column32:
[{"Name":"Anonymous","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QfjHmZg8gr7jpDgKhrh5KsR_Mq7L6pkVedvpKQz-f3LMiOd3OjI90CK4uLtF3wE59zZgA=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"As soon as we got into our room on the first night, we could smell cigarette smoke and this smell persisted in our room & in public areas inside throughout our entire stay. The hotel was overall dirty and staff were incredibly rude and aggressive. 
On the day we were checking out, one of the staff women walked up to our door and accused us of smoking even though it had smelled like that the entire time. I tried to explain politely that it had been that way and that neither me nor my wife smoke cigarettes or anything else. The staff lady got very aggressive and rude and said she was taking our entire deposit + charging us an additional fee. 
I want my money back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jayden Jepson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_GKuuvOcO2HL4GLNAZtRYnx4ltlYI8f3f4SEcv_M_DSbW5yk5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This was hands down one of the worst hotel experiences I‚Äôve ever had. The advertised rate online was over $100 per night, yet the receipt I was given clearly showed $85 for the same stay. Despite that, I was still charged the higher amount. It feels dishonest, and I strongly suspect guests are being overcharged without realizing it.

The room itself was in terrible condition. The floorboards were peeling up, and the bathroom was filthy when we arrived. There‚Äôs clearly no effort being made to maintain or clean the rooms properly. For what they charge, the quality is absolutely unacceptable.

The customer service only made things worse. After realizing I had left an item behind, I called to arrange to have it shipped to me at my own expense. The person claiming to be the manager refused, citing a ‚Äúpolicy‚Äù that they can‚Äôt make any shipments. I don‚Äôt believe that for a second ‚Äî it sounded more like they just didn‚Äôt want to be bothered or intended to keep or sell left-behind items.

Between the dishonest pricing, disgusting room conditions, and complete lack of professionalism from the staff, this hotel is a disgrace to the hospitality industry. Do yourself a favor and stay anywhere else ‚Äî even sleeping in your car would be a cleaner, more honest experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Govula Bhavani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUf-eczOlnvU9y4-Q-5S4GiiPEPk0WE-U2bYManuH-SUfoO4R0QRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We stayed here on Christmas night while traveling with our elderly parents, and because of the holiday and the late hour, it was not possible for us to find another hotel. Unfortunately, that left us stuck in a very bad situation.

The room we were given was already in poor condition ‚Äî dirty and stained bedsheets, general lack of cleanliness, and maintenance issues. We reported this immediately. Instead of fixing the problem properly, the front desk suggested we go to another motel, even though it was Christmas night and we were with elderly family members. They then moved us to another room that was only slightly better but still not clean.

After checkout, the hotel charged us an extra $250 without any notice or permission, and only later claimed that we had ‚Äúmade the room dirty.‚Äù This is how the scam works: they provide rooms that are already dirty, do not provide proper housekeeping, and then later blame guests and take extra money from their cards.

When we called to question the charge, the front desk person acted like a manager, refused to listen, and told us to dispute it with our bank instead of resolving the issue.

This was a very stressful and unfair experience, and I strongly recommend others be careful staying here, especially during busy times when you have no alternative options.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anonymous","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QfjHmZg8gr7jpDgKhrh5KsR_Mq7L6pkVedvpKQz-f3LMiOd3OjI90CK4uLtF3wE59zZgA=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"While the woman at the front desk was AMAZING and very helpful, the property was not. It says they are undergoing renovations, this is a lie. The rooms have lamps with land line phone plugs, there is no where to plug a usb cord. There are homeless people living here, it smelled of weed and decades of people‚Äôs cooking. The people loitering out front made it feel unsafe. I was thankful to not be alone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anonymous","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QfjHmZg8gr7jpDgKhrh5KsR_Mq7L6pkVedvpKQz-f3LMiOd3OjI90CK4uLtF3wE59zZgA=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"The carpets are dirty and not vacuumed. The door knob to the bathroom in the room I stayed in is need of attention ,loose. The bathtub drains very slowly, drain cleaner? The phone in the room I stayed in didn't work. The staff though were friendly and understanding. The vending machines are expensive.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Trip.com Member","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeCck1CfANpZm9bBk3PHtP97Kh9k25HZfvq9yAWlN3BaIyjSHUPEfWkhAJmuYiJsH-_6g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Reception was very nice. But never been to place so dirty ( especially Hall way) like this. The door handle was broken.¬†I know I have selected inexpensive place to stay just a night. However I have stayed other places with same prices, it was much more cleaner.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jason Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIBDmzQDis0mDSrnMIVFUatPBhcI1xPMUthDgvjcMCuW7PCiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The rooms were weirdly designed and had    some awkward and malfunctioning features. To lend a luggage cart, you have to deposit your ID cards until you return it. It was also not ready when we arrived at the hotel exhausted. There were also no sheets. Even though the location of the hotel is fine, it is still overall very disappointing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anonymous","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QfjHmZg8gr7jpDgKhrh5KsR_Mq7L6pkVedvpKQz-f3LMiOd3OjI90CK4uLtF3wE59zZgA=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"The room ok, but not great.  They first assigned us to a room that hadnt been cleaned, so they had to give us a different room. The bed was extremely firm and uncomfortable. The kitchen area was outdated. The overall appearance of the hotel was dingy and old. The carpet in the hallways is very old and almost black. The area around the hotel is sketchy.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column3: Days Inn by Wyndham Las Vegas Airport Near the Strip
column5: 5075 Koval Ln, Las Vegas, NV 89119
column18: Relaxed budget hotel offering free continental breakfast & an airport shuttle, plus an outdoor pool.
column29: {"id":"113931224030103638554","name":"Days Inn by Wyndham Las Vegas Airport Near the Strip (Owner)","link":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113931224030103638554"}
column31: null
column32: [{"Name":"Emilie Ratsimeuang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKZcrKvDtLyKYUJja7Kmk_gVuUTlnzo-04liJtEidsqODbGJaM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Although our shower faucet handle at room 252 seems unreliable...but with gentle care all 4 of us were able to shower with warm water in this December weather.  Shuttle is $4 per person. Hotel is not sound proof so we can hear EVERYTHING and we were woken up by a group of loud, drunk people at 2am something. BUT IT'S VEGAS! They are here to have fun can't find faults in that. Affordable price. Breakfast is grab-n-go fruits and pastries. All very healthy for you. Affordable price. Room very clean. I would definitely stay here again. Last time we visited Vegas and stayed at Luxor Hotel, I didn't even get any free breakfast...not even a banana!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBMiMyWZnD_-o3YyaLJH_oB\u0026fid=0x0:0x8fca0fd970fd50af"],"When":"2025-12-22"},{"Name":"Christina Rayh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUy-DCOhs21C8vUp_jd5STAiQYrrkvRkVZvi_TgfFLUlesI9VUn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely loving my stay here. Room is so clean, even smells amazing. Towels are soft which is hard to do with all the laundry they have to keep up with. Also have to say the coffee is 10/10 for as far as motel coffee goes and available all day and night. It‚Äôs only a few minutes walk from the MGM where I lost 40 bucks on the machines and their ATMs are a 11.00 charge! So get your cash before you go. Lyft from the airport about 25, so it‚Äôs almost worth not having a rental for short trip. Just wanted to say my stay here so far has been fantastic and I‚Äôm super happy with this motel. Even the parking lot is clean!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINIJvmVNLjc3t6BJ6U25LEPEuRp3oNbREpjNA_Q2sIgCrLWw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stayed a night in September 2025. Ideally located. I took an Uber to the other end of the Strip and walked back. Great pool. Management was awesome. Dennys nearby. Excellent motel.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCDiMVBkVW7bLlDLqUjSfoL\u0026fid=0x0:0x8fca0fd970fd50af"],"When":"2026-1-5"},{"Name":"Gisselle Ramirez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK99fTJxTEf-iOne97wEOC_Kpj_vzuvdCNdXWEu5vq34VpSFw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hotel has all your necessary amenities for a great stay.  It is also very close to the strip. It‚Äôs clean, good atmosphere and To Go breakfast included !! We had stayed in December 2025 and for all these reasons we came back. Staff is very friendly and helpful too .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mr. C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgDpQCAk1jKdV1xtSNv7z7XIuqTHbUtVVZoseDwvDSxIPYuYksZg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Clean and spacious room at reasonable price. Great location, near MGM Grand. Friendly staff and driver. Good to have airport shuttle service (departs every hour, call them to book in advance). Air-con is a bit loud at night be tolerable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCNFRSEQF-yoy0Kwa3J8s8w\u0026fid=0x0:0x8fca0fd970fd50af"],"When":"2025-12-16"},{"Name":"Victor Vdovin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIw2dsGc5KRLvRqNSV8KsCesv_FWX7zEYnJE454BGnPiX6Yg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great stay for a short visit to Las Vegas, I have been to a conference, and this hotel‚Äôs location is Monorail, And as such any other axis is close by. Room Was clean, breakfast was light but sufficient, and the hotel and it surroundings were are quiet during the night. I recommend this place for a nice, safe Trip on budget","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nagaraj Raghavendran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXb5o0vnoj_VcvzQ36rtz3ax2rFS-RiuGKWVFNPSyKMRWhUppZK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great location near to strip. Room is small but good for short term stays. Mattress is comfortable.. 0.7 miles walk to strip area.. Price is good.. Breakfast is just grab and go. Very limited items.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"AndyCrais","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QfjHmZg8gr7jpDgKhrh5KsR_Mq7L6pkVedvpKQz-f3LMiOd3OjI90CK4uLtF3wE59zZgA=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Walking distance to the strip and 24hr food options. Check-in: Prompt friendly service. Room: Clean and everything worked. Comfortable bed. Plenty of plug-ins to charge electronics and they were in places that made sense. No shortage of hot water. Low-cost airport shuttle, limited availability. Limited breakfast options but at least it is included. ||We just found out about this place. Had we known, we would've stayed here more often. Will definitely stay here again.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column5: 1502 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89104
column18: Plain rooms in a basic adults-only hostel offering complimentary parking & Wi-Fi, plus a restaurant.
column31: null
column32:
[{"Name":"Alex Rosskopf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXxEl2KZqbKHGRGKhPo-PlLlPbxp0QOGyZTtJnltSa4DAu3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"All I did was book a 2 night stay a couple weeks ahead of time. The next day after booking my reservation, there was fraudulent activity on my credit card.

DO NOT STAY HERE","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mikayla Neff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJ52aM1oAK2eH-xZDWeqYf14XKkqTMIuE2X4lu1g_uSSHBmXPJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It's a "you get what you payed for" situation no doubt. The area around was mostly those Vegas wedding chapels, with a substantial homeless population. The room itself was safe but the sheets one one of the beds were dirty and stained. The bathrooms were clean and a shared situation. There was a strong smell of smoke, and the fire alarms went off in the middle of the night due to some people partying in another room.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"markaQ5743LD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QftlnsLB8VReEIa8q3x-FUIWL9jAVnw9OiPzFml0xLx7k1DporKgZdMXGALflbNzntF3w=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"We got to the hotel i try to check in and the lady that was a de desk told me she did not have any rooms they where all sold out!, So i had my wife come in to the office and tell the lady we had call the day before to make sure we had a room and show her the booking number. The lady told me well i can give you a smaller room not the bungalow is already reserve but i have to charge you for room change,.??? Please note:  We where talking all this time in English. I told the lady i was going to call my credit card company and agoda, She said that is fine i will call then and cancel for you!. WHAT? why would you do that?., Well you do not want any room, No! we have a reservation and got confirm Yesturday Mam!. I ask to talk to the ownerand she said SHE is the Owner!? OK! That was not true.So i got on the phone and told the lady i was calling you and put it on speaker phone , then she found the the room!.||OK! thank you! buy this time my wife was really mad. She was trying to make us cancel! We Still had to pay for cancelling full amount. People keep knocking on the door all night, people where fighting outside of the room, we where not able to sleep due to the police siren all night long. We are never going back to this Place EVER!.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Serverio Fernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU37vWgKwxYuXXp6KIklkWRtB8NK-l9uE-oK5vW-lhlmiRZK4Enxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Bathrooms are communal. Rooms are small and very simple. Just a bed, a small table and chair, and a tv. It isn't bad for a 1 or 2 night stay but you can get a lot more for about 30 bucks extra. Place was clean and staff was nice. Parking is VERY limited and you have to enter through a backdoor which is inconvenient and a little shady.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"F. L.O.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZb6Vv1d_5pa4tY6B8GXFqUHaVok5G4MNvWMGvFBn0yWMmhQk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Not a B+B despite the name; it's a hostel. No breakfast, just coffee. Private rooms that are clean, no bugs, air conditioning and quiet. Shared bathrooms but one for boys and one for girls. Arrive by 10pm as front desk is not 24hr as advertised. Call day before and day of to verify reservation (they had cancelled ours as a mistake). Questionable neighborhood so you may not be safe walking anyware; driving okay. Parking enclosed but not gated; yet they have cameras everywhere. Friendly staff. Good enough for adults but I wouldn't bring kids.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paula Pinkston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVf6tvN8gLVWYmnnpxnwGMvhyjppSIjLCCTrOt-jjFGSCDsBro5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The room is immaculate very clean airy roomie, Bathroom is Down the Hall, I Didn't get to view it . No Cleaning facility is in the rooms at All, No coffee in the room No continental breakfast.  It is upstairs , All the rooms,  I give it a Two Star the employees are very courteous , employable , very friendly and family-oriented . $70.00 a Nite with Deposit.  You make Your own Judgement on this business .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ghoast","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK34yQjuTeG_Sll7tYJS-t92PF9hQnQ6GHNQc75wHy56j8WZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We checked in, got into our room, and instantly turned back around and gave them the keys back. The room was extremely small with one full bed that was very uncomfortable just sitting on it. It's 113¬∞ in Vegas and the thermostat in the room is locked and the window was open in the room when we arrived. The room is about the size of a jail cell and the bathroom is outside of the room down the hall. We seriously left the room within 5 minutes and checked out, and offered my girlfriend a 40% refund. But all that being said, given the location, it was probably the cleanest one I've seen around there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Blaze","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQq1jOQw03ybVkardxRdXPTw1zFi5Qce30YN_487X-hxuSpcYk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It's cheap but don't do it.
Sketchy ppl, vibes, and area. Cigarette smell everywhere. Communal bathrooms. Room were eh and the bedding did smell clean. Staff was dry. It's all very worn down. Loud guests. If I would've stayed through the night, I wouldn't have left my room bc I wasnt going to leave my belongings alone in the room. I showed up and checked in but I quickly scrambled to find alternative sleeping arrangements and bounced. Sacrificed my payment.
Totally regret my interaction here.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column3: Extended Stay America - Las Vegas - Midtown
column5: 3045 S Maryland Pkwy, Las Vegas, NV 89109
column18: Simple studios with kitchenettes in an unfussy hotel with free Wi-Fi, breakfast & parking.
column31: null
column32:
[{"Name":"Keiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcA2M2P-l3UKhtAJglzaV4noGALAEWXl5MWb-qfvrE2ukd3wvB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Front desk... Angelica is super helpful and has been here for eight years... You can only stay three weeks so be aware and you can't come back ever after the three weeks....used to have security but not anymore since choice hotels took over.. $100 deposit makes no sense. You can tell the hotel is dated.. Old carpet but they are working on upgrading it... No first floor rooms as of end of December
Some rooms are updated but nothing to write home about. They are working on the road so be aware.. Denny's is next door. Had to stay here until we moved to our new place
Hope they redo the hotel better
It is showing it's age","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"lindasue duncan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrlu7_nqmcHHtr6tJuYPeWIJoUBINqz6uqUy8sMcjCJ4fwoz2N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ena, a front desk agent was above and beyond. My husband had to go emergency heart surgery. He was flown in from another state, leaving me here with out transportation and friends... Until I met Ena. Her kindness, smile and laugh made my week long stay much more pleasant than I was expecting. Ena sets the bar of excellence.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Renee Logan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZwag1ztZJgn_AidSUSI-jQDq13yqkaPhqE_Z2gbipjtZNzelW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have enjoyed my stay there. The front desk personnel are awesome. I needed a room downstairs for medical reasons and they have taken great care of me. It isn't far from the strip either. Thank you to everyone there","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrs5D4wCoWj9dkQdBEPQSkQs_YwOrL1ZTPX2H5aLM-rvdj_x83=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The front desk lady that worked middays was awesome always had great conversations. Rooms was more like a studio apartment with a full-size kitchen stove and sink","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jojo Towery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgmlcHkmdWisiiOX7CKBrjh8vr0qrMktN_talyk5kLBw-3Vw7u=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"So I won't lie.  The rooms suck. They are outdated, the bed is uncomfortable, pillows smelt weird and overall it was not great. But, the woman who was working the desk last Friday 5/9 was the SWEETEST person I've ever met. We chose this hotel because a family friends child was in ICU at sunrise and it was the closest one. Not only did she help get us a good rate, she listened to us and made a bad day a little better. She was so unbelievably sweet and even with the outdated room we were happy simply because she was there to listen. Thank you so much! I don't remember her name but she deserves the world ‚ù§Ô∏è","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pablo Bruno","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKeHkEaOtewaJCPHd0uVoPPavD0HUpSGPZDf2D7rJjIMa4DaBVXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good location if you need to go to Convention centre, rooms are OK and aligned with their price. I will stay there again next year","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lashaunda Whitlow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_bWuJNSm7eSamFbgCEN2SDGcFjyOspaZa4ImxKQhAjvY1jnmE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The floor and bedding were not clean. There were no towels to bathe with. The only towels provided were (2) hand towels that I had to use to clean the floor. The hotel dryers were broken so they didn't provide replacement towels although they told me they would after the weekend. I checked between the sheets before lying my 3-year-old in the bed and noticed there were multiple strands of brunette-colored hair throughout the king-sized bed which also matched hair along the walls of the shower. I brought my concerns to the front desk along with first the towels and later with the bedding. I was told that housekeeping would be informed to address the situation but nothing had been done to address the problem. Although I'd paid for 1 week I was forced to stay elsewhere for a night until I was able to pay to clean the bedding which I'd done the following day in the hotel's residence laundry room costing nearly $10. The hotel didn't have the amenities for the kitchen inside the room. I purchased my a.m. coffee from a diner the 1st two days of my stay because there were no coffee makers available in addition to that utensils to prepare meals and cups had to be purchased as well to safely store and drink my coffee. This experience was the worst I've experienced. The reason for booking a suite with a kitchenette seemed to be more cost-efficient than one without. I could have stayed elsewhere with a comp breakfast and a properly cleaned room near the same location and saved approximately 100+ dollars. I am highly disappointed do to the false advertisement and the lack of concern and hospitality in this establishment.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcBJr8MAGhsTxqZDvpmobzxOQ4lLIGGQm7ULXKE_nkq1YtLHs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great hotel with lots of security highly recommend great food and staff rooms are clean","Images":null,"When":""}]

column5: 105 E Harmon Ave, Las Vegas, NV 89109
column18: Casual accommodations with kitchenettes in a modern hotel with free Wi-Fi, a gym & an outdoor pool.
column31: [{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"LGBTQ+ friendly","enabled":true}]}]
column32:
[{"Name":"Michael Strickland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLK6dMcc8Yf4nyg-qd2yhY-ghaCYbqDYRbcVZXveMwYIApwdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Although smaller than other hotels in the area this made it quieter and more homely. The staff on reception were excellent with a quick check in and also allowing us to park as we were early to check in. The room was enormous and excellently equipped. The pool is closed at present but this didn't matter to us although I believe you can use the pool in the hotel next door. A short walk to the strip made this an ideal choice for us as a family","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Liz Shannon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJsaoU4J0bf6YbK8Vfr-zsxeWOYUntSX9ssXvm8wKGvuTmGpU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stay at The Carriage House every year during NFR and Cowboy Christmas, and overall it continues to be a solid, dependable choice ‚Äî especially for longer stays.

One of the biggest pros is the location. It‚Äôs close to the Las Vegas Convention Center, which is incredibly convenient during a packed NFR schedule, and it‚Äôs also easy to get to restaurants, shopping, and everything else Vegas offers. Another huge plus is that some rooms include full kitchens, which is a game changer for multi-week stays. Being able to cook real food, store groceries, and not eat takeout for every meal makes a noticeable difference.

That said, there are a few ongoing drawbacks. There seems to be quite a bit of staff turnover, and newer team members aren‚Äôt always familiar with the property or the little nuances that repeat guests come to know after staying here multiple years. It‚Äôs not a dealbreaker, but it‚Äôs noticeable if you‚Äôve been coming back year after year like our same group has.

Another con is the consistent F1 teardown noise, which often happens overnight on the streets around the hotel, honestly was not as bad this year as its been in the past 5 years. Additionally, the pool and hot tub area has been ‚Äúunder construction‚Äù for the last two years. We were just there last week, and it was essentially a full rubble pile. Hopefully that means real progress is finally happening and it‚Äôll be completed by spring or summer 2026 ‚Äî because that would be a big improvement.

All in all, it‚Äôs still a dependable option for NFR / time in Las Vegas, especially if you value location and having a kitchen / larger space. I think it‚Äôll be even better once renovations are finished.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jackmason69","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0Qdx0CtChWdL4amzhVtedU6JgNzs3A9KzPS8K998c7-u-mDeTb-7WQwuTD-PPX6BcVA5wg=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"The hotel was just off the main strip but close enough to walk to . The room was enormous and quiet and had everything we needed including a full kitchen and large lounge. The ladies on reception were very good and allowed us to park as we arrived early for check in and leave the car on our last day whilst we spent more time on the strip. Overall an excellent choice of hotel.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"DesertPrincessDubai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0Qczn4VDfUM6-AtEt-6oaNazFa-i9Fy6kqPVfGIlPil6vJulEYyK8t930jZwOW4hD80mzw=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"We had two rooms for our family of six. Plenty of room (I think we were lucky and received a complimentary upgrade on one of the rooms). Great bang for our buck as it was clean, spacious and location perfect. We had housekeeping staff (I think Alice was her name) running around for us getting extra pillows and blankets but they were great - nothing was too much hassle.  Definitely recommend this hotel.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"SavvyTraveler759","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeFH6dzZjd_ZFLhXHZKibEzXEy8hWzFB4Qa7PutLe3CnO2G7yVfjd4VSabiCQwQYo5W-g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"The location was good but there was a F1 race about to take place while there which made driving a nightmare.  The swimming pool was down although next door was accessible .  The staff was friendly and the rooms were nice.  Surprisingly better than I expected so my overall stay was very good and I would recommend The Carriage House.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Justin Stauffer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLI4LtTSpzvF6cZgUkthK0GsgpXZv3klObeQ1gXTtzGl_uw5w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great location Great staff. Small place compared to other places around it but it still didn't what we needed. Sadly the pool is closed. That was a pain. We had to walk to the next hotel to getting access to their pool. So we at least got free access to another pool. I wish they had a designated time or asked us what time room service should come. Other than that very happy. Very short walk to the strip too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"travelsportfam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeqQESQs2CRf2VRyln1Raq0k2FSdB19mGKme5Xh6nHXcs2V7pTrOayJAdxC-qWdu9VyTA=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Great customer service. Housekeeping is very quick to respond with extra pillows and towels. Also like that they provided a roll away for our daughter so she did not have to sleep on the pull out couch.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashton Levin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjzcrEnu7tYvAe1oq7FuHOYEkU2ZstaW33_eVyyed8W2K1EZE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Giving a 1 star review because my rental car was hit in the front parking lot directly under the lights and cameras where I was assured whoever hit me would be captured. I was told the hotel staff would review the footage and get back to me ideally by EOD. It‚Äôs been several weeks (incident occurred first week in Dec) and still nothing from them. I called again today and called the police and until they release the footage I am responsible for the damages. Which cost 3x more than the hotel stay was.

Would never stay here again. Strongly advise against it given the lack of safety or accountability. If you have any information regarding the hit and run would be greatly appreciated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAbpbdVQLQenJXO4dSQB29S&fid=0x0:0x117c65cbd58cf3f6"],"When":"2025-12-22"}]

[{"Name":"Taylor Deas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuCosIc0BzQOWkIlE7dIfL2ha-GYmfiBMpy6pil9L6y5ILf77o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"**PROS:**low fare, historic building, near by a lot of locations with ride share, fun decoration, good AC, Fridge, a microwave, shower. Hot water gets HOT fast. Cable, If you love 50‚Äôs style for sure you‚Äôll love the decorative style. QUICK walk to convince stores across the street IN THE DAY TIME. Near a lot of 24 hour food spots so door dash was always available and quick.
**SERVICE:** Didn‚Äôt really ask or need service, so I don‚Äôt know how they were with problems. But the one time we talked to them they were kind, helped us out, and allowed us to check in early because our flight was so early.
**CONS:**the location mainly, don‚Äôt bring your children here. It‚Äôs really a whatever thing if you‚Äôre like us. We stayed there to sleep and that was it. Prostitutes were in and out of neighbors (it‚Äôs legal there so honestly DGAF ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è) so many buildings are closed and burned down, the pool is empty, our bedding was dirty and had burn holes in it, a lot of homeless in the area at one point a lady got on her knees and started screaming in the street. Another guy told her she needed Jesus and so she chased him lol
I live in a similar area so it‚Äôs wasn‚Äôt too big of a deal and for such a low fare I legitimately CAN NOT complain.
If you can handle yourself, you‚Äôre not a timid person, mind your business, it‚Äôs a great stay.
But the photos FOR SURE need to be updated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCT8UEhfta47F5a5Z8SuaI0&fid=0x0:0xfd83a130d65ddde8"],"When":"2025-10-19"},{"Name":"378kcg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeWB0GIG9gGd6g9zDFXwjE9TRuKRtAO6HvwA5jEdK_CrOJXcVxp8esjQRYTFMjay2JK=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Seems like they are trying to delete the reviews I‚Äôm leaving on Google, so I will post here as well. DO NOT STAY HERE. My partner and I stayed here last year during Memorial Day weekend, and after checking out, they charged us over $500 for a missing guitar decoration. They accused us of stealing and did not notify us of the reason for the charge until we called. Then they said they would run their own investigation and check their camera footage. They ended up refunding us the money but overall they are very shady and did not reply to any emails we sent. We even partnered with a consumer advocacy group who offered to mediate on our behalf. This hotel and management caused us significant emotional distress. Can‚Äôt recommend enough DO NOT stay here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marie Hassett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXROUw5wty_5J3s-BDt6kovYIzhuLK_e0oaqtFQbTw4jZ3Ur2M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The location is great( fast food and gas station really close by),rooms are clean and the service is excellent. I give  the Desert Hills 5 stars ..","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nagat Galal El-Din","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIPlh8fIglkUP77UDyakonXrU2dlNc7P1h_2szH9qIJPIgWqPl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Would give 0 stars if I could. Customer service bar is all the way in hell plus communication is the absolute worst. Had an issue with my flight and aside from the few times I was able to reach someone; when I called back to ask questions and to provide info for someone to check in all calls went unanswered as if they wanted to avoid me to get my room. Would never book with this place again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paula Tate","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzAkqH96qP0jeK1D5maiMSQoty9m4IqPm49hGrts7q64zcToDf9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"When we got to the room, there was nobody there we were told to go to another location to pick up a key we picked up the key made it back To this motel, just open the door and close it lock it and take the key back. I think this place is not fit for a DOG The place smell like mold, other reviews said roaches and bedbugs. I cannot this place needs to be shut down. I had to go and find another room in a better spot so I can lay my head down and be safe if anybody is on this site trying to get a room here don‚Äôt waste your money. Don‚Äôt waste your time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Prince P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVO_UdU5FMJ8rwwpRIVIZ1xOoLzYvTZzneSOvi8pqmMAigarBKD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Update: they did send money back after sometime but way more than weeks
_-----------

I waited one week to write this review.
Biggest issue- they'll ask $100 cash refundable (as they say) but I(and almost everyone read other reviews) didn't get back as they wouldn't return deposit before 9 am and they if you'll leave we'll post you I called after 2 days they said they've posted it's been a week now I haven‚Äôt got my money back.
2. The place is real shaddy and you'll feel your in some insecure suburbs.
3. The office is roughly 12-15mins of walk away from the actual place of stay. They provide address on the day of check-in. So be ready to carry your stuff or do another uber if you haven't rented car from airport.
4.the old man on counter gave me keys of single queen while we booked double queen so I had to go again to get the keys.
5. Please don't book this place if you get any other option
And yes read the one star reviews they are most precise description of place and 5star ratings looks unrealistic to me.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Javier Alvarado","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlL7pI3jk1qmB4vVhXQdVv2C9DMh8QhfX6mtfcA-OMP_HOr_Ov=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The room was a complete mess when we came in. You have to check in at a different location, the pool wasn‚Äôt available, the housekeeping ladies carried their cleaning supplies in a shopping cart. The bathroom was very dirty, and the beds had no cover by the time we came in. We came out of state to enjoy Vegas for a weekend and we had to spend a good amount of our afternoon to get out here. Didn‚Äôt even feel safe leaving anything in there. The front desk lady was very nice and professional and did help us get our money back, but everything else was horrible.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Quinten Klingonsmith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXK8Il8jrKic58R_Kmw7dCuqHzGk-8oeOX1z9MC0lQJED3KT8jEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We were looking for an affordable place to sleep for a few hours after the U2 concert. It was clean, quiet, and the bed was comfortable. It is old and not on the nicest side of town. In fact, when we drove up to the place we really second guessed our decision to book here. But  the room, themed with old roadside signs, retro fridge, clock radio, and lockers for a closet, sort of grew on us. We got a good night's sleep and are ready for a long drive home.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC5qbuZUA&fid=0x0:0xfd83a130d65ddde8"],"When":"2023-10-15"}]

Perfect stop on our road trip from San Francisco through Death Valley and etc, before flying out of Phoenix. The room was super clean and comfy, and the staff were really friendly. Loved the location too ‚Äì easy to get downtown and back on the highway. Great value for the price. We‚Äôll definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCGQ1dK5USwdxesS0AK7vkV\u0026fid=0x0:0x85f21b8bb6a6c48a"],"When":"2025-9-6"},{"Name":"michaeleH9431UP","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QftlnsLB8VReEIa8q3x-FUIWL9jAVnw9OiPzFml0xLx7k1DporKgZdMXGALflbNzntF3w=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"After driving all day, my family and I could not get into our house so we decided to stay here for one night. We checked in and almost 7 PM was not informed until last minute about the $125 deposit and the $12 incidental fee for Internet parking and one water. We‚Äôre given a room with one bed for three people slept on top of the covers brought in her own pillows and blankets. Bathroom sink was backed up. Did not eat in the room. Did not shower. All we did Was sleep and leave by 11 AM the next morning. Two weeks later I called about the $125 deposit. They informed me over the phone that maid service found tons of dog hair and the room smelled. Told her the sink was backed up, Maybe the smell was from that I don‚Äôt recall. All I was doing was sleeping. She gave me the email address for the front desk said they would handle it. No response to date. Not worth it, not very clean, not a good value, homeless people doing drugs, walking around the property, if I‚Äôd had small children I would‚Äôve slept in the car before taking them to this property","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jaimiharrison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0Qc_m0BOt0e288CC5xVhlFJeGbeLoq1HoB7h5IAKHAwOrWyFaFWxIwsJ8EDSK3zkB1-qng=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"As a group of five college students this place was great for us! The room was a little hot, the carpet a little dirty and there were no amenities like fridge or coffee but for the price we paid this was definitely worth it! The beds were comfy and the bathroom was clean aside from one cockroach scurrying in. |Perfect location, right on the south end of the Strip, we were able to just walk up and down the Strip all day and night easily.|Surprisingly great stay for what we had expected from a very cheap motel!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Margie Groce","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK74A3KjWkfOiLOiiuPPl2gFd-RgW1aYtL6cKJeZbV45G5Dzg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"When we booked online we requested a family room. We got into the room we had 2 queen beds for 5 of us 3 kids 2 adults. When next door has the 3 beds. The hotel is disgusting. Staff is horrible we asked for extra towels because there was only enough for 2 of us. The guys had major attitude over it. Then when asked if they had maid service the 2 men said they didnt. Check in is a joke you have to check in inside the store. Again you get what u pay for. Take our advice NEVER EVER stay here pay the extra for a nicer better cleaner place!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"103bunnys","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeWB0GIG9gGd6g9zDFXwjE9TRuKRtAO6HvwA5jEdK_CrOJXcVxp8esjQRYTFMjay2JK=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"At the time I am staying here, the ownership has recently changed. This is a sweet little retro motel in a great location, the staff is caring and warm. No fridge, microwave, or coffee maker but McD's and Subway and an awesome pizza shop are nearby. I'm quite satisfied and I'd much rather stay here than a fancy overpriced casino/hotel. :-) It is right near the airport so one can obviously hear the air traffic. My room is cozy and comfortable and I feel safe.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lynne8387","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QdVsxDWqDDLG62Q3M3dmLlHORJs5jz0NWRJO3cP21KtRNPfosO7RpofjnbUgpyNjOTDew=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Motels of this quality should not be on Trip Advisor except with a warning not to go there. This place looks like it rents by the hour or that drug addicts or the homeless live there. There is no office; you \"register\" in the convenience store next to the palm reader. The area is sketchy, the people are sketchy, and it was so frightening at 11pm that I wouldn't even get out of the taxi. The town was sold out under $600/night or I wouldn't have considered it, but I thought it was like a Motel 6, and the rate that night was about $200, so I thought I could do that for one night. But I couldn't. It really is so disreputable and scary that women, especially, should be warned against going there. And there are a number of storage sheds like you might buy at Home Depot for your backyard, but they have a door and window, so I wonder if they put some guests in those? !! It was dirty, scary, totally awful. It doesn't look anything list the picture or listing. In my case, Hilton took care of me and gave me a nice room at Tropicana instead. Yes, people have different tastes, but nothing this scary or dangerous should be on the site except as a Stay Away warning.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dalton Christal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6xf99hxtnQMIadpgg0VHvSBNPWjaDWdVJsJlBT1d0W26zRgK3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"For the price, you can't beat it on the strip. About a third of the cost as other hotels. Now, you typically do end up paying for what you get, however, this place wasn't too bad. It wasn't all that clean and you can tell people use this place for prostitution often. Other than that, it was good. Just used it for sleep and shower","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steel Urgod","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrrQPG73h6UXgnu9b8FgLAie81rJH2u1W7daGy0mpOeWn9JQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great stay here the staff has been amazing treated us like family I have 2 big dogs wasn't a problem at all and one even accidentally broke a window . No problem no extra charge they understood and I felt safe most importantly.  Sure the place is dated but it is still like the last old vegas style hotel left it's definitely worth the price  .I would stay here again and for all the people having issues I cam assure you you all must have been a$$ h@\u003e\u0026$ because the staff here is very friendly and helpful if your polite to them . If you want an affordable rate for vegas trip then come here","Images":null,"When":""}]

The host screwed my reservation up as I wanted the Suite but only got a 2 bedroom. The entire place was really small even for 5 people. Its not worth it! Spend the extra money and go stay in a villa i promise it will be worth it. Only upside was being on the strip and everything was walking distance which was great but the room and service was not worth the money! I love Vegas but will never stay at this property again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cameron Hooper","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6wqvZB7kJUZLG_A14ggqOaNzDMMo_wV5Nq9T-cZPelv_gmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This room was awesome and we had a great view of the strip. It was a great place for 6 of us to stay, I would 100% stay here again and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a full kitchen that can sleep a lot of people! I have absolutely no complaints.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joann Vue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLM5br9exUPOnihwAyn2pfM_zXbQz8MNEYvLc6GU2Z65zt2_w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Booked this room for the weekend. This place is right in the middle of the strip so that was a plus for us. The place was nice clean and the beds were comfortable. The host was was great. Answered questions that we had. Was very satisfied with our stay. Thanks for making our stay great. Will definitely come back here whenever we come back to vegas.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mia Blank","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSdoxlfl60DiBMkXpZ4s54bWWLbesJjw2l0Orj36IWY801uuj0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent location!\nWe had a group of five young men (mid-20s) stay and each had his own bed. column5: 1300 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89104
column31: null
column32: [{"Name":"Randy ‚ÄúIlio Hihiu‚Äù Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwAaB7YWIVRrW7dyHhY4AjUK_TAOjs6HZTJNhn7NbXXNUBqAkV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my better hotel experiences in Vegas, one of those \"don't ask don't tell\" type places. That being said, don't expect fibe star furnishings and what not, it's not that kinda place. It's cheap, it's decently located, right down the block from Dino's place which is an excellent 21+ joint.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tiffany McElfresh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXqnX2H_AWfWGmpMjrD7SmtbB6lQiIhfpOhuxQze5ILCzuXZmS7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Way to expensive for what you get. I had friends staying here too so I saw inside 3 of the rooms. It seems like they furnished these rooms by dumpster diving, there's holes in the walls and ceiling, not a lot but still a few cockroaches and neighbors fighting from midnight until 2pk when finally did someone step in and make them leave. Lady at the front desk was extremely rude commenting that I have too much luggage for only staying a few delays, I didn't know there was a limit on suitcase you can bring to a motel. And when I decided to extend a few more days each day I went to pay there kept being no one in the office or coming to the door when the doorbell. I had to keep coming back out to check since it would be past check out time. I saw other people just standing out in the cold for at least 1 1/2 - 2hrs!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ebony Felder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI--WPtTZBToIQCr3QmW2L4GEi2aI6UBV7v9MDA1P7bjubHq-U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went to pick up a friend. 4 cars in parking lot covered with dust and all with flat tires. Pool empty with trash in it. Her room was extremely hot, tv didn't work.. neighbors all had their doors open. Cops showed up. Kept worrying about my car. Had to leave. The plus side is her room looked clean.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrea Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_TjI5sYWZI4QBtzF_v-tgzFE9qLBo5tP0osIDxewZqH1MIQ8i=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Don't stay here. There's roaches in all the rooms. The rooms is not clean.  The so called maid told me to get the dirty towels out the room she was going to rent me. Til i told her that's her job. One of the rooms they duck tape the window. The room i rented had no heater and i got sick behind it. They overcharge for rooms for the price they want it at. There's drug addicts in-out the rooms all day and night. Don't waste your money. Don't stay there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kristen Zabrowski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOY6Ts-ug1yCvfgdYGKbn1EdsOb6JO8OAhvTOhEsOHgH-1XqT6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This place is... almost hard to describe it's so run down and sketchy. We've stayed here a couple times out of necessity when we had a hard time finding an affordable room at the last minute, and it is nice being able to just give the front desk person a $20 for the deposit rather than racking up resort fees + $150 or more that the nice hotels require as a deposit upfront... But having seen multiple rooms on the inside, we can confirm that all that's left in the room is literally whatever can be bolted down. The beds are like bad pull out couch/cot style beds. The water constantly fluctuated between ice cold \u0026 scalding hot. I definitely, definitely, definitely would not recommend leaving anything of value in your car. Overall, you're getting exactly what you pay for so it shouldn't be a surprise that it's not exactly a nice place to stay. But if your priority is saving money, it's always an option down past the Strat end of the strip.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"HENDO","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWM8H9qNKpg5J2LP_6e2cdv-qQq4EylrbuXy-c8iPThxnFKproB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ok. This joint is unacceptable! Start off with no towels, no soap, filthy carpets, walls, furniture, 90s tv 80s furniture and the ac went out in the middle of the night due to a filthy air filter. Office staff are unprofessional and dismissive offering no help nor showed any concern. Actually heard the office lady curssing out load for some reason very disrespectful, poorly dressed and looks like she lives on the street aside from body odor. The african American at office totally lazy and rude. They didn't even apologize for their lack of supervision on this property.i really hate to leave a bad review but costumers need to know.\nOne good thing to say. Finally security actually doing their job. I observed plain clothes security follow and stop someone at 1 am who was knocking on a guest room door. Very alert and professional kepping the hotel nice, quiet and secured. Good job a Mr Jackson! Should you stay at this filthy? PLEASE READ all reviews and steer clear of this place. I'm willing to re review this place if actual owner or corporate resolves this matter in some way.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Charles Fennix","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKUIizXJEbuKsutPNDfWYrem4AdgdIiRZwo6EjeMsWWzPMhQws=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Poor customer service the Manger lady walk out with no shoes on with a bad attitude problem like she was mad she had to do her job .she catch my money from me then throw the keys in the slot .when I get to the room the TV didn't work .the room wasn't clean I ask for my money back she said it was to late so I was focus to sleep there .I would like my money back still but looks like I'm going to get a lawyer. People was yelling all night and walking pass my door smh.when I was checking out she still had a attitude for some odd reason poor poor poor customer service üòí","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cool Guy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvbYIz0DYWbXZBaD5aCe1daINgl2NJbd8uj8IgpiT_po068g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It should be $10 a night , like a rescue mission or shelter . There was a hole smashed in the window, they just taped cardboard over it and it kept falling down. Bed bugs. Filthy filthy carpet. And some nasty broad working at night acting like she's doing you some kind of favor.  Owner dude has a take it or leave it attitude for the toilet bowl he's operating. Do take a bad review then.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column3: OYO Gateway Motel Las Vegas North Strip/Fremont St. Area
column5: 928 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89101
column29: {"id":"110689411006417128911","name":"OYO Gateway Motel Las Vegas North Strip/Fremont St. Area (Owner)","link":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110689411006417128911"}
column30: {"borough":"Downtown Las Vegas","street":"928 S Las Vegas Blvd","city":"Las Vegas","postal_code":"89101","state":"Nevada","country":"US"}
column31: null
column32:
[{"Name":"Brittanie Nunez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkzp_iFhfkDQ9BMKjNVwQ9jsl_0wuCVfn5i_YYdLvKv2BtDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Checked in at the front desk. If you could even call it a front desk. You literally stand outside and poke your head through this tiny window to speak to the lady that works there. Rooms look absolutely nothing like the pictures you see online. Went to use the bathroom inside my room and the ceiling was falling apart and all the pieces were scattered all over the sink and the toilet seat. The TV did not work. I decided to immediately check out. Definitely not worth the $100 I paid for the room. Would definitely not recommend. They should actually be shut down by the health department.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J. Revereza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLk422BTla8g8-jrvqNam24IzNzprs_wkc5V2nMp1YKnOqwHHTs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I heard from a You tuber called The professional that this hotel elevator doesn't work for 8 months and the hotel corridors don't clean that much often where in the video he said it took 3 days just to remove cup noodles in the corridor. The fire alarm as well is defective where the guests rush to the hotel open area where there are no staff informed regarding this matter. The room is not clean as should be the golden standard and the AC is broken, if not broken AC is from the 90s and not modernized by the  hotel management. I might avoid this hotel and probably choose MGM Grand.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Danielle Jackson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOicuEeTNtkL-WIU09fRKgsK8F1n3_ViBlTJlXDtxx1owcqw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"When we spoke to the agent that helped us book the room he never mentioned that there was a deposit. Then we get there to check in and they tell us it‚Äôs a 20 dollar deposit which I don‚Äôt mind but for the location and the room really is it even necessary? We get into the room and the room is blazing hot the air conditioner didn‚Äôt make the room cold until the next morning. The bathroom was steaming hot the air doesn‚Äôt even reach the bathroom! Other than that the shower was decent and the bed was comfortable .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cecilia Migliacci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKESfsajZmb39_zWkFfMxee5mnmlnRL8OBdYDjB7OEMwHpb4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We rode out to vegas last minute on Saturday and weren't expecting much for a cheap motel to get some sleep for a few hours. However, it was far worse than we could've imagined. Upon entering, I went to wash my hands and there were multiple ants crawling across the sink. I didn't think much of it until my boyfriend noticed the massive dead cockroach less than 3 feet away from the bed! We were in the room less than 5 minutes, grabbed our bags and went to ask for a refund. After we told the woman at the front desk what happened, she said "did that scare you?" As though a massive dead cockroach isn't disgusting for any guest to encounter. She was unable to process a refund and upon calling the site we booked from, they did not refund any of the money either.
Do not waste your time or money at this motel.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDjoui8tQE&fid=0x0:0x42b1487380451faf"],"When":"2024-5-1"},{"Name":"Morgan Smario","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2o0zazovjleL-E_mHap2VYpmM8WoFliG-hPskoKDlhzXsxoZe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Do not stay. DO NOT STAY. The rooms are a complete misrepresentation on every booking site. The area is not safe, the "security" is laughable as it's only the door lock and you can give a strong shove and it opens. The rooms are dirty, I'm sure they've wiped them down, but you can't remove 20 years of use and filth with a simple rag and fabuloso. They also will give you an entire run around if you demand a refund. I plan to continue pushing this issue until the booking websites have accurate pictures and representation as someone will get robbed if they stay here. It will happen.

*Edit for update on response from owner*
Zero contact. That's what I have. I've supplied all information and after 2 email chains where you asked for my reservation information and number I've had zero contact. You "can't find my information" even though I've been in constant contact with hotels com and the oyo team there, and have emailed and called everyone. So this is the ploy? Just do the bare minimum and we'll go away and you get free money? No. I will contact my bank for fraud charge back, and a lawyer and I plan to raise as much awareness as I can to the fact you're fraudulent advertising your hotels. This needs more attention and I plan to complain to every booking company and any social media websites I can, and every review spot. All I wanted was a refund.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICZxO-RCA&fid=0x0:0x42b1487380451faf"],"When":"2023-9-4"},{"Name":"Tomie Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlgjnHmLZb8jQYem9jQoyR9rWObpYAoMqEG_izmlV8Tm5ZMA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Stay anywhere but here!! This place is absolutely disgusting and falling apart on top of that the staff is extremely rude. We had to wait 20+ minutes for someone to come to the desk at 2pm and when someone did show up she was extremely rude and did not answer any question I had. Our room was literally falling apart. The floor did not connect to wall in several because it was collapsing in on itself, same goes for the ceiling, the bathroom tile was not even at all, the bathroom window had a massive crack in it, the entire floor in the room was at a decline, the comforter had several cigarette burns all over it, the dresser was missing 2 feet and was chipped, the bathroom door had been cut on the top and did not fit the frame properly, the front door did not seal with the frame letting bugs inside all night. I have never been so disgusted in a hotel before if I could have I would not have stayed there when I realized how misleading the website pictures are compared to real life.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hope Morrison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_CREX5Qb6gwiuJhvV6eHeB99z5sHrAb6HohjxxAw5vhOHmiSq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ask to see the room BEFORE you book. Do not trust the photos. It is not your typical cheap motel, it is an actual drug den. Staff was friendly enough, but nothing could prepare for the room. I didn't even walk on the floor without my shoes on, dark stains all over the floor. Door could be shoved open, exposed wires on the TV, the main room window didn't shut properly, the back room window was missing are replaced with a piece of plexiglass with holes in it. Just terrible.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICd2__k8gE&fid=0x0:0x42b1487380451faf"],"When":"2024-2-18"},{"Name":"Growth Therapy Center","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSwbj0JiRLGeUUzo3jTFMMYztcc70r_d7RQovShOREUiwy9OM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"What can I say about this hotel that will persuade you NOT to book here!!! The rooms are LESS than substandard. I wouldn't leave my DOG IN THESE ROOMS! OYO Hotels has acquired these run down motel properties and continues to rent rooms out here when they KNOW that these properties are dilapidated, old and run down. They should be ASHAMED of themselves for even keeping this property and the one down the street open. The bed was at least 15 years old, the blankets were old and stained, the room smelled horrible and the manager went in and sprayed some Odor Ban in the room to mask the horrible smell! The bathroom had mold and broken tiles in it. Words just cannot describe how bad this room looked. After he sprayed the room, I could not even stay in it because of the fumes! I spent about an hour walking up and down Las Vegas Blvd looking for another room and when I found one, I returned to this property and told them there was NO WAY I was staying in that room. I turned in the key and left. I was also charged a mysterious $50 "admin feee" when I checked in although the room had been prepaid online. I was told I would "only" be charged $20 for the deposit which was usually $100. FOR THIS DUMP?!?! I have contacted OYO Hotels and they say I cannot get a refund. I have also contacted my credit card company to dispute the charges. PLEASE do not be fooled by this property. OYO Hotels is a run down, old, dirty motel that I wouldn't keep my dog in. If I could leave NO STARS, I would.üëé","Images":null,"When":""}]

column5: 1418 S 3rd St, Las Vegas, NV 89104
column18: Down-to-earth motel offering simple rooms, with private bathrooms, at daily & weekly rates.

column32:
[{"Name":"Danielle Starbird","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVk4MZUKTuvAEBxDg4DE4SxsciUTSEaj61czBR5ELx3Wzlh3MB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We booked a room for Christmas week via Airbnb. This place is adorable super kid friendly. The area is walkable with lots of convenient restaurants, it‚Äôs also super easy to get a Lyft to nearby shopping and attractions. The property itself is extremely safe and completely locked and monitored by cameras as well. The little one bedroom apartment is adorable super cozy with two televisions and sleeps six people comfortably. It was perfect for my mother, myself, and three children. The owner Glen was super attentive and extremely friendly. We will definitely stay here again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kim Anthony Sinogbuhan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQfw3TvaMliJYL721WpixWPHHuRPr_PEdL6LtkMTrAB6ZZWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stayed here at first, but after deciding to extend my trip, I found StayDrive BnB and never looked back. Their places are perfect for long stays ‚Äî fully furnished, affordable, and close to the Arts District. I‚Äôd recommend it to anyone planning to stay in Vegas a bit longer.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lynda Aloha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIzGWXgeygTot1FTqLCTAtgLt-gcJISX5e37atS8coJS30415P=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This dive motel requires you to do a ‚Äúsafety‚Äùscreening that gives an unknown third-party company permission to collect and store your biometric data for three years. Why? It doesn‚Äôt make any sense and this if you didn‚Äôt know this is what biometric data is:

Biometric Data Defined
‚ÄúBiometric identifier‚Äù means a retina or iris scan, fingerprint, voiceprint, or a record or scan of hand or face geometry and any other data generated by automatic measurements of an individual‚Äôs unique biological characteristics or patterns used to identify a specific individual. ‚ÄúBiometric information‚Äù means any information, regardless of how it is captured, converted, stored, or shared, based on an individual‚Äôs biometric identifier used to identify an individual. As used in this policy, ‚ÄúBiometric Data‚Äù includes ‚Äúbiometric identifiers‚Äù and ‚Äúbiometric information‚Äù as defined applicable law.

I would stay far away from this company because this seems like some nefarious business practice completely unwarranted .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tony Plantone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbvQCX4ud1QKmFCKPFDmL2GlItXq5KodtaZQ28I9rnIGBaQDg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing location and well kept rooms! It is Right in the heart of the Arts district, so I was able to easily commute to everything I wanted to do.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shawny Shawn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4HRhfIP4SXSoLy3EzSLVnswLSdTVJY4G0E_2g6M26vONmgl0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I stayed here for six months, in room #1 in 2018. The rooms were always clean, the management was super friendly and extremely helpful. It was always quite, no unsavory people around. This place provided us a safe place to live and get back on my feet. I will always be grateful to them. Thank you My Ralphie (little puppy) and will never forget your kindness. Thank you again Angel","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"R S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWn7-sjGXhhcDq0TBB4KcwGcIoKIMzPJCnIhLK4anS99I3oTCL4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"No issues at all. Perfect place for a family, close to the Strip. Closed yard for safety. Good parking spot, safe. In downtown, so you have to take a cab. Nice to have a kitchen and a yard.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rosie ‚ÄúNat‚Äù","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJau10EauXK6CrIe3BDbjCWf0HZpTu1TldkAMD10nTWyRpSp8HKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little motel just off the strip. Just a block off the strip in a nice secluded little spot. Extra clean and in a safe area. Monthly and weekly rates. We payed $253 for the first week (that includes a $50 deposit). Located in 18b Art District. Friendly front desk thats often around to answer questions. Laundry on site. We wanted a place we didn't have to commit to while we saved up some cash and found an apartment. The Star Motel was perfect. Thanks again! Would recommend a thousand times over!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICkwJ_osQE&fid=0x0:0x9b376845969ae4e2"],"When":"2018-7-16"},{"Name":"frank wirt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtNWuMOFebmlp4AtoGSg2nMsZIjB_UKAi5OHAMA-ttJtIkzA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Reasonably Priced, Quiet, Clean and Safe. The best kept secret in LasVegas. A very nice and helpful respectable staff. No need to worry about your car. Plenty of free parking in a well lit lot.  Your vehicle is safe nothing to worry about.  This place is safer than some of the biggest Hotels.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"sabrina bayha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9WnnNMyihZOiOu97vpXO-MLgGCRGZiovomETh3QI2vcTsxZ9dDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Sorry Liquor world....your prices and varieties have missed the mark for us. Not sure we will try again. We never have found the selection here worth a second look but we have tried again and again because people we are with want to check it out, and I guess we are hopeful people. Anyway if you are in the market for basic and don't care if you pay more than other places by all means pony up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDg27GIzQE&fid=0x0:0x70ee348ae0d4f4b4"],"When":"2025-2-27"},{"Name":"Eddie Bottger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTBB0uLvDyH9q_FwrYzES8JJ1-BRE6kp6ruLI4DHQ_RcUkEw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Selection on bourbon was great but that is because their prices are way above secondary values. [{"Name":"Craig Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-IFfspOjZv92PAskSLxHk81_F2TloIXYKEZso9khlwvf16w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Liquor World and overall it was a pretty solid experience. Located in a convenient spot with ample parking, it‚Äôs easy to find and access, which is always a plus.

The store itself is well-organized with clearly labeled aisles for wine, spirits, beer, and mixers, which made navigating through the shelves easy. They‚Äôve got a really impressive selection of local craft beers and a solid range of international wines, so there‚Äôs something for pretty much every taste. If you‚Äôre into whiskey, they‚Äôve got a wide variety, including some rare and top-shelf bottles that I‚Äôve had trouble finding elsewhere.

Overall, a solid liquor store with a fantastic selection and great customer service. I‚Äôll definitely be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"U. Olivia Parker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFkX8MW6F-16nQdInbgmQIEOoqa9z21McZCZDdGyWKZCp3GAFz5A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mrs Keecia is the best and she has a welcoming spirit that makes me want to come back again!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC6Lpy0bRKox8TLrWRclBkO&fid=0x0:0xb2f1be66135a554"],"When":"2025-12-14"},{"Name":"sonny nelson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1Y1rUP0c8RsN9jJal9C14Ouvs90oGEJXu8MEGMnW6y5-wM6E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lenny! Lenny is my guy! Great personality and attitude every time I come in! His customer service is one of the main reasons why I keep coming back! Give this dude a raise","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"TheAnthonyYOU","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURarmqLA-sz2Q4hE-8g3y9Ww8rfM7w73BIMttb4QgWxXQpjgYn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lenny , & Ty showed  absolutely amazing customer service ! I hope that store has better prices and service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paula Marrero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIN4OXotxhxh2TcdNMNPJuuXEBofn0yyR5ptLWqF2th7NXS3A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing staff! Amazing variety, great staff, totally recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDxrtjkc-EjKZrm5_SF2n4l&fid=0x0:0x678c0ff88d4fd19c"],"When":"2025-7-3"},{"Name":"Gavin Greene","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIw2QcO_lcMmtl_WN-b2celng6cjMfZgQLmzkED3gTRLB_FdA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to this liquor store two times during my stay in Vegas, and both times I had a lovely conversation with the person behind the counter. The establishment is quite welcoming and friendly, the prices are great, and the location is extremely convenient.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Izzy G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAVrePujW3rCHGJI2sR7Xp857IntYAKWFerfLJnd21K6Ws19VI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great experience at Stip Liquor! The staff were super friendly, engaging, and genuinely helpful, made the visit feel personal and welcoming.

The selection was outstanding, with everything you could need and more. Whether you‚Äôre looking for the basics or something unique, they‚Äôve got it covered.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCbMMN7-qaJqRQJtGHauURF&fid=0x0:0x678c0ff88d4fd19c"],"When":"2025-6-28"},{"Name":"Raquel Woods","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZaWqc_UqhM8fmyptMLOLYRsG1u4ehxZ0lpkECJ7TvSfJJatvc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely love all of my locals that come see us at Strip Liquor!!!! They also love the free Merch!! I mean, who wouldn‚Äôt love FREE MERCH?!?

Come see us at Strip Liquor and you might just get some merch of your own! We have an amazing atmosphere due to amazing staff members and we have the lowest prices directly on the Strip!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDz4czkV0Grl_g6XY6uMf5U&fid=0x0:0x678c0ff88d4fd19c"],"When":"2025-8-2"},{"Name":"Lynn C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzTv8g8hFaI2uiM0DGSvzQM5rfoa1kaEIMuZ1a1jM4NsbyJ1eg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Best prices in Vegas. This place is on the opposite side of the world resort & across from walgreens. Watch where you walk when going as there's some pretty disgusting critters I'd rather not mention (ladies watch those open shoes) on the walk & the store is old & a bit dirty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID2rYSRQg&fid=0x0:0x678c0ff88d4fd19c"],"When":"2022-5-21"},{"Name":"Lawrence Smith III","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe_ELLvuqESMQz_IN1iyFKiVfG93CSGoYViiB9OdrHbqHTINpN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very conveintly located Liquor store right at the end of the strip near resorts world. Very friendly service. Thanks again! Love my cozy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Connie Gerow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJa-MrZ9DxUGRZ2aNaGwJnCot5xWTwJOVLSfj3b8l1A1MXl0g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We always find what we are looking for at this location of Lee's discount liquor. We like the unique bottles of liquor and we're never disappointed here.  The manager, Mark, is always helpful and great to talk with. He went out of his way to  find something we requested and it was greatly appreciated.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Katherine Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6Ajv_dmWZg-gVCb2u71b-14p1fBQi74xLyjgHhjLQpXvqW7xz1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Raquel is my favorite person but honestly all of the employees are wonderful. I‚Äôve never had a bad experience. It‚Äôs super clean and set up in an easy to find fashion. I love how they give the best recommendations for every occasion. I won‚Äôt go to any other store.","Images":null,"When":""}]

He helped me select everything I need and I didn't spend more than 5 minutes in the store and I got exactly what I wanted. Fantastic customer service","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cicely G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIbzJFb3iZ2FOkQPhBD0uiHduKdsYCnIkvhWPgEqThccJ_Zrg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Very helpful staff, lots of selection.

Had to change my review. Yes, the staff was helpful but I was charged twice after being told the first transaction didn't go through. I showed them that it showed up on my account, and was told that charge would fall off. It's been almost a month and both charges are still on my account.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kimmy Wallace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5TWGx-NNWpv5wOv5E0ZFPZRKqmK505jRw0bfF0UoKuzxVYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Advertise a particular brand of liquor on sale online. Go into the location with hopes of purchasing the product. They did have the product stocked on the shelf, the cashier stated that it showed the product was in fact in stock. She got the manager out so I could ask if they had he said they do in fact have the product but it was in the stock room still in the box ,but he doesn't know which box. So this really made me disappointed, because why would you advertise a product online and on sale and not have it stocked, especially just sitting in the stock room. I was gonna buy all that was in stock that I would have been allowed. So you guys lost a big sale for this one.i have two stars because at least the manager did try to figure out where it was.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amit R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAelKa85GBnsXfrjfqoUYqfpt-fTJWVSr9514VkpxO74HJqA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I came in to buy rolling paper. Paper! I come in. Immediately, the guy asks me to place my bag on the side. The store was completely empty, if you think I'm going to steal something while buying paper, just look at me.
Anyways, I ask for the paper, he then proceeds to ask for my passport and then starts logging in all my information to buy PAPER! I thought this was a free country. Absurd. I'll give my money to somewhere else.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Destiny D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbTADtEYFS4Fw360Tez-G_WTw1Dy3nZsY6t-bGgMv7K7z6Rqhh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great costumer service. Definitely will he coming back for more! & Daniel was very helpful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDftMCQEg&fid=0x0:0xddce55025d233138"],"When":"2025-1-4"},{"Name":"Travis Delaney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5AUnOckO9mUJJJxs9uquEFLli0r2QPhEU69Lm7tHZaTn6jfgn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"These folks denied me and my ADA service dog, service because of a no pets sign.
Private business must follow ADA guidelines as well!!
VEGAS PD also needs EDICATION because they followed through with this DISCRIMINATION Finding lawyer now
@TheGreatTankDane on IG

IT ALL IN VIDEO","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeff Crumbley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeF3MWqxSJuCZ9yTxv7r99cJMuDEcXu7JpUxeTp9bSN3LY2Ios=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were there on New Years Eve looking for a bottle of champagne. Now say what you will about that but I would want people to stay at my casino since OUR drinks are the same price as the ABC stores, if they leave then hey they'll go to another casino to play too. Even your own worker told us to go to the liquer store next to the stagedoor LOL!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"RC Play","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRWa0w8Q-R-8UK1D9YN5PO7fyXhRqVyH6NUZyS_f6inR7yjFM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cheaper than vending machines in the room halls (they are $5 for a 20oz pepsi/Pepsi brand) I paid far less in this shop, about 3.50 I belive for the same size Pepsi.
