Open fairly early and late also!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bastian Maps","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoQS2JMR9JrOAOutRJnbPwvhi5Eo3t4IuEx1HUxXlq8crq-AIEpg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Omg üòÆ so overpriced ! What a joke ... if you have too much money, feel free to go. For the others, don‚Äôt stop by.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICEn9naTg\u0026fid=0x0:0x18e0a12da8aabb45"],"When":"2019-5-27"},{"Name":"Levi Lawrence","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY934L9L4H-ERXXou2HQ6WjAx6puFcRI6xUYEtclxySGOmpg4o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Nice and conveniently located but definitely overpriced as many other reviews accurately state.The price you pay for convenience. When we were there they had a couple of specials on vodka so as long as you bought the vodka, the price was reasonable. Definitely worth the walk to head down to the CVS to save the money.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32: [{"Name":"Jenah Winkler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwr4fiFbpdeucsMIyZWwv2I0JSEPtN6DYTHXuDHMc-GgXKCTMtfg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I don't really like drinking alcohol all that much. But when I heard that they only sell mom and pop stuff here I had to stop by. They have some very cool stuff here for wine lovers as well as beer lovers. They even have some interesting spouts that you can purchase up at the front desk. They provide samples for you upon request which is unique.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEOC3ifyu5prgdw\u0026fid=0x0:0x8b3260f78a43fb82"],"When":"2025-5-7"},{"Name":"Kristy Urain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcMQCe26eBg-pi9rQdsGHrxYYRH1bPtRpc8LI8w_X8GE41SOQymQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an incredible experience tasting authentic spirits of Tequila, Whiskey, Bourbon and flavored Liquors from international countries. These fine spirits brought us to another world for a moment which made us feel like we were on another planet. We cannot say enough about our attendants that assisted us with our tasting experience and explained the way the pricing work as well as showing us their special spices available for purchase. We were both greatly impressed by the dedication and care received by our tenders. Our only wish is that we had more time to spend there and experience more. We look forward to returning next week to make more selections and have more time to experience the incredible aura. This place is a must visit for sure! Thank you to all of our tenders for a unforgettable experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID7s6rnbA\u0026fid=0x0:0x8b3260f78a43fb82"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"S S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKtccJCsZF0J-NYjE2fd9aaG1rkmJzoTjxTlujAGsPMOSZohGs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great selection of liquor and spices. Very friendly staff and nice ambiance","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhALI2lgh2wT800F1IuBuOcn\u0026fid=0x0:0x8b3260f78a43fb82"],"When":"2026-1-26"},{"Name":"curtis richards","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJr_4OgK-PQ-TjvE4HWhxQUv0U8u2eHDT5Hcc8uQkWTw_E68w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I tried a few tequilas in here and fell in love with one. After bragging about it to my friend who also likes tequila l opened the bottle and we took a sip and spit it out. It was nothing like what I tried in the store and tasted like bottom shelf tequila. I know the sales associate dropped the bottle while wrapping it and grabbed another bottle and maybe grabbed the wrong one. Either way this situation feels like a bait and switch situation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBEQF4AIrBk4eU5ANS0f1Nw\u0026fid=0x0:0x8b3260f78a43fb82"],"When":"2026-1-12"},{"Name":"Yi-Ching Chiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0NQUKno4st5Snfj7o-6blT6q_K3S3S_3rtHrpeCTz_f4NqUj7dg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff here are incredibly friendly and knowledgeable, taking the time to introduce us to a wide selection of exceptional whiskeys. Their expertise and passion for their craft made the experience truly enjoyable, as they guided us through the unique flavors and profiles of each recommendation.\n\nThe quality of the wine was equally impressive, with a carefully curated selection that showcased excellent taste and attention to detail. The combination of top-notch service and premium beverages made for a memorable experience that we would gladly return for. Highly recommended for whiskey and wine enthusiasts alike!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICvxNiXeQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x8b3260f78a43fb82"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Pat Fune","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKrOsoIKBtjoPzr8ZCSNLn-rizXKRmoxALLi-Za49LFTZ3goQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were casually strolling through the Venetian Grand Canal Shoppes when my wife pulls me into this spirits-spices-vinegars-oil-wine boutique gift shop. The sales persons were kind, helpful, and a joy to converse with. They explained that whatever you love (see above listed examples), they have something which may very well be your jam. We looked around and stumbled onto this Peanut Butter Whisky bottle and inquired further. Brian told us it wasn‚Äôt as sweet as others you may have tried (i.e. Skrewball) as it‚Äôs small batch created, has real peanuts, and is sweetened with real sugar cane (not high fructose corn syrup). Brian gave us a sample and we were SOLD! Bought their biggest bottle 750ml! Shared it with close friends and that bottle was the hit of the night! We‚Äôll be sipping on the remains back in San Diego during special occasions. If you like peanut butter, this makes for a great shot drink or a sipping whiskey. The Vegas store is well stocked, tidy, stress-free, and the staff is wonderful (especially Brian who helped us). He personalized the bottle for us and put a cute bow on it and wrapped it carefully so as to protect it during transit. Everything done was top notch from the moment we entered the store ‚Äòtill we left with our bottle. Pay this small family-owned business a visit, you‚Äôll be amazingly surprised! CHEERS!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC_grazRQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x8b3260f78a43fb82"],"When":"2025-1-14"},{"Name":"Alan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYH2ijJbaDk5OUvTtn3F0y_ohKQVqVNijmAdC5M4eigC8TtsUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Located inside the Venetian shops. Really enjoyed our visit here. River helped us and was REALLY GREAT.  If you let them they will walk you through all the many spirits and oils they have to try. Lots of blended drinks they make themselves so you have to go into it not really knowing what is going into their drinks. Many of the flavored drinks were very sweet but definitely tasted as advertised. We bought 5 different 200ml  bottles that totaled about $300  so it's a steep price but worth it if you enjoy trying something different than what you get at the liqour store. We will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDhiO7OUw\u0026fid=0x0:0x8b3260f78a43fb82"],"When":"2023-2-28"},{"Name":"Sherard C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuqa1SJ8TSC6Svt3C3FFpy3oEZLTVCPkF4Bs5q6ftIPPKELbM9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"River and Brian were great.  River was constantly checking on us, providing us with small cups allowing you to sample whatever liquors you wanted to try.  If you purchase over $200 worth of items, they will ship it to your house for free.  Nice spot to check out if you're in the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICvm435iQE\u0026fid=0x0:0x8b3260f78a43fb82"],"When":"2024-12-15"}]

[{"Name":"Jewell-lhea Jensen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6nv2mxGE471QfchCzOQwAj2Z7EB6Gp4bBOFSh_Twu2DzBuoCu3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ash and willow were absolutely AMAZING!! They gave me so much of their time to help me select products! I'll be returning here for the duration of my stay. They were so  sweet and friendly! Top notch service","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sean Caldwell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXz539-qyhrlWU3TlX-F3mVImPq88tTgRhZJCip_mr1A0r2CHniyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Check the pic, here‚Äôs an example of the hilariously ridiculous prices for even the lowest tier of trash liquor here. It only gets worse from there. My buddy got a $52 12-pack of seltzers while I browsed the store laughing. Just go to any cvs or grocery store and save literally 50% off these clown prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDtHpjcADrebR7FnAIcutqQ&fid=0x0:0xae9346a107f38ad4"],"When":"2025-8-29"},{"Name":"Tate Atchley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXnARbfrSLSiKjVlN9IDPRE2HyFDIYiAlJ1fWDVzvDGCMYbilT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent service and options! Would recommend for a first stop in Vegas! We came here on our way to our hotel and it was quick and easy!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ariel Rowe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJu6bK9chNz_8W4ITuuGOI-K_0lh4XMuynM4QsUBdhHeFQ8CQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the best experience here. Ash was amazing and extremely helpful. The store was very organized and neat. The vibes were AMAZING. definitely coming back here","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Soriah Swinton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIH356IPSg1VGDdbr13LaBtQyT6CboeTUv1-tDQzWe-PtBRHg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very convenient little liquor store near the strip! Perfect place to stop at after leaving the airport on your way to the hotel","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica DeLair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLDB06bC-0uC0wUOdgtOIIN6PGVkmnbmzLOh6C__e5AGIRmp-E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff is so friendly and very helpful! They definitely helped make our trip more fun and easier!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jayne Armstrong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9eBtrSNofMW24qTU7zux8FAaWoYyAuVF6IjjaA3jVtx-Nmg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came in for birthday bottles and Willow was awesome he gave us great options and schooled us on tequilas!!!! This is a a great stop !!! Will be back ‚Ä¶. Tomorrow ü§£üíô","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adriana Mota","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUguXKUC4UVXc_eGIFs2Fm7A1ZpC3d1orkJzgfjtLArtris8IoIdA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Well, when I gave five stars, I was referring to the store overall, and especially to one employee who works at night, the slim guy named Andrew.

But don‚Äôt go there during the day, because there‚Äôs a woman with light-colored eyes who is extremely arrogant. She treats people badly and yells at customers, it happened to me.

I don‚Äôt know what her problem is or why she‚Äôs so angry all the time. If I were the owner of that place, I would have fired her a long time ago. She‚Äôs incredibly rude to customers.

So I‚Äôm leaving this review out of frustration, and I hope that if she happens to read this, she learns to be a little kinder and more patient with people.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Truth Speaker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPdJmOkf2hY6dOJgZDekQbuGR2lKkMwK1Z-HcwjpZGgw7xww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Swung into Liquor City tonight and it was so empty you could hear a wine cork blink. The best part? The clerk ‚Äî who looks exactly like a budget-friendly Jimmy Kimmel ‚Äî was actually watching the new Tupac biopic that 50 Cent produced. Right there behind the counter, fully invested, looking emotional like he personally knew Pac.

I‚Äôm talking chin-trembling, deep-breath emotional. Meanwhile I‚Äôm just trying to buy a Red Bull and some vodka while Jimmy Kimmel: Director‚Äôs Cut wipes away an invisible tear.

Quiet store, peaceful vibe, and honestly the best entertainment I‚Äôve had on a liquor run in a long time. Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nikola Kisko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXL7Ii3yO2_POBXIA3gYS17SJhQOpI-LaABmdPA-kc8V9CO4oTNkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good selection, reasonable prices (especially so close to the Strip!), and awesome staff. Helped me out with a gift purchase and really appreciated the extra effort they went through to help me out!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christine ‚ÄúSunny Ra‚Äù Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbUXQgRqFzJ0pWG_hf1VhxrYJoviHVzxXMVEZZFEVAFc75hrYI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"So overly priced! Something I pay $1 for at Terrible's cost me $6 here. Well now I know and so do you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jonn Cena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKI2kNkWmM0Sm70PP7lQWoOUsezjDHUUuCAp2y_sBy-Zq6B2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly vibe. Love the owner !! Very good guy","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shed Cast","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4auK3HwSttZraM89iS3rfFkJ3-qVOWfRhbbjsqo_852IuFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Man, I don't know what these guys are doing. But obviously not keeping the correct amount of product in their store. I bought a 6 pack of diamond bear, and it's old. I mean over a year old, completely flat. And tried to buy some smokes, out of the specific brand also. Guys. Just be cautious of products, rotating stock, and if its last the expiration date. Get the distributer to take it back.... And try to keep up with inventory.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tackleberg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoE6V6V5mjio3F48M01EZCDVhsYkuPnm_6JtyaFSIp1Kl7D2I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Clean and Well stocked is right! This is a Liquor Museum not a store. With the prices you'll quickly see why. Basic bottles like Jack & Bacardi are $10-$20 over priced. The higher end bourbon and Single malt bottles are $75 to over $300 over priced. They have a great selection too bad they're more about collecting than selling","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"l s","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOmMG-RFMUqOaJvg-kiqpFJRYgOpttrPD63V3-97-cyDCfItCp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bought my boyfriend champagne and cigars to celebrate our new baby coming this month. Originally we wanted to go across the street to some fancy cigar shop. But GPS completely had us running around. Thankfully there was this shop, conveniently across the street. With some of the same selections as the fancy store. Great prices and selections. So happy we didn't have to leave empty handed. Thanks guys for your help xo","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Barry thompson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6btjQIQlTBSpg1XK8Qt7C3mur4k9nzkeaaa8gfTJFwfjgJg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Funny guy(Frank)... Great Vegas Prices...... Worth the half mile walk from Treasure Island..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICkvt_wfQ&fid=0x0:0x2b6e95b6faa64681"],"When":"2019-4-27"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"David Blumsom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDf8bKDesuZvL7p1X_yCSELClTpGSwVjlhlW3F0Hoz2qnh0MA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing. Best choice for booze I‚Äôve ever seen. It‚Äôs huge.
I went back again and added this video. The place is huge and has everything you can imagine. Plus a massive range of price from a few $$ to '000s
Enjoy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBP4MBdgnJno-cVE7oHZbLg&fid=0x0:0xa7379acfcf235440"],"When":"2025-7-14"},{"Name":"Lisa Weir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKFtfgkdNnXjmmWtbEMuUlNeiGkcf1fGf6hQx-gJDNIPod4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a great selection. I'm so happy to find this place. Not many stores have my Don Q Coconut Rum. Thx guys","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAHw3A7o-iZ_oPxP1HNoCDf&fid=0x0:0xa7379acfcf235440"],"When":"2025-10-9"},{"Name":"Sherron Powell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKqZtwIN-LTF3P3L6s32cNJ8o7U5wUGwxFh1m-HGNXl0EdP1Hsfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They had everything and more with great prices and amazing customer service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCpVkxyZx_V1jjZXq2ZhWn_&fid=0x0:0xa7379acfcf235440"],"When":"2025-10-8"},{"Name":"Jenelle Berrien","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_n2_v6YGdHiw90oYm3TOYY0-uBap8VFBrG-Q413P-dHlsp807=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I purchased $20 tickets to attend the Patron Cocktail Lab at Total Wine with my friend on a Friday evening at 6pm.  It was a really lovely experience.  The event took place in a back room that had multiple tables, chairs and snacks set up.  The event began with an in-depth discussion on Tequila and how it is made.  We were all provided with 3 Patron tasting samples as well as mini Margaritas (my favorite)!  I enjoyed the experience quite a bit.  We were also provided water which was great since I ended up with a lot of Margaritas and a cool recipe guide!  I would definitely recommend this experience.  The staff at Total Wine were all very knowledgeable, friendly and open to questions.  The group I was with was full so I recommend booking tickets in advance..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDJy8OTpwE&fid=0x0:0xa7379acfcf235440"],"When":"2023-7-22"},{"Name":"Lisa Maraszek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1hxWORwVUUNShBy3rCKCkxhyOcCu4HIIURvrOynVWFWlDooXJXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hubby really enjoyed the free sample stations, and felt like a kid in a candy store when it came to stocking up on international wines. Store employees were super friendly and helpful. Displays were very eye-catching, and made shopping "fun"! Coming from Cali, this was a treat on our vacation weekend to Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDR3oVA&fid=0x0:0xa7379acfcf235440"],"When":"2023-4-26"},{"Name":"William Herrera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMVq_kHrmsduwVa1WxH7027kY7kPSu6NUF4VZ7MZxlsTJ4Rr9n=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great selection - I came to visit this location while I was working near the strip as my usual location is the Rampart location over in Summerlin.

Great stock compared to other locations and very good presentation. One of the products I love but I noticed there's an abundance of is the Goose Island bourbon county stouts, they're all the 2024 releases, and the 2025 releases are in November. To the beer manager/supervisor, please let me know if you plan to discount the 2024 collection to make room for the 2025 releases, I'll gladly buy out the stock myself!

Overall, good location! Be careful though, folks driving around the strip tend to be a bit unaware of cars around them","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Johnny Chavez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8kxa5wTy8Tjy3PsZ_cdlO6jLKiraFSZWapnPFuTJc4zXgdQPo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to pick up what you need.
So many times you go to other places and they may be out but Total Wine and so many other options you will not be disappointed.
They match prices if needed.
I highly recommend this place","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICe0-bv5gE&fid=0x0:0xa7379acfcf235440"],"When":"2022-9-23"},{"Name":"Beth Cato","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMnraAknoYE9HTdmdB_AUWKsBV0lkPHVk58O_OwkGSYMga2_ID=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were visiting from Arizona, and we loved the different varieties of cider and beer available at this location. It was fun to pick out new cans to keep in our hotel fridge to enjoy while we were in town, and we even brought some home! The selection here is certainly better and more cost effective than at any of the ABC Stores in the heart of the Strip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICB1regkwE&fid=0x0:0xa7379acfcf235440"],"When":"2022-12-24"}]

Prices are pretty good. The man behind counter was super friendly and always smiling. Looks like he's doing remodeling inside. Felt pretty safe going inside with the amount of police that were parked next to it. Lots or different varieties, brands, flavors etc of mini shot bottles. Premixed drinks, wine, etc.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chad Powell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWehmFG8-IphvDFlupEVWY-K-UsECZbmS6gFvVpOSZoze82TX6ipw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great store. Made a few stops before but they by far had the best selection.  I would've bought more but didn't have the luggage space. Would definitely go there again with a bigger suitcase.

Update: went back there this past week and bought some more and was fantastic. I don't mind paying a little over MSRP but some of the stuff was a little closer to secondary.  Will revisit again in December to see if prices changed a bit.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"hasitha Rama","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-gLF3g-2mt7CKByXxZz_L3GHdT3gw4b3cvbi3Kr27hvURxUfQ6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stop by this place, friendly crow. They will give you good deal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDdxcXvsQE&fid=0x0:0xc5a62bfe1a4d3a18"],"When":"2024-2-25"},{"Name":"RLJSR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURzVroSrbNbjiiAWhwRwwFyMORO4DXtRjhL_YTInvYg_FViYfR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The very friendly guy was very helpful in the store. As a weary traveler, I enjoy stopping at a liquor store that's convenient and inexpensive.  Prices were just right and there is a bathroom for customers.  The place is kept clean and is next to the Lions Den. Nila was helpful and friendly. Just a block away from circus circus.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anthony Mancillas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdQnBFTIKyjEf0lFrz5-4JizUVRJtafwoBKv55L9oID1WHu96S=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Would Give it no stars if possible.  Went in for a beer and a pack of swishers and a small water bottle and this guy tried charging me 34.57......!! WTH. A $3.25 beer and $2 dollar swisher and a $3 water bottle. 30 dollars. Thief. Wonder how many drunk people this guy takes advantage of. Rip offs

Then the owner tries to justify overcharging but I wasn't stupid enough to buy it. So jokes on you thief. No transaction to find if I didn't buy what you were over charging for foolü§£ü§≠","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lalith Mohotti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKbhlEooft9fMIpjFcPILZlDjZ7UgYCuKJ8r_Bk6l2pJjTqZw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have great prices and the store is very organized and clean. Super easy to locate things in the store, definitely would recommend a visit there. Very friendly staff","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brandon Cardinal - Dead Bird Productions","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVI8teN4H9jaLis5MYeJUaSOMW6WRSq6ux9GEqhre9AF9buDIhW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Poor selection and it smells so bad I think the old clerk died in the back room. Mike \u0026 Max are the coolest people I have encountered in this city","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCjNLrhID0dRuX_ntA8c_vw\u0026fid=0x0:0x30da1513f8327671"],"When":"2025-10-26"},{"Name":"Lavern","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJE3uCAm-sJtNRzlsTQ-aw1BOkb8ge9M_eQDDqtjv2qPLj6bA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I give this store one Star simply because the workers are being cheated out of their tip money. They don't want you tipping them because they know they won't be getting it anyway. The boss man takes them and keeps them to himself.  When I overheard this, I've decided not to buy from this establishment anymore. I thinks it's very cruel for someone to deprive their employees of the well deserved tips. It shows that the customer appreciates the service they give. Shame on you whoever you are that runs this establishment! üòî","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anthony Villase√±or","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4xOt28sxQFjLCguo_fDdVZDvUYzYYdWF6pOpwtxQtw37IlA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an excellent experience with Jay at w liquor. The customer service was outstanding from start to finish. The representative was friendly, knowledgeable, and went above and beyond to assist me with my issue. They were patient and took the time to understand my needs, providing a solution that exceeded my expectations. I am extremely satisfied with the level of service I received and will definitely be returning to Jay at w liquor for future needs. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDbyYfgfQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x30da1513f8327671"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Tyisha Spears","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSSNY-q-hHAajhrZXMAqyGFUhTUphO67uIxCmO-QXADUtL0A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my Liquor store stop every time I come to Vegas! The prices are unmatched‚Ä¶‚Ä¶Manny and Nickk have phenomenal service and their guest interactions are genuine and hilarious ! They are sooo sweet! Nick is so sweet and kind hearted‚Ä¶I will never stop coming here and supporting their business.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICf273cPg\u0026fid=0x0:0x30da1513f8327671"],"When":"2025-1-1"},{"Name":"Mary Circelli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDa-S_iBMaElQyCuJyl9_w2vD_h_Vmgla495ftQBLKL4QFHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great selection and Max was able to order a craft beer that I wanted to take home when I left Vegas.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paul Devoto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWlSmWOZhaB_4Lv_8W4LNdEJzswLFpFoGyKkPtrY8ABSJ3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely brilliant shop... We stayed at Rio and had a little walk to this shop.. Brilliant selection and cheap as well.... Cashier was the friendliest most helpful person I met in Vegas and we came back 5 times and told others to visit too...... Try the walk in fridge!! Going back to rio next year and will definitely revisit!! Try the las vegas vodka and colt beer!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Destiny Perkins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVu2os6Tv6kBrwg1rAiFJbqpaC-uRqlMzSXmC_7LKiOhKXRynTOXA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yo I shopped with this handsome cashier named Max! Dude, he gave the best suggestions, so good that I bought them all! I got a beatbox, some vodka, and 2 cans of the club cocktail for $20 out the door! Not only do they have a variety of liquor/ spirits, the hospitality is UNBEATABLE!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIClhqHB8QE\u0026fid=0x0:0x30da1513f8327671"],"When":"2023-11-17"},{"Name":"Sam Bodycot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqHIAzHvbaL0-o8XRFXZg3N3JCsinQKfqPLafI-Sgs5LDESA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very convenient for Rio guests to stock up on drinks and snacks at great prices","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCF15WhlSHuMGLG77tVw863\u0026fid=0x0:0x30da1513f8327671"],"When":"2025-9-25"}]

I liked the selection. The cashier though was not very good at their job. She asked me if I had a phone number with them, which I answered no to. I asked for the membership program and she replied that there was non.  stumbling something like no no. While she was scanning my items, I saw signs about the rewards program. and when I asked her about that she answered that I was supposed to sign up befor payment. I mean, if I was a manager I would probably fire her for saying something random after not understanding some customers question. Very unprofessional and unnecessarily anti-customer.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vanessa Serrato","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKv-kFX6ny74o6L8fimW2j3Wbs5yju8qdsm61zJLH5xXzQh6Ko=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This store has so many options, very clean, and neatly organized and the employee who helped us, Dean, was an absolute rockstar. Definitely coming back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDuFrJYvS63tHEl5aamEqBK&fid=0x0:0xf4a2349cdecadb81"],"When":"2025-9-4"},{"Name":"ayanna rogers-edwards","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjmxvwWdxcAB6sAuu2lne3_JLzS4QM-dUNBBmCtc1tkJJl6w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Robin and Sam were amazing. Especially Robin. She was so kind and an accommodating all THREE times that I came. I felt the most comfortable going to this liquor store due to her, alone. Robin was very communicative and knowledgeable about the different alcoholic beverages that were behind the counter. She had a bright smile and a bright personality to match. Will be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cyron Byrd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWkcPlm7rYhikeXxykdI6x1roviEa-ds87qdoClsoufwkr590D=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The customer service here is great if you guys are looking for Alcohol good prices please come here. Sam is awesome. Store is super super clean","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAbAX9JWW8MMJjSKU8IOQNz&fid=0x0:0xf4a2349cdecadb81"],"When":"2025-9-15"},{"Name":"Sam A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKE0KjT-MkQfuiPGtdnYN_dRnQLW4I4AutyFsxR9ksiuKC7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here, and it was a pleasant experience. I'll definitely be a returning customer.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brandon Cooper","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6yUCEJNa2ijSb9VQ_mjyuI7i57soMoVg0Fm3Wi5fwXTpxBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This store is a great store since I been in Vegas Friendly people and fast work if it get better we‚Äôre at!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCDyS0Fjsozu1mtFg9HYjif&fid=0x0:0xf4a2349cdecadb81"],"When":"2025-10-1"},{"Name":"Tyler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKNwzhb4DMbOojcJU7kUHlzy-GANpStvDUUcCtu6IshZFg3jw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great atmosphere  nice staff Sam and Robin always treat me like family and make sure i got everything  I need go here on a regular  basis one of the only spots I go because  they treat people well","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Breezzy Baby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlrSg5HnCpOmotGtKNH18dbHBM7XSsCSRon8s_O9LXIlYQ_g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Robin & Sam were super generous and kind (: Robin helped me pick out my flavor vape !! Since geek bars are gone thank u so much !!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDueQa6YUQtzGUi1YVpcnJc&fid=0x0:0xf4a2349cdecadb81"],"When":"2025-8-30"},{"Name":"Cortney Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoMlrY1I2oaOjUz2DmVAnDdphUFLf036JgQsMF0uJLOzzADLmF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Must visit! Not only are prices reasonable, but just a short 10 min ride from the strip. Much cheaper than the strip might I add. When you go- ask for Juana! She is fabulous and knows her liquors, especially tequilas. Friendly staff and welcoming too!","Images":null,"When":""}]

Decent selection.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John Westing","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXt2hXBHqw9TpJZJkMdbKr9ut_4kncFA4aWarWnTErBe0VzMzU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a convenient little spot where you can pick up a few cold cans, some wine or some mini bottles. They also have Gatorade and water. Naturally, it's pricey, given it's practically steps away from the guest elevators. However, you're paying for the convenience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Heather Cox","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlj3TE1aZSEvu2WjAer_hAvRJOEVFPdfWS-y-Vy7GpYAhIyg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The ladies who work in this store are so kind and wonderful. While reaching for a beverage in the cooler my beaded Tiffany bracelet broke and all of the individual beads broke off and fell onto various shelves. I was devastated as the item had great sentimental value. Ava, Korey, and Rosie were so calming and wonderful. They gave me a cart and together we removed all of the beverages from the cooler until each and every bead was found. There are many places to buy beer in Las Vegas, but you‚Äôd be hard pressed to find one with such incredible people. If you are in the area, I highly recommend you stop in.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ellie B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxG8wwHG9f0fzZL17fcl7xOemKI1Zo_goV1eTj1WB9eBnlc1XI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Super expensive, staff are nice though. Probably better to grab liquor off strip but its convenience to your hotel room always wins I guess.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"andrew griffiths","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKi7BSZxnRoXwlYfNnISI4M2QIj0_yVU2oJHBUiRtnRoewdIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"An absolute rip off!!! $21 plus tax for two cans of beer that are $8 in the ABC store!!! The last time we were in Vegas we used to buy beer here and spend an evening in the casino but now their prices are ripping off customersnwendidnt spend a single evening there. Whatever increase in profits they are making from the exorbitant prices they are losing big time in the casino. Do yourself a favour and go elsewhere.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"D'Vaughn Bell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUf_ZFFl8eUxAnh_PQq-3E2ScKEQuZAKNjJVxKeQ7aB2DZAWZD6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Was debating on whether or not to give this three stars because the selection isn't very good. I walked about two miles to get here because it was the closest thing that showed up as \"liquor store\" and had a decent rating but they didn't have what I was looking for. I expected the prices to be steep but they're pretty insane!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"BabyC [TV] 22#","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUp9la4MmfO0hi4CBsi2Is7jpcLUoBBjnzZNQkzmLozpPhbnAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was clean comfortable have AC heater just the promise me a sauna there was no sauna because everything by five but I went around 4:35 or 4:30 and it was closed same to go to the flamingo to use the sauna or the gym or anything like that and it was also closed so beware of them promise you something and it's probably not going to happen I was very disappointed that's the whole reason I got the damn room I wanted to use the sauna for a while","Images":null,"When":""}]

KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDG-JHTuAE\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9672050801b24e5"],"When":"2021-11-18"},{"Name":"Travis Fowler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtmzgdLPdPUV_69Zz0DwlodTPZcPDi6z71Gs9Ibb0oTVQkxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I stopped by as they advertise hard to find items but they do charge 3 to 4 times what it is available elsewhere in vegas for.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Advanced Manual Therapy Institute","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0g6BExDIjZaF_M0bZDa_VvoSmP44OeEKpB0hAv7XjSadd6ypo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a great selection.   They even have Mimosa Royale!!!!!  Perfect for my pool side","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDKirv80QE\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9672050801b24e5"],"When":"2021-5-7"},{"Name":"Terrell Sanders","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9h98GKKBvk6Gflj1kIt_Pdu4irdDLBI8RoPSnQytr-2kwY0f6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Overall, it was OK at best.\n\nIt is cheaper than being on the strip but still expensive nonetheless. Customer service was good as the clerk was very attentive and helpful. Mainly, the prices were all over the place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAVYmuhvvTcSfliZCkPaaxxSdEHCn11ZnIrLdmSn9mA8M-wg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I find it interesting that everyone raves about the customer service here, the only time I've gotten good service was recently when a female started working the register. The guys there barely speak to you, and are on the phone literally every single time I go in there if they're working. Decent choices, prices a little high but not too bad. It works in a cinch.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"April Griffis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXpenamV5tUlVGZ_b1vuH6fm3YpD-ZV5tl4qsM1nYb0xRNenZdBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The ONLY reasonI am giving this two stars us because typically I have a decent enough experience inside the store. The lack of selection is rather frustrating I will be honest with you about that. The prices aren't too bad. However you have to watch out because they like to sell discontinued products for bargain prices. So there's no telling if the products are even remotely close to being at the best that they could be. This last experience was one of the worst experiences I had in there. I'm not sure if this was an owner or manager or what his deal was. I handed him a quarter and he refused to take it. Claiming it was too dirty.you could see that it was a quarter it was just a little bit darker. I took it to a different store and they took it with no problem. It's all US currency and I thought you could not refuse US currency.it seems like this whole store is designed around making a quick Buck. Without concerns of the actual customers will be purchasing the products. It's a good enough place when you don't really have any other options. Now if there was a Total wine \u0026 More beside it I would go to Total wine \u0026 More over this any day. That's all I'm saying.","Images":null,"When":""}]

The employee correctly convinced us to get a small bottle instead of minis.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDh76WuVQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x7391064460d889d5"],"When":"2023-3-21"},{"Name":"Aubrey Spilsbury","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXi-PFGcGHuvQldbBGmwcy_NfNv-XTqaxiHoX88MCkdplbJPFvzeg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The lady behind the counter was very helpful! Theres stuff behind the counter as well as the shelves.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDCyoLQrAE\u0026fid=0x0:0x7391064460d889d5"],"When":"2020-9-22"},{"Name":"Florian Tschurtschenthaler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHHqcmp4kSfRHdGqjqEUm5C9S58YOQHpahtesEt5KH-nJsWL4n=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good selection of drinks. They are one of the only shops, I know of, that still carry GEEKBAR vapes, but they also have a ton of great alternate choices.\nWhen I‚Äôm shopping for alcohol, this is also my go to spot. They have a felicitous selection (saying this as a bartender). And if you‚Äôre ever looking for Soju they have a whole wall of flavors.\nNick is always so helpful when I come in. Answers all the questions I have, and guides me in the right direction. Today, I purchased the Hall of Fame vodka, pictured with this post of his recommendation. Excellent customer service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhASNcxAfkUSKyA2RJ02VRBs\u0026fid=0x0:0x2e3dba287a862837"],"When":"2026-1-16"},{"Name":"Jeanine Daniels","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPNuTqVtWoWzWR8PTkVUBm_KVLm6jAGXcK1IAyEoWM_ZR6jw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best service ever! column32:
[{"Name":"Jason Janes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX97DC_KcUfYA1x4XCbGzdpKDpG4aKwV0isSR2kesTqkUOXpCQrEg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Latest Update: Aug 2025, The prices are still the same, so ownership does listen and employees are very friendly.

Updated Review:  I stopped about a week ago to see if the price was changed, and it was üòé. Sailor Jerry's back to $16.99 so kudos to the manager/owner for listening to their customers.

Original Review:
This place used to be great. I didn't even mind paying a little extra for my drink of choice because they are open 24/7. I drink Sailor Jerry's Rum and the 750ml is $14.99 at the big competitors store and Top Shelf used to charge $16.99 so a difference of $2 for the convenience factor. I stopped today and the greedy owners are now charging $21.99. $5 more than they used to charge and $7 more than their competitor.

Needless to say, unless their price gouging stops I won't be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paul Adams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrQ2zb9XtLIo9f8N7aMpmnlCiDFix2aqpJLHNcU63_OA6x=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly neighborhood liquor store!!! Has large selection and friendly to the customer. Occasionally has rare or hard to find bourbons at near MSRP which is rare for Vegas. Milad is a great dude and has some great bundles that‚Äôs fair for us. Definitely will be shopping here more often!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDvqJ6dsAE&fid=0x0:0x1fd4cd89e54fb67a"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Amy Kay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWG93iDFe-AcEXsoSP_6j4CNkTnpbmxeMpoJcbrUzP_Rh9ZZnu1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I called to check on a product in stock the girl that worked there said they had both the bottles I was looking for. I get there after a $40 cab ride to find they did not have them it was 2 different bottles. Yikes! I bought another bottle while I was there. Maybe help educate your employees on the products you carry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDyz_TV5AE&fid=0x0:0x1fd4cd89e54fb67a"],"When":"2021-3-22"},{"Name":"Drew776655","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJCkIfhHLrjtjtGUUCq3ivKFZHMv3qCWzDnKCuBriCkVz0uzA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their bourbon selection is top notch.  Blanton's, Blanton's Gold, and Barrel Proof Blanton's all for reasonable prices.  Multiple varieties of Pappy's.  Tons of Japanese whiskey.  A whole wall of scotch, but I don't know scotch.  Rare varieties of everything imaginable.  Fantastic customer service.  They were happy to sort through bottles for the letter I needed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICLgo_iew&fid=0x0:0x1fd4cd89e54fb67a"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Joel Loftus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzV08LiXyhsHgXqDcHUi_v2V9xjxBCBCGPYNowgnsh6BTM2WE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything you could possibly want. 24/7 liquor store that has everything you could want at good prices","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"MICHAEL BOSCH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLgVWipeRFDVQTRXInIMuylCkM_nkMolSs3gxwS4ircWhHcRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You can find some great deals at this store if you‚Äôre a regular. The prices for allocated Bourbon and Tequila are perfect for travelers staying on the strip. It‚Äôs a quick Uber ride away and will save you a few bucks compared to strip prices. Mark is the owner and works most week days. He‚Äôs very friendly and treats regular customers very well. Lately, the store has had some amazingly delicious store picks.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Raphael L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVP6-DooJhR5SBtcjsNThE_GpmrEIs5JDU9KujFeP_sRPg6ErLs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The store has a lot of products packed into a smaller space making it feel tightly packed or closed-in. Although, that impression could be the result of me usually shopping at Lee's. The employees were nice and the store was clean. The prices are more expensive than Lee's, so I'll only go back for particular items when I can't find them at my usual place. All in all, a decent choice for a liquor store.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"justin scott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwGSWt6K1axMbuPk-VFE8rx_h9u-07jhRO4GYoN9SFPS86X-72GQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently moved to Vegas from Oregon and I have been struggling to find a bottle shop with craft beer. I know Oregon is the capital for craft beer and I there is no place that can compete but this place, from the places I have been so far, is pretty damn legit. They have a great beer selection in multiple coolers. Pretty impressive on some of the beers this place has, some of which were hard to find in OR. If you're looking for liquor, pffff it's everywhere in this store. Floor to ceiling! Gentlemen behind the counter was polite and helpful. A must check out!","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32: [{"Name":"Parrish Lusby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpFJS-MWZRAicmDvy5q6NQAO2kdnuSbnxN6PnsjfMrN5mlq9db=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For a liquor store the whole layout is immaculate everything is just portion apart there's room to walk the employees who work there are down to Earth overall I would recommend this place 5 out of 5 stars","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Miska Mullins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKmdrieYXy9hFHcZsBxLZwDyvpnRge3rDjPV22-_p9R98-a9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Located close to the palms, Rio, Gold Coast. The prices are great and the variety. It's a good place to go here in the neighborhood if you don't want to go to the grocery store. The staff are also very friendly and helpful.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kirk Fisher III","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlRpGU6cbSEcJqSEYh2xdmsRSOULOmpv5Z2IjEMjW8x5nnXqU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Not the best experience. Very slow shift change. Then the slow transaction of customers ahead of me. No sense of urgency. I had an Uber waiting on me. The slow pace was costing me by the minute. Shift change was very long and great service can be given with a sense of urgency. People's time has value and when people forget that it can cost people. The prices here are higher than others. Yet 24 hours. Not sure if the other person there was security or cashier off duty. Makes it look bad with the cashier leaving, the cashier coming on, and a third security/cashier standing at freezer.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jacob Benavides","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKXoX_uvm8y2QP_-oUDk0BIA954Ayxg-__RZeNJ0GjkTXdrfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always come here. Staff knows me very well. No frills. I get what I need and if I have any questions they either meet my needs or get me close.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Izzy Jacobson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJncUvHmVlHZsHri8fHzauD24XmeYxCYQ9Qua52erQUyWmHSw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you are in Vegas, this is THE place to go for your liquor. Vegas totally Jack's up alcohol prices. Xo liquor is decently and comfortably priced and there are locations literally everywhere. Plus I have never met any of the staff that weren't nice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Willemiek Bijlenga","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdt4Feleunt5nGWuhu-hFnpqn2itxt9MkFkLFjsbKcVZzotUem=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good store and collection. Had a nice conversation about what is really spicy. Well the Mr \u0026 Mrs T bloody Mary mix - bold and spicy has a spike amd taste well but is not really spicy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"yewbdar tibebu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUjO7DTsQQabU2at6mjwFmfd_Hi4VRPuh2I-6C0d7Y81ZCSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Over priced!!! for regular belly‚Äôs and mum champagne got charged 71 dollars that‚Äôs insane u can get both bottle with 25 dollars less at any other places‚Ä¶","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Key4Twenty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJyu7lY5TkS9mK4LFqDqkxQ4cQmJH5x8N3-o-i7UfeGoIfISsW_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place is a scam. I went to buy liquor when i swiped my debit card the power in the store compeletely went out on March 18th 2017 they said the transaction did not go through even though i showed them my account history and it showed i was charged. They made me pay again and said if i was not credited with in the next day to go back and they will refund me. I went back to the store the next day and they gave me the run around telling me to give the bank 72 hours to credit my account. The owner of the store gave me his phone number and told me to call him in 72 hrs if the bank didnt refund me that he would. When i called the owner a chinese man named Sam on March 22 more than 72 hrs later, he pretended that it wasnt him on the phone and cursing at me after im reminding him of the situation telling me if i keep calling he will cut off his phone. I had to end up going to my bank to dispute the charges. I would avoid going to this store if your around this area.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Roman Petrovskii","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBJtpS3Q9zkPF-BKe8mlLaHoOaAuGl6o60g29pSzstb1Q1PnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"At this location, you‚Äôll find another one of those typical tourist shops that Vegas is full of üôÇ. It‚Äôs the kind of place where you walk in and immediately see shelves packed with small souvenirs, keychains, magnets, T-shirts, and lots of little items that look fun but don‚Äôt really serve any purpose in everyday life üß≤üéÅüëï‚ú®.

Just like many similar stores on the Strip, the prices here are noticeably higher üí∏ ‚Äî things you could buy online for a dollar suddenly cost ten or more. Some people don‚Äôt mind that, though. For many tourists, it‚Äôs all about grabbing a quick reminder of their trip: ‚ÄúLook, I was in Vegas!‚Äù üì∏üåÉ

For me personally, there wasn‚Äôt anything worth buying. Most items feel more like symbolic trinkets than something useful, and the quality varies a lot. It‚Äôs the kind of shop you step into out of curiosity, look around for a minute, and then move on üõçÔ∏èüôÇ.

Still, places like this stay open because plenty of visitors enjoy them ‚Äî they just weren‚Äôt for me üîéüî•.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBHrGE9Dy0fB5Kqu4l-GzVp&fid=0x0:0xb00dc7750ca26c6a"],"When":"2025-11-30"},{"Name":"Yijing Yin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBphBmSepp3VkzoZdEjfNPSRkuyuWSzRYRY23ZY4rHNWWvBWcN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Offers very reasonable priced cold sandwiches, sushi, bento, spam rice wrapped with seaweed. Regular price bottled water(cheaper than CVS). Fun souvenirs.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAdLtgledrrtI7xzVruxnFi&fid=0x0:0xb00dc7750ca26c6a"],"When":"2025-12-19"},{"Name":"Brian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtyAwTgsDCrblJuyzuO6vFy1iSk2-qXUZPXWqAoU3gmad5hpo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What's not to Love about a ABC store on the Las Vegas strip, the store had everything I needed, it was super clean and well laid out. As we shopped we we're offered help several times to help us find what we we're looking for, even offered us a basket.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD7jkF1cnHDtgEXAsNX_Qxx&fid=0x0:0xb00dc7750ca26c6a"],"When":"2025-7-3"},{"Name":"Chung Liew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVYoZ79MrCrpWf0k5mRJz-uRy5mqE8cXOw7IxgH8V9Pv0JC7Iw1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"These ABC stores are very similar to the ones in Hawaii. There's always certain deals going on. Prices are very reasonable for booze and souvenirs. The staff is friendly. Always a line at checkout but move pretty quick. You can get IPA craft beer, mixed drinks, spiked soda and lemonade in a can.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCg2PTFeQ&fid=0x0:0xb00dc7750ca26c6a"],"When":"2025-2-13"},{"Name":"Melina Dhana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVurSOg47I_L8kPcBkzgHvRMeC2NsiTwRZYmllwq8yeDPEu-h0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the many ABC Stores throughout Las Vegas. Very clean and organized, with quality products. As usual, a little pricey, but to be expected in a tourist area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDo1YqP2gE&fid=0x0:0xb00dc7750ca26c6a"],"When":"2025-4-27"},{"Name":"Nataku","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTzskMbQB0w89T5WGeHN_9JfdRAFGi_NN5gAmVz5ws_WZLnRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the ABC stores. They always have interesting things to look at and as you can‚Äôt get from other places, they have a free gift if you spend over $100 which is normally a cup, calendar or a bag. It‚Äôs always a fun place to visit and enjoy coming here to look around.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICH6tbj_QE&fid=0x0:0xb00dc7750ca26c6a"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"F. Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9OoPgMovLX5Jy4Z1c0EwtED20jBTTp8MBZ39sS_pZalWXBH8X=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really nice service from the employees.  The best place to go for water and snacks that you wont empty youre wallet out.  But for souvenirs you better go on freemont street a lot cheeper","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Darja Diduch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQ-vwuV1BmqBdQwDR7ErtDynFF02F6ugO1yQ3KWTUPHdddVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The store has the loveliest staff, but especially Josefa. My girl saved my dress from falling apart and went above and beyond to make me feel comfortable and looked after, fondest moment of day 1 of the trip! In general everyone was super helpful and the store is in good hands. Thank you, will visit again!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Paula Guti√©rrez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_hX0UFRoC2tR4e_6Zl65t28X07vL-mLrNbMHBhotVNU3R5fXR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A somewhat pricey souvenir shop, but with good deals, much better than some other, more famous ones in the city. I definitely recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBU9DzF86G9zoLD99xts3EX&fid=0x0:0x5490d97792b39913"],"When":"2025-12-1"},{"Name":"Tomomi Araki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKmHFPSw-dNog-uG6B_r3JQ9b2ZWBgGWgdKHQHxYn9Kqgi25Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We bought ornaments and drinks here.
Lots of good souvenirs choice with decent prices.
The cashier told us that there is a free gift with $100 purchases.
We asked family and gathered receipts, got a free mug.
We could choose from lots of different designs of mugs or shopping bags.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICfi8C0Xw&fid=0x0:0x5490d97792b39913"],"When":"2025-1-1"},{"Name":"T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocICoTAFiQ-im6PWnVJqzZw40uIeuAFgAlqyMTU6WUAGfV1S9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Top notch service. From being offered a basket while browsing to the genuine friendly and memorable register experience, this was such a great place to shop. Super convenient and a great variety of everything you may need.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kathy Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiyb_IZpx_WoUpDbNVrKDpyLmD7_rVs6LOSYuAzIVmUAcA7Ma7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I highly recommend you to come here.
I brought 30 T-shirts for souvenirs and they're only 5 bucks each and good quality.

They have no parking lot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICzisPX7AE&fid=0x0:0x5490d97792b39913"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"Big Scott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjUFNB7DCllgcGbt-_lZzBEKa3DXiazO1e4AXfecGRgd3sO-I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The ABC store at Miracle Mile Mall in Las Vegas is a true convenience gem. It's a one-stop-shop with a diverse range of products, from snacks and drinks to souvenirs. The prices are reasonable, and the staff is always helpful and efficient. Whether you need travel essentials or Las Vegas keepsakes, ABC store has you covered. A reliable and friendly spot for shopping on the go!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDV3cH4xAE&fid=0x0:0x5490d97792b39913"],"When":"2023-12-15"},{"Name":"nikhil sathaye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-4WdiVN42izsOHnQ-5iznXL1MbInKkEPsfwtUXbdJ7tUFzubYJw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Souvenirs are definitely cheaper than some of the other places. Basic grocery is also more affordable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aimee Mertz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvqN5fVKv4E2TqIKtUrBrLRUCWPvVKkY__dmlbMegkX16o0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every time we are on the Vegas strip we end up here. It's a great place to grab a walking around drink. I try to stay hydrated and always forget to grab water on the way out. They alway have 2 for under $3 deals on water bottles. Beers rotate through 2 for $cheap all the time. They sell all the convenience items you would expect as well as liquor and souvenirs.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICe4Mej1wE&fid=0x0:0x5490d97792b39913"],"When":"2022-9-3"},{"Name":"Krin H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY3I8CfwS1lTyGGkaKZ239C_kVPzZ11nmm8JOFzYJRIA9lCAdi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"(hope this is the right one but surely they‚Äôre all similar enough) the abc store in vegas‚Äô ‚Äúmiracle mile shops‚Äù is the BEST place to get cheap souvenirs. they have the best prices of any other similar store i‚Äôve been to. $6 shirts, $2 magnets & keychains‚Ä¶ not to mention, spam musubi.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDBh4Cr2AE&fid=0x0:0x5490d97792b39913"],"When":"2023-1-30"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Matt Kapa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfXt521FXultcmvdFCYkQd-ikEbLJ0aDNhm8bNeidSpRDCWh5P1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stage Door Casino is one of the coolest dive bar experiences you can find in Las Vegas, especially if you want something completely different from the flashy Strip. This place lives up to its reputation as Las Vegas‚Äô favorite dive bar with incredibly cheap drinks and a relaxed, no-frills vibe that instantly puts you at ease.

The bar feels like a hidden gem, with casino games and slot machines right up by the bar so you can sip and play at the same time. They even serve hot dogs and classic bar snacks that hit the spot while you‚Äôre hanging out.

Service was fast, friendly, and welcoming. The kind of place where locals, visitors, and regulars mix comfortably. It‚Äôs connected to an awesome liquor store next door with great prices too, so you can grab a bottle before or after your drinks.

If you‚Äôre looking for a classic, laid-back Vegas dive with cheap drinks, fun games, and a friendly atmosphere, Stage Door is an absolute must-visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAM1JCm9HNgn5d1plKhcxpi&fid=0x0:0x8d2bbe82c770ddeb"],"When":"2026-1-4"},{"Name":"Super Star","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdng9ZVsYvMRyuGJZCjbYj9pbL2RljBmu28xNPYLbp2ee-QA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Yikes. $4 bud beers (before tip) and $3.75 hot dogs (before tip). Used to be our go to spot to hang with friends, old and new. They took out all the tables to sit and have a good time and replaced them with slot machines. Anywhere you choose to sit (has slot machines) and says must spend a min. Sucks for us and this company. No longer a happening place.

Eta: a hole in the wall type of place. Run down, little place. These photos are from the 2 for 1 hotdogs ($3.50) we got from the 7/11 right around the corner (walking distance).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDvpqhy3klXjOS1DRwZRUQE&fid=0x0:0x8d2bbe82c770ddeb"],"When":"2026-1-22"},{"Name":"krissy R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKj1TMcJWX7Flt8gMPlNA4gEeVVsbf84vGQMaQKE-zL28DgWw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Cheap drinks is bout all they good for! I gambled bout 340 dollars and only had 1 drink.... And still had to pay for it. Apparently margarita not included in gambling tab","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhABZwRuCScqp3MO5w3lRCJY&fid=0x0:0x8d2bbe82c770ddeb"],"When":"2026-1-31"},{"Name":"Tracey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuOQ8anXQYYlcC8YMuIDwvJai00AwfxC_iwMTk3-qJMQg-WcE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stage Door Casino and Bar Las Vegas - A Hidden Vegas Treasure

Rating: ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ**

What a GEM! We‚Äôve read about this place a while back and decided to go check it out. We were NOT disappointed! Everything was just as the great reviews said.

The Atmosphere
This is quintessential old Vegas charm - a little hole-in-the-wall bar that feels like stepping back in time. Don‚Äôt let the modest exterior fool you; this place has character in spades. The intimate setting creates a cozy, neighborhood bar vibe that‚Äôs become increasingly rare on the Strip.

Security & Service
The staff maintains a professional approach with security checks for weapons and ID at entry, but everyone is super nice once you‚Äôre inside. The friendly atmosphere makes you feel welcome from the moment you walk through the door.

Drinks & Pricing
Here‚Äôs where Stage Door really shines - the prices are unbeatable for Las Vegas:
- **$5 Jack and Coke**
- **$5 Whiskey and Coke**
- **$1 Beers**
-***$2 Hotdogs

And this isn‚Äôt watered-down tourist trap liquor - you‚Äôre getting REAL, quality alcohol at these prices. In a city where drinks can easily cost $15-20 elsewhere, these prices are practically unheard of.

Gaming
While it‚Äôs a small bar, they have gaming machines right at the bar where you can try your luck while sipping your affordable drinks. We both played the machines and had a great time, though we kept our expectations realistic.

The Verdict
It‚Äôs really a great experience that captures authentic Vegas spirit. The combination of incredibly affordable drinks, friendly service, and genuine local atmosphere makes this place special. Don‚Äôt skip it if you‚Äôre looking for a break from the corporate casino scene!

**Perfect for**: Budget-conscious visitors, locals, anyone seeking authentic Vegas character
**Skip if**: You prefer upscale casino environments or need extensive gaming options

Bottom Line:Stage Door Casino and Bar proves that sometimes the best Vegas experiences come in the smallest packages. Definitely worth the visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEPqG3Y2jmsLHOA&fid=0x0:0x8d2bbe82c770ddeb"],"When":"2025-6-7"},{"Name":"Action Jack (Wolverine)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUis2AT8oadf3TJX3UZyG32oHA12doBBNWEeLaB7YWcSVLMkRUHgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Heard all about this dive bar, decided to check it out. You can‚Äôt go wrong with $1 beer and $5 shots. Very lively atmosphere even though it‚Äôs smaller than some may like. They have a liquor/convenience store attached to it that has good prices as well. Across the street from Horseshoe and near Linq Promenade. I‚Äôll for sure stop in again on the next trip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID74LOdMA&fid=0x0:0x8d2bbe82c770ddeb"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Rob","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVm7PCPYzEJqGX9TEODVo09sflzptD_t7jVPQvTOyl6ZQeFXgAR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good atmosphere, drink prices are some of the best in Vegas, toilets are not the best, it‚Äôs a place where you come and have a drink which is not far from the strip. This place hasn‚Äôt changed in years which I like üòú
Take ID as it is a requirement to enter.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDog8KcIw&fid=0x0:0x8d2bbe82c770ddeb"],"When":"2025-4-28"},{"Name":"Kevin Velasquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmRi5DnzDiW70JUzk9CZbCNCRxslljWafMavEOiuj9Zxsa8IhG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a hidden gem. Hiding in plain sight (literally). It is right off the street and it CHEAP AS HELL. $1 bottled beers. $5 jack and coke drinks. They also sell hot dogs for like $2 or so. Cannot beat that! You do have to finish your drink inside the bar though, but still, great place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCg0rrDfA&fid=0x0:0x8d2bbe82c770ddeb"],"When":"2025-2-15"},{"Name":"G G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_oQRImqlEeRBIJvnv8A7oW1gITf_9PiLODnNZcUWMfhJ5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had to come here because of the $3 beer and hot dog special. Hot dog was good and beer was cold,  what more can you ask for? individual beers are also a dollar (bud or bud light).

Atmosphere and vibe is really nice, no frills and very chill. Feels like a locals bar. Liquor store next door in case you need booze for your hotel.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDPltSpGA&fid=0x0:0x8d2bbe82c770ddeb"],"When":"2024-12-1"}]

[{"Name":"Jonn Cena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKI2kNkWmM0Sm70PP7lQWoOUsezjDHUUuCAp2y_sBy-Zq6B2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"AVOID !!
SUPER OVERPRICED & RUDE!!
This place pays drivers for bringing people. It‚Äôs on the same street you leave the airport on just ask your driver to take you to another one.
Any other liquor store is cheaper than this.
AIRPORT PRICES & RUDE!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pump Faik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJN_qeW4ws8DsDwQV0Vz49I5pGL6lJjBBQHbQeqglpi0Vqz0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Official tourist trap. Used to have decent prices. Now that all the uber and taxis come here they are more expensive than the stores on fremont!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ha Yoon Baek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKiRja3U40ZXGccd5UCADWEN2Cv1Cx2SNlkA7IvwhZazx1gQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Uber driver took us there, prices are so expensive $80 for a bottle of Jose cuervo. Go to vons, its 5 mins away. Weird interaction between thr uber driver and the worker, when we didn't buy the lady gave us some weird looks ans whispered to the driver.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Victoria Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUQMPcgjrLHMi6H93BAlB9pLl9kbb0knsN-rP69PjbsDooIg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is the biggest scam ever. Uber drivers will take you here where prices are double or triple of other liquor stores on the strip. Please do not come here and save your money.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jared Sturtevant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2qTqcDjIWgTvCpsvNxODgNEjF6L1qVwg1Kfok8qJW4-666GZx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place was more expensive than the liquor store next to the baggage claim in the airport - I compared.  Get an Uber and go to Walmart it was literally half the price for everything at the big box.  I have never had such sticker shock in my life.  Yeah I know I was in Vegas but if you‚Äôre trying to save half your gambling money skip this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICt0ZfbKQ&fid=0x0:0xc6cd5ca751cafaf6"],"When":"2024-1-30"},{"Name":"Scott Montgomery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK70jTwKVKVX10b3rqh2RBipFwPI9HYh2iaY8T54EZWJ0xg1w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Rip off. $43 for 1/5 Beam 2 1 liters bottles of pop.  I was told I‚Äôm not in Kansas.  I said not Vegas either.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Barbara Thompson Roethle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTxEE6VylvRT2sEcSB66ereca8FrrDr_2vjXdM_x7V3oXPl5PG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"While the selection was awesome,  the prices were insane!  We purchased a four packnof cut water drinks, and it ran $29 after the convenience fee for using my debit card, which we were unaware of until after we paid.  Also, our taxi driver brought us here when traveling from the airport to our hotel.  We noticed a bunch of drivers waiting at one end of the store, I believe they get a commission for bringing their fares here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"DJ Kre","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTnN8bIqkdX0lSKI8OsM-ztITuP4up92fYUWB_S__U1uhYs2cycw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best place to kick off your Vegas Vacation to stay away from the strip prices!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID4hsrm0wE&fid=0x0:0xc6cd5ca751cafaf6"],"When":"2019-1-13"}]

I didn't know they sold everything here. So we end up buying drink and snacks back to our resort room. I also bought coffee mugs which was on sale for 2 for 10 dollars instead of paying 6 dollars each.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Scone Choco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_f65STLXuXAQpmLZqPIF3-MzLHxcrc5mV3Pf-l5wyB6-BsEc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute souvenirs. I have no idea why they are pushing hello Kitty so much but it‚Äôs cute so OK.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDQnfqOyAE\u0026fid=0x0:0xb604a6647af421e6"],"When":"2025-3-13"},{"Name":"Ms K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJx_Z2GBYI01H2feR60I5OGdIKinDv0bchdFlphxpsbbQnvaw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I stay close to this strip location, 2 to 3 months a year and find myself regularly shopping at your miracle miles shops, particularly the one outside of the South entrance of PH.  The staff are always so nice and the prices are reasonable, especially for a staple such as water.  I do appreciate that.\nI really appreciate your stores in the Mall.  Also, I really like the fact that you guys offer a variety of quick bites, sandwiches, cut fruit, salads, even musabis!  Thanks!   I am heading over for water shortly!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adam h","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8c9EIaUgljksY0HbH4rIRUf6rY7bN8FerEgnMT5A_kGrVaw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Avoid their  hoodies. Just got home from Vegas . Washed it in cold once , not dried . Went to wear and all the lettering is falling off. Not even wore once . Complete joke for a 40 dollar hoodie.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICP9MqfpAE\u0026fid=0x0:0xb604a6647af421e6"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Jonathan Flores","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWa_tz7ZgdQhkSmg3fMTVfGybGk0Zn5gyfADOJyZLWs4QrmVEGRsA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great prices and large selections, what else do you need?
