column32:
[{"Name":"God","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMJI6NoeovHO6uXi_4kOzu3N8qQUDsUAYjVeOY1e2hC5xS57Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"God : Liquor Library LV , perfect spot to pickup some smokes after your flight ( God ) and before you hit the strip! : God","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD8pAv-eE5ytbFSd2k4uyKw&fid=0x0:0xdc75f96bda3046d6"],"When":"2025-10-15"},{"Name":"astrida mcfarland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdTe300IQFfKs5bIuXfiS01FioQsJDXRPYubRrpgpLlaubiWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We spotted this liquor store right by our baggage claim in Terminal 1 at the Harry Reid International Airport.

How convenient and it is the only non-duty liquor store in the US from what I read. They claim that their prices are the same as the liquor stores on the Strip. The vibe is really cool, and they stack the bottles like books in a library, hence their store name. They have liquor, wine, and craft beer.  The store is beautiful and decorated in a white theme.

The manager was very welcoming, and she helped us find a bottle of Casamigos, lime squeeze, soda water, and a Figi 6-pack of bottled water.  I also bought a jeweled Las Vegas water cup with a cap and straw. We will definitely return next time we are in Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDLhcW-uAE&fid=0x0:0xdc75f96bda3046d6"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"lydia clarke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqi4oGGmJ4rzHul8HZrRFpX2phezl-rrZaFPA9GdrPxmcT6vADFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing selection! I was able to grab my fav bottle of French wine and a cigar for my husband at the same price ( maybe lower) than my usual store in town!  I don't drink hard alcohol but they have EVERYTHING.  If you are visiting or returning home, this is the perfect stop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICv37zo0AE&fid=0x0:0xdc75f96bda3046d6"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Khoi Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUz_ndBnrvVWVMgFtNj5oRzJrcfU3W2jTBhlCt3x921x4lkWBPRXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So many beer, wine and liquor options. Prices are reasonable. Located right by the baggage claim","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDBsG9Ej4_7K5I9VWecjru9&fid=0x0:0xdc75f96bda3046d6"],"When":"2025-6-9"},{"Name":"Lucky Charm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKZR7DKxxqHXHZppsMKveqGGsTJwUb0dNNT80XrGLsDemmA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"When I found that the prices were too high, I walked to the area across the street from the airport. I discovered that the prices there were much more affordable. A helpful African American employee advised me to make my purchase from outside, and her recommendation turned out to be spot on.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thomas Yarnall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI1oJw9rs0H4pI5PHgXS_sJ9oJc-KJvnruKUo9U1zyau2ZXR7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tipping Gone Wild!

It's a liquor store in the baggage terminal. Of course the prices are going to be extremely marked up. The place is clean bright and there is a nice selection. Only thing that bugs me is that you're prompted to tip when you make your purchase and I've gotten a little side eye for not doing so. I'm sorry, but working at a liquor store is not a tip position!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kellie Edington","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWu7IQiwzRo6iWzuJ6SSNesmc2LCfXDnoei9M3e6YF9rf4npSEB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Expensive.  If you want bottles at non strip prices. Total wine and more is a quick lyft/Uber trip south strip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICko_nv6wE&fid=0x0:0xdc75f96bda3046d6"],"When":"2019-6-12"},{"Name":"Loreal Clark","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9uQPQXStqZ_9lycF1dFO6bnwW09ka4au0hixl6eAbevROVUW6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Just visited this store last night within the Las Vegas aiport. This was my husband's first time in Vegas, my second time. We were looking forward to buying a variety of liquors as we like to enjoy and host gatherings back home. When we walked into the store, the two young ladies working were having a conversation. They looked at us and kept talking...no greeting. They didn't ask how can they assist us...nothing. They continued their conversation and we decided not to purchase anything. On our way out, they did not say anything to us. However, a white gentleman walks in and to our dismay, they greeted him by saying "Welcome in!" They did not say one word to us but greeted the white gentleman as if his patronage was more important. They lost our business and we WILL NOT be purchasing from this store or any if it's affiliates. Whoever the store manager is, please speak with your staff about being polite to ALL CUSTOMERS.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Laurencio Ronquillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWH5KEtHawCR2OY_aAqEHsZdqMxvoJ8Huak55dY0fnJIkdqg6EpUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place to save on your pre party in room drinking. I went to sushi across the street savings right there and then saved by purchasing liquor that would have been $300 on strip I paid $70. I suggest they carry more malbec red wines. Also review some spirits where cvs on strip has them cheaper price. But overall great store and the staff was as friendly and service oriented as could be.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICk2OORPg&fid=0x0:0x899c8c4fbabacd44"],"When":"2017-12-8"},{"Name":"Jorge Camelo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfoDdnCcIw2XoV7v0dfiKJ0f1TobkxCgSGqnLWiYGIolzeyw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great selection of liquor. I went in looking for a couple bottles for the weekend and ended up buying my stock for the rest of the year. The staff was very knowledgeable and helpful. Will definitely come back when I return to Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDCpdqXTQ&fid=0x0:0x899c8c4fbabacd44"],"When":"2020-10-4"},{"Name":"Brandon Luckett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHJBnx9Cs6L9yH9wScHhOTyKcwMtyPB4kOwc1HBd9WtRjltjiR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Gotta be closed, how is it 24 hours ? This sign been on the door for way longer than 5 minutes too. Wasted trip walking over here. Bad for business for a new local & 1st time customer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDJbrPvFptJnzXGhoiJdiSR&fid=0x0:0x899c8c4fbabacd44"],"When":"2025-8-1"},{"Name":"LISA AFFEZIONATO","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_oydAi2GZxXBETRzO-n_G9md-gACT5uN8kuZkq9gmcyg4Xg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The disheveled. Insolent, and indolent cashier harassed my friend‚Ä¶ a veteran of 3 wars.  He followed her outside of the the dirty, unkept, and unorganized ‚Äúbusiness‚Äù . He did not thank her for her business, so she stated, ‚ÄúI did not expect you to say thank you.‚Äù This disheveled, stinky, and unkept worker‚Ä¶ chased her out of the store and screamed, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm calling you in for drunk driving!‚Äù My friend was upset, not intoxicated, because she had a large amount of money stolen from her. However, stink man assumed she had imbibed and chased her out of the filthy store. He then cornered her by her vehicle and threatened to call the the police. He continued to berate her, run up on her with the dirty phone. Unbelievable, this is how our veterans are treated. A myriad of phone calle have been placed to this sketchy alcohol store with no one answering. Guess their phone only works to call out, but not accept calls. Hmmm. Maybe, the law should investigate what is really going on there. I know when I enter Lees‚Äôs stores, I don‚Äôt have to disinfect the bottles. It‚Äôs worth the extra dime for professionalism and clean sanitary products.  Lees‚Ä¶ I love you. As for as

X O liquors‚Ä¶ dust your inventory, hire hospitable employees, and for the love of all that‚Äôs holy‚Ä¶ make your employees bathe..","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_r74ZHn4GmxKy6MU_AKrOXU9QqAOGuRPYR5lyvRNmI9uT3sc9vg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The one thing about this location is they always have Damso Soju and buzz balls. It's a small place but decent products for being so close to the strip. Also if you are looking to pregame before eating at a restaurant this is a good spot to grab something quick.

The staff are very nice too.

Just be weary of bums that might be lingering outside.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marc Bruyere","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnKfnmbtZoW2o_hEbayQmvgdI5xEXMORfPQSQ_P3dULJCY9w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a Vegas veteran of 20+ years I can tell you this is the best and closest liquor store for access from Strip Hotels. Don't bother calling them because they won't give you prices and may be rude on the phone. In the store they were EXTREMELY helpful and nice with prices just like the store up the street from my house in Denver. An $8 round trip Uber makes it that much more worth it so don't take a taxi.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephanie Pitzl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKM0ESsXA_sfmwQMYF5BIZJjrek4YfnRA8eC4HpQOitoFBtVwBoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience!! Went in to buy drinks for the weekend and Nick the cashier was absolutely amazing! We got a free birthday bottle of champagne and got tons of advice for things to do in Vegas over the weekend! Definitely will be returning!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Josh Almas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVhiLD7CyP9Qm20pDHRGm6o7JqBdR1I8gyyrsTZVg_RtF2JI4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A conveniently located liquor store, featuring a good, but not great selection of wines.

The staff, was very friendly on my visit.

The decor, could generously be called minimalistic.

On the plus side, it's open 24 hours a day.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32: [{"Name":"Mark S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZGHAIfe0_FDiheHtA58qHG0YLE6TxxsuceNUBV6Y_6N_95PEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"UPDATE 2/6/25;\nAuntie M's is a hidden jewel that needs better street signage to draw in customers. It's very nice and new inside with a great location on Tropicana and Arville. In between The Orleans hotel \u0026 casino and the Budget Suites on Tropicana. I've meet friendly and helpful staff there. They have a very good selection of wine and liquor. They've improved on a greater selection of food. Being the only grocery store within walking distance. They have capitalized on that, with a wider and better selection of food for the workers in the offices within the building. They now have a grill to cook hamburgers etc...The prices are fairly reasonable. A gallon of milk is around $5.50 in an open air cooler. Milk should be in the beverage cooler to last longer. Compared to the gas station that wants $9.05 for a gallon of milk a block away. Auntie M's is on path to be very successful permanent local market. We needed a small local grocery store like this in the area. Great job Auntee M's !!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDA2O6l9gE\u0026fid=0x0:0xaa664cc6b717b94e"],"When":"2025-2-6"},{"Name":"Terra Jae","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJQvwJ2I-Q5S3A9nHesdbf87t-g5OMU954laNw2cmdwMB7BqI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Rude and racist‚Äî random guy in parking lot accused me of prostitution idk if it was cuz I‚Äôm black or was dressed nice lol then threatened me and got violent‚Ä¶ May sue","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCzZtOp3AueRDELh98PLojK\u0026fid=0x0:0xaa664cc6b717b94e"],"When":"2026-1-29"},{"Name":"AJ 702","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlRMr-QPEAocE6Oefn4-bGNTXeUsL7gsmcR281sFV2pJ-33obz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So a couple months ago my homie Rob and I were driving home from work, when we noticed a 304 (street walker) walking out of Auntee M‚Äôs Market with what we assumed to be her client. They both had a bag of food. Fast forward to today my homie Rob and I decided to pull up to Auntee M‚Äôs Market to try some of the local food that the 304s love to eat. When I tell you that joint was BUMPIN !!! It was definitely A1 better than the steak sauce !!\nRob got himself a breakfast sandwich with hash browns for 10 dollars and I got the 15 dollar Korean bowl. We will definitely be back the food was AMAZING and the service was great. Thank you Auntee M‚Äôs Market üôåüèΩ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDflefG0gE\u0026fid=0x0:0xaa664cc6b717b94e"],"When":"2025-1-8"},{"Name":"Lindsey Roberts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtZavtYrSm2Kt2MB_kE-N_aUaB0W5H9P5yhynJ-yMwXBpATdEi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Popped into this store at 2:30 a.m.. Aside from the store BEING and SMELLING clean, they have a great selection, normal NOT VEGAS prices, I felt safe being in this store. I wish we were local so I could go back when the cafe is finish/opened. Love to support Black owned business and ESPECIALLY when they are making a difference in their communities.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"marquise avinger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-vv7NhO9GPXeUCUAG82nMgyaLhZ7m0DygR2m6CZc5Rab7Rznb=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great vibe and super friendly...felt hella welcomed. Also had people posted outside to make sure no shenanigans. I believe a cafe is coming soon as well. All I know is I love to see bruthas win, anytime I'm in Vegas they have my business ‚úäüèø","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carlo Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvnXebqRN9SsjUp0HooquZGlR9-UiJjEXXr-MbEmBDie6E0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very clean. Was completely empty. They have the usual type of convenience store products,  but also what seems like alot of import style products, the ones I saw were Italian in origin. There is a restaurant that I saw which was closed at the late night time I had visited. Am interested in trying if I pass by during the day.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"R Terry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIs9WNe2Mn7jPQnM6y9fV416a8qGAvrFFKO0ISP4DWJwWO3Sw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome business model! Great value! Hop skip and a jump from the strip!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Egghead Warrior","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVo0V6tbHpDCA_rx5qyiL9y7pvqerVmGGsr4WsVJsc_Xhmz-WZHsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The steak and eggs here are AWESOME and a heck of a deal!!! Randomly happened upon this place, but will be coming back every time I'm in Vegas for work.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Jesse L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXluz1KaKdHgrrmRuZJPlk8cYuq2Rjellu8F6E0tApYZQN-3vfG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great locally owned liquor store.  Such an amazing variety and great service.   I‚Äôve driven by this place so many times and had NO idea what I was missing out on.

I don‚Äôt live close to this place but now I will be making special trips for the great selection and the beers on tap.   You can have samples and if you wish then you can get a growler to go.   They currently have 3 different Goose Island beers on tap and that was a A+ move on their part along with 3 other beers to try.

Janessa and Teri are super awesome and helpful.  They helped me get my Thursday off to great start.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC1xuKEGQ&fid=0x0:0x2033546e73bed849"],"When":"2023-12-28"},{"Name":"Jay Hendrix","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9YIhvzGV28ZbayB3jltzNt4b2PpkijBcequgWaoPLgD_1nBc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Top shelf wine and sprits are the best, they know their stuff and have the goods! The only place in Las Vegas that has Nooku Bourbon Cream. Old Elk special","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDy0JDisQE&fid=0x0:0x2033546e73bed849"],"When":"2021-2-21"},{"Name":"Mike Svensson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJe_RMPa3CP8KRuzkPkkyuAzo0zxh5VnnV-jCD9S_lfHzwKmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing selection. Nice people","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel Spencer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtSSx9oVEwmccvqW2sULJNwjrUvnKNuwt8GIW5FiAl7xBd4w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great selection of spirits. Home of the "50ft wall of Whiskey".  Literally everything u can think of is in here. I recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC3j7CJ5AE&fid=0x0:0x2033546e73bed849"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Josefin O'Brien","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEdRp1Vz_xzGErd4X0eV18esqKp-96qFfn2xY_sJtdHQ9KwvyS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I live down the street from this place so yes, maybe I am slightly biased because it‚Äôs so close, however having said that I can go other places that offer coupons or deals or have lower prices. I keep coming back here because they have one employee who is THE BEST. Well I like everyone who works here but there is one guy (white guy, bald, black eyeglass frames) who just always goes the extra mile! He is one of the nicest, friendliest, most knowledgeable, most approachable person in service I‚Äôve ever dealt with and every visit is a pleasure. I‚Äôve been in a few times when he isn‚Äôt there and I always think oh no, maybe he doesn‚Äôt work there any more, but I was just in tonight and he‚Äôs still there, thank goodness. We talked about egg nog and holiday cocktails, he has a voluminous knowledge and amazing recommendations (and it‚Äôs not always the most expensive item - he asks what my budget is and I appreciate that). Shame on me I haven‚Äôt gotten his name but if you go there, you‚Äôll hopefully have the pleasure of meeting this guy - he is a GEM. Also they clearly have a great selection of stuff for any occasion - from a random bottle of whatever to a really really really expensive bottle of wine. Check it out!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Travis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIITwohOLBD_OSIN0bQCJtuj13UbBLt_F4KnSBso3qat28lBUbGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best local bottle shop in the area. Liquor is priced higher than the grocery store but they have a wide variety to choose from.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDelbmtiAE&fid=0x0:0x2033546e73bed849"],"When":"2022-10-15"},{"Name":"Franzaui Randall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1TjWs6ldlqNkwcRZrAFUNM4gH7niJ0CuN0XqKjb_S2r6jhXWflQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have everything you could possibly want, but the service from the amazing staff is above the rim. Simply put Top Shelf speaks for itself, they are truly top shelf and 5 stars. Don‚Äôt take my word for it please go there yourself and let the world know what you think. You will not be disappointed üòé","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Haik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrwzLdvS0Zc35auM9af0IJH2Fog0l3paN-gujDpUtUXGb64vA0nA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good prices and huge selection of everything.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Isaac L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVDh2u_0W5mEXcbAJwhsTjaWeQfI_KbPFOA_ZUfUBBHmLwO5R8TQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a fantastic dinner at Wally‚Äôs inside Resorts World! The food was top-notch across the board, but the steak was easily the standout‚Äîperfectly cooked and incredibly flavorful. They also have an impressive cocktail list with a wide variety of unique options to choose from.

What really made the night, though, was the service. Our group was quite large, but we were attended to so well by several different staff members who made sure we had everything we needed without ever feeling rushed. Highly recommend if you‚Äôre looking for a great meal with excellent service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAEE3gflPu2mngjeIaGUuJn&fid=0x0:0xc4145339ba99de7e"],"When":"2026-2-5"},{"Name":"Harrison Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_euAunu9rLKPVGiGNS3L9HqgISMcFK-WzqKZr4hRiJTYwacQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dining at Wally's feels less like a casual meal and more like an entrance to a polished European salon, where luxury is expected, and quality is non-negotiable. The atmosphere hums with quiet confidence. Soft lighting, marble surfaces, and an extensive wine wall create an inviting ambiance even before the first dish arrives at the table.

I ordered the Wally Burger, a dish that truly lives up to its reputation with each bite. The half-pound Black Hawk American Wagyu comes perfectly cooked, rich without being overwhelming. The patty is deeply flavorful, showcasing the unmistakable silkiness of Wagyu, and is beautifully complemented by Artikas smoked Gouda, which adds depth without dominating the palate. Caramelized onions provide sweetness, heirloom tomatoes contribute freshness, and butter lettuce keeps the overall structure light. The signature Wally's sauce ties everything together with subtlety. Nothing is overpowering; it's indulgent but well-balanced. This is a burger for those who appreciate proportion.

Across the table, the Salmon Avocado Toast demonstrated that refinement isn't limited to meat dishes. The smoked salmon is delicate and clean, layered over creamy smashed avocado. The poached eggs are cooked perfectly, their yolks providing richness without heaviness. Basil pesto introduces a gentle herbal note, while shaved green asparagus adds texture and a pleasing crispness. It's thoughtful, carefully composed, and far more elegant than the name suggests.

Wally's truly excels in its wine selection. We paired our meal with both white and red wines, each carefully selected and poured with confidence. The white wine enhanced the smokiness of the salmon and cut through the richness of the avocado, while the red wine complemented the Wagyu, enhancing its depth instead of competing with it. Here, wine is not merely an accessory; it's an integral part of the dining experience.

Yes, dining here is expensive. There's no getting around that. However, Wally's doesn't apologize for its prices, and after the experience, it doesn't need to. The execution, ingredients, atmosphere, and service all justify the cost. This is dining for those who appreciate precision, quality, and the luxury of things done well.

Is it pricey? Absolutely. Is it worth it? Without a doubt.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA_ix41Un-OJHNqlXs0vDBv&fid=0x0:0xc4145339ba99de7e"],"When":"2026-2-1"},{"Name":"Krista","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYywUR3moU0chP_QDMvlllq9krBcgEPnZi3vKFhevs2zte0MQV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We really liked the food. And the service was perfect, nice, helpful and efficient. We did a pick 5 for the charcuterie plate. It was really fun to be able to pick any five from quite a few choices. We also got oysters, the duck confit pizza and shishito peppers. We asked the sommelier (or wine nerd as he called himself) to pick a wine to go with our random choices. He checked to see exactly what we'd ordered, asked what kind of wine we normally drink, and our budget. He gave us a couple of choices and directed us toward one after we asked us to. And he stayed under our budget. And the wine absolutely delicious and perfect for what we ordered. The charcuterie plate was really generous and has fun accompaniments. The shishitos came with a delicious yogurt and the pizza was really good as well. And it wasn't even as expensive as some of the other nice Vegas meals we've done. We would definitely go back for the food, wine and service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhChTRSwHLoZag3BweRg1mvU&fid=0x0:0xc4145339ba99de7e"],"When":"2025-12-30"},{"Name":"Sushil P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfVYIXcZkr6daBNpXM176puWvBIaQmPJVosSUlyKVNmvS4LYu4bw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had a good experience dining at Wally's. Tried this during our stay at the Conrad - resorts world and we were pleasantly surprised.

We tried Owen baked Brie Bread to begin with but found it way too sweet for our liking. Should have stuck to Burrata I guess !  We also got the Mezcal drink which was awesome and high quality !

Then came PAUL‚ÄôS ENDIVE SALAD and the GRILLED OCTOPUS - Both were highlight reel items for the night. Excellent. The Endive salad is the most unique and interesting salad I've ever had. Great Crunch and flavors !  Grilled Octopus was awesome too and we loved it.

We requested them to bring our Spicy Salami pizza without any Honey but they forgot about our request , nevertheless , with or without honey - pizza wasn't good. They were not busy and in spite of that service was lacking. Requested server for a diet coke and again she forgot about it and had to remind her 2nd time.

Ambience is good and we prefer the outdoor set up with good views of resort world  (Indoors are all high tops in a darker environment)

Overall - A good experience with few misses !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCrgOnkGPLDr0hgzljpjd4k&fid=0x0:0xc4145339ba99de7e"],"When":"2025-12-4"},{"Name":"Keng Low","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8gKQ_kpGznSzKcGf3xfTYt9fYS0vDVBBuhnl-M7ZE1ulLsY3wvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Sat down and was hard to resist getting wine with dinner. Ended up getting a tasty Malbec with the rabbit Bolognese. The mussels were piping hot and fresh with plenty of sauce to soak up with the bread. Recommended if u like mussels","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA-MOWAt48vBrPJ2DiNCCI6&fid=0x0:0xc4145339ba99de7e"],"When":"2025-11-26"},{"Name":"Aubrey Glaze","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKXO8MP3ZMfA7aSNAn9nsdZNDI4UuIrSwAinWVGiR5SRpqO3WSr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant is within the Resorts World hotel.  We came for dirty martinis and shared plates and none of it disappointed. The martinis were made so much and we all were still thinking about them the next day. We had pizza, burrata, salad, mussels and more and we enjoyed it all. Such a treat. Our server was very kind.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAzjICvURVRUD9qQzQnW4L7&fid=0x0:0xc4145339ba99de7e"],"When":"2025-12-7"},{"Name":"Joey Laudando","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGIR11XiHTdwvU3qu2KWY2WaqfPXd-JKQ6V8qhbw3ZV1IAlMCR7g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I don‚Äôt typically write reviews, but I felt compelled to share this one because there is certainly room for improvement, and this restaurant and hotel have the potential to deliver a truly world-class experience being that they are on the Las Vegas Strip.

Pros
The aesthetics of the restaurant‚Äîmusic, location, and overall atmosphere‚Äîare all up to par. Unfortunately, beyond that, this experience fell short.

Cons
For a high-quality hotel, I was surprised that we were not greeted within the first 10 minutes of being seated.

When someone did come to our table, we asked for still water and were not advised that it came with an upcharge, which was disappointing. After this when our actual server arrived, we were not explained the menu or given the opportunity to learn about popular items.

The truffle pizza was alright, and the burger with fries were decent; however, there were two notable issues with the burger:
‚Ä¢	The pickle served alongside it was sweet rather than savory, which did not complement the burger well in my opinion.
‚Ä¢	The Wally‚Äôs ketchup was, frankly,  very unpleasan, so much so that I nearly gagged when tasting it. We ended up requesting Heinz ketchup instead. I‚Äôm genuinely curious who provided feedback suggesting this ketchup was suitable to be paired with the burger.

Overall, the service was not outstanding. My spouse‚Äôs birthday was not acknowledged, despite it being noted in the reservation.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dianne Coosy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYnn8GKO-YmJyGtNCtHtEeHwyHGd0SQ4LJ3n3fnED49M0CKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was in Vegas for Restaurant week and I had a prefixed menu as per the photos.  The small charcuterie plate was super yummy. The Breakfast/Brunch plate was yummy and cooked perfectly! Then came the dessert which was again awesome.
I sat on the "Patio" and love the atmosphere out there while I people watch.
My original server, a gentleman, was awesome. However, the only thing about the service I didn‚Äôt like was that when they changed shifts? Or went on a break? I was not notified so I kept waiting for him to come back.   Finally, a lady came over, did not let me know that she‚Äôs my new server and asked if I needed anything with my credit card on the table. I said no, (I was still waiting for my original server to come back) then she came back and asked if I wanted to pay‚Ä¶ I paid her.
If that‚Äôs the only little snag, and everything else was awesome, I will definitely be back!!!
I would definitely recommend trying this place out.
I‚Äôm certainly going back and having a nice charcuterie board with a glass of wine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEOTw66nS9NSV4gE&fid=0x0:0xc4145339ba99de7e"],"When":"2025-6-15"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Adolis Jimenez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2Nmn1wPkSDDJ98Oe-PpTIG9tqd8pPZW40Cwrj0nTfXA_zWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here on the third weekend of October looking for my signature favorite Vodka, Chopin. Unfortunately they did not have it, but what surprised me was that the cashier lady called the owner and the owner said she promised to have it within next week if I pledged my loyalty. I am not a local so I was unable to take her up on that offer but I promise I will when I move there! The cashier lady was so real and sweet, it felt like talking to my best friend back home in Miami. I felt right at home. Loved her vibes so much she was funny. Gave me great recommendations as well and the prices were amazing. Couldn‚Äôt stop thinking about them so I came back to write the review <3","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mat Torres","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXF-rdAr-2tWQRArJzS3Wr1a315tJLrtk1UaRRNnjlqTg_Ycjy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place because I myself built a good relationship as a friend  to the people  that work there and I feel welcomed all the time  and very great customers service  very nice and always positive energy  I love that and very respectful here so come on down and visit  this place ‚ù§Ô∏è üòä üòÄ","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Craig Adkins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW97O14X1VfjK-QPUxgbgWXSP4JzeJDZJ0Yhw6jj1n1QclqLI4Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good selection cheap prices also small selection of grocery items more than the average liquor store. They are always very nice and polite to everyone. Vape store next door has a great selection and decent prices too. They sell inexpensive pro shirts in the back of the store I believe it's less than $10 a shirt all colors short and long sleeve Ive bought a bunch they are great to wear under your work uniform.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eric Duval","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIEWdNlmjIIMRCODSyjgliHKtIXO0BVnv8AaivwXyBIUKWw9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am a steady customer at the mom and pop smoke shop. I go there mostly for the reason being the owners and the staff. They have always treated me very well and all of them are very polite. They do there very best to accommodate all my needs. So if your looking for a smoke shop that is very well supplied and deal with people that are very knowledgeable and courteous, this is the smoke shop you want to go to","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"manijane‚Äôt ten","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPnCZjcBbPG0xscdDwMgEIAHfu4bqZzjkQ8CZq-Hw0Cy2xGzI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this store!!! The staff here is very personable, they greet you by name.  I have been coming to this store for years and the only thing that has changed is the fact that they opened up a smoke shop right next door.  They really do have everything between the two shops, and honestly the best prices in town. I drive 5 miles just to shop here, people are awesome and the prices are reasonable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shannon Hull","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQDLkx0H01qz6etdmwtKDTsUAgcodK5x46aV9opVL8Gv6MRX3t4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My goto stop for everything. Everyone here and the smoke shop next door r friendly and awesome. Been shopping here for almost 20 years and still have same owner.
(If u seen my last review, was an accident and meant for the horrible hustler store across the street)
Truly and honestly one of my most favorite convenient stores","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thomas Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMPiYsYlGN-VwuMdDPojoaqa3gpWaXUlol8Q2DTYKzlK_ghiE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good prices family owned just off the north side of the strip has hard liquor to suit all taste prices are from $1 shots and can's of beer to high end bottles fully stocked with just about everything to everything you might need from a tooth brush to cleaning supplies the two brothers that run the establishment are always helpful and if you are a smoker step next door to there smoke shop very reasonable prices for packs and carton's and if you purchase a certain you get a free lighter üòú","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"RSH RSH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhdwQurX5P3U2RriqV4EkwFE8Zk_0mrZMEeSreLQBuhKoxrBE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've lived a block from this place for years and the employees are always friendly and courteous. Eddie, Mama, and the guy in the afternoon really treat all the customers well, no matter if you are a regular or someone that just visits once in a while.

If you ever visit the store and see Eddie ask him How's "Hamir"? that is a running joke we have had for years. If you see this Eddie, God bless you and the family. Happy New Years.","Images":null,"When":""}]

Thanks for the Rad free tin cup!
They keep everything so COLD !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDrnsfVSw&fid=0x0:0x71e87f0fc841a5fd"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"Bryce Tucker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCIVPW_GB_xfRNvXSYJOOMK9WQbpxA1IPJ9bHBpH-3qhHowCXW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place always has the boxes I'm looking for staff is super helpful and very knowledgeable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brennan Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHC1lSNJdYwn9WtOi1hEFYR3Zzfrbv0rAuo93Ux9ZW5AmNHktb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A pretty good liqior store with a decent selection. It‚Äôs not the closest to where I live but the service is so good, I drive the extra 15 minutes to go to the best XO in town.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kim Merrill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVM16A1qS8XyGUBMtb6dEPbm4tf_M7nTvBgNGWxrYgEp8MRUegG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I wish I could rate a 0!!!! I kid you not, they rig their own gaming machines. Man called me a liar when I told him my money got jammed. He couldn't find the money anywhere in the machine. Meanwhile I called my boyfriend to come and assist me. I didn't know what to so. Call the cops, continue arguing with clerk, gaming authority.???? Never being in this situation.  He took it as a threat , gave me my money and told me to leave. My boyfriend comes everyday to purchase some sort of liquor.  I promise he won't be back nor myself!!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Francisca Toledo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJPDCpZGKAvpVj5NAKk2Qtg2Z5heulJpzPb4XcqxDBNPlYXw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The environment feels very peaceful.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jacob Benavides","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKXoX_uvm8y2QP_-oUDk0BIA954Ayxg-__RZeNJ0GjkTXdrfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my go to. Service is always amazing. These guys are always friendly and always know what I want when I walk in. If you‚Äôre looking for cheap off strip liquor this is the place to go. I guarantee you‚Äôll spend $25-$50 less than you would on the strip. Take an extra 10 min drive and hit this place up!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tyron Herman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXeIPraNwgfVHCiX-sUfiT6hfN-9Z5YEHWiAd8ZM0JmRBxZ1RcU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great selection and awesome, helpful staff! column32: [{"Name":"Santos Gomez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuaLRM2FX_UnBBKFTYefCVvZOmmiY7WmYY4C-ANlxLQAzvleq_Aw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great spot off strip with a great variety of goods.  From wine to whiskey sodas to snacks. There's a bit of everything for everyone. And prices are cheap. My favorite go to local Liquor store. And there's a few machines if you wanna try your luck.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kim Fain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZHS5Y81pOytyx1mKepa_3HkuKP14FUpPwC0uzK94s0pa3TIR6xg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Save your $$$ go to Lee's Liquor. All products are marked up. Store is dirty and unmanaged. Cashier will mock you and overcharge.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICRosbkCw\u0026fid=0x0:0x514d57e3b1d4030"],"When":"2023-3-28"},{"Name":"FALBY Mark A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6xzSazzeXnIgFQmr4_VyE9EL40jBpJ6O8qbobYdaVj_3PO4T0_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I am a visitor to Las Vegas and chose to go to Liquor Land because it was was the closest liquor store to my hotel. All liquor is stored behind a long counter to the left when one enters the store. Liquor is stored up to the ceiling which made it hard to find brands and prices. The prices seemed high so I did not buy anything rather, I went to Albertsons Grocery across the street where I had bought scotch last year. The price I paid was $8.00 less than this location. It was recommended by an Albertson's shopper to go to Lee's Discount Liquors on Rainbow St. so I will try there for buying my higher-end scotch gift purchase soon. Liquor Land isn't horrible, there are just better options available.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brandon Saccal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuowG25R-VQWO9zKdhXnPNXXJnwgJ0jKCmJ0SlPMY7HJ-4bTOu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best liquor in Las Vegas hands down. prices are great and they are open 24 hours so they are always available for those last minute trips.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Kennedy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLt8gBqY4e0xmdiZ9xE3J4qn2eW2LINSBKQvu-gk-aNdf20g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I have shopped at this store for six months since moving up here .spending twenty,thirty sometimes buying just a couple of beers .today i went to buy millers 16oz cans from the back corner marked at 99 cents a can.i have purchased these same items before no problem ,today i grabbed 3 cans at 99cts \u0026 1 kingsized reeses peanut butter cups 2$ \u0026 change the cashier who is usualy fairly cool \u0026 easy to talk to.polite,helpful etc.rang up $10.59 which is about double the price for 3 millers \u0026 1 candybar .when i pointed this out he told me that was what he was charging i told him that was the wrong price.he got angry and pulled my items behind  the counter and told me to leave .i did nothing to warrant this treatment. I told him as much  as and he just got angrier and we ended up arguing  as i was leaving he called me a name and at me like he was going to assault me? What kind of customer  service is this .i have spent hundreds  of dollers in this place and did not warrant this kind of treatment. So what's this guy's problem. He even acted like he was going to come outside and attack me when he saw that i was ready to defend myself he thought better of it.now i don't understand why this man tripped out on me like that when normally we interact just fine. Im not going  to spend my money in this store anymore .this man is racist against americans period. I got a bad about this man something wrong with him.michael kennedy","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thomas Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPGcbFOFNkli24s8I4kNPvQVIizXW8ugtis4q-74kYKQxDSw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Do not waste your time going here if you are black. There‚Äôs an associate that worked there who is racist. I had to call the cops on him because he pepper sprayed me. Fortunately he will be going to jail. If you‚Äôre black im warning you üö´üö´‚ÄºÔ∏èWarning ‚ö†Ô∏è ‚ÄºÔ∏èüö∑","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tanya Rawlins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLgcpRSJPupaGBdz6g4ewWhPJ1VLGrBqFXqbFXk-oX8dsczYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I like this store prices are the same as their competitors, staff is very friendly and helpful and it's never really crowded.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Philippe Trevor Vargas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkZunotyxYDo9cbiorckBb7I2sLD-5VtMCAgc6N_5L2A4Istom=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very kind and nice employees, clean and has a really great liquor and non-alcoholic selection! Would definitely recommend shopping here!","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Scott Hattis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU23DbdcWhTsBi0T53AnOoifxnwNvTc8JMm92nDAfJVKe2iZ_5B=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They have an okay variety. They have snacks Vegas souvenirs cleaning supplies a little bit of pet food, frozen entrees, cigarettes and alcohol.

They also have a comically large number of "no tap to pay" signs written in sharpie plastered all over the store.

The prices are ridiculously high. For a 0.93 oz. single serve box of cereal that usually comes in variety packs they want $6! You don't get a pack, you get one little box.

Everything in this place is a price gouge.

If you drive, and you are sitting in your car in the parking lot of this store here's what you do:

Turn on your car, and make a right onto Tropicana. Trust me!!

2-3 minutes up the road on the right is a shopping plaza. There's a dollar tree, a Walmart and even a few  restaurants. (Yes, Walmart sells booze)

When you get time, go in and look at the rediculous prices. You'll thank me later.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A C NYK","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOGh-rlOd4AJ6_LCzCxSMxySJqzd2z9Ds8SKemOb3ZxXdOasv7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"$6 plus tax for a bottle of Aquafina? No price tags anywhere in the store.. Seriously! I know this is Vegas but don't take the piss for something as basic as water!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ben Chapman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvi7rmZFti8uNwB36Vz8RxATZTznS9sKmv2ZKhWcBeyKSong=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Don't shop here. Over priced, charge for use of cards. Wants you to use ATM so he can make more money with fees. Person who claims to business owner. Treated elderly shopper poorly. Also handicap. If connected with motel 6, bad reflection motel 6.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brooke Whitehead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKsRB4XJBNxM43dKIRnU_SQcJ-TPf2vRSzYOODVcOa16WEdIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in to grab water bottles. column32: [{"Name":"Drew Cabrera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_iZVHHc3AJcXwZCdirshvocGiMxaUWJKYtW_ndQH740IJQQw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Absolute garbage of a store and even worse management. The cashier told us the price of a bottle we grabbed, then rang it up and sold it to us with no prompt offering the price on the screen, and also no receipt, so we took her word. Then we find out on our bank statement that they told us the wrong price, so we paid double for something that any other store sells for the same price she advertised.  When we reached out to the SUPERVISOR for help correcting their mistake, she told us we should have insisted on a receipt because the price they told us was wrong, and that‚Äôs somehow our fault.  Then they said ‚Äútips‚Äù help.  This place should not be in business.  They charge 2x literally anywhere else, and they run a shady business with no intent to make the customer happy.  I‚Äôd shut this place down in a heartbeat if I could.  -5 stars.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"S T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVi9cG75Cam_vX2kyo3PFvRdbIPUI3wQwOTHVCtKCkzdzawVrC9ww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Incredibly large selection. Staff has to be on ladders due to constant theft, totally understandable. You will be overpaying for liquor here but all of the novelty gifts are in a huge variety and of course all of that is fairly priced for Vegas. Normal shooter of liquor for $1 is $2.99 here or 2 for $5.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kimberly Wright","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWm6v8XTptanI9SJf-rSGH_vAIst2R5Th0Z7uZLDYao3P_eSbDkGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It‚Äôs a cool gift shop but, it‚Äôs overpriced and they wanted me to tip them just for ringing up my items which was uncomfortable. I really didn‚Äôt want to tip just for that, but I felt like I had to.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Javier Alanis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXXtVFkVb_VK9LS_AQEw-sTbMD09gcztBbGIjZ5Td1Y0LK2jE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Id give it half a star if I could","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"amaze em","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_gbszNrSr4gnd5ZIJkRPvt1tFCGEGouQgSDSrMJDmREJzfg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"As others mention, prices are ridiculous. Security is standing on ladders which is kind of entertaining, but the worst part is they have the nerve to ask for a tip at the register. Not joking. Would give minus five stars if I could.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rajesh Ramchandani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXS9OtOVyXmMfp9AAFvTBuHKAMAyvHa9cPBXsdamPc7lVCgw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the variety of liquor. Very cordial staff and welcoming service. Little pricing but hey it's Vegas","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shisell Ruiz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRRGEwnA7v2-e7jLc8TrL-jr0jFz7gB71KXaKq7o3e_pxICA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"As another reviewer mentioned, I don‚Äôt think even living in NYC I‚Äôve seen such price gouging EVER. Is no wonder there‚Äôs barely a soul there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amber L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUExa0QSC7dAMVjIm1N9qYF-q7D5agED3gBpiG4WtYbTK8SrctU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly staff and GREAT prices . If you visit never buy from casinos this is your go to store for EVERYTHING.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32: [{"Name":"Marcus Meacham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuS_quTr9wFVzvHgKZBBI2C0qPRM4Qc9lN2HXsfJl5Y39fw0lA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As good as Costco‚Äôs pricing on the Caymus (cabernet, not cognac). The year selection is slightly different (from Costco‚Äôs), but $70 for 1000 ml of the 2023 Napa-only vintage is excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDH9rgZyAlqZl7sfR2qrx7p\u0026fid=0x0:0x2a06aa2e9a4c67af"],"When":"2025-12-28"},{"Name":"S S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLEyZlw_83IlQf9FGWBefFIVB-cDEPK7UzppCjTa5jG326B1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great selection of spirits with solid pricing! Staff is very friendly wherever you are going in to buy something or to have a beer. We recently attended trivia for the first time, which was a lot of fun. The food trucks throughout the week are an added bonus!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAsKp0-CftEebHa3SxZ57Y1\u0026fid=0x0:0x2a06aa2e9a4c67af"],"When":"2025-9-6"},{"Name":"Ken Schmidt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfT1wKaOzG7Bw2Uuts02KbUuRv_1zGoJas7n7p5czix-3KqW9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely love this place. Everytime we're in Las Vegas we make sure to trek to Khoury's, totally worth the extra drive. They have great store picks and many of them you can sample. Just be polite and ask. Whoever selects the store picks has a pretty good palate, totally 5 star on many of them. The staff is super knowledgeable and very helpful.  Quite educated on all whiskeys and regional distillers. Clearly at this point you know we go for the whiskey. They also have a tasting / food bar, good wine and beer selection and occasional food truck outside.  I will always pack and extra suitcase and bubble wrap to bring some bottles back home from Khourey's.  Prices are super fair and not the typical hype markup. Keep it up and we'll see you again soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDwsv-QCQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x2a06aa2e9a4c67af"],"When":"2025-3-25"},{"Name":"Melody Quiros","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqY-9zT6XazlmpWSpjYWVNHcWKABqJOqGf-dNVPIyCrlwJons=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to hang out with family and friends, buy some beer and wine/whiskey. I was there alone and felt very comfortable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAs_KHFeE_450cC5Kz6i6PF\u0026fid=0x0:0x2a06aa2e9a4c67af"],"When":"2025-8-16"},{"Name":"Henry Qi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSuXX3xH7ULVzP491tW6uSv5KNhFmOYES2N-4h5jILnuBrjyrGIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were passing through Henderson and was very happy to come across this liquor store/taproom. The people are friendly, the space is pet friendly, and they have good selection of liquor. We would be regulars here if we lived near by.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICfrNbrzgE\u0026fid=0x0:0x2a06aa2e9a4c67af"],"When":"2024-12-26"},{"Name":"Karen A.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2OgskwJxN2tQ1uvvwzauFBQISWj0kvguTlzNAShviuU7z2aJbfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been coming here for years and still love it. The owners and staff are awesome. The selection of beer, wine and spirits is fabulous. They recently remodeled and expanded. Kudos, as the ambiance is great. There are food trucks scheduled and you can purchase items from the shelves and drink on-site.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICelfuc_AE\u0026fid=0x0:0x2a06aa2e9a4c67af"],"When":"2022-9-19"},{"Name":"Robert Guerra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXB1j9FSyTB5G6sPuSHIaH9OkZPyMrj3sIPEzfbTzGG3vkusL4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is not the biggest, their selection is definitely diverse enough and their staff makes you feel welcome. This was my first visit here, went there because they were hosting a new food truck called Father Figure Grub Truck (which is amazing!) First of all let me say that I love the feel of this place, it doesn't scream warehouse or hey hurry up and buy. The place makes you feel welcome and their staff is there willing to help, they have a great selection of beers (which is my go to), then they have a really great selection Wines, whiskey, tequila and other spirits. They have seating area for you to relax and enjoy a moment so you can contemplate how much you are going to take home with you. I enjoyed seeing other local vendors being represented there like \"Cured and Whey\" who has an amazing charcuterie selection in town. Overall I am so glad to have visited Khoury's Fine Wine and hope that this review will at least tempt you into making a trip there and seeing what they have to offer. I don't think you'll regret it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC6_vWgkQE\u0026fid=0x0:0x2a06aa2e9a4c67af"],"When":"2021-9-5"},{"Name":"Neal Shebeck","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVH4LhLqzKnnv8DL1coPJxkA2tTgTVUf86Sz-3vlkfKRsO2BwHe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Favorite neighborhood hang/bar/liquor store! Love the friendly employees and the beers on tap are plentiful and consistently changing. They have a great selection of craft beers, wine, and bourbon. Highly recommended","Images":null,"When":""}]

column5: 5255 S Decatur Blvd #106, Las Vegas, NV 89118
column18: Snug liquor store selling a standard selection of spirits, wine & beer, plus cigars & cigarettes.

[{"Name":"Dennis Moe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7l583FFQ-BdIBxrRAMksnGwz1AXr_pOf1hu8rHPIXMSo5EicM7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":""A wonderful family-owned business with exceptionally friendly customer service. Stop by for a great nerdy chat and treat yourself to a quality bottle of booze. Support your local gems!"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAPhNN5lQqcnHfFBbNmi5gu&fid=0x0:0x83da790ea4bf79a0"],"When":"2025-9-18"},{"Name":"HTX Dream","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbV2ozg_xbdh-GuiTkomqKBp24r7tza-8tcPJkO1Vy8prliXSx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Family owned, well curated, and exceptionally professional for a business operated for 21 years. A definite must for those trying to get away from the strip, coming back most certainly next time here in the city.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mary Hancock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsZVEUmoWa1WyCwus2GLieNkzt-Ize4-i13QhkFHuo9FPObmHAHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Actually best Liquor store in Las Vegas Nevada. Best place to purchase "BELLS BEER" IPA.

Besides the other goodies Ben has in the store. Not far from Raiders stadium.

It's The Hancock's

Was looking for Something to buy in my coffee, but owner suggested this liquor it's delicious so much better that Bailey's a little bit more $$ but worth it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID9rfn_FQ&fid=0x0:0x83da790ea4bf79a0"],"When":"2024-3-19"},{"Name":"Adrian Laguna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0K1esfz8NW7jN-U_BeWMtPNiXZJ_XwuD2JAifZSq7AiFy-q6z6w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great customer service! Amazing atmosphere and the most welcoming employees!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jason Millican","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2--02c1ViGUo8gF1RJHVAXLDWRlI0z32VzEcTnUwqL5eD0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I figured with the good reviews I would make a stop into hacienda liquors. Unfortunately I was met by an extremely rude owner/ employee who belittled me with his jokes. Very unwelcoming. I decided to leave without making a purchase. He thought I was price checking with other stores while I was on the phone with my brother. I would not recommend this store to anybody and the prices were comparable to on the strip. If you're in the predicament of having to visit the store, I hope you have a better experience than we did. It was an interesting boxing/new year's sale promotion they were running where the owner thought it would be funny to play a name your price game.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"shelby hamm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxPA94us5QKJk4yMeCqVUDbDtLodsoFP5YfxFJ3HEcfQ221A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was reading reviews for this liquor store and I thought it was weird how everyone said the owner was so sweet, kind, and knowledgeable. I was thinking to myself it‚Äôs just a liquor store‚Ä¶ but it‚Äôs so true! the owner was fabulous. Best service I‚Äôve ever had. He really helped me picked products and made excellent recommendations. 10 out of 10 recommend this place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sena McKnight","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIc807v5Td3eRmNPTx_qu9o-rB8OJJ0lq3RbzZJzYI_5hI28Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ben was amazing! His knowledge and service is outstanding! For a small store, had great inventory and very competitive pricing. He introduced us to a new spiced whisky we would have never tried otherwise. We still reminisce about visiting with him.  We will definitely make a point to come back and see him next time we are in Vegas.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eddie White","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1n-5GMh_n6hqQiKhCvUFac6yKso_ZGHQFlKnzYisxufJ3WnrPjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to get a Styrofoam cooler and a 6 pack and a half pint to bring back to your hotel room. I'm not a big drinker but the employee (in the pic) helped me decide what alcohol to get. Very friendly man. Great selection.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Josiah Griffith (KawaiiDere)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCdhQ8lmX3dsfSWY3oaTrbNhuPSEHwND8JYLF64WvwWqRzjz4vXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good staff (got directions, hand sanitizer, and talked about the merchandise), clean, quality seemed solid. Unfortunately it was a little too expensive for what I would pay for a souvenir but that describes most souviner shops in general (most of this I could see myself wearing if I was the type to wear branded clothing). Building was a little dated (no recycling bins or water refill stations), but had some architectural detail (albeit somewhat beige as well).

Not a place I'd recommend or anything but also not a place to necessarily avoid. I had a solid experience, but it requires you to be honest and direct with yourself if you don't want to buy something","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Birdie M.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBqmhk91cY8ksSeV4VlejZCwTzU5wQNxzDtLyuDKEWN74DrkTz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"There are three ‚Äòessentials‚Äô shops in Caesar‚Äôs Palace. The main one located in the Lobby is by far the largest with the widest selection and is open 24 hrs. What I liked best about this particular shop was that they had some refrigerated Prosecco whereas in the other essentials shops, they were all room temperature. Another shop is located near the Palace Tower and convention area. It is much smaller but offers a similar selection of goods. The last one was barely open during our stay and is located near the Augustus Tower. It is a shame it was always closed as it had some really cute bags in the window. All shops offer astronomically high priced gifts and basics like medicine, milk and feminine hygiene products. Expect to pay around $7 for a bottle or water and $15 for a small box of feminine items. These prices are high, but nowhere near what you‚Äôll pay if you opt to eat anything from your room.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICRk8Hv7gE&fid=0x0:0xc9cff841db839049"],"When":"2023-4-9"},{"Name":"M Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRt-QaHidtRPiQTNgTKHZFiNhgbYmvtSdGKwadObsHwHRppg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"No price tags? One star immediately. You are the store!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBkSyuOtCz62zXuPOsn8aSx&fid=0x0:0xc9cff841db839049"],"When":"2025-10-6"},{"Name":"Jessi W.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWS3IGk9a0RhktcfuQolz1rEBO19O_97JV1SkBfu_408-PI4I6ong=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"$25 for a charger cord that takes 3 hours to get to 15% and they won't refund. So I'll dispute the charges. Not everyone is scamming like y'all, maybe buy better quality chargers. ü§°ü§°","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIChvP-DpgE&fid=0x0:0xc9cff841db839049"],"When":"2023-2-8"},{"Name":"Jack Hatzi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLC1ZdcckSC8yLq7HVbkJ41e0OGf4Ui3nGHnuMhY-4q3-8QRc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Was at the Emperors Essentials store at the entrance at Las Vegas BLD just 2 hours ago this afternoon. I was escorting my 89 year old mother to buy presents for her grandchildren. She want to buy 3 t-shirts and 3 full length bathrobes. I suggested we just buy the t-shirts now and our way out we buy the robes cause they are heavy to carry around the casino. So I paid for 3 t- shirts, and Putin one bag. My mother asked the female sales assistant if she could have an extra bag inorder to put 2 tshirts in one bag and the other in another bag so she could give gift with bag. This sales assistant ask if we are staying at this hotel. I said no. She said store policy is we get only one bag. We bought 3 shirts,, what business is it of her where I‚Äôm staying? On our way out we ought the robes at the other Emperoors Essential store who put each robe in a seperate bag. What a disgusting customer service this female store assistant gave to an elderly 89 year old lady. Why are you employing staff delivering poor customer service? Don‚Äôt buy from the store at the entrance at Las Vegas BLD go to the others. I will never buy there again, who needs a disgusting attitude while shopping and treating an elderly women like that.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bruce Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgD05JXR61EYR1DZGkCnd63EVJ7bkNEsGuhn96m-rzZUqq8W0f=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"1L bottle water for 5.6USD
You can get milk here,if child need it urgently.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDEmYLKXQ&fid=0x0:0xc9cff841db839049"],"When":"2018-3-12"},{"Name":"Maria Maria","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYTHnXmnC-HvTbf-BuffFdDKDVXSe0WRfHvd6oO_trtlcM-iw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Lots of things to buy if you like overly Cesar themed tchotchkes.  Gaudy to me is subtle to others.

I‚Äôm gonna just say when you need certain lady items at ‚Äúthat time‚Äù of the month, you‚Äôll be rather indifferent to the $18 price for them.  Super glad that‚Äôs off my chest. Lol","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bruce Springsteen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsfY9T1iqNE9wXgVou-_4NGUkKOHAEVdfDihGFlA2kFS1dRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thanks to the male worker who helped us today with buying water! Very pleasant. :)","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Rachelle Lopez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVljMTigD4ebtcO4huzG76R8wjDzS_ku-hcvw8FQUJQOmQPjD4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vegas pricing $8/water but I had to drink water. Girlie was amazing and helped me with my essentials","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBBsgkQkTDFc8bzbhItcr4h&fid=0x0:0x5be97d1ce088fa47"],"When":"2025-11-12"},{"Name":"Nikita K.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4mYJAGv2332txl4h1ooG2LRjog7SWHu785A995-xbyGtNNG04=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Wow. I bought this fresh coconut from the Vitals store. When I got the room turns out the coconut was cracked/empty. When I went back to the store, the manager (Mary I think) refused to exchange it. Like are you serious? üòÇ She asked why I didn‚Äôt bring it back right away. I said because I had to wait for  maintenance for 3 hours because of a raw sewage problem in the room. (That‚Äôs another story)

I know, first word problems. But this is just ridiculous, the principle of it. Selling a spoiled/faulty overpriced product and refusing to exchange it. I‚Äôm not even sure who to complain to about her.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Neon City Walkers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUR0w7iVM5VtfZ3v-15NTW0Cz-2DuMCZaasWmEGld1mNyMs4oNn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vitals at The Cosmopolitan is a great go-to spot for essentials right in the heart of the Strip. Whether you need a quick snack, a last-minute travel necessity, or just want to grab something on the go, this place has you covered. As Las Vegas streamers, we‚Äôre always looking for convenient and fun spots to show tourists where to find what they need, and  Vitals is perfect for that. It‚Äôs a lifesaver for visitors who might have forgotten something or just want an easy, hassle-free shopping experience without leaving the excitement of the Cosmopolitan. Definitely a solid stop for any Vegas traveler!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Riccardi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1OBz_65biIbWFrRrfoyNAlGjCITHFQeH1YMaFbxMkZcNwW64Mkw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This place was convenient to buy a spare phone charger when I forgot to pack one. As one might expect, it was expensive ($30+tax) and can't be returned.

That's all fine, except the charger is also the cheapest thing I've ever seen, plugs in funny,  and both my phones complain about issues with the connection. Seems to charge still, but slowly, and hoping it'll continue working for the next couple days.

If I had more time to get one, I'd probably recommend trying another shop or a quick Amazon order. Disappointing start to my stay at the Cosmopolitan.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Breeze Tags","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCiDw4JJMbdDe0eE_qXuqaLHb_4gy7CkHLaoqJDDyOsH1mZ1ur=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love shopping at Vitals. They have everything that you need for the lowest prices. I was surprised to see that they had much more than just vitamins and health products. I was able to find the exact type of vitamins that my doctor recommended to me, which were cheaper than what I normally buy at the big chain stores. I feel like I'm getting the same product for less! Vitals is conveniently located near my job so I can stop by after work or pick something up on my way home.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jonathan Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgGXpWxNziJ_z3ULHPXZcnruPAbIO6jYxcZEOsL4zLOVyoAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Vitals is a small convenience store and gift shop inside The Cosmopolitan. Although many products here don't have prices posted, they tend to be expensive. They're nice products, but if you don't mind a 10 minute walk, you'll get much better prices at CVS, ABC stores, and probably plenty of other shops within 1 block.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"JC Betancourt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV02mTlxf1VqRUcgZmc_n5bR1vzqkQZK8u0YzijeO_b0D4CipI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"DO NOT BUY HERE Bought a pair of headphones  for  $135 as I received my receipt I see stamped on it final sale and I asked the clerk if I am able to return them he says I have 30 days so long as I have the receipt

they have static and they refuse to either exchange or give me at least a new cable to see if it was the cable. I spoke with Ana Jimenez and she called someone and spoke on the phone and refused to do anything to help me.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kyle Stoneberger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-P5WygRTZWBqtyag59vNNgBg20zkideNEbJBSJzCTMyooXN1Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vitals has great drink options, and other things you need that you probably forgot to pack for your vacation. Vitals always has employees with great personalities.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32: [{"Name":"Siara Casner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcv8ooRzZi7CECa9srQrnhZ_pzWv8cjdeRNprxpBkxDiOaDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Parked right outside the door at 3:20 on may 15. I was getting my wallet out to come inside and as I‚Äôm walking up to the door some dark haired chick races me to the door and puts this sign on the door as soon as I get near the door. So annoying. I was literally the only person in the parking lot so it didn‚Äôt feel like an accident‚Ä¶ lol as if she didn‚Äôt know I was coming? Poor customer service going on here..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICxusyiSA\u0026fid=0x0:0x6ce0cab61119e4f2"],"When":"2023-5-15"},{"Name":"light waves","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6Jrd02U7elJH0C9reFkZ3bzMGddnBxRz_KVwnkDGB4sQ4okOe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly clean excellent wide good variety helpful staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbh4iqqowQxYpq_HaODTdlwB9gIWcbKUzck2aeWMJ_2jgFIfY6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great liquor selection, clean, and convenient. column32: [{"Name":"Benjamin Benedict","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrO3BHhuB6Is1L7XC1q2j6Apreql0dM1pAGRG0BjwQw7f2eMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited this store today and noted that there were several nice allocated bottles available.  The store was clean, well organized, and the owner promptly greated us.  People bash secondary pricing, but I believe supply and demand finds what the market and more specifically what the individual customer will pay.  The owner spoke with us for a while and when we put several bottles on the counter he worked with us on the pricing.  What we offered, he accepted.  We were pleased with the William Larue Weller and Russell‚Äôs Rickhouse we purchased.   If you are a serious buyer, please visit this store and speak with Marwan.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDgjLC4Mg\u0026fid=0x0:0xb2f37bc4a3e45810"],"When":"2025-2-22"},{"Name":"Alberto lopez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcVnaDRlWHa7nZzZXq28DOUjudlq_QxSDWZyCdUaCmNPx_Yg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If you don‚Äôt mind an older lady assuming you‚Äôre on food stamps \u0026 telling you how much she supports everything the president is doing‚Ä¶ this is the place for you. It‚Äôll happen every single time you go at night. \u0026 no matter what time of the day they like to have the doors locked. Just a heads up.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"702 Visuals","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXy9PwJ5QZjjBEZeQt1BImxz_QwUdLLzl_AWZ679JusiaPfopUh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love to support local and it's close to my house but the prices can be anywhere from a little to quite over market price. Picked up some E.H. Taylor for $80 but was able to find it locally two days later for $46 a bottle.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICKgPuMFQ\u0026fid=0x0:0xb2f37bc4a3e45810"],"When":"2021-3-24"},{"Name":"No Filter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYFMJX8ilx9Jh8Jo0DmoBjOLmEJwaGFUmRnCpieBnaCxwcUlM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shop local! Owner is a super nice guy. Shop has a smaller selection, but very high quality. He‚Äôll also get you anything that you want.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Spencer Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaLGYwz3RqFGFRAOCAlduXycqf6RqdOxb6_fYc_zELNqlk1Ds=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Nothing of good quality. $1.50 charge anything under $10.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Reid Galbreath","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocICMNhA9SUpbb6iJJRdlr1Z1uaaFn0DMpwh4dIdw29RaG2tGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is a great place to find allocated bottles. That being said, the owner is marking up everything in the store, with the allocated bottles being marked up triple. For a \"local\" liquor store it's sad to see someone trying to take advantage of people this far away from the strip.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steph V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1QKRRJsB0cabGjZ7p8IG7RttmKfz_mHqx-iu3iw7olQ6pVRBZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing service, open late, and have everything you need from cheap to expensive. What‚Äôs not to love? Also the cashier when I came in at 10:15pm tonight was so welcoming and warm. I appreciate a business like this. Seems to really be about customer NEEDS","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jasmine Lotus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGfPOcW3nRDLWqz5EF2Ev6fe3S_a2dqxcTkpqzEfXcgOPDk-M5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"i came to this place yesterday and it was open during the operational hours, today the guy who worked there closed early i guess. literally as i approached the door. pleas duo date the hours if you guys are just varying the times of operation. would help a lot of people.","Images":null,"When":""}]
