column32:
[{"Name":"Michael W.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUChZ-TZB0XTqluQ04MhZVE30j1vJjSFjFoQDmM7KyrG7uTIX4q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The ABC Stores on Fremont Street in Las Vegas are fun stores to visit. I love to see the souvenirs and gift items they have there. The store also has drinks and snacks that I can buy at reasonable prices. The good thing is that the ABC Stores are located on Fremont Street‚Äîone of the best fun places in Las Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDBWl-8Wl_WIoU-1mWN1Xee&fid=0x0:0xd544ca1e9da55ef5"],"When":"2025-11-15"},{"Name":"Larraine ‚ÄúSantos‚Äù Criss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBl7oQEncPmHFOvFpt-IWb7h-TQQR4KH0cC1o7fK8nW0CHczl9Yw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Glad that I found this nice convenient and souvenir store in Fremont that sells affordable bottled brand. They also have selection of snacks at reasonable prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCI7zPnFNrIhrqLcpzUo3da&fid=0x0:0xd544ca1e9da55ef5"],"When":"2026-1-14"},{"Name":"Grace Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjTH97i8ZwsILZUmONTz0LJfNdacjn1PbcCy4N0yNVeeMoJD9S=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great location on Fremont Street for late night snacks and beverages! Can‚Äôt believe they even provide hot spam musubi at almost  midnight! Be sure to grab a lot of cute tokens and Hello Kitty for Vegas souvenirs!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC_4aD7tAE&fid=0x0:0xd544ca1e9da55ef5"],"When":"2025-1-16"},{"Name":"jiggbury","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULB6NKo99RerabNwXqPKNq5tvL0u2L7eeEVKIDXrhZEWLt6fA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"For a store i used to see every block in downtown Honolulu, its very interesting to see them in las vegas!

Unfortunately they're just as any other tourist store looking for some $$$$$ for shirts... But they do have some cool exclusive shirts and products thats only tailored for las Vegas abc stores! Like the my melody and kuromi plushies! Unfortunately, just like any abc store, prices for plushies are $$$$$$....","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICB7ujrvAE&fid=0x0:0xd544ca1e9da55ef5"],"When":"2022-12-26"},{"Name":"Kevin Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaPjSwLZAt5ctTla2jYilccLlBwhUZqr_13D9RD-GbM_LZJhA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really busy location but ideal spot to pick up convenience supplies for whatever you might want to stock up on during your trip in Las Vegas. From alcohol to water to a variety of snacks, this is a convenient place to stop. It‚Äôs right on Fremont Street and gets pretty busy inside too but the staff are good at redirecting people to the cashiers that are open.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDv96CkgAE&fid=0x0:0xd544ca1e9da55ef5"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Shannon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDD9wLX3cZ0thgyehcMwD4RBjfim3GPCnS-RCAO7R0sb-jvWFF3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty great selection of last Vegas gitch and souvenirs. The prices felt fair. Staff were friendly and helpful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIChjpOT5AE&fid=0x0:0xd544ca1e9da55ef5"],"When":"2023-2-13"},{"Name":"Vegas Mama","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfFUjVNaE9cEZnTCj8qCZ00wkQtK8QkBcsVqAjMMXKEQ581pQORw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"No Hawaii calendars sold at any of ABC's...
Hope they will be back next year","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICX-62I9wE&fid=0x0:0xd544ca1e9da55ef5"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Dee Dee Pineapple","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXK_LZEdyogYECkjxpXnEPz-3kLdQ4SgGCeAcO4bUCFawWHXibe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was the first place I went to when I got to Las Vegas.  First thing I grabbed from the store were the Hawaiian snacks and then got magnets, & key chains.  Enjoyed my visit at the store.üòÑ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDO87vLJQ&fid=0x0:0xd544ca1e9da55ef5"],"When":"2022-7-13"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Richard Cooper","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9uD5ovlwmjlgrDkVY7mQUJkiAJ0lSliUPVhtkBegSkgLncmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Looks like a candy store from the outside, but it‚Äôs much much more. So many different kinds of candies plus a whole retro section which is very cool if you‚Äôre into the nostalgia type candies it‚Äôs worth a visit. Then upstairs they have a bar that serves really unusual drinks definitely worth a visit. Some of the larger ones are definitely shareable, also recommended lol","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDQtEqIXf11CTGuJrDvNAvT&fid=0x0:0x8465b1f1a3fcc32c"],"When":"2026-1-16"},{"Name":"Kay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcZtea31W-zfTD4HS7bBsIR78QEWPHPXcgKDKKd7gZULvLlgH0Ww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place for sugar!
Lots of variety and very dangerous for sugar lovers lol!
I will say that I wish there were more signs stating how much the weighed candy was. I didn‚Äôt know that the gummies per pound was almost double than the hard candies on the first floor. I ended up spending wayyyy more than I wanted to due to this unfortunately.
All the candy decor was super cute and the staff were fine. Just make sure you‚Äôre careful with the prices!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhArXgrkzYVd9rimrjACnFNq&fid=0x0:0x8465b1f1a3fcc32c"],"When":"2025-10-30"},{"Name":"ExploreandEatWright","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXugu9q5EVQx8Wh_HS64RSIYy2SBoTKDga5FuGVK6JLfKMMy08=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went upstairs to the candy martini bar in Las Vegas. It was absolutely fantastic. They had different martinis and cocktails. Of course everything was full of sugar lol. Just watching them make it for us and for other customers was entertainment. The staff was very helpful. It was definitely a place where you can do asa date night with your significant other.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAD9uHKeXWUKE3zu7C0sgZy&fid=0x0:0x8465b1f1a3fcc32c"],"When":"2025-12-2"},{"Name":"Elmo W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWfRQAw1g57DQmsEuxT6uiGMLjptvZlWwoQqiPDM3wsaQvdC82-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For an OCD person like myself this place is heaven. Everything is in the right place what a well organized, clean and neat place. How do they have everything so perfectly stacked is perfection. I almost forgot the gummy bears chandelier it is  manific! Plus enough room to walk around to not bump into someone another plus. Bravo! Did not go upstairs I heard it is a nice place as well. It was a better experience for me than Omega Mart","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDpoqqghax6qvb_XPmFmM51&fid=0x0:0x8465b1f1a3fcc32c"],"When":"2025-11-6"},{"Name":"Diana Montalbano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk7EvB0vHO0N9DLy3yoLM_srlLtUHmQlKFQw79TEV7eWCy7UJ7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Who doesn‚Äôt love sugar? This was a fun store. So many different types of candy. My favorite are the sour belts. I was happy to see the huge selection. The store was very clean with full candy bins. And organized. Staff were friendly. I‚Äôd definitely go back next time we‚Äôre in Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBFbMEIpFRvoV0P5Qi9FyhZ&fid=0x0:0x8465b1f1a3fcc32c"],"When":"2025-9-9"},{"Name":"Jenn E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4Dc5suqJe9OJWGaS9jmk_OQ0V7j0VmWzWAAZnC-YgPPVTKLgE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Literally had no idea there was a bar here! I'm not a sweets person, but this place and the drinks upstairs are absolutely amazing!!! Staff is great, great location to watch the promenade and hang out for a bit. I would absolutely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD0KKbKqRPs85yEVggIAP7j&fid=0x0:0x8465b1f1a3fcc32c"],"When":"2025-12-31"},{"Name":"Ashley C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLqPOxrwtPUfVTCi05vRtLYBrjisfm7Bo3JpGYzbFatnTmr_5T=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Looking for the ultimate sugar high while you‚Äôre in LAs Vegas? Look no further than I love sugar by the Linq Hotel.

Over 2 floors of candy with a a fudge bar and candy themed drink bar located on the second level. This place is truly impressive and a great place for gifts!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCKzWAM-GKrtKIECoj3y-G9&fid=0x0:0x8465b1f1a3fcc32c"],"When":"2025-10-20"},{"Name":"Dan Blakeslee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4aiSUG02mDWfmBJZqlo7MPJqeyhZHeSYzV18t1mjjwoD2pQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was such a cool candy store! The decorations and displays were over the top fun, making it an attraction all on its own.

In terms of selection, I've never been to a store with more candy options, and they had obscure offerings that few other sell. I had been on the look out for Bleeps for more than a decade ever since I had some at another obscure candy store in FL. I Love Sugar actually had some!

If I'm ever back in Vegas, I'll be sure to stop in for a Bleeps fix.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhALIBT_aiTlSN6fdR8MxfDo&fid=0x0:0x8465b1f1a3fcc32c"],"When":"2025-8-29"}]

column32: [{"Name":"Nelida Safrit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcdrpNVxmkQhRJHMxTshJRQF4qGFdBujUkAkqmoHz6NFC8k1na=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This store has just about everything you‚Äôd need. They sell cold sandwiches and salads. We bought some parfait for $4. They sell beer and other alcoholic drinks.  A bit pricey but not as bad as the hotel stores. We were able to get a 12pk of small water bottles for $5   It‚Äôs conveniently located on las Vegas blvd close to the hotels.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAucKSJzji44IzlXCLcf0uB\u0026fid=0x0:0xc6e01a0569693a8f"],"When":"2026-2-7"},{"Name":"Rachelle Lopez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVljMTigD4ebtcO4huzG76R8wjDzS_ku-hcvw8FQUJQOmQPjD4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love CVS, had an amazing experience and saved a ton today. So convenient and love that they carry epsom salts and bubble bath for my deep tub at The Cosmopolitan.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDLXPGaV6O4ajQq4PlXxOeI\u0026fid=0x0:0xc6e01a0569693a8f"],"When":"2025-11-11"},{"Name":"J D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKKGKQD0Jqv971b80O64cuOezQjnZ3MN0qZu9ZUiMh9SXI12uE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A couple days ago we went to one of the CVS‚Äô on the Las Vegas strip. We had the absolute pleasure of meeting CVS employee Raven upon check out. Raven was an absolute pleasure to interact with and will go down as our favourite staff member we met on this trip. Raven was fun to talk to, helpful and provided us with excellent customer service. Raven left such a positive impression that I wanted to tip her. Raven respectfully declined the tip as she sited company policy and that she was unable to accept it. Raven comes across as someone who is dedicated to her role within the CVS organization and is passionate about what she does. I certainly hope that Raven‚Äôs commitment to CVS is noted and she is provided with ample opportunity for career advancement and other opportunities in lieu of the monetary benefits that most staff experience on the Las Vegas strip. Thank you Raven!  We hope to see you again soon. :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bryson Ritz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhaXdV06m2fkz3VVt46bwpx6ySrgQckrK5y3e_5r9dpFfN7kvC0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Absolutely the worst experience at an CVS.  There was a massive line in the back of this Vegas strip CVS.  After making it through the line I noticed when I was walking out that there were at least 4-5 registers with associates behind them not helping anyone including the shift supervisor.  All of their computers had x‚Äôs on them which to me showed them as not available.  I asked why no one was able to come up here and check out in which they replied that they are.  Both an associate and the shift supervisor replied ‚ÄúI love when you tell me how to do my job‚Äù and then the other replied ‚Äúyou‚Äôre harassing me‚Äù.  I asked why aren‚Äôt they letting people know to come up there.  They got even more upset and asked for a security guard in which I explained the situation to him.  He replied that he deals with the staff all the time and they make him feel the same way.  Go watch the video of this interaction.  This is such a horrible representation of CVS staff.  All should be coached on how to assist customers and not just sit there collecting an hourly check.  The shift supervisor should be let go as she is the one creating and cultivating this type of environment.  All of my parties items purchased and most of the people in line‚Äôs purchases were non-alcoholic by the way.  This interaction occurred at approximately 8:28pm on October 11th, 2025.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike Casady","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjmMHqo1CRJFyWal7KTEsPLAP9etZGIy8_ozi8EOC99YigNnRBIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I visited CVS on a Wednesday, expecting a quick trip to grab a bottle of liquor. Instead, I waited over 30 minutes for someone to unlock the cabinet. Finally, a short Chinese woman arrived and scolded me in front of other customers for pressing the call button twice during the wait. She said it was excessive and that only two staff members could access the bottles. I don‚Äôt see how their staffing issues are my fault ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è. To top it off, they didn‚Äôt even check my ID‚Äîjust asked for my date of birth. Wow! Avoid this place like the plague, unless you‚Äôre underage, because, well, they don‚Äôt seem to check.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"chaplain celerin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL0LujGX3pn1DR3I9NnG_7kNrdOX7H-WId-Z1UUzIH4HzVYCg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I want to acknowledge Michelle who has provided excellent quality of Customer Care to me two days in a row. She is definitely a tremendous asset to CVS. She was kind, helpful, professional and very knowledgeable about all products in the store on Las Vegas Blvd across from my Hotel. I would like for Michelle to be acknowledged by management on my behalf. I wish her greater success. Thanks.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Baird King","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX839_RKgcgQ4HxIpKrLXhPrvkjiFweXM5F52nLlzR0VCXu5ZdV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As entertaining as any show on the strip. There should be a reality TV show about this place. The fact that the management and staff are able to maintain order with the massive and constant stream of the most diverse, wild,  and crazy stream of people you can imagine is a major testament to them. And they do!\n\nSeriously, if you want to be entertained, stop by the store for a bottle of water, pack of gum, a beach chair, or‚Ä¶ anything that excuses you being there really. It‚Äôs worth it. The entertainment continues outside. If inside is Cirque du Soleil, then outside is Absinthe. Look in any direction and you will see something you have never seen before and will never see again, except maybe 24 hours later standing in the same spot. Just watch your pockets‚Ä¶","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Douglas G Russell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvAEMqZbL0DDd6kziJ1DDEU-k6fjtlYGVEYKNYxvekV-GFJHdy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had to fill an out of state Rx at the CVS at 3645 Las Vegas.  The pharmacist, Lindsey Forstner, was outstanding!! She quickly notified me of an insurance issue, worked diligently to resolve it and was a real pleasure to work with.  Friendly, professional, positive, quick, funny, and clearly very good at what she does - especially with dealing with the complexities of multiple insurance providers.   She quickly turned what could have been a miserable, frustrating experience into a very successful, positive one.  Thank you Lindsey!!  The rest of the staff at the CVS were also friendly and helpful.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Felicity Chiou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnfzJOS1kD6rGuIt6-hElFi-K_z6cXBJdOzbdVpqc2-jtwgyxN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I never can drink beer (or barely any alcohol) but the sour beer here is really good and refreshing.
It‚Äôs very dark inside but they also have a nice outdoor seating. Fun place to get some conversations with other guests or the bartenders.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD8Tg5rivSkg92GCm9A4GRs&fid=0x0:0xfb2af8e0ad845935"],"When":"2026-1-11"},{"Name":"Melissa Eisner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocInzITBbs1kXHipsTJdwwrMde7hDOKObbB0vpNxOQgGNOJiyWnr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the history surrounding this place ‚Ä¶ plus any dive bar is a bar I wanna check out, had a great old fashioned and listened to some great tunes. Should be on your Vegas visit list!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAIhumpqeIZcZdguvoBDWfz&fid=0x0:0xfb2af8e0ad845935"],"When":"2026-1-10"},{"Name":"J.Saucier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_ws-I2EmKhqY3UapISJmcOk7cJgiV-Z1cgUSsQw5b9924F5I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Big dive bar guy from the south so this place definitely had a hometown feel! The bartender is an on point baddie. My fav part is the spittoon relic behind the bar! Reminds me of the Pops! #RideOrDie #WinnerWinnerChickenDinner","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBqoRNvg1F10NDocttctHC6&fid=0x0:0xfb2af8e0ad845935"],"When":"2026-1-20"},{"Name":"beck herm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI65FIZ5cRJSNl7pl3Wfk4N5RhL1pohU_hl0TPdN3mOk8TxXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Atomic liquor is a nice little place, staff is nice. We had the Octoberfest menu and it was delicious.  The prices are super reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC7eSfxBPEYL6dOIuCMxxr5&fid=0x0:0xfb2af8e0ad845935"],"When":"2025-10-21"},{"Name":"Kurt Wallach","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKcartZJche68Flmx5045clh7DaB5NsAomjsiFBUJhfsRYi1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hung outside for a few beers. Good music on the speaker system for a while. Classic rock. It got kinda alternative and techno after a while. Interesting people watching.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBMRWOAF6zE8yU4bFl-1OID&fid=0x0:0xfb2af8e0ad845935"],"When":"2025-11-2"},{"Name":"Grants Honest Reviews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIhyj6NMLOfyXaJ2YtQWaVmHvf01HO7je70gYOI-mtJF7tX0s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our second time being here and again the first thing that always comes to mind is ( If these Walls Could Talk )...

So much History in Atomic Liquors. My brother and I arrived right at High Noon and were welcomed right away at the side door.

We had outstanding service once again from the Barkeep she was very attentive and helpful.

We basically just sat outside as the weather was perfect in early May. And had our last one inside, just for the feel of the amazing history of Atomic Liquors.

Great service friendly people and secondly very clean as well.

Definitely be back just for the History Vibe and Feel. Definitely makes you feel you're back in time.

Cheers üçª","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKELuuiNDYrau7WQ&fid=0x0:0xfb2af8e0ad845935"],"When":"2025-5-16"},{"Name":"itsallgooddm1 Maldonado","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIz53Z6VS2PhDXDTMblllPCtO3lZlMbmY0XQ4YsWyCpsAopeQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you visit Fremont Street during your Vegas stay, then start here. A flash from the past, Joey Bishop must have stumbled in here once or twice. Back in the day the patrons here would have stepped outside as a group to view the routine nuclear blast that the U.S. performed north of the city. Friendly service, good drinks, and a glimpse into old Vegas, not to be missed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCd2_NgiezU5By8mP6UnjCW&fid=0x0:0xfb2af8e0ad845935"],"When":"2025-9-5"},{"Name":"Michael Spicko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUioJ8jCVPm--bozcAu0YWGLUzbDX6pKLqOy_qEX7rlzzzj17M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Funky cool dark and divey. Great inexpensive happy hour burger. Didn't care for cigarette smoke...but hey, when in Rome.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC-ptIN8IZAuzihvIgobs2P&fid=0x0:0xfb2af8e0ad845935"],"When":"2026-1-21"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Bala Krishna Addagada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7mYVfEYxmD7mEfmISLXbpiCEBQnYFRcvuFARn81Fc1dlJZWU6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I personally felt this place was quite expensive for what you get, especially for someone with an average budget. We paid around $40 and change for just two slices of pizza, which felt overpriced for the portion and overall quality. Unfortunately, the taste was below average and didn‚Äôt really justify the cost.

The restaurant operates with a self-service setup, which is fine, but when prices are this high, you naturally expect a bit more in terms of food quality and overall value. The ambience itself is nice and modern, and the place looks appealing at first. However, it was very noisy inside, which made it less comfortable for actually sitting down and enjoying the meal.

This experience also made me feel that dining directly on the Las Vegas Strip may not be the best option if you‚Äôre looking for good value and flavorful food. You end up paying premium prices mostly for the location rather than the taste. If you go a little off the Strip, you can easily find much better food that is more reasonably priced and more satisfying.

Overall, decent ambience but expensive for average food. I‚Äôd recommend exploring options outside the Strip for better taste and value.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAaeTKhEXyUAi-7hQl6UUcz&fid=0x0:0x95732ce89a75e31c"],"When":"2026-2-8"},{"Name":"Adrianna Salazar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXA5Pl9BEZHSpJOZhpipf8QCUPq8eeHgevkwRBlFN2l7sJ9hDQP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This spot is so conveniently located in Park MGM.
We went there numerous times during our stay so we got to try a bunch of different foods.
It was the fried pizza. That dough was amazing!
The salads were pretty good, but each salad we got was heavily dressed. We recommend getting the dressing on the side or else it‚Äôs gonna be too much.
Good variety of cocktails and wine. Each place is priced differently so definitely check before going. Nice little coffee shop with some pastries to enjoy each warning.
Everyone is friendly. It was easy to find seating. You get a buzzer when your food is ready. So you can order and go sit anywhere you‚Äôd like.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCmOQMWdmYyx3DjimI8TMiu&fid=0x0:0x95732ce89a75e31c"],"When":"2025-12-10"},{"Name":"Carl Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzzzCEbFywrfN6J8D1cg9gzfF5k6W__avTERzLSOylhZ2b_2N4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Eataly is a great Italian food hall concept located at Park MGM (what was Monte Carlo before). The price point is quite high, just like any food establishments on the Strip. There's a sit down restaurant as well, but the experience is going from one stall to the next and pick the dish you like.
- Limoncello Spritz: excellent
- Insalata Mare: cold seafood salad, love it
- Mortadella Panini: amazing
- Tagliatelle alla Bolognese: average, overpriced
- Pizza Fritti trio: good, overpriced
- Shiitake Fritti: skip
- Lavazza cappuccino: okay
- Blueberry cake: good
- Baba au rhum: good
- Cream puff: excellent

So, great food hall experience for high-end dining prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDOGpXhSPUatCJYQntBPcrN&fid=0x0:0x95732ce89a75e31c"],"When":"2026-1-8"},{"Name":"Jenny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVO5zdXhBE-ts4R_tBHOvkXzazGrKdiKidEjrRAxQdXoMQxTLNm0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Park MGM has a great variety of food options right inside the hotel. From casual bites to sit‚Äëdown meals, you can find something for every craving. Whether it‚Äôs a quick meal on the go or a relaxed dinner with friends, the dining choices here made our trip even better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDfYCle0sXjzVNEnN0_4JbD&fid=0x0:0x95732ce89a75e31c"],"When":"2025-12-15"},{"Name":"Chloe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJl1Np3sg_-fE0-4YqVfvB-YNX0qkyBZLH8MP-OorMtCVaFZjoL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Eataly Las Vegas is such a fun place to hang out. It feels like an Italian food hall in the best way, with tons of different stations, snacks, wines, and little spots to explore. There are plenty of tables both inside and outside, so it‚Äôs easy to grab a drink and stay awhile.
We ordered the Grandissimo charcuterie board and it was fantastic. The prosciutto was buttery and perfectly sliced, and the cheeses were rich, flavorful, and paired so well with the housemade bread. Everything tasted fresh and high-quality, exactly what you hope for at Eataly.
The wine selection is great too, and the cocktails are fun and easy to sip while wandering around. Overall it‚Äôs the perfect stop for a casual bite, a drink with friends, or just soaking in a little Italian market energy right on the Strip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCAQduOE3iG3ibX8URNKcPv&fid=0x0:0x95732ce89a75e31c"],"When":"2025-11-19"},{"Name":"Jessica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAZhL9jn2dRE4pkPTaSlb9H1clYSeR_ef0QjMtH6soaz08YHE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ate here twice, it was so good. Highly recommend the mozzarella bruschetta üôå But even just the pasta was excellent. Seems like legit home-made Italian food. And plenty of vegetarian options. You basically go around and order from different stands and they give you a buzzer to come pick it up when it‚Äôs ready. There is also a whole bar section. I‚Äôd Eat here again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCxM1qE307c5zRZ2rBxF6IC&fid=0x0:0x95732ce89a75e31c"],"When":"2026-1-5"},{"Name":"Dipan Desai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVR_5kQ1jSg1GeyHnlm0squhZ7xwXbm55_0NtlrTTkiMxhHQLEf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Eataly - An italian üáÆüáπ restaurant on main street of LAS VEGAS. This place have wonderful atmosphere, they serve best coffee on street as they brew it freshly. Large selection of Desserts.

They have in house pizza üçï making which taste delicious üòã.

But this place is little bit over price as compare to food they serve.

Note:
If you are in street and want some coffee they have best coffee and for food you can skip this place as on street there is lots of food option available with much lesser price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAKPc_KN4FCttRho-8uAmLD&fid=0x0:0x95732ce89a75e31c"],"When":"2026-1-6"},{"Name":"Aileen P.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9CEwmFkMNSm9BoeijpHJqQZGN3BHcPYqzdMmorucVQjXVlA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Eataly continues to be such a fun spot inside the Park MGM! If you've been to Italy, you'll see some aesthetic nods to the decor and streets of Firenze, and the food has a lot of the same quality ingredients. During this visit, we enjoyed a salad and ragu dish, and both were delicious.

If it's your first visit, the seating is all open tables, so first come first served. You can walk up to any counter to order from menus that include entrees to drinks, desserts, or produce/gifts.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCsEveWUL7Dzduz_s8kbNWF&fid=0x0:0x95732ce89a75e31c"],"When":"2025-12-9"}]

column32: [{"Name":"Zeniah Ward","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrcJNyxb3Ry_ZN12FN-9Ug6ZKsAOo5Af8V0KEx38kL-m5KroEM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had no idea there were so many different makes of just one typ of alcohol, let me tell you this is a learning experience. A lot of the customers come in looking for specifics, depending if we get any in, you are very welcome to call, or better yet you could check out our new ordering system with our online ordering. And if your looking for collectors bottles we might have what your looking forüòÅ. The atmosphere is wonderful and the employees are friendly. I love the pretty different shapes of the bottles, and of course my favorite is a pretty little blue bottle that cost $203. üò• so come on in and check it out, if nothing else Spartan Arms gun store is in the same parking lot who doesnt love guns .....did I forget to mention we have taste testing just about every weekend for the next month.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICa_f3_PA\u0026fid=0x0:0xb7afc008d3a070ee"],"When":"2021-8-7"},{"Name":"Eric Kent","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLVd1koZNjAyaEAiVCeQfJXj0yIzpxAZOvu9HA2WKqodTIrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Nice local store, they've got a decent selection and prices are ok on most items, but they price gouge on anything.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID1_PyqUw\u0026fid=0x0:0xb7afc008d3a070ee"],"When":"2024-1-5"},{"Name":"Austin Septer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJyIxAOFxnWXAM8ZmbbsW2wiN6yTfsX5uKr-AWt0_uK61tP0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"1864 Wine \u0026 Spirits is incredible and even if it may seem a ways down Decatur, make the drive.  You won't regret it.  They have an awesome selection, frequently get very hard to find allocated bottles, and feature the absolute best prices. They work extremely hard to provide excellent customer service.  Brandon and team are exceptional.  Stop sleeping on em and get down there!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maygen Brockway","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRjGhFMCU-_UGT0fa26miGKLPdWCWq0xtBhhp8EJ_FgVQiCA6d_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gorgeous shop with a wonderful selection of wine, hard liquor, champagne, and beer. They have a great red wine selection.. The store was clean \u0026 well organized. Staff was incredibly friendly, helpful, \u0026 suggested products. Solo was super awesome! üëå  \u0026 the gal from Louisiana was a peach!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICm9fzVdA\u0026fid=0x0:0xb7afc008d3a070ee"],"When":"2022-1-5"},{"Name":"Whit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmAVQlw0_sMDAKJNcJoHbqkzcdKN2u_dbjScZKiTa60jPdv4X9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just stopped here for the first time and it‚Äôs so nice and clean! They have an amazing selection and the employees are very friendly! Definitely coming back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matthew Lozano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWO78q_oyhSMMbzRccbSnrvG6UauXxnhxxU3qJvbFpjNIKsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Staff super friendly.  Convenient location.  Selection is okay, but pretty overpriced","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David Ahlstrom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOTabIztn-cC9JVIwtXvI8SV9Yk9BNIEnmYga7GY4-LUuO7JEu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this place. The people especially SOLO the manger are fantastic","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nathan Pride","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXaE12NwGX4KquDbrug6GR3ZWRIFSHTc-OrRc3hMaCQBzFglSYy4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small nice place to get your boose workers are great if you need any recommendations","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"David Blumsom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDf8bKDesuZvL7p1X_yCSELClTpGSwVjlhlW3F0Hoz2qnh0MA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing. Best choice for booze I‚Äôve ever seen. It‚Äôs huge.
I went back again and added this video. The place is huge and has everything you can imagine. Plus a massive range of price from a few $$ to '000s
Enjoy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBP4MBdgnJno-cVE7oHZbLg&fid=0x0:0xa7379acfcf235440"],"When":"2025-7-14"},{"Name":"Lisa Weir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKFtfgkdNnXjmmWtbEMuUlNeiGkcf1fGf6hQx-gJDNIPod4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a great selection. I'm so happy to find this place. Not many stores have my Don Q Coconut Rum. Thx guys","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAHw3A7o-iZ_oPxP1HNoCDf&fid=0x0:0xa7379acfcf235440"],"When":"2025-10-9"},{"Name":"Sherron Powell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKqZtwIN-LTF3P3L6s32cNJ8o7U5wUGwxFh1m-HGNXl0EdP1Hsfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They had everything and more with great prices and amazing customer service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCpVkxyZx_V1jjZXq2ZhWn_&fid=0x0:0xa7379acfcf235440"],"When":"2025-10-8"},{"Name":"Jenelle Berrien","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_n2_v6YGdHiw90oYm3TOYY0-uBap8VFBrG-Q413P-dHlsp807=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I purchased $20 tickets to attend the Patron Cocktail Lab at Total Wine with my friend on a Friday evening at 6pm.  It was a really lovely experience.  The event took place in a back room that had multiple tables, chairs and snacks set up.  The event began with an in-depth discussion on Tequila and how it is made.  We were all provided with 3 Patron tasting samples as well as mini Margaritas (my favorite)!  I enjoyed the experience quite a bit.  We were also provided water which was great since I ended up with a lot of Margaritas and a cool recipe guide!  I would definitely recommend this experience.  The staff at Total Wine were all very knowledgeable, friendly and open to questions.  The group I was with was full so I recommend booking tickets in advance..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDJy8OTpwE&fid=0x0:0xa7379acfcf235440"],"When":"2023-7-22"},{"Name":"Lisa Maraszek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1hxWORwVUUNShBy3rCKCkxhyOcCu4HIIURvrOynVWFWlDooXJXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hubby really enjoyed the free sample stations, and felt like a kid in a candy store when it came to stocking up on international wines. Store employees were super friendly and helpful. Displays were very eye-catching, and made shopping "fun"! Coming from Cali, this was a treat on our vacation weekend to Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDR3oVA&fid=0x0:0xa7379acfcf235440"],"When":"2023-4-26"},{"Name":"William Herrera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMVq_kHrmsduwVa1WxH7027kY7kPSu6NUF4VZ7MZxlsTJ4Rr9n=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great selection - I came to visit this location while I was working near the strip as my usual location is the Rampart location over in Summerlin.

Great stock compared to other locations and very good presentation. One of the products I love but I noticed there's an abundance of is the Goose Island bourbon county stouts, they're all the 2024 releases, and the 2025 releases are in November. To the beer manager/supervisor, please let me know if you plan to discount the 2024 collection to make room for the 2025 releases, I'll gladly buy out the stock myself!

Overall, good location! Be careful though, folks driving around the strip tend to be a bit unaware of cars around them","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Johnny Chavez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8kxa5wTy8Tjy3PsZ_cdlO6jLKiraFSZWapnPFuTJc4zXgdQPo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to pick up what you need.
So many times you go to other places and they may be out but Total Wine and so many other options you will not be disappointed.
They match prices if needed.
I highly recommend this place","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICe0-bv5gE&fid=0x0:0xa7379acfcf235440"],"When":"2022-9-23"},{"Name":"Beth Cato","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMnraAknoYE9HTdmdB_AUWKsBV0lkPHVk58O_OwkGSYMga2_ID=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were visiting from Arizona, and we loved the different varieties of cider and beer available at this location. It was fun to pick out new cans to keep in our hotel fridge to enjoy while we were in town, and we even brought some home! The selection here is certainly better and more cost effective than at any of the ABC Stores in the heart of the Strip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICB1regkwE&fid=0x0:0xa7379acfcf235440"],"When":"2022-12-24"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Constance Raquel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWepTORBsSuYQ4d_qhjO9rvNRKoh89ECeDheCYyPvvY1gGugBB0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I HATE this place. I came in here for the second time since I‚Äôve been here and I did not have a pleasant time. The second time I come in and the guy in the picture was doing what he‚Äôs doing now, on the phone and not engaging in customers. I was never greeted and when I bought STALE produced I was treated horrible when trying to EXCHANGE for the same thing with proof that the product was stale. I was then chased down by the other guy in the picture that‚Äôs actually working and given something in exchange because I LEFT the stale product he sold me and walked out. This was horrible. I‚Äôll never spend another dime. I thought I was doing something by supporting my fellow brothas at a smoke shop, however I won‚Äôt ever come here again. So if you smoke, keep walking to Walgreens.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAmhF4qRcCfmXFSquWgSeo6&fid=0x0:0x3bec9fcdaf145de9"],"When":"2025-8-17"},{"Name":"Raina Doomes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhbjdAqhH_S5_zmI_-uBI2NCD816e84Roq-JqCQz-mwKwTkOI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome experience !! I came in and actually purchased a veil...yes they had a veil in here, I guess that's Vegas for you. I forgot my phone in the store and the tall, curly headed guy actually took his time and called my mom and my husband and let them know that my phone was left behind and where I could come pick it up from. And on top of all this he even went the extra mile and charged my phone for me. Thank you, thank you, thank you!!! Great service,  great people","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Devon McCoy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVao4eBqBGqzf6IikYxWYi2Qd819WfyMGqlO-e_w-aquuSKUuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The prices here are a bit high, but it's the strip so what do you expect,   It was convenient tho and the variety of stuff is limited.  The tall dude in here Izaiah  is on his game,  he was very helpful and knows his stuff. I am in sales and have much respect for bro. Made my experience in Vegas a good one, ran across some real idiots while here, but this guy was refreshing and had cool vibez! Will be back next time I'm here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike Parker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQtY_6kutNAM7CIduluH9Im269gBZoXyvWJqY-MEEvyeAOCA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After a brutal,  flight I stopped into the shop assuming they had weed. I didn‚Äôt buy anything, but the two guys at the counter were sick they were super friendly and helped send me in the direction of a something to chill me out","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John Goon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZGzWa3DfvVEaiK20FlLYOuYszTLH0151_wfrbTLx7x8T9q-I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Forgot to post
Our recent visit trip to Las Vegas, we encountered a deeply unsettling experience involving a manager Issiah whose behavior was not only unprofessional but also indicative of an attitude problem asked for a pack of cigarettes Marlboro 27s and, his tone was aggressive and dismissive creating unnecessary tension which he asked do you need anything else?? Which I responded with no‚Ä¶ just the cigarettes.. DO YOU NEED A LIGHTER??? raises his voice like he‚Äôs not right in front of me then asked for ID and I do understand because it is the state law but the yelling or the attitude in his voice was unsettling and looking up and down at my wife also was very uncomfortable while she was in a bikini.
rather than welcoming us as guests his approach was curt and confrontational. The lack of courtesy and respect was disappointing and made what should have been a fun and memorable occasion instead felt uncomfortable and unnecessary I don‚Äôt know if you are connected with the casino or what, but I honestly hope there is consequences in his actions. I go to Las Vegas to have memorable times and spend time with my family.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jacob Stanfield","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcBmdbTrTF02SjV95Y0ebt9CVC-ikR37CcPiUP9-ZMo9UZoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The people that own this establishment are nothing but real people with real prices and real vibes. They will make you feel the most welcomed at any given time. 100 % Isiah is the boss man no doubt and he will do whatever it takes to satisfy whatever needs you desire or have. This review is 100% real on my own words. Thanks again guys good peeps","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDZlJiqXA&fid=0x0:0x3bec9fcdaf145de9"],"When":"2023-9-25"},{"Name":"Laura Abi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5QPViIEc9BCv44Hyjt6mNouFDSBL1Udf6J9tvvJu6O0cVfaiSdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was in this store and my experience was so great , the manager Izeha was very helpful. Is so comforting yo find places where you feel welcome.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQDxRVxeLmFsSRvU27Szd-FK42KFHufyS5zhB0ukFHVkVd1Tkc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I visited this smoke shop recently, and it was hands down one of the worst experiences I‚Äôve ever had.

As soon as I walked in, the tall guy at the counter, his name was either Isaiah, with curly hair stared at me for two full minutes, as if I didn‚Äôt belong there. When he finally spoke, his tone was shockingly rude, and things only got worse from there.

I asked for a pack of Marlboro Blend No. 27 cigarettes, and he acted like he had no idea what I was talking about. I pointed them out, describing them clearly as the golden pack, third from the left on the row. Instead of assisting me, he just glared at me with a look that felt outright racist. It was clear from his demeanor and the way he was interacting with me that he was judging me based on something other than my request.

Then, out of nowhere, he barked, ‚ÄúID please!‚Äù I handed over my ID, but instead of processing it normally, he shouted at me again, demanding that I ‚ÄúHOLD MY COFFEE‚Äù‚Äîin an unnecessarily aggressive and demeaning tone.

Even after I paid, his hostility continued. I‚Äôve never been treated this poorly while making a simple purchase, and it was clear that his behavior stemmed from prejudice rather than any legitimate reason.

To the owners: Your shop benefits from a prime location on the Vegas Strip, surrounded by hotels and tourists. But employing staff members who are not only rude but openly racist will damage your reputation and drive customers away. I hope you take this issue seriously because no one should ever feel unwelcome or disrespected in your store.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDf7vWgdw&fid=0x0:0x3bec9fcdaf145de9"],"When":"2025-1-6"}]

[{"Name":"Victor Chavez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfemtpeCI0aUCGZHJP3X4BcLxCvzBKqICJgxIuYvHdM1ay2pdz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent prices. Damon is cool as heck, very respectful. Come get your beer here (but stay away from my outlaw light)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Khoi Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUz_ndBnrvVWVMgFtNj5oRzJrcfU3W2jTBhlCt3x921x4lkWBPRXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This location is great. Plenty of parking and very clean. They had all of the premium items that I requested and the staff were really quick in retrieving what I needed. As soon as my 1942 Don Julio was taken off the shelf there was someone ready to refill that spot","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICG0aboHQ&fid=0x0:0x5bb3b78c5cfff98"],"When":"2021-11-1"},{"Name":"Richard Mortensen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGF80zH-6WNIfRran06sLxCorP43Xyn3h41RFqSaHd_FpcTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good prices. Phone number gets you discounts. Friendly staff.
Nothing bad to say!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sindii Da Silva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJB57MKi2tJ5jAsfv97NF3ZjJQ2OLsMEOX0YYaqMb8Cs6agsJGe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice clean store.
Employees are all patient and friendly.
Asked a question at the register to the employee and he answered in a polite manner and gave me the answer to the question I had.
Always well stocked
Drinks in the refrigerator are cold and ready to drink.
They give out free samples (varieties)
Good selections of wine, beer, tequila.
Employees give you suggestions if you need it.
Good Store over all.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDB0-a2ywE&fid=0x0:0x5bb3b78c5cfff98"],"When":"2023-1-28"},{"Name":"John Tomsich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKao2NWue0VT1oww454yYHuErD0FEcoqBQlzYaPoqX7Lbb8xw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can find every alcoholic beverage here!ü•≥üôå I've visited this store monthly for the past several years and never left unsatisfied. The location isn't great, but it's not bad either for a liquor store. The staff are friendly and professional. "If I have a question, there is always someone to help and has the answer." Their prices are very competitive, shelves stocked well, and floors are clean! If you're in the area and booze in on the grocery list, I recommend coming here first.üòâüçªü•Çü•Éüç∏ cheers!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Erika McDougall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2xRiQc6MNqA4iAtwhV6U-W6TFFnGlhNGZN3yNoEc92GS94TUk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lee‚Äôs is usually always good. Prices seem to be getting slightly higher..but that‚Äôs pretty much everywhere nowadays. Their staff could be a little more attentive and friendly. But overall ok.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jose Linares","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRhxlL7uvUgFgGbPWAb4NKeIGqUaQL66YL2R8rE1ZiS6U3WTQOCg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I asked an employee if they carried 7 Lleguas Tequila, and he took me straight to where they had it‚Ä¶.! Awesome job‚Ä¶üçª","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDbvvObnwE&fid=0x0:0x5bb3b78c5cfff98"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Christopher Kronen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxDpz-DBOo8wVH0F5my4OXkwu5GFZG1RTkBe3zAPwNL8JZXlJi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you need an ethanol fix in whatever form you prefer, then Lee's Discount Liquor - a family business - with it's great variety of everything alcoholic under the sun is a go-to place in Las Vegas that simply must be considered.

Lee's has been around for many years and has multiple outlets throughout the greater Las Vegas Metropolitan area.

While newer stores such as Total Wine & More, etc. have opened during the intervening years, the best price on many if not most alcoholic concoctions from the run-of-the-mill to the extremely rare still can be found at good old reliable and lucky Lee's.

Isn't it comforting to know that some things never change, especially when you're nursing another hangover?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICkxsrnRA&fid=0x0:0x5bb3b78c5cfff98"],"When":"2018-6-19"}]

After that all the funds were transferred to a PayPal account and withdrawn... Shady people work there and I will never be back unless I'm paying in cash only....","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Denise Brooks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVL23GSRfpCo636PGk5SjkpeWn671HVgJp9VXM87BTNZcTKyplI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite store in the community and always there to help me and my son when we need there assistance.Keep up the good work with your Dedication.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Teisha Baker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvg16SI4CFK-TkHPFZC7aw269AwKr9dkbYJL15UBTNyQIP1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great prices. Love the huge selection here!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Tucillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1qYiK3EEs1krIM3x3EITYLMaxGMriR5zycgz8V6O482dd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Open 24/7 and has a lot of groceries, for a liquor store. They also have gaming machines and friendly staff. I have been going there for about a month and the cashiers already know what I want and have it ready as soon as they see me. Awesome place, and better prices than some places I have been to in the area.üíØ","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"gymshoe johnny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKIE42gHIwMHoK10F9IHup5ji6Mk-SdZmW4TE7_93g85HLygg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Five star Liquor has a great selection of liquor and also if you just looking for some budget friendly bottles to add to your bar, they have crazy buy one get one free specials. The young lady Lupe is always great to talk to very friendly knowledgeable. Make sure the customer gets exactly what they need customer service is one of the best I‚Äôve seen in a long time it especially just being in a liquor store","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rhiannon Schaar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_woR6oFAu3dLjVxY6bG5mHdWQXbyZ6cRi1BefUnUh1ke8fQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I go here often. I love this store does have some groceries and 24 hour access. I wish they had a bigger variety of wine and tobacco products. But, overall it's a great neighborhood store.\nI park close to Taco Bell because those spots in front tend to be crowded. There seems to always be that jerk that's in a hurry and loves to use his car horn as some Morse code device.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mary Dean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9Mc0k8Z5QkR1t68EJ7vZwXnzvXda1NrVuS9lRNrb5m0IPIA0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The prices listed under the product can be wrong. Ex: cigs had a price of $5.47 they were actually $9.70 ok mistake. I went in the 2nd time and the cigs were still were wrong priced. I asked for the cigs and asked if they were $5.47? The cashier said yes. The rang up $9.70 she got really confused. This man behind the booth with her said the cigs were placed in the wrong spot. I said I think I said get them for the lesser price. He said I can't do that. He did however removed the wrong sticker price.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephanie Sierra-Lopez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIayyyOyKpnnz2ny-gVR3UuLuQBuvq0a-tFJtbvjzgoJRvVzrueA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I been going here since the store berely opened the two gentlmen are nice but the new girl or sister whatever she is, is very rude. I try going to family owned buisnesses but ill just go to smiths from now on to buy my beer. Once i bought milk here and the date wasnt expired but the milk was. They probability left it out the fridge too long.  I got my money back but dont buy milk here","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Lo George","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVH4dVc638EfVL_QFLx72Kum4acYJbgal6zTGkhhPkECv1IMK92=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Way smaller than the average store, this quick stop spot is great for the strip. It‚Äôs organization and cleanliness are extraordinary. Super friendly staff and great deco. I hoped more stores would be like this one. Definitely a must stop if you want to save some money while visiting Vegas. Well done!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDWgqOS-AE&fid=0x0:0x30ebaa6d77a448b5"],"When":"2022-3-18"},{"Name":"Flo Yeow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCED0nHINoONtoIhYrg_037nt9gzG8G4ZOxJ3RLinEhCioWYU8hrs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's a great Target store, don't get me wrong. The fact, however, is that it's one of the smaller Targets around, given that this outlet is located right by the Las Vegas Boulevard, opposite Park MGM. Prices are also slightly higher, given the location-premium. It's meant more as a large convenience store, than an actual Target.

There's a much larger Target located along S Rainbow Boulevard, and that could be what you're looking for, if you're willing to travel further out a little. That outlet is also located across from Walmart, which allows you to kill 2 birds with 1 stone.

Everything here is clean and well structured, in respective sections of the store. Staff were also helpful, as we needed to find something, and they pointed us straight to what we needed.

Overall a good shopping experience. Extra brownie points go to the small Starbucks housed within this store.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIClvvL_7QE&fid=0x0:0x30ebaa6d77a448b5"],"When":"2023-11-19"},{"Name":"F. Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9OoPgMovLX5Jy4Z1c0EwtED20jBTTp8MBZ39sS_pZalWXBH8X=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really nice store! Got everything you could need from food, to beer, to medication (even hangover medication haha).  If you want little things to eat for a quick breakfast or even lunch for on the go its so perfect, and all the prepared food is really good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Melvins Melvin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJxcf7t451_H13Ep_5ZBTspwL2_EzfVOrJfJSDiuaV0Fg0Cg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I tried to use a gift card here but because the barcode was scratched I had to enter the code on the card but the women working at the self checkout was completely senile and not cooperating at all and ended up arguing I couldn‚Äôt use my gift card

It‚Äôs literally redeemed and on my target account online so it‚Äôs annoying to have to argue with an employee who doesn‚Äôt understand how gift cards work, she said she can‚Äôt read small numbers? Pretty ridiculous","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Minyon (Minion)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5AB794XKpTh9U0jOy-mMUX9tPj6ZT2grHw0vI3j1LcQjGzCqj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The shop itself isn‚Äôt bad, there were one or two things I was looking for that they didn‚Äôt have, but nothing important‚Ä¶
But what really made me laugh ‚Äì and something that has never ever happened to me anywhere in the world ‚Äì was that the cashier asked for my ID, at 50 years old, just to check my age!!! Because I bought a small bottle of whiskey.
I‚Äôd like to ask the owner whether everything is fine in their head, or if they might need a doctor?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tatiana Fetzer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLfgalL7ibRYBak6vMe3MXkI8FUw1qpm54i7435IljBRTVYIbJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff was so helpful and friendly. The store is well organized and clean. We had an issue with the pricing to one of our items and they made it right without any issues. Added bonus for having a Starbucks in it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICdg7qGggE&fid=0x0:0x30ebaa6d77a448b5"],"When":"2024-2-17"},{"Name":"April Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdX8OQAJbEEhWu9TEvgCN8Dw2zDv3zFjiGJ_d2sJKjz5orML0U9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Target is right on the strip.  Very convenient to many of the hotels.  I stayed at Excalibur and it was about an 8 minute walk.  There is a Starbucks located right inside the door.  Eating out in Vegas can be very expensive.  We ate out one meals a day and purchased snack meals at target.  For the 4 of us we would spend between $12 and $15.  To the left when you enter there are a number of ready to eat foods.  Sandwiches, fruit cups, yogurt, lunchables, protein trays, etc.  We found plenty of things to eat and not break the bank eating out every meal.  There are also some basic clothing items and personal care items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDuiOGWrwE&fid=0x0:0x30ebaa6d77a448b5"],"When":"2022-8-12"},{"Name":"Chris Dockwell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJXAdc6wusxlPxeAdGH8mX3rshtHHj07k7gtqF5gfx2pmjs6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thank you for keeping the prices reasonable since it is the LV strip. I do all my shopping here including food for breakfast and lunch, and also beer. You can do Vegas on the cheap, and shopping at reasonable prices at Target helps.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32: [{"Name":"Michael W.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUChZ-TZB0XTqluQ04MhZVE30j1vJjSFjFoQDmM7KyrG7uTIX4q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Grand Bazaar Shops have many restaurants, bars, and souvenir shops in front of the Horseshoe Hotel Casino. I love this shopping area more and more whenever I'm here. The more I come. The more I found out, the more lovely it was. They have a CVS store right in the area too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDo6CfAhesRv3CxFaafIsyN\u0026fid=0x0:0x71a9c48cb505eba9"],"When":"2025-11-27"},{"Name":"Cyn-D McConkey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEhbiGYL9lBPlpZSVKCZAQD7ixU50-pocoez7x_diJP5MxeQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shops and eateries.  Love Walburger but didnt get it this time, we opted for Birria Tacos and they were so flippin good. Can't wait to go back the next time I am in town. I wont get the chips and quest dip, the chips were so old and stale and a waste of money.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCVBUn7CY-ERFRKiRmamsEq\u0026fid=0x0:0x71a9c48cb505eba9"],"When":"2026-2-2"},{"Name":"SAM Smart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLIolraUpgrWNqa_TLnogc05PIWu6bs-Syui71bW5KXR6TGpw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a fun outdoor dining and shopping area in front of the iconic valleys casino. They have some great restaurants from sit down dinner to take out. They also have a bunch of fun little shops. It's a great place to walk around since it's an outdoor vendor, usually you can catch a few street performers performing or playing music. Unfortunately near the CVS pharmacy, there are shady characters that hang out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC6kLmv4gE\u0026fid=0x0:0x71a9c48cb505eba9"],"When":"2021-8-28"},{"Name":"Lisa Edelman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5We-kx2-R2AH5IYmeaoakVj8dlDiE-5IbdzPYCJpRaU-iV-ug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is kinda neat although not really like a grand bazaar if you‚Äôve ever been to one. ¬†It‚Äôs a nice place to wander around and eat and drink. They have some good fast food places including a hot dog place that offers vegetarian dogs! ¬†There are some fun shops there including one selling beautiful light fittings. Little alleys of little shops, quite good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID4mLifVQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x71a9c48cb505eba9"],"When":"2018-4-10"},{"Name":"Emrys K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXw0oAkIe61zCi4U_XHvwsihqJD13ZneapExDNRmo50G-h3Ewgk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Always crowded and bustling with people. If you enjoy the suffocating embrace of the Homo sapiens then this may be your paradise, but if you prefer peace then the chaos and turmoil of human presence may drain your energy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDwgOz-UA\u0026fid=0x0:0x71a9c48cb505eba9"],"When":"2025-3-22"},{"Name":"√Ödri √Önn √êroid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWdBWXg0yXmeHVbG2r04ICnp14IFp9y8H7lamJP0P1teOVvWmsjw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This candy store is fantastic! column32:
[{"Name":"Ann Sinclair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXr7Sfos7Wt0s5Ix1w_DRkAuDFYopN492usD_SwZCrbPUBZZvsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This wood fire pizza restaurant made the best food. We had the gluten free cheese bread which was so fluffy and crispy and amazing! Everyone will want to be gluten free. I also had the gluten free pizza. It was the best I‚Äôve ever had. I will compare all future pizza to this one. It is thick like a Detroit four corner pizza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAOha3dWoUVC1Gbnj-ElSuW&fid=0x0:0xcdfa5bc101c4f42"],"When":"2026-1-17"},{"Name":"Max E.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1Aq8Ttyd7EDUZ-iXm5TTZN8m_ZS9lG73NkjNVKt_kLlOqpr86=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We visited during a convention with a group of 14 people. We started with appetizers while waiting for the rest of our group, and initially everything was going well. As the restaurant got busier, however, the service became quite slow‚Äîwhich I understand can happen, especially in Las Vegas.

Overall, the food was okay. The pizza was good‚Äînothing exceptional, but reasonable for a restaurant close to the Strip.

The main issue that really bothered me was with my order. I ordered two Calabrese pizzas, one of them specifically with no pork at all. Unfortunately, it was served with pork not once, but twice. The manager did come over and asked if it was okay, and I explained that it was not. He offered to reorder it, which I appreciated, but by the time a third pizza would have been ready, my colleagues had already finished their meals. I thanked him and declined the remake, sharing slices from friends instead.

The manager mentioned that the item would be removed from the bill, but later I realized it was not. That was very disappointing and honestly disturbing, especially after the mistake was acknowledged.

In summary, the food was acceptable, but the service and handling of this situation left us unhappy. I hope this feedback helps improve the experience for future guests, especially when it comes to dietary requests and billing accuracy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAQvz50Jcc6C1PP9tNLLWEv&fid=0x0:0xcdfa5bc101c4f42"],"When":"2026-1-26"},{"Name":"Michelle Martinez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTKJkO-D6tX3dligpU3Da1T8a-3Dqa6IHceT2qwa_69P7VeL5k4A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Accidentally stumbled into this spot and am I happy we did! My husband and I ended up ordering a margarita pizza (good for one person), Greek salad (big enough to share), and lobster mac and cheese. Though the lobster mac is listed as an appetizer, it could serve one person as a meal or be comfortably shared between 2 people before a meal. Every single bite of every single item was perfect. Jerica took phenomenal care of us and the rest of the tables in her section. The attention to detail from every staff member was outstanding. Got lost in the sauce and forgot to photo the food, but here‚Äôs a look at the bar for good measure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD-MEOv7fDg101b9jA4zbk-&fid=0x0:0xcdfa5bc101c4f42"],"When":"2025-12-30"},{"Name":"Thomas Pham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKkHemfVYOLzpSmyDfBc5V9gjGeGoh_3uUvGn_hkP9nVr-2XA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"From the minute we walk in to when we left, we had a fantastic experience with Flour and Barley! All of the food we order and the mimosas were delectable and appetising. I personally ordered the Linguini and Shrimp, I‚Äôm still thinking about it now.  Our waitress was also accommodating and very professional. Highly recommend if you want a place with good ambiance to sit and yap over good food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAFtbf3hMJ3rCMUd9XQRMJj&fid=0x0:0xcdfa5bc101c4f42"],"When":"2025-7-17"},{"Name":"Corrine Martinez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmw-8_zH7z4BsUOOvuQFgJPNDBcNs-KjWetguoi5lIMN6YN8lu-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We wanted a quick bite to eat on our way to the High Roller Ferris Wheel. This restaurant did not disappoint. It has a casual, cozy, and kid-friendly atmosphere with plenty of food options. We ordered the chicken fettuccine and the double pepperoni pizza. Everything was flavorful, delicious, and made fresh to order. The staff were very friendly, and the service was excellent. We really enjoyed the food and the overall experience. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD6rvlh34PTZdKuDIrjda1x&fid=0x0:0xcdfa5bc101c4f42"],"When":"2025-11-20"},{"Name":"Claudia Le√≥n","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuYNMS_W874IztQPT2m18MHUUSzc7s_wJ7rVga_-6fSj0XEF5-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It was my first time in Las Vegas and I was looking for a good pizza restaurant, the food is very good but the service is very bad, yesterday I was attended by a server who had glasses I don't know what the name was, he only asked for our orders, he brought us water, I asked him for a coke when the food arrives and I never bring it, I never return to the table to ask if we needed anything, he did not serve water again, but to ask for the bill to pay he arrived about 4 times at the table, he was pending how much tip we gave him, I thought he would be nice at the beginning But it was simply a waiter who wanted a good tip and give us bad attention. I would come back for the food but not for the bad service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCjJlQYjwEOPqtzlZSkiS3-&fid=0x0:0xcdfa5bc101c4f42"],"When":"2025-12-7"},{"Name":"Gary Shatraw Jr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtF6pqsLWFv3dt8jjcnkoIg5EGS0L4t0coOzuuxcWHIbtSVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was amazing. We got a Margherita pizza added pepperoni.  We also had the meatball appetizer and cauliflower buffalo bites.  Food was amazing.   The water tasted like pool water.  I swapped to lemonade and that wasn't enough to cover the chlorine in the water.

Food is great but don't drink the water.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDWT4ZL81iqTvjpY0xHSsIy&fid=0x0:0xcdfa5bc101c4f42"],"When":"2025-7-22"},{"Name":"Adriana Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3i7i890jXCiIQv5fe8FFzP3cDk818ZEJbjzi-rgbhPYw5TA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visited on Friday 1/2 for dinner. We ordered crispy brussel sprouts (removed egg), mozzarella sticks, greek salad, the parma pizza, and the vampire pizza. For being on the strip it was good food and less than $100. Brussel sprouts were well seasoned and a hefty serving. The mozzarella sticks were crispy and still melty when they reached the table. I really enjoyed the vinaigrette that was used for the salad. The parma was delicious! The rich creaminess of the ricotta offset the saltiness of the prosciutto. I also enjoyed the vampire pizza but was slightly disappointed at the amount of sausage, maybe 3 on the whole pizza. Still very tasty other than that. There were several extremely intoxicated girls who kept stumbling past our table to the restroom but i guess that could be a downer anywhere in Vegas. Our server, didn't catch her name, was friendly and definitely made up for any off vibes. Would visit again in the future","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Nancy Chambers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvUUDJ42_b8EkB2871Zu-LUmYhK6EOtvOTVAFpYP2aXibM0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was just in for a quick one item and Sheila helped me. She was amazing. I‚Äôm writing a review just bc of her help! She greeted me, asked if she could help me find anything and then since I was only buying one item, she checked my purchases out at the beauty counter. She was perfection for customer service. I‚Äôm sure this store is constantly busy being on the strip but she didn‚Äôt even act flustered.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX__IMj_RomANiXHxwO4y4-xq2g4GY4FX1rSOUrzFGvoGSAz3o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Walgreens S Las Vegas Blvd and Harmon ,Las Vegas Nevada

The exterior area is under construction distracting from the location.  The is no parking. Most traffic is walking from surrounding areas.

Internal area has security guards giving the location an unfriendly vibe.

The facility was well lit. With the exception of one shelf , the shelves were well stocked and the stock was correctly date rotated.

The location has a good selection to stock your hotel or timeshare room.

Check out was fast but the check out staff were not very friendly.

Over all vibe with guards -1
Staff attitude -1","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID_tYbQcg&fid=0x0:0x1dd67cfb900b19e0"],"When":"2025-1-26"},{"Name":"Salvatore Oggiano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW91NjuBSfYvPLAfyAGDoM_SxuBS__lyZkL3SNpPVqvPsixyg8b=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went to Walgreens 3765 today, Sunday, December 7th, around 11 PM, to buy a bottle of Coca-Cola. When I got to the checkout counter to pay, at the second register on the left (after the entrance), there was a short woman with Asian features. When she saw me go to pay at the register next to where a young man was working, this woman started making faces at me, laughing without any reason and without the slightest respect. I even mentioned this to the young man at the register where I paid, regarding the faces and rudeness of his colleague. These people shouldn't be working in customer service...","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"GWE COMPANY","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKQr58zDLyj4oAS-TECKfA4tl1e2LIu7DspuMsNY2a44kSzf1q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I have been to this location about 10 times now in the last 6 months.  I‚Äôm a retired 69 year old and I frequent Las Vegas from California.  I have given those black cashiers numerous opportunities to be more cordial and appreciative of my business.  They never ask me how I am or even say thank you.  Do I have had it and they deserve this review.  I hope management wakes up and trains these cashiers to do their job and be more appreciative of my business and others they have never thanked.  They need to know that Las Vegas was built on good customer service. If they don‚Äôt want to be appreciative then tell them to go work somewhere else.  You don‚Äôt need a degree to give a sincere smile and a simple Thank you.  If nothing is done by management, regional will hear about this. I found these ladies insulting with no ‚Äúyou‚Äôre welcome‚Äù after I thanked one of them today.  üëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëé","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"L B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMbZ6DxKiIhKPEVpg9gksSWhb1qjOQfMhvFVNMTzZ2W_H-6oUFww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent store and location. Clean, well lit, safe and secure. Plenty of miscellaneous items for whatever you need or want. Everything is neatly arranged. Yes, some highly pilferable items are in case. There is plenty of friendly staff to help you. AND if you are lucky enough to see SHEILA, she is superb. Friendly, helpful and will get you addicted to a new snack item you didn't know you needed. It is wicked delicious!  Yum!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bernita Maxwell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhSXN2VeT4fqHO4MgbqyEwOBnQjaT3evFi99h1I7iy-lfLgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visiting Las Vegas from Illinois and had to pick up a few items of course we headed to the local Walgreens, where the associate Ms. CHIQUI at store #04763 was the best!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kyle Schaffer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXB3Qs--Ah9M4PGHNRMIi_ZNc4j0UlMnE_7Y3gLOk-nP6BNX5UP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the cleanest Walgreens I‚Äôve ever been to. If you go in, say hi to Chiqui, she was super nice","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christopher Kristoff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzfBKOyAoDlDJMzlOEqHg4ieIK5I582UbszMyjl2mTahiUcuv3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrible store. Everything is locked up due to theft which I understand but they have these doors on the alcohol area that close right when I was entering and ended up ramming into my leg which hurt a bunch. They should just close the store if there's that much theft. It's annoying. You have to like constantly buzz people to get anything and the security gates which I'm sure dont really work, hurt you and this place sucks. The prices for everything here are so expensive as well. Help better to support your local market or any corporation other than this one which just overcharges for everything and hurts you when you're trying to shop there. Horrible. Horrible horrible","Images":null,"When":""}]
