Jr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvGxRvVu5IMa2HHgwX-RizEjfzVnhCbMuiu1EsYZ9mQV4KRAU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I think the store is great, has a perfect location, there were 2 employees at the store and both were very polite. they didn't charge me double. I was with some friends and they didn't charge them more either. The store had plenty of inventory and items to choose from. I recommend this store to everyone who comes to Las Vegas.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elizabeth Shirley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdHH8i8yY5H_LX84MvLAekxM0yzzNp00Col6DezwktqC0rHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have huge selection of alcoholic drinks \u0026 non-alcoholic drinks to choose from. Souvenirs. T-shirts, flip flops, hats, toys, toiletries, \u0026 items you may have forgotten to pack for vacation in Las Vegas. They even have luggage. You will find something to to remember your visit to sin city","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Abrar Ahmed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-432l82mnRSUyOSHfIRLz-N_EQeiorZWezCtUjovXQNtGFyB4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A small basic and mix grocery and souvenir store with very few choices. But availability of basic stuff is more important than nothing","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICBm5P1Sg\u0026fid=0x0:0x6b194c6941d0a47f"],"When":"2023-1-5"},{"Name":"Sandra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL1qRx5VSIegZy20NMt5hfOYaEUmko7pxMbJ6O2zfuaMKz8_f8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Popped for a browse really, picked up a few bits and bobs...soon adds up i spent $24","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Francesca Piacentini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXp2BcDo6fdzD452JEktW1kb63Q9jcyHEHEyMVgpvWMgnCnN-Jb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I‚Äôve been there to buy souvenirs and they charge me twice with the same transaction (so I‚Äôve lost 30 dollars). I‚Äôve called multiple times to see if they can check the situation and refund me but they never did and never call me back when they say they would have. I would not recommend this shop to anyone.  The worst !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jason Connelly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIF4hTH84QnwdJrJ7NvMa0hMdf33SE4DzBehDPHj6CAjiBsRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My wife and I bought a full price Tshirt and paid. As we were walking away the cashier started complaining about something, so I walked back and politely asked if everything was ok. She started screaming at us like a mad woman. We left wondering what caused that. If I thought she would have accepted a return, I would have gotten my money back. Too bad most people won't read this until it happens to them. This place is crazy!","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32: [{"Name":"Andy Beach","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWbhjByiU9Mhk_tJ8fx5H21pcknN6X_VAyN_PhZiYIa3g2oZY7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best place to shop, eat, and go to a show in Vegas. Save all the walking up and down the strip. Love the Jets musical concert, the Mentalist is there too. Flights, La Salsa, Earl of Sandwich and a Chick fi la to eat and many more. It‚Äôs a great place to start if your on a budget or never been to Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBNYFv7PCDoZtTkAUIRGsZU\u0026fid=0x0:0xc3b3e34dd5965bce"],"When":"2026-1-7"},{"Name":"wrathof don","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8-ffX5ZnMSfcU_VgQ1Le5wjYbvnHtp3xgmfFWr6H2pYuB1Zk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Well visiting Vegas for the NFR this year we went through the mall. Pretty neat stuff in there lots of places to eat and shop and get some exercise no matter what the weather. Since it's essentially a giant circle you can always come out where you went in makes it very convenient so that you don't get lost.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDIyIT710Nq_ydBWL30E619\u0026fid=0x0:0xc3b3e34dd5965bce"],"When":"2025-12-26"},{"Name":"S S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKtccJCsZF0J-NYjE2fd9aaG1rkmJzoTjxTlujAGsPMOSZohGs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Impressive ashtetics and easy to navigate the mall. I enjoyed the balanced number of clothing shops with other artsy products to help the whole family stay entertained.  Skims and Lululemon are the recent additions that I enjoyed visiting. The restrooms were accessible and clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAHMOprGEoe-wBzVw9Htdg2\u0026fid=0x0:0xc3b3e34dd5965bce"],"When":"2026-1-25"},{"Name":"Helping hand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7fM2h_hucMPfgb3ZPwwftaKq-yY7yt8A_-0keM1-7ptcgHg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was indeed reassuring to see security present at the entrance. However, I observed a considerable amount of unused space. Naturally, it becomes quite busy, as one must wait for their number to be called for assistance. Perhaps having more staff available on the floor to address questions would be beneficial.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAgViAbedqcLqejWlKqTAsh\u0026fid=0x0:0xc3b3e34dd5965bce"],"When":"2025-9-17"},{"Name":"John Devlin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFSph8Lj1VOlK4C7s_X0VY2nYot5jrjfJVzqnsprjnlIMp6T6hdw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I went to see the things and ended up spending lots of money on the Lobster Roll. Size didn‚Äôt match the cost. Decent taste. The lobster Mac was good. I wanted to take some time to do the skin treatment where they let fish eat the dead skin.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCGLz8xnsFQ6Mk3iBA1gwGM\u0026fid=0x0:0xc3b3e34dd5965bce"],"When":"2025-12-19"},{"Name":"Glenn Mullin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXt8FGzGGWClVYRawmux0PouLL8ONUbgmBTH8yfVKbfGv2S329LiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"V Theater located in ‚ÄãThe Miracle Mile Shops. Currently hosting the Popovich Comedy Pet Theater show. Great fun for all ages.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCNZp-1ev8mSWmETyXWakgc\u0026fid=0x0:0xc3b3e34dd5965bce"],"When":"2026-1-31"},{"Name":"Kayode Odepe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgm7rr4gtdMTTS2l4h_FNMe0jjSWfIhmY4tM4h3GFULkVpeWI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Loads \u0026 variety of stores,  businesses,  restaurants \u0026 attractions to explore. Awesome savories, sights, smells \u0026 sounds to stimulate all 5 senses.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCrqG44F4WKOd9UKTs_m-FG\u0026fid=0x0:0xc3b3e34dd5965bce"],"When":"2025-11-8"},{"Name":"Tami Silva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpRp8q7TSVmzqJ76ABIMinwFCnC36hLH8A5Ncqg-g0LhjUyvxy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We spent most of our time in this area for shows and live tributes. Great place to hang out","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAK0jj_Xd4dkdDU2sHmbW0Q\u0026fid=0x0:0xc3b3e34dd5965bce"],"When":"2025-9-28"}]

column32: [{"Name":"Erik Lehman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXauWqALM2Ygt4OKmbMA4uRydY857CAnlfQn4mMtGGDnRtgI6H1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great time here. I sat at the bar and caught a nice buzz with free alcohol, won $142 playing keno.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDUpNsV-uhHsEcaRdVuMsKn\u0026fid=0x0:0xad683283fb18a627"],"When":"2025-10-15"},{"Name":"carine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJI5w-ror0AyjYNPns5gHg97Gnnxtdr9-y18v4csn6IE4flBA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The boulevard at Paris Paris hotel and casino in Las Vegas is a great shopping mall area opened 24h. Retail area looking like a Parisian street with a gift shop and restaurants. The atmosphere is very nice to walk around. With brass lamps. Pavements street alike. This is a great decor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDoyv_BdQ\u0026fid=0x0:0xad683283fb18a627"],"When":"2025-4-23"},{"Name":"HANAA IBRAHIM","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEG3vat9gF3euANVd6cUvHc2fR-wxGEU220Tpdp96AeLFCsKe2yQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I loved my visit to Le Boulevard at the Paris Hotel! The mall exudes a delightful Parisian street vibe, filled with beautiful decor, elegant chandeliers, and inviting caf√©s. It‚Äôs such a lovely place to wander, find unique gifts, and savour gourmet treats and pastries. The atmosphere perfectly balances luxury and relaxation, making it feel like an escape. Plus, being open 24 hours a day makes it convenient for anyone looking to explore, no matter the time. If you‚Äôre in Vegas, I highly recommend taking time to experience this charming spot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAdbXArhrCkWq3jtEpYxcuS\u0026fid=0x0:0xad683283fb18a627"],"When":"2025-6-8"},{"Name":"John Fontana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrQgxUhTjSikBysCVVJR0cIt-IfS-HL3ubIvJCaDpgffaLjKDR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really nice selection of restaurants, even if grossly, offensively overpriced.  Bedford is one of the nicest interiors I have seen, Nobu is sharp, classy, and Vander Pumps is where house tacky, but we'll done for what it is.  Plus Bobby's Burgers are pretty good and only $15!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCOPTHBduKirFlQlp9XUmzW\u0026fid=0x0:0xad683283fb18a627"],"When":"2025-6-15"},{"Name":"Miranda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWk_NvnqWti6qFA9gHJcqXvSr1I3ywpTMlbTwbMr8vecQxGeC0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Room was nice although it lacked a coffee maker, fridge and microwave. I was having a really hard time finding food at restaurants (food allergies) and it would have been nice to be able to eat. Casino was clean and didn't reek of smoke. Mask rules were not enforced. Had a great view of the fountain at the Bellagio.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDG35Hl8AE\u0026fid=0x0:0xad683283fb18a627"],"When":"2021-12-14"},{"Name":"Dave Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDhP9hnxxDUnnyERg9bH0mZjqmDg6uYiH7Yy8rRZWnb1yeRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great coffee and location.  Fast service and was spot on. We got White Chocolate Mocha and Carmel Macchiato. Muffins are just ok. Friendly workers....will go back","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Sabella","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4-sFmHO6LtL7HDFDO-ju-nMmukb2UJJvF1aSvfxc6XEEWTMA8Mg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Worth visiting if you want to see the sights in the central part of the strip. It's probably the best location to start with. The shops are nice and the view of the fountains across the street can be excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEN_o9K7Kydj4ew\u0026fid=0x0:0xad683283fb18a627"],"When":"2025-5-22"},{"Name":"Susana Lerma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4laW_IXFeU6f9UA95uiUwePZGf7dl-GLXnSsBzraFdEKPOzzT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Clean and very well kept casino, full of exciting and new machines. We played quite a bit we also had breakfast at Mon a mi, a must to eat breakfast. Love coming here it is always a must, missed the old bakery and the sandwich place that had all the meats other than that still is a favorite very well kept great job keep it up. Just beautiful as always thank you","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID7p7eqXg\u0026fid=0x0:0xad683283fb18a627"],"When":"2024-8-29"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"ozitheexplorer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXe7IfckE5yW33Uc37xY5D8cKjMF_rwv4oyvgddSFfI1uWoi4E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I stopped by Davidoff Lounge on the Strip and really enjoyed the atmosphere. The walk-in humidor is spacious and well organized with a strong selection of premium cigars. The staff took time to help with recommendations, which I appreciated. Having both indoor and outdoor seating makes it a great place to relax with a cigar and a drink while watching the Strip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBiTLLzyR2Lh2vPt0oAvV5s&fid=0x0:0xe942a80d95b04296"],"When":"2025-12-15"},{"Name":"Luka Bulatovic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMLl2sVavRVSXFNROqWzOquzmO-ap2sRVV7-EutI9R2uoZahjR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"From the moment you walk in, you feel the vibe low lights, smooth music, and that rich aroma of quality cigars in the air.
The lounge strikes the perfect balance between sophistication and comfort a place where you can unwind, light up, and enjoy conversations that last longer than your cigar.
Service is on point, humidor selection is top shelf, and the cocktails complement the experience perfectly.
Definitely the kind of spot you want to return to , not just for the smoke, but for the atmosphere. Definitely 10/10!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC2PjROn0fKep3cUmoRW-_j&fid=0x0:0xe942a80d95b04296"],"When":"2025-8-22"},{"Name":"Chris summers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXiJDWPi2UsC6SnfQvkvKvE5coYywN8iupcDHrf3f9rzvu2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place. Most of the gentlemen helping with the cigars were great and very knowledgeable. Went there 4 times in the five days I was out in Vegas. The gentlemen working Thursday 10/30 night didn't give a very good vibe of being knowledgeable and the cuts on the cigar was too deep. Ans felt more like an inconvenience than anything. Over all one day wasn't the best but would recommend it you want a place to relax and sit on the strip to drink and enjoy both night and day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDiILVL_XYVJ1jdtOFzpXRz&fid=0x0:0xe942a80d95b04296"],"When":"2025-10-31"},{"Name":"Jimmy Krueger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-gUbb6W_YThZYi2mQDbUxrXJf-18Gf1jpRCpo2zmuRFrwhw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stopped in for a cigar and a drink recently and had a great time. The person at the cigar shop was friendly and knowledgeable. He gave us great recommendations and we enjoyed our cigar. We sat comfortably on the patio and enjoyed an old fashioned. We loved the great atmosphere to enjoy a cigar, a drink, and to watch college football.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB6QKLShaoEsDdjE2Bc85SE&fid=0x0:0xe942a80d95b04296"],"When":"2025-12-6"},{"Name":"Mert Eren Zurnalƒ±","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3LwcfY5_QIehwLIcpF-qRqtkEv6Y5xScQOBMtjpgoAdnDsemTIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing spot to escape the Strip's chaos. The atmosphere is top-notch, and the service is incredibly attentive. Perfect for a relaxed drink and a quality smoke.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC2Vj1d3WBNHpnrkH35sjuS&fid=0x0:0xe942a80d95b04296"],"When":"2026-2-6"},{"Name":"linda jefferson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKk6Nc9KDlgYek_mLBcKpeOXwRs_m7TeRVNt4Z9WRTR3NHM6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ty is  mind blowing amazing!! He keeps us coming back 3-4x a week. His hospitality and professionalism is top tier. Me and my husband is always referring family and friends to this beautiful establishment!! Great music, cigars and drinks!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBT1ZTwH7Yx1C53mZvbuV35&fid=0x0:0xe942a80d95b04296"],"When":"2025-8-22"},{"Name":"BryR74","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPqqkbfbnQOz7SoGHFy-AotYVRSi5FmaX6Hfp7gkHHwJYHqRTC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The view from the patio is beautiful.  We had an incredible time there and are impressed with the service from a very busy staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDREyz1jUAJ0pSWR1BxqPH-&fid=0x0:0xe942a80d95b04296"],"When":"2025-11-2"},{"Name":"Christian Diener","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXtJmEaIqsi1CQuLRixtSLEAbGEleGsm9gSC8dIPFsy0wVi-4Ytw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I visited the place while in Las Vegas for shot show. I am not a gambler and basically in town for work, however I don't mind a cigar.
It was quite busy in bar area and I was assigned a seat. Friendly enough I was asked if I want a smoke from humidor and I joined to waiter to get Camacho. This took 3 minutes and my seat on the bar was gone. This because somebody was reserving for the husband not being around while she not even consumed a beverage. Well, a seat was arranged, and was asked to move over a seat again to get more somebody else accompanied to a group. That was the kicker, that somebody was a "dog". This dog was put on a bar seat, and soon later was drinking water out of a pan. At least the dog behaved better than its loud mouth owner. Non of the employees did anything about this situation. This was really ridiculous and I would never expect that in a place like that. Especially paying 24$ for cigar what is worth 12 and 44$ for an old fashion what cost half in any other lounge besides Las Vegas. Sorry, this was not a good experience.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Debra A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpd5ri5ujoUMYwoiTUhO7OG0tB27edd4xTJHJrX4Xj_qL2RA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I stopped in here twice while visiting Vegas for a few days and was very happy to find that apples were available. Sadly, most restaurant meals don't include fruit and very rarely include vegetables these days, so I was very happy to get some fiber in my diet for the week I was there. I was also impressed with the customer service and the self scanners. Both times an employee stuck with me and helped to ring up my purchases. Kudos to them!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Uchizi Phakati","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIorOoSkOjNefpV3oOe4iEkc2vRoSve0_zLbf8DzBMvJ1ixOcQ8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The CVS on the Las Vegas Strip is fantastic! The store is impeccably clean and well-organized, making it super easy to find what you need. Whether it‚Äôs health essentials, snacks, or souvenirs, everything is clearly labeled and in its place. The staff is friendly and efficient, and the location is ideal for anyone staying on the Strip. A great spot for a quick, hassle-free shopping experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID_zqSvMQ&fid=0x0:0x6bd42885474b3980"],"When":"2025-1-24"},{"Name":"Saikishan Ramidevi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKSQUnq_XzIh2NbSR8BacpeZlMv6KNDxgEvrawyBIcX3oUUpg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shift manager Penny is the best.

I go here every week I always see penny with the smile, she never gets tired and it seems she is very happy to help people. CVS is very lucky to have  an employee like this.

Thanks everything penny for your service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Doughlicious Restaurant & Catering","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmGMnLyUhLrB4qvOAwynNQZDBdl9TcVlpcrqJNZH_vtJ80ziV9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Around the world, this is the worst customer service ever.  In short, I arrived in Las Vegas with my small family on the 23rd of March, 2025, at 11:00 PM, and I was very tired due to a chest cold and a persistent cough. I stopped to buy medicine, and I wish I hadn't. I asked for assistance because the medicine section was locked, and then disaster struck. The employee had a sour face and an unprofessional attitude, and her response to my inquiry was incredibly rude, adding emotional distress to my illness.  I understand that she might have her own problems, but the customer is not responsible for them. Therefore, the management of this branch should hire people with experience and good customer service skills.
Customer service and attitude is :  -2","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bee G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPMOEgHwMoUiyLQ6YfWEVIzPgWcl_kJNwuCDtU4tyxs7eDIY8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lindsey F & Marie, store # 10348.
If I could give the two of you more than 5 stars, I WOULD. I went to Vegas for my wedding, I forgot my medications. I know you're thinking how stupid are you! Because, I've wondered that in the past when I've been told the same from other's, how does that happen?? I will never question this again. I'm a very organized person and still forgot due to circumstances. I received more help from these two ladies then my personal doctor. Which I think even upset me more. Lindsey and Marie went to battle to help me. They went beyond the call of duty. Without them, I would have been in big trouble and had to come back home early. " DID I MENTION THIS WAS FOR MY WEDDING". Lindsay and Marie both kept in contact with me daily from the minute I was in touch with them, to figure out what needed to be done. Even contacted my doctor which was not their responsibility. It's people in the world like this that make this world a better place. They're willing to help. If you get a chance to go to this CVS give them a great big shout out, these are two amazing women.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kevin Ao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkBvZ6ce_zHnWsLqA5ojfX0nMQ_CDE0WIX5k8yhZ46T8a1BLiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This CVS is super convenient if you‚Äôre staying at Park MGM‚Äîit‚Äôs right outside, so it‚Äôs perfect for grabbing anything you need without going far. It‚Äôs quick to get in and out, which is great if you‚Äôre in a rush. The best part is the pricing‚Äîway cheaper than what you‚Äôd find inside the hotels or casinos for the same items. A great little spot to have nearby when you‚Äôre on the Strip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCo8f-JiwE&fid=0x0:0x6bd42885474b3980"],"When":"2025-4-18"},{"Name":"Yesi Hern√°ndez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_VcVKGp_1GCOLR5fFpQBbylGp7HeCy4lLp2YePEcdIG2vTtA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This CVS was super close to our hotel, just a walking distance of 3 min. It was very clean & the staff was very kind; a staff member offered to help me right away. The prices were pretty decent & we found what we needed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lyd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbPcIyV_OHCEQxy6gPIuHlafPQW-eqHaLc-rgSTJLoIEGDns4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great selection!! We got gluten free cookies on a whim. A little overpriced but not as expensive as they could be","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32: [{"Name":"Jean Ortiz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOELGe2gG_nEYjfNSVrFQRM6W7CR9U6_BiRg-LmriKBTE4Gsk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very casual bar with a great vibe and great bartenders. We came on a slow Monday night but as a person who works in Hospitality as well, it is clear these guys can handle multiple crowds and still be the center of attention!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBjCuj3DJqzHWcg3I01fYLR\u0026fid=0x0:0x3c4f6bce99a82eeb"],"When":"2025-9-30"},{"Name":"Goose Prevot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuK-JbT-e65ehWoObJN_2imZDUyawbNlL7GjaqmqwIBnDqQkUzeA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best deals and place to drink. Always something fun happening around there. Good conversation with the bartenders and you can also catch a show with the cocktail making flair!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBPz-sf9yjEYBrGKgUqExyB\u0026fid=0x0:0x3c4f6bce99a82eeb"],"When":"2025-11-10"},{"Name":"Steven Universe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGkfoP15uWFTBw4A8KBdr6sbloCAwcXbd300B6E75OYX7KZ4HX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has been the best spot near the Vegas fountains to get good drinks.  The bartenders are fun to talk to and will give you great honest feedback about Vegas.  The best spot on the strip if you're looking for a chill spot to sit and enjoy a few drinks for around $20 or to grab a few walking drinks.   Hopefully the changes Caesars makes to Grand Bazaar shops doesn't take away this Vegas treasure. Colby and his team do it right and deserve the best.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gy√∂rgyi R√©dein√© Sz√∂ll≈ësi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULVS4-PxinLULLbAUxfrADEieW3pM5bKVx74s-iATZrU-5LTxq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"‚ÄúGreat atmosphere and delicious cocktails! They have a fun 1+1 deal, which makes it even better. The place is a bit tucked away, but once you find it, it‚Äôs super cozy and definitely worth visiting","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCqDXzDgyqC5LIOU0FgAKyA\u0026fid=0x0:0x3c4f6bce99a82eeb"],"When":"2025-8-16"},{"Name":"Matt Gardea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcjU5RnBgtWKWrJGBPaQv-cJxfuizCmpMIQ-f9OjRPXaLIRBM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Got a coupon on the strip for buy one get one free. Got two of the same drink to use the coupon and it came out to $19. Not too bad considering the location and everything but 80% of the of cup was ice. Didn‚Äôt let my friend eat inside either. The bar was pretty dead too. Wouldn‚Äôt recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Selena velazquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSLWkuvEuemK6CMDPaWi7uJde9OedSzLdo8KsNb_nYXfQt7UOkOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This definitely is the vibe when out with friends!!!! They have a promo going on right now, buy one drink get the second ‚Äúsame‚Äù drink free. It‚Äôs totally worth it cause they are not shy when it comes to the liquor.. ;) They have a little basketball hoop and you can pay $5 and get five attempts to make it. One of the home boys made the shot and everyone in the place got free shot!!!!!! Pour straight into our mouths, what a time to remember. The staff is AMAZING!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCgzqaLPg\u0026fid=0x0:0x3c4f6bce99a82eeb"],"When":"2025-2-17"},{"Name":"DEE Jax","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIzmfyaoLyahXqeJj0EyaFhy57yWkJOJ0kVRTx6XTxy7Nzf5Kp4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved this spot! First time going and I will always go there every time im in Vegas. Bartenders were awesome and those bottle tricks they did were cool. The buy 1 get 1 free deal is LEGIT! Also those drinks were very strong...it only took two to have me tap out! Good prices too!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rafael Flores","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLo_56X9wAKJnl5o00mfW8zytGDNO6I-6T98uWlAqBvqM2d6M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We recently visited in the first few days of January after several years of initially having a horrible experience; in the hopes things had gotten better. Well I can tell you they haven‚Äôt. Me and my female friend entered the bar late one night to get a drink and keep our night going. Upon entering the staff was extremely friendly and lively and welcoming, especially Paul and Colby. They asked us if we knew about their current promotion and how it worked so we could get a good deal. As we sat at the bar top a group of two males and two females who all looked like they were in the mid 40‚Äôs attempted to get my attention. I turned over to them and they began to ask extremely sexual and inappropriate questions about my friend and if we were in the mood to party. Instead of reacting out of anger and this situation leading to a worse one I told them off and said leave us alone. They didn‚Äôt like this and proceeded to make degrading and negative sexual comments about myself and my friend. I immediately notified our bartender who reacted promptly and notified the bar manager. The bar manager then approached the guests who of course denied everything and in a dramatic and obvious move of being caught in the act got up and left the bar. Then I noticed the bar manager get on his phone. After talking with the staff we were told these were regulars at the bar. The team did apologize for their behavior and made it clear that it is not okay for anyone to be doing this to any other patrons. We continued to enjoy our drinks and shortly after the owner showed up welcoming back in the regulars who had just gotten kicked out. He spent about 20min speaking with them and laughing. Not once did he come over to me and my friend to apologize to us or explain why he felt it to be okay to allow such guests back in while we were still here. If this is the type of regulars this owner allows then it speaks volumes for the lack of consideration and care he has of any other business. Once again the staff did a great job checking in on us and in the end taking care of the bill as a sign of good will; which they did not have to do at all.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Philip Jeremy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2eOVr7nscUeJ-wRokiYQS_FPWoyVlcmMf-hz7g3XrApPZ5w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Diana shouldn't be dealing with customers, her lack of professionalism and customer service skills really show. I'm extremely baffled by the way she treated me, as a valued Walgreens, regular guest. I'm caught off guard by her demeanor. I happen to have someone standing right next to me who witnessed her AWFUL attitude, we both couldn't believe she spoke in such a manner. She was rude and out of line. She was very argumentative when I simply asked for the store address, she INSISTED on seeing my phone with a confirmation. Her responses were degrading and just plain unprofessional and rude. She was EXTREMELY disrespectful. I'll definitely reach out to corporate about this. She should NOT be up in front. The way she spoke to the guest was UNACCEPTABLE.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCRg2OF9pOMvZHXtymxF1RB&fid=0x0:0xbece41c0b2abded0"],"When":"2025-11-20"},{"Name":"Chris Ayash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLfybAqGwe6BxQUPqZqXrA-X71EDx_tZWHCDsZfuA0M7vyjCg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Needed to fill some prescriptions after forgetting my meds at home. Within 2 hours the staff was able to get my Rx‚Äôs and fill all of them and answered all my questions. Very nice and professional. Loved the entire experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brian Brinsfield","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKb34g2At_MqH9BQhikQviNMT8mMOFHJUzOGb9_mvKas444pHwmw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cleanest and most efficient Walgreens I have ever been in. And that is saying something for a 24/7 especially on the Las Vegas Strip.  I hope I am remembering her name correctly but the Mgr. Melanie was outstanding. Organized. Stocked. Clean. Efficient. 10/10.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Day","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURbtRfeCT0i8CT7q6PoVd-nsPtgX0Sd_wu17BbOyI11DKy-Q-r=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"One of the worst experiences as a sharper in my life. As soon as I walk into the store the security guard leaves his post and follows me around the store. I let him know that I feel uncomfortable because I'm not the only customer in this store and why are you following me around I leave the store I get a notification to review the store so I'm standing in front of the store taking pictures the security guard comes at me with a teaser! I asked him what is he doing he says I've been 86. I asked why. Never answered my questions! A white lady with a backpack like I had walks in does her business and leaves. Long story I profiled because of the color of my skin.i have incident on video Will post if I'm able to","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICV87ab4QE&fid=0x0:0xbece41c0b2abded0"],"When":"2023-12-9"},{"Name":"Philipp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpC_TpgJEzkBjfu-emvzKUKhlIdssx5HQjg3WeNO0xnhB9Zegx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Two ATMs available in entrance area, worked with my German debit visa card no problem. Make sure to decline the conversion offer, 6$ fee.
Friendly security guard and cashiers. Decent selection of food, drink and even souvenirs","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michell Jackson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqx5PIGaQGTngGGgQETpWoCSEC2yQbLZFxJA84Ula7rgsv0g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Outstanding Customer Service!
We had an incredible experience at the Walgreens near Planet Hollywood in Las Vegas. The pharmacist went above and beyond‚Äîshe truly cares about her customers. When our medication wasn‚Äôt available, she didn‚Äôt stop there; she took the time to search around and found it at another Walgreens for us. Her dedication and kindness made all the difference. Thank you so much for your help Doctor Daltrang‚Äîyou are absolutely awesome!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paul S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_X6uhdMpITyXKlJQrN3LvlKT0mXnEEQHqdVPEGl4qP1eWHg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We were racially profiled by the security. He followed us to the waters like if we were going to steal something. It was the most uncomfortable situation of my life. I have never been discriminated against by any Walgreens, and I have gone to many here in the USA. You need to change your security guy; he is scaring your customers always by profiling immigrants. One thing is secure place, and the other is follow customers in the most visually unpleasant way.  Please offer training to your security guy on manners.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steve Hunsader","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX--aXjI1C17YBE-jMlYjgnOZZ8AERLnH72_cSEx4KT3x63D7AkAg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Don't let the length of the checkout line deter you from buying here. My wait time was under 7 minutes for a line that switched back a couple of times...perhaps 30 people in line.

Prices reasonable for being in such a prime location. Great selection of goods. NOTE: I asked security guard if the lines ever got shorter, and his response was "Not really, but the line moves quickly".","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDRrvS_gQE&fid=0x0:0xbece41c0b2abded0"],"When":"2023-4-25"}]

column32: [{"Name":"ÂÆÆÂπ≥„Ç∏„Çß„Éï„É™„Éº","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyoBhsEJECvzMqOrTHmlK-jnj0Ro63zSrIWeX3rm9LWydQfm7_QQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A lot of things to buy as a souvenir from Las Vegas. But there was nothing unique and the prices are the same. It‚Äôs nice if they had something special only for this location. Overall it‚Äôs good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAA9jdnYJPwQZFGzJxZ8pQh\u0026fid=0x0:0x60021d724d454aa5"],"When":"2026-1-6"},{"Name":"Jalal Alghabra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcYZq2RMCcZkOvc1r_bpx-azSqDa87mxDpJt1fLsCD9emMu0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very big store with everything you may be looking for to buy.  The problem, if you are familiar with temu or shein then it's really hard to buy anything from there.  While I'm the store, I double checked the prices and what on temu for $2.00 free delivery was $13.99. I get that you want to make money but even doubling the prices is Ok.  I mean if I can get it delivered free, they do too.  Over all, beautiful and clean store with so so much but over priced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBpY3SRu16tyklXfCiHnSFv\u0026fid=0x0:0x60021d724d454aa5"],"When":"2025-9-13"},{"Name":"Amol More","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWt-fy7BshgOQcqFeBRqAo3rzlbCTqboxFUE2q5brV8UVU1h_qOpg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you‚Äôre looking for a budget friendly shop for gifts and souvenirs then this is the place for it. It‚Äôs a largest gift shop on the strip. Too many options for Magnets, souvenirs,key chains and what not. Cash and card payments are acceptable. A good point is that it has a free parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEI2Ywsj3q7ynvQE\u0026fid=0x0:0x60021d724d454aa5"],"When":"2025-6-2"},{"Name":"Jay J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnRYTCAD-Jok_S7xWKzUaIEGuxFiWZHV4m3NqKyd4HAUi9gB9f=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Huge selection, even tho you can find cheaper stuff in smaller stores, but for sheer number of different items, this is the best store in Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCtV94HWv08v0GQstY0kivb\u0026fid=0x0:0x60021d724d454aa5"],"When":"2025-11-20"},{"Name":"Life's Good","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWw5U_U6dharlUH7K8TPdfeftSl9qJ54tQYDWs4UtW2w2EGovWHlg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"At the end of the strip, I always remember this being the best place to get your souvenirs, but their prices or the same a shopping on the strip. Yes, big store lots of selections, but not the great. Cheap prices. I recall.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDLA9zBzdcBmVzCkmbCwyF5\u0026fid=0x0:0x60021d724d454aa5"],"When":"2025-10-17"},{"Name":"Backpacker_ Hiker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUR1VKJQ_UrVmK3RVLZiLZOhfnaD3g9fLFpKL3e4E--JK4dnv3p=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My spouse \u0026 I love this gift shop and come here several times when we're visiting Las Vegas. The items are priced great and there is a very large selection. We enjoy coming here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDFfjV0aImfRbZzL47CQvTk\u0026fid=0x0:0x60021d724d454aa5"],"When":"2025-9-9"},{"Name":"Heather Tingle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSGAItG6reg6IVuZTyVXgCP3KG4vwcJnPYB5zWnh-PaGrzYamFhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing. I spent a lot of time and money here, but I still enjoyed every minute of it. I like that the store is divided into different sections.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAPjqU_QTTR8f3eb7lqv-kI\u0026fid=0x0:0x60021d724d454aa5"],"When":"2025-9-26"},{"Name":"Rebekah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoBZRvbliYRqfyp-stzgOlhFoD-5JZkzfj7IrV1Hkt0av2pw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Any Las Vegas souvenir you could possibly want is probably in this huge shopping store. The prices are reasonable as well. They also have free parking and seem to have personal watching the parking to avoid any shenanigans.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhARQJwXDDiD-HItFB2sFv3y\u0026fid=0x0:0x60021d724d454aa5"],"When":"2025-10-28"}]

[{"Name":"D. S. H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3F57h5AxbcMzhEr--8D93zcIb-txEfZGX4Gw7G_Ho0wMXSMGheg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super-friendly service from Eddie the manager. Prices are significantly lower than expected, despite close proximity to the strip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC3kM2-6QE&fid=0x0:0x15d753487148f276"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Yolanda Cruz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLEJQoRak1YKM0X_jfKxqjwpuM1wOhNNe5-XmHQMROK5EymWNwrg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite smoke shop by far! Let me begin by saying that not only are the prices affordable, you always have a variety of products to choose. The staff is very receptive to your needs, and the atmosphere is friendly. Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alex","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHKNZ33TD_GWVQDkmMOYZxIdUxyUGT8kv51ohWidslAyvhrw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing. The people are amazing.
The product they have is extensive & worth, the prices they offer are competitive to say the least..
None of this makes sense. Why wouldn't you always come back here?
Definitely worth the drive or hike.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nekia Burnett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKX43Ckw-9o0YrY-SpW-tLMzgO0DV-8dQvx8TsTvyzWjYG1sw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this store it is the shit affordable prices conveniently by the strip. If you ever in Vegas take a trip and visit Eddie. He has the best customer service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Swazz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDWp6oAzagb2svCyQ8svgKrA0Qqney5b_xQSUcgvmFjf6mOtyq8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a life saver if your hurting on money but you vape .
These guys update their vapes consistently and always have every flavor in stock.
One vape is only $20 and if you buy two it's a little under $40
Best prices on vapes period everyone in the city is charging $30 for defective Vapes except mom and pops.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Craig Koch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBEAOF8jVVOtHxGHtzen6cEc_j3paMGtmJTztuot_GGDpv8Cy6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Went inside with my 1Yr old daughter to pick something and the lady told me she couldn't be in the store. She basically wanted me to leave her alone in my car while I grabbed what I needed for a second.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Latisha Grant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6KkHyVyAElmR-G1UrOMNd_SI0C3lneOS12d212nSzv_ofhZEN=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Claudia and her sister with the red hair are my 2 favorite people there superior customer service the whole family is awesome . My favorite smoke shop in Las vegas :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bryan Alcantar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1Ulc4MoGckRW4rcz6NvJL9Q-kChw7DvS3EpRNaV6DHPnCSx7rnw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So sweet all the time. Just in a sketchy area so be careful but inside they treat you like family :)","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32: [{"Name":"Jen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXt4EI6Ge0LLrpdSGQ2NYwFXKPHU6cC_-WeQiDSM5wWL2LGhI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nell was super fun to talk to \u0026 truly tailored my drinks to my preferences,  while still pushing to try new experiences.    I was so excited to have found the key that I was texting all my friends.   I loved the whole vibe!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAl5lSi86lI-vskH58H8rAu\u0026fid=0x0:0x186953e47e22068f"],"When":"2026-1-26"},{"Name":"Michele M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImag4M3e868FdmD4QRiKuhOXZL7rUkSi6Bb0LJXxrAJJ4Zb-E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely loved the experience. Nell's custom cocktails were spot on! Emily was a great server. We loved the whole thing from crawling in all the way to the silent movies and just relaxing. Way to go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD8C_Ectda2X4ax8oALDNeZ\u0026fid=0x0:0x186953e47e22068f"],"When":"2026-1-27"},{"Name":"Sharron R.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjRbFvi0QgyA9Le7UxpskTaTTBT7HQ_jtDgJQ5u-DhYgQfylyd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You've gotta check out Nell the bartender at the Locke speakeasy; they're seriously the best! Seriously, the drinks they whip up are works of art, and Nell's personality makes the whole experience even better. They have this amazing knack for making everyone feel like a VIP. You can tell they genuinely love what they do, and it shows in every cocktail they serve. Honestly, I could just sit there all night watching them work their magic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCUoFk2q1YRID5_v3ywX8hK\u0026fid=0x0:0x186953e47e22068f"],"When":"2025-12-16"},{"Name":"Tish B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKsexShmv0pBh5MBQLxpWKQzIEXty24pcJ70CHesg64vGIszg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a fun vibe! Great little puzzle upon entering the venue! Nell, the mixologist, is amazing! Her choice of cocktail was amazing. Spooky vibes for All Hallow‚Äôs Eve! Would definitely visit again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhALdil7GiXW44OFSpFsy1Dg\u0026fid=0x0:0x186953e47e22068f"],"When":"2025-10-28"},{"Name":"Haley Briand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPlyOygNt97dPGuSk3mcf4SbixS829Y4JlkFgAl3ZGaKmtQtEF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"super fun bar to find, you need a reservation for the speakeasy so i recommend booking in advance but it was super fun to find the password and crawl through the wall. it‚Äôs a minimum 2 drink purchase to enter but it‚Äôs literally the best drinks i‚Äôve ever had in my life. super cool for your second drink they customize it to you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCB9mgCwGN8wPWogPPPqtF_\u0026fid=0x0:0x186953e47e22068f"],"When":"2026-1-8"},{"Name":"Camilo Arenivar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUL0Q-fKS6Y9uQOJW2MHHW1ry2qfbVA_0i3cxPnQzmvHfGfPQmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an amazing experience! Maybe because we had tthe VIP experience but Nell made us the most amazing drinks base off just a few informational items. Definitely make a reservation to get on here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBZsfROTiu0jKjZ64821GIG\u0026fid=0x0:0x186953e47e22068f"],"When":"2025-12-30"},{"Name":"Satyam Rawalji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKczetTA6oaVBW6yyROinSgiWfBFs9dqydwXQlQm86aHrCmRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Having a puzzle element to enter this bar was already a cool concept, but the drinks were well worth the effort. Nell was an absolute blast as a bartender, and the drinks she made were the best I had in Vegas over a 4 day trip. 5 stars, would absolutely recommend anyone who has the time and loves cocktails to pay a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCiEZ9mFDnPgzBWmvkXe5Ft\u0026fid=0x0:0x186953e47e22068f"],"When":"2025-11-17"},{"Name":"Amanda Kopydlowski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpR7p-UGv8NtAr0Q4DiaazSLd4FI9FB_ttAjmQ1CmTNOvrwkLe=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nell is an amazing mixologist, and Emilee supports in a way that is perceptive and creative. They created custom hand crafted cocktails that perfectly encompassed everything I expressed, and even some things I didn‚Äôt (glitter + scotch + toasted marshmallows + christmassy gingerbread?! Yes, please). Our experience at The Lock exceeded our high expectations - do yourself a favor and prioritize an evening at this speakeasy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAaQqyAeMSWp-cCl5zFnr9k\u0026fid=0x0:0x186953e47e22068f"],"When":"2025-12-16"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Carla Howe Ruffo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRgBQ6d-1VJ39chmJrbOMwkYekeY_xq_9uW9fj6NwI3Oq9vmLXWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The 2-for-1 signature cocktails during happy hour are hard to beat! Basically two unique cocktails for $26. They offered variety of liquors and flavors--and the combinations were so interesting. I had a strawberry martini with a touch of balsamic vinegar making it sweet with a touch of savory. The group I was with each ordered something different from the menu and the flavors and presentation were wonderful!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEP3GhoHH6_3-WQ&fid=0x0:0x89100ab78ee5b61"],"When":"2025-5-27"},{"Name":"Steve Nardini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUV-0qbywNCB8UzXI-HroSBsDvlRpYwUYdwjA3cif4sGB2U7Fwiww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Favorite place to meet up, grab a drink, and enjoy time with friends. Pablo, Leo and Sandy are the best!!!! They're friendly, attentive, and make some great drinks. I don't know what's going to happen with it during the The Cromwell's changeover to the Vanderpump hotel, but I hope any change is for the better.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maksym Skorubski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURBDX0m1-7wkj8ueswn9Mz41g_USQH0dSDgvxMtZQ6kq6rU-9a=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The most creative cocktail bar on the strip. Ask for anything and they will make it. I am on a keto diet and the bartender made the most delicious strawberry keto cocktail. Bartenders here are so creative. Sandy is the best!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAaZWJZhXrG84Q9P7T_JaJV&fid=0x0:0x89100ab78ee5b61"],"When":"2025-8-3"},{"Name":"Theresa Cannon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIngAEdKO0mLRJtmSVjDwkAoLQNFtOjy2SUe0GCIajKLsKj7w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a petite lounge meant for the grown and sexy, not for the children. In thirty years of drinking classic drinks I was beyond pleased with ours. I had a Dirty Blonde ‚Ä¶ wonderful. Curled up in the lounge chair and had Whisky Sour.  Hubby had Old fashion ‚Ä¶ ‚Äúgood stiff drink‚Äù.  Lovely mature atmosphere.  ~$23 per drink love they will make whatever drink you name; mine were not on menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICTxfqIkwE&fid=0x0:0x89100ab78ee5b61"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"Adam Reid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUL3TYb_HOjjsq4Y_oMEpL1mtMSbufZ6E4_8-Fst0DYDExGZpW3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dynamite cocktails! Friendly and helpful staff that show a love for the craft. Flavor are creative and unique. Priceless are typical for cocktails on the strip, not cheap, but at least in this case they feel worth it. Atmosphere is cozy, classy and cool.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICkmMOc1wE&fid=0x0:0x89100ab78ee5b61"],"When":"2019-5-29"},{"Name":"Amanda Colesworthy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVL180vvtKvt2e4GFGCCQE6PLk243zRtjD8N-CGreoHhZyxCLs4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent cocktails! Nice quiet atmosphere. Enjoyed playing video poker as well. I would come back here to gamble and drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID14-XAAg&fid=0x0:0x89100ab78ee5b61"],"When":"2024-1-9"},{"Name":"Michele Pellizzon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGcxVKSfRvVk--CDvScXezYWjLLs2SlJVQuUiUYWy-7Vwgk3lF2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great dueling piano. The duo is a lot of fun and play all kind of genre  room for dancing as well. Server is fast to bring drinks.
We did not eat there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDdqZDVhwE&fid=0x0:0x89100ab78ee5b61"],"When":"2024-2-24"},{"Name":"Josh Wolfrum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTJtQD5tginH7eAEsOI6m3tT7gAEkRO5937NeINZLpg0DCbUnJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"There was nobody seating guests like a proper cocktail lounge. I went to the bar to order a drink, and the bartenders were arguing over who would serve me. Initially I thought it was because they WANTED to, but I quickly learned they were too overworked to take my order. I ordered an old fashioned that was made incredibly weak with a few spins of a circular cube, as if I wouldn‚Äôt recognize the lack of alcohol. I tipped $3 and grabbed a seat only to be chastised by the server that I was in a reserved area. THEN ACT LIKE A SERVER AND TELL ME WHERE TO SIT.  This is not a complicated issue. Stop yelling at your patrons for your lack of direction.

After finishing my drink, I waited around for over 30 min for a server to stop by for another.  Nothing. I left. What a waste of time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDXlrObOQ&fid=0x0:0x89100ab78ee5b61"],"When":"2024-10-27"}]

[{"Name":"paige perreault","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsbRWVTRko0rw0cabt2U5DfOK9BYg2NrgxEELD2Qg9dqdceA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everyone here is super friendly! Bartender and hosts were very attentive and the drinks were great. Dancers were very kind and not too pushy. All around was a fun atmosphere. Will definitely be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Olivia Hager","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuaHJX-uSxCEX_59AT3ERnEE5l1nWfliiaUFdyV3EVipSyX7A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This might be my new favorite strip club‚Ä¶!!! We had a group out for a girls night and decided to pop into a new spot. Honey‚Äôs did not disappoint! We met Paul after finding a table, who, by the way, was VERY sweet and made sure that we all had a great time. A+ with the staff and management. We‚Äôll definitely be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ice Ice Baby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIES40tn8dEdq2Cvol5DPp4tEcJoVhUoG-UmgmR_e9XAxZCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best experience of my life! Driver came to our hotel to get me and the boys for our bachelor party. From the front door to VIP hands down best experience I‚Äôve had. Lots of beautiful girls in this club!!!!!! Did not disappoint!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Angelica Flores","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWa-BkS9sWscnrh5mmR3RuPp89MkhF7bXS4sjESGXuk9LxVe61u=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Sunday night I came in here, Ashley was our bartender, she got our drink order wrong the first 2 times all we asked for was a shot of casamigos repo. Then we wanted a third shot and she wasn‚Äôt even paying attention. Mind you we were her only 2 customers at the bar, then she said she couldn‚Äôt hear. I was very upset because Courtnee usually takes care of us and the service we were getting from Ashley was so bad, especially us being her only 2 customers. And not to mention we were giving her $20 tips each time because we work in the industry. Literally the worst service ever. I do not recommend Ashley‚Äôs service. The worst","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Josh Yates","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX210nzvoN8lbeC1ThsMGpOqT7d53FynzMtL3nhP6AXNJSMX9Z7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Absolutely the worst club I've ever been to, after a dancer coerced me into VIP, the waitress comes over and said there's a $45 room fee charge on top of the $300 I just spent and took my credit card and drivers license and never brought it back and said she gave it back. The manager didn't do anything about it so I had to go call my bank and cancel my card and jump thru hoops to issue a new drivers license which I'll be waiting for for a month. Never go to Honeys, super terrible place, yuck, nothing but scammers and thieves there. There are much better clubs in Vegas","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Penny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYT3wabjr32q5ugK3CC0yZsbjaGwoSPS4KQdvMJ1EP7oseIw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Husband and I had a great time. The hosts were pleasant, waitresses were friendly, and the girls were beautiful. We will be back here soon, too much fun.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Larry James","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_hau7JFkfRtvCRkkXh5Pnfi5Wr4ZAexMY8Bwq5eg6NXJw2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Absolutely the worst club I‚Äôve been to in Vegas ! The management alllows the staff to steal your money and is aware that customers drinks are getting drugged ! They have horrible customer service and won‚Äôt think twice about ripping you off! Stay away from here there are plenty other clubs in Vegas that I frequently go to and have an amazing time when I‚Äôm in Vegas !
This was the worst experience I‚Äôve ever had while in Vegas #lasvegasstripclubs","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thomas G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTOhzzh9uou-cqykvgG5AVFmX9nC1Wr1nSVOEGzgg5qITERg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"‚ö†Ô∏è WARNING: Spiked with pills / date-rape drugs / KO drops

Title: Dangerous and dishonest practices ‚Äî avoid at all costs!

We were five people in this club and ordered five bottles of champagne, ready to celebrate. Shortly after the dancers arrived at our table, one of the women, without my consent, put a small orange pill directly into my mouth. I noticed it immediately, spat it out, and confronted her.

I reported the incident to the management and the security staff. They assured me that the full amount for the bottles would be refunded. We left the club immediately without drinking anything. My contact details were taken, and I was promised a follow-up. The next day, I reached out again to ask about the refund ‚Äî but to this day, no response at all. I also wrote to both the doorman and the manager, who had given me their numbers.

This was not only dishonest, but also dangerous. There is a real risk that guests here are deliberately drugged or manipulated. I strongly warn everyone to stay away from this place and to be extremely cautious. Do not accept drinks, food, or pills from anyone, and always look out for your group.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32: [{"Name":"OPEN247 DAYSAWEEK","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbLBqVvHpFX5fDeTQP1gTJZJYZune4V4nttRhFrrvFen66F1s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is one of the best places you can be in if you enjoy talking about music, books, fandom, horror or anything to do with movies and more. The bartenders are the best and the people that you meet will make long-lasting memories. One of the best bars I have been to in a long time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAttFLM0F7-biEwI1hFS4di\u0026fid=0x0:0xd1a4683729ebff8f"],"When":"2026-1-11"},{"Name":"Area Man","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKCLBZ6DjsnlaoKnacF8oS5bsGNgdtops4_pURSuKvb8DbzRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came out for the Fallout Fan Celebration this past weekend, and found the staff helpful, Friendly and good at making the fun themed cocktails for the pre party. They even had grab bags in the vending machine and the staff all had Vault Suits. Super fun! I hope they do another one next year!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDu8oLgMfKDGIafDOxrquSI\u0026fid=0x0:0xd1a4683729ebff8f"],"When":"2025-11-18"},{"Name":"B D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8_Qy36lCC_pqICyEWiqTUnFjaKzmdibmrgER666dSIuo-MQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My partner and I are relatively new to Vegas. As an avid cosplayer, I was incredibly excited about this bar when we first moved here. We've been to Millenium quite a few times and have had a lot of fun!! The staff are great, the drinks are yummy, and the environment is usually wonderful. We particularly like the guy with the beard (his name escapes me, but he's really friendly).\n\nI also understand that Halloween is one of the busiest nights of the year for this bar in particular. During our recent visit on Halloween night, we experienced blatant antisemitism, harmful stereotyping, and general hatred from another patron. The response we received from the manager, Alex, was disappointing. We like Alex. Alex is a cool guy and we recognize he was overwhelmed one of the busiest nights of the year. We also understand that the bar is not responsible for how their patrons decide to dress or conduct themselves. Still, we would appreciate a stronger effort to address and prevent racism, antisemitism, and other forms of hate going forward. Cosplay is fun and expressive, but it's not fun anymore when it harms or targets others. We love Millenium Fandom and we would really like to come back, but we are very disappointed about what happened tonight. We hope this can be addressed to ensure a safe and comfortable environment for everyone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ali","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW41TPpegBP7_wTuhAgT_Q2LlUs8-f4vpuTGCdezGoBE0DkuU4q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for a Halloween Fashion Show. The place was amazing! So much to see! Drinks were reasonably priced and staff was super friendly. Had an amazing time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAwNYVWCSdk8gKkQ0lxEU8N\u0026fid=0x0:0xd1a4683729ebff8f"],"When":"2025-11-1"},{"Name":"Chris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6v91QZ5HQ4dbdkMqWlUzqsDJGunE75TuhP9-Gk4G9ScNtgpfW=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honestly I don't have enough great things to say about this place. I'm in Vegas just for Thanksgivings and as someone who never goes to bars I decided to give it a shot and genuinely, I am so glad I chose this bar to be my first. I don't very often find myself socializing with strangers, but I felt very comfortable to do so here. The bartenders were so sweet checking if I was okay every so often and the drinks were also really good (try the \"Harder Daddy\" at your own risk I had like 3 of them). The owner Alex is a very, very charismatic man and I had great conversations with him. He made me feel so at ease and I found myself opening up and talking to the people around me. I left that place with a full heart and a full soul. I am sad this bar won't be there when I go back to San Jose, but I am happier I even found it to begin with. If you want a place with good drinks, good vibes, and real people check this place out you won't regret it :D","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lexa Rivera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvdq6eqJLqBJ4CrklSbisUwQ1G3O4iltKwo4jw224swF6xRd_E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I saw this on the map while navigating to the Neon Museum and curiosity won out. I'm so glad it did. Literally the most awesome small venue I've ever been in. The memorabilia decor is so well done, the staff are amazing, and the menu is fun. The themed drinks are so creative and you've got to try your luck at a D20 shot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIiG-qMQ87bW4By3_jLToM1bnFZuywnlA6ouOLsnsAotVx-oEdfg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow what a cool bar. All of my favorite things are here. The bartender, Jake, was amazing. Not only was he great to talk to but his skills at making drinks were too notch. I wish I had one of these in San Diego. The vibe was cool. The people were amazing. The drinks were well priced and I had a blast.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"abeness88","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0P1V49Vm9pO5JQR44GL0dZeVNa_asOt_ougjVfoP8wEfSn_s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Place is cool. People are really nice. The parking is hard to find. Had to park across the street down a few blocks. Drinks are well priced. Can see movies on specific days of the week. Cool spot for sure with lots of character.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32: [{"Name":"Kat L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWn2nOPTD1ALohpfmPTiq7-EfEhMSVpVTAI-A3_NGBaX_EnwLAZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ghost Donkey is a fun, tucked-away speakeasy with an impressive variety of nachos and creative drinks. I especially loved their take on a Nespresso martini‚Äîrich layers of cinnamon foam, perfectly chilled, with aromatic coffee and a light smoky mezcal note. I don‚Äôt even like mezcal, but they balanced it beautifully. The lounge area was surprisingly spacious and relaxing, perfect for a small group of 2‚Äì4 people. A great spot to unwind with flavorful bites and inventive cocktails. Minus 1 star as the nachos would have been more balanced with some sour cream. I was hoping for a bit more variety of food options. Cheers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAYQVy7Z6O1rhYfnjmMbyYG\u0026fid=0x0:0x93f41f14612d615a"],"When":"2025-11-29"},{"Name":"Katherine He","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrABQ8O2YvDjM_qfxWX0pX8bqIFK5ofdr4H1U44qLgfJJujXIx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The space is cute and has a fun vibe, but they were really short-staffed during our visit, which led to a longer wait just to order. They were also missing a few ingredients, so the drink we ordered didn‚Äôt match what was listed on the menu. To be fair, the bartender was incredibly friendly and clearly doing his best while juggling everything on his own. We just had one drink and left since he was swamped, but the service attitude itself was great, just not the best timing to visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBjda0rl9OMIErsjIq-9fzG\u0026fid=0x0:0x93f41f14612d615a"],"When":"2025-10-25"},{"Name":"Marie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8ZbQXVbrcEqgoH2bbPr2nVgYkiSzW7T9iIvg-iGNz4uSdn2s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love this tequila and mezcal bar. Small and fun. Feels tiny for vegas but always full! I noticed this time visiting the little donkeys in the drinks have been scaled back and the drinks and coking from pre-mixed bottles and servers are really just more adding garnish these days but still ‚Ä¶ I do like it. Try the nachos!! Beware‚Ä¶the drinks in here are strong!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB_0Ki-elGD7u7s8s3kVq9K\u0026fid=0x0:0x93f41f14612d615a"],"When":"2025-10-26"},{"Name":"My Hoa N.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUm-CsGNBzvaQE5Sx2gcDre0ovoguRdjkc7ZJhE0R9mXCrXta8FfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Small venue, but decent tequila \u0026 mezcal options. The Watermelon vida loca was quite refreshing. And the Burro Tropical comes with a miniature donkey. fun place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBZuIzVA4WGIUCC0E2MaEHf\u0026fid=0x0:0x93f41f14612d615a"],"When":"2025-7-28"},{"Name":"Carrie Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDNGRc-3yhG6TVvOEZ-0tFzs0AcudPm6Fj-E4U57__T6g40FGKoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is a small bar, even smaller than Ski Lodge, tucked away in a food court ‚Äî a fun little find. They offer a selection of drinks and light food options. Cocktails are $20+ each, which is pretty standard for similar spots, though still overpriced for what you get. The staff was friendly, but the drinks were just okay. It was worth checking out once.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBme5EO7yk7NUmso2Tv1eom\u0026fid=0x0:0x93f41f14612d615a"],"When":"2025-7-28"},{"Name":"Tejas Vernekar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMvQtOfO8RL-yT9Vs8VO7aq39UDfYYB-gOnkzqqy4FsXfFwq1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visit every time when I am in Vegas. They serve amazing cocktails and nachos. Mole chicken nachos is my favorite and out of this world. The espresso martini and the donkey drink is amazing. The bartenders are super friendly. One of the hidden cocktail bars in Vegas. Small place but easy to find a seat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDfwr2BxwE\u0026fid=0x0:0x93f41f14612d615a"],"When":"2025-1-5"},{"Name":"Brittany Larkins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgf6Fc3-kDK2oRhK3IsiCVfPHN1PElpDJosW7C6jBdaNXiyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I truly wanted to love this bar so much purely based on my love for a good speakeasy, the decor being perfectly on theme, and the cosmopolitan being the best. Me and my husband were able to walk up for bar seats on a Thursday evening around 8pm which was amazing. Unfortunately we are just not the biggest fans of Tequila and Mezcal so we are torn on this. The drink combinations were exciting but not for us. They had a huge selection of top shelf tequilas \u0026 mezcals. I would definitely recommend this cool spot if you‚Äôre a big Tequila drinker.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDgxbuTxQE\u0026fid=0x0:0x93f41f14612d615a"],"When":"2025-2-26"},{"Name":"Emma Kruse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1mRBAdLrwZ-XzV9d_d40KjCSDIkWHmhLNlyGP3aZhgFKiX4zt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were celebrating my 21st birthday in Vegas and I had heard of this adorable little spot, and had to check it out. It did not disappoint!! Our server was so incredibly sweet and our drinks and food were amazing!! A small, adorable little place for those who appreciate tequila and a not-too crazy environment:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC1zr6kbw\u0026fid=0x0:0x93f41f14612d615a"],"When":"2023-12-29"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Dwight Calwhite","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVb8aJyp7n3B4rLpiDdzq_h_Zj9xb3itJNkyvovcqeg3aEPfHQLLw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Flight Club Las Vegas is a blast. Located inside the Grand Canal Shoppes at The Venetian, it turns classic darts into a fun, high-tech group experience with automatic scoring and private booths.

The decor is playful and stylish, the games are easy for beginners, and the food and craft cocktails are surprisingly good for a game-focused spot. Perfect for friends, dates, or group outings. Definitely recommend booking ahead.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB5Qpkc5bCxb4QJVjwgbbYK&fid=0x0:0x74e6a646b5503286"],"When":"2026-1-10"},{"Name":"Elizabeth Fitzgerald","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8idw-Wek_kbiJycPM2Zh6HCfQXdkge7yKMCbWmoLKHItUv638eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Saw this place online and thought it looked cute. It was a bit difficult to find since it‚Äôs on the top floor. I ordered the Field Forever, which was tasty. Our bartender was friendly enough and pretty quick. My only real complaint was that the bar had a weird smell‚Äîkind of like a dive bar‚Äîwhich was a bit off-putting. The aesthetics are nice, and the bathrooms were clean. While the drink was good, I wouldn‚Äôt necessarily go out of my way to come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBy4xUmDB5CbRik1IgWopMv&fid=0x0:0x74e6a646b5503286"],"When":"2026-1-16"},{"Name":"Xena Motes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLqe9sGGR3aIBGcZaZvG8wu6XU6LrfYwmJhJrLeS-IRwux95uV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing place to go with family and friends. Edwin did a great job with service and we will be back. Also, the variety of games you can play while eating great food is the true VEGAS touch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBtW16b2GBz0Fc0hKtGN0CQ&fid=0x0:0x74e6a646b5503286"],"When":"2026-2-1"},{"Name":"Chelsea Chavez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3vImJUvT_tFOj40ufxAK5AOJKBBnsbEhYtIWV-xPSLTyyvBty=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We hosted our company holiday party at Flight Club and had the BEST time! The atmosphere was upbeat and the darts made for such a fun and interactive experience ‚Äî truly perfect for a group event. The food was fabulous, and Toni, our server, was incredible! She kept everything running smoothly and made sure we were always taken care of. A blast was had by all! Highly recommend Flight Club for any celebration or team outing! üéØ‚ú®","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC-5MGUH7V3KtZQqvIWKoJs&fid=0x0:0x74e6a646b5503286"],"When":"2025-12-6"},{"Name":"Nomad 1","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrOsHFwqwix-84u4dH2HAI82R2mtAkW3WxsmwoCN-mmMqRHa8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a fantastic surprise! We celebrated a birthday here and had a ridiculously good time.

We hit the dartboards, and the best part? No math required! The electronic scoring kept things easy, so all we had to focus on was beating our friends.

Kelly and Casey were our incredible servers, practically reading our minds to keep the drinks and food coming. It's the perfect spot for a fun, casual night out on the Vegas Strip.

You can park in the Palazzo garage with locals getting 3 hours of free parking‚Ä¶otherwise it is $23.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBrOvVZYZXC_2JyXBTF4LRM&fid=0x0:0x74e6a646b5503286"],"When":"2025-9-16"},{"Name":"Tuane Quintella","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeV-ov_jlMiLrE7SZu-P0sl9SjJV6VmVzwnNGl5K5buLF7nrvKdg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This bar is great! The darts system is super fun, there's several game modes and it keeps track of the scores, leaderboard, etc, and it shoots super fun videos and photos of the winning shots. The playlist/mix at the bar was great too, we were not even drinking and we were dancing in between our plays cause the music was so good. The mocktail I had was pretty good and service was very friendly. Definitely a fun night, I'd love to go back again when I can actually drink :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adam Green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_ue4s4KgqypM9c28u_0fyAyYWSHO4EybfkBhcAAJXqsxJHg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A really fun place to hang out.  My sister and I visited on our last Vegas trip and really enjoyed it.  the staff was friendly and fast.  the drinks were great and all the different games you could play with the darts were great.  we were bother exhausted by the time we made it there for our scheduled time after walking up and down the strip in the heat all day but even then it was still great.  we plan to go again on our next trip and bring some friends.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sara Gonzalez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwpgzQElkBw_3Kt01e1JQIp-iwEZX1gUi5W1I16thgcTO4pg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our company hosted a large event here and the staff was incredible. Food was absolutely amazing, service was top notch, they anticipated what we needed before we even knew we needed it.
Highly recommend, and we will be back the next time RE+ is hosted in Vegas!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCtXqdPBPcLMtPFE5Dsf2lh&fid=0x0:0x74e6a646b5503286"],"When":"2025-9-11"}]

column18: Relaxed stop for bacon-wrapped dogs & fries loaded with toppings, plus other deep-fried fare.
