column32:
[{"Name":"Samantha Wolfe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNR_L75clj4FiPP4ViT4RbNOLgwbAXjyRm5pOaAWQq9YRwQfWy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're on the Strip and in the mood for bucket drinks and greasy in the best way food, Dirt Dog Bar absolutely understands the assignment.

We stopped in and tried several of the bucket drinks (because when in Vegas... obviously), and they were fun, strong, and exactly what you want when you're committing to novelty sized cocktails.

We also grabbed a dirty chili dog, and honestly? It was delicious. Messy, flavorful, and perfectly salty exactly the kind of food you need to balance out those drinks. This is not fine dining, and it's not trying to be. It's comfort food meant to soak up alcohol, and it does that job very well.

The location is super convenient right behind Ole Red in the walkable shops. There's bar seating both outside and inside a small building, and ordering is easy: you grab drinks at the bar and order food from the kitchen tucked just behind the bar area.

Bonus highlight: Ryan had to grab a photo with Snoop, because obviously you don't skip that moment when it presents itself.

Dirt Dog Bar is fun, casual, and exactly what you want when you're already in Vegas mode. Great drinks, solid food, easy location, and zero pretension.

Perfect stop when you're ordering bucket drinks and need something greasy, satisfying, and reliable to go with them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBlbg56_yXhkwMy2dxK6BoL&fid=0x0:0x5d9924400e73cc38"],"When":"2026-1-25"},{"Name":"Tierra Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaL05CuvoJGrR9HlY6okbuxcP1u4527UzIeBNBY8h8hJuYc7fp0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Let me say I came alllll the way from Indianapolis to try this place !   Service !!!! Is 100% everything I needed.
Joana (Jo) I truly thank you for such great hospitality and joy you brung to me and my family . You are truly a breath of fresh air!
The wait time was not long at all for my food to come: it was so hot and fresh and just so good. The cup of corn was Amazing and the cheesesteak hot dog was so good !!!!

Every where in Vegas is so expensive for their drinks but my well drink was not bad at all. I‚Äôll definitely be back to try more","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAGnvCFyMRHaSBAnUgJEdfs&fid=0x0:0x5d9924400e73cc38"],"When":"2025-11-10"},{"Name":"Charlie From The UK","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCS7LYnmzO4hcmJzv0Ercj-6wwUxf_8Oh8WpvtYH0RBtZTez3P=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was absolutely amazing, Jordan was such a good bartender! Soo pleasant and lovely. We had an incredible time, and will definitely be back again. I","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBFGhK6PuXVfD2XhonVlWgx&fid=0x0:0x5d9924400e73cc38"],"When":"2025-11-4"},{"Name":"Jesse Adam Martinez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUz3HA2IbgB8oSnlswINJnMC_SMjZnLDGvWIBzwIoCuGPy0O3_NPw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stayed at Paris and wanted to try this spot because of the reviews and distance from my spot. It was an excellent choice.

I got the DUI Dog and it was arguably the best hot dog I've ever had. I never would have put that combo together but it all worked and it didn't mask the hot dog. Well done.

Now, I will say the garlic fries were super garlicy. Probably a bit too much. Would have been great to have an option for just regular fries.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCBjVwqyP5USqJ-nWJnEX_3&fid=0x0:0x5d9924400e73cc38"],"When":"2025-10-29"},{"Name":"Dominic Lucchi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIHX_gQmK1BIS6rY8zkMbQrJvT6IBWFlrJ1OKnaHMo1hpLa_w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jordan made the entire dining and eating experience a breeze. She welcomed me and my coworker with an enormous smile and helped navigate use through the well thought out menu. I got the Hot Hot Dog which was a refreshing take on a hot dog with the inclusion of Birria. I also got one vodka shot which paired nicely and prepared me to take on the conference!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCREXTAPuY5oOYjYgSt77Pi&fid=0x0:0x5d9924400e73cc38"],"When":"2025-12-10"},{"Name":"H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL64eGjMbtn_4v_3QwUxXvuWpSVh7F5zOQBPx1E2q12yv9shw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Elote dog and garlic fries to die for. Jordan was awesome and kept it real with recommendations for taste and fiscal responsibility. 10/10. Would absolutely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBtv6IOIZhxtEdfNDYmCK7N&fid=0x0:0x5d9924400e73cc38"],"When":"2025-12-10"},{"Name":"Leanna Rudert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk639HMPg9uSa9nI2fpmQgiYgSnMoxZVHftFecUFMoehjJ8qd5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered the birria tacos and DUI dog for lunch.....then hung around the side bar with Jordan.    Ordered the December drink special "Slutty Santa"üéÖ .   Jordan was a whole vibe and made the experience of a slow Wednesday afternoon better. We will definitely be back!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDpXUkFAwKno7UKa4Au6Gdi&fid=0x0:0x5d9924400e73cc38"],"When":"2025-12-3"},{"Name":"chris walden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyRjsIXuFx1uXfMLGt6bhUDqxvxRYys8fUTbYeoKJ4zBWLYO5A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My bartender, Jordan was very nice & professional. I appreciated that a lot especially on my birthday. I was full! I will come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA1kHU0nxBFiOR2VV0EXiL1&fid=0x0:0x5d9924400e73cc38"],"When":"2025-12-29"}]

Wir wurden begr√º√üt bekamen die Zimmerkarten und das wars!! Die Lifeguards am Pool sind sehr unfreundlich, sobald man die Liege wegen dem Schatten etwas nach links oder rechts verschiebt, wird man direkt drauf hingewiesen (sehr unfreundlich) dann man die Liege dahin zur√ºck schiebt wo Sie stand! Man m√ºsste Sie nicht verschieben wenn es mehr als 20 Schirme geben w√ºrde !!! Also von einem 5 Sterne Hotel erwarte ich ein bisschen mehr Service als den vor Ort.
Auf dem Zimmer liegt ein Schild man soll sorgf√§ltig mit den Ressourcen umgehen da es ein Nachhaltiges Hotel ist, dies kann ich leider nicht best√§tigen. Wir haben unsere Handt√ºcher abends auf gehangen zum trocknen damit man Sie wieder verwenden kann und was bekam man, einmal komplett neue Handt√ºcher, man bekam auch jeden Tag nein Duschgeltuben und Shampootuben obwohl man die alten nicht nicht mal komplett verwendet hatte wurden diese entsorgt. Dies hat f√ºr mich leider keine Nachhaltigkeit!!
Das Bad wurde auch nicht anst√§ndig geputzt wenn man 2 Tage die Zahnpaste Reste am Waschbeckenrand hat.

Es war eine Erfahrung wert, jedoch auch nur eine!!
Ich kann dieses Hotel nicht weiterempfehlen.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cubanito Hernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJxbfbJ2HFRQ1fATznFaljadHu7jicCKr9f3Y9dEZvUD9PmEPq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Un lugar s√∫per bello el servicio 10 los restaurantes s√∫per","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32: [{"Name":"Kirk Teeters","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKH6SLKjce7F5F2JES-d4URlYKbIsYKZd7ifnqT6qzrlLs2Sg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The drinks are good and at a great price.  The staff is friendly.  Depending where you sit, you may have to put up with people having their picture taken with the two story pole dancer.  I know that someone reading this is wondering.  The two story dancer has red bikini panties on.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC4ypmaag\u0026fid=0x0:0xd843c8965bb7c098"],"When":"2018-8-11"},{"Name":"Daphne Daisy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVP_SotQ2aNpcXenMH8Zc12gBPOPNfI4mDt-m34Inkp3TDMYvrE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Small funky little bear next to the theater.  Drinks were stronger here and cost less so we were real happy to have paid the bar a visit.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gabriella Russo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKCAtUs45_9jpCucWEsLp6TZ3QCVb-VcO_fUcZOShjNL12HOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Attempted to stand in line to get a drink before a show at The V Theater, but the bartender spent 8 mins talking to the same 3 people at the counter like there was no one else in line. Ridiculous. Lost my business and won‚Äôt ever get it again. It‚Äôs not difficult to perform your job and not neglect paying customers. Do better. - No other drinks allowed in the theater btw so thanks for wasting my time (;","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shelly Grenier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJDNMK04tcBEDVaS7iUWavw_p6R-H2YMwuQsJzv-Jt5a42C6MmhA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very small bar, good for sitting and having a drink. Bar staff was fantastic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICkrOrTZA\u0026fid=0x0:0xd843c8965bb7c098"],"When":"2018-11-29"},{"Name":"ItzRealEyez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIezn4QTAP6iKra27-QJ8a0Ox1iqTX2buwUrjhD_pei_JSV9A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The bartender was rude. We asked if their was a menu and was told no but when we turned around seen a menu behind us. Asked for a lime and was given attitude. Horrible service","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Janice Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKN-H4wVjth4Lt8LEMaQxfKV793qx-uzlEj6RBSMBQmKxxCENiBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We were seeing a show at the V theater and they upsold us a drink from the Showgirl Bar. It came with a cheap plastic \"collectors\" cup we had hoped to keep, but did not. The drink was good, but not cheap.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David Schmidt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJixAh-oniXc9KA7LeUDTWsBWeeKNPKQpGOg7c9nb_6gPiBt3aH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This bar is the only place you can get a drink to bring in to the V theater.  Spent 15 minutes in line while the bartender talked to one couple for almost 10.  Then she rushed through a few couples and tried pocketing $5 of our change.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David Oster","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMd309BO4hKKthHn82_HneI5IvizcN_ShAtZy5RqCwxAQUGHoZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Never went inside, but the statue is cool","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID4_quPwgE\u0026fid=0x0:0xd843c8965bb7c098"],"When":"2019-3-15"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Andy Bratz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8XTM5Pw44GCcRHPsXKjDgv7V-wvWJJYyrCQjSW340YdjOylfF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We meet friends here for a laye breakfast and really enjoyed it. Our server was very nice and helpful and the atmosphere is pretty cool, there is one HUGE t.v. and lots of other ones so watching sports here must be pretty cool. I had the blueberry French toast and it was very very good...I usually dont order French toast but this one sounded good and it was. The egg breakfast plates looked really good too. They also have a big bar and it looked like they had lots of selection on tap too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAiNODrWi5xTOXIZtgXR-mI&fid=0x0:0x6c3cb2e5c4f78bd1"],"When":"2026-1-4"},{"Name":"Arthur Mirasol","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnqN-ZbFqcz-lqLyxHju-7BJ4i5V5JSGW16YUjRSgM1_0zm6kQvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The dismissive and unsympathetic attitude we received from the manager given to us locals who dropped 3 bills in this place was unacceptable. The rules for AYCE and AYCD were unclear on the menu and the servers were also unsure. When asked for clarification from management we were met with, "that's not my problem," "it doesn't say it, but I'm telling you the rules now," and "you expected to eat for three hours?"

A little professionalism and even fake empathy in this situation would have gone a long way instead of pointing the finger at the paying customer. Now, "it's not my problem" when I take this place off my list for options for Monday Night Football and tell all my other local buddies to go to one of another dozen places where the manager doesn't have to put the food down from stuffing his face to change one of the channels to the Knights game that is well into the 2nd period.

If you want a better local experience for football, check out the new Sunset Station Sportsbook, Atomic Golf, any of the PKWY Taverns, and Able Baker Brewing.

The food wasn't awful but you have to eat and drink a lot to get your money's worth in the allotted time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhABGORMW7l0MQWhTt9fH8HJ&fid=0x0:0x6c3cb2e5c4f78bd1"],"When":"2025-10-22"},{"Name":"Abby Hehenberger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtF4zn14TzNTVIDuEOIbcvizyknLn5hz5vBCfUwSMFhWhLagzt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for watching football, good happy hour specials, and good breakfast! We went for HH one night and the brat was really disappointing (burned, too much bread, peppers, and mustard, and the pepper ls and onions were basically raw) but the pretzel and beer cheese were amazing, the pork sandwich was great, and the bacon Mac n cheese was good, though there was hardly any bacon in it. We went again for breakfast the next day and the steak and eggs were so good. Perfectly fried eggs, and tasty steak, though a touch overcooked. The brisket skillet was also great. We'll definitely be back for both HH and breakfast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD_B0juyUZTTSYWgwLaXHp6&fid=0x0:0x6c3cb2e5c4f78bd1"],"When":"2025-8-30"},{"Name":"ACM_Nails 8.0","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrPWfHmaS4L_fWhH1-RUn5z_YUEghN1Hbf93CCOwmTm1SYS70a=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place just off the strip. They have a nice little casino and an open air feeling food venue. We had the brisket nachos and although it was not warm it tasted great. Would have been better had it not been cold.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCwq59jNwXJywIrvtZVJXMT&fid=0x0:0x6c3cb2e5c4f78bd1"],"When":"2025-10-1"},{"Name":"Melody Quiros","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqY-9zT6XazlmpWSpjYWVNHcWKABqJOqGf-dNVPIyCrlwJons=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience here especially as a sports bar! We aren‚Äôt into football or gambling, and although it‚Äôs catered to those fans, we still loved it because of the fun vibe, good service and great brews! The white pizza and pork bites come highly recommended by my husband and I. Free 3 hour Nevada locals parking across the street at horseshoe parking","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB_ymGYqcaYlCJHM7-7NVpK&fid=0x0:0x6c3cb2e5c4f78bd1"],"When":"2025-9-8"},{"Name":"Addison Hollen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWExQPBl905noFQsjypFd4h1O_NAh7XQvtqr79DgIEc4l6N7_NzMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very positive experience.  Its cute, like its a restaurant in a yard.  The menu is refreshing, the servers are authentically kind and the vibes are perfect.  I didnt stay at the hotel this restaurant was at, but I'm glad I stopped by.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAr8p8cLCj6f-DZ0VC4Y_qB&fid=0x0:0x6c3cb2e5c4f78bd1"],"When":"2025-9-2"},{"Name":"J P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIWcr27RheEbKpk0pkY6IeW-caVHt_sN7bEahx0P12VT-R-gK0y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Kinda dated deco, had to go through the casino,  got hassled cause my boys were on the floor. HOW am I suppose to get to the restaurant?  Directions and a little help would be nice. Street tacos were dry and chewy. The homies hanging outside shoulda been my first red flag.  Better places to eat.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jenny Felix","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3tC87Thgxwq_C8EYmUBGK5REFVisJqqHBTcd39CAbDCB7rsW2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They serve RAW chicken. Came here on a layover with my crew around 1am since we worked a late flight. It was dark and lit by the giant screen and lights around. Didn‚Äôt notice that chicken was raw until bringing leftovers to hotel. Disgusting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDOkPxJ1gsuvqYGJHZwfEpA&fid=0x0:0x6c3cb2e5c4f78bd1"],"When":"2025-12-30"}]

column32: [{"Name":"Kathy Hatten","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVVw2g3-j4oBE4-B8cVBQgPMS4mfn-fE8cnc9phDkophmewzbJyg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Whenever we come to Vegas, we love to come to Ole Reds. We always get a friendly howdy welcome and love the live entertainment. Today we have downtown Avenue duo and they‚Äôre fantastic.\nTrina was our fabulous waitress. I‚Äôve always wanted to try the fried chicken and waffles  but I couldn‚Äôt handle the spice and Trina had the kitchen cook  it just right for us. It was delicious with my sweet tea. She made our experience great and we didn‚Äôt feel rushed. Stayed for a second set and listened to the lively  music. We will be back again and hope to see Blake one day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCcj9jwh_nGmCuLmtRgydgV\u0026fid=0x0:0xed4193b771d65747"],"When":"2026-1-30"},{"Name":"Sharif Sha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJq2RP_LsCYdwnze-FhrPcRE6i3LyYQPCswgpn4pFlWc82U9jqYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Managed to get seats for my party of 6 at 7pm. Live band was average to above average. Drinks were good. We mostly had cocktails. Ordered wings- great.  Brisket- dry. Sharing platter- meat n ribs were mostly dry. Friendly and efficient service. Great atmosphere for drinks n music.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD8IfOAT3GBHBz0D29n6M9B\u0026fid=0x0:0xed4193b771d65747"],"When":"2026-1-16"},{"Name":"Angela Herrick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUWn7MQ8oC57Ym5kHAdyzvpIz8NgRHfAyHzwSpDxMKKW_BBw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You have to try the Fried Green Tomatoes! They were delicious! My taco salad was okay, my husband got the burger and it was so good!  But the banana pudding‚Ä¶so so good! Great atmosphere.  Our waitress was new, but she did great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCSM_I7m4HmGhvOrFBXLPR-\u0026fid=0x0:0xed4193b771d65747"],"When":"2026-2-9"},{"Name":"Shawn Jessup","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbw6JZ3yL_v90o-HyL8Hk8OvUqBNaSRY33_vcZZDzl5ziQj_d_VQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Theres not a lot of depth to the menu but the BBQ bacon burger was great! The atmosphere has great potential even though the guy singing on the stage when we were there was kind of bland.  He could sing and play the guitar but honestly id rather had them cranking some good country music on the jukebox.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC8dBPW4uI8wAleF2SD1bxe\u0026fid=0x0:0xed4193b771d65747"],"When":"2025-11-16"},{"Name":"Irene Zertuche","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnnJF8zRIGc-Gf9sDV9z4T_vQHGUYuJmvci1aWCHUPf13p9UiDvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place!  Located at Horseshoe right in front of the Bellagio.  Food was great and a big serving! Music was awesome!  Check out their website for a list of artists playing.   Rooftop bar is a must!  Great music and great views!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhALljL7oYyXwCZvAqyZ3RrL\u0026fid=0x0:0xed4193b771d65747"],"When":"2026-1-24"},{"Name":"#GoBirds BIRDSPHAN4LIFE","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKbcVdqBV8flM79eQyX_XdwhijRfQWL7mKEnECAFtcFOfNtabk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for drinks jan 1 6 pm ish got this amazing sidestage table. Stayed for dri ks, dinner, 2 bands.  Great place. Not stuffy at all, not overcrowded as some vegas spots tend to do.  Our wait staff was amazing from the host, waitress, server etc.  Very busy but food came hot, very tasty, drinks were brought back surprisingly quick after ordering fir as busy as it was. Sat bottom floor and after paying bill sort of wandered thru upper floors.  Great spot, great location. Went to place next door for nye amd was sorry we didnt pick ole red.  Well be back for sure. 5 out of 5!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC4NzSiOOzvuE_DSmcNv3E7\u0026fid=0x0:0xed4193b771d65747"],"When":"2026-1-27"},{"Name":"Erin Bithoulkas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHbCWlwgoWuwO6wtbEyg0kYZpUA64cicSMyeGpu7-Xz1cniRlW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tasha was our server and she was wonderful. We ate here for lunch on a Wednesday and had a party of 7, including 2 toddlers (we‚Äôre locals - don‚Äôt @ me). Tasha was so sweet with the kids on top of being a great server. She recommended that we split chicken \u0026 waffles between the kiddos. Great recommendation! We ordered apps and a bunch of entrees and everyone enjoyed their food. Everything was a little pricey but that‚Äôs expected on the strip. The food was hot, fresh, and delicious. The musician who was performing was also wonderful! She did covers of hoobastank, Marcy‚Äôs playground, and other bands instead of all country music. I‚Äôm not a country music girlie, so I was pleasantly surprised by that. Great staff, great food, great views, clean bathrooms‚Ä¶ I have no complaints.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDUcLNXPkiaT6DIleqgBTX1\u0026fid=0x0:0xed4193b771d65747"],"When":"2025-10-8"},{"Name":"Celine LeBlanc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKad6MW2bwGQw8WUnF9uRkaBFAm8qVIow1XZdqOVXRfER9qufkIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"1st time there and enjoyed everything and our waitress Trina was excellent!  While there we listened to Chad Collins. Excellent entertainers!  Thank you for a nice visit for lunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCOoXrkN-otO1YxVriEGPI_\u0026fid=0x0:0xed4193b771d65747"],"When":"2026-1-20"}]

column32: [{"Name":"JM","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWct5uQ2Ryr8A8zF0BJYphXVMMszt2SzX1lkr12HATWwn9uwbrr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Mixed drinks are outrageously priced, even for Vegas, at $25+ each. However, they are SO TASTY. I felt there was an appropriate amount of alcohol in them as well. The Octavious is my favorite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAEoUhJpQE7qQyuxyKX6AHD\u0026fid=0x0:0xe650a98b788eef4d"],"When":"2025-10-26"},{"Name":"Shellie Ferrer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEJ-GGuLcaaYgdDdc6n3gzm55_0kSCdSUC6_DGugVLOa2DUQtu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è\nRichard is the absolute best! I‚Äôve known him for over 15 years, and seeing him behind the bar at Caesars Palace is always one of the highlights of my Vegas trips. He‚Äôs not just a fantastic bartender‚Äîhe‚Äôs the kind of person who makes you feel welcomed, remembered, and genuinely taken care of. His drinks are spot-on, his energy is unmatched, and he always brings a smile to everyone around him. Thank you, Richard, for making every visit special. Vegas wouldn‚Äôt be the same without you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDgeempaOty510RYQDv5bJx\u0026fid=0x0:0xe650a98b788eef4d"],"When":"2025-7-8"},{"Name":"Cindy loos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWixtk8wzDreaS6gYHHDQVby7Mb3mNpgYmTj-tHN-mPrQ0VRTWH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our bartender was the best and so friendly. I don't remember his name but he waited on us from 4pm to 6pm this past Sunday while we waited for the buffet","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Florian Stein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4Un5adQSEUILCdxmrpnlND7SJ7czTZTU3xhzKe3jQk8PsBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The atmosphere is mediocre, two small beers for 25.90 plus taxes and tips, and then they told us we couldn't get a glass of tap water but only bottled water (for ridiculous prices).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC78fzQwgE\u0026fid=0x0:0xe650a98b788eef4d"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"L G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIWZ-5RCzsUBfnUDr6Cbv-QF4BASTghb1K1n7r6RByU_97DD48=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in here around 1am after exploring the strip for hours with my husband. We both loved the atmosphere, the setup of the seating, and the furniture and d√©cor. The drinks were great and our waitress was super friendly. Sat for a couple of hours, had some drinks, chatted and people watched. It was perfect end to our evening. The drinks were a bit expensive, but they all are on the strip.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6ogC4UkJAEbpnBFBPESqQa6zWC8IoxuZMzGqpzZA71VlBSgrT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visited this location a few times while staying at Caesar's. All the bartenders are pretty nice. Some are better at specialty drinks than others (old fashions, whiskey sours, etc.). This bar get pretty busy most nights and there are a lot of working girls that come through. Overall I would come back again but I prefer the restaurant bars for speciality drinks.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alexander Scherry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIP6k3ZUWeVXyKr-WVkZc0blEFoF2EobU4dyRIja1xCOr7CmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Bartender was unnecessarily rude with me over water. I expect more from a place as wonderful as Cesar's. I expected the bartender to help everyone have a good time, making sure everyone is well hydrated so no one has a medical emergency. And the more hydrated people are, the more they can drink, more fun they can have. That is all, better customer service, better etiquette please, look where you work, be better.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mugur Tolea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBB4y6jZmrjPb_sqBSOuGHlakh09Xa8T73TOQadH2tGA2g6mtYPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Today's Monday shift is not properly preparing the drinks - practically no alcohol in cocktails. Management should take a look at this - we had a few cocktails they were all almost virgins. The bartenders are new and they are trying to take advantage of customers. This is not nice to do in Vegas.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"D Rmx","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImSAkVXi5wlx5vPypydpXrv-sITcoj4iRp5bNwnBuyOYrjgg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This past weekend our family did a private mixology class to celebrate a 21st birthday - the class was amazing!  Delicious and unique cocktails waiting when we got there, and the ambiance in the room was a great mix between cozy and classroom.  The instructor Daniel was a wealth of enthusiasm and knowledge and wove information between stories effortlessly.  The second cocktail we made was one we all agreed was one of the tastiest any of us have ever had, and when he realized one person in the group had an allergy to an ingredient he pivoted and she got the same hands on instruction with a special drink just for her.  If we could have stayed longer we would have and we all walked away grinning from ear - with our third drink 'to go' which for how strong the others were in the time, was nice to not feel we had to 'chug'.  This activity was a highlight of a weekend PACKED with special events. I would strongly recommend the class and I would book it again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBc_ChQakEYEvOXnwcKinVv&fid=0x0:0xd076e96fa95dce24"],"When":"2026-1-20"},{"Name":"Bryan Devitt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-DdWygmDZr7czoXFcTe3uhwUV9jAUzAaHPX-U5YoNit3X=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Lock is an amazing speakeasy. The vibe and drinks are great! I 100% recommend coming to this place. Jon out front makes incredible bourbon cocktails. Nell killed it in The Lock with some amazing specialty cocktails catered to our preference cards. She is a wizard with tequila and mezcal! I will definitely come back with as many people as possible to enjoy what this place has to offer!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBcuu7DeJnM00NXgniIZzCm&fid=0x0:0xd076e96fa95dce24"],"When":"2025-12-9"},{"Name":"Vaughn K (destrosdungeon)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7jt6ykO1VbUwja384UtN-4QEVF6HL696qCL6P1jjHhfAQTxiF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Pretty nice drink spot. Has many custom cocktails on the menu. Average price for Vegas watering holes. They do have a cool set of items in cabinets (hence the name) which range from the bizarre to the spooky. Scan a QR code to learn more about them. Only downside..it's location. For a quiet, almost spooky speakeasy style establishment, its location its basically the equivalent of a lower level mall.  Had it been outside or slightly off strip on side road, it would have gotten 5 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB_UCxFcR_tR5RQ2JutYv8J&fid=0x0:0xd076e96fa95dce24"],"When":"2026-2-16"},{"Name":"Grecia Mendiola","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6IlTYi1EfW1eP52drSTNpUDkqJglXGORPOS-uMPpxHpZhdAdDMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a unique and amazing experience! Can‚Äôt wait to be back! We were lucky enough to find the ‚Äúkey to the lock‚Äù since we didn‚Äôt have reservations to access and go through the quest getting the clues to open the final door. Belle and our mixologist were the best! Gave recommendations and took care of us throughout the experience. We truly enjoyed the beverages from their menu and also the once created for us! Super cool atmosphere you won‚Äôt find anywhere else.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBt5eHHE2l54cE_mI2OM-hb&fid=0x0:0xd076e96fa95dce24"],"When":"2025-9-30"},{"Name":"teena logo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFBDjGGd2A6rMSdkRP3mDi7F5_p3m36wrPIxqVwchkEbVGusR6tw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you‚Äôre looking for a hidden gem with an incredible vibe, this speakeasy is it. From the moment you walk in, the atmosphere feels intimate, creative, and just a little mysterious‚Äîin the best way.

What really sets this place apart is their personalized drink experience. The bartenders actually craft a cocktail based on your mood, your preferred style of drink, your favorite destination, and even your zodiac element. It sounds unique, but the results are amazing. Every drink that came out was thoughtful, balanced, and honestly one of the best I‚Äôve ever had.

It‚Äôs the kind of spot where you can relax, enjoy something truly one-of-a-kind, and feel like the drink was made just for you‚Äîbecause it is.

Highly recommend checking it out. It‚Äôs definitely worth the visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAuaL3ZWYjeMkqeN-ggreHO&fid=0x0:0xd076e96fa95dce24"],"When":"2025-12-7"},{"Name":"Allison Nuanes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUx4Uej6xHK4Qg7uJsgBLsVDhUEFA5V0Rt9fyZKvECbo9xUqPs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We loved the atmosphere, amazing drinks, and overall experience at the Lock. We had a reservation so we got to solve the puzzle and sneak discretely into the speakeasy. I highly recommend it! The low light, jazz music, and great drinks are a very nice reprieve from the glitz and overstimulation of much of the strip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDm2zGPOK8uKMMfp4Yx8TDF&fid=0x0:0xd076e96fa95dce24"],"When":"2025-12-7"},{"Name":"Daena Mansapit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjxC-tJNl5-m6fV5ouMXg1tUBNuk3KXCi-WCqecMyl6Xg3PyZljA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The atmosphere was great! The bartenders were so friendly and helpful! They made fun drinks that catered to each of us in our group! There's even a speakeasy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCOjGYRxB-2JTzy_qump3Ke&fid=0x0:0xd076e96fa95dce24"],"When":"2025-10-13"},{"Name":"Mike Laird","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMq86wspRVf37vEPS-xuDDWueu2tMDWabJiqJ-p_pMabPc0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing!!!! Best mixologist in the state of Nevada.  If you want something to dink from your thoughts/likes they got it. Don't hesitate to book early. You won't regret it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDd1susKD0Oy9YOoSfnAdS7&fid=0x0:0xd076e96fa95dce24"],"When":"2025-12-10"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Courtney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9Zqcepb6kMwIeVuldeN_nkC1-3JWHQ-_5sdAjQumhGFY6KA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Only came to meet some other people. Not really my cup of tea but fun atmosphere. The live band had everyone dancing. Bartender did great with the drinks enjoyed the theatrics! It's outside which was nice because the weather was perfect on the night I came. Great to be outdoors.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD3rt0KZiu_qMjuYhdKwvyv&fid=0x0:0xc49c4fedb74bc004"],"When":"2026-2-17"},{"Name":"Sara Decker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQA8vBBKPDV8sn8i60vmWFpLeSItwprXlfXSFXJZU91emiLA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a fun stop.  Great bands!  Heaters by the bar to keep you warm outside!  Must see in Vegas!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC2FqGKQ-Xn4WbtTaJRdSNQ&fid=0x0:0xc49c4fedb74bc004"],"When":"2026-1-28"},{"Name":"Marta Ku≈∫niar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8JC55nwoAxN4ScmWU16dC7Gh9-p4laLN6GsuCPBoBBaVnT8Ws=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is an absolute blast! Carnival Court at Harrah‚Äôs in Las Vegas is one of those spots where you can really feel the true Vegas energy. Amazing atmosphere, fantastic live music, and people who are genuinely having a great time! Huge shoutout to the bartenders ‚Äì their skills were pure magic. That flair bartending show was unforgettable! I highly recommend this spot to anyone looking to experience the real spirit of the city that never sleeps!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEPuFjojT_IK28gE&fid=0x0:0xc49c4fedb74bc004"],"When":"2025-5-19"},{"Name":"Louisa C Zimmerman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGBxIeUJqn3aKyF1H3eP9k9USjAKdGS23rD7pAHumcIQ_T1uCiHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely favorite place in Vegas!! Live bands with great music and even better drinks and bartenders! All of the bartenders are attentive and entertaining and so much fun to meet new awesome people there as well! The people watching is on point! We actually left our credit card there by accident over night and they kept it for us and we got it the next day. Definitely recommend!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDg3oqQdw&fid=0x0:0xc49c4fedb74bc004"],"When":"2025-2-24"},{"Name":"Shelli Pattison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVI0D378rzkl8tnqDUwkZYWfdEkKpOma7FXLEtCnJ0orKK-52SHmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have never heard of this place is was super happy I found it the band was great and loved the drinks. Atmosphere was cool","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAUZUhRkzY5MvjLLANvN_D0&fid=0x0:0xc49c4fedb74bc004"],"When":"2025-7-29"},{"Name":"TomB","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcf3n1qQNsOhLjqz2iyWlDL1zu_SVOzroRykkwZaD26csXqQ6T=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"New Years Eve 2026. The place was so much fun even though it was 40¬∞ and raining. Had a great band playing which was fun for all. Can't with to hit this place again when its warm out.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Natasha P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiGSEYFb7t-M50UGzcZLx083X1sQ9ho5KVGh-C4Wbbfig2JQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Overly priced drinks. Sub standard service.
15 years ago this was the place to be.
Now it's a relic of its former self. Better to shut up shop and start again.
Won't be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBnuT0pGOEYxrg72vxBTYwy&fid=0x0:0xc49c4fedb74bc004"],"When":"2025-10-1"},{"Name":"Dean M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsd4fb7XSxU2g_tEAZPyzmuLM5YGIuqhG--gbituVakHv-gmZf2g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fun place to listen to live music and dance on the strip. No cover and drink prices aren't crazy expensive. Unfortunately, they don't have any NA beer options, but the bartender comped me a couple of small waters.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Kevin Barry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-AStWXde6x7WvLvzgQow9DU6K6YkLzw3zbpPBHsPnh6t3ah8t0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This bar gave us such an enjoyable experience, we went back a further 2 times! I truly think it's worth checking out! When we arrived we were seated right away at the bar even though we didn't have a reservation. As usual, I ordered my favourite drink (Spice Of Love). Our server was fantastic. That unique drink left quite an impression, and I'd definitely urge anyone to give it a try.
Overall, I felt the service was top-notch ambience was great. I'm already looking forward to coming back sometime!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBsWd2GTsuTJD3fjxRc-MQT&fid=0x0:0xc8d3715d39f2f24f"],"When":"2026-1-13"},{"Name":"Collin Wheeler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7JG9X260EUNSIJF5FB1bLQSZBFVeBSub7_dsi58NLdVaV1-RZ8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Such a cool concept. You will legitimately feel like you are inside of a chandelier.

Drinks were great, service  was a little meh, all the servers acted like they‚Äôd rather be somewhere else.

Cool atmosphere though, would definitely go back. Long wait to get in for a seated section,  but standing room was quick.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDDLWpybSIowUoTSxWE_8ub&fid=0x0:0xc8d3715d39f2f24f"],"When":"2026-2-9"},{"Name":"Shawna Nikole","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyFTq0_2P_kJSQVxK76pMENixeuCNY-cNgGMnTtcYWFC57lrI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stopped into The Chandelier Bar by trying the secret ‚Äúflower drink,‚Äù the Verbena. It‚Äôs not on the menu, but well worth asking for. The drink itself wasn‚Äôt the highlight‚Äîthe real experience was the buzz from the flower. After one sip and chewing the flower, my mouth was instantly tingling and alive, creating a fun, strange sensation that enhanced the flavors. It only lasted a couple of minutes, but it made for a memorable and playful experience. Definitely worth trying at least once when you‚Äôre at the Cosmo.

Head to Donkey Bar speakeasy after","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDAhbs6gHzE_7Yj3kOlW7LD&fid=0x0:0xc8d3715d39f2f24f"],"When":"2025-12-16"},{"Name":"Dena Cooper","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJkJD5FObiS8jXqFl9A6G0msM_2P1L4Im7Vve9shqBWBQfHRYN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We met up as a group here to give a toast to my brother before his wedding. They had a nice large area for us to sit and there was no wait. The atmosphere of the Chandelier is gorgeous, adn we enjoyed essentially sitting inside a huge crystal chandelier for a big toast. The drinks were expensive, though no one was surprised given we were in the middle of the Cosmo hotel in Las Vegas. The gorgeous backdrop made a nice ambiance to celebrate the wedding party in style.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBo3rFsYNzzsXNZZ-6Y-fni&fid=0x0:0xc8d3715d39f2f24f"],"When":"2026-2-2"},{"Name":"Bry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXK5J0Y6FkLXzDkTrTATWNbLKWocoQzLIhKatVT2626qMXd6FYK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The atmosphere is the main draw here, but the drinks were also very tasty! Imagine sipping on a lovely bubbly beverage while surrounded by thousands of sparkling gems! The second level was nice and quiet, especially compared to the first floor, which still had a lot of bleed over from the surrounding casino. We will absolutely go again the next time we're in Las Vegas!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB9nMK4kADyRaIXlCR0ZzyT&fid=0x0:0xc8d3715d39f2f24f"],"When":"2025-12-26"},{"Name":"Michelle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLnOdWaosM8z313n9pX1fcjISpxgKFIHZ1eX8V6_LLy0dG-xJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I celebrated our second anniversary by ordering the secret "flower drink", the Verbena, from The Chandelier bar at the Cosmopolitan. This drink isn't listed in the menu but a friend had told us about it beforehand.

We were both surprised by the drink. It didn't taste great but the whole point of it for us was to try the flower. The waitress told us to take a drink, chew on the flower, then take another drink. I ate the entire flower with my first sip and my mouth was buzzing! It was a funny, weird, and interesting sensation. It didn't last long, maybe less than 2 minutes. It did enhance the flavors of the drink and my experience.

Give it a try next time you're there!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDmBYHTGqJJnhz2JkXC_rFC&fid=0x0:0xc8d3715d39f2f24f"],"When":"2025-10-29"},{"Name":"Carol Lauer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpo21EGg9Xk_mh_Cpz_UbXDkp5B_3D-dAGk-PUc8oo-QKmcZ19=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service was quick. The drinks were delicious. The chandelier is beautiful. The only thing I don't like about all vegas casinos is that they allow smoking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCxWP3JydR5q5Of--25sz4C&fid=0x0:0xc8d3715d39f2f24f"],"When":"2026-2-11"},{"Name":"Francky B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJrpT1OkBcOhpt_7xwP7wdPoMjVX3CvWFIB5HodOG5BIToj0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing place! Great cocktails and service. Go to 1.5 (not the ground floor, 1 level up and you'll be surrounded by massive chandeliers). Beautiful!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD_VTMMo_mzPeaiWJe29iqm&fid=0x0:0xc8d3715d39f2f24f"],"When":"2026-2-3"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Roman Petrovskii","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBJtpS3Q9zkPF-BKe8mlLaHoOaAuGl6o60g29pSzstb1Q1PnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"When I stood in front of New York‚ÄìNew York Hotel & Casino üåÉüóΩ‚ú®, it felt like Las Vegas lifted its chin and decided to play Manhattan for a night. The lights burst so brightly you‚Äôd swear someone picked up the whole New York skyline and dropped it right into the desert ‚Äî skyscrapers, bridges, and a glowing Statue of Liberty all blazing with life üî•üèôÔ∏è.

The air is thick and warm, filled with the scent of asphalt, perfume, and the promise of evening adventures üå¨Ô∏èüåå. You can hear slot machines chiming, people laughing, music spilling out of bars and blending with the neon glow of the boulevard üé∞üç∏‚ú®.

The facade of New York‚ÄìNew York looks like a piece of Broadway. Lights blink in rhythm, shadows stretch long, and you half-expect a jazz band from the 1940s to step out from behind a corner üé∑üí´. People walk slowly, soaking in every spark, every sign, every breath of the Vegas night.

Overhead, the Big Apple Coaster slices through the sky like a streak of red fire üé¢üî•, giving the whole place a heartbeat of thrill and movement ‚Äî as if the city itself were alive and teasing you.

Inside the hotel, the casino, bars, and restaurants feel like little neighborhoods of New York. Brooklyn-style alleys, the smell of pizza, laughter, the clink of casino chips ‚Äî it‚Äôs the perfect Vegas cocktail üóΩüçïüé∞‚ú®.

New York‚ÄìNew York is a night that smiles. It‚Äôs Las Vegas pretending to be New York ‚Äî bright, bold, mischievous, and unforgettable ‚ù§Ô∏èüåÉüî•.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA46mOxq902TSqZWt1TAc6d&fid=0x0:0x5f475b0daf276e5a"],"When":"2025-11-30"},{"Name":"James Toomey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKon3jSp9AKZP-a6dF3k3-VMxiZDvrcE9SWPFn1Cphi3MEi5A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome place for you Great time ,adults only! Cold beverages and food and fun!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCFM0pP5QwBkVAsOIR21_jc&fid=0x0:0x5f475b0daf276e5a"],"When":"2025-10-27"},{"Name":"Tommy Kanuch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWGx-O1WfGo-oImZ3twklbhtN330Cn5TGkMx0Jv2yVDTBUxdY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"‚≠ê 1 out of 5 stars
‚ÄúNot What I Expected at All‚Äù

We stopped by Coyote Ugly in Las Vegas thinking it‚Äôd be a fun, high-energy bar with attractive bartenders dancing on the bar ‚Äî you know, the classic Vegas vibe. Couldn‚Äôt have been farther from that.

Instead, it felt more like a tourist trap where they rely on the crowd to make the entertainment. The staff was more focused on calling people up to embarrass themselves than actually putting on any kind of show. We waited, hoping things would pick up, but it never did. The vibe was awkward, the drinks were just okay, and the whole thing felt like a cheap imitation of what you‚Äôd expect from a Vegas bar with this name.

If you‚Äôre hoping for something like the movie or a fun night with real energy and dancing, skip this place and head somewhere else ‚Äî there are way better bars nearby that actually deliver.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica Subia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKyEgJwk0a-mQ7_tNkBv10pFrms07SjNY9bYSA0gTfE_VGZCA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The bar does not stay open until 3am as advertised it closes by 2am. When I talked to the manager Carla about updating the times on their website so people don‚Äôt waste money on a taxi she got very loud and rude and defensive about it. The doorman was also extremely rude and unprofessional. I think if you work in the entertainment and public service industries you should probably have better communication skills and maybe not hate your job. I‚Äôm a local but I will not be going back here and will tell others it‚Äôs not a good experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"K Mestas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKyPnGaf9MepI6_XJCAYFDRYgsybtdeGRGVymMoaLkgT3ob2g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Have been here numerous times and my party of friends usually enjoyed themselves. But, unfortunately, my group of friends who can drink easily at altitude and heavily due to being bartenders in the Rocky Mountains, some of them ended up drugged. They were just fine and then took 1 shot from an UNLABELED Tequila bottle from the bartender and immediately went downhill! Aside from the immediate symptoms, we were charged $50 per shot. Their pupils went black and they showed all symptoms of drugs being in their system. PLEASE be careful when going to this establishment!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rebecca Goode","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBJCA3cyo4TWqr9yE9aJKFcII_4Kewmd9muBZ15D2hZjHMbg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Six friends tried to enter, 2 were permitted, while 2 had tiny pocket knives. They couldn't enter. I had retired military ID with no expiration date, they kept telling me my ID was expired.  Absolutely ridiculous! No wonder there was only 3 people inside. Don't waste your time, nor money there. Go some place else!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cody DiCicco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVd5OsHDXyGAIRAgt_5SWTanbNFD55gxwydFoQ6rrEzmT1quoxr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place was awful. The service was terrible. The place was almost completely empty, went to sit down and was immediately told to stand up or pay to sit in one of 10 empty tables? There was one person on stage with one person dancing on the floor in front of them. Prices are absolutely absurd after already paying to get in. We had one drink, which we downed and left. I would leave 0 stars if I could. Do not waste your time or money here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhClmbMNihL2czEijXNN_JuK&fid=0x0:0x5f475b0daf276e5a"],"When":"2025-10-18"},{"Name":"Neeraj Yadav","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHm0bHPuxrGc4JrNKQFY6EykrMJ373mkNqu3DN3ZCv-e4P1tI8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best spots on the strip to have a good time. Fun games and dancing! Must visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC7rf0G9ZaInqG9qCVWXs1O&fid=0x0:0x5f475b0daf276e5a"],"When":"2025-9-16"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Lucy Sky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLz8SZdbPugvRPE-l2cQ4c2-tmezeF5k0vFQ0cSxdiuiqZPFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Seth the human bartender was much friendlier than the tipsy robot.  The tipsy robot was just distant & cold.  I very much enjoy the human bartender Seth.  He is awesome and AI cannot replace him.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC9UhsddnNj_yi9E-Qh_Bpx&fid=0x0:0x5a9834b6da3c831a"],"When":"2025-10-20"},{"Name":"Kim Chrisman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPLStFl8Cq3FilmfLt-pAx4z0MLankYlM_sHq6_Q5rSBu4iw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Seth was an amazing bartender! Drinks were so good and the robot was delicious!! Top notch!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAabd9RA0GVUCGLnx8pLiFw&fid=0x0:0x5a9834b6da3c831a"],"When":"2026-1-16"},{"Name":"Bradley Mariska","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUK5RUMf3WaxHQiF8NdcUP-lm0QKuKfLQRC5uliyOoZBtllWPHs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a fun novelty shop where a robot literally mixes your drink for you. Take a video and share it on Instagram! The drink I ordered was actually very good, but not really worth with $20 price tag (there‚Äôs a ‚Äúservice fee‚Äù?!), especially since it came from a machine. Atmosphere is a hit lacking since you‚Äôre in a shopping mall and the space is very small. Props to the host who welcomed me warmly and explained how everything worked.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAk8DLXZqElS3zFi7z-_wG1&fid=0x0:0x5a9834b6da3c831a"],"When":"2025-8-16"},{"Name":"JJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlQw5_LpFWskQwUyVd_0i01O--IkGHhMsnhJ07vCVcTiTIv3E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"So cool to watch your drink be made by a robot! We were able to secure a 2 for 1 coupon prior to coming so we did it for a cool novelty. Drink pour was immaculate, had the mix right on - little booze heavy even but I don‚Äôt think many would complain about that. The menu for drinks is massive so you would be hard pressed to not find a drink of your choice that it cannot make!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEIbe6MW_9-zEJg&fid=0x0:0x5a9834b6da3c831a"],"When":"2025-6-11"},{"Name":"Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcXU2UqaMa4S5msFjS0MNiDyJGi7noxcaIKZ96zyUYRrdwc81u=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really cool experience with great tasting drinks. Human staff is very nice! Will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDvEjiHkEHbfqJjlddL-2cu&fid=0x0:0x5a9834b6da3c831a"],"When":"2025-9-11"},{"Name":"sharon lordello","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUW7dIfoNiKpSsdzBO2Li8gGJbgzdKTIxdyUzC84XC7KBI-43Ol=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tipsy Robot ‚Äì A Futuristic Cocktail Experience

I recently visited Tipsy Robot, and it was such a fun and unique experience! The concept of having a robot make your drink is already cool enough, but the execution really lived up to the hype. I ordered a Sex On The Beach, and it was delicious‚Äîsmooth, fruity, and refreshing with a decent kick. I wouldn‚Äôt have minded a slightly stronger pour, but overall, the balance was still great.

Watching the robotic arms mix, shake, and pour the drink right in front of me was a show in itself. It‚Äôs not just about the drink‚Äîit‚Äôs the experience. Everything felt clean, efficient, and surprisingly personal, considering it was made by a machine.

If you‚Äôre looking for something fun, techy, and tasty, Tipsy Robot is definitely worth checking out. I‚Äôd go again for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBMVNcYj1Op4f9sUrscrTaY&fid=0x0:0x5a9834b6da3c831a"],"When":"2025-6-8"},{"Name":"Jazmin J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVaIKnDRaXV9nNwGtF4XmAyKNQ_bAkt-CbVZcmfI5AnWgjAw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This bar is amazing, it has such great vibes. Also so many games you can play with Others! I love coming here on my days off. Also, when I‚Äôm visiting Vegas! Shot are cheap and affordable. Plus so many restaurants around!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tori Ann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoVJLdJjWImaZ_4C3K99BuEiak2Vo_nqqj1JE-nzTVZOdyshzK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a funky place! We had the coupon app so got BOGO offer! Lily was brilliant and really helpful! We had 4 drinks for around $45 so it was defo worth it, plus the robot bar man makes your drink and even shakes it! So cool! Defo worth it! Thanks Lily! üòäüòä","Images":null,"When":""}]

You can't go wrong with the most amazing views of Las Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAFPbKqUbmaOExv7rfF83yJ&fid=0x0:0x91bd5ead52e73143"],"When":"2025-9-28"},{"Name":"Kevin Wilmoth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlAl96kTHRP77EN2J2qUHWSUDOm3Q9fMRvBIpcjSYqWHBWNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic view of the strip. What an amazing place. Very pricey drinks but that‚Äôs to be expected","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDwvkB4AP2Ekkg4tJKc9HCh&fid=0x0:0x91bd5ead52e73143"],"When":"2025-8-11"},{"Name":"Karmaresh Patel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUo0NYsnxWacxzTfrVPnFiI9T5bo1jfMrB8sQMIrvzGiv3m0DSU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing view of Vegas. Live and vivid ambience. Music is awesome. It opens at 9 pm on Wednesdays. Gets crowded around 11. Don‚Äôt go by the timings as available on google. Once they check your identity, they will stamp a logo on your hand. Take the lift and get an amazing view of the city. No food, only drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDT3ueTDg&fid=0x0:0x91bd5ead52e73143"],"When":"2024-5-25"},{"Name":"Buddy Swisshelm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3dzEZGz-okEQoFX99tYR7nReV5iUXvaw-fOuBqvuvPoGjpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"To Whom It May Concern,
Formal Complaint Regarding New Year‚Äôs Eve VIP Experience and Safety Concerns

I am writing to formally express my disappointment and concern regarding our experience at Ghost Bar on New Year‚Äôs Eve.

I purchased VIP tickets for my family specifically so we could enjoy a safe, premium experience and have access to the patio to view the fireworks. The evening began positively, and the service was very good. Unfortunately, as midnight approached, the situation deteriorated rapidly.

When guests began moving toward the patio, only approximately half of the patio was open, which caused severe overcrowding. During this rush, my daughter was pushed and knocked to the ground. My son-in-law and I were also pushed and nearly involved in a physical altercation with an individual who did not have a VIP pass but was attempting to force access onto the patio.

Despite the obvious crowd control and safety issues, security staff did nothing to intervene. When we attempted to explain what had occurred, we were made to feel as though we were the problem rather than victims of an unsafe situation. As a result, we did not see the fireworks we paid to attend and felt unsafe remaining on the premises, so we left.

What should have been a memorable New Year‚Äôs Eve with my family instead became one of the worst New Year‚Äôs experiences we have ever had.

After leaving, we called to file a complaint. The individual who answered was dismissive and stated that she doubted the incident even happened. This response was extremely unprofessional and compounded an already unacceptable experience.

I am submitting this complaint not only because of the poor experience, but because of the serious safety concerns involved. Overcrowding, lack of crowd control, and dismissive responses to guest injuries are issues that should be taken very seriously.

I would appreciate a response from management addressing this incident and explaining how situations like this are handled, particularly for guests who purchase VIP access.

Sincerely,
Buddy Swisshelm","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennyleen Dy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9L5V_b3-PwZuRL0323GFZ4oBt7dCXI1nJGf6UZH3weDmVScrF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ghostbar was an unforgettable experience! The moment we walked in, the chic, sleek ambiance set the mood. The stunning rooftop views of the Vegas skyline were a sight to behold‚Äîperfect for capturing those Insta-worthy moments. The cocktails were crafted to perfection, adding a touch of elegance to our night. With the DJ spinning great tracks, we danced the night away under the stars. Ghostbar is definitely a must-visit for a top-notch nightlife experience! üåüüç∏üé∂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC_ovOjpwE&fid=0x0:0x91bd5ead52e73143"],"When":"2025-1-14"},{"Name":"Lamont Jordan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5O1fTxnOxBalvt8sWy82UQUxp2H2Bv07xY9zLHNveV1S15g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here twice and the view from this place is still surreal. Not as popular as it was 15 years ago or so but still one of the best views of the Las Vegas strip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB0yx_25kW-RWL9H4QcAa9A&fid=0x0:0x91bd5ead52e73143"],"When":"2025-8-14"},{"Name":"Rose W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsUEhYAA5f184QzS-eMI1VOnF4JyDDL626bia_p6DrcRL-UCZS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful rooftop bar with indoor and outdoor seating. Good vibes & an even better view!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA1O15V1qhDwpsvJWMsZGA_&fid=0x0:0x91bd5ead52e73143"],"When":"2025-10-13"}]

The only interesting thing about it is that Doug Stanhope did comedy at this bar back in the early 90s.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tanguy Pepiot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUK-3F_ZLUXg_t6OkkZzaAZj8W4CQi79Mq9VB_YLPUoFp-YRyte=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome place!

Live music is great!!
They just upgraded their sound system with Turbosound gear it‚Äôs a lot better now!!
Bathroom is an experience on its own‚Ä¶ üòõ
Definitely worth checking out while you are in Las Vegas!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD8YuaVmKHXfdq7uk7uA0sC&fid=0x0:0x57f897dc0580c2fc"],"When":"2025-9-29"},{"Name":"Marla Sachs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuxKqc5Zyw-Nd5GT-dLQGrwWotEVueTT9emhC1LfdIvekfBOfGKw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The phone number listed across all platforms is dead. I can't find any reference to this on their site or any of their reviews but this bar allows inside smoking. The Dive Bar embraces all that makes a dive-bar great; however, is 2025, there is no reason to be smoking inside.

I love dark, dingy dive-bars with slightly sticky floors and questionable bathrooms but indoor smoking in such a small space is a dealbreaker for me.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Seth Moon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3nijuDbSfLr80pITst3nGGgNV-q_AQ3K5beTkWxMd3DAiRSCo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"So after a night of listening to the chick bartender talk crap about every artist I paid money to enjoy for the night, she turned around and over charged my tip! Great place to see a band .
Music is on the hard edge side.
Saw the Queers tonight.
Had a good time. Spur of the moment kind of thing.
I would definitely come back.
Looking for a punk type bar. This will pretty much be your place
B.t.w.
$6 for a decent well vodka screwdriver after the show","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDepquu8QE&fid=0x0:0x57f897dc0580c2fc"],"When":"2022-10-9"}]

[{"Name":"Mert Eren Zurnalƒ±","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3LwcfY5_QIehwLIcpF-qRqtkEv6Y5xScQOBMtjpgoAdnDsemTIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The atmosphere here is amazing, and the food definitely matches the vibe! I tried the spicy noodles and they were 10/10‚Äîperfectly seasoned and fresh. The service was also top-notch; our server was very attentive and friendly. Whether you‚Äôre here for a quick lunch or a night out, this place never disappoints. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAusxk9tIjezA1GNOiwzd8h&fid=0x0:0x6cd08527af5bcaa0"],"When":"2026-2-6"},{"Name":"Priyal M (festivefunkylife)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1n-Nek_vDtedcWQe6oC69fCX4C7UJ2F3-smVl4v9xwlZrAWlj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Yard House ‚Äì Las Vegas Review

Yard House in Vegas was a solid spot for sharing a variety of dishes with a group. We started with the loaded nachos, which were generous in portion and perfect for the table, and the spinach dip with tortilla chips, which was creamy, warm, and a great classic appetizer. The truffle fries were crispy with a strong truffle flavor and disappeared fast.

For mains, we tried the margherita pizza and mushroom pizza. Both had thin, crispy crusts and fresh toppings‚Äîthe margherita was light and balanced, while the mushroom pizza was rich and savory. The chicken wings were well-cooked and flavorful, making them another easy favorite.

To drink, the coffee martini, scorched melon, and pi√±a spritz were all well-presented and refreshing, each offering a different flavor profile depending on what you‚Äôre in the mood for.

Overall, Yard House delivered a fun, casual dining experience with a wide variety of food and drinks, making it a good choice for groups who want to try a little bit of everything.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB6JsXLd-yQCmyVVrPSskUv&fid=0x0:0x6cd08527af5bcaa0"],"When":"2025-12-29"},{"Name":"ozitheexplorer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXe7IfckE5yW33Uc37xY5D8cKjMF_rwv4oyvgddSFfI1uWoi4E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The location is very good and place is comfortable. The food is delicious and portions are very filling. Menu is quite extensive, especially the wide selection of beers. Saranina, who took care of us, was very attentive and friendly. Many thanks to her. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a nice meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAKIb1HaTUhvMlQQEjqqYkR&fid=0x0:0x6cd08527af5bcaa0"],"When":"2026-2-6"},{"Name":"Wendy Robinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjxFFgQQHXMMvbQL6YEvFf4eP0BVVtUXavT0LbPIJzITknq8-Wuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came in to Yard House for lunch while walk my on the strip. Nina was our server and super awesome!!! She was sweet, thoughtful, and knowledgeable about the menu. We were all super happy with each of our meal picks. Ordering fries as appetizers was a perfect start. The bbq chicken salad (large) was very filling and tasted amazing!!! My husband mentioned the ahi dish he got was really delicious. Overall, we had a great experience at this location. I recommend coming in.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA5sxHR7EWFlh99U4jMf8mW&fid=0x0:0x6cd08527af5bcaa0"],"When":"2025-10-19"},{"Name":"Darrin Rumph","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMUIR5h6kT4WqpaSKqRExPFkenqQUx_a3IGZFNPv-FxOTiUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Late night casual dinner for 2
It was pretty late when we entered. The host at the podium confirmed we were a party of two.¬† She then asked if we wanted a table or to sit at the bar. We quickly decided to sit at the bar , our new favorite for some reason.¬† We reviewed the menu and the food and beer options were pretty extensive. We quickly made our choices for drinks and food.¬† I ordered a Space Dust from Elysian and Wifey kept it simple with a lemonade. For food she ordered the Loaded Tater Tots and I opted for the Chicken Quesadilla, which came with chopped chicken. Yard House had plenty of screens scattered around to watch all the games.¬† I found out the restrooms are on the second floor. When I went upstairs, it looked kind of deserted, probably because it was off-hours. The food came out pretty quickly and looked super fresh. We started digging in, and everything was delicious. I would definitely recommend this place if you‚Äôre down on the Promenade at The Linq Casino/Hotel.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC79hRaSCiBNAdcFyESueA0&fid=0x0:0x6cd08527af5bcaa0"],"When":"2025-10-19"},{"Name":"Joshua Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWm3nGidKZYoJH53q9epwZdRL6Na9_t8OPQtpWcMraz-qvqGUMj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited this place while in Vegas a couple of weeks ago.  Highly recommend.  Staff & our waitress (Janeth) were great!  Loved the atmosphere of the restaurant.  The food is delicious.  I had a couple of tacos, very good.  A bite of my wifes blue cheese and bacon burger, literally told her that was the best burger I've ever tasted!  Beer selection is 2nd to none.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDpvTObqlU-mMPhN4sFQdPT&fid=0x0:0x6cd08527af5bcaa0"],"When":"2025-12-12"},{"Name":"Arturo Garza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZMwVZLUJFzbkNnvUCNydi6IacMxQjoPPPiSZt8gRAIpY_kKCjgg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really like Yard House. The food is consistently good, the menu has plenty of options for everyone, and the portions are generous. Great beer selection and a fun, lively atmosphere. Service has always been solid when I‚Äôve visited. A reliable spot I‚Äôm happy to come back to.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCwJkD8SF7Xn-KpW9Np6CjZ&fid=0x0:0x6cd08527af5bcaa0"],"When":"2026-1-6"},{"Name":"Stephanie Holbrook","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0Hn165P4gH7uEVXl-A3QJsycbGyNbCUg0k1pkArIVR_qldTTb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We checked this place out because it was near the High Roller and were pleasantly surprised by the burgers. Not only huge and filling but tasty. Peach unsweet tea was so good. Plenty of seating, we enjoyed the inside patio area, which was perfect for people watching. It can get a little noisy. Easy checkout with electronic ‚Äúregister‚Äù on the table.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBvUgu87RPYeUd4STDmJFDJ&fid=0x0:0x6cd08527af5bcaa0"],"When":"2026-1-24"}]

column32: [{"Name":"Carrie C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKCiJ7Kc0NtT9uTgE3YkcsPM_WhmJj_Y8xEydjTva9WBICsmGU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I just went to take a photo of the menu. Everyone, you‚Äôre welcome. 3.17.2025","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCwrs2KSA\u0026fid=0x0:0xafbaac59eb7c8058"],"When":"2025-3-19"},{"Name":"isabela cinca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVnZIWT0u8TSUE1GhTu9ReLvG_KDEOlRTAskXefOZmlxE7aKqE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"18.40 $ for a can of beer. The service was the worst and the product in the bill didn‚Äôt match the beer so maybe was a fraud. No chair so no seat just an open sad bar where you hope can be cheap and instead you get scammed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDHq8fTkwE\u0026fid=0x0:0xafbaac59eb7c8058"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Odilia Lindstrom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYjHcqvSzty5x-IQ_KYqibdBx5H-zXV0w0ttnmOQCtPYm3PA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst customer service ever! Stopped in for a fruity  frozen cocktail after a delicious dinner. Asked for a taste of strawberry mixed with lemonade which was fine. Decided on ordering one with vodka (of which many selections were listed on the menu board) and the barkeep said only rum or tequila, no vodka. I said but there's a bottle of vodka right there. He took the bottle and put it behind another bottle and said nope only rum or tequila. Hmmmmm.... I thought he was kidding and said that I was really looking forward to a delicious frozen vodka drink. He wasn't  kidding though. Proceeded to tell me I can get those all over the strip. He was serious. No wonder no one was in there. Seriously most disconcerting experience ever!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Ftacek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVl_71QZSwbOYK-UJ8M-w07RWvKiT0xI6tp5Ibn-lZnkrE6dQF9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Do not waist your time here. Drinks are over prices a man behind the counter is rude and chases paying customers off for no apparent reasons even though we were going to pay.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ariel T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-pJfiWvL6XKYqZYNYzp0HMstT7x-Oi6IwQURoPtxj-IWy7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had been waiting for years to visit Vegas and get my Eiffel Tower margarita cup. The gentleman at the bar was very nice and was able to make me exactly what I wanted. Bucket list item checked off","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jack Le√≥n","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOGcP2fxFt-AWIUHXpOTQIi6_INoUKYBIEqNRnWLXZYgtMNYtMBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Water your drinks down much? I had a 2 double Bacardi and cokes and I saw the barman over pour the spirits but still felt no alcohol in the drinks.\n\nI think he knew the drinks were watered down and that's why he over poured. On top of that each drink was $20, I know it's Vegas but at least give me what I paid for.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Noemi Almaguer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0ISiYiTqHUxriNuSYE38T4jJULCFliGop8PBp80tfbD9cSg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I will rate it 0 worst customer service ever the guy working there is so Rude if he doesn‚Äôt like his job he shouldn‚Äôt be working with people If you are getting paid to do your job I don‚Äôt see how I should be tipping you for only pouring my drink in my cup that I am already buying from you","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan Moss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqmGnAWetbqzjePE3D1kGEk0veyusMRS69ym8S2FF_DvsfRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fun place right in the heart of Vegas","Images":null,"When":""}]
