column32:
[{"Name":"Erik Laifer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMYxd0BIN8U6o-smZjAB_5rP5XlFQ1jw-ACP43syezWgstMtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a cool place located in the Cosmopolitan Las Vegas. Very friendly staff and beautiful bar and seating area. We stopped in for a few rounds and had a blast. Even if you don‚Äôt drink alcohol still go in and get a tea or coke.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDPk_01qXuC4zM9Wr_bQjLA&fid=0x0:0xf6b9decec8c3dfab"],"When":"2025-12-16"},{"Name":"Darya Shestakova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnzi3YfPqisBmdnMaXXCRJ5Pa9M-ZJGYaFC2uHr3CyXgiH0h-yWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I love the vibe of this lounge and bar. It's very relaxing if you sit at the dark side, or it's vibrant if you sit close to the walkway. I loved the music.
The bartenders are creative and can make a delicious cocktail per your request, even if it's off the menu.
Their menu looks great, though. But unfortunately, I can't have drinks with tequila or whisky. They also have a good selection of wines and spirits.
It would seem too pricy to some people, but nowadays, $25 is an average price for good quality cocktails on the Strip.

Update November 2025:
Now I see why this place has some negative reviews. We stopped by thus bar 3 times during our recent stay at the Cosmo, and two times out of three our cocktails were good. Not great, but good. But one time it was just horrible, absolutely undrinkable. We still were charged for that one even though I barely touched it. So yes, I guess it depends who is the bartender. Inconsistent quality. Take one star off.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCIgbLRPg&fid=0x0:0xf6b9decec8c3dfab"],"When":"2025-4-2"},{"Name":"Damon Reyes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEvC3FFUmdtT42t_-W072_Gz1M9hrVXkOh6ZdE-vPcSlsvdg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jose the late night bartender on a recent weekend visit was a total badass. Incredible service from him and drinks that were better than any of the many other cocktail lounges we visited during our stay. Dat guy is a pro. The bar is in a beautiful setting and had an elclectic background music selection that included The Kinks song Powerman. I would definitely return on future trips to Sin City.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andy Chiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Ytd6jvLjiUIKjc2DLdidLuwgHbgPUD4GPhFuPOLEoqlZ2vbh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ok this is by far the best bar at the Cosmopolitan. I know the Chandelier is the busier one, but this one makes the best drinks.

Sit at the bar if you can, strike up a conversation with the bartenders, and order some classic cocktails. They make some really well made cocktails and they do it with style. This bar can also get really busy, but worth a visit if you can get a seat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCAzcD5Rw&fid=0x0:0xf6b9decec8c3dfab"],"When":"2025-2-3"},{"Name":"Thomas Riese","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJj-IyCViquiZF3y5pLg1W0-_Dr1JaY73r5BeDeOHE0eJPbuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Bartenders wouldn't make drinks because shift ended 1 minuye before we arrived. Waited 15 minutes before next shift even asked if we wanted a drink. Happened across all patrons. Go someplace else!!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tyson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWo5rrhX5XVoGX3fPSyH_LOf71fwRYroGwNiOi-0ZQbhOxmcYJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice little bar at the Cosmo. Classic and reimagined cocktails tasted great. My favorite was the Elysian Field - organic Hardy Cognac, Elation Pear Cognac with bitters, Lemon and Coconut Chai Syrup. Our server was great and checked on us regularly. Not inexpensive, but quality ingredients are used.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDW_8_cSg&fid=0x0:0xf6b9decec8c3dfab"],"When":"2022-4-9"},{"Name":"Charlie Te","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUM3tcz74rJ0DuYDDGqeapmHdklqGqUrrA6BTCZLUf9O7D5dKDG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cool bar on the strip to enjoy a nice cocktail without being super busy or packed. The interior has a nice design and not brightly lit. I had the Mark Twain and the others had an old fashioned and Champs-Elysees. The cocktails were carefully made and you can taste the quality of them.  Definitely worth the try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID6vOz-twE&fid=0x0:0xf6b9decec8c3dfab"],"When":"2021-9-23"},{"Name":"shimmeringpath","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgKPva2isMDTKHwZHtz74CNx3IFEeHxOGxMFwRzHd1MMJV-a2mTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Extremely chill architectural bar in the Chelsea Tower lobby at Cosmopolitan. I had the Gilded Age - a lemony Mezcal and Tequila drink that was pretty nice . My friend had the Champ Elysees a drink from 1930 with Remy Martin and chartreuse and lemon. Both were good though not too strong. It was refreshing and the bartenders are nice and there's lots of little corners to get comfortable in. I'd go back. Could be a hangout spot .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC2_8uQgAE&fid=0x0:0xf6b9decec8c3dfab"],"When":"2022-5-2"}]

column32: [{"Name":"Caleb Goatson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbxv5jXuQHQP8y4Bo6sKen1zU13tfEx32KUOwLHLVMwxJ8AcBH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I used their service for my buddy's 21st birthday. Note that this is now my 2nd time and I've got to say, they once again delivered! Smooth and seamless experience. I called for a booking limo ride appointment and their limo shows up a few minutes later.  Limo playing really good music, smelled good and super clean.  I just had to pay for 2 drinks as  usual but the limo ride is FREE.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sumit Sahu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4ouQ7Y8n484cXz8_skiufITgWOu6hTIfE2E2IKsheAV6QWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best place to go as a new first timer in vegas like us. The booking is very easy and simple. You get booking details instantly and a message confirming your pick up details. Great Service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"day byday","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVN8a466oiTpHxN-xmTZzBaK9F2TbXmvZrVKDn59bx7CGDjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My wife and I had arranged in advance to go out for a birthday celebration.  No one contacted me at the appropriate time. The most frustrating part was dealing with their automated text system. You can‚Äôt get a human on the line. Finally, about 15 minutes after the scheduled time, a driver called me. He said he was on his way, he‚Äôd be there in 15 minutes. I waited another 30 minutes, he still hadn‚Äôt showed, so I called him-no answer. About an hour after the rescheduled pick up, he called and said he‚Äôd been in an accident. No one ever showed or contacted me. Sad thing is, I‚Äôve used them before with no issues. Be advised, if there is a problem, there is no way to contact them.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Merz W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBw3mJ-MRat0Hi_TnB4jAt_3NdHcooPcyMkxLqRU0gRXJLFw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My husband commented, now my turn. Nobody showed up. We reserved 48 hours in advance. We got a verification text saying the driver would contact us 15 minutes before pickup. This never happened. 5 minutes after scheduled pickup time, no contact from anyone. We began texting their chat bot from hell. It was useless. About 20 minutes after scheduled pickup (did I mention we scheduled 48 hours in advance?) a driver called us. He said he was on his way to get us, at a different hotel! How did that happen? So we redirected him to the correct hotel. Sat outside waiting for another 30 minutes-no show. We tried calling and texting the drivers personal number-no response. About an hour and a half after the original scheduled time ( I‚Äôm fairly certain I said we scheduled 48 hours in advance?), the driver called to say he couldn‚Äôt make it, he‚Äôd been in an accident. Lest you think we have no heart, we did verify there were no injuries. He suggested we try scheduling a completely new reservation. It was way too late at this point. Even if there had been no accident, he would have been an hour late. Not one single correspondence from the actual company. We gave up and celebrated at the hotel bar, a bit of a bummer from what I had planned for him. Complete failure as a business. You will not be able to speak to a human. Maybe because it was only two of us, they just ignored us? Use at your own risk.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alex Roy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_qiG3c1PvqGBka3VqAgqzSqX_V3EnRBtEFnzC7U1zh1L1BT28=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just the convenience of being picked up and having perks like drink specials in one shot.  Saves us the time to actually enjoy our time instead of worrying about all the logistics.  A+++","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anya Ervin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6zJgisP572xcq2F3egG-5-mwSq7J0wnq3tTaH7NdPDpPO3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Everything on their website sounded great and we booked with the prepayment. The ride came to get us as said but when we got to the strip club the driver pressed us for a tip saying the ride isn‚Äôt included. First red flag. He wanted us to pay him $80 and I let him know I prepaid online even adding gratuity on there as well. He said he don‚Äôt work for the strip club blah blah blah We ended up giving him $30 so we could go inside and he had the nerve to be upset! Once inside they did give us preferred seating and 2 drinks each like stated. Crazy Horse was a good time but there isn‚Äôt any floor dancing going on for $20 a dance. They want you to go to the VIP room for $100 plus a drink purchase which was $30 a drink. There is also no ride home like stated and the truck was sitting there with a driver but they said only one way is provided! Overall I wouldn‚Äôt use this service again as I‚Äôve used other ones in Las Vegas and got exactly what was stated at booking.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karl Jp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwiOG86XjQSb4JJlNFVwt1ukujgIWV2sCFMIiblHa6QY4m7caN=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There are a Ridiculous number of options for Strip Club in Vegas. SCC takes all of the guesswork out and let's you take advantage of their expertise.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Keshia Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6e3KrJ4_q7yGzO-QbYGn6UatXRx0h5Dxi9zpSwDlAjGcz8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great driver for the VIP Package! Prompt pick up and communication was key!","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Josh Caine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJNbsR985dXUTmC94tSw-N79-Ic4CBSgG6FUkRQFeG4NFmXyQpD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really cool experience, pun intented... Had a great time and enjoyed a couple of cocktails out of glasses made of ice, while sitting on a bench made of ice, in a room surrounded by ice. The detail on some of the carvings and just the overall experience being in a very cold room surrounded by so much carved ice was fun and the staff was courteous and helpful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDpc6InwKMxmqOHX_Q1elvX&fid=0x0:0x7d4ac02497533595"],"When":"2025-12-29"},{"Name":"MarG Willingham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlP-jgH9uG7GoLo2_wUgobhUlqRc7lu_r-2BvZJGx95koICS7Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a blast in the ice bar. The bartender was so down to earth and gave us suggestions on where to visit while in Vegas. The drinks were delicious as well. It‚Äôs an experience drinking out of ice cups and sitting in a bar full of ice sculptures.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDd_4Us7PE_xRC63wWya0re&fid=0x0:0x7d4ac02497533595"],"When":"2025-9-30"},{"Name":"Shatoni Marie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVPVYVZ8o96K_w_Q0vWEbKxYNMeXCzZvB-xdm8ojIN4Zzg7z_PCg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Minus5 icebar was such a fun and unique Vegas experience! Everything inside is made of ice :walls, sculptures, seats, even the glasses for cocktails‚Äîand the LED lights make it all feel magical. The drinks were tasty, the vibe was upbeat, and the whole space felt like a frozen art gallery. It‚Äôs definitely chilly, but manageable for about 30 minutes. Great for photos, a fun date, or just doing something different. Highly recommend if you‚Äôre looking to cool off and do something memorable!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhClwtY7cDOKZyWIR8x0EcXA&fid=0x0:0x7d4ac02497533595"],"When":"2025-8-3"},{"Name":"Kaylie Golding","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7BsjlnKy1K1-nrg71MQ-aQh_Bvh80bNubN4r84CeJZjMbfD8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We hosted our wedding welcome party at Minus5 Ice Bar last November, and we couldn‚Äôt rave about it more. We had such an amazing experience, and it was the perfect way to introduce our guests to the city we love so much!
For the event we were offered a private warm space, which was cozy and perfect for our small group of about 25; it also included tickets into the Ice Bar (which was open to the public still, which wasn‚Äôt an issue at all for us, we actually think it made it even better). We also had delicious passed appetizers that I wish I had more pictures of, but they went so quickly I completely missed my chance. The bartenders inside the Ice Bar were awesome and my guests raved about them then and continue to talk about their stellar service now. The drinks were delicious, the energy was electric, and the ambiance was everything we could‚Äôve hoped for. I also feel the time we were given for the event space was perfect for a welcome party- I we didn‚Äôt feel like we were rushed at all, and it also didn‚Äôt feel like we had so much time it dragged past its glory.
We are so grateful to Candace and Marc who helped us plan the event so that it went off without a hitch, and to the wonderful servers and bartenders who made the experience what it was. If you‚Äôre looking for a fun thing to do in Vegas by yourself, or if you‚Äôre looking to host a small event that‚Äôs guaranteed to impress- look no further.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD3-eLZwcZVin7Dl1HMN759&fid=0x0:0x7d4ac02497533595"],"When":"2025-9-30"},{"Name":"Sudip Patel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeKSbKmDpUrn7tv2T9sZvEmpwFy5S6a3FGBbj0_upMcd2u7jsQGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Minus5 Ice Bar is a super fun and unique experience in Vegas! You get bundled up in parkas and gloves, then step into a room made entirely of ice including the walls, seats, sculptures, even the glasses. The vibe is cool (literally), with fun music and colorful lights.

Drinks are tasty but a bit pricey, and everything‚Äôs pretty small, so don‚Äôt expect to stay for hours. Still, it‚Äôs a great break from the Vegas heat and makes for awesome photos.

Definitely worth checking out at least once, especially if you want something different and memorable on the Strip!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhARgunhza6VUw1wFuitXqtL&fid=0x0:0x7d4ac02497533595"],"When":"2025-7-17"},{"Name":"Alyssa Apuzzio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUf_0seg5LJJBOAuf04NhfwCNSgPLoGeSk7zD4HvcLCaHGRfu8j-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time at an ice bar & minus5 was so cool, literally and figuratively! There are parkas & gloves available, which you definitely need. All of the drinks are served in an ice glass. The ice setting not only looks neat, but has a shine, especially with the lights glowing on them. A must do if you're looking for a fun, different place to hang!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC95w41ts8Huz-ts6tkucGn&fid=0x0:0x7d4ac02497533595"],"When":"2025-8-7"},{"Name":"Josi Quarless","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCnPSxwyBrsVWiVRnZjwy1Pl_UBLgYZ9rEiNynZvyxWc3_tWsEmA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was  an amazing experience and everyone need to see it! The service was top from beginning at the entrance till leaving the ice bar. # #buzzybooth","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAuGwLifZLRGgZXgFk65-C3&fid=0x0:0x7d4ac02497533595"],"When":"2026-2-16"},{"Name":"Alysha Salapack","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK56El1kOINAEuI5GjncCg1OVgDp7zpIn5nSAnaM62ivTi0aQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was an awesome experience for someone from Florida! The parkas were warm and the drinks were good. I could have stayed for another 2 hours!  #minus5icebar @minus5icebar #buzzybooth","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCe7si_kNEwJMf3ZFffgsDD&fid=0x0:0x7d4ac02497533595"],"When":"2025-10-20"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Janey Lee Caravallo Maciel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkNiL8x7UMxd1SmXos9L9LR31WsnualGzySwX0kbF_m7ND4jYb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Bar Parasol is an upscale, beautiful bar located inside the Wynn hotel. The decor is exquisite.

They have a full bar serving up great craft cocktails, beer, wine, champagne, and mocktails.

This is the perfect spot for a quick, small bite and drink! We enjoyed the caviar service and charcuterie and cheese.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCmDdvFBEK0NTyL7N3sr_Pq&fid=0x0:0xd1c670b50b6f47a9"],"When":"2026-2-12"},{"Name":"Micah Gaudio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0p8kU76ywU72WAaz8mftSwPnzBX2646X3I_v4r9rJDBWh8BsWBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"‚ÄúWhere Champagne Dreams Meet Caviar Reality (and Wallet Regret)‚Äù

If you‚Äôve ever wanted to sip a $24 cocktail that makes you feel like you might own a yacht (even though your credit card clearly disagrees), Bar Parasol at the Wynn is your spiritual home.

I started with the Bubbles & Bump because why not chase Champagne with caviar like an indecisive aristocrat? It was classy, confusing, and cost more than my first car payment. The bartender looked like he should have a PhD in mixology and minor in psychology because he could see my financial anxiety.

Next up, the Cozumel Spicy Margarita. It‚Äôs not just spicy ‚Äî it‚Äôs like being kissed by a jalape√±o and gently slapped by a pineapple. 10/10 would cry again.

Someone ordered the Havana Rum Old Fashioned for Two at the next table. It came out like a Vegas magic trick ‚Äî smoke, passionfruit bonbon, and all. The couple looked like they‚Äôd just been proposed to by Bacardi itself.

The d√©cor? Imagine if Gatsby, Versace, and a peacock got together for brunch. The lighting makes everyone look 30% more attractive and 70% more mysterious.

Would I come back? Absolutely. Will my bank account forgive me? Unlikely. But hey ‚Äî when in Vegas, live like the Wynn expects you to.

#CaviarForTheWin #BarParasol #WynnningAtLosingMoney","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDnleqO7Ss45S9ijLC2Kab5&fid=0x0:0xd1c670b50b6f47a9"],"When":"2025-10-18"},{"Name":"Sa Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTA7LtqFHgBLO9em_QN5LNbpjRYFqMZ6bhWsDWyZdFPPIxL7Et=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This bar is inside a Las Vegas hotel, and the experience was not what you‚Äôd expect for Vegas. We came in around 8 or 9PM after leaving a buffet, expecting a typical social bar atmosphere. Instead, the environment was extremely quiet, and it felt like even normal conversation was discouraged.

We‚Äôre from the South and naturally tend to speak louder than we realize. That was apparently taken as a sign that we were intoxicated. After being served one drink, the bartender refused to serve us any additional drinks without explanation or warning. We were not disruptive, belligerent, or visibly drunk ‚Äî just talking.

The service felt unwelcoming and unnecessarily strict. For a Las Vegas bar, this was shocking. Being cut off after one drink simply for speaking made us uncomfortable and frustrated.

If you‚Äôre looking for a fun, relaxed, or even normal Vegas bar experience, I strongly recommend going elsewhere. This bar may only appeal to guests who want an extremely quiet, almost library-like setting. We would not return and do not recommend patronizing this bar.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joyce Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJsuzbFB8_Womg0HqDNbYelEaDTZuNOf9de050rWB2hFItVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a beautiful place with indoor and outdoor sitting. I have loved it for yrs and they have now redone it so it is more beautiful. Excellent food and service as well as beautiful views of the water fall. Expensive but worth it and I highly recommend for day or night and they are open until 2 AM. Inside the WYNN CASINO.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEIW-5-n0rq7xMA&fid=0x0:0xd1c670b50b6f47a9"],"When":"2025-5-29"},{"Name":"Chelsea Mork","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJCQBjILADa7SCwbu4QdtcsOzLzLe4fDk0_oK2lDT4RfnB1fg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Cocktails were great, but the food was disappointing. The lobster roll was dry and cold, the fries were soggy, and overall it felt overpriced for the quality. Worth stopping by for drinks, but I wouldn‚Äôt come back for the food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDZtCMj8K6LwkPQN2fpSN-_&fid=0x0:0xd1c670b50b6f47a9"],"When":"2025-8-30"},{"Name":"T R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXxcNTxv5kSF_Eux56Fckry9UTgm0vV10YourlCLrQBlBGlrXW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for an afternoon cocktail! Get seated outside, you won‚Äôt be disappointed! The waterfall and water was beautiful and serene and the swivel chairs were super comfy I could‚Äôve taken a nap.

Came here on a Friday afternoon, we didn‚Äôt make reservations, so there was a 20 minute wait. There was some room at the inside bar and they invited us to have a drink there while we waited. Host and wait staff were friendly.

We ordered:

- Bangkok - very flavourful
- gin and tonic
- Beef tartare - flavourful and truffle was not overpowering.
- Petit fours - each item was decadent and delicious
Matcha tart
Coffee cream puff
Creme br√ªl√©e
Macaron - peanut butter and jelly
Dark chocolate

Everything was delicious and would come back again!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDj2Z6ZsAE&fid=0x0:0xd1c670b50b6f47a9"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Masumi M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9vTBeozrdPV9620FM8FT79ZfwagZhERzJwDAV_I8zjhABqOda=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stopped by for a drink after dinner. I had an amazing drink that tasted like a dessert which I liked. They only had macaroons for dessert but those were fresh and delicious. I wish they had more options for dessert. It‚Äôs a small bar but ambiance is nice. The service was great.

Wynn has amazing restaurants and bars that they offer high quality food, drinks, and dessert.

I‚Äôd love to come back here for more drinks and foods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC7j4yKCQ&fid=0x0:0xd1c670b50b6f47a9"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Andr√©s Zamudio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXb8dG1hFW8ry0swee4sQgr4JVJ_-O0rqPmzlJ5gM4CsysKiziAXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great bar, one of my favorite spots in Vegas to take a break while enjoying a few drinks. Nice selection of spirits and cocktails, snacks and cigars. Indoor and outdoor seating available. Highly recommend to have a table by the lake in the evening and enjoy the lakeside shows every 30 minutes starting at 8:30 pm.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDaqPSxxgE&fid=0x0:0xd1c670b50b6f47a9"],"When":"2021-8-14"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Tiffany Morgan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSi8AO-PxM2iVTdjfV6nsaNCF9UE-W9xOifSFMTWi9QJbA5NZZmg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This OG Vegas lounge delivers on all Holiday occasions! I went for a night cap and to check out their Holiday decor. Super fun!!
I love they have local live music and festive Holiday drinks.
Visited before for Halloween and will certainly go back! Their pizza hits too!
Service was a bit slow, but only because they were so busy. Completely understandable!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD-rhEY3fZ1l9pMRMCerpmd&fid=0x0:0xd1e661e0b5c7a20d"],"When":"2025-12-5"},{"Name":"Vicki Ream","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbavDMoPq8TNnH-wV1HP5gIxCmvhtDayGLndNjh2DW52mt-GXi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's s Christmas time and they transformed the place into a magical experience. It's beautiful! Staff is super. There on top of it and very friendly. I didn't eat there but the pizza they prepared for others looked delicious. They have the cutest holiday drinks with cups you can purchase. A little pricey but for the holidays it was worth it. I got the naughty shot glass. You should definitely check it out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAjWGeg_HARiJ_xBhL-slIj&fid=0x0:0xd1e661e0b5c7a20d"],"When":"2025-12-16"},{"Name":"Tysa Manuel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbtixla70ePICTthMD_0-MX85DrcuGs1r9wPx-89p4qy89ZFwYEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went there after a Christmas party for the after party and it was a great decision!!! There were awesome decorations and holiday inspired drinks! There were a lot of people but not overly crowded! My favorite part was the live band! They had everyone having a great time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBZDv2hdNYPZGw6SbCJeRwf&fid=0x0:0xd1e661e0b5c7a20d"],"When":"2025-12-22"},{"Name":"Karen pasqualetti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS4hXpVmq6cQ2pnTHQUnpRQRo15RH89pR9FFGmwvFPe9wIo2c0jA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There's no cover charge. So much fun and the service was amazing! The Christmas decorations are spectacular and the drinks were fantastic!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAo1stc-v2h-6q0VG7PmhBX&fid=0x0:0xd1e661e0b5c7a20d"],"When":"2025-12-28"},{"Name":"BuBoNiC NATE","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYm2NAcSfQQ5FUJQAOhhicCD1wYjEpzVY-NM59BImuiBOoUipv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have spent two weeks on vacation in Las Vegas and I have had my fill on the tourist trap locations. Luckily a musician friend recommended the Sand Dollar Lounge as a place to catch some local musicians.
I really enjoyed myself here. The beer selection was good, the pizza was amazing, and the local group playing, The Foster Collective, was on point!
I will definitely be back here first thing the next time I'm in Las Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCbIJPnKLsT2WPoAUL9bufU&fid=0x0:0xd1e661e0b5c7a20d"],"When":"2025-7-7"},{"Name":"Max Buxs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU07JWUd7YLGeYzNpbHDQvIrwSU50mvMMX2_ATJRNBi8sMy6yw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place sucks it charges strip prices to be in an old shed.  $9 for a glass of beer.  The bartender insisted on a credit card to comp my drink even though I was gambling top amount per hand.  Won't be back avoid this loser place","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD5RDKc6xU6B6iBJ0olS-Mt&fid=0x0:0xd1e661e0b5c7a20d"],"When":"2025-12-6"},{"Name":"Stephen Legg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWi3pAsdOl8T9uWgbzbdrvoY8RrfovWU6VQTxG7pXU7lD99iu1G=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"HOLY EFF!!! How have I never been here before? I've been coming to Sin City since 1984 and thought I knew all of the fun cool divy kind of bars but I've never been to the Sand Dollar. Where have I been? This place is awesome!

The pizza is just awesome and so fast that I could barely get a drink before my buzzer went off in my pocket saying that my meat lovers was ready. Cook to perfection and tasty sauce. Yum! üòã

The bartenders were fast and humorous with all of their funny Christmas themed t-shirts albeit NSFW. üòè

Which leads me to the ambiance. If you happen to be lucky enough to be in Las Vegas during the month of December you definitely need to go because they re make the place into a magical place renamedl "The Miracle on Spring Mountain". With Christmas lights hanging from every inch of the ceiling to wrapping paper all around the walls, you can't help but feel the festive spirit.

Even the Grinch felt his heart grow 3 times bigger when he visited but I'm sure the Snowball Old Fashioned or Krampus drinks didn't hurt. üçπüçª

Finally, the bands were great. First was a really good cover band that was super tight even thru some difficult Steely Dan vocals. The second band was Bootylicious Deluxe with a couple of Deeelux ladies out front belting out No Doubt-esque tunes while burning up the night with their vivacious personalities. Let's Go!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA26zo5Xcu0PBeYUc57zVCR&fid=0x0:0xd1e661e0b5c7a20d"],"When":"2025-12-7"},{"Name":"Juan Cardenas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnDgTx-hzaa5UToAsZJYdxk13DYjvGuvdJE94BY97SH8EOs-hz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of best Vegas bars for locals. Period. Live music quality is almost guaranteed here. Great beer selection. Spectacular cocktails and great pizza. This bar is fun, always. During Xmas it becomes a holiday delight with special cocktails menu.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Aileen Hokama","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrTz3_UVNtvDDVus4QBUyOHKZh4Xq34AAZ9Xu9sgza_AtLH1YmXw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The pizza is just too good - right now this is my fave pizza spot in LV!

This spot is a hidden gem, on the other (east) side of the strip, inside a super unassuming divey bar. So we heard about the pizza, so we ordered the Groovy Gravy Train (like a breakfast pizza, and wow I wasn't expecting much, but it was breakfast heaven), White Pie (so yum, if you like white pizza, you'll def like this one), and the Signature Detroit Style (classic, and my fave of the three). Each is ~$20, comes with 4 big squares, and 5 of us barely finished all 3 pizzas.

We also ordered beer and drinks, but I must say $4 for Dwarf's Piss is amazing - it's a pretty light and crisp draft, and easy to drink. I will come back. Oh also, the service here is awesome, so friendly, warm and homey vibes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCyc8mHATHX__-rJsxr4QwQ&fid=0x0:0x502c1314cca90c1d"],"When":"2025-11-4"},{"Name":"James Mikkelson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3RYhMR37Jwn8ZWCOKjLQsnPpjesicQsgXFWHjTOpQZlPSOdQi7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good beer selection.. have real beer not just light beer .. Bavarian beers and sours. Very chilled, cool interior. Bar man helpful. Pizza solid. Top recommendations for off-strip bars in Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB561PRXIcd3T9SbEb0IoTG&fid=0x0:0x502c1314cca90c1d"],"When":"2026-2-17"},{"Name":"Bry Ulm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV47U3nldVAv9TT7W-e8T04nkrf_zFvWB2Kc5kiPvoU5JimXBtA9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First things first: this ‚ÄúMidwest‚Äù Detroit-style pizza is the best I‚Äôve had this far west‚Äîhands down. As a Midwest native, I can say with confidence that if you're craving authentic Detroit flavor while away from home, this is it. My only question for the owner: are you competing in the Las Vegas Pizza Festival? Because this pie is absolutely worthy.

Tera is a wonderful bartender. She's warm, inviting, attentive and makes a wonderful cocktail.

The atmosphere is inviting and the decor feels just right‚Äîcozy, friendly, and perfectly sized. They've even tucked a live band into the corner, adding a touch of magic to the space. The drink I had was well-crafted and tasted great. I also tried the wings, which were decent, though at $12 I‚Äôd expect a minimum of eight. My only real wish is for a larger pizza size‚Äîbut honestly, it tasted so good, I‚Äôm not complaining. Well done, Red Dwarf.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBTzmGlORSkqTfYFETLkO2V&fid=0x0:0x502c1314cca90c1d"],"When":"2025-7-20"},{"Name":"ismail arslangiray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyM2Xh5e7PJqin-WxmwWE8CKfHvY2_nlcP3XX6D38V_jH4UfkbNg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a very cool bar restaurant to visit. It is very much reincarnation of Tacoma‚Äôs Bob‚Äôs Java Jive. Best pizza in Las Vegas and kool staff. Btw, their pizza is a Detroit style pizza and it is phenomenal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA_OVxBrFSUssgCfYv5c9DG&fid=0x0:0x502c1314cca90c1d"],"When":"2025-10-9"},{"Name":"Juan Cardenas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnDgTx-hzaa5UToAsZJYdxk13DYjvGuvdJE94BY97SH8EOs-hz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best dive bars in town. Hands down the best bar pizza you can find in Vegas. Service is magnificent, a real community bar, with regulars but also casuals that know where the good stuff is.
If you like burlesque definitely check out the monthly shows. Live music also happens all the time, plus other local shows. No cover ever.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBn5nFG4IZK1cq02ZPmJgbW&fid=0x0:0x502c1314cca90c1d"],"When":"2025-7-29"},{"Name":"Ryan Fenton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvbiZVmbA7MutMUxHzH6Y1eMM9yMQHNIvP5O6NDFdl4oqaRNJ6Xw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A unique grunge/dive/tiki bar just far away enough from strip to not be hard to get too. They have events often, my favorite is the Sunday surfer music brunch. Not tons of parking out front, but its free.
Pizza, amazing. Drinks, same. Not a bad beer list either.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDw-LGdjaov_D0OsOi0Tt86&fid=0x0:0x502c1314cca90c1d"],"When":"2025-9-28"},{"Name":"SwampDonkey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKccX17ZONV1pJd5hjG1qideAvuJcT5ihZHinTCQAOTkdUJGA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There's tiki and then there's cool tiki. This place was awesome. Drinks were good. Pizza was outstanding. Can't recommend it more. 15/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC1RHV0uSOEMYoT6LDV7UNB&fid=0x0:0x502c1314cca90c1d"],"When":"2025-11-10"},{"Name":"Brian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUr1jqPLKzPag1c2NNVFLT-UNLEL09UKQ_Ok_I319WLVYAB4zuC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic food and a great atmosphere! Don't let the door outside scare you! Although the door isn't very welcoming, the staff are! They serve incredible pizza with a smile. If you're looking for drinks, it's got plenty! A nice surprise tiki bar that you'll easily pass by if you've never heard of it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDX0j8rdK2zKIhM_KAUXzmZ&fid=0x0:0x502c1314cca90c1d"],"When":"2025-9-30"}]

column5: The LINQ Promenade, 3545 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
column18: Vibrant ice bar with sculptures, serving up drinks in ice glasses & providing parkas, hats & gloves.

column32:
[{"Name":"Matt Kapa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfXt521FXultcmvdFCYkQd-ikEbLJ0aDNhm8bNeidSpRDCWh5P1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the coolest experiences in Las Vegas! Visiting Minus5 ICEBAR was amazing. Literally everything inside is sculpted from ice, from the walls and furniture to the ice glasses our cocktails were served in. Walking in from the desert heat into a winter wonderland was such a fun contrast.

The staff provided us with parkas and gloves so we stayed comfortable while sipping great drinks. Definitely one of the most unique bars I‚Äôve ever visited. The vibe was playful and unforgettable, and even just exploring all of the detailed ice sculptures was worth it.

Whether you‚Äôre stopping by with friends or looking for something totally different on the Strip, Minus5 Icebar is a must-do Vegas experience. Unique, fun, and absolutely chill (in the best way).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA5i7Ak3OGcPTeoo5B8TnPX&fid=0x0:0xb8784f29868b6472"],"When":"2026-1-4"},{"Name":"J B C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYbvSF7Ick9C5mM63Pg3cPN-fsMlIOh51cROUbSxqvWVfJwg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was looking for a place to have lunch after I got off the High Roller Ferris wheel when I came across this bar. It seemed interesting so I decided to check it out. They have 3 different pricing packages. I went for the $50 package which included entry, coat rental, gloves & two drinks. The bar is completely made of ice & so are the glasses the drinks are served in. It has different themes in each section. They even have a QR code you can scan if you‚Äôre in the mood for a scavenger hunt. The ice bench‚Äôs you sit on have animal pelts to help reduce the cold when you sit. (Not sure if they‚Äôre real lol) An interesting place to have a drink & cool off for a bit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAPf3nMc7-TSLY_GNAv2CqC&fid=0x0:0xb8784f29868b6472"],"When":"2026-1-15"},{"Name":"Mila Staneva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZ5_-VHUUSAlJttC2EziGJU9PA51Ui556E2eqmE0LbIBl20cqe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super cool place. üòÖ Delicious drinks, the bartender was lovely. It is a very different place, we had a private work event there. I loved it. The only problem is that you can‚Äôt stay for a long time because it is very cold even with the jacket they give you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC2q95oKdWhWNlRz9VsOIbO&fid=0x0:0xb8784f29868b6472"],"When":"2026-1-23"},{"Name":"Regina McConnell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXdphyPrZpE4kOgNwXVd36HxddMmsI-TEqKkvolQMBgz2Ak_l21Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ice bar was a lot fun. Robin and Nigel were great hosts! Don‚Äôt be afraid of the cold. Warm coats and gloves are provided. Drinks were good and the ice glasses were awesome!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAhp-iCrATT3_IaUt6Uic1B&fid=0x0:0xb8784f29868b6472"],"When":"2026-1-13"},{"Name":"Leah Kanas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvEcE7wMyTcMs7UbJrCv8YQTUi09Pd6uhg84NSX70aIH7FYf7r=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had such a fun time at minus5¬∞ Ice Bar! The entire place is made of ice, even the cups. They bundle you up in a cozy coat and gloves so you can fully enjoy the experience. The ice sculptures and themed rooms are incredible, and each location has its own unique vibe. It‚Äôs such a cool (literally!) and unforgettable spot to check out. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD9hEtffRHjNI2E-k9xmdWV&fid=0x0:0xb8784f29868b6472"],"When":"2025-11-8"},{"Name":"Sofia Perez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNEU0UarCh1wLrumPFialZFHMPoyl4cNxaC1--NrWNlQZ2KPU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was genuinely surprised going there! I heard almost everything was supposee to be made of ice and not going to lie, I was skeptical as it gets so hot here in vegas. However, the whole bar was made of ice!!! Even our drinking glasses were made of ice, hand sculpted 10/10 recommend and im definitely going back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAYhunUgs53a_Nobale9PPl&fid=0x0:0xb8784f29868b6472"],"When":"2025-11-14"},{"Name":"Michelle Rivera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOkp8dGzFVlm5ZDFMaNuObzPJpSyuWtmH_qkwYibiSHMirU3eeAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Staff was friendly from start to finish. Loved the ice cups and the boozy hot cocoa.
The nonstop psychedelic techno made it really hard to relax or enjoy the experience. A better playlist would completely transform this place.
Overall, it‚Äôs a unique experience that‚Äôs worth the try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBBCyXi29aqtuVOZGLWd9m_&fid=0x0:0xb8784f29868b6472"],"When":"2025-12-7"},{"Name":"Drew ‚ÄúMerdyoo‚Äù Palakiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINpmKxZH9e9ISPaO6Ry3IoielkGugeaPItd03z-kTq0O2hMCXD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such an amazing experience‚Ä¶. had such a great time. Did the booze cruise and ice-bar. The workers really made it 20x better. Our bartender Robyn was such a good time! thank you so much for the fun time can‚Äôt wait to come back!","Images":null,"When":""}]

column5: 3300 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
column18: Upbeat casino hangout serving frozen margaritas, tequila, Mexican beers & drinks in tiki mugs.

column32:
[{"Name":"Jasper Pan√©","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWE_c-YkQZhUA9WLQz1XxqRsyzwvi6ES5es3_RzbcPt6qqCBFcJNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rock house was a good bar and restaurant. It‚Äôs a sizable venue that accommodates various party sizes. Our particular private event was curtain off and we were able to enjoy a private experience despite it being connected to the rest of the restaurant. There is also a live stage that you can enjoy on certain days. Staff were accommodating and anticipated our needs. I highly recommend it. Food and drinks in this restaurant is not extraordinary. But it is above average and is what you would expect from a venue like this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBffL7i8CNLu378J3JWJMfQ&fid=0x0:0xf749f2a5b250ffe7"],"When":"2026-1-20"},{"Name":"Dave Danekas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjKuLRH23OL3f6DZnSDVHfaUsEBmrRX3u8U41eHDMYGsOZFms=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were heading to an event at the Sphere  and popped in to grab lunch. We were seated right away and got some cocktails ordered. If you're a fan of espresso drinks, I found The Shakedown delightful. The stoli vanilla and kahlua combine to make it so balanced and smooth you definitely want more.  We went with the Mac Burger and Western 50/50. I found the combo of burger and pork patty with their BBQ sauce make the 50/50 a flavor winner!  The burger prices are low for the Vegas strip, but sides are sold separate.  We just ordered fries to share.  Our server was friendly and we liked the overall vibe of the place.  It's certainly worth checkin' out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhArI4XoEU2Bt41MERZpIP66&fid=0x0:0xf749f2a5b250ffe7"],"When":"2025-10-18"},{"Name":"Blake West","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiaR1wzqh3eQOZe4P-NH2YtvWVnmZH9pGQEu_cAC8UMxsz4TD-8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice place.  Walked in and sat at the bar while waiting for a show to start at the Sphere.  Ordered the Western 50/50 Burger and onion rings.  The beef & pork patties, with extra pork (bacon) were juicy and full of flavor.  The onion rings were large, plentiful and tasty.  Service was friendly, food was a bit slower than expected but not finger chewing late.  It was a good visit and I would go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB8a6s9y42fn4oSsYeXGuDm&fid=0x0:0xf749f2a5b250ffe7"],"When":"2025-8-21"},{"Name":"Jenah Winkler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwr4fiFbpdeucsMIyZWwv2I0JSEPtN6DYTHXuDHMc-GgXKCTMtfg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's loud here today but it can't be helped when there is a conference group getting Together üòÑ. I asked for a Taste the Randow and the bartender has never made it before.  It come out looking like a cup of water you use to wash your paint brushes in. It may not be pretty but it is good. The hamburger sliders are good so are the chicken tacos. The vegetarian egg tastes good to. I am a happy camper. The staff is great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEPbds6Pq38mh0QE&fid=0x0:0xf749f2a5b250ffe7"],"When":"2025-5-8"},{"Name":"John P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_CxPzu3UPAAHeERGMTVR9qQE2x60JpvFcr6APF9_ZVCLP2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amanda and Freddy, amazing staff. Such courteous professional service. Wings, pretzel bites, and buffalo cauliflower very good.Beer cheese as good as anywhere. They carry all sports packages. TV audio very loud and clear. Great decor and ambiance.  Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCxBhtqvotLYq5hfGU2vfUc&fid=0x0:0xf749f2a5b250ffe7"],"When":"2025-9-26"},{"Name":"Valerie Marquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKVcA0cgtg0f1yvh9syu2mVbRyp51yCkDJsa3PiszPzVFRtXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stayed the night at the Palazzo so this spot is any easy walk from our suite. It‚Äôs off of Las Vegas Blvd so that‚Äôs a plus too.
Had a 50oz. to share with a friend.
Service was great!
Wings and quesadillas could‚Äôve been cooked a bit more, but flavor was alright.
Wedge salad was delish!
Good spot to meet up with friends if you don‚Äôt want to leave your hotel.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBWhRmmgiNBsdVlKC9R4xuQ&fid=0x0:0xf749f2a5b250ffe7"],"When":"2025-6-28"},{"Name":"Gen Meneo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdpU1xSafC68Lbs2x7za7bQy7Rar7WhT8XhU3SywQn9d7gFY9h=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ended up at Rockhouse this weekend, oddly looking for a place to hang out for a bit that had beer pong.  We didn't have any expectations other than some drinks and hopefully beer pong without a super long wait.  Ended up having a great time and enjoyed good food and great drink prices.  Timing wise we hit it perfectly for happy hour and drink and appetizer specials (the beer cheese and spinach artichoke dip were delish).  Angelique was our server and she was SO nice and super attentive - super fun personality and with our larger group of 8 she hit everyone's requests perfectly.  We didn't wait long for any refills and she got us quickly set up for beer pong.  Ended up being a fun afternoon and will definitely go back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"barbara kuliak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIF1gKSBxqQOjayh1jTOBGyNfcYH_2gdwAB_f7Hcv_IP8rCpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best bar/restaurant ever. We were there 7 times in 4 days for food, drinks, games and fun. Both Alex bartenders are marvelous. We are not big whiskey drinkers but we went for a flight and every time we went we tried a different kind. The Shibui was worth every penny. The atmosphere is welcoming friendly and engaging. Shout out to Sean Alex 1 Alex2 and Lance. Thanks for the great time","Images":null,"When":""}]

column5: 3300 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
column18: Refined sports bar with elevated decor offering video poker, sports on flatscreens & drink specials.

column32:
[{"Name":"Jason Boyd (Linktreats)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRhExSto05kLVYKnPSyA7MmmznGkEaZOvUwndlwM26mwDMiqaWUA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good place to waste time while waiting for a table to eat. They have gluten free bloody Marys for 14 dollars. The bar is interesting because they have big screens that take credit cards or cash to play games or gamble. The staff was attentive. We also won 1000 dollars at the table on a 25 cent bet lol.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICh9eyMiQE&fid=0x0:0xd7befa367f3c997b"],"When":"2023-2-18"},{"Name":"Nick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1ZDQol1sQR_MVZr_k4w1pb1SymQAu0eqzM3Eni6aHFNkbriI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I didn‚Äôt realize that oscar the grouch had a second job at Treasure Island! Our bartender gave no greeting, no follow up after the first drink, and no positivity whatsoever. When it was time to leave, the bartender had the audacity to say he would comp our drinks if we ‚Äútook care of him‚Äù, as if my group hadn‚Äôt been gambling at the video poker machines for 45 minutes. Picture for visual aid to anybody too young to remember Sesame Street.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICLz_KpeA&fid=0x0:0xd7befa367f3c997b"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"S A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLRsvX-ZS0lS_ElRyL5G97iXHTcB5p-lIpb81qtai0nm_crhg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Overnite bar service is awful..
Got a beer then she disappeared
45min later still not back!
Had to find someone else to pay","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rob Kuzmicz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLih3dbfiYNw0c8oe6osKtukR6-ftHm5rlVtsIrJndYYap44A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been coming here after work for awhile now. Just wanted to say all the bartenders are good and friendly. Until I went one night and got Alison, she was rude and quick with her words. Constantly was complaining about me not playing enough, which I've never had a problem before with any other bartender. She was very unfriendly, and the cause of me leaving this review. Other than her, solid spot for drinks and gambling, and watching some sports on the TVs.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christina Jiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMI8eLk_Ft4rYd8BB0R6DwuR3x16kxA1Sfb_Z_ZqrfRZK6Wg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We came to stay at Treasure Island for 2024 CES show.

Due to the weather, the flu and COVID, some of us didn't feel well so I asked the hotel front desk to borrow an electric kettle. Unfortunately, TI didn't offer kettle so front desk told us to go to the bar to get hot water. We asked around and found out Breeze Bar, which was right next to the hotel registration that they had hot water. We told the bar tender we were staying at the hotel and asked for two cups of hot water. Nevertheless, the bar tender lady, the one with blond curly hair who's in her 40-50's jumped up to her feet, yelled at us, said very loudly, "I'm going to charge you for hot water!"

It was such a huge "surprise" to us that a bar tender shouting at us for asking for hot water! We were so shocked at this lady's attitude that we were speechless for a few seconds. Still, we said calmly, "Front desk told us to come here to get hot water." The mid-age blond curly hair lady remained very rude, "Go get hot water from them!"

It's not that the bar charges for hot water that's shocking, it's this blond curly hair lady's attitude towards the hotel guest. It's totally unacceptable. This lady could have dealt with our request in a much nicer and peaceful way if she could not do it.

During CES, Treasure Island's hotel price went up to $400-$500 per night and it's 4-star hotel. Such unhappy service and experience are definitely out of our expectation. It has never happened in my career life, giving that I travelled a lot. Breeze Bar and the hotel may operate separately. Yet, Breeze Bar and the hotel should already have some common and agreed policy about "special service". When in disagreement, Breeze Bar's employee should never shout at the hotel's guests. There is a huge gap between the management of the hotel and the bars/service that are inside the hotel, which is very disappointing.

We feel very disrespectful by this lady‚Äôs attitude. We will not recommend Breeze Bar to anyone and we will not come back to stay at Treasure Island in the future.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Monica Martinez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNGgeDcpi5MgmrGpbqFfBK55lZxM4vh00PgJCy4c0cqWXKKmT-nw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best bartender ever.  So friendly. Hyped up and the specialty drink is a hello kitty!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICWzviWMA&fid=0x0:0xd7befa367f3c997b"],"When":"2022-2-27"},{"Name":"Erika Solis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRv5dqwou6v_JIaN0Eh5ieu55SgwwpEHw-6of5TtMUzeGlVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service, good food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICEoLLUSw&fid=0x0:0xd7befa367f3c997b"],"When":"2018-7-13"},{"Name":"John Perez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNvNhNEGvvJdMrhUqbxfTm6W_NfoU3x7lLD2natTMB63tNUfpXSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Not a bad place to grab a drink. Love the look and feel of the place. Dead center of the casino. Staff are very attentive. Their menu mostly consists of vodka drinks but it is a full bar. Recommend this place if you want a bar that isn't so packed.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Patricia Rivero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtR8qXa0xVjNbROfcd-ROcyXJJGC2cZhCUjAcHUzq9lHs_63dN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited Allƒì Lounge 66 during our trip to Las Vegas, and it was a very enjoyable experience. We tried the cheese board, which was beautifully presented and had a well-balanced selection, perfect for sharing. The shrimp were delicious and perfectly cooked.
The atmosphere is elegant yet relaxed, ideal for enjoying a drink and good food with spectacular views of the city. A perfect spot for a special stop during your trip.

We paid $118 for 3 drinks and two appetizers, not bad for the type of bar it is! I would go back for a special, romantic night out with my boyfriend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCdzpXhl2MGTn4MKHkZMrtR&fid=0x0:0x7c123f8d8c6b91d5"],"When":"2026-1-2"},{"Name":"Brian Evans (AtomikEvans)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxwJqXuRHACR-3AavykAJbwWS3cOlwjwRCTojIniLZ6w51-dH3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

Stunning views and serious cocktails

The view from the 66th floor is incredible. It‚Äôs a swanky spot, so you will want to dress up a bit. The prices are what you expect for the Strip, but unlike a lot of view-heavy bars, the drinks are actually worth it.

We tried a bit of everything‚ÄîLemon Drop, Paloma, Espresso Martini, and Pisco Sour‚Äîand they were all executed well. I have to give them credit for the Mai Tai specifically. They kept it traditional instead of drowning it in pineapple juice.

The real highlight was the service. Our bartender, Benny, was fantastic. He managed a packed bar and service tickets without breaking a sweat, all while making us feel welcome. We even tested him with a La Louisiane (an off-menu New Orleans classic) and he nailed it.

Come for the photos, but stay because Benny and the team are running a top-tier bar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC8lObCf60NC_rotvxZM7CK&fid=0x0:0x7c123f8d8c6b91d5"],"When":"2026-1-20"},{"Name":"Pam Delfino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVou97WNj_X-lZ_I6WAUZr7ELzzqVVEd-LYy7ydp9dEDslErRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gorgeous, luxurious lounge with spectacular views of the Strip! Service was friendly and attentive. We enjoyed delicious bites to go with our drinks. Conrad is my favourite place to stay in Vegas and I will definitely come back to this lounge the next time I am in town!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDoKMneEIzBdKvcx8j9bEAV&fid=0x0:0x7c123f8d8c6b91d5"],"When":"2026-1-8"},{"Name":"Ally Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRHY6oX5hTxptIyUOQ9-fsthSVteSHAI5xjruOyRJx3EqCGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow wow wow, I‚Äôm not even sure where I begin between the ambience location the views and the food being served you will not go wrong choosing this place!! We were reading reviews at the lobster rolls were delicious so my brother and I dined at the bar late night Friday. He ordered The old man‚Äôs old-fashioned and I got the cookie butter espresso martini which was out of this world! I can understand why so many reviews have come in regarding the martini and of course that lobster roll that we both tried. I could not we loved it so much we ordered a second order of them! The scene was amazing the views were spectacular and the patio to be able to look out on Vegas at night was everything you would want. Thank you for making a very memorable evening! We will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDDTKXHIgEnB3UxiVupC62G&fid=0x0:0x7c123f8d8c6b91d5"],"When":"2025-11-15"},{"Name":"Reetu Prasad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhBhZj_8NlQRDneE4DoyuPCGtZxBNzLHPkMCbqktHRILSYGYgO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great service, awesome view and delish wine list!
We have been coming here at the tail end of our evening as this rooftop bar is located in our hotel.
Service is awesome. Samantha was our server both nites and she was awesome and friendly. We didn‚Äôt eat here but came for some martinis and wine. Great view and this place does get busy so go make reservations but they do prioritize hotel guest.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBgh9_VzzQoZRvdFOEMhDBw&fid=0x0:0x7c123f8d8c6b91d5"],"When":"2025-10-26"},{"Name":"Sophea Son","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJhomdtq5C4mRujYJmbB2WsyiNp-TdrqUR5YzBG8TXZIXzec3uMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My fianc√© and I came here while staying at Resorts World and loved the vibes‚Äîsuper elegant and classy with a great city view. The dim lighting and atmosphere were perfect for a chill night out.

They gave us complimentary mixed nuts and truffle chips, which were so good my fianc√© asked for more! We came just for drinks and the view but ended up ordering food‚Äîthe yellowtail crudo and bourbon chicken were both delicious.

Drinks were amazing! I had the butter cookie espresso martini‚Äîprobably the best I‚Äôve had in a while. My fianc√© got the Mexican Candy and loved the sweet, sour, and spicy mix with the salt rim.

Service was excellent‚Äîfriendly and attentive. Perfect spot for drinks and bites with a view, whether it‚Äôs a romantic date night or a fun group hang. We had such a great time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKELynzMHvnMLG_QE&fid=0x0:0x7c123f8d8c6b91d5"],"When":"2025-5-15"},{"Name":"Mike","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZ8Ph_RwusI086IEENx1yacNy_ZrMtErqXy39SuSMb2uIom-NLTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved it here, got in right at opening and enjoyed a beautiful sunset with some amazing drinks. Prices were very standard considering it‚Äôs a panoramic top floor bar in Vegas so that was nice to see. Hostess and waitresses were super friendly! That was a very nice added bonus.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA0LI4q4iaCWVb0LZKNaBH-&fid=0x0:0x7c123f8d8c6b91d5"],"When":"2025-10-12"},{"Name":"Minnie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNoq-lsCKhmSMhiP4VUuvSgjOwWqZKcOGVS4AKv9b0STFwmKo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was pleasantly surprised by how amazing the lounge food turned out to be. The complimentary truffle chips had a strong and delicious truffle flavor. The food and drinks were excellent, the service was exceptional, and the stunning skyline added to the wonderful atmosphere. The live music was the perfect finishing touch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAUpkBWY2V4CIvnpi1AlYpK&fid=0x0:0x7c123f8d8c6b91d5"],"When":"2025-9-7"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Silvia Torres","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwvLHw6mgiLf3BDbZ6-ANyz2UMg1O51qIPGn3foHB0BwG2fw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had the lunch special double burger fries and a drink for 13.00 bucks.  We later added a Whiskey flight that Noah our server helped us chose according to our tastes.  Food was good and the Whiskey flight was worth its value.  I would recommend this place as a quick bite between excursions in Vegas.  All the staff was friendly and accommodating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAUMe2gjGAcSAR2B_SluCRh&fid=0x0:0xcd227f1e495169bd"],"When":"2025-10-22"},{"Name":"Debra Adimey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBFxznj479tBeZZ0pCrKNSSa8gXI7HZ0JfKYf5l2Z4vzSAtaU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Service was Outstanding! Our Server was so friendly, knowledgeable and fast. We were there for my Granddaughters graduation and we we so happy we had it here. The food was delicious, there were about 10 of us and everyone liked what they ordered from the appetizers to the main course. I had the pork chops which were delicious, the steaks were great and the honey chicken. We will be going back. Thank you for the great food and making our special night fantastic!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDgr5ulGA&fid=0x0:0xcd227f1e495169bd"],"When":"2025-2-28"},{"Name":"L M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXai-1Ntl_wRtPbkSg3ABZxKeIymJ7FKytatvtl8DW8YlwAvVM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You can‚Äôt tell me that all these 1-4 star reviews are legitimate.. this is THE PLACE I go to after a convention at Venetian, or Wynn, or Encore.. pretty much any convention adjacent to the Venetian- I‚Äôll be here.

They KNOW their whiskey.. and they have it ALLLLL.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"George Liss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqFLtumOvybfZ9CQeaLfL2xAzRWDxfa3sQQinWSjThXWvl6vs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had An appetizer and a couple of beers at the back bar yesterday. The service by Freddie was awesome. Great guy with a fantastic attitude.

TVs were huge and stationed perfectly to enjoy watching golf.

I had the eggroll appetizer and it was really good.

Keep up the good work, Freddie","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dan Mccarthy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPC9djSn2a7oenK212oMUTjCuiLwZhDy_1mGa6_WczZkV5ipQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is great. I actually didn‚Äôt realize it was there until I bumped into it. I went there for happy hour and it‚Äôs probably one of the best on the strip. I think there‚Äôs one at 11 and the other at 5. I stopped in around noon. I would definitely double check the time. But it‚Äôs worth. The service is great. The atmosphere is nice. Overall a cool vibe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICHsYXR_QE&fid=0x0:0xcd227f1e495169bd"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"A W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5_aXfVFljlwkN3s2Zy1nwEdo-VxnRAJauDSXii4Wi34lz2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good food. Parmesan garlic was best I‚Äôve ever had! Sooooo good. We split an entree and appetizer and it was plenty.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jainif Marediya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlxAA3V3Gk0r11hnNriE9MAVvq0ZEe3r3nf-otud0lENJjlvhgeQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place is fine for bar food but nothing special. The service is great and the selection of dishes is strong but a lot of the dishes lack flavor. Probably wouldn‚Äôt come back but the restaurant setup looks fun for a dinner meal when music is playing","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDBsrX1Ug&fid=0x0:0xcd227f1e495169bd"],"When":"2023-1-16"},{"Name":"Ashley Giron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjYqlKy7SJFYk_pheFtE3HANYIL_0zYoljrjXqSDgrYgMFT6LH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If your looking to get good drinks! Or a place to chill to drink, pregame this is your spot!! My fianc√© and I couldn't stop getting drinks lol. The bartenders name was hatch he was kind, nice, himself! & outgoing, just keeping it real with you, which we love ‚ù§Ô∏è","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICp6IKShQE&fid=0x0:0xcd227f1e495169bd"],"When":"2023-7-27"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"abhishek kottur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUxB2MrLotcHOYuOfh-KLeBLyPXgcmbOFVwCr0M0kOFMDG1lk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Glass Bar is located inside Planet Hollywood, and I love this place it‚Äôs just awesome! Whenever I go to Planet Hollywood, I make sure to spend some time here to chill. I always have a great time at this place, and it gives off such positive vibes. The drinks they mix are amazing, and I always feel special here. The Glass Bar truly lives up to its name, as it‚Äôs designed entirely with glass, making it a unique and stunning spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCg4LalHw&fid=0x0:0x57f912a23f7233ba"],"When":"2025-2-13"},{"Name":"Kurt Nauenburg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTV5PLC_6aEot6XCyqCRI55DlNAi_tzIa3sG0cQQ_d5YF12pQE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Absolute garbage. We purchased two drinks from the sports book, which is also garbage because there were no decent views of the games at a sports book. The glass bar won't allow to enter with drinks purchased from Planet Hollywood.
Just another example of how Vegas has lost its soul.
I'm never coming back to Vegas, and I used to come a few times every year.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alan Green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvZxqSlhgo2ClY5Xa73Q3wFruH69_g-d4Cj5_RQwFyO0sNoDRNHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to enjoy a delicious cocktail and drinks before you spend a night out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDoW17-AoXoDCY_2_O0XVHs&fid=0x0:0x57f912a23f7233ba"],"When":"2025-9-21"},{"Name":"David","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKcVR7Aad8gjD4vkIt4JXo5Ej50Q841TSwwkr1DKNZ4sd-lsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Been to this bar twice now. Left the first time because the bartenders ignored me for so long it‚Äôs almost like it was intentional. Left the second time because when I asked the bartender for a drink menu he responded with a passive aggressive ‚Äúwhat?‚Äù and looked at me like I was from mars. Then when I got the drink menu most of the cocktails were ridiculously overpriced, even for Vegas.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gia Barone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNM_oovpqfQ_atn_3O6ICFaCUEdQs3h8oA12weqvEvDGfsFxPuGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a cool new spot, I felt like I was in Hollywood! The fruity pebble cocktail was delicious. It was fruity but not too sugary. This is a perfect place to be seen but also have your own a private intimate lounge space.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICdtOymWg&fid=0x0:0x57f912a23f7233ba"],"When":"2024-2-12"},{"Name":"Kushikimi 117","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-hVuKjQC6NoYqk7BwwFesZUBIYR8LBiDpZpSpVoWZskqLhPH6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome welcoming bartenders and great music playing in the whole lounge. Great service and a lot of room to relax and game. From specialty cocktails  to hand crafted cocktails are very delicious.
I ordered a Tequila raspberry lemon drop, and it tasted amazing! It's definitely a great bar to visit.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"FJ S'IV","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoD4s1Ty4HqaWIcgCGeKo7N2apAN3TJpy_gOEYEMEf7JS4wEE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's been a long conference week here in the desert, thank goodness for that oasis called Glass Bar, and more especially or server Misty!  I attended multiple end of day refreshment sessions there with different hosts and, for each one, Misty and Glad Bar were awesome!  I never lacked attention and always had the highest level of service. Mystic is friendly, polite, and efficient!   I always had my next drink two minutes before i finished my current beverage.  That's an amazing feat with a group of 15-20 thirsty conference goers, and there was always a smile and a feeling of genuinely being cared for. Thank you to both Glass Bar and Misty for elevating my LV conference experience!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKaRX4clatjDlJ-1GG-Z4xndIeIzO9W976SSiFvw6HpP79yYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Highly deceptive bartenders.  Andy, first bartender, tells me play 5 hands for complimentary drinks.  I play at least 10.  You need to play in quick succession.  So I play 10 more quickly.  Nothing.

I tell Andy I‚Äôll go next door to the Extra Lounge.  Same hotel, Planet Hollywood.  He says the other bar, Extra Lounge, doesn't serve real drinks.  Not the real branded drinks.  They repour (suggesting not real alcohol).  But Glass Bar is real alcohol from glass bottles.  What?

Guys at the Extra Lounge have been super nice.  No BS.  Straight shooters.

But I believe Andy and play at least 10 more hands.  At least 30 played in a few minutes.

Nothing.  Then he claims there‚Äôs an algorithm.

Other bartender walks by and rudely states "No, it's not green.  No drinks.‚Äù

Whole experience sucked!!

Deceptive, BS, trashing the other bar, ... really unsavory behavior and highly deceptive.

Folks at Extra Lounge are very nice, but I now question their drinks.

My brother was so disappointed too.

Will not go back and will try to avoid Caesar properties.  Culture probably encourages deception and poor behavior.

We're staying at the hotel too.

Stay away from these guys.  Not clear what's realty.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Jay Mehta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqAB6asuyZwota1r1T1ZXmlTf720lXMC7yRpR4yGnChm3hrN8tHg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely to be tried, especially if you‚Äôve never had, like me, a frozen cocktail. The lady at the counter was super friendly and suggested good options. We went for a Yard Dog having a mix of Margarita, Watermelon and a Blue Raspberry. Enjoyed it! Good for two people sharing it. With towers, you can refill it for $15.
The shop is on the main street so no detour required if you‚Äôre walking down the strip. Parking can be a challenge.
Definitely recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDXx7zAuAE&fid=0x0:0x9f73331a5a6b21c0"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Joss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0kFqJoUzYzvGzC2F9I9eVIGZTJY274esuqvbvRwaLzyFSxwK9cw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were walking by our hotel and decided to try one of these ginormous drinks! Very flavorful. You can add shots to them too.
Service was friendly! You can also refill them at a discounted price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDfmJCXYA&fid=0x0:0x9f73331a5a6b21c0"],"When":"2025-1-3"},{"Name":"Nani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfa0WkRBdRSCL39LN27bkTFm1URGK1iIUxLpTcflC8drzSphoKVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious drinks and quick service. You can sample a couple of flavors before selecting your final ones. I passed by a few Fat Tuesday locations during my stay. I decided to finally give them a try, and they didn't disappoint.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID6nZ29WA&fid=0x0:0x9f73331a5a6b21c0"],"When":"2021-10-8"},{"Name":"Tiffany Denier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1bYAqkAIkzAF6rnAGWdpTG0kwFZMkMvxLS-TvGWJEA5V4TGwO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"These were needed when walking the strip. Actually could taste the alcohol in it. And we were told your cup never expires for discounted refills.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAcnlujz8Q7NOA5oDBPciBN&fid=0x0:0x9f73331a5a6b21c0"],"When":"2025-6-14"},{"Name":"Maria Bortters","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXg5VlwOpbE1oKgzSfXTbt_6fyo_ckJgTW7AGwJ37L9krdnMvg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a place that I look for no matter what city I am in Fat Tuesdays is good with the best spiked slushy place I‚Äôve been to ever even out shined the Wet Willies that we have in the city we stay in. I‚Äôm determined to find Fat Tuesdays where ever we go...in Mexico, then in the Bahamas, down in Biloxi, down in Destin Florida. Wherever I am I must visit Fat Tuesdays...they have all the your favorite flavors. Drinks are spiked just right, I always go half-and-half with something that includes the 190 octane on top. You can never go wrong with it..! Fat Tuesdays they always have a drink special that will include refills and a lower reduced rate it will keep you going back all day or all night long. So I like Fat Tuesdays I always go there no matter where I‚Äôm at.  I like them and the employees have always been super nice. Thumbs up ...so in the future we will return to this great spiked slushy place...!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID4reTm0QE&fid=0x0:0x9f73331a5a6b21c0"],"When":"2019-4-21"},{"Name":"orangecheesekj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVoydkUUq0h5VfxrrlkxP2Xb1pkfsv4D1pmOTa4VlPk5sicdYFgw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great tasting to go margaritas, frozen drinks. Premium drink shot choices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICN_ZKq5wE&fid=0x0:0x9f73331a5a6b21c0"],"When":"2024-1-17"},{"Name":"Nicholas Wasserman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkATstOBlIo5zXH1oUEeWezOBGw7E809lhHDoaEqdAMQs-Iw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Drinks were very tasty. Service immaculate. Seriously. Went out of my way to stop at this specific location every day of my trip because Dee Dee was the NICEST person I've met during my time in Vegas. Seriously whatever you are paying her is not nearly enough she is an absolute treasure. Next time in Vegas I will definitely be back","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kevin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlcPZfqvcuvnfUI-JkDLAfst807kz1fVeWXlY62sSnAJtQhVVN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited back in May 2023. The drink was good and had the right amount of alcohol per serving. Was pricey but willing to pay as it's one of things you have to get when in Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDFxuzQjgE&fid=0x0:0x9f73331a5a6b21c0"],"When":"2023-11-6"}]
