column32:
[{"Name":"Christine D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrjSAbKBoSrhNoNUfnPKhsEEnr3OkE8UUj5ZbAOMospy182A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sophia was absolutely fantastic.  I had the athlete massage and she was able to give me the deep tissue massage that very few can.  I have tight muscles and she gave very firm pressure, but with amazing technique!  I have had many massages at high end spas over the years.  This spa itself is fine, a little pricey for the amenities.  It‚Äôs busy and loud. They could have better snacks, nuts would be nice or granola bars.  A donut isn‚Äôt a great snack if you are in the spa for an extended period.  The blow driers barely work.  The seating area is small and not quiet.  But I would pay that price again for the amazing massage!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jackie Adler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUSs9O425rXTWYuMYiSqmbLWxGcivlE0BOybZY29pQXVwY0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My husband and I both had pedicures here last week during our Vegas weekend. Very professional and clean. They are in the middle of renovating, so the pedicure tubs are kind of in the middle of the salon right now. Not a problem for me, but if you are looking for a certain environment, this wouldn't be it.
My technician did a great job with getting my feet super smooth.
No "dryers," though, so I had to walk to lunch with not quite dry polish and wait for them to finish setting while eating.
All in all a good experience, but not sure if it was overall worth the price we paid.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICzmJ_oIA&fid=0x0:0xe6708d3b5619c8a7"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"M Myers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocII6ERHBmJw3xDPZB4WtTdAETaiTiH2xSX9OriJc5lsuMueB8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I usually go to the national blow dry bar chain for my hair when in Vegas but was in a crunch for time so booked here last minute. The stylist went above and beyond to make me look fabulous for dinner and the Mariah Carey show that night, charged less than I expected and did a better job than I would‚Äôve gotten across the street. Will be back next time we‚Äôre in town.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kiley Wallis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIF4QqGpJWlOUYg11qbS4DHJ7Tf4GMgYlbopzAK0T-H_GBCcA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Michelle was amazing!!! She took her time but it wasn‚Äôt too long. She made sure everything was okay with me as I went along and also was super personable. Defiantly will be back to request her. She is great!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Janet G.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrY2rf96DC49VoHLgkBpM4OIfELHQs2d9S3g6jyt9gMUW0tVE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Spa‚Äôs jacuzzis are as pictured, very plain and nothing special. Room had only 2 loungers.  On a busy Saturday, the waiting room did not have enough chairs either with guests having to stand while they waited for their appointments. Wonderful assortment of teas and snacks.  Good blend of Eucalyptus oil with steam to not be overpowering.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mo C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4Sw3qQ2XUW2vm_rB5vs7DIPRDIJBn-a6KISjOEfcUFQJIcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Amazing. Could not recommend enough. We had the couples massage with added services and it did not disappoint. Mandy was an excellent masseuse!! Would 100% return. The only thing is that they kept one door propped open to the women‚Äôs room upon return from the massage which made me feel uncomfortable because people were in and out consistently and women were also changing in the locker room. I think the door should remain closed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"D D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJXizsXhBvxZUTCGRwsWh6v72yJkYJR9agGAxUP2l44kIbKIq8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited the Bellagio Spa for a prenatal massage and unfortunately, my experience was less than satisfactory. I had spent about 20 minutes waiting in line to confirm the details of my scheduled prenatal massage, specifically asking whether they would use the special prenatal pillow with a hollow for the tummy, which I had been assured twice would be provided. The pillow was a deal-breaker for me because I don‚Äôt find side-lying massages effective in relieving tension, especially in my neck and shoulders.
I made it clear that I rely on proper pressure release through simultaneous massage from both sides of the back to ease the tension. When massage is done only on one side, the other side gets squeezed, which is not only uncomfortable but counterproductive. So, I was extremely disappointed when I arrived for my massage and discovered there was no special pillow after all.
To make matters worse, I was promised that the manager would come to speak with me about the issue, but no one ever arrived. It‚Äôs frustrating when you‚Äôre promised a certain experience and it doesn‚Äôt meet expectations, especially when you‚Äôve communicated your needs clearly. I left feeling dissatisfied and let down by the lack of follow-through on their part. I was hoping for a relaxing and effective experience, but sadly, it fell short.
For the price and the reputation of Bellagio, I expected much better communication and service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDhg3Sj0XRAkVMB81Lucbxp&fid=0x0:0xe6708d3b5619c8a7"],"When":"2025-8-13"},{"Name":"Elle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJOvO8wOW6BGcP1HEXZPvBgPwCvAJUa665vGO-nEgLSOhZQBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This spa is more about experience. If you‚Äôre used to getting massages, maybe try a different place. The massage therapist seemed to be rushing through the massage. We booked the customized but it seems they have plenty of options. I had to ask a lot of questions since it was my first time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICezfvfngE&fid=0x0:0xe6708d3b5619c8a7"],"When":"2022-9-20"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"C CJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7i-sOy2Ebo23lmubtB_pu_ZfpiajvDUlbiHUA3vUZW_-DjaKM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Resorts World Las Vegas is a modern, upscale resort that offers a clean, organized, and high-quality experience on the north end of the Strip. The property feels new, well maintained, and thoughtfully designed from the moment you arrive.

The rooms are stylish, comfortable, and very clean, with a modern layout and quality finishes. Housekeeping and maintenance are consistent, and the overall atmosphere feels calm and refined compared to some of the more crowded Strip resorts.

The resort features a wide variety of dining options, ranging from casual food hall choices to higher-end restaurants. The food selection is diverse and convenient, making it easy to find something at any time of day. Bars and lounges are well managed and add to the overall upscale feel of the property.

The casino floor is spacious, bright, and well organized, making it comfortable to navigate without feeling overwhelming. Staff throughout the property are professional, helpful, and efficient, contributing to a smooth guest experience.

Security and cleanliness are noticeable strengths. The property feels safe, well monitored, and well lit at all hours. Walkways are wide and easy to navigate, and the resort layout is intuitive despite its large size.

Overall, Resorts World delivers a polished, modern Las Vegas resort experience with strong amenities, excellent dining options, and a more relaxed atmosphere. I would recommend it to guests looking for a newer, cleaner, and well-run alternative on the Strip and would gladly stay here again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Coleen Referente","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8ZKtbait3KH6aQwmDSFxezNs-e8GaSQEYWg1QG_tKzeaX6N3U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you want some Asian food, Resorts World has some good choices for ‚ÄúAsian fast food‚Äù in their food court. We had clay pot and it was delicious! The mushroom clay pot was flavorful! Resorts World is also home to CrossRoads fine vegan dining restaurant. They had amazing plant based dishes! I would go back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDklL8zMXvKTFcArxm_bA74&fid=0x0:0x46f0f1df163094c4"],"When":"2026-1-20"},{"Name":"Vincent Caballero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYkkQcLBG3xdwtp9AWY9M9XjalAjRefnmFjYJ-LBOXDN2RyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Going to make this quick and simple for anyone looking to stay here who's stayed at resort world before or haven't at all . Earlier this year i was emailed an offer to come stay at the property with a complimentary 2 nights stay - LIES , Total with resort fees and taxes come to a total of $385.00 + a  holding deposit of $300.00 bringing you too $685.00 , glad i budgeted more then enough for this trip lol then upon check out i used there AI Chat "RED" to check out. Fast forward to getting to the airport and finally sitting down then reviewing my charges , i then viewed my pending charges from Resort World were changed from $685.00 to $1071.00 i proceeded with calling the front desk and they told me i was only charged $685.00 , I then asked for an explanation to why i would be charged more money additionally after i checkout? The lady could only tell me it was a system glitch and i would need to wait 7 to 10 business days to see my refund back . Keep in mind room was perfect and the well fridge had never been touched ?? Lastly, forget checking in inside the resort the property doesn't have enough clerks to check you in , you WILL BE WAITING 35-45 minutes just to get your room keys ..
This went from a great trip to a terrible trip , will not recommend this property to anyone . Seems like a property in Vegas only hurting for more and more people to come and stay well they attempt to screw you over behind the scenes.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A Becidi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUL7Tb95kW_9IO5D4Hu2sSY7zRD9nJ1zfst3JtWf98dnCAqJYM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ahh, what can I say? It smelled amazing, looked amazing, and felt amazing to stay here. I see what you're doing Vegas, and I like it! We didn't come to gamble but to vibe out on amenities and enjoy each others company, and Resorts World did not let us down. Resorts World checked all of the boxes for what we wanted in a couples getaway. We had everything we needed right at RW to spend the day in, if we wanted. It was the little details that I loved the most. The wallpaper in the public restroom brought me so much joy! There restrooms were immaculate, period. If you're finnicky about cleanliness, then this is your place. Everything was so clean! And all the staff we encountered were a pleasure. We ate at Junior's nearly every morning. It was a wonderful experience, overall! I can't say enough good things.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC8VwRKfVrjD9ET-doMhXPW&fid=0x0:0x46f0f1df163094c4"],"When":"2026-1-11"},{"Name":"Rob Schneiderman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTRXoghQ7lPH0NfdIyfYkDPX4An0NzCA-PtGcchMbAeR4otp3l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is not your typical Las Vegas casino. It feels much more like a typical resort.  It is a little vanilla by Las Vegas standards.
The people who work there are just fantastic. Aaron in the center/Casino bar is just fantastic. The bartenders in the high limit room are also really nice.  They remembered me from a previous visit and asked me if I wanted the same drink that I had from a month earlier. I was super impressed!
Be sure to visit the ‚ÄúHere Kitty Kitty  Vice Den‚Äù speakeasy over in the food court area. Not surprisingly the bartenders and they are a really nice too.
They have an amazing pool complex as well. When I go to meetings during the summer, I definitely try to stay here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"tanisha brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJWQdvNCL9e5vGBkK7USEMyLG9mHeQKX0UjIf6tZYyWQwWb9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The stay was good but night 1/3 my group decided to check out the street eats for a few drinks. The staff at the bar in the center of the street eats was completely professional. They ran out of the drink we ordered and offered us a refund. However the manager Nicole couldn‚Äôt figure out how to refund my card payment so she wrote a note and took a picture of the receipt. I advised her I would have picked another drink but we had reservations at Here Kitty Kitty. She seemed to understand. As we were waiting for our reservation the same manager, Nicole, came over and walked 2 guests into the establishment and advised the hostess they were taking no more guests. When I approached her she stated ‚Äúwe did our best to accommodate you at the bar with the refund and I didn‚Äôt know you had a reservation over here.‚Äù The hostess advised her we had already been waiting and Nicole mentioned something about a POS system. The hostess then apologized to us and stated she could seat my party of 3 in a cramped area. Nicole offered no apologies, accommodations, or accountability. Nicole then proceeded to contact security, David, to say there was a ‚Äúverbal altercation‚Äù to which all of the staff and witnesses denied including Payton (hostess), Bella(waitress), and Cher (bartender) who was amazing given the circumstances. Security then escorted my party of 3 out of Here Kitty Kitty to make sure ‚Äúwe didn‚Äôt get ourselves into any trouble.‚Äù I was extremely embarrassed! Payton and Bella expressed their sincerest apologies stating ‚Äúthey are under new management and that was excessive!‚Äù","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ping D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-_KBk5-yIGzGmKAkX1L-6QPRrz_RZKkgRnIY4il5exhoL_sw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was suitable for families to stay. The food court was convenient and offered a variety of Asian dishes. The lobby was clean and the room was comfortable. The Fashion Show Mall is just a short walk away, and the Wynn is within walking distance too. For people who don‚Äôt like crowds and prefer a newer property, this is a great choice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA_XHgCk3xcsCGWekYnhCUQ&fid=0x0:0x46f0f1df163094c4"],"When":"2025-12-31"},{"Name":"Maidel Fletes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAyR8tdGwwGnjJ9_Cb8CeP1ghMQDsSt87Vx70ChXZ-2P-Kl58Z=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Walked into Resorts World with my friend and were greeted by Nicole at the front desk ‚Äî she was absolutely amazing. She upgraded us to a room with a great view and immediately made us feel so welcome. We really appreciated the time she took to chat with us and make the check-in experience feel personal. Such a great start to my stay at Resorts World!","Images":null,"When":""}]

column5: 3570 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
column18: Large, tri-level club inside Caesars Palace offers DJs & dancing plus bottle service & Strip views.

column32:
[{"Name":"Riddhi Bhattacharya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUej_VQKD9T6ov0x2ovM2qkyIvn0tW7JKlzuCIbWxRNFOrDpAiWw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredible venue! Great visuals and sound. Crowd was majorly good! The chandelier is obviously amazing to watch. Zedd was incredible to watch live. Omnia really changes perceptions of a nightclub experience","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAoFnp22cIMAgmtIXBhnooZ&fid=0x0:0x7fe4c6478a6de758"],"When":"2026-1-29"},{"Name":"Flavia Grill√≥n","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4m_SFx-d89RplO7Fzd3fCG5QyMZVF51iSyzvWxo-fNrdAg6V8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"had a terrible experience at Omnia Las Vegas, owned by Tao Group. The security staff treated us with zero respect. They accused us of having fake IDs, pulled us out of the line, and made us show extra documents, visas, social media accounts, even apps on our phones to ‚Äúprove‚Äù we were real. It was ridiculous and humiliating.

There were five security guards against two women who were doing nothing wrong. People around us were watching and even defending us because the situation made no sense. At first they let us stay in line, then pulled us out again just to say no, then after 10 minutes of rude behavior they suddenly decided we ‚Äúcould‚Äù enter. One of them even walked away with my ID, so we had to wait while they kept treating us badly.

We spoke with the head of security. He apologized and offered to let us in with free drinks, but after the way we were treated, we chose not to enter. We also told our group not to come.

The worst part is that we went to Hakkasan and Marquee the nights before, also Tao Group venues, with the same security teams, and we had amazing nights with no problems. We even showed the stamps and wristbands from those clubs to prove it. Nothing we said mattered. They even claimed we ‚Äúweren‚Äôt the same people‚Äù because we used our middle names, and questioned our last names despite having multiple official documents verified by the U.S. Department of State.

We also spoke with Edson, the promoter who put us on the guest list. He was kind, apologized, and tried to help, but the damage was already done.

I left disappointed and honestly shocked. Our previous nights with Tao Group were great, but this experience at Omnia was unfair, disrespectful, and completely unnecessary. Avoid this place if you don‚Äôt want to deal with that kind of treatment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA9w_S6I2liGFGFtOoWtEQh&fid=0x0:0x7fe4c6478a6de758"],"When":"2025-11-17"},{"Name":"Nattawoot Maneetorn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURKTpIMhyzjLJBGPeP72OqjmzRvQTgJ6eRf958vA2KAPlB_us=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This pub has an amazing vibe‚Äîstylish, lively, and truly inviting. The music is great, the drinks are fantastic, and the atmosphere makes it the perfect place to unwind with friends. The staff are friendly and attentive, and the whole place feels warm and energetic. Definitely a spot you shouldn‚Äôt miss if you‚Äôre looking for a fun and memorable night out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCA9vKtwm4ws-G8uYzvrUev&fid=0x0:0x7fe4c6478a6de758"],"When":"2025-11-19"},{"Name":"jayson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVs1KLJjadcZNxoBMXDejnFrqJeoe50jxRvScMcsPzvz8Sf6JpN8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had my son's 21st birthday there with a VIP package for 12 my host let in an additional 8 people,  gave us the Top corner balcony that fit us all very comfortably over looking Steve aoki and entire floor . 7 bottle of our choice best spot in the club own security private cocktail waitress.  And gave my son 2 shirts 3 cake pillows and an Omnia  night club hat signed by Aoki. The  night was completely epic. Words can not describe it video or picture. Cannot describe it. You must experience this in person the best club I've ever been to. And i've been to a lot. Thank you Robert Chu , my host....","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAZNh-UaUoIeaCW9CHTs5RX&fid=0x0:0x7fe4c6478a6de758"],"When":"2026-1-28"},{"Name":"Achraf Fawakherji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULxGqgDxpwBgYGwToIv4F2GhndEUt_ZG_rHZhtJaTA4QaEqsajzA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The club is visually impressive, especially the moving chandelier in the main room. However, it gets extremely crowded and it's hard to move around once the headliner starts. Drinks are very expensive, which is expected for Vegas. The outdoor terrace is the best part because you can actually get some air and see the Strip. It‚Äôs a decent experience if you don't mind the crowds and the high prices","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCGHfkhdvoYIMfRGfkb79YB&fid=0x0:0x7fe4c6478a6de758"],"When":"2026-1-10"},{"Name":"Alaaddin Akkaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0Sn4Sth0BrWxpvfrpFZ_BzQCyaqaxglz1U1InDkxOxbIfCXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"My first and last time to Omnia. What happened? The reason for selling tickets and checking who enters and how many people are in is to make sure the number of people are ideal. It was over crouded. Could not move, not get drinks, not dance, not see the scene. The sound volume was too high, over the limit of keeping it enjoyable. The famous light show is too big for the room or the room is too small, I would say more the later one. As said, I dont think I will visit omnia again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA3i_S1ewzjjYxWJ9WtlxTn&fid=0x0:0x7fe4c6478a6de758"],"When":"2026-1-1"},{"Name":"Don Saludares","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVasN9aSrY3ENFPoOWI3b-6heVncnx08SeCr6OcCG7S-qSU7Pusfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very nice nightclub, the chandelier going down is epic. The drinks are crazy expensive though, a shot of tequila is $25 USD so I suggest yall to pre, drinks outside are cheaper. Anyways you have to pick and choose the days you go to, Tuesday, Friday and Saturdays are the best days to go to since its the main floor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhATdYgXoLlWqCV61ra9XJXh&fid=0x0:0x7fe4c6478a6de758"],"When":"2025-12-20"},{"Name":"Alexia Barrera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQ4tQWNKwelwHu9pfTYEg6FTAAQ33MG4ZjB9gGxeSTrmUgE-8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Review of Omnia Nightclub Las Vegas ‚Äì Disappointing Experience

I bought my tickets online expecting a smooth entry, but it was a total mess. There‚Äôs no priority for online ticket holders, and the line was chaotic. Once inside, the club is a maze ‚Äî no clear signs to find the artist‚Äôs stage. I went to see DJ Zedd, and locating his performance area was a nightmare.

When I finally found it, the space was completely overcrowded. Security guards were blocking access, and if you wanted in, they demanded extra payment ‚Äî $60 or more! It‚Äôs outrageous to have to bribe your way into a space you already paid for.

The dance floor was packed beyond capacity. There‚Äôs no crowd control, and it feels like they oversell tickets without limits. You end up begging for access while staff treat you with disrespect. It‚Äôs humiliating and frustrating.

Bottom line: a money grab disguised as a nightclub. I do not recommend it.

---","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD4cg1IiYV5ClW4YjpTUTeZ&fid=0x0:0x7fe4c6478a6de758"],"When":"2025-10-20"}]

column18: Set in the Linq Hotel, this modern chophouse offers steaks, pasta, and other American dishes.

column32:
[{"Name":"Kiira Penrose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhID9QfkTZBp7FNLnssc_QxnzINKTIm24zrutS9hKm6Et2TAfz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The vodka pasta is amazing. Definitely our favorite out of the dishes that we tried. It is very busy in here but we still were seated right away. After ordering and waiting probably half an hour they came to inform us that they had a large party upstairs and the food would be a while. They said typically it‚Äôs 20-30 minutes before food comes out and ours was over an hour. We were hoping they would at least offer us a free appetizer and drink or even simply some bread while waiting, but they did not. We didn‚Äôt complain because our waiter was nice and we know it‚Äôs out of his control. He did end up giving us a small discount on our bill due to the long wait time which was a nice gesture.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB1X-SsGNOX5zMYeqXBGlYl&fid=0x0:0xddbbf9890fbdff5a"],"When":"2026-1-19"},{"Name":"Shannon Jackson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnftc936WZGxPFMugcdAknv92zgXIzyXfjgmRXvODEW2w9DFdP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Chicken Parmesan was MASSIVE. Flavor of the chicken was good, but the marinara was spicy and that was a little off topic putting since it doesn‚Äôt usually come with a kick.

My other half ordered the bolognese and says he wishes he had more sauce. The noodle to sauce ratio was definitely off, and the sauce itself didn‚Äôt taste as rich as he was excepting.

Calamari was weirdly chewy, and quite large. I went to bite it in half and it snapped like a rubber band. I could only have a couple before I called it and let my hubs finish it off. He says they were really just okay.

Order:
Old fashion
Prickly pear mule
Calamari
Chicken Parmesan
Bolognese
Before tip= $111.00","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBjdzAr2PCSPRkLXvg-27oc&fid=0x0:0xddbbf9890fbdff5a"],"When":"2026-1-10"},{"Name":"Ritchie Coleman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAjuUeuyy-abOGUVRkIV9w1CxTCo-ppTfg9VM8ndtzedmTyF2ECQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went in before heading to see GODFREY at Jimmy Kimmel's comedy club! When we walked in . We were greeted by a young lady. I gave her my name and she seated us right away. Our server Nahuel came right over and Introduced himself to us!üëçüèæüëçüèæ Then got us started with drinks and an appetizer. Nahual was very attentive and friendly!üëçüèæüëçüèæ We ordered rolled asparagus, garlic bread, moab burger with fries, spaghetti with meatball, garlic bread, a side of parmigiana cheese and avocado, blood orange margarita! The food was delicious!üëçüèæüëçüèæ After we finished our meal.  Nahuel asked if we wanted to take a look upstairs? And we said yes! We took the elevator upstairs . When got upstairs chef Jesus was waiting on us. Chef Jesus gave us a tour and told us that they would be rebranding as a Prime Rib house. The was cool! Thanks chef and Nahual!‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è The food was delicious and the service was great!‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDreVVbdsT__mhsyfAEOfwE&fid=0x0:0xddbbf9890fbdff5a"],"When":"2025-10-12"},{"Name":"Zachary Belyea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUHRLYJ9RYe6n6uAoBQ_weoPOHh7zDQzuCZ9jwPCY3HXFwaSR4Tw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here twice, a few years ago and again in 2025 and both times were awesome.
Chicken Piccata last time.
and the ribeye this time.
Broccolini was so buttery and garlicky.
My wife ordered the chicken Marsala and cleaned the plate!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCOFAUY_zoJHM8YJ5l0iuKB&fid=0x0:0xddbbf9890fbdff5a"],"When":"2025-10-21"},{"Name":"mwayoe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMuy-rYTCWnqiCbO7RmkpsmOMRWxEFmsqLQMH7IOP2FkKY7oYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The service and food were bad. I went here with my family on my birthday. The only welcoming person was the host we first met upon entering the restaurant. She led us to an open table upstairs where there was another 5+ group that seemed to be finishing up with their meal. We sat down at the table and the host went back downstairs, and even though there were two waiters helping the other 5+ table, neither one of them looked our way or said anything to us. We were there for 15 minutes before we called one of the waiters from the other table to ask for service and he went and got a 3rd waiter, who then started our order. That waiter was friendly, which was a relief, but the food was terrible! I ordered lobster mac & cheese, and the cheese sauce tasted like powdered cheese mixed with water. The presentation looked nice, but the taste was bad. I won‚Äôt mention anyone else‚Äôs meals because I can only speak for my own, but I really wish I could get my time and money back. I should have looked at reviews before I decided to come into this restaurant. It is so unfortunate that it was my birthday, and this was the service and food that I received.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Krista R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJO4WqUCjg7LB8D36_64ZkW_fSwgSctRJkkz5wxq_LhX9IdIeVtw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Enjoyed an excellent dinner here! After eating at a more expensive restaurant the evening before and having a pretty subpar dining experience, we opted to try a restaurant with solid reviews. We chose Off The Strip and had a fantastic meal with excellent service. We had a steak and chicken parm between us, along with drinks. Everything was 10/10. Food was delicious and arrived hot. Price was reasonable too. Of all the meals we enjoyed this trip, this one was our favourite. Will definitely be back on the next trip!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"RPM Repair Performance Maintenance","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJNvIRZYPW19bSTkH8kf1HL04H27eoD12bFxnUS0LvijvmrF8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place. Each time I stay at the Harris I walk over for food and drinks. Met some really good people and bartenders. The food here is amazing! I've tried new items each time and its so freaking good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB56xyN6HcV0I5FXwqxp3j1&fid=0x0:0xddbbf9890fbdff5a"],"When":"2025-8-3"},{"Name":"Leah Hentrich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXz8CAqqDzrDwrSJw946T-S7-P1sIfcdkA1lYAQMhKsiI7MBqg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I got married in Vegas last year in July 2024. We had our wedding reception at Off the Strip and had the entire upstairs for our 40+ guests. We decided to come back this year for our first wedding anniversary and have dinner at OTS so we could relive all the fun memories. I truly cannot say enough wonderful things about this restaurant. The service is sublime, the food is incredible, the atmosphere is so much fun!! We were greeted with a champagne toast and a ‚Äúwelcome back‚Äù from the manager, which meant so so much to us. I wish I could remember our server‚Äôs name (sorry!) who brought us a SUPER DELICIOUS cheesecake on the house. Coming back here for our anniversary was everything we hoped for and more. Thank you to the outstanding staff and team in the kitchen. We love OTS!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB9ZyR5LVWLMLCYSiWkQfd8&fid=0x0:0xddbbf9890fbdff5a"],"When":"2025-7-24"}]

column18: No-nonsense chain bar specialising in the Scottish brewery's craft beers, with regular guest brews.

column32:
[{"Name":"Pierce Colman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfo5bdeVzq3pf9BmK1TemWSunHwZF5Fk_J_QFRdB3O0TgMoH8o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This was a fun experience. Get ready to hike up some stairs but the top floor is a great vibe. We had a great server. The nachos were great and the extra beer cheese was a great suggestion by our server. My buddy got wings and I got the big rib burger. I‚Äôm a burger aficionado and save 5 stars for truly standout best burgers and this one was very good but I thought the short rib was a little dry but overall a pretty dang good burger. I would definitely go back and try out some more things on the menu. The margaritas were great too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAikhFh70p3hwlowtPdmyJG&fid=0x0:0x564531310cccd48b"],"When":"2026-2-1"},{"Name":"DG See","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwkohWP1pE6y_7Kk3U5VL9nxWCeEOLoKGcfwts-sJGLG6d5mY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely fantastic experience. The staff were incredibly friendly and welcoming from start to finish.
Their beer recommendations were spot on ‚Äî Wing Man and Hazy Jane were both outstanding and full of flavor.
Even though I had a short schedule and couldn‚Äôt stay long, the quality of the beers and the great service made it a memorable visit.
Highly recommended, and I will definitely come back next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC13ZnQE94EcJZL78LUGWgU&fid=0x0:0x564531310cccd48b"],"When":"2026-1-9"},{"Name":"Debbie Hernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWy16G1-c5TQhksSHoe765yyg61Rv3hM0m7g_Ej0wyxILd0IoYl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Philip,  our server was outstanding! We ordered the loaded fries and requested a change in the meat.  The kitchen sent it out with the wrong meat. The lady that delivered it to our table, who had an attitude said we couldn't substitute the meat. I mentioned this to our server Philip and he went back to the kitchen and talk to them about the situation,  he brought us out the protein. He really turned around our meal! We also enjoyed a gluten-free chicken sandwich and piickel fries,which were delicious. We also enjoyed a variety of delicious cocktails! The views from the bar are outstanding!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC7ALHDvSgTMnuaE_LlKOte&fid=0x0:0x564531310cccd48b"],"When":"2025-11-14"},{"Name":"Fernando Ortega","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKk9HVPJiY2EIyexbHEGhxlSh4LrvoxT-8A6Rnm3R7ACP_Qbg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wanted to try a different place for wings besides your popular ones. The place in Vegas is located on the strip and is on the rooftop of the building with a view of the strip. Had the regular size 6 wings buffalo sauce. The sauce had great flavor and was perfect on the heat. The beer of choice for me was Modelo but the have beer from the Vegas area to complement your food. Service can use more help.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDT4ffG0YTabqH-T4nFnr7i&fid=0x0:0x564531310cccd48b"],"When":"2025-12-30"},{"Name":"Adam Hovak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVLZZ9-7M9IZAFo240T6AfgW9hcUkJrx6w4Tfh_60l5Ot0Imbt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stopped in because they said they had a rooftop bar and we were pleasantly surprised. 56 beers on tap and buy one get one free appetizers. We had the soft pretzel and the nachos, and both were good and both were huge. I don‚Äôt think 1 person could eat any one appetizer by themselves. View of the strip is a bit off center, but relatively unblocked. Stop in for a bite!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDgucfehUSsswbAvukCNwVe&fid=0x0:0x564531310cccd48b"],"When":"2026-1-18"},{"Name":"Robert Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDdPPjPDuYlyzi5k8OS53W1MZrKwezmS9RXDeYNp6fCg8HUzAn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great, laid-back place to grab a beer and enjoy either the indoor seating or the outdoor seating overlooking the strip. Outdoors, there are plenty of heaters, and all the drinks they offer are great, including the non-alcoholic offerings as well. I visited twice during my trip as it was such an enjoyable experience, and I look forward to visiting again in the future!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAt_CCC1Rc4SmPf-VTX1NnU&fid=0x0:0x564531310cccd48b"],"When":"2025-12-3"},{"Name":"Blaine Losier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJ7A33TeZm72Pg8kemQ-ucbgig3pqA2sbvQZ7YjTK9ztJSkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great spot for good craft beer and good food.  The burgers are amazing and they have a nice selection of really good micro-brews. The atmosphere is great and the rooftop patio gives you a great view of the strip. Will definitely be coming back here next time I visit Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAteT7uMGkj0OuL1kMTk4gC&fid=0x0:0x564531310cccd48b"],"When":"2025-11-15"},{"Name":"JF Bruns","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8qj-3VnkslgAkXe5DRemXf82Ohdc96iDudG6GVhsdwe2p331t=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"12/25 - Here on a Sunday just as the Raiders home game started - PERFECT.  A flight of beers & chicken wings, doesn't get better than this.  Had a great server which make the experience better.  Leaves a water carafe on the table, wonderful for my wife's condition.  Wing dry rub was a little spicier that the server let on, think of Tony Chacheres with a little brown sugar.  Sweet potato fries were good, maybe a little sweeter than I like. Overall, a good experience & will be back next year.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBlQlfeo7DHsPtXwC2heGTL&fid=0x0:0x564531310cccd48b"],"When":"2025-12-7"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Fong Lopaschuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVghy4DswT3JG42N2xoZSY48gReNXUTV8wl1s-h7pzQK8Q5JQLEUA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The bar was almost full at 5pm, the bar tenders were very busy, after about 10 minutes, I was finally able to flag down one bartender, but he tells me he's off his shift. The other bar tender comes, he looks super pissed off-- to be fair, I'd be pretty pissed off too if I'm stuck minding the whole busy bar bar by myself. He was helpful tho, and made good recommendations. The drinks he made, wow, amazing and delicious!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBsOZMd4nRPuMRPVOBMW43e&fid=0x0:0xb3613ff7d17e9f1f"],"When":"2025-11-10"},{"Name":"Mikayla DeKlein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUntCmCMU6dzthFNqHWfbz1bjsOj622wiNwbbb4kwFJpDwxIlg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Aaron and Victor are great bar tenders! The peppermint pattie martini and the Reese‚Äôs peanut butter cup martini are to die for! Make sure you stop in and have one of these guys make you the best dessert martini in Vegas!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCdt0A6CJ8p16xw2nwXH8Wz&fid=0x0:0xb3613ff7d17e9f1f"],"When":"2025-11-5"},{"Name":"Rob CHANCHOLO","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9hxAoR4Y_mRUQ22u7rxk_WtL3tvoL6agS7WG5jCKoX0MlcEmbBA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"No matter what you like from Hersheys you can get it here as a martini... it's a must try... and yes... you must try it

Visit 2.... we came back.... Damn these drinks are good.. bartenders are artists...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDz25oFUICHT3HvkXxjlZP4&fid=0x0:0xb3613ff7d17e9f1f"],"When":"2025-11-19"},{"Name":"Preston Burns","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwj_ilxmaSKnxN731iwZflg66rUnV7VyWPaZINTbWGyBIYejs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly bartenders and a cozy atmosphere. Jason walked us through their delicious menu of chocolate martinis. Located near the entrance of the casino and right beside Hershey‚Äôs chocolate world it‚Äôs an easy quick stop for a recharge. The Second Wind is great as is the Signature Kisses. We were given free waters and candy while we sat at the bar. It‚Äôs worth having at least one üòÅ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICzgfOESQ&fid=0x0:0xb3613ff7d17e9f1f"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"PERFECTION DANCE","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKpQGnR4NWfZoiAW65QspD-CBjFGeKVg0cTGh4qZ0o36j0w1t_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Marco and Anthony had a 6 year old in tears due to the ticket shelf being labeled in correctly. Claiming the toy was an additional 500 tickets than what was labeled. As any other establishment would, honor what is labeled on your shelf. Not handled well at all. Wouldn‚Äôt pay any attention to labels if you can just make them up as you go. Ridiculous!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCHYfSbegqa9MM5obThCRD2&fid=0x0:0xb3613ff7d17e9f1f"],"When":"2025-7-2"},{"Name":"Kathy Americano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2w6JrYIuYMa5N-1O7I6fHXvDpcidgV5rgGeC5Vv29wAxW3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved this roller coaster so much the kids did it twice!! The view is amazing! Pretty decent and fun roller coaster with loops and turns! At night, the lights are even better than during the day. Get the bundle pack with the arcade and you get a pretty cool T-shirt for a souvenir!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICO2ueP-wE&fid=0x0:0xb3613ff7d17e9f1f"],"When":"2022-6-7"},{"Name":"Dominique Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUr0sjDJqXBGWcuffN-YcuFEttbzoAZIrIMb3K_TACgaREVS3A6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My kids insisted on this darn ride. I hate Rollercoasters of any kind. My 13 year old and 9 year old talked me into it. They loved it and I screamed the whole time. We went during the evening hours and didn't have to wait in any line. I believe it was $21 or $22 per person. My son bought the picture it was also around $20. The arcade is neat too. We loved the arcade. It was wasn't empty but it wasn't packed either. We stayed there for about 2 hours. Lots to do for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDO8PPEHw&fid=0x0:0xb3613ff7d17e9f1f"],"When":"2022-6-25"},{"Name":"Curtis Hilmes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVR7gBQDlFeVoqgBPsJPQBNYaVe-TX87HYOe1lpO8GnW805Du8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favorite stops in Vegas.
The name says it all. It‚Äôs a bar right outside the Hershey store that specializes in chocolate based cocktails. If you like a sweet drink it‚Äôs a great place to stop by. They have a selection around specific chocolate, Kisses, Almond Joy, Reese‚Äôs, and a few other sweet cocktails as well.
I‚Äôve always had great service and the drinks are consistent so I know what to expect.
The bar is just open to the inside of the casino. It‚Äôs not a full, self-contained establishment. If you‚Äôre looking for a more involved bar with food perhaps, you‚Äôll have to get that elsewhere.
I love stopping by for a tasty, sugary drink. Take time to stop by if you‚Äôre in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCY8vCWjQE&fid=0x0:0xb3613ff7d17e9f1f"],"When":"2025-5-3"}]

column32: [{"Name":"Finding Collateral Beauty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoZbyGqvN5ph6OlC951O7hPZBOxuU2XvE2JLVDlx2RK6V89gw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Paris is one of our favorite places to hang out when we go downtown and I especially enjoy the Le Central Bar- maybe it‚Äôs the atmosphere.  Maybe it‚Äôs the prime spot to people watch.  But more than likely it‚Äôs the place I had my first Frech 75 and it was üßë‚Äçüç≥üíã","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDZ3qMjMrKpS-1kZKSUqtkO\u0026fid=0x0:0xb726c880f4f5b93f"],"When":"2025-12-18"},{"Name":"abhishek kottur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUxB2MrLotcHOYuOfh-KLeBLyPXgcmbOFVwCr0M0kOFMDG1lk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a great place to chill, relax, and talk. Whenever I'm here, I spend quality time enjoying the atmosphere. They have plenty of space to sit and chat, so my friends and I often hang out here. I relax, grab some drinks, and soak in the excellent vibe. This place is always busy, which adds to its lively atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDg_u37Dg\u0026fid=0x0:0xb726c880f4f5b93f"],"When":"2025-2-25"},{"Name":"Diana Mai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNauQInskL2sOSTAYHWs1FqUCRVia3ho8O6LEvivSDMwF6KtOm6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Espresso martinis were alright. Got 3 of them however 1 of them had about 3/4 of foam instead of drink. Nice place to sit and relax.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID_9fyoHw\u0026fid=0x0:0xb726c880f4f5b93f"],"When":"2025-1-26"},{"Name":"Dave Manley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIJLVa9KaBaX82URLmhq7-g00yVprFtlz_r5CSE80_T6tT9w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to Le Central bar for some drinks with some friends, and we had a fantastic time! The drinks were well made and the service was awesome! Our server was Traci and she was so friendly and attentive. ! We will definitely be back to the bar even if it‚Äôs just for one drink! Very cool vibe here!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steve Bintley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUz91tVXj2WT6I7ulfH4Gp5APOIk3cPC3KNiD2RZ0AT-lIBXQFCDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A nice bar right in the centre of the casino floor. The service at the bar, even when really busy, is quick and given the prime location the prices are too ridiculous. It has a slightly more sophisticated vibe to it but it‚Äôs a great place to relax and watch the world go by.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Opalinski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRHyktxf2sUjvdu4xtGDqgXijZ0kP6bMPzix3poN7ppGjOpcCtQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is a very inviting bar, in the middle of all of the Paris energy, but was ultimately a disappointment. Servers were clearly overworked for the number of people, so we had to get drinks at the bar. Then came the sticker shock of a single drink being nearly $20. I might come back if it were more empty or properly staffed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDegYv0VA\u0026fid=0x0:0xb726c880f4f5b93f"],"When":"2022-10-11"},{"Name":"Gregory Bassine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmNaNfXj3XYyK8h31vaE6ju2oz3C7f0wszLKfCdlBT_gswdi6oEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Conveniently located just outside the check-in area, Le Central Lounge Bar is an easy and comfortable spot to wrap up the night if you‚Äôre staying at Paris Las Vegas. The drinks were great, and the bartenders were friendly and attentive. Unfortunately, the experience was let down by one of the lounge waitresses. A larger woman with curly hair was consistently rude from the moment I politely asked if I could place a drink order. Her attitude didn‚Äôt improve across multiple visits, making each interaction unnecessarily unpleasant. If working in hospitality isn‚Äôt enjoyable for you, it might be time to reconsider. Meanwhile, your colleagues‚Äîwho were warm and professional‚Äîwere well tipped. There‚Äôs a standard to uphold here. Do better.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adriana Franco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWygDJ1R8XWrJr0xGItKl4JWrCBi2Kk9qaEZgNFQ1cHjqb6aSsj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Nice meeting you today up place for a drink right outside the bed towers and registration area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCAjcy8Zw\u0026fid=0x0:0xb726c880f4f5b93f"],"When":"2025-2-3"}]

[{"Name":"Hard Candy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsSJa-z5Aq46asF6vat70Pxm8g1y4YmMrIn_C-C-gu5kHD0gVH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped by the VISE VERSA lounge in Vdara.  It is Beautiful and elegant. Spacious with an elevated sophistication. A grand view of the city center from the indoor bar lounge or from the patio fireside lounge. I enjoyed a specialty cocktail. I ordered the fig and goat cheese pizza both were Excellent. Todd was the bartender. His service was impeccable!!! Unforgettable. The standard!!! Highly recommend. Thank you VISE VERSA patio and lounge.  Sincerely,  Shannon","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDI__GZXg&fid=0x0:0xd8d34d7ab5569be5"],"When":"2025-4-14"},{"Name":"Lom√© Pienaar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLfyt-kcqhi8gXjLOnKaNV0I-mPkdaT5oSAxobfGU0QkC9eZGTx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"When we sat down in the lounge waited for 15 min while waitress was standing by the bar drinking coffee. We decided to just go sit at the bar for breakfast instead after failing to get her attention. Poached eggs served swimming in water and the food was flavorless. I asked for a side of eggs and was told by the bar tender they don‚Äôt serve √† la cart and needed to order a full meal. I‚Äôve never had a problem doing this since most full breakfast meals are too big for me to eat with the extras. Avoid breakfast here if you want decent service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James Corbett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXORPNpjn99AmypwXC5L8gqaCK1buk43veXhtLSzHUK1ZItjmE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every trip to Vegas I go here, have had breakfast and the wagyu hot dog and both were were very tasty. The cocktails keep me coming back and I can spend hours sitting at the bar drinking. This is a hidden gem in Vegas, it is not cheap but worth the price you pay. My last 7 trips I have been here and no regrets and my friends also love it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCB8ol_WTX69zM6ZrqRzy5u&fid=0x0:0xd8d34d7ab5569be5"],"When":"2025-6-24"},{"Name":"Kay Sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVW4GamJnH1HjXq_h4wWs1rKUo1DT8Q_tgJ4RQzwuftSLm1HoNffg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We stayed at the Vdara. We ordered steak and eggs and the cheese and ham croissant.

The croissant was nice. Really crispy and tasty. The steak however was not. We ordered it medium rare but it was over cooked and not tasty at all.

The service was great, the place is clean and has eye catching furniture just like the Vdara Hotel.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCgq7buXg&fid=0x0:0xd8d34d7ab5569be5"],"When":"2025-2-20"},{"Name":"Darya Shestakova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnzi3YfPqisBmdnMaXXCRJ5Pa9M-ZJGYaFC2uHr3CyXgiH0h-yWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's a small but very nice lobby bar with a great service and delicious cocktails. Highly recommend Ophelia.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDoph5IkmR_2sXLypWlGYPQ&fid=0x0:0xd8d34d7ab5569be5"],"When":"2026-1-14"},{"Name":"Abby Kaufmann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVckqL5PhJz-ySjqxKBr1QBvsnQB2DafQCWCpip73OQgEolDe18=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Not a ton of gluten free options - I was staying at Vdara for a work conference next door and the last thing I wanted to do was more walking so I stopped here first to check on some menu modifications. The bartender Todd was incredibly helpful and even called the kitchen to make sure my order was safe which was very appreciated. I did the nachos (corn tortilla chips) without the beer cheese and asked for just normal shredded cheddar. They even melted it for me! It was delicious and I had no symptoms.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Akaravej","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjwwhnPBmnMvHDAQyGhaMSh4AeLU6OB1-xPhWrSz0SbCDZ7bsx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A classic cocktail bar situated perfectly in the midst of all the action, this spot is the go-to hub for pre-dinner or pre-party drinks that will kickstart your evening in just the right way. The ambiance is sophisticated yet inviting, making it the ideal place to unwind and get your body buzzing at the perfect temperature before the night truly begins. The service is attentive and efficient, ensuring that your drinks arrive exactly as you ordered, crafted with precision and care. Whether you‚Äôre looking to relax with a classic cocktail or try something new, this bar delivers an exceptional experience every time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC7jpzVzwE&fid=0x0:0xd8d34d7ab5569be5"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"DM","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJ718hcMSQF0To7CQTfFJ_Fash64r83J_exljiPa-WVp5JCw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family and I have done a staycation at the Vdara a few times now and during those times, we have never eaten or drank at Vice Versa, until recently. Well, we didn't go all out and created a buffet or anything, but did manage to get some fresh fruits and a couple of muffins for breakfast. Additionally, we opted for a couple of coffees here versus purchasing overpriced ones at that one infamous, popular coffee chain located every 10 feet in every major city. Needless to say, our mini breakfast was outstanding.

Unfortunately, that was basically the extent of our experience at this patio lounge. I suspect that down the road, we'll make another trip to this area (whether for another staycation or just passing by), and actually sit in the lounge area to have a bigger meal and actually order some adult beverages. When that occurs, I'll be sure to update this review accordingly. For now, based on the food, coffee, and customer service that we experienced in the late morning of 26 Feb 2024, I highly recommend this place to everyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC9oPu3QQ&fid=0x0:0xd8d34d7ab5569be5"],"When":"2024-2-29"}]

column5: 3475 Las Vegas Blvd S, Las Vegas, NV 89109
column18: Upbeat, casual lounge at Harrah's offering dueling pianos, lounge singers & tribute acts.

column32:
[{"Name":"Carina Del Bosque","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEVnqFwxP4HaXf11R7MTyQShkkpWQnQBhPImAh0mXCfPWB7Th1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was my first time visiting a dueling piano bar and I had a great time. The two gentlemen performing were amazing and entertaining. They knew a wide variety of songs, which was really impressive. The lady taking orders from around the room was okay. She frequently didn't see us raise our hands to try and order a drink because she didn't look at our ground for very long before during around. The inside is nicely decorated and the atmosphere was great. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDvnvkJvic8VdDnLC0B6iFr&fid=0x0:0x4b0342bebd9cbb04"],"When":"2025-11-3"},{"Name":"Amy Jo Behling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpP6I5KMOqFNASzRTpK8AmyqUZr3dkeFkaW2oFCNZGcM6p=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"6-9 karaoke in front of a crowd, not a private room. Adding this because I searched for karaoke near me and it didn't come up. My "go to" first song when traveling, Blue Bayou, was being sung when I arrived. Within three minutes of sitting I was requested to order if I was going to take a seat. Cover charge or per song sung could be a better idea for those of us walking the strip and not wanting to get sleepy. Good to come early as in year's past I did see the piano show crowd. The KJ took a break for dancing the Cupid Shuffle.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCIS1jO9O5qH631yUTGBzgc&fid=0x0:0x4b0342bebd9cbb04"],"When":"2026-1-20"},{"Name":"Jenah Winkler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwr4fiFbpdeucsMIyZWwv2I0JSEPtN6DYTHXuDHMc-GgXKCTMtfg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I didn't order anything food I only got  drinks üçª. I ordered The Piano special and my husband ordered a Lemon Drop. The drinks were good. Our group really enjoyed the dueling pianos. It was fun just being able to drink and have live entertainment playing in front of you. I warn you though if you don't like louder investments than this is not the place for you. But if you don't mind loud fun and drinks then this is the place for you üòúü§ü. The staff is great here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEKLf-va82r2hHA&fid=0x0:0x4b0342bebd9cbb04"],"When":"2025-5-6"},{"Name":"Ryan Jacques","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsSO3xvAbGs_qeKv9sgrbjbMqwKro6UiOPNrrz-wWAjP09_3dtiw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We‚Äôve been to the Dueling Piano Bar at Harrah‚Äôs before, but this time we just stopped in on the way to the Tournament of Kings‚Äîand honestly, we almost didn‚Äôt want to leave. The energy in that place was off the charts. Packed crowd, drinks flowing, and the musicians absolutely owned the room. They weren‚Äôt just talented (which they seriously were), they were hilarious. The kind of performers who can roast a guy in the front row, take a Britney Spears request, and then pivot into Queen without blinking. Pure chaos, in the best way.

One of the highlights? A jaw-dropping performance of ‚ÄúIris‚Äù by the Goo Goo Dolls. That ‚ÄúI just want you to know who I am‚Äù line hit like a freight train and the whole place was singing along. Even with just a short stop, the vibe completely pulled us in. If you're even remotely a fan of live music, comedy, or just watching people get hilariously called out for bad song requests, this place is a must. Already planning a longer stay next time‚ÄîTournament of Kings can wait. ;)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAYKD3r55Ru_xb0zxoSOaNA&fid=0x0:0x4b0342bebd9cbb04"],"When":"2025-7-31"},{"Name":"Denis Fleisher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFxto-BaQj42A-Vl5LGoVVSDWQazM3Q-AzphpzaCfE0f2W3A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"5 Stars ‚Äì An Unforgettable Night with The Twins at the Dueling Pianos!

I‚Äôve known Kim and Tam ‚Äî ‚ÄúThe Twins‚Äù ‚Äî since middle school, and it‚Äôs been amazing watching their careers soar from New York all the way to the city that never sleeps, Las Vegas!

We‚Äôve seen their dueling piano show at Harrah‚Äôs several times, including most recently during our vow renewal celebration with friends, and it‚Äôs always the highlight of our trip. Anytime we‚Äôre in Vegas (or know someone who‚Äôs headed there), we always recommend Kim and Tam‚Äôs show ‚Äî it‚Äôs a must-see!

From the moment they sit down (and often stand!) at their pianos, the energy is electric ‚Äî nonstop laughter, jaw-dropping talent, and unbeatable audience interaction. They can play anything you throw at them, from classic rock to pop hits, and somehow make every song even better than the original.

It‚Äôs more than a show ‚Äî it‚Äôs a full-on party! We always leave with huge smiles, sore cheeks from laughing, and unforgettable memories.

Can‚Äôt recommend it enough ‚Äî go see The Twins at Harrah‚Äôs and get ready for one of the most fun nights you‚Äôll ever have in Vegas! üé∂üôå","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Annie Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPxbUZMFq2IAgQEul4CVmiDRuKYLfqzEfWot1h882NqVMLaAKp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Harrah's offers a lot of entertainment. The one we enjoy the most is the Piano Bar. Cone ready to sing along, drink, and have fun. These guys definitely put on a show this evening. Definitely a place to stop and enjoy the show. $20 will get any song played by these fantastic artists.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICb0d7IqAE&fid=0x0:0x4b0342bebd9cbb04"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Louise D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLdlhJPWZbxhAPnWM4s6LutbO8pz0M7XdmTRi_I_GY-cnrWNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This bar is a hub for some great entertainment. From Big Elvis to karaoke and duelling pianos. Well done for keeping us entertained!

The cocktail menu lists drinks which aren't always available which is disappointing. Staff also looked very busy during certain times.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yuri Castillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVx7cCrBxxRdP5QDLX_PcbiqPLr8xsD_mHUQayUOtinIcrrMwJ9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome spot! Definitely a must-visit whenever we‚Äôre in Vegas. We arrived just in time for karaoke, and it was such a blast. Plus, the ladies who performed afterward kept the fun going!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDX5eO9-AE&fid=0x0:0x4b0342bebd9cbb04"],"When":"2024-10-29"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Mimi C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdwSPqijk5E56mPxv0GHAu34VoPq38X9gffUQAQQ3NOGboH2Pw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôve been to Alexxa‚Äôs Las Vegas twice now. The first visit was excellent, and even though it was busy, we didn‚Äôt have to wait long, which made a great first impression.

The crab omelette was the standout on my first visit. It was flavorful, perfectly cooked, and truly memorable. On my second visit, it unfortunately wasn‚Äôt quite as good as the first time. The flavor and texture just didn‚Äôt hit the same level, which was a bit disappointing since I was really looking forward to it again.

That said, the service was friendly and efficient, and the overall atmosphere was still enjoyable. I‚Äôd come back and hope the consistency matches that first experience, because when it‚Äôs good, it‚Äôs really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBwxnDyf_-aMp_9r1t3lkJE&fid=0x0:0xbabb8c203abf5fb0"],"When":"2025-12-31"},{"Name":"Amir Kazemi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVw1U9JAqzsfwZc_AgFCrutPDzGclFBa0i6-zBwVfUseqQoVVHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alexxa‚Äôs in Las Vegas was an outstanding choice for brunch and easily one of our favorite dining experiences on the Strip. The menu offers a huge variety, so everyone was able to find something they loved, and every dish came out delicious. The food was made with fresh, high-quality ingredients, beautifully prepared, and full of flavor.

Everyone at our table was happy with their order, which says a lot given how different our preferences were. The service was excellent‚Äîattentive, friendly, and well-organized‚Äîeven though the restaurant was extremely busy during brunch hours.

Yes, it‚Äôs a little on the pricey side, but for Las Vegas and the overall quality, experience, and location, it felt completely worth it. Great atmosphere, great food, and great service. Highly recommended for brunch in Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBdJn6W8euhTyY8LoAfHavL&fid=0x0:0xbabb8c203abf5fb0"],"When":"2025-12-31"},{"Name":"Richard Cooper","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9uD5ovlwmjlgrDkVY7mQUJkiAJ0lSliUPVhtkBegSkgLncmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow, did we ever have a great meal here tonight! The salmon was absolutely amazing. It was perfectly cooked, not dried out at all. It was delicious. We also had the half chicken, which was really really good. Sauce was amazing with a great presentation. We also have the chicken Alfredo, which was very very good with lots of chicken in it. OKWe got the absolute best service from blonde Matt and Juan. These guys were the best nothing was too difficult. They were incredibly attentive and accommodating, I can‚Äôt imagine being able to get better service ! If you‚Äôre on the strip, you should stop by and if you can ask for blonde, Matt and Juan, they will make sure you have a great, no, let‚Äôs make that an amazing dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDV0SaFUHI3y_Qq-9fw384S&fid=0x0:0xbabb8c203abf5fb0"],"When":"2026-1-13"},{"Name":"Elizabeth Fitzgerald","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8idw-Wek_kbiJycPM2Zh6HCfQXdkge7yKMCbWmoLKHItUv638eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This was a lovely spot for breakfast! I ordered the Classic Eggs Benedict, which hit the spot‚Äîmaybe not the best I‚Äôve ever had, but quite enjoyable. My husband had the Veggie Omelet, which was packed with veggies, and he said it was good. The Alexxa‚Äôs Spritzer was a divine way to start the day, and the Cacao di Lusso cocktail was delicious as well. The service was fabulous! Overall, a solid choice for breakfast! If you sit outside, you also get a nice view of the Bellagio fountain.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDdTMpNFWIBCqdFL3UuF1Dl&fid=0x0:0xbabb8c203abf5fb0"],"When":"2026-1-14"},{"Name":"Jamie Spranger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMIcWNzyoaJqMF8CtblgslyTGkr0zmU4ClW0OXOKXsMJNgpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Well this was a wonderful pre-wedding dinner. It was upscale and filling. The food was delicious. Our server took great care of us. We were able to sit outside and enjoy the strip and dining inside had a great ambiance as well. Everyone enjoyed their pasta dishes and drinks thoroughly. It was a wonderful experience. If we have a special occasion and we are in town we would come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCduYlcfmr3GZggKJjk0eF_&fid=0x0:0xbabb8c203abf5fb0"],"When":"2025-10-18"},{"Name":"C Alberto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGRfOaVvJeeCP1DHZk-rHTgebnXG4B__HJWSxe-AxrV_jvTvlVzA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visiting Vegas for a bit a of sunshine and warm weather mid January, I decided to try this restaurant because the chicken with basil butter sauce caught my eye on their menu. Wow, is all I can say. My waiter, Edgar, was attentive and very accommodating,  despite the fact that I kept asking for "one more thing". I took one look at my gorgeous entree and decided I needed some garlic bread to go with. Then I needed more of the amazing basil butter sauce. His smile never faltered as I ran him to death. The chicken was perfectly cooked, with crispy skin, the bread crust was crusty, without being too hard. And I could have slurped my extra basil butter sauce without shame. Excellent meal, excellent view of the Bellagio fountain show, and excellent service. Highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBSLjoAgdgtSUuf95dahFX4&fid=0x0:0xbabb8c203abf5fb0"],"When":"2026-1-14"},{"Name":"Donavan Lopez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtAzvoc3hJIzq8-uuU7hCJuPNbENFyiYYfRUFQJ9_WM5xmU2g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alexxa‚Äôs Bar & Grill at the Paris Las Vegas is the Italian-American comfort food gem you didn‚Äôt know you needed on the Strip. From the moment we sat down, everything felt right. The vibe is classic Vegas with a neighborhood twist ‚Äî dark wood, red leather booths, and just enough clatter from the casino floor to remind you where you are, but never loud enough to kill the conversation.Let‚Äôs talk about the food, because wow.The 40 layer lasagna (first photo) is hands-down one of the best I‚Äôve ever had, anywhere. Perfectly prepared, still light and crisp, layered with a bright, chunky marinara that actually tastes like tomatoes and a blanket of melted mozzarella and Parmesan that pulls apart in those glorious cheese strings. They finish it with fresh basil and a little extra grated Parm tableside. Served sizzling in its own little cast-iron skillet, it‚Äôs pure comfort on a plate.Then came the Short Rib Gnocchi in a truffle cream sauce (second photo). Little pillows of potato gnocchi that somehow manage to be fluffy and toothsome at the same time, tossed with tender shreds of braised short rib and earthy mushrooms. The truffle cream is rich but not overwhelming ‚Äî you taste the truffle, not just smell it. A few leaves of fresh basil on top cut through the decadence perfectly. I‚Äôm still thinking about this dish days later.Service was warm, knowledgeable, and genuinely excited about the food ‚Äî our server could tell we were food nerds. Cocktails are strong and classic (the Negroni was spot-on), and the wine list has plenty of great Italian and California bottles at reasonable Vegas markups.If you‚Äôre tired of overpriced, underwhelming ‚Äúcelebrity chef‚Äù spots on the Strip, do yourself a favor and head straight to Alexxa‚Äôs. It‚Äôs the kind of place where you walk in hungry and leave ridiculously happy, already planning your next visit. 11/10, will be back every trip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAE8rzGygrDvCC5W-8QGhN6&fid=0x0:0xbabb8c203abf5fb0"],"When":"2025-11-23"},{"Name":"Reed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCa5blgHKhPxLKCKgB6FBYdg0r1XFkB_AlxMNz4KPV1jMkjGeQWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice place open to Las Vegas Blvd but part of the Paris casino.  We ended up doing a late breakfast one day and dinner another day.  The breakfast was super delicious.   Very large portions. My wife had a crabmeat and asparagus & cheese omelet.  Very fluffy eggs and lots of munster and fillings.  Served w delicious potatoes and an English Muffin.   I had. Breakfast burrito was really good and large. Service suffered a little as an alarm went off and stayed on for 10 minutes.
For dinner we had a nice pasta dish and the 40 layer lasagna.  Prices a little high but what the heck, it's Vegas. Would highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBsYaNKX3EkJ_1YEtxiJOsi&fid=0x0:0xbabb8c203abf5fb0"],"When":"2026-1-27"}]

Biggest downside is price. I paid $16 for a Whiskey coke made with well Whiskey. I can get a complex cocktail at the cosmo for a dollar more. Doesn't make much sense to me. I just don't know what planet a well Whiskey and coke is $16.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica Contreras","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4d5eCbu79REGHOiXpo7SKa6G2N5ojf_vtVYFlNNcjvDoz-p5u=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service!! ALL bartenders were very accommodating, willing to help, chat, and serve, one even said, \"don't worry about it (when I said, \"sorry for the complicated drinks\"), that's what I'm here for!\" Played some video poker in good company, thank you for being a surprisingly patient and welcome ok ng bar experience! Byron, Jimmy, and Matt - you're the bestest!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Manny Gastelum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmici6HAnIyX_GpgfW4JkQbTpAN2q5djWDV_PkJNQDASiS43Jj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jose, overnight bartender, his service, attitude,  and work ethic was awesome. Despite the late hours of the day, Jose disposition was exceptional and inviting.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David E.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQaauEvrJNN9pQ0Vzjgs9xAF3cNhYuob68blvq-IKm6-T5-3M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice small bar with friendly staff. The machines are not loose but the food is great ant they have fun bartenders.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jared Frerichs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPj_K3dqopvXa84IjZsmw0WxpcVfAiVjvm2dJ7fxJ7ngzMz32hlg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The bartenders are accommodating and doing the best they can with some obnoxious new rules from management.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Santos Gomez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuaLRM2FX_UnBBKFTYefCVvZOmmiY7WmYY4C-ANlxLQAzvleq_Aw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Pretty terrible pricing for the drinks.
