column32:
[{"Name":"M4l2K T4N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWV4wXrhjNiOYlvktn1UJuu0CpU8fhtmCt1QArE7pDV4zllRck=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pricey but expected in Vegas. Every drink was perfect and had its own original twist. The butter and brew is highly recommended for those who like a cookie stout twist. Can get short handed and so service slows down a little. Drop by amidst the action at the tables!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC5by1-KrAOEdj-oa9RZe4N&fid=0x0:0x27b3eae44da9ca96"],"When":"2026-2-16"},{"Name":"Ben Sigal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbE_hwtCTcC8rDDmUbhGRqFHbieNoqoCNJjhDqd2Df3rGtu0Y8Ag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We walked in Friday afternoon right after a large business party had entered the lounge. They were swamped and it was a mad house, but I have to call out two things:

Sidni is an amazing bartender who nailed two complicated drinks for us in the midst of the crazy. She did it with a smile on her face, and a sincere apology for the delay. But more than that, these drinks were delicious! Which takes us to the second point‚Ä¶

This smallish lounge is a powerhouse. I get the feeling it may be overlooked for Electra, but the art deco atmosphere and design is fantastic and the curated drinks are delicious, especially if you like brown liquor (which I love).

Come in. Enjoy a drink. Be patient and kind. And to the manager, please make sure to take care of this staff, especially Sidni! We will be back for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA4oDm1o_HFLqH4WrdZfcfA&fid=0x0:0x27b3eae44da9ca96"],"When":"2025-8-30"},{"Name":"A G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmlQNlwmktt1I_2dG-sddc0NICAF-lx_5OqviXf_PkDI1dfhV2MQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love love love the art deco atmosphere!!! Bartenders are amazing as are the drinks! Had an amazing time here!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDAQTniQLaBVwv-bIUU7FXf&fid=0x0:0x27b3eae44da9ca96"],"When":"2025-12-14"},{"Name":"Annabelle Veatch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_Hb63PWHwePizDSQT4kHMtRl_QGPnZvNigk2d7m25TWbsVDxU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Classic cocktails üç∏ and 1920s style design!
Expertly crafted cocktails. We sat at the bar and received great service from the bartenders! ‚ú®
I want to go back!!! üòçüôå","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBsuxeXtXWOt0nDbxmJUCu0&fid=0x0:0x27b3eae44da9ca96"],"When":"2025-12-1"},{"Name":"Jaden Stock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMM9mMp7S4J1KgMvdZkt9eUIT4QNIh6pYrNF3QSbTDqXXSH2CU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"When my friends and I arrived at the bar they asked for my card at the door. I was a little confused and asked why. The hostess tried to explain but I didn‚Äôt really understand. I assumed it was either a hold on my card or like they were opening a tab. Not uncommon at dive bars (a little uncommon at fancy cocktail bars but whatever, I wasn‚Äôt too concerned). A few days later I look at my bank statement and I see two charges to my card! One around $80 which I believe is my bill and about her mystery charge around $70.

I try to call the bar but after about 20 min on the phone getting transferred around the phone tree of the Venetian I get to the voicemail of the bar manager. I left a message but never heard back.

UPDATE:
They did get back to me and refunded the duplicate charge after I emailed her directly, which I appreciate. That said, it took too much effort on my part ‚Äî calling around, leaving voicemails, waiting for a response ‚Äî just to get back money I shouldn't have been charged in the first place.

Aside from the billing issue, I just didn‚Äôt find the bar that impressive. The drinks were overpriced and honestly not that good. One cocktail had a fire ring, which looked cool but made the glass hot and warmed the drink in a weird way. If you're looking for good cocktails, just go off strip. Even with the Uber costs you'll be saving money.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCmpdr7sImKtgBy-g2-Xg8s&fid=0x0:0x27b3eae44da9ca96"],"When":"2025-7-24"},{"Name":"Summer W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8_UATk9Vv2C48hYpwNb-2_NpqyL9Q1GtQKSmQBQqFIhdWPw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Upon checking in, the host asked and took my credit card and without informing me in advance, brought me a $100 minimum charge bill to sign. I didn‚Äôt want to make a fuss so I signed it. Then i asked for water, they told me they don‚Äôt provide water unless you buy the Fiji water which i read online cost $8 per 300ml bottle. Then the drinks, they are mediocre at the best. Way overpriced. Worth $15 per drink at most. In the end, I got my bill, they charged me $5 for service fee and still expected me to give 20% tips. I felt lucky when I was able to book a spot for the same day. But now I understand why the place was half empty on a busy Saturday night.
They are so eager to milk cash from you, it is on the borderline of robbery.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC9nN2NkwE&fid=0x0:0x27b3eae44da9ca96"],"When":"2024-3-4"},{"Name":"Alexei Marshakov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcPKeuMUBfBdKwOosWGTZi0z3jANAHj8ay4MgqYicBMnSO0Co8zQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Beautiful small cocktail lounge serving inventive cocktails. Great service. Reasonably priced, but $8 water is an insult üòï","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEK6bl-OO9M-XxgE&fid=0x0:0x27b3eae44da9ca96"],"When":"2025-5-22"},{"Name":"Alicia Thompson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjm9M8h0RXg0zO3Ssp_8ND8HGaQZ67ihB1DlkwQzPjzO-zmwk3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favorite VEGAS lounges. This is the club with the button to push for champagne. The atmosphere is straight out of Gatsby and the seats are soft and plush. Staff is lovey and the bartenders are knowledgeable and some of the best I‚Äôve ever had the privilege of hangin four with on the strip. They have a secret menu, so I highly recommend telling the bar staff your favorite flavors and letting them whip something up. You won‚Äôt be disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICstsSDag&fid=0x0:0x27b3eae44da9ca96"],"When":"2020-2-1"}]

column5: 3355 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
column18: Chic lounge inside the Venetian for craft cocktails, wines & punches served in posh surrounds.

column32:
[{"Name":"Jasper Pan√©","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWE_c-YkQZhUA9WLQz1XxqRsyzwvi6ES5es3_RzbcPt6qqCBFcJNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent Cocktail room with some of the highest quality libations on the strip. My experience here was unparalleled with all the other cocktail rooms. The staff is also very attentive and always anticipated what we needed despite the crowds of people in the room. i Recommend this venue, especially for private events. The atmosphere and service is conducive to conversations.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAg5P1bvYUx83byj-5vt-Bt&fid=0x0:0x57a100f4be84dc76"],"When":"2026-1-21"},{"Name":"Jo Ann Patterson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIhXVC537L9xIk3J-dx5VvDDWnETTZh8fq3DO8fNUbelNEqnA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We stopped in to check out this bar for my nephew‚Äôs birthday. The space was mostly empty, yet the bar itself was standing-room only, which made for an odd and uncomfortable setup. While the bar looks upscale, the drinks were overpriced for their quality, and the service did not match the prices being charged.

One server in particular negatively impacted the experience. A young man covered in tattoos, he was consistently snarky and dismissive. Basic questions were met with sarcasm, and his attitude made it clear we were not welcome. This was especially disappointing given that we were there to celebrate a birthday.

We did observe another server‚Äîa short-haired blonde woman‚Äîwho appeared friendly, attentive, and professional. We wished we had been served by her, as she seemed to provide the level of service that should be standard at a bar charging premium prices.

Overall, the bar prioritizes appearance over hospitality. For the cost, we expected better drinks and significantly better service. We will not be returning.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"shiyin zhao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwGRnt92Jw6M1z1QdTA4i6a1c96m0zM2irk2Ke_we9LRAEjOg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I visited this bar on our last night in Las Vegas, and Olivia took such great care of us. Her service was amazing Ôºåwarm, attentive, and she truly lifted the mood with her positive energy. She also recommended some delicious drinks that we absolutely loved. Olivia made our last night in Vegas even more perfect. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA08rOXRp5ugv2QaLAibape&fid=0x0:0x57a100f4be84dc76"],"When":"2025-9-23"},{"Name":"Shaila Sterling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeYGX6l6UlBRh1W1ymK1DzHffD0SJv-8GEC9LitjC0jwSVwFGX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love this place! As you enter, you are greeted by a lovely hostess who escorts you to your choice of table, bar or couch+coffee-table seating. We have ‚Äúour couch‚Äù as this is our daily routine for the week we are in Vegas. We order the same thing every day. The cocktail menu offers two ‚Äúmocktails‚Äù (non-alcoholic), and we get one of each. Mine is the ginger/watermelon. That ginger kick gives you the familiar burn of an alcoholic drink but it‚Äôs also sweet, which is what I like. They also bring a snack trio of mini toasts, snack mix and chocolate covered raisins. Yummy! Our waitress, Cianna (shown in the photo) is charming, and helpful. We feel well taken care of, as a guest, not just a mere customer. Enjoy the sultry ambiance of low lights, popular music and old timey reels of Hollywood Greats. Bill it to your room through a Costco Vegas package and your $25 a day drink allowance will cover this!!! Wahoooo!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAdRXEaW_92lB4c1m7Ky3Zr&fid=0x0:0x57a100f4be84dc76"],"When":"2025-9-3"},{"Name":"Vallon Holcomb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVp1zNW6m5PtKMpXRo8GwCSIl7m03NgCq80_rdshNpODhjItx64Yg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I had a terrible experience here. The DJ was horrible, and while the live psalmist wasn‚Äôt bad, there was clear confusion they had booked both and took turns, which threw the vibes off. I originally gave this place a try after hearing her at the start, but I wish I hadn‚Äôt.

When I arrived, there were plenty of empty sections and lots of seating available. I bought a $30 drink and sat on one of the couches. After sitting there for about 30 minutes, the host came up and told me she needed to seat someone else at the table I had already been sitting at. Not even for a large group  just for two people. To make it worse, there were several other empty couches marked as reserved she could have used, but instead she chose to move me. I asked where I was supposed to go, and she directed me to a high bar stool.

I was shocked. How can you move a paying customer who has been sitting for over 20 minutes especially when there were so many other open sections? I told her it wasn‚Äôt right, but all she said was ‚Äúthose are reserved.‚Äù No one ever mentioned that to me, nor did anyone stop me when I sat down.

On top of that, the host was rolling her neck, giving attitude, and showing no professionalism. For the high prices they charge, the service and music are not worth it.

Do not visit this place. Bad music, overpriced drinks, rude staff, and a poor experience all around.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhANw0_gu9z9Mq5nGudoQ2LO&fid=0x0:0x57a100f4be84dc76"],"When":"2025-9-1"},{"Name":"Jenah Winkler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwr4fiFbpdeucsMIyZWwv2I0JSEPtN6DYTHXuDHMc-GgXKCTMtfg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our friends enjoyed their old fashioned quite a bit they ordered three of them. I really enjoyed my strawberry daiquiri on the rocks. My husband said the lemon drops were quite good. I really enjoyed the owl cup my fruit and basil came in. The fruit and basil drink itself was okay. Olivia was the one serving us last night around 5:00. She did a great job despite how pack the place was. Thank you Olivia for the excellent service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEMHW2JyrhJzI1gE&fid=0x0:0x57a100f4be84dc76"],"When":"2025-5-7"},{"Name":"Aaron Sansom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJl89oaKFU4wP6b8m19Sh-ybXP9cLnwPXNYtRbHJOvtqzcJ5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
The Juliet Cocktail Room was a bit of a letdown. Cocktails tasted good (we tried the watermelon and vodka cranberry), but the overall experience didn‚Äôt match the price tag. Drinks were very expensive, the selection wasn‚Äôt great, and on top of that we had to pay a venue fee, which felt unnecessary.

We didn‚Äôt eat, but the food menu also looked very overpriced. Staff could have been a little more attentive and welcoming, which would have improved things. Overall, nice cocktails but not worth the cost.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhChMOqb9E6ls1yDP5ZQluz1&fid=0x0:0x57a100f4be84dc76"],"When":"2025-8-29"},{"Name":"Rebecca R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSVYTmbs57YZyUJGicWYPn5JODgl74cEeEjR057M65CkGZ7KVI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This lounge has been a favorite of ours, but we hadn‚Äôt been since it became The Juliet.

We decided to stop in for a couple cocktails before a show and was treated to a beautiful drink menu of craft cocktails, great service and one of the best cocktails I‚Äôve had to date, The Monkey Slide - so good!! Presentation was top notch!

A chill, intimate, classy vibe was just what we were looking for and we found it here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCuLVDUnh0WzQTa1m3JIDFt&fid=0x0:0x57a100f4be84dc76"],"When":"2025-7-8"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"MIKEY LAP","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5sk6JHAJo4yBrvVDm5liyPvddTDQ0modh29mnvqs6o0LT0xgGsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place should be called Ben's or Benjamin's Bar not Bugsy's!!  A bug is nothing! A bug does not exist. The word has no meaning. Its used out of ignorance or malice. A bug is a colloquialism which has no basis of reality. Insects include a wide variety of living creatures that fly or crawl but none of them can be called a bug!  Nevertheless Bugsy's Bar offers top shelf liquor at affordable prices under 20$ worth getting if your in-between table games and need a drink without overspending!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID-pJnYSA&fid=0x0:0xd314c851d3df610d"],"When":"2022-11-21"},{"Name":"M L (Momo)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4t8NrB_1RCDJzpBIK5FcI3P8MxGE2sfgFSfmAky1MX8L9XXj2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service and the seafood tower is delicious like always. More on the pricey side.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDVhrvOZw&fid=0x0:0xd314c851d3df610d"],"When":"2023-12-12"},{"Name":"mad trailblazer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKiNhzx7_v2rWyBuMDjAMhLDLl47EzPbGrdSDm1obBVwvrChg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The bartender at 10-01-2024 around midnight was awesome and helpful,  I wrote a not to myself and that woman who ripped me off was my fault for getting too drunk and stupid.  For some reason I forgot in the morning but I remember both bartenders were respectful and helpful.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ed Hsieh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOIWzd9fRJsDMbOyA9PcRfwbsepMEVHKNa9BAAmWM2JmqESp98=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It was closed . Looks like close down but Google map appear it‚Äôs open 24 hours","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"linda mccarroll","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJTjw4T1AIylFdAPTI54lxOQr47hbi4wbr9uMxJIimXIwiMlw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Would not return over price for the food.
Ordered the tomahawk steak, waiter stated it would take 30 - 35 minutes. The steak come out in 15 minutes chard, cut open raw.
Had to send back. They did finished cooking the over price steak.This was $155 for the steak, bread was $10 and cool mashed potatoes.The waiter was pleasant, very cold in side, probably why the mashed potato were cool.
Not worth the price, there are a lot of better steak places to go.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"DANIELLE CLOUD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKE_ykCfo5ardGPENlb0hkLM9EFB0zDhPzTnwwLM8fhQuPJ3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"In addition to the drinks being mediocre, this bar had the nerve to also have awful service. I witnessed such a disturbing act of rudeness from the staff towards another patron while visiting yesterday. A young woman was attempting to order a glass of water. The bartender (with red hair) got it and placed it out of reach. For 5 minutes the young woman kindly tried to get the bartender‚Äôs attention to have the glass of water handed to her and place an order and was blatantly ignored. After taking another order and a phone break, the bartender yelled at the woman saying she heard her the first 6 times and then ordered security to escort her out for harassment‚Äîunjustifiably. The bar wasn‚Äôt even busy and the bartender prioritized backfilling straws instead of taking this young woman‚Äôs order.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"T T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTREiyRblMqJGfrFceKuMgrcD2RuqRz0cpdGnaFS9NieWJguho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"There are great bars in the Flamingo‚Ä¶this isn‚Äôt one of them. Inattentive bartenders and especially poor customer service from bartender Robert. Impatient and unprofessional with guests. He should not be in a customer facing role/industry. The lounge/bqr inside Bugsy and Myer‚Äôs Steakhouse (or any other bar on the casino floor) is infinitely better in service and drink quality than Bugsy‚Äôs Bar.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bijan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-yu056YAFLGizXryJbEKODl72Tr5AsNMXlLw03348An3DT1Buew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I've been to this bar a few times out of convenience since it is in the middle of the flamingo. Everytime I've gone it has been a poor experience from rude bartenders to not knowing how to make simple drinks, Bugsy's consistently disappoints. There are better places to get a drink in flamingo and nearby.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"kia Hunt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbXS33n3gwHEwz_RIFEfPfE_JXsdmst_9fSitn7flvnJ4owQw-BA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a really good place to visit. My boyfriend and I visited this place for my birthday weekend and it did not disappoint. I had a bacon burger with cheese medium well and it was cooked perfectly. My boyfriend had the fight wings and he said they were delicious. We also had the daiquiri flight that gave us the right amount of buzz. When visit Vegas again, this will definitely be a place I‚Äôll visit again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCAaGdolrzBzhBczDwpcRsV&fid=0x0:0x47033bf7777ac5f5"],"When":"2026-2-14"},{"Name":"Shantel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-ZlzJFM65aLooHID2UOf5Ip9c8nseC_SpZbKvxDl707xF6DnbIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Heard about this place on TikTok and decided to give it a try and very glad we did. The drinks and most of the food comes in flights with 3 different types of each item. It‚Äôs the absolute perfect place for someone who‚Äôs indecisive or is always wanting to try just a few bites of everything. The food overall was good, I mean everything was cooked well and some of the flavors of things I didn‚Äôt love overall we really enjoyed our meal. My husband had a mojito flight and I had the frozen margarita flight, both were good I truly loved the prickly pear margarita! Then for dinner we shared the slider, shrimp, wing, and french fry flights. On each of the flights there were 2 we really liked and 1 we didn‚Äôt really love but like I said overall really tasty food. We ended with the cheesecake flight which was perfect to share and fun to see if we agreed on the best of the 3 flavors. We both agreed this was a nice relaxed place and we‚Äôll probably return again next time we‚Äôre in Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDzNfNfac8G5954UhC6Mva4&fid=0x0:0x47033bf7777ac5f5"],"When":"2025-12-3"},{"Name":"Loving Life","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjKWLxlBTaTJCS6ZHq8c9XPCZO_iB5FcEwM1UaRaMPJHdeCdBHmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I flew to Vegas just to try this place, and let me just say, I was not disappointed. It was more about the experience for me. The waitresses were so amazing. The food and drinks were good. I had the fries, wings, margaritas on the rocks, and the skewer flights. The prices were also reasonable. The best part was being able to purchase a to-go drink and walk around the shopping center.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCDKh8cH7ZVwrFdgBl87dYH&fid=0x0:0x47033bf7777ac5f5"],"When":"2025-12-9"},{"Name":"Mary Arao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvXEcmXkNCqwHk5cM63a4vRTnEhQuyfzSzTMNPkRxEZ4eNrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We went there on Friday about 9p. No reservations needed. We were seated right away. Our server was friendly and helpful. Cool atmosphere. We started with the pina colada flight... my niece doesn't drink but really liked these samples. We ordered the shrimp flight, chicken flight and signature skewer flight. We really like the shrimp, the chicken was a little dry and the skewers looked really cool. Great way yo eat and drink because you have three different ones you can try in each order","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDlblayGdVjlD6xSdO4kyCf&fid=0x0:0x47033bf7777ac5f5"],"When":"2025-10-1"},{"Name":"Rose W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsUEhYAA5f184QzS-eMI1VOnF4JyDDL626bia_p6DrcRL-UCZS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you‚Äôre someone who likes to try a little bit of everything this is the place for you!

I went with a group of 5 and we split the ‚Äúaround the world‚Äù flight which is all of the signature flights and 2 desserts. For the price, you get so much food and this is one of the best ways to get something for everyone at the table to enjoy without breaking the bank.

Services was friendly and food came out relatively fast. Some of the food didn‚Äôt have much flavor, while others were wonderful. I would come back here with a group to do that same around the world flight again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCj6J5sntOEcJH8IpIQ_YNt&fid=0x0:0x47033bf7777ac5f5"],"When":"2025-10-9"},{"Name":"Yuni Still","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyaAzoGYn4SmYuP9U9nrSkiS0pY7OofT5rou9y-Msk0y--vL8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was good, drinks were great, and the service was solid. Overall, a nice experience. The only downside was the chicken wings‚Ä¶ way too expensive for the portion. Other than that, everything was enjoyable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB_trC0uyxdI5llApH7SzWz&fid=0x0:0x47033bf7777ac5f5"],"When":"2026-1-4"},{"Name":"Racheal Turner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNP0D3Lo8thJLOjCKZiqkuK1ziVoOgDFk4xuzPs3vwoIRmmgo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Found this place by accident! We had reservations for a different hard-to-get-into restaurant, but after a long day and being lazy, we didn‚Äôt want to go back to the hotel to dress up, Uber in traffic, and wait to eat. So we ended up walking into the mall to find a place to eat and chose this place, thinking it was a food court mall/ quick airport-type restaurant! To our surprise, the food was really good! The service was outstanding! It wasn‚Äôt the atmosphere we had originally anticipated, but we ended up going back a second time during our trip! The food was really, really good! Flight drinks nice as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDLhkOfYES_oKO3xYIWy_lO&fid=0x0:0x47033bf7777ac5f5"],"When":"2025-10-26"},{"Name":"Steven Warren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2n-Vh8s_ISKKtKsF-tExYJb8L7pttJyxY1Ge7YYnNPVTuf3hBZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The restaurant was not busy when we were there, but it felt like we were being rushed out between eating the meal, paying, which was not desirable. The food itself is ok, but is clearly bar food but carries the price of more expensive restaurants in the area. I recommend going to other restaurants like the food hall just down the hallway.
The vibes itself were the reason to come, if you wanted a flight of anything between the food and the drinks, that is why you would come here. The gimmick was funny, and if your only coming here for that, it is worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDp8mO9FRUO6USkFxGkXwPe&fid=0x0:0x47033bf7777ac5f5"],"When":"2025-9-24"}]

column5: 3663 S Las Vegas Blvd #183, Las Vegas, NV 89109
column18: College-style bar & grill at Planet Hollywood with 40 TVs, beer pong, grub & cheerleading servers.

column32:
[{"Name":"Rolling with Rolland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0_7N1dWZ2cVlyBR_4mA-kYoFB83GfSoax8LSvuSHVvaAgS0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We stayed at the Hilton Elra and Blondies was a easy walk. We had Isabella as our wait staff and she was amazing! She remembered our orders from the day before even. She was great! The food is good and it‚Äôs really a sports bar but we if we were looking for a good bite to eat this was our spot! Good food, great service, and if you love sports this is the spot! The food for Vegas is reasonably priced! We will come back here next time we are in Vegas. If you hate noise I would say this might not be your place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBlc4a7w2C67p3umg3BKWIb&fid=0x0:0xb8d44bf04ca1715b"],"When":"2025-12-29"},{"Name":"Celeste Abbott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdJiBMsHYbS-HBbWNiat8Jv_cp3piZXHP2ndYc2Ka_nThYeFk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è (2/5) Disappointing service and surprise fees

We ate at Blondie‚Äôs and the service was frustrating from start to finish.

First, we ordered the appetizer 1 lb of hot wings and specifically asked for all flats (if possible). What came out was all drumettes with only one flat. If you can‚Äôt do all flats,doing the opposite is just bizarre.  Wings delivered. No napkins and no plates to share our appetizer.

Service was extremely inattentive. As a lifelong hospitality person, I understand the business and I had to get up to get napkins myself, and then when my salad arrived we still didn‚Äôt have silverware, so I had to track down a busser to get utensils. No one checked on us or noticed we were needed basic things.

They also never cleared plates, so our table was covered and there wasn‚Äôt room for the rest of our food. I literally had to put baskets on the floor just to make space, which is gross and not something a paying customer should have to do.

To top it off, the check included a surcharge $4.99 and then the tip suggestions start at 18%. Between the  fee and the lack of service, that felt pretty insulting.

Food was fine, but the service and the extra charges ruined the experience. I wouldn‚Äôt come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA3gXEVfQxLn4Y-HtBYTxSp&fid=0x0:0xb8d44bf04ca1715b"],"When":"2025-12-30"},{"Name":"David Nugent","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbYQWpuuzZ2MrKwIevYmohzLDWDgA06jrA4MPBksB32OHvJkV-sg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Traditional breakfast for $15.99 for 2 eggs 2 bacon OR 2 sausage and some chopped potatoes is not good value $4.99 for a soda. I had the breakfast Burrito which was ok. If you do go then I would recommend the ham and egg sandwich. Good sports bar tv screens everywhere. I would go back maybe to watch a game but not for the breakfast","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBsyz3t7x65rXhlSCv5PY5I&fid=0x0:0xb8d44bf04ca1715b"],"When":"2025-11-9"},{"Name":"Cathy Abel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKg7ysqFbe4hPpoqwW_HT0qg5slwc1Kb1PhEzu4XZhf3V0lZA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food, amazing prices. From 12 to 4pm your choice of 10 entrees at only $10. $2 pints of bud light or bloody Mary's. Fun atmosphere. The table behind us was actually playing beer pong. My protein bowl was amazing. Hubby got fish and chips.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDzAU7u0qLhZSq_b9vwQY_b&fid=0x0:0xb8d44bf04ca1715b"],"When":"2025-11-27"},{"Name":"Karen L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULhRKZ7q07hobgZ5GTPERY8C4vync10U4OSvQO4TFAYvA-iKp1iQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The service was excellent and they run great specials for you to be able to eat at reasonable prices. It's a great place to stop and people watch if you set on the outside of the restaurant and watch people walk by inside the Miracle Mile shops. Very convenient location if you're staying at Planet Hollywood.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDFEC8id2aobuPyJCMtviyN&fid=0x0:0xb8d44bf04ca1715b"],"When":"2025-10-6"},{"Name":"Angela Anthony","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVB7D_sr6KkDfj0zEUjfx2Xe11azjGrHzIGYL_-pjTkQkk_vBVt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This restaurant  is inside the Mira le Mile Mall, inside the Planet Hollywood Casino.  I enjoyed the famous $5.99 breakfast,  which consists  of two eggs, bacon, and potatoes . I went early, so there was no wait. The atmosphere  is nice . It is a bar setting.  The prices for the other meals were average.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAu1pbU2M_fluXsQ_iNE4qw&fid=0x0:0xb8d44bf04ca1715b"],"When":"2025-7-31"},{"Name":"bill jamer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGlu5rnBMB7yNzjxdWDsbQbMKux4KcIjYflL7rgfwJl2xO0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place likes to offer false advertising. They offer 2 for $7 domestic drinks but don't tell you that it's to go only! If you stay and drink the beer it turns into $10 a piece, which, unless my math is incorrect, turns into $20 for 2!! How is that even remotely reasonable considering the advertising!? I really hope that this reaches some of the potential customers that may get ripped off as well! In this day and age $7 is a big difference between $20! I just don't think it should be legal for them to advertise this with not informing the consumer. I also would think they would like to keep the customer in their establishment instead of having them leave.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDOW8Yml-YQdHEr5f9yy_5y&fid=0x0:0xb8d44bf04ca1715b"],"When":"2025-11-4"},{"Name":"Jeff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7n1nxLPW4R1AZ9bF7MaAQQ0pNzUlhVkiALWDOn3AUNpENDKd8oA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It took us a bit to find this gem, but it was worth it.  (Hint, enter Planet Hollywood at the sign for Miracle Mile Shops and walk straight, don‚Äôt go through the casino.) The scenery is stunning and mind blowing.  The $5.99 breakfast was a solid, adequate breakfast. Remember, you‚Äôre eating a $5.99 meal‚Ä¶in Vegas.  It satisfied.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEIWgjc6Zmqjeag&fid=0x0:0xb8d44bf04ca1715b"],"When":"2025-5-16"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Alex Xander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6h_6vwtcaNztu9Oeqa1Ex3sVl3VAfit_1zMwt02eVxGBHYQU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Fun boozy slushies. Decent amount of alcohol and you do get a good size cup for the price. It‚Äôs sugary but you don‚Äôt notice it until the drink melts then you‚Äôre just drinking diluted sugar water","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCqnefx1duHRijqijKBbQee&fid=0x0:0x619908f3c7f11e5f"],"When":"2025-6-12"},{"Name":"Amber Dawn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4N2imazgrdjLCGOysykZU_-fDUb9wWZz2pBMzz2QMewQjuma9sA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Another Vegas favorite they have locations all over, it‚Äôs an adult slurpee store, all drinks have alcohol already mixed, they do offer free samples so you can try each flavour before choosing. You can also purchase additional ‚Äúfloater‚Äù shots of your choice of alcohol.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICPnu-cGQ&fid=0x0:0x619908f3c7f11e5f"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Coleman Elliott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVV7SnKGAQAqfkYY9MDGvEKgJEFtKud5jNaIOoMEfyMk-XU_Avj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love Fat Tuesdays!  Much better prices than any of the clubs you might find them near ($6 per shot) and the employees were super friendly.  You can choose from so many frozen flavors and drink mixes. Must stop in Vegas!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDjgqS1uQE&fid=0x0:0x619908f3c7f11e5f"],"When":"2024-4-30"},{"Name":"Boss 0919 (Rochelle Jack)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIkH5mdoVyAhqqebetWTjrNT2fdIZTmmQ7S55jf9jRw_uobLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My fave place to come the minute I check in. Nothing like a fat alcoholic slushee with extra shots to kick off your vacation!
I love that the refills are so cheap don‚Äôt let the first initial price deter you from getting one they are well worth the money","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICdtfew9AE&fid=0x0:0x619908f3c7f11e5f"],"When":"2024-2-17"},{"Name":"J L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJUpOE7EKOmENWB06v7WeYubrU0vQHrw_3_WBcTmuveeSrcQ5nB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Long line but the line was a breeze. They have a ton of drink options, and I love the set up. I ordered shots, friends got mixed drinks, perfect for our day walking around.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDyz6i5ogE&fid=0x0:0x619908f3c7f11e5f"],"When":"2021-3-22"},{"Name":"cesar cipres","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWA0jUOIN7MMLfg1Dft1usfiVEem9JJK6eEtDC201zBm3nIhNe4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing experience at Venetian Casino Resort come to experience The realistic Venetian Town Plaza inside the Casino Restaurant Shopping Stores ice creams or ride in a Gondola singers canals come with your friends and family and enjoy infinity ...... All year around.......   Just come check in or Visit .......","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC-_fuMMQ&fid=0x0:0x619908f3c7f11e5f"],"When":"2022-11-11"},{"Name":"Darien D.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWT_6V8x-XSk6Tq7ibxbk7cWWRzZegd-HnBYxl4iE6BlCORIqXT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fat Tuesdays are my go-to drinks while walking the strip! I always have one in hand while I browsed around. I usually mid strawberry and mango, the perfect mix! The strawberry is very sweet and the mango actually has a bit of a sour kick.

They usually have a different design cup every time I visit. I like the refill-able cups because you can re-use them and get refills at a discounted rate. Normally I purchase the tumbler for $22 and refills cost $18. A pretty decent deal if you ask me!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC256HIiQE&fid=0x0:0x619908f3c7f11e5f"],"When":"2022-4-30"},{"Name":"Two Chicks Click","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrUH5BfU_i5c7g83gJe_hRisS4Elk6TNEWA79naq1CjNHwE9zq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Fat Tuesday on the Grand Shoppes level near the Guest elevators was the spot for us!!  D. is an amazing mixologist with a great attitude that had us returning for refills on the regular.  Loved the service and drink selections.  We'll be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICJo5Pf0gE&fid=0x0:0x619908f3c7f11e5f"],"When":"2023-7-4"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"somewherewithjon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDyCveNl2HwW2-z-Q93dxQVLVR_utn1stYZw8EhYYQyx5I6IXF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good place to inhale car fumes. Kidding! This place has flavorful pub-style food, friendly service and a great atmosphere, with views all the way up and down the Strip. Good place to chat, kill some time or watch a game on the TV.

Entrance is located on the 2nd floor, up a flight of stairs.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBWx736L93Hwx_7hhcYnrjf&fid=0x0:0x1395057d6243c395"],"When":"2025-11-20"},{"Name":"Joe Daguanno","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoz3ReoUlWPbmUBtVBMCVu6DlCKk9XMPysxbbAUXbf9XhSg2UJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I were out for a walk and randomly ran into Beer Park Las Vegas and we sat outside. The atmosphere, the food, and the drinks were fantastic. Our server, Savannah, was exceptional! We will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAPvWWMaFIANbaV2QrhIvsv&fid=0x0:0x1395057d6243c395"],"When":"2025-12-26"},{"Name":"ACM_Nails 8.0","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrPWfHmaS4L_fWhH1-RUn5z_YUEghN1Hbf93CCOwmTm1SYS70a=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was great $20 for a burger no fries but the Beer burger was delicious. Fries were about $9 and they were pretty standard crinkle cut fries. The hot pretzel was fire that cheeses sauce I could drink. That was about $15. Our server was awesome but it took forever to get seated and it wasn‚Äôt busy. Be weary they do add this CNF fee. We asked for it to be removed and it was.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDlw6hqpSlesUL9PYHkwCkL&fid=0x0:0x1395057d6243c395"],"When":"2025-9-24"},{"Name":"Annemarie Harnish","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYGTrBc6-16RWOTOhzWodnjH3TUw2reFjqFryEEL2O2IeL9qp8og=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is FABULOUS! We got a few pitchers of Beer and some apps. The atmosphere, the views, the friendly staff. You really can‚Äôt go wrong. Oh , and the BEST TASTING pretzel we had.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBR9veK4ExXdvVPmCKlD1G1&fid=0x0:0x1395057d6243c395"],"When":"2025-12-14"},{"Name":"Antoinette H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjKff-tI6s8pUukNRQqwP5JMQCPMVw_szvNygk5FmjBpKcjg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rykki, KiKi, and Alexa provided absolute excellence and truly top tier service. The restaurant was overlooking the strip and everyone last night was on point during the entire three hours we were there for the big Raiders vs Cowboys game.
‚ÄãDespite the packed house, every employee was actively and constantly working. It was amazing to witness such a seamless team operating with such mutual respect and camaraderie.
‚ÄãMy husband and I both work in service oriented industries and understand how extremely difficult it is to build solid teams with the kind of chemistry needed for superior customer service.
‚ÄãThe food, by the way, was delicious, and the recommendations were perfect. I love spicy food, so it surely made my palate happy, and that crisp local cider was a refreshing way to finish the meal. Thank you all!
‚ÄãHats off! Bravo to the entire team!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDe07tuX0NuaJWi2btG--6Z&fid=0x0:0x1395057d6243c395"],"When":"2025-11-18"},{"Name":"Chris Rich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVuTcUfpVIUqRS6zNhH2yZvdp0sEKVsLVlrrlTGmDgH_utHJI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful service with made and Christina. Delicious food. Best ever. Cheesesteak. Will be back. Must try the PB&J dessert!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA2rB1-WsVCXMrGdJicwOO2&fid=0x0:0x1395057d6243c395"],"When":"2025-11-12"},{"Name":"Ken Leibig","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVI6qHrlbiQL1b78wmmhhJpu6nPlbzmgRfupMvY25kPksWpMcsH4A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great outdoor beer garden with a ton of taps. Good views of the belagio fountain and the strip. Perfect spot when the weather is nice","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAEJisoUnehxa6D4lg1lo5y&fid=0x0:0x1395057d6243c395"],"When":"2026-1-31"},{"Name":"Sarah Grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRlfaupSYarxoudE4NabU2lPiZN04Y47RC9ResB2Jo7xNLRhg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you‚Äôre fortunate enough to have LAURA serve you during your incredible BeerPark experience, make sure you tell her how INCREDIBLE she is. This was such a perfect experience, from the views at golden hour, to the insane kindness to accommodations made for my husband‚Äôs allergies, the experience was S-Tier from start to finish. Everyone was kind, food and beers were great, vibes were immaculate, but it was truly Laura that made the whole experience memorable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBMOn88TkV1zLNm_seZphBd&fid=0x0:0x1395057d6243c395"],"When":"2025-9-22"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Nicole VanDoren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwID2xu3e0e3vXxEsQyD_5k7HBfYoDGVw9gXJq6sSiFwFHQv0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a fun vibe and we loved using the secret entrance to Absinthe! We had a cocktail in the Green Fairy Garden first and met a staff named Daavid who was absolutely phenomenal! He is a huge asset to your experience. He magically appeared if we needed help taking photos and made fantastic recommendations. Kudos!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDHmfePHg&fid=0x0:0xdfcf41581cb85ffb"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Jack Miller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBHIcvDXjBgrsgVPAQNOFLg8tAuFnoC5qSQ4iMxeDwwybESYo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"LOVED the drink Joe‚Äôs Balls!!! üòã it was refreshing, tasteful, and an all around must try! It you‚Äôre in town, you gotta taste! The staff was also friendly and super sociable. We literally came back for another drink because we loved the vibe","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDbLCk37b3SnnOdtkaeM0fA&fid=0x0:0xdfcf41581cb85ffb"],"When":"2025-12-7"},{"Name":"Sara Hayden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgSgsi4U8zDQ9OS4Xpwrki1S1FIGWmKPcRj_puX53_oW8I6Bdd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My husband and I came here for drinks and burgers before the Absinthe show. I thought the place had a cool vibe! The drinks were pretty good. The burgers were okay, but did really enjoy the tots!

I think the great service and overall fun vibe made it a worthwhile experience !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICjn5vyYw&fid=0x0:0xdfcf41581cb85ffb"],"When":"2024-4-27"},{"Name":"Deyon Miller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5cXE5tD5l5xShV-bzLhvNJ8q788SYQBdFfdCChDBRhdjujzSa5g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I stopped by after visiting a few other speakeasies. It‚Äôs a fun Pier 17, New York City-inspired bar that evokes the vibe of a yacht club. I really enjoyed the password as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD_KAlBmlEYlz_prZi4spxT&fid=0x0:0xdfcf41581cb85ffb"],"When":"2025-7-14"},{"Name":"Conner Estes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3IkIZYtTOO-SMRhCdFhXokcurdz6w_eZcVogy55fRiVJ9EA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Moderately nice atmosphere and nice escape from the hustle of strip. But 20$ a beer is robbery. The mixed drink was $26 and we arent the ones to waste a lot of money on drinks only to not drink them but it was disgusting and couldnt be stomached. Waiter staff tried to sell us tickets under the table for $75 to the show next door.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A Porat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCDyrJh5BlCh_vjbuJFiDIcxlCpUppZ1qfcOKcwjXQikE6GI7Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very unique cocktail bar next to the Absintne show. Ordered the Bourbon Sailors Club and enjoyed it. You can drink a cocktail here and get inside the show directly from the bar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDH3ZqORQ&fid=0x0:0xdfcf41581cb85ffb"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Chris S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwMTnpz5B59Yvc10OsnscMc1REaFstqgwBirKweJUGsjJ5O7YX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great little "secret" spot with great service. The No Pants loaded star tots were fantastic, and the drinks were solid, if not super expensive ($50 for 2 double vodka sodas).

Having said that, it is Vegas, so we were expecting it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCoke7H-QE&fid=0x0:0xdfcf41581cb85ffb"],"When":"2025-4-17"},{"Name":"Patti Upsavs (Website Developer/Design)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVK_AyQOtYA-_VduuRCeVsFfqZ7eTdl7nYz4JB0DQV64M5XaAYbQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pier 17 Yacht Club in Las Vegas delivered an exceptional experience with its blend of sophistication and comfort. This swanky spot stands out for its top-shelf booze, offering a curated selection of premium spirits and expertly crafted cocktails that elevated the evening. The burgers are a standout, served from No Pants food truck, cooked to perfection with rich, juicy patties complimented with their delectable tots‚Äîcrispy, golden, and seasoned to perfection. The yacht club‚Äôs chic atmosphere, paired with its fun and funky food and drink, makes it a premier destination for both relaxed dining and vibrant socializing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDbnM7KYA&fid=0x0:0xdfcf41581cb85ffb"],"When":"2024-8-2"}]

[{"Name":"Peter Xaymountry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4-iw-e0tHl9zEINryHZo0RHkxSU2aUq1A5Ys5v7J6GgxmO6ZN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friends and I had such a great time here. The first thing we did was hit the roulette table and spent like a good 2 hours just gambling. Then after grabbing in n out nearby, we went to play beer pong for another 2 hours. We had some random people show up and wanted to play as well so we were able to get some games going. That took another 2 hours of our time here but we had fun. If you're in the area, I would say check it out and see what luck you may have here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICjn4n7_wE&fid=0x0:0x588874ad6dcf2d44"],"When":"2024-4-27"},{"Name":"Richard Klaus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnE_Sh68_1zh3cEoA_lr3L13pe5vFCn-AVNaNVR4Ibq1FtJA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Would love to review the service, but never got any. Afternoon Dec 14th, 2025. Went in sat at the bar for 15 minutes while the staff walked back and forth past. Never got the Guinness I had come in for. Left and probably will not come back","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A. Fowler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUX2VRGB4bgOhM5qUpT79CsCpqpbEB4dJrSCXuDbzg6-LowKHnvRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious but expensive. Bartender was quick and attentive. Frozen Baileys is divine. Recommend trying this at least once.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEPu60O67nKi5qgE&fid=0x0:0x588874ad6dcf2d44"],"When":"2025-5-27"},{"Name":"Sara Decker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQA8vBBKPDV8sn8i60vmWFpLeSItwprXlfXSFXJZU91emiLA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fun place to gamble. Great location... still has an old school Vegas vibe!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCcLgLEmNCEcK-YjwDzuxtl&fid=0x0:0x588874ad6dcf2d44"],"When":"2026-1-28"},{"Name":"Derek Picklesimer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUE7Um9_d-PFmNJ8vfGzYtZf-H7w_qn6AyY6w1iVLvF8LHgF1oO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The frozen Baileys are worth the trip here alone. Bought one for my wife and I- with a tip came to about $50 but it was worth it! A great start to a terrific day in Vegas.

Played the video blackjack and stadium style bubble craps here (the dice shoot REALLY high for bubble craps) Probably my favorite bubble craps machine I've come across.

Small place but really cool and right off the Linq promenade and attached to the LINQ. We will be back for some more frozen Baileys on our next trip!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEOOrtf7O8bnRcQ&fid=0x0:0x588874ad6dcf2d44"],"When":"2025-5-21"},{"Name":"Jenny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViBhBCcjUqtborAP-P1JhWlW7-SkS4GdRLd0QbCLS9uNQMiE-d=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cool, chill vibes. Friendly bartenders who give you your space. Frozen baileys lived up to the hype, highly recommend. It‚Äôs now in my to do list every time I come to Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCA5dr_eA&fid=0x0:0x588874ad6dcf2d44"],"When":"2025-2-2"},{"Name":"SAM Smart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLIolraUpgrWNqa_TLnogc05PIWu6bs-Syui71bW5KXR6TGpw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"O'Shea is an iconic bar that has been part of Las Vegas history for a very long time. It has moved and been remodeled but it still has the same old charm and extremely energetic vibe. It is a great place to drink some great whiskey and or any other adult beverage. A lot of nights there are live bands. There are tons of beer pong tables and they are all usually being used especially on the weekends. There is definitely a party atmosphere in this bar and is a great place to visit while in Las Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC68ICtfw&fid=0x0:0x588874ad6dcf2d44"],"When":"2021-8-28"},{"Name":"Malcolm Naylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJutj2JhBV5tlcTFBkJVyZUQiSzMTcMhnIQOU7_1m9Jk7VSdg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lovely little casino off the linq. Nice atmosphere, the dealers are a little slow as can be the waitresses but the Guinness is good. Enjoyable night.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32: [{"Name":"Barrett Lobdell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViR1awKooX-Ai3-w7Unp2-jfh8PwLwHrGrZcmPFanOyDXMyPnmMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Okay Big Mac's shout out to Sterling aka Silver for making a good drink! You on the strip and like a drink with a strong punch! GO HERE AND NO WHERE ELSE!\nI'll be back Silver surfer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDQWdZ9Ui56TeLA8UQOhfQq\u0026fid=0x0:0xcfc3ab9e8aec2dfb"],"When":"2025-10-14"},{"Name":"Lisa Penning","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLA6oiz0OECxe2kvEQjvZVIDUbCgdrs7wJD_eLWbLnLWhJoVA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sterling was the best!!!!   I left my credit card and he was amazing and saves it for me.   So very nice!!!   My favorite spot now!!  Best drinks in Vegas!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAyCqrCsHWLtQmS0v9UlmLK\u0026fid=0x0:0xcfc3ab9e8aec2dfb"],"When":"2025-10-4"},{"Name":"Kimberly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWu-PKlSn0eawaov7E0iIqXkUI0gmcQLG0alc5-5wgZo3U4AB6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best adult beverage option in Vegas. I cannot recommend this place enough. I highly suggest my go to beverage of choice the classic frozen margarita with an added shot. And of course you should get a yard glass or larger to get more bang for your buck since you get discounted refills when you bring your glass. The best part is there are locations all over vegas so you will have no problem finding a place to get your much needed refills. Another plus is this is a very refreshing beverage when you are suffering in the hot vegas sun.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICdsKChswE\u0026fid=0x0:0xcfc3ab9e8aec2dfb"],"When":"2024-2-10"},{"Name":"ktzpawz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVi2L-9ONWrpmdmYDM-M6fizcQ8HdkpbXg4WwXsj9aXO0OB2skIoA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When in Vegas‚Ä¶go for the YARD!  Fat Tuesday offers a great selection of flavors to satisfy your frozen drink palate. They even have some frozen drinks that are low in sugar.  You can also add other spirits until your heart‚Äôs desire. I got the watermelon low sugar yard and it was delicious. You can‚Äôt just have one, so if you return with your cup/yard you get a discounted price on refills. Cheers!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDR7OW8Pg\u0026fid=0x0:0xcfc3ab9e8aec2dfb"],"When":"2023-4-19"},{"Name":"Gabriel Rosales","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6umld3GoS9nxueQMHXW_R585Or0fWbJ0sR-EWzU1DP2z6T3Vh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The girl that gave me my drink was so sweet and nice. The High Octane Drink is delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID9kcjqcg\u0026fid=0x0:0xcfc3ab9e8aec2dfb"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKh3etsF0wJIn_D08s8hGq4YRh1DVsVh0yTeLE2kNbkKrQo8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This this the best fat Tuesday! I will back definitely!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDohuLXkwE\u0026fid=0x0:0xcfc3ab9e8aec2dfb"],"When":"2025-4-24"},{"Name":"Lauren Strenn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbs7bFQCfZzqBbyvUNet08WOojOWwzq0iQ0JmecuKzfx8z70s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The yard dog was worth the price if you are looking to sip throughout the day and get a good buzz. The girl was very helpful with recommendations and guiding me on my first time there üëçüèª","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jesse Echevarria","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBy7RR0GBC92J6xckTXfhQA-LW-QfD-InIbcPor8aqsno56lBj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have the mossy amazing mix drink flavors. We tried Strawberry and  margarita. They were delicious and pretty strong.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Vy H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXh0KxVqwDE2ZbHS9bzfcPnyt0Lr9qQCvHsad3Otow-juwuL4q3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here recently Sunday for lunch and to watch the football games.  Sat in the bar area‚Äîlots of huge screens to watch multiple games at once.  Got the Smoked Brisket Nachos to start off‚Äîhuge portion!  Buffalo Chicken Wings were just okay but the Off Da Hook Fish N‚Äô Chips were good.  Our server Christina was awesome, and food came out fairly quick.

Note: they do take Caesar drink vouchers here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDG4NAvpnlVrEBKZ7fn2e0J&fid=0x0:0x3eb1bc39e7cbf57f"],"When":"2026-2-1"},{"Name":"Christine Jackson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLioatIBCFg84BJ_SzaXy0CKDwCK91nx88Tl1pyXg6f_K8D=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We have been visiting this restaurant for the past couple of years, and every December it has been a place we intentionally return to. In previous visits, we consistently enjoyed an outstanding dining experience that reflected the high standards expected from a Celebrity Chef‚Äìbranded restaurant.
Unfortunately, this most recent visit fell well below those expectations. While prices have noticeably increased, the quality of the food did not reflect that change. In fact, the overall dining experience was subpar and not in line with the standards we have come to expect‚Äînor with the reputation of this brand. The Garbage Can Brisket Nachos,  and the Mac Daddy chicken sandwich in particular, were extremely disappointing and did not represent the quality or creativity associated with Guy Fieri‚Äôs name.
The Nachos were cold, soft, and the brisket if you could find it amongst the beans was hard. The macaroni and cheese in the Mac Daddy was just a cold blob.
That said, The hostess, Faith, was exceptional. She provided beautiful customer service, was genuinely apologetic, and handled the situation with professionalism and grace. She truly represented the brand well‚Äîunfortunately, the food did not.
This experience left us wondering whether the leadership behind the brand is fully aware of what is currently being served at this Las Vegas location.
We hope this feedback is taken seriously, as we have always enjoyed this restaurant and would like to see it return to the level of quality it once consistently offered.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDshfOboGhFNnwNreOpjOuT&fid=0x0:0x3eb1bc39e7cbf57f"],"When":"2025-12-22"},{"Name":"Aaron Linsdau Thriller Author","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBktHZmppMeg7ijsgru__TfFiLzI80rYJdBwXVt1wGbupwKj8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a thriller and romance author attending an Author convention in Vegas, I appreciate this restaurant.
The Guy Fieri restaurant between the Horseshoe and Paris hotels is one of my favorite stops during my thriller and romance author convention trips. I‚Äôve been to many of these events and this spot always delivers.

I love the branded burger bun. It‚Äôs a small detail but it stands out and the quality backs it up. The beer and liquor selection is solid too which makes the evening more fun when you‚Äôre talking plot, tropes, and pure adventure.

For Vegas the prices are reasonable. The staff are always on top of things. I rarely wait long to be seated or served.

Recommended for reasonable eats at the Horseshoe and Paris hotels.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDX92fQ5x7JhuEgOhwgbNS2&fid=0x0:0x3eb1bc39e7cbf57f"],"When":"2025-11-16"},{"Name":"Lara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwXbePzCjmm1sGYgI5G99WRR7bbJec2GTTBDfVwXM32LeJuLE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My family and I recently tried Flavortown Sports Kitchen for the all you can eat brunch on a Friday afternoon. I love the concept but did not really enjoy the food. The quality of the food was pretty low and it was definitely lacking in flavor. I wouldn‚Äôt expect to get gourmet food at a $19.99 buffet but this was pretty drab. They have several items that qualify for the $19.99 all you can eat but a few items like the chicken and waffles and avocado toast have a charge of $5.00 and if you‚Äôre with a group of 4 and one person orders those items then everyone at the table gets charged $24.99 to avoid sharing. I decided to look past this and go ahead and order the chicken and waffles and I was really disappointed. The fried chicken had way too much batter and not enough (if any) seasoning and the waffle wasn‚Äôt impressive either. If you want a lot of food but aren‚Äôt necessarily worried about it being any better than someplace like Denny‚Äôs then this is probably a good option. The server was very sweet but the place was super busy and the food took a really long time to arrive. We had made reservations so we didn‚Äôt have to wait long for a table but I saw a lot of people waiting and then leaving because it was taking way too long to be seated. In my opinion this was just another over rated celebrity chef restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCgqkwu-WgvBL2lYomvfwUo&fid=0x0:0x3eb1bc39e7cbf57f"],"When":"2025-10-3"},{"Name":"Aaron Reinecke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLVpcw-AHP73ATE5tw82Qu_O8nj_1vUwhiIkPxMQyW4YYoZPw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ever since I learned this was in the Horseshoe Hotel, I‚Äôve wanted to get a meal here and it didn‚Äôt disappoint.

My choice was the Quesa Birria Mexican ‚ÄòPizza.‚Äô  I hadn‚Äôt expected such a huge serving of food but I definitely wasn‚Äôt complaining.  There was plenty of consomm√© and lime juice to add extra flavor to this meal, which complimented the meat and salty fried cheese.  Despite the abundance of cilantro (which I dislike), this was delicious.

For any sports fans, they will not be disappointed with so many tvs showing sports.

Other options like the Tonkatsu Club and Mac Daddy Fried Chicken sandwiches looked amazing and received high recommendations.

Also, our server was excellent in personality and service.

If I‚Äôm back in Vegas again, I‚Äôll be sure to hit this place for dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCjIdhzTA4qpYZdPHwns1Dd&fid=0x0:0x3eb1bc39e7cbf57f"],"When":"2025-10-9"},{"Name":"Sonya Barber","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmFMqNhQBCM4MHTejivg3Nnj-4N1XmOXAGXtX9OKPq3qDLd3ID=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Our second visit to FlavorTown and DEFINITELY our LAST! Last December my family & I visited FlavorTown and got the Trashcan Brisket Nachos and they were AMAZING! Needless to say when we returned to Vegas, we went back for the delicious Trashcan Brisket Nachos! What a difference a year makes! The brisket nachos were TERRIBLE! They tasted OLD, & the meat was stiff! It‚Äôs like they used ingredients from 2-3 days ago! It truly was TRASH! Definitely not the quality that we had before. These were equivalent to Taco Bell or worse!
Look at the ‚ÄòBefore‚Äô picture taken from December 2024 vs the ‚ÄòAfter‚Äô picture taken in December 2025!!! SO NOT WORTH THE MONEY!!!!! The ONLY positive was our server, Faith! Despite the nasty food, Faith was very attentive and helpful!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDlfdykwBfe9heF1YDxlA3I&fid=0x0:0x3eb1bc39e7cbf57f"],"When":"2025-12-26"},{"Name":"John Paul Costin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcJL6KQ8r_y13oiMx9hr8v1xqosyVITpS8nWAHILxaoejI2yK5Tg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a reservation for 9:45 ,turned up at 9:15 and they graciously accommodated me. I got seated and my server came over to take my order.
My food came out in a reasonable time, was nice and hot and delicious. I went for the all you can eat brunch for 19.99 and added the avocado toast for 5 bucks extra. I had high hopes to try more than 2 dishes but I was full as an egg pretty quick.
I had read some negative reviews ,that was not my experience and would recommend going. Thanks to everyone for such a delicious breakfast for a well reasonable price. To quote an 80's movie "I'll be back "","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDWio6x7y-zTwmTZu65jN-f&fid=0x0:0x3eb1bc39e7cbf57f"],"When":"2025-12-25"},{"Name":"Tia Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqUpWX2XL2flMSVUYR6Gfty5OHctGSLSbQiDJpQpomkYJF1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"For $20 you can‚Äôt beat this all you can eat brunch. Overall the food was seasoned nicely and cooked well. The French toast was overcooked on one side, but with the ability to order as much as you want, we weren‚Äôt too pressed about it. Good atmosphere and friendly and attentive servers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC7qOidm5QUpnSIywZuPtRE&fid=0x0:0x3eb1bc39e7cbf57f"],"When":"2025-10-23"}]
