column32:
[{"Name":"Lili G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9Uiojudq-gSHi89WTatoVFO2drCWbw7aPZrnNNES2j8i5aTU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really enjoyed this place on a nice sunny afternoon. The lake of dreams was a beautiful water feature and made for interesting light. It felt secluded and was relatively quiet in the middle of the afternoon. The food and drink was expensive (like any of these hotels) but good.

I took a star for service because I felt servers were a little cold.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC_zZHTsAE&fid=0x0:0xff940a560c818e8e"],"When":"2025-1-18"},{"Name":"Buckeye Blitz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpW3Cbz8ZS-dtD7dKWb8L0cJS-G3iS8F9pkgrejk39lh0diG-zTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Did not do food, but drinks and view were amazing.  Worth it for sure. Little hot but would be nice latter in the day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCOg03A62G1o39-TE9ia3sS&fid=0x0:0xff940a560c818e8e"],"When":"2025-9-22"},{"Name":"Lydia Hain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWk9nVGleTXDbZ6JsyZgmmyybHFOR7sEZA3jIyvoX5M0XWWVFgCnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Since I visit Las Vegas a lot, I love to stay at the Wynn and my favorite place to unwind and meet with friends during daytime is Aft Cocktail deck. It feels like being on a ship and is a peaceful place in the middle of all the action of Las Vegas.

I never had trouble getting a table although it‚Äôs always very crowded. The cocktails are delicious, but when it‚Äôs about food I can only tell it looks delicious but I haven‚Äôt tried to far.

The staff is very nice, the service is excellent and the ambience is simply beautiful. I highly recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID7vvy8vwE&fid=0x0:0xff940a560c818e8e"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Amanda Leonard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMbxaR3y6Bt9p9HwpvBzfbxpGUrOpsw6B_jmrd6SOR__Yu4hDT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When we arrived the deck wasn't very busy and we got a great table to enjoy the show, which was trippy and fun.  The cocktails and service were exceptional and because it wasn't busy (it was pretty late at night) and the setting was intimate, it felt like we found a some kind of well-kept Las Vegas secret.  We will absolutely be going back the next time we're in town.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKELzLxJf67L7__wE&fid=0x0:0xff940a560c818e8e"],"When":"2025-5-17"},{"Name":"Daniel Colston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlBfVyZhvrEnN9mIb9en0uPGdr8UPutk824W7z8LSd5QrCbt3y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is a super cool place. The atmosphere is what makes it with the entire hillside lighting up and a huge projection screen with synchronized music and graphics. There was even an acrobat hanging from a wire that did a choreography that synced with the music and projector.

My issue with this bar is that their service is very slow and the food was ‚Äúehh‚Äù could be better. We got the hummus, and the chips that came with it were super hard, almost chipping my teeth and didn‚Äôt have a real distinctive taste.

We waited to get in for 40 minutes, we waited for ice waters for another 20 minutes. We waited for our cocktails and the hummus and chips for another 15 minutes, and then we waited for our check and they never came so we had to chase them down to ask to cashout.

Management needs to realize that the beautiful attraction there is a draw that can build real volume and they need to hire the staff to handle the volume. Also why does such a cool space have such a small amount of seating?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICr0dLa9gE&fid=0x0:0xff940a560c818e8e"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Laura Ransom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIhob9hEkUqr9B_5HC8YSoJjVdIBBZvHBR9g1CrXPCdIr7ZEg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great spot to escape the strip! We stumbled on it Thursday early afternoon and waited 20 minutes for a table (conveniently they took a phone number and texted when table was ready). The cocktails were different, beautiful, and delicious. Service was great. We shared a tasty, healthy and filling hummus plate. It was so good that we went back on Saturday around 1. This time the wait was about an hour. Once you have a table there is no limit on how long you can stay. We had 2 drinks each and the cheese plate, and then a mocktail and fries. Again all great and a cosy calm place to hang out for the afternoon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCQ3Pfq6AE&fid=0x0:0xff940a560c818e8e"],"When":"2025-3-2"},{"Name":"Ktoms","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLERPMndK7veUeUn5s623weJHvBCcw9T18IhaXMLC89rGmkXw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Our server was wonderful and knowledgeable about the menu. We stayed for a few of the shows which were‚Ä¶odd. The themes vary a lot and one of them shut down halfway through. They were having issues with the lighting, etc. Bit of a bummer, but would come back. Cocktails are expensive but quite strong if that‚Äôs what you‚Äôre looking for.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hunter Milner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAy_HA1K_AHsWvnSTESafpsyOJ1_6aFP64KwN4aRc6hMAb02M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It‚Äôs hard to beat the atmosphere of this cocktail lounge. Located right in front of the lake of dreams at the Wynn you are surrounded by opulence. The theme of the place is nautical and they paid attention to every detail from the metal railings to the hostess‚Äôs uniform. They offer small plates to eat, cocktails and mock tails. You can even order drinks as a group if you‚Äôd like.
There is always a wait to get in since it is so popular. To get on the guest list just give them your phone number and they‚Äôll text you when your table is ready. I recommend coming after dark as they lake of dreams does a show every 30 minutes after dark.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDJtJTovQE&fid=0x0:0xff940a560c818e8e"],"When":"2023-7-11"}]

column5: 2777 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
column31: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":false}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Fast service","enabled":true},{"name":"Great cocktails","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair accessible restroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true},{"name":"Cocktails","enabled":true},{"name":"Food","enabled":true},{"name":"Hard liquor","enabled":true},{"name":"Wine","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Restroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Trendy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true},{"name":"Tourists","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":false}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true}]}]
column32:
[{"Name":"NESCOTT24","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWymjd0DPNpPPKqjrN_PpUQJO2Rq2MKTpLzTQj4V3tGwyGabJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"All you tequila lovers, this is an amazing place to check out.

Geared toward the classy adult. Azul‚Äôs decor and interior design stand out. As soon as you walk in it feels comfortable. Each booth is in a nook where it feels private. Beautifully dimmed lighting and lounge couches make you want to spend the entire evening here. How can you sipping fine tequilas and listening to the tunes from the DJ.

From blancos to reposados to anejos to mezcals. Azul has you covered from a vast list of fine tequilas. Superb mixologists have can craft you tasty cocktail.

Door guy can be a bit strange but that‚Äôs just his personality.

Looking forward to lounging here again and knocking back a few.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCohIzq0QE&fid=0x0:0xd84e1e6f7fc15e66"],"When":"2025-4-15"},{"Name":"Joseph Downing","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoyOf0NTQ1TTdZhzqxOIgQipZnwRJ0fdxWi_61McvjVf0LzTvBUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was a very cool place they have a ton of tequilas here. Very comfortable chairs and it's very lively and authentic. Steven got me to try a new tequila that I've never tried it was very good if you're in there and he tells you to try it try it. They all around very good experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID9xuW0Vg&fid=0x0:0xd84e1e6f7fc15e66"],"When":"2024-3-16"},{"Name":"Lisa Mattson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWF_P2KW4523g0njREHFwdMODj_25Tu429Xvo2PRYRFw51TlO2L=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this swanky mezcal bar! Such an awesome vibe. Wish the designer could renovate my house in Mexico. Still having dreams about the Dark Horse (espresso martini inspo).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICXnaf18QE&fid=0x0:0xd84e1e6f7fc15e66"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"John Munger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmN5twCs-kj3WqpXIRFWrIsAbl22oMI-cOpRlY1vGlo6aleoxA5A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I had a Tequila and Mezcal tasting at Azul. Michael was incredibly knowledgeable regarding both, the distillation process, where they‚Äôre made, and how the tequila and Mezcal market is changing. Highly recommend stopping in Azul for great drinks and amazing service!

*Food rating is for the drink rating but there‚Äôs no option for that.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC91_yNCA&fid=0x0:0xd84e1e6f7fc15e66"],"When":"2024-3-10"},{"Name":"Pam B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLTXVHua51v_0XDHmgMYL4q5OZRbrtWI5CRl8AZPQ1KavO6tCp0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful bar with elevated agave cocktails. I loved the complimentary corn nut snacks. Cocktails run about $19. The staff is very friendly. It's very elegant but comfortable to chill.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC1sYa9Pg&fid=0x0:0xd84e1e6f7fc15e66"],"When":"2023-12-31"},{"Name":"Arnaldo Alvarez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwoxngyu8FUetrZaz0UicF6HqxxNgze-sGC9PwpH83BOgwtg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mezcal drinkers. This is a must try! Price point is amazing. Drinks are all specialty cocktails. From what we tried. #1 Jade Rabbit #2 Sunday Service #3 Bailando Pera. We did not have any food but the bar snacks definitely match the vibe and drinks - corn nuts and banana chips.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDHj8WoNg&fid=0x0:0xd84e1e6f7fc15e66"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Aaron P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUTN_O7zebgiekhQjH6GJ5lveLGULp9kU-YchMkgjf5ijE1kPa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the atmosphere, and a great selection of unique cocktails that tasted amazing! Also the vibes were great thanks to DJ CLA!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDLoNXnSw&fid=0x0:0xd84e1e6f7fc15e66"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Catherine Collison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXryp5kkJe0EKe8R1UhkRGolH8QN4C6Ypy8E3sB6LZdRC3gOonQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Cocktails were great, ambiance was very fun. Our server was Ashleigh, she messed up our bill then tried to make up nonsense about putting moet in an aperol spritz instead of owning up to her mistake (we were not going to haggle over $10). After seeing others comment that they were only offered bottled water when others were getting tap water, I wanted to comment that this was the same for us and it was Ashleigh who refused to serve tap water.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column5: 1017 S 1st St #180, Las Vegas, NV 89101
column31: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":false},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":false}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Fast service","enabled":true},{"name":"Great cocktails","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair accessible restroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true},{"name":"Cocktails","enabled":true},{"name":"Food","enabled":true},{"name":"Food at bar","enabled":true},{"name":"Hard liquor","enabled":true},{"name":"Wine","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Table service","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Restroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true},{"name":"Trendy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true},{"name":"Locals","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Paid parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Paid street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
column32:
[{"Name":"Sheryl Savage","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIEcGjbr1ztZb07OyfnDdHzRzsXQchxDkSvtnHbWo09w4kgag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down one of the best bars in Vegas. Set in the Arts District, Nocturno feels like a bar you find in a trendy chic-local neighborhood in your home town city (if you aren‚Äôt from Vegas). The cocktails are expertly crafted - and even modern classics are elevated (the dirty martini is an excellent example of that!) and the small bites are very reasonably priced. They introduce seasonal changes to keep their menus fresh and interesting too!
And I can‚Äôt say enough about the knowledge and friendliness of the bartenders.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBfAGV3LdFhp1Ec4WEGkp9f&fid=0x0:0xde9c8be58b83844a"],"When":"2025-12-7"},{"Name":"Susan Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyKTpgt5ta9Qfjmp6ldCeDkCMEj9PC9yc_LFadweImHFvl6M-_gA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice, clean, cocktail bar at the corner of art Square in the heart of arts district. Lively alternative music, but not too loud and overpowering. Perfect spot to have a conversation and hang out.
Outstanding service from our server the entire evening üëçüèª
What stood out the most for me aside from the tasty cocktails was the elevated, delicious, and perfectly presented small bites we ordered üëåüèª  the prosciutto tower was delightful, with thee best sauce as the cherry on top (even though it was below the tower lol). Also really enjoyed the arancine!üëçüèªüëçüèª
All in all a great experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB5M-T2BRNLuGqsnkCt4KDq&fid=0x0:0xde9c8be58b83844a"],"When":"2025-10-20"},{"Name":"Shawn ‚ÄúShawn830ss‚Äù Johnston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2JNHUjGfcZLMpbwLy7wwxNZNqz6JLHc07mRovdaz66CZ49w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice, smaller side trendy cocktail bar. Great location for intimate conversation.
The drinks were great and so was the service. I would recommend reservations. Tuesday at 10:00 without reservations had a 20 minute wait but it was worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA0i78qutlHH6Yr-jcl8iMM&fid=0x0:0xde9c8be58b83844a"],"When":"2025-12-24"},{"Name":"Charlotte Ashborn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKIcJufxB5ZOpXCz6UggSIqfBVSqABsOl4M3TVG-jEBPdRZpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I didn‚Äôt get to try the food as we came only for drinks but the drinks were SO GOOD!

I got a Brazilian lemonade swizzle (no alcohol) and it was absolutely delicious! Everyone tried it and they all ended up getting on. The service was great but I love the ambience. I could have stayed there all night. Will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAybvGiP735gdZMTnRKg0MS&fid=0x0:0xde9c8be58b83844a"],"When":"2026-1-28"},{"Name":"Tressa Reading","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdViaHmVXcvClQX3gA7gdyiI_O4F-6wZSuYKhYIWsP4cm4lw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"All of the drinks were absolutely fantastic. The atmosphere is also super chill. Our bartender, Faith, she was superb. We had a non-drinker in the group and she made two nonalcoholic cocktails that were delicious. The food was not the best, but the drinks definitely were.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCXwXAjpMV9Ba1SeaafemDC&fid=0x0:0xde9c8be58b83844a"],"When":"2025-12-28"},{"Name":"Tony Del Pino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV06-5uy0JVpjgzSVM-kDU4HjmNF_PD74uqG1yccUbIwy12GNxjVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A true cocktail bar/lounge in the Vegas Arts District. Chef DJ, Lu and his team have something special brewing in town.

The room is sexy with modern furniture and a back wall full of vynls. The bar seating is comfortable as well.

The menu does a great job of explaining classic cocktails along with the family of cocktail styles ( sours, martinis, fizz, etc).
Each step of building and creating is done with a high level of execution. The entire staff are cocktail nerds and Hella knowledgeable.

Incredible bar food is available to pair with the cocktails.  If you show up on Sundays, they provide smashburgers and chicken sandos all day.

Nocturno is becoming the go to spot in town for an evening out and with good reason.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCLG2Vtu8EFlg1upt59ou3-&fid=0x0:0xde9c8be58b83844a"],"When":"2025-9-19"},{"Name":"Lonnie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9BlAxYFU8b83rzSrkhOIMwdcVDofOeiAlsO8Q9oIBohLyzFbm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped by via inKind recommendation.  (if you don't have it, download it immediately, great restaurant app) We were in Vegas for the New Year and got to Vegas a couple days early so we stopped by, a GREAT decision.  It's a cool speakeasy style bar with a dive bar feel, but way nicer.  It's secluded inside some business buildings and it's very unassuming from the outside.  Once inside though, they got chill music playing on the record player, cool lounge chairs and couches and an ultra cool bar, like something from the 70's.  Retro and cool. Everyone was super nice and welcoming, especially Ross, who took great care of us at the bar.  They specialize in craft cocktails and boy were they delicious.  We had their Tiki drinks and they were refreshing and well-balanced with fresh fruit juice and rum.  The Prosciutto Tower, made with their homemade chips, perfectly savory prosciutto and a house made sauce was OUTSTANDING.  We also ordered their steaks and they were absolutely juicy, tender and packed with flavor.  Can't wait to come back next time I'm in Vegas.
*Shout out to the other bartender as well, wore glasses missed his name, for all the great Vegas recommendations!  Much love to all at Nocturno!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashton Harvey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBnTHf2Y0AuhbazyjlgcK2CkkJn-OQx7HKfSdzSf5b9oswu_Tp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great bar, not overly busy, amazing cocktails, elevated small bites and changing steak specials. This place is very unassuming from the outside, definitely a place you have to come to with intention. The menu is cleverly broken into sections with pages detailing variations on each drink. Between core drinks and variations there are at least 125 cocktails on the menu. They also have 7 beers and 9 wines. An amazing variety. The menu also has a great history on each of the various drinks for the curious. My bartender, Cornelius, was engaging, checking in regularly, was super helpful, and very knowledgeable. I highly recommend, but know they are strictly first come first served!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEOH5t47Fgf-ByAE&fid=0x0:0xde9c8be58b83844a"],"When":"2025-5-28"}]

column5: 3663 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
column18: Rocker Sammy Hagar's high-energy cantina dishing out Mexican eats & cocktails in colorful digs.

column32:
[{"Name":"Mr No","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_n9gUg--CP2J1kv5_3kQpfQlbdhzfcKyXYBLwjGb_5hBrPqxh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Impressive to get a great tasting bloody Mary with muddled jalapeno, three different burgers and a breakfast burrito with a fruit bowl just minutes after 8am. The coffee was good, but they didn't have real milk. Great decor and service. For me the prices are a bit naughty, but a solid offering that fells like a safe choice. I would definitely return if the prices were reviewed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBJ61tVHzW5fmp4Su46qTSq&fid=0x0:0x22e23af07d61229d"],"When":"2026-1-21"},{"Name":"Christine S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPF6Zh-w2E6Igo0_VOwlmuDOBYRR2UCmR3JYGKLL1CdhYzYx1GdA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went to Cabo Wabo because Cabo Wabo Reposado is our favorite tequila.  But, what we were blown away with is Laura's service.  Laura was amazing, it felt like we have known her forever.  She was kind, attentive & we loved that she was comfortable enough to sit & chat with us a few times (don't worry it was slow her personal touch did not affect the service she gave others).  Since, we ordered our favorite tequila, Laura suggested a few & let us sample them, we enjoyed both.  Every time Laura checked in on us it was a joy, like being visited by a friend.

Now for the food, we order the triple dipper, tequila shrimp & the carnitas platter all 3 dishes were delicious.

But, hands down Laura's service will keep us coming back to this bright rock & roll playing restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBwiboIfSGP-ovjoE157pp3&fid=0x0:0x22e23af07d61229d"],"When":"2026-1-16"},{"Name":"Kien Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqiQOuQyIKfRjWsWu0OowPkCTmwgICtsdSh9nKepjW-IFdr7LYsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thanks, Sammy Hagar, for putting up a lively but "affordable" eatery in the middle of the Vegas trip. With the great majority of menu items under thirty dollars, it's as affordable as anything you can find for a sit-down meal. Plus, they play rock music the entire time, and the service was super friendly. Highly recommended for anybody, including families.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDCiLk76f4Blfi72g7MJJOQ&fid=0x0:0x22e23af07d61229d"],"When":"2025-12-29"},{"Name":"Rajesh Prajapati","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTjvbdxaIIUKiZy2veo6TOWiKu44qxkWJyr6e51agDTYX1Vpfl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a great experience here as a solo traveler! The food and service were top-notch. My server, Justin, was incredibly helpful and attentive. He suggested several great vegetarian options and made sure almost any dish could be modified to be veggie-friendly. The portion size was huge and they helped with boxing the left-overs. Vegetarian people should find good options here if ask for.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA_-ud5cpr3dz7PmD7XNZWj&fid=0x0:0x22e23af07d61229d"],"When":"2026-1-10"},{"Name":"Honest T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKIDBhaRXC5FAGq3uCLmJri77vwJRQ_YGTqf5uZwfRSodvp9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here on a Friday night with a small group. Our server was Brendon wo was amazing at his job. He explained the menu and suggested the drinks he believed we would like based on our likes and tastes....and he was spot on. He continued to check on us and kept our table clean and our drinks filled.

Brendon even suggested we return for breakfast because he believed their breakfasts were the very best around. We took his advice and returned for breakfast. It was amazing. The egg burritos are excellent. The fruit is fresh. The Bloody Marys delicious. Cabo Wabo....we'll be back. Thank you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCKvDqR8pJKBf4nv3KnfRM7&fid=0x0:0x22e23af07d61229d"],"When":"2025-12-18"},{"Name":"Eli Moslemi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2x5Pn2Eat4kmcz8FB0YPYBf5LURqTih250jXvCstAMBQ1YDOF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First of all, Cabo is located in a great spot. It has a very easy access to the strip street.
The food was delicious, fresh, and fair price. The portion was enough for a very hungry person.
I recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCZxhyVYyfBCWAbTC68LjNq&fid=0x0:0x22e23af07d61229d"],"When":"2025-11-1"},{"Name":"Nyssa Waters","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUio6tFvNNb_PmhNs7RY6Fo5rvA0tnU6ObW6NzNp968cFnHjsXJrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm eaten at a lot for the expensive high quality places on the strip after 4 trips, and numerous weeks strolling.  CaboWabo is my Favourite destination on the strip for bottomless mimosas, a long late brunch, people watching, great service.  The steak and eggs...oh my golly!!
Just around amazing value and fun!
Only downside for some would be it's very very loud, but makes for the atmosphere!
Thanks Cabo Wabo!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAgeohBYGXCx9r9tIhgHivv&fid=0x0:0x22e23af07d61229d"],"When":"2026-1-12"},{"Name":"lanette cornford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLtypZZeJcsJFs7fwh5N1DLPcf9mVRK5UZ2QbNhZg4ofY_A1v5mw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"California burrito and Mexican Style chopped salad- did not disappoint! I added grilled cheese Jen to the salad and it was amazing- probably one of the best restaurant salads I‚Äôve ever had as far as flavor goes!

Hubs loved the CA burrito. Margaritas were good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA5HSD2izlW148Lbf3dsHYk&fid=0x0:0x22e23af07d61229d"],"When":"2025-9-12"}]

column5: 3355 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
column18: Traditional Southern eatery for themed decor, chicken & waffles, grits & more, plus craft cocktails.

column32:
[{"Name":"KG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQEWATf-r9b0TYymsbRNwAkSr6VJnDKB8H8JGn0K1HzlTE8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We decided to try Yardbird at The Venetian for brunch after seeing how busy it was, figured they must be doing something right. We were able to snag a couple of seats at the bar, and despite how packed it was, the service was outstanding from start to finish.

I ordered the smoked salmon avocado toast, which turned out to be a great choice. It‚Äôs built on perfectly toasted bread with a generous layer of creamy, ripe avocado, then topped with silky, smoky salmon that adds rich flavor without feeling heavy at all. Balanced, fresh, and really well done. My boyfriend ordered the breakfast sandwich with biscuit, gravy, egg, chicken, and bacon purely because he was ogling the plate of the guy sitting next to him, who convinced him to order it. He definitely enjoyed it, but OMG that thing was huge! We also shared a side of Brussels sprouts, which were excellent. I‚Äôll admit, I was hesitant to come here at first because I assumed Southern food might be too heavy for breakfast or brunch, but I was completely mistaken. Yardbird actually offers lighter, easy options alongside the indulgent ones, so there‚Äôs truly something for everyone.

Busy for a reason, great service, and a solid brunch I‚Äôd happily come back to.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBgBKLi2TKVlVVO7ucXc0Ib&fid=0x0:0x1b5e55c69047f3cc"],"When":"2026-1-29"},{"Name":"Jason Fair (Nomadic Nerd Project)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUd9flC6DA9JbCVYuZujYGPu_K65O96tUV9P5_ezs9QFXUFxeI7NQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an excellent brunch here. The food and service was great. We loved the chicken & waffles, creamy grits, and bisquit. Everything is well seasoned and warm. The tables meals arrived together, but our chicken and waffles was 10 minutes after and waffles were cold. Once we got new ones, it was good. This made the meal less than perfect, but the flavors were excellent. Something they just need to work on for future guests.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD5CvR6cnZIJlgpfShYcMZ_&fid=0x0:0x1b5e55c69047f3cc"],"When":"2026-1-18"},{"Name":"Zhoou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxKG6K1XrSUbNbhPq8GcdGVm4q68TO1DB2QTAH0Xa0HzMMf8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing! Definitely the best waffle on the strip! It‚Äôs crispy on the skin and it‚Äôll melt in your mouth. The bourbon maple syrup also brings the waffle to the next level. The chicken itself is tender and juicy, with the honey hot sauce it literally blows my mind! Our server is also very nice, he introduced all the signature items and his recommendation after knowing that we are first time visit. Will be back for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBbHz8Ptv9c4DZMYCMzrnl6&fid=0x0:0x1b5e55c69047f3cc"],"When":"2026-1-27"},{"Name":"Joe Mahany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlJJlgbwHRBfRdQBW-jyLAYKEZVi03PMwh5zIxPDWUHi1hPf3T4g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"From the moment we walked into Yardbird Table & Bar in Vegas, the staff was attentive and quick to seat us. Our server, Dante, was incredibly friendly and knowledgeable about the menu, which really helped guide our choices. Once the food and drinks arrived, it became obvious how much thought and care goes into every item they serve.

I ordered the chicken and waffles, and it was absolutely top tier. They even provide a pair of tongs so you can pull the chicken right off the hot bones‚Äîa small touch that makes a big difference. The bourbon maple syrup was unreal. And you must try the deviled eggs with the jalape√±o bacon jam‚Äîseriously, so good.

My fianc√©e loved her truffle mac and cheese and the sliders. We also tried two of their cocktails, both of which were fantastic.

We landed around $89 per person with gratuity‚Äînot the lightest bill, but well worth it for the overall experience. We‚Äôre very glad we stopped in, and we‚Äôll definitely be returning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBeHi6uJT2Ia3RxlZEzSdtt&fid=0x0:0x1b5e55c69047f3cc"],"When":"2025-12-10"},{"Name":"Chris W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUST6p_3uk7yPCHl8XLq8y46qeYYcxy3AggYZyNCGgEAd5KVSwu_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ate here for brunch.

Had the chicken and waffles Nashville style!

Don't be alarmed by the spice since it is not terribly spicy. Insanely delicious on the other hand... If you're not into delicious stay away from it üòÅ

Had the watermelon tequila cocktail and the cornbread as well! Both were spot on and delicious.

Other than the delicious food, Domenick, our server was spot on, attentive and on top of it. Ask for him and take care of him if you visit.  You will not be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD5p6nt9t_TE7e2jhHFYvAD&fid=0x0:0x1b5e55c69047f3cc"],"When":"2026-1-10"},{"Name":"Latavia Shepherd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3e4z-BL3JEjcPIvasQ1h-9msnq5R46FEPi2x1jQyy84zEDuVRdA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were recently recommended to try this place out and when I say we were all thoroughly impressed?? Everything was delicious! They had plenty of options for dietary restrictions as well. The portions were so big and actually match the price you‚Äôre paying!! The only thing that we wished was different is that we didn‚Äôt want high top tables when reserved but that‚Äôs all they had available when they seated us. Other than that, it was one of the best restaurants we had been to during our stay in Vegas! We will definitely be back next time we are in town!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDz5Rsn4OS236AbDUk0jFVb&fid=0x0:0x1b5e55c69047f3cc"],"When":"2026-1-3"},{"Name":"Chris Barsoum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK9ALEZ27bVkX43KnJdFsQVcGGlgN6w5tjPq2jGm19zrFYhyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is very popular at the Venetian. I originally had dinner reservations during F1 weekend which were already hard to get. I later opted to switch it to lunch which they were able to accommodate. Being known for their fried chicken, i got their fried chicken and waffles while my wife got their chicken sandwich. We also shared a plate of wings all of which was amazing. The staff were also very friendly and honest. Our waitress pointed out that they already include 18% tip in their checks which is kind of weird but at least they were upfront about it. Overall, definitely recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBkj86W7vyviXiHgKh1mShe&fid=0x0:0x1b5e55c69047f3cc"],"When":"2025-11-24"},{"Name":"dietmar doehring","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUb5f4Act7E2hz-RTT3GK6NY-S7C1iycZJ7iIstI23jRu5a_dslw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place.  The menu is so simple but the dishes are all elevated.  From the app.'s to the salad to the sandwiches then main dish's all next level!

They serve breakfast, and it's next level as well.  I highly recommend the sausage & gravy fried chicken bacon and egg biscuit.

Second the Nashville 1/2 chicken is the bomb!  OMG!  It was so tender and juicy, you can tell they brine it for over 24 hours.  Make sure to ask for their home made honey hot sauce.

The deviled eggs are top notch as well. You gotta try.  Then order the fried green tomato with pork belly - OMG!  LOVE LOVE LOVE!

The service is excellent at both the table and bar.

Highly recommend reservations during peak times.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhChWkBBI_R__5RclDD_QF4T&fid=0x0:0x1b5e55c69047f3cc"],"When":"2025-11-12"}]

column5: 3940 E Mandalay Bay Rd Delano, Las Vegas, NV 89119
column18: Chic bar on the W Las Vegas' 64th floor offering drinks, snacks, a dance floor & patio with city views.

column32:
[{"Name":"Mark Stornes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFLsYFHC3zagvURSDNQfEFovVYbW5P3XXBN9p76RDmSDYCxA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The view is the draw!  Spectacular views of the strip.   Drinks a bit overpriced but since it‚Äôs a drink only place it‚Äôs understandable.  We made a reservation, but not overcrowded on the Wednesday night we were there.  But I‚Äôd suspect it may be quite full on weekend nights or during big conventions at Mandalay Bay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAYnpZCSP1hi3YvJRy_oOuY&fid=0x0:0xba5fffad76ca82a8"],"When":"2026-2-17"},{"Name":"Kevin Hargis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsp1hk9qBgP04jDcrvxaZ0Orvq8xGrLyFxZeNfnlMMgajPBOSe3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I first went here two years ago and made it a point to bring back our best friends. The atmosphere is beautiful, the views spectacular and drinks second to none. I highly recommend it and the experience to anyone wanting a more upscale experience without the upscale price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBsBJ3k2q8e_YgFnMb18e2n&fid=0x0:0xba5fffad76ca82a8"],"When":"2025-11-19"},{"Name":"Allison Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXkp8j1AagfVQkKye1RivWdWul8NRFjdOHLymNx1RGdO0tU3vC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The views were absolutely amazing, and the staff were so friendly! We only ordered an appetizer, but it did not disappoint ‚Äî everything was fresh and delicious. The ambiance and skyline views made the whole experience unforgettable. Definitely will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAFXJWoMqhRMvf0v1dhZdWw&fid=0x0:0xba5fffad76ca82a8"],"When":"2025-10-7"},{"Name":"Simileoluwa Adebajo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3pKcOL-_LFPAtjXldVwigiRqy06wVOokAe-O7lk1nlslv_5zMsA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a crisp and refreshing glass of wine at this rooftop bar with wonderful views of Las Vegas. Music was pretty good too. The ride up and down in the glass elevator is an interesting part of the experience too","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA7Nq9XOhfFWGbED17ab6P1&fid=0x0:0xba5fffad76ca82a8"],"When":"2025-9-11"},{"Name":"Mat Allen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdxcqB_H5oKvFmY4sa8zP0BuyBxghKGHXANH4Y_CWlwcXQBqq3_A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The view was nice but everything else was a disappointment. Took my gf to kick off her 30th Birthday Vegas trip thinking this would be a nice boujee start to the trip. However.. we got there to find they were not serving food as advertised (we were all hungry), the seating arrangement wasn't cramped and couldn't realistically sit next to one another, the wait staff took more than 15 minutes to greet us! (I went to the bar myself twice - once to get water, another to complain about lack of service). It was very expensive and the drinks were so-so. We left and went to Citizen instead and received good service. Shame really.. Skyfall has a great location, but don't let their pictures fool you! they appear to have little grasp of their business opportunity","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steve Bintley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUz91tVXj2WT6I7ulfH4Gp5APOIk3cPC3KNiD2RZ0AT-lIBXQFCDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic bar which is suitable for both special occasions and a more memorable casual evening out. Naturally the view is a key draw, and with the balcony it‚Äôs easy to admire and get unobstructed photos, but equally inside has a great vibe, decor and service, with the large windows still making the most of the view. Bar staff are friendly and both quick and proactive with service, and the range of drinks available is exhaustive. Prices aren‚Äôt too unreasonable given the unique setting but an offer of nuts or snack with a drink at the bar would elevate the place to a truly high-end venue.

I‚Äôll be back though, and for a more sophisticated drink in this area of the city I‚Äôd recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCwc8y1-14nGWF0lhORXkLT&fid=0x0:0xba5fffad76ca82a8"],"When":"2025-8-19"},{"Name":"Globe Scout","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnKIjc2AshLxoy2NbgaNWTAnR7XmJ98UgxOhJjDW7MrJTKjw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We first visited Skyfall Panoramic Bar and Lounge in late December, and the nighttime view is absolutely stunning. It‚Äôs one of those moments where you realize how close and connected all the resorts on the Strip really are.

Lounge Experience:
The staff at Skyfall are exceptional‚Äîvery friendly and inviting. We enjoyed it so much that we recently cancelled another reservation at the Venetian to come back and relax here. The drinks are excellent, and the bite-sized foods are a highlight. We especially loved the 8‚Äù pesto pizza with Parmesan and arugula. The Setting Sun with whisky and Kiwi Colada were a good start, both were refreshing cocktails. Their typical whiskey and martinis are also excellent.

Recommendation:
If you‚Äôre looking for a less crowded, chill vibe to unwind and enjoy the skyline with a good cocktail, Skyfall is the place to go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDrhICXPA&fid=0x0:0xba5fffad76ca82a8"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Your Beachhouse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDlz0opYDGyqotl46Cj-z0KVS3nuiCnqgFNVJbsIZLrf2QPw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing spot with one of the best views in Vegas! The patio is high up and super scenic ‚Äî someone even proposed while we were there. Chill vibe with great music and cocktails. You‚Äôll need a reservation, but it‚Äôs easy to get. It‚Äôs a bit hard to find, but head to the Michael Jackson show area at Mandalay Bay and take the elevator nearby. Totally worth it for a relaxed night out with stunning views.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEN_YpfTKndD5eg&fid=0x0:0xba5fffad76ca82a8"],"When":"2025-5-11"}]

column18: Unique stop with a front barbershop & swanky back cocktail lounge offering live music & cocktails.

column32:
[{"Name":"Dav Mad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOtdfLeBKRRHPQ-xHdkLsK9vMmJ0R0V1lLBQlzlh7YvZxvY61j=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Trying to put in to words how awesome this place is won‚Äôt do it justice!  It is always a go to spot for me every time I‚Äôm in Vegas whether I go with friends and work colleagues. The live music is always spot. Thank you Dallas for accommodating such a large group this last week. And thank you Mario, Jasmine, and Jade (Jane? Sorry it was loud! ü§£) for putting up with us!  The table service was impeccable!  Would recommend for anyone looking for a fun night in Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCnBJR3c09w_dzzV81nU_F6&fid=0x0:0x7e88c1d3c3f0275a"],"When":"2025-9-27"},{"Name":"Bradley Mariska","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUK5RUMf3WaxHQiF8NdcUP-lm0QKuKfLQRC5uliyOoZBtllWPHs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôve had The Barbershop speakeasy on my list of places to visit in Vegas for a long time and I was not disappointed by my first visit (it won‚Äôt be my last). The speakeasy well-balances the ‚Äúsecretive‚Äù aspect without making it too difficult to find. On my visit on a Saturday night, there was a bouncer and velvet rope outside the barbershop, so it was pretty clear where to queue, but it was exciting to walk through the barbershop through two ‚Äúsecret‚Äù doors and finally see the cocktail lounge. I also loved that, while the space is not huge and it was a Saturday night, I wasn‚Äôt hurried; in fact, I was encouraged to stick around for the live band that would be playing later. I had an Old Fashioned with was mixed perfectly with my preferred bourbon. It was about $20 which is the basically the current going rate in Vegas for a classic cocktail and considering the atmosphere I was honestly surprised it didn‚Äôt cost more. Speaking of the atmosphere, it is simply outstanding (see photos of the bar and decor). The professional and classy experience continued to the very end, and I must give a shoutout to Vincent who escorted me to the exit and graciously thanked me for visiting. Get yourself to the Cosmopolitan and check out this incredible speakeasy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAii1tfdE-i5JLeEXucxDfe&fid=0x0:0x7e88c1d3c3f0275a"],"When":"2025-8-18"},{"Name":"J S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQqTCS7R9qLDXWU8CMo5qj-cj9uiPHi_CPEkikmqWAAVLvjKkjng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a blast here on January 18, 2025. The service was excellent, The atmosphere was amazing and the band rocked! I can‚Äôt wait to go back one day!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBq1iKTusVJ8NibKhdOgCHK&fid=0x0:0x7e88c1d3c3f0275a"],"When":"2026-1-25"},{"Name":"Amanda Santos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgTWNqOkbHqp13JfV6TGioewCg3PsKSNO9ssvzTeCKj18oiHy1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited this hidden speakeasy during F1 weekend and it was truly one of the best Vegas experiences. The entrance is a super cool surprise! You walk through a barbershop into this gorgeous lounge that feels like a secret spot in the city.

We had bottle service and it was fantastic. The bottle prices and table minimums were actually amazing compared to other Vegas venues, especially during a busy event like F1. The live music was incredible ‚Äî the kind of songs you actually want to sing along to ‚Äî and the crowd was sophisticated but still super fun.

Our server, Jasmine, was absolutely impeccable and made the whole night feel effortless and special.

If you want a unique, elevated experience in Vegas that feels like a secret gem, with great music and top-notch service, this is the place to be!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Samina Alva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGPcykmdxOrdWzO_zMgeyykrtWdC02sjAdFPC1-cKCTFKq4BM9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a review for a visit on Monday August 18th 2025

We reserved a table for 10 near the stage¬† and the spot that was given was perfect .¬† Our group had been pretty busy this day . We had reservations at Maquee and Blue Ribbon  throughout the day  . It had been a long day and our group¬† was losing steam .

That all changed once Ziggy Zeno started playing his guitar . During his set he kept calling out our group and  asking us  if we had any requests .¬† ¬†The group loved it , and they were starting to show life again .

During Ziggy‚Äôs set I got meet the next band who was playing later  up at the bar, who were in the crowd supporting Ziggy.  The band was awesome and even asked me if there was a song request I had . I did , and it was the first song they played .¬† They also called  out to  or group several times during the night.

Once they got going our group was on fire!!

Thanks to Ziggy and the band whose name escapes me for being so interactive with our group , and for the awesome music !

Last but certainly not least the staff was amazing!
From Security , Khalil , Franklin , and Vincent were very kind to all of us , making us feel welcome with our interactions at the door and during the night.  Great team!
Cheyanne our server was kind and friendly and made sure we were always taken care of. Thank you Kim bartending skills on point and for your awesome drinks . We also got to meet the manager Greg Dipipi,  his attentiveness & kindness to our group was awesome!
I do hope the food¬† returns¬†to the Barbershop, which was very good when it was offered . Maybe with Clique reopening it will come back.
Looking forward to a visit soon !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA_zso5r14QodSbZt5Oqk95&fid=0x0:0x7e88c1d3c3f0275a"],"When":"2025-9-16"},{"Name":"Becca Ramirez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXADl5RjRmDcQXb961x3HGPaTp2bxQOgm9WPcPu2ydizyTgE9uO1A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dylan and Vincent Wilson - exceptional!
My husband and I decided to try this place after hearing about it on instagram and service has been amazing! Customer service-made use feel at home like we were friends

Absolutely check this place out!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA43IXPC0upxfGbEmBepT6O&fid=0x0:0x7e88c1d3c3f0275a"],"When":"2025-10-19"},{"Name":"Jill Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEdA1-KuPQR7xylZWGZjBlz_uf6lva4HMKypiqA4clslu24HRz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Barbershop is always a good time but last Thursday it was exceptional. After securing a table, we arrived with a pretty large group hoping that the team at Barbershop would be able to make it work. Mario, Dallas, Jasmine and the entire staff went above and beyond accommodating our group, bringing the drinks quickly, and ensuring we had a good time. It was emo night and the band was so much fun. Huge shoutout to the Barbershop for helping us create an epic night for entertaining customers and the best final night in Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC4fG_dhazkAh0S5Yvu1Ptm&fid=0x0:0x7e88c1d3c3f0275a"],"When":"2025-9-27"},{"Name":"Info Tiamspa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKS3fOw-UKHGujynNEDhuPMxcEs3MRhZxBfRLVjl6ciiMv3QA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My boyfriend and I recently traveled to Las Vegas for the first time and discovered a charming speakeasy called The Barbershop Cuts & Cocktails. We were excited to try it out after a long day of exploring the city.
Upon entering, we noticed a group at the center of the venue enjoying drinks.
When they decided to leave, the lady kindly suggested we take their spot since we wanted to relax and enjoy the atmosphere. However, our experience quickly took a turn for the worse when one of the staff approached us and insisted that we move to another table because our spot was ‚Äúreserved.‚Äù
We were surprised by this, as there were no signs indicating that the table was reserved.
Despite our polite inquiry, the staff member seemed more interested in enforcing the rules than accommodating us, forcing us to relocate to an uncomfortable table by the entrance.
As background, my boyfriend owns three restaurants that feature speakeasies, so we are familiar with the culture and expectations of such establishments.
Unfortunately, the treatment we received was far from what we expected.
The bartender's attitude, particularly towards my boyfriend, was rude and unprofessional.
To add to our frustration, when we were leaving, my parent accidentally opened the kitchen door instead of the exit, and the same staff member responded harshly, saying, ‚ÄúWhat are you trying to do, man? Just leave!!
Overall, it felt as though the staff did not respect their customers, and I would rate this experience 1 star if I could give zero stars, I would.
The service we encountered was disappointing, and we would not consider returning to this establishment.
Additionally, the venue itself did not live up to the expectations we had.
I would recommend looking elsewhere for a more welcoming and enjoyable experience.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Darya Shestakova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnzi3YfPqisBmdnMaXXCRJ5Pa9M-ZJGYaFC2uHr3CyXgiH0h-yWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The interior and vibe of this lounge are gorgeous. Cocktails are good, with a pinch of creativity. Service was quick and friendly. Perfect place to take a pause and chill.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD2ZmD9GXK8FxOSwkOd7Rrm&fid=0x0:0x4d459661a176f105"],"When":"2025-12-5"},{"Name":"Antonio Lopez (Tokalu)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqzi6Riv_19uV70wN4vZg9vUN9B8ZefLzjgy8MUp98OZ-Iajjyzg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved this lounge!!!! We came in and didn‚Äôt expect to stay as long as we did. Sat at the bar and asked for something cool with mezcal. The bartender Stephanie made us really good cocktails and suggested the waygu sliders both were so good!!!! We will be back on our next trip to Vegas","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAhTtFHzzjwZXVgqQ4r4N4v&fid=0x0:0x4d459661a176f105"],"When":"2025-10-17"},{"Name":"Brian McDermott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLaSt-qBFfSp1vHQsbBJpBSTFVTcXnVdWXCzYG8OhWLEnhbQg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just spent an entire week in Vegas. We came here on our last day. The vibe is fantastic, and the drinks were as well. But the service was over the top. Jonathan was kind, attentive, and personable. He provided the best service we had all week and it wasn't even close! If you're looking for good drinks and phenomenal service, you need to check this place out. If Jonathan is bartending, make sure to grab a spot at the bar, you won't regret it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Igor Avidon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXp6-ituYk7-iucIICs-TPq9KzpA5Aw7lw_erxJt7HC7UTZRNRRaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of the better bar lounges inside of a casino. Once inside you're mostly shielded away from the casino itself. On a weekend, the DJ played 90s and 00s club music. Drinks are what you'd expect from similar places (decent). The interior is nice and the atmosphere is truly the best part about this place. If you're not trying to get into a big clubin Vegas, but still want to dance, this is a perfect alternative.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cameron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVP9glja16ds-pjeUiAGtqjy871nA3ly4-eCBX69QvS2vjCsyxo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Clique is quaint, but jumping lounge. It's small but never over crowded. I can't remember who the DJ was, but it was hands down one of the best mixed sessions I've ever heard in a long time. The music just kept coming, jam after jam.

The drinks are good and the waitress are not only friendly but beautiful!

This is a good spot. Definitely a favorite lounge.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Raymond Neville","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKG4gZcaTrLSsaxRcMdgrOcF4395Am9pr5Dzef-v-rEPPVmDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Snobby as hell.  Fun atmosphere and if you want to be treated like you‚Äôre not worthy, then this is the place.  Drinks are weak and no house specialties.   Had martini and very watery.  Food is pricey, even for Vegas, small portions even at the bar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDnp8WV2QE&fid=0x0:0x4d459661a176f105"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Brandon Peterson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKo-VQZwj5WP-4DRUXnj9NGdVJ9XwEvPDkYLykkrhGwbdpYCw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was in town visiting and came across this lounge while staying at the Cosmo. Came into clique and Stephanie was our bartender, she was so friendly and welcoming, She suggested excellent cocktails and some food items. We ended up chatting about Hometowns and life, she really engaged with us, we adore her! She made me and my wife's experience so wonderful we will definitely be back to see her every trip we have to Vegas! The drinks and food were phenomenal, good music and DJ too. 10/10 recommend this lounge when staying in Vegas","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Travis Sainsbury","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiyRpfNHzUae8dpeg7Y5VSIMtv0lndNBCNrg6hLTs_uNA2Rck=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited this bar this week while attending a conference at The Cosmo and was not disappointed. The drinks were awesome and the vibe inside was perfect. Service was on point with Jade as she was very friendly and on top of everything. Will definitely be going back next time I am in town. And hopefully it is a night when Jade is working.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Mita Sampat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTCYBGMr8DzzQxR11q12uIcRnNwYqaRBSh_rJT0GbqgQHBSMjd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Pinky‚Äôs is undeniably stunning. The attention to detail in the d√©cor makes it feel like you‚Äôre stepping into another world the moment you walk in. It‚Äôs immersive, glamorous, and exactly the kind of vibe you‚Äôd expect from a spot tied to the Vanderpump universe.

Unfortunately, the experience didn‚Äôt live up to the atmosphere.

We went for apps and cocktails and were left disappointed. I ordered the Hot Honey Margarita, which was neither hot nor sweet ‚Äî it tasted like a basic margarita. For apps, we tried the goat cheese balls and the pigs in a blanket. They looked fine, but the flavours were surprisingly basic. Honestly, I had better appetizers at the Cheesecake Factory earlier that day.

Service was just okay. It took a few minutes just to get water, and our server took quite a while to get to our table in general, which didn‚Äôt help the overall experience.

Pinky‚Äôs definitely delivers on the hype and aesthetic ‚Äî and as a VPR and Beverly Hills fan, I fully understand the appeal ‚Äî but I was hoping Lisa‚Äôs impeccable taste would shine through in the food, drinks, and service. We ended up skipping ordering anything else because it felt like a waste of money.

Beautiful spot, but not much beyond that.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA4ljmDuRkbIDy__dxRgWjB&fid=0x0:0xc1216b4cc7b84f2e"],"When":"2025-11-12"},{"Name":"Tonya Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjwLy360lXDXlrxfLTmGl8L3wHk2nrMiyC6Rv11UKw03mMHfR5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first night in Vegas we went to Pinky's for late night drinks. Carlie was our server and did ok for the most part, she was tired. The drinks were good and strong. I had a long island ice tea, one cousin has a classic margarita with cosomigos, my other cousin had strawberry mocktail, I can't recall the name. The esthetics was beautiful üòç we will visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDyb59Ha8NuSpHHIl6eSBWH&fid=0x0:0xc1216b4cc7b84f2e"],"When":"2026-2-9"},{"Name":"Julie Valencia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPgHQsDDza2MGGwqP14gKvwf2ynl5qyE95aq9ne8WcKNkmQO3m=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow,  this place was beautiful.   We couldn't wait to see and taste the food and drinks.   I ordered the Sin & Tonic but with vodka.  It was so fresh and not too sweet, just perfect.  My husband ordered the d
Dirty Dog and he loved it.  Food wise we ordered the Deviled eggs,  mini Lobster rolls and the Waygu sliders.  I would definitely order them again,  so delicious and fresh.   Such a beautiful vibe,  we were seated in the glass atrium.   The service from Brittany was wonderful!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCoOWI-wFK5oUOrm4Vx981t&fid=0x0:0xc1216b4cc7b84f2e"],"When":"2025-10-4"},{"Name":"Harneet Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV188JOxFqCZ9v15hDob3SGVhHBsYK0srVu8wXvfzaL49BNzwM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Spent some time at Pinky‚Äôs inside the Flamingo Hotel and really enjoyed it. The ambience is very aesthetic and perfect for taking pictures. The place has a great vibe, and the food and drinks were very tasty. Everything was enjoyable, and I‚Äôd definitely recommend it if you‚Äôre looking for good food and a fun, photo-worthy spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDCPOLsjbUTfCowBLWvQAGC&fid=0x0:0xc1216b4cc7b84f2e"],"When":"2026-1-6"},{"Name":"Victoria Clark","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJyDECx9QdOThG9HxKmwBGIotuN1x4Ke46IgAUH9Vk_3w6tNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow, I‚Äôm so sad to see the ratings are kind of low here. Is it A bit overpriced? Yes. But everything was so beautiful so delicious. I mean it was just an incredible experience. I had the best drink I‚Äôve ever had called Nic something lol and it was huge. My friend Friend got the espresso martini and yes, the presentation was 11 out of 10, but didn‚Äôt taste the best. But I really enjoyed all of the food we ordered!!! Highly recommend the sliders and The burger and the pool Apart  bread!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDhxQRfWl60mFJOZbTuDs2f&fid=0x0:0xc1216b4cc7b84f2e"],"When":"2025-10-23"},{"Name":"Megan Bercaw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2x5jxGg6BNnErfSyRIIheuF1D8D2sXMEod3KSmkLkAjOdIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Miguel was THE BEST server assistant! Very quick and attentive. The goat cheese balls and truffle Mac and cheese were very good! The daddy issues drink was delicious. The birthday baby drink was so cute but way too sweet. Can‚Äôt wait to come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCE4FYI1IRAb0NIOkna0ZoH&fid=0x0:0xc1216b4cc7b84f2e"],"When":"2025-11-12"},{"Name":"jessica parish","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL0gVsGlDJ8hNCpHoHsNMMYJfpqbIiWj265LVKh__inNMcpBg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My mother and I visited Las Vegas for Thanksgiving week, and our dining experience at Pinky‚Äôs by Vanderpump was, without question, the most iconic and unforgettable meal of our entire trip.

We started our vacation at Vanderpump √† Paris, which set the bar high with phenomenal food and service. For Thanksgiving dinner, we saved Hell‚Äôs Kitchen‚Äîonly to be met with a shockingly poor and dismissive experience from our server that left us feeling unwelcome and disappointed.

Hoping to salvage the last night of our trip, we chose Pinky‚Äôs by Vanderpump, and it turned out to be the best decision we could have made.

From the moment we walked in, Desiree (Des) made us feel truly seen, valued, and welcomed‚Äîexactly what we needed after the previous night‚Äôs treatment. She is extraordinary: warm, attentive, effortlessly charismatic, and incredibly knowledgeable about the menu. Every recommendation she made was perfect, and her enthusiasm and sincerity completely transformed our evening.

Miguel was equally amazing‚Äîfriendly, professional, and attentive in a way that elevated the entire atmosphere. The teamwork between Des and Miguel created a level of hospitality we rarely encounter anywhere. They didn‚Äôt just give great service‚Äîthey redeemed the end of our Thanksgiving trip and reminded us what genuine hospitality feels like.

The assistant manager, Joseph B., also came by to check on us, adding to an already flawless experience. Between the attentive service, the exquisite food, and the thoughtfully crafted drinks, everything at Pinky‚Äôs was exceptional. It says something that we enjoyed their birdcage charcuterie, pull-apart bread, and goat cheese balls a thousand times more than Hell‚Äôs Kitchen‚Äôs Beef Wellington.

We left feeling grateful, celebrated, and absolutely blown away by how much care and kindness these three brought to our night. Desiree, Miguel, and Joseph are shining examples of what makes the Vanderpump brand so special: elevated service, genuine warmth, and meticulous attention to detail that turns a meal into a memory.

They are the reason we will continue choosing Vanderpump establishments every time we‚Äôre in Las Vegas.

‚Äî Jessica & Kathy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDtFcK2IV42hstZSaLHQ_f5&fid=0x0:0xc1216b4cc7b84f2e"],"When":"2025-11-29"},{"Name":"jeanette thul","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJv31uNwh1ezoBW0hq6imR-FgSKDhEBnczOMGnxy8_Zh49iHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a lovely experience at Pinky's! Food was delicious and the presentation was beautiful! Our server Micala was excellent and helpful! Wonderful brunch on a Sunday!  The one suggestion I have is to turn the heat up a bit. Many of us were cold in the restaurant. Otherwise .. perfection!'","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBYiUM8c5aRQZen-OAYgwhg&fid=0x0:0xc1216b4cc7b84f2e"],"When":"2025-11-17"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Roman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpfNb4KdnRqz5qfC9S8qsfGvDO9mi3iJtbGqUWY2BEWoaByVU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My partner and I had dinner reservations at Gilley‚Äôs in Treasure Island on Wednesday, December 17. We were excited for a relaxed meal, country music, line dancing, and maybe a ride on the mechanical bull. The whole evening turned into a lively, memorable night.

We arrived around 8:30 p.m. and the bar area was fairly quiet at first. We asked if we could eat in the bar even though our reservation was for the dining room. The security guard said yes, so we grabbed high top seats between the mechanical bull and the dance floor. After about ten minutes with no service, we decided to use our dining reservation instead.

The dining room was a pleasant surprise. We were seated right away, the hostess was warm, and our server was upbeat and attentive. As a vegetarian I had hoped for a spicy southwestern pasta, but the menu had limited plant-based choices. I ordered the Beyond Burger and fries. The burger was tasty and satisfying, though I would love to see more vegetarian options. My partner ordered the baked half chicken. The portion was generous and she loved it.

After a relaxed dinner in a not too crowded dining room, we returned to the bar and took seats at the main bar for quicker service. The atmosphere picked up as the night went on. We enjoyed a few rounds of drinks and had a blast watching people line dance and two-stepping. The DJ mixed classic and modern country tunes and kept the energy high. The crowd was friendly and everyone seemed to be having a great time.

We had hoped to see the mechanical bull in action and maybe ride it. Unfortunately, the bull was not operating for our second visit in two years. It would be great if the bull‚Äôs hours were posted more clearly so guests can plan around it and not miss the show.

Overall, we had a fantastic night. The food was good, the staff were friendly, and the entertainment was a lot of fun even without the bull. We always look forward to visiting Gilley‚Äôs when we are in Las Vegas. If you love country music and line dancing, Gilley‚Äôs is one of the best spots on the Strip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAiiqH-W75WVtowLR0Zrz9I&fid=0x0:0x2188e40631d1dec5"],"When":"2026-1-18"},{"Name":"Èô≥ÂÆá","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3Jps1iPCY7RZeadJEQ-ZKVOqYhLhNSZw62Wzu2DA3jme-IZI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The menu design is suck‚Äîit's full of hidden traps that can easily lead to overcharging. However, the staff and manager are actually very nice. If you decide to visit, make sure to double-check every detail of your order before confirming.
The beef, pork, and chicken were all super dry and overcooked. Only the salmon was actually good. On the plus side, they are very generous with the broccoli side order‚Äîit‚Äôs delicious and one of the few places around here where you can get a good serving of veggies. Highly recommended for the greens!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB-GsqxnXnoRkE6pQzTfaN2&fid=0x0:0x2188e40631d1dec5"],"When":"2026-1-16"},{"Name":"Kathy M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1FISTbS8Fy1fgPt9yvry9JGQcWqYeKiKmZu0CguvRTCdOp5o3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"On a recent holiday to Vegas, we found this place without knowing anything about it. We assumed it would be pirate themed since it‚Äôs treasure Island Hotel. But it‚Äôs cowboy themed. The food was great and reasonably priced for Vegas.. we went at lunchtime so there was no dancing or entertainment but the place still has a nice vibe . Would definitely recommend. The pulled pork in particular was very good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCQymFAe7oFd3JMka9S656h&fid=0x0:0x2188e40631d1dec5"],"When":"2025-9-22"},{"Name":"Nourchene","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyacPT7gPbfhnW0Y1Esgw68onWLVX4r1McV5T-tp9Rbd8K9Yk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had two half roasted chicken with two different two sides (smashed potatoes + grilled broccoli and fries + salad). The quantity was generous and the taste was incredibly great. We enjoyed every bite!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDcM9QGyHbAWlOZhTvkCC9d&fid=0x0:0x2188e40631d1dec5"],"When":"2026-1-8"},{"Name":"Rajiv Garg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7Mc-eFXbj_H3ta4V5Li7udLvt7IPXRJxHgqwMbsaA1z6uft9k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great Atmosphere and big place with bar and restaurant, as well as live country music on weekends. Mechanical bull riding and line dancing. Huge stage for dancing. Great decorations and good selection of food from burgers to barbecue. Excellent bar for entertainment, food, and dancing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhARwv_nASYRA5aLfJ3nqbP-&fid=0x0:0x2188e40631d1dec5"],"When":"2025-11-10"},{"Name":"Whitney Reid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZaK5uSqNefhNSRUFeDgyFhzxpPQ5yNAIyosx9nuUL0xd0YGGr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food is just ok. They have line dancing lesson at 7pm. You can ride a mechanical bull if you‚Äôre brave. Great music and fun atmosphere","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCEvaRyWn8aGrqoItOASYn_&fid=0x0:0x2188e40631d1dec5"],"When":"2025-10-3"},{"Name":"Robert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvFI6ygtwpZJswiJpyXWI3XyKMMm_KeIdAsifgt1azPM2QFUxS6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The generous portion of sliced brisket with two sides was enough for two! The staff were very friendly and the kitchen was fast. At 8:30 the music and dancing starts on the other side. You can take line dance lessons prior to 8:30. Yee Haw!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAsWJHPG9jr08vbdu_n7yrc&fid=0x0:0x2188e40631d1dec5"],"When":"2025-10-6"},{"Name":"Andrew Mariani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvv9ZorBrfLvJil8bqyvTbSY5qIGqSkUXdjxYWapylSp5VYIDc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really cool southern bar. Watched some dancing while we waited for our table. We all enjoyed our food. The chicken plate was HUGE.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBbUjBc4RrW_FFfO98XKHHW&fid=0x0:0x2188e40631d1dec5"],"When":"2025-10-22"}]
