column32:
[{"Name":"Brian Holden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVu_uPC1kvM2K3okgSjg5idl8dCAV2jtoIwHuUCTh5dsS2MiGdPgg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finding The Ski Lodge Bar is part of the fun, but staying there is pure magic. Tucked away discreetly, you'll need to know the secret entry, this bar is the most unique and charming hidden gem in Las Vegas. Forget the neon and slots; this is where you go when you crave an actual escape.
The atmosphere is executed flawlessly. As soon as you step inside, you are transported to a chic, mid-century alpine cabin. Everything from the wooden paneling and stone fireplace (which is always "burning") to the vintage ski equipment on the walls creates an incredibly warm, intimate, and cozy vibe. It‚Äôs the perfect spot to decompress after a day on the Strip.
The cocktails are inventive and perfectly crafted, leaning heavily into delicious, spirit-forward "apres-ski" themes. They specialize in hot toddies, spiced drinks, and unique takes on classics, all served by bartenders who are knowledgeable and genuinely friendly. The service is attentive but never intrusive, adding to the feeling that you‚Äôve stumbled into a private, exclusive retreat.
If you‚Äôre tired of the typical Vegas scene and want a genuinely different, high-quality nightlife experience, you absolutely must seek out The Ski Lodge Bar. It‚Äôs an authentic five-star experience that rewards those willing to look off the beaten path. It‚Äôs the best secret in town!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCpFI5BuzVZGMWjT6da_UTc&fid=0x0:0x23d717ab9db56a86"],"When":"2025-12-2"},{"Name":"Brian Evans (AtomikEvans)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxwJqXuRHACR-3AavykAJbwWS3cOlwjwRCTojIniLZ6w51-dH3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"üéø A Cozy, Cocktails-and-Mystery Gem: The Ski Lodge Speakeasy Review

‚ÄãIf you're looking for a hidden retreat amidst the glitz of the Strip, you absolutely must find your way to the Ski Lodge Speakeasy inside the Cosmopolitan in Las Vegas. Finding it is half the fun‚Äîit's a delightful scavenger hunt!

‚ÄãKeep your eyes peeled for the subtle clue: a dark wood door marked only by a small, gleaming brass skier logo. Once you've found it and step inside, you leave the casino floor far behind and enter a small, incredibly cozy lodge atmosphere.

‚ÄãThe Vibe, Music, and Drinks
‚ÄãThe speakeasy itself perfectly captures a mountain lodge feel. It's intimate and warmly decorated, but what truly makes it special is the funky mix of music and decorations. It's this playful and unexpected combination that adds a layer of super fun charm and ensures the atmosphere never gets stuffy.

‚ÄãAnd of course, the cocktails are great‚Äîexpertly crafted and definitely a highlight of the experience.

‚ÄãExceptional Service
‚ÄãWhat elevated our visit from great to fantastic was the incredible service. Our bartenders, Nicole, Jasmine, and Marco, were an absolute dream team. They were not only skilled at their craft but also genuinely welcoming and attentive, making us feel completely at home. Their hospitality truly makes this spot stand out.

‚ÄãThe Verdict
‚ÄãThe Ski Lodge Speakeasy is definitely worth the time and effort to find. It‚Äôs a hidden gem that delivers on atmosphere, high-quality cocktails, and amazing service. Don't miss this unique Las Vegas experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDDZtbgoHzl93TLyH4vXgwN&fid=0x0:0x23d717ab9db56a86"],"When":"2025-11-9"},{"Name":"Jimmy Krueger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-gUbb6W_YThZYi2mQDbUxrXJf-18Gf1jpRCpo2zmuRFrwhw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We finally checked this place out on a recent guys trip and had a good time. The ambience is awesome. Definitely wouldn‚Äôt be able to tell you‚Äôre in Vegas. The house made cocktails were great. The bourbon selection was awesome. We even did a shot-ski! We got there too early to try the food (not available until 3), but it gives us another reason to come back. The bartenders were friendly and gave great recommendations. Check them out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDzCtcuPzp-0mPMFStChiwC&fid=0x0:0x23d717ab9db56a86"],"When":"2025-11-2"},{"Name":"Dj Lorence","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyrDQ6leC8sZTHF80aMSkeF5D-c5I0wzUc38H8GvF7eycL7C_z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ski Lodge is a super cool speakeasy located in the Cosmopolitan hotel! You can find a nondescript door and walk into a winter ski lodge. Everything is super well themed and it transports you to feeling like you‚Äôre in a cozy and warm cabin. The drinks are a bit pricey, but that‚Äôs standard for Vegas. 25-30$ at least. I did get the ‚ÄúNot the Buttons‚Äù which was a gingerbread old fashioned with a build your own gingerbread man on the side! Super fun!! They also have a ‚Äúshotski‚Äù which you can take flavored shots off a ski at the same time with your friends. You can do 2 or up to 5 people on 1 ski. Overall this is a cool stop if you want a good cocktail with an atmosphere!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBS31JbQ3H_vdGXBoclsKcg&fid=0x0:0x23d717ab9db56a86"],"When":"2026-1-11"},{"Name":"Mike P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGgizkLqYX6LGsHECIDnOmjTpL0cTawJCcomdaxosqHBGjAsus=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finding Ski Lodge is a bit of a scavenger hunt ‚Äî look for the ‚Äúdoor with a ski logo‚Äù ‚Äî but once you‚Äôre in, it‚Äôs worth it. I wandered in around noon and shared the space with one lone guest, which made it feel like my own private apr√®s-ski cocktail dream scenario.

The vibe? Cozy-chic ‚Äî like a high-end cabin with cocktails instead of cocoa. My bartender, Heather, was friendly and totally on point. She made me the Soy Soy Good, a bold mix of whiskey, gyoza (yes, really), cocchi di torino, apple, and toasted coconut honey. Wild combo, but it worked. The Marugarita with wasabi-yuzu and pistachio salt? A winner.

At $25 each, the drinks aren‚Äôt cheap ‚Äî but this is Vegas. For the flavor, vibe, and creativity, it‚Äôs easily in my top 3 cocktail bars in the city.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBzE1HculRtzekhUrLe3UZw&fid=0x0:0x23d717ab9db56a86"],"When":"2025-10-27"},{"Name":"Valerie Kwasniuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMhAp6Mdj6YBLciTRxhvvFy7eswLMa9t_OjEWX4sa1UePM2WVf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cool bar. We waited in line probably twenty minutes on a Friday night but the line moved. It‚Äôs a fun bar inside with 90s snowboarding posters and decor. Good drinks and pizza","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDsYraoV53_VXWvn7T9VMUC&fid=0x0:0x23d717ab9db56a86"],"When":"2026-2-17"},{"Name":"Tracey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuOQ8anXQYYlcC8YMuIDwvJai00AwfxC_iwMTk3-qJMQg-WcE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"# Hidden Gem Alert: The Ski Lodge Speakeasy at The Cosmopolitan

**‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ Must-Do Vegas Experience**

You absolutely HAVE to hit up this place when you‚Äôre in Vegas. Period! This isn‚Äôt your typical Vegas bar - it‚Äôs something completely different and that‚Äôs exactly what makes it so special.

The Experience

We got there right at noon when they opened and had to wait a few minutes, but that‚Äôs part of the charm. Someone comes out to set up the ropes and organize the line - it‚Äôs all very mysterious and exclusive feeling. Once you‚Äôre in, they tell you exactly where to sit, which adds to that authentic speakeasy vibe.

The Drinks

The bartenders here are absolutely incredible - true artists behind the bar. Yes, the drinks are $25 each, but trust me, they‚Äôre worth every penny. These aren‚Äôt your standard Vegas cocktails; they‚Äôre crafted experiences that match the unique atmosphere perfectly.

What to Know Before You Go

**Important tip:** They don‚Äôt serve food until 3pm, so plan accordingly if you‚Äôre looking to eat. We got there right at opening (noon) and were glad we had eaten beforehand.

The Vibe

This place is the perfect escape from all the craziness that is Vegas. While the Strip is all bright lights and chaos, the Ski Lodge Speakeasy offers this cozy, intimate atmosphere that feels like you‚Äôve been transported somewhere completely different. It‚Äôs that contrast that makes it so memorable.

Bottom Line

This is one of those experiences that sets Vegas apart from any other destination. It‚Äôs not just about gambling and shows - it‚Äôs about discovering these hidden gems that give you stories to tell for years. The Ski Lodge Speakeasy delivers that in spades. Make the time, spend the money, and prepare for something totally unique.

Would I go back? Absolutely. This is going straight to the top of my ‚Äúmust-visit every Vegas trip‚Äù list.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDQsBuN2qYWazKtSyuSH9eG&fid=0x0:0x23d717ab9db56a86"],"When":"2025-7-26"},{"Name":"Brook S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvJNjEwNzTjX8MhcCtsLnAaY3lSnzV553ZzLi-Hu6DZYBPq1tG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We visited June 2025. This is a speakeasy in the Cosmopolitan Hotel and casino. I‚Äôll let you find it. Super cool interior, cozy, dark, but loud. We had a couple drinks and relaxed with a large group. No drink minimum. The host was a bit over the top - that‚Äôs all I‚Äôll say. Cool place to check out when in Vegas!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKENelm8PQzPmHbw&fid=0x0:0x23d717ab9db56a86"],"When":"2025-6-9"}]

[{"Name":"Wabi Sabbi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgDi6ikbIlwX16zk2Cwgr6RSx3b8sVrJOVYEoLeCWg36OQeWIPbg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The bartender Jonyce was awful bad attitude legit killed the one but when the bartender William came out people were wayyyy more happy and actually talking and conversing. I would have will out more than joynce. If it wasn‚Äôt for Will making the situation better i would‚Äôve left and given a 1 star review makes no sense everyone at the bar gets excited at 4am for someone who‚Äôs a barback and not the bartender. Check the cameras and see how uncomfortable everyone feels around her. Also 20$ for a drink is crazy when oddfellows has 8$ drinks","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jon Stone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL1qky6R7GTHQ7l8oZ_TchvOqYTl310vhLNTmFGVPDJmFUBdw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sullys is my favorite little bar in the casino... I've been going there for 20 yrs now(Ballys days).  There are some really great bartenders. Sunny is the best!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike Ingle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQNe18zxa3IK1j3BghrvDgi3ZPbZkil7hQVUqygp2tht88BA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Wesley was the BEST bartender on the strip! On the other hand, RICK was the absolute worst! Would absolutely refuse to acknowledge your presence. Even when wanting to order an ice water he would ignore you. And he would not only ignore you, he would tell the other bartenders not to serve you. If you see Rick working....... Walk away!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ericka B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjm2o0VOQuuSqDaIArpV4V9_qqSSdSTsL4kllXzMWwOMPzmdg1_w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I‚Äôve stayed at the horseshoe over the week for the bar expo and this was by far the worst customer service I‚Äôve ever experienced.

First time there we were not acknowledged for at least 7-10min and once we were the bar staff was too busy pouring one glass of wine to multitask and just AT THE MINIMUM SAY ‚ÄúI‚Äôll be right with you‚Äù instead she bypassed and when we brought her lack of service to her attention she said I‚Äôm making something right now with an attitude.

The next visit which was seconds ago, I asked for salt and just a cup of hot water. Could‚Äôve been tap for all I care, I‚Äôm not feeling well and losing my voice and just wanted to gargle and nothing else is open but the bar.. also I‚Äôm paying to stay at the Horseshoe so im a hotel patron; besides the point she rolled her eyes multiple times.

This was the worst bar experience I‚Äôve ever had in Vegas and the horseshoe should really address the people who work underneath of them in their establishment.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Big Daddy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJVxl_tGyV7qLzzY95bG2BNDOeKScVphAL8vTnTSs_JDozDPSO5A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ask for Cynthia. Great Barkeep, great service, conversation! Brings luck if you gamble at her bar! Also ask for Donny! Great bartender as well. Never have to wait and always service with a smile!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Miss Spicy Today DivaLuscious","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVarKWUoa-7JUjL_i5iOJ1hFd0ffFG9sYrj4Bdxfn25WnZn89s8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I Will Come here Again!!!! SLAMMING!!!! GOOD TIME !!!!  Lila Mentia Truvillion aka Miss Spicy Today DivaLuscious....
NO ACTRESS.........
..Personal Phone and Personal Email!!!!
NOT Paid on Youtube or Instagram..... I am NOT on a REALITY SHOW!!!! SERIOUS NO!!!
3 Years Living in VEGAS!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marcus (The Bushna)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5mraEx0FCJ6TXeRThLbevJzZkkOcLtZBehJbPnHC3wY4a409i=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Passive aggressive staff & overpriced drinks. Would not recommend. Drink was good. But worth maybe at ‚Öì the price I paid for it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Judy Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYMb2hZK8L8g1kopNTR24UroZnNS0VVKSybrKc2eKwBMrYS3StUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome. Free drinks with the video slots at the bar. It is brand new and swanky. Bartenders are awesome. Nice place to hang out and get your head together in Vegas.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Rich Gold","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXaR9pkNSBb06LfRUIccH2Csxg9wDOD-2xvvCHZXlZG9wmeO73Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Decided to stop in to the Tilted Kilt for a light dinner and the Mac Daddy Flatbread seemed very intriguing so we gave it a try.
Since Denise is a vegetarian we asked that the meat be served on the side and they were very accommodating.
Sorry about the photo not showing the entire flatbread, we dug in to our first slices pretty quickly.
We have to say that the Mac Daddy is an excellent flatbread. We‚Äôve tried Cheeseburger Pizza at other places in the past but this beats those out hands down. The Ranch Dressing and Dill Pickles combine for an excellent flavor profile.
Be adventurous. Give it a try.
As far as the restaurant, it was a friendly atmosphere as could be expected. I was surprised that it was not at all busy, but the benefit was that our food was delivered incredibly quickly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD6I81hUHBN8gkB_B0GqFPl&fid=0x0:0xea0c13e1411878fb"],"When":"2025-12-24"},{"Name":"Robert Degnan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVqP2fLIgSZwDV7OB_9pl7rEZjKsqQehPV2m904CtwmuUg_CqZsw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came in on a Sunday. There are over 25 tvs on with all the football games as well as golf. Huge selection of beers and full service bar. During the game they had a $3 special on Miller. We got the pulled pork, BBQ, mac n cheese. It was creamy and topped with fried onions on top. So good. We ordered 10 wings. 5 were Jamaican jerk. Unique flavor throughout. We also got 5 buffalo, garlic. The combination was really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAh7G2qKVbowQdNfY2pFt4Z&fid=0x0:0xea0c13e1411878fb"],"When":"2025-9-28"},{"Name":"vic carr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKOO6F7Zfrp-gz92v1_htBWpRMhmJJhMzxPTSrr_s7TgvGtEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Great place to sit, enjoy a variety of beers and liquor. Really good food and awesome service. Plenty of seating. If you decide to sit out the high roller ferris wheel and have a bite while catching sports highlights then this is your place. Good times.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCtQB2Qyz4keTE_3intaGkN&fid=0x0:0xea0c13e1411878fb"],"When":"2025-12-23"},{"Name":"Brian ‚ÄúBmanpitt‚Äù Pitcher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWe0MjsVWEJdzdTIqy9Ir-SaZ7A8Yq0fd7S1nANp4x-OCE_ijd70w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great atmosphere not enough servers being cute..Loved the design and interior looks like a nice Irish pub .... Way bigger and love the decor. The food was good but nothing over the top. I eat at allot of Irish bars and found them more authentic..The server was good but she was running many tables...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCw_ZTlrwE&fid=0x0:0xea0c13e1411878fb"],"When":"2025-3-20"},{"Name":"Frans Ponson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhN00-r56UmTCsGGi08ZUZ58K10OXP8cxcYffdUNaP8JcJfVGq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you are just like me a Chicken Wing Master then you have to eat at this restaurant. Wings where grilled just at perfection point while moist inside grispy outside, tried 3 flavors all perfect did not try anythings else but if you are a chicken wings lover just like give this restaurant a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDg67n8nQE&fid=0x0:0xea0c13e1411878fb"],"When":"2025-2-27"},{"Name":"David Oliver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWujqqscekZLMq9p1tMxaHoSAiEV_YZuTiWE39rGyvuNNcefmrG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came to Las Vegas for a business trip and stopped by while hungover. I was greeted at the door immediately by Arianna with a huge smile and great attitude. The atmosphere, music, and decorations are fantastic as well. Claire was my server, and she was amazing. Great attitude and attentive, I never had to wave her down once. I was told Eli was the chef and he cooked everything perfectly. Mozzarella sticks were hot when they arrived and my burger was ACTUALLY cooked how I requested it. I wish I had staff like this in the restaurants around my town. I will definitely be back the next time I'm in town. Thank you guys so much!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICRyMqBTg&fid=0x0:0xea0c13e1411878fb"],"When":"2023-3-23"},{"Name":"Chris Dickinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKMSs9sq9GpDKHUs0_dLue-4UH0jTDSiHE6wMyqV39oq1wj5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a few drinks to watch the game.  Our server tabbed us out and said her shift was over and someone else would take care of us. 45 minutes later, no one came to help.  Asked another girl and she said ‚Äúo yeah, her shift ended at 6.‚Äù  No offer to assist us, so we left.  Better places in Vegas to go, skip this place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Albranyer Hern√°ndez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIHxjFliXSw8upufmFVToMSyT3d7uNNTswLUBZRYeggvoGs_g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very bad service. The girls are rude and never pay attention to the customer. They're always on the phone. Their faces are terrifying. A very bad experience. The place is very nice, but the service is 0.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDVb7qb4Zw6EOJP9FhsBV1J&fid=0x0:0xea0c13e1411878fb"],"When":"2025-10-26"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Marc-Louis Paprzyca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUykj6pT26ZZ1p20EsXn6bp0FjGU_2lP2VCChgWZ627wpLaaIZutA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We‚Äôve been to a few Vanderpump spots and they‚Äôre all pretty much the same. Great atmosphere, great cocktails, and pretty ok food.

We love the vibe and the decor and the cocktails but we always get sucked into getting food after a cocktail or two. It‚Äôs so not worth it. They‚Äôre never as good as they‚Äôre described or look. Sip the tasty drinks and take your time to people watch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCkzcGgaRQZfsFLv2OyPoXK&fid=0x0:0xaee5852e11aebc9f"],"When":"2026-2-8"},{"Name":"Maura B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdJHSbFY6h1tCGGzHjmwr1_uWRQHbUi9KVf-M2cp3hzObKMdCf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vanderpump √† Paris & Cocktail Garden ‚Äì Las Vegas
Wine & Dine Review

Vanderpump‚Äôs Cocktail Garden is a vibrant escape tucked into the heart of Las Vegas. The moment you walk in, soft lighting and fragrant blooms set a romantic, whimsical tone ‚Äî like stepping into an elegant garden party where every detail sparkles with personality.

The space is vibrantly colorful, from the lush d√©cor to the beautifully crafted cocktails and plates. The food is unique, delicious, and thoughtfully presented with that unmistakable Vanderpump flair. Cocktails are creative, refreshing, and visually stunning ‚Äî each one feels like its own little work of art.

The staff was gracious and attentive, adding warmth to the experience without ever rushing the moment. Their hospitality made the evening feel even more special.

Whether you‚Äôre stopping in for cocktails, sharing small plates, or settling in for a full dinner, Vanderpump‚Äôs Cocktail Garden is the kind of place where time slows down just enough to savor beauty, flavor, and connection ‚Äî a true Las Vegas gem worth returning to.
Maura B.

Vanderpump Cocktail Garden:

‚ÄúThank you for your thoughtful response. The ambiance, service, and attention to detail made my visit exceptional. I appreciate the hospitality.‚Äù

Maura B.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDMC62VMZMsDjIyxIyJkNCl&fid=0x0:0xaee5852e11aebc9f"],"When":"2025-11-18"},{"Name":"Amy Edmondson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXePyyuCtlQk8tU9WmNVqUqnFpbVJoum32PqlMejzhUoni0Wyi5BQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you want to feel like you‚Äôve stepped directly into a diamond-encrusted fever dream, Vanderpump Cocktail Garden at Caesars Palace is the only place to be. It is quintessential Lisa Vanderpump: unapologetically opulent, slightly dramatic, and utterly gorgeous.

The attention to detail here is breathtaking. This isn't just a bar; it‚Äôs an indoor forest of romance. Looking up, you‚Äôre greeted by a lush canopy of flowers and twinkling lights cascading from the ceiling. Looking down, the floors and furniture feel like a high-end Parisian library met a moody garden party. Every square inch is a photogenic masterpiece, drenched in candlelight and oversized industrial-glam accents. It is the definition of "floor-to-ceiling" fabulous.

The Vibe is sexy, sophisticated, and has that "see and be seen" energy that only Vegas can provide. Whether you are a fan of *Vanderpump Rules* or just a fan of impeccable design, this spot is a 10/10.

Final Verdict: Put on your best outfit, grab your camera, and prepare to feel like royalty for an hour or two. Cheers, darling!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBu_o2e1wqGN89XrzrtpVl6&fid=0x0:0xaee5852e11aebc9f"],"When":"2026-1-29"},{"Name":"Randi L Rubin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXf9_w_-227jviJo8GlH13Xe-0YSXuw25Sb4UE0VSwqUVYnwX_e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Having been to SUR, PUMP, and villa Blanca -  this place leaves a lot to be desired - but it‚Äôs still fun. The sliders and skewers were yummy, tad cold, and came out super fast. The cocktails were strong and HUGE. The biggest gripe is that there are no restrooms inside the venue. So you have to leave the garden- walk to the food court to their small and dirty restrooms and then walk back into the garden.  They also close by midnight.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCcC7JJeO_MzW2U76uGrBhH&fid=0x0:0xaee5852e11aebc9f"],"When":"2026-1-6"},{"Name":"Liann Amagan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXO40HRuuM_E9btxFD4_1E5SUUvCyojdDb_hNIluB_k3nhuX-wcFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Surprised one of our best friends with a night reservation to finally checkout this cocktail garden. We did go to a day party earlier that Sunday and we were dead so it was really hard to bounce back. We pre made a reservation for 10pm, our server was great! She knew so much about the place and all the drinks and handled the whole floor, shoutout to her, our receipt said Marki, I think that was her name! It was definitely a vibe, loved the decor and all of the flowers. It was hard for us to drink but I got the Puff the Magic Dragon (dragonfruit and mezcal), my other friend got a margarita, and the other two got the Vanderpump Pink Sangria. The drinks were really pretty and fairly strong. They also gave us complimentary shots for my friends birthday. We needed to eat so we got the charcuterie board and the swanky potato chips and caviar. It was a good supplement to the drinks. Nice spot for a drink and vibes with friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBuUbV4jjMw0Z7GxRJcKjXd&fid=0x0:0xaee5852e11aebc9f"],"When":"2025-10-3"},{"Name":"J Souza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrVSXhcpNGaq3sGrTyWkJiMxdw77wznxa49Y2D17VyWfECrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Attending a Conference at Cesar‚Äôs Palace Casino. My associate and I were hungry so we decided to go this place a go.
Located near the Forum Shop and Caesars entrance.

We waited in a short line and were seated on a high top table.
We ordered:
1.) Caesar‚Äôs Berries $14.99 this was refreshing nicely balanced between ingredients.
2.) Baby Gem Caesar Salad $17.99 the dressing had a great flavor and the lettuce was fresh.
3.) Baby Burgers $21.99 the burgers were a bit over done just ok.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhByhiHct30mqzwGcO4HJ4Zg&fid=0x0:0xaee5852e11aebc9f"],"When":"2025-10-30"},{"Name":"Alyssa McCord","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocID6dK85sDz8sLLRnjiDX5aD9zGOJDPIn3A915O2tz1dlmN8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely amazing. The food was all so good I forgot to take pictures until dessert! The goat cheese balls were so yummy! We had to get two orders. We also got the burger sliders and the hot honey chicken sliders. Both 10/10! The rose cake at the end was amazing. Drinks were delicious too! We had high hopes and were so excited to eat here, and it did not disappoint! The atmosphere was awesome, it is a beautiful layout, and great service. Can‚Äôt wait to come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAzEE5jW7ZcBQlLEh57RuDI&fid=0x0:0xaee5852e11aebc9f"],"When":"2025-10-6"},{"Name":"Carmen Toledo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLIv0y61u17sh82wMfufjWVwYD35RWt-hlEjs0ALQYE1AjdNA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An unforgettable experience! We had the pleasure of being served by Stacy Mendoza, and she truly made all the difference. From the very beginning, she treated us with outstanding care, recommending drinks that turned out to be exactly what we needed each one delicious and perfectly balanced.

The most special part was when she asked if we were celebrating something. We told her it was our honeymoon, and she surprised us with a spectacular dessert: a Croquembouche Tower, a traditional French treat that was not only stunning to look at but also absolutely delicious. It was the perfect way to end our evening.

On top of that, the place itself is absolutely beautiful, the decor is spectacular and perfect for photos, adding to the whole experience.

The drinks, the service, and Stacy‚Äôs thoughtful recommendations were all exceptional. She turned our visit into a memory we‚Äôll never forget and made us want to come back again. üíï

Highly recommended for anyone looking not only for great food and drinks but also for service that makes you feel truly special!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB1gSrBl4McLv42kzzTpgey&fid=0x0:0xaee5852e11aebc9f"],"When":"2025-9-17"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Tiffany Mascia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHfyb6ZhhpOqgyfuFkV9MvxlEP_d4RguU4ptJA1WmMPKCsOw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We came when it was decorated for Christmas and tickets had to bought prior for Holly Jolly. The decorations were cute inside but it was a pretty small space and was giving work Christmas party vibes (do with this information what you will). With the ticket purchase you got a welcome drink and it was only 2 options and then a mocktail. The drink wasn‚Äôt very good and I wish they just let you pick whatever drink you wanted on the menu since they were all around the same price anyways. They had such cute cups for the other drinks as well. They only give you 90 min time slots so make sure you get there on time because they are strict about the times. We were there for about 40 minutes before any server came up to even check in on us and see if we wanted another drink & this was on a Sunday night so it wasn‚Äôt even that busy. The seating is first come first serve. Overall if you‚Äôre going to be getting a few rounds it‚Äôs a good spot for it they have few games around and the tables were good for conversations. Parking wasn‚Äôt the best either it‚Äôs in the same lot as the golden steer so it was tight and small and packed so just be mindful of that!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAHyBuSlNYBIwVon39SLcbU&fid=0x0:0x1d3656179fbf6001"],"When":"2025-12-13"},{"Name":"Christopher D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlpBHtcYCHcaBJW5V5wxUulLX5Acmp29PEVjqx2ARiJmoBVo9I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went during the Christmas pop-up event. Very nice decorations, fun themed cocktails, and attentive service. Good photo ops for the Instagram people.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC85ifURzWFtXyuzlJ6oyHL&fid=0x0:0x1d3656179fbf6001"],"When":"2025-11-20"},{"Name":"Daniel Maros","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWT2J789w6Wl2msroBod6rsq_ZrmlRN8k2eoTxVaPyoFgF3_UzW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really enjoyable classy cocktails.  I enjoyed all the ones I had immensely.  Went super early in the morning so not sure how busy or loud it gets and didn‚Äôt have any of the food but for a 24h bar all the drinks were solid.  Thanks!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhASqPTrwMFGWI9a2kigsTpV&fid=0x0:0x1d3656179fbf6001"],"When":"2026-1-1"},{"Name":"Jean Peragine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpgyyD7jU5tCoiC6wTGYwrg9FEZ22SBFLX8_eAaESqcVDiOO-RcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"A group of us attended the Holly Jolly Bar. It was SO not worth the cover charge. When it was our 90-min time slot (yes you only get 90 mins), we went in and it was still packed with people from the prior time slot so no seating was available. The space is too small for that amount of people. The parking is impossible, too. You get one drink included with the ticket fee, but you only get to select from 2 alcoholic beverages and one mocktail. I got the Rockin' Around and it was AWFUL. Some ladies in our group gave it back because it was so bad. Because of that, they missed out on their free drink. It's best to avoid this place. There are plenty of other bars that decorate for Christmas that don't have a cover charge, have decent amount of seating and parking, and have more employees working that space. There was only one bartender and one server for that area. It was also so loud that we struggled to hear each other. We left and went to a better bar. Lesson learned.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ambs O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJiWZPpdC9N-ciNU_HFvbku2WfzMmOzbwj3lJ9sCffCwVJ4U4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little bar that I discovered because my hotel is lame and there‚Äôs NO BAR after like 10pm!  Stephanie was phenomenal and makes a great old fashioned.  Worth the visit!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brenda Gallagher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUm_7BIOMFiN3bU_hXs605EmKT3yiPOG6V2_PMRxRpiXpKytHmcVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow !!! My friends and I came in to inquire about the new restaurant SLANGING TACOS & were immediately greeted by CHASITY & she made you feel like Royalty!! The waitress HAVEN was sooo sweet & the food was delicious!! You need to come here!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Melton Potts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8g9THeN8BtLM7EyDsn4YI6ev3u9WRU0DEfK1sXGoW2miBEhKXPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pre launch opportunity 10/12/25. - Holiday themed. Great Service with a smile. Creative, Interesting takes on drinks.

Great opportunity to hang out after an evening at Golden Steer next door also","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dalia Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLotwNOs2G0JU6fjU5Yk0Ft-B9_7XQcgmXtPXr4QJow-SK7sQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Honestly, one of the worst experiences from the moment we arrived. Just for asking simple questions, the girl at the entrance was extremely rude and unprofessional. Even though we had already paid for our tickets, they wouldn‚Äôt let us in, and her only ‚Äúsolution‚Äù was to tell us to email for a refund, without even trying to help or resolve anything.

She also said that because of the ‚Äúhigh demand,‚Äù they were going to kick us out exactly at the scheduled time, even though we were being denied entry from the start. The attitude was terrible and the customer service was even worse.
Definitely would not come back and I do not recommend this place at all.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Juan Cardenas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnDgTx-hzaa5UToAsZJYdxk13DYjvGuvdJE94BY97SH8EOs-hz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It could be the best bar in town. Easy, if not for its location, not that it‚Äôs bad, there‚Äôs just not much around. That being said it‚Äôs easy to reach from anywhere.
Once there, this is pure fun. Live music. Fun crowd. No one here cares about you, you come and enjoy, mind your business; although it‚Äôs very common to find cool interesting Vegas people here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAfZGEB_SezbtvigsxHr2Bj&fid=0x0:0xadab283cff7d85eb"],"When":"2026-1-5"},{"Name":"Mike MacLeod","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUJg_m3CbqZQDmVtdzTk45lmC0FP3NLbdTGvbai2mTPIDA67r-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cool little dive bar. Fantastic happy hour deals. Staff was friendly. Chill crowd. Close to the airport so we checked it out before leaving Vegas. Will definitely return next time I'm in LV.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAW5-0Yvc-0d5GV6L0Fcwpz&fid=0x0:0xadab283cff7d85eb"],"When":"2026-1-25"},{"Name":"Donna Marie Abril","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtL1Oigpe38Qv2oIeklcsQh5bvCa5JUeaLe2QIVA_OBeu2mrW1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Listen. This place may be off putting to some, it‚Äôs a good place with really great service. They‚Äôve got an awesome happy hour. The bathrooms are clean. They play a jukebox box full of music. We were there early in the day so I can speak of all hours but it was a good chill experience. A bit grunge and dark but if that‚Äôs your vibe it‚Äôs up your alley. Overall, I‚Äôd go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCgweO4Eg&fid=0x0:0xadab283cff7d85eb"],"When":"2025-2-17"},{"Name":"Becks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrveh8qJjdEB_6fyqU8Ful9MbFkGVPIBTvDPHSIGu5vJB-XEqHLg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great atmosphere, friendly staff, good music, entertainment and clientele! We‚Äôve been to New York one also but I absolutely loved the Vegas vibes! Shout to the lovely lady making balloon animals and hats, topping on the cake for a great night.
There was also an awesome food truck around the corner for some midnight snacking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDwopeb3gE&fid=0x0:0xadab283cff7d85eb"],"When":"2025-3-24"},{"Name":"Kate W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_bGdCQmPYF25fIbaGAqhJubbZbRb9XmLbiHrp-aKixu_mGqP4xA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always nice to find a local dive bar when I'm on the road and away from home, that reminds me of home. Friendly and chill crowd and great service. The live music was awesome. A great alternative to the strip if that's not your scene.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Crave Corner By Mike","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXuqav1sxNmvbY7j8Y6_srVRjGT3u2h-lSG339hlDtxYMko80=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been coming to this small bar for over 20 years, and it never disappoints. The atmosphere has that same welcoming vibe, and it's always a great spot to kick off the night. If you're looking to get the party started, definitely try the "Ass Juice"‚Äîit's a classic! This place may be small, but it‚Äôs packed with personality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICXqPvx6QE&fid=0x0:0xadab283cff7d85eb"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Emilio Reyes Le Blanc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMZnJRAJLJWJELEukLAkQ9XMLda6O1YQuZFl3gnKVME4cIxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"High-quality dive bar. I enjoyed the house ‚Äúass juice‚Äù for $4. It was much sweeter than I imagined it would be.

Really friendly vibe. Great bartenders. Free music most nights. I can‚Äôt think of a single flaw, except that it doesn‚Äôt exist in SF or LA.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDxjpSMUQ&fid=0x0:0xadab283cff7d85eb"],"When":"2023-6-8"},{"Name":"Shelly Lyn Marshall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuPo0YjIU4Y3FC_ZS8J77t1tyinY0b7azZvQ1N_xSY3clxzRI92w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Double Down is interesting!
I would probably never go again if I saw the place with all the lights on. Anyway, I went to support a couple of people I know in the bass performance last night.
I only gave one star for food because I wanted to say n/a, since there was none.  Great place for old-school dive bar atmosphere! Great music.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDPmOrnvQE&fid=0x0:0xadab283cff7d85eb"],"When":"2024-11-28"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXs3-OB3Y-fefZMl7reaikSQBtNWo58-93IIsDPUc00kwYVDwqUww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Not really my style, unfortunately. This felt like a low-cost family restaurant-style steakhouse - quantity over quality kind of place.
Maybe it works if you have a large appetite and just want a lot of food? But for me, it wasn‚Äôt comfortable at all.
The restaurant also wasn‚Äôt very clean, which was disappointing. üòï
I won‚Äôt be returning. Might work for others, but just not what I was looking for.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBKrVDareVUqbvJ0OZOpApq&fid=0x0:0xdc15ac48d6e1dd96"],"When":"2026-2-7"},{"Name":"Miranda Fraunfelter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgBdN9w8f4Ecz_NIVuwTCbWuCZbd7klIZqdOff2TW43UECPteXig=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This may be one of Vegas best kept secrets. The restaurant is in Ellis Island casino. You receive coupons for their restaurants with game play. The ribs were fall off the bone and the sauce was really good. The steak was cooked to order and very good. All of the sides were very good as well but no way we could finish it all. Two great tasting enormous meals in Vegas for under $30 is a win! It is a block off of the strip, close to the Sphere, and open 24/7 for a good meal before or after a show.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB1c82VNCaGlUY9XN_JI_Oo&fid=0x0:0xdc15ac48d6e1dd96"],"When":"2025-12-23"},{"Name":"Nicole Manno","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGqRdabVQyp-t4GewFKiSJh8Zaoe4WHX3NS866ZthqtY9t0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best breakfast deal in vegas! Steak and eggs breakfast for less than $14. Steak is tender and the potatoes don‚Äôt look appealing but they taste great!! I was more than satisfied with the breakfast a the price. Although I don‚Äôt recommend the pancake ( it was kind of spongy and chewy) everything else was great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCvwZ77_wKeOgD0x92pHk9C&fid=0x0:0xdc15ac48d6e1dd96"],"When":"2026-1-27"},{"Name":"Todd P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUr1v6nPXocH0BUrQLcYdusjhpr4U6q-bWTBSFM2ecOCaabByzI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had a Las Vegas Advisor coupon for this restaurant. And we had always wanted to visit Ellis Island. The restaurant itself is pretty old-school. Not fancy at all, but reminiscent of an earlier era.

We had lunch here and ordered the Lumberjack burger and the fish and chips.  We also split one of their homemade root beers. The portions were extremely large and very very good. Especially the fish.  Our server told us that they bring in whole fish and fillet them on site. They were piping hot and crispy on the outside and flaky on the inside. The burger was also huge. We didn‚Äôt really care for the steak fries, though. The root beer was excellent. We recommend giving the pub a try if you are in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCGP4OB8tkdLVIT4AE-cG_C&fid=0x0:0xdc15ac48d6e1dd96"],"When":"2025-11-5"},{"Name":"Robert Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIVxEWmHG0y-p5675lMWL4xVWvs6FndFIN7J3m3JlOn9C90LQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is not fine dining.   But, it's good and reasonably priced diner food.  And you'll get a small discount, if you get a players card and gamble alittle bit in their casino.  There are times that you just want basic diner food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBImuRgQvuj0GveEg4DPgku&fid=0x0:0xdc15ac48d6e1dd96"],"When":"2025-12-17"},{"Name":"Henry WinePro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtOBOpXltKZpLwL21tX7OoR-QOOFXcA-rOBnJH3HnQ2-OH9E5dqw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I want to express my sincere gratitude, first and foremost, to Priscilla, the charming hostess. Her exceptional service, professional demeanor, and genuine care made both of my visits truly special, and I look forward to returning largely because of her outstanding hospitality, as well as the food, of course. Her attentiveness, combined with the restaurant's commitment to quality, consistently transformed our meals into memorable experiences. I would also like to thank the kitchen staff for consistently preparing delicious meals. The excellence in food preparation, combined with the energetic and inviting ambiance, makes this restaurant a place I want to visit again, which reinforces the positive impression created by the front-of-house team. Last but not least, I would like to thank Yen for making me feel so welcome and at home during my initial visit, as well as for her efficiency, care, and delightful service. I would also like to thank Andrew for his excellent service during my second visit.

The only minor issue was that the French Onion Soup was a bit overdone on top when it was served to me; however, given the overall positive experience, I chose not to complain about it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAZ3Pu7Usn8rFIgNZc3w6P5&fid=0x0:0xdc15ac48d6e1dd96"],"When":"2025-7-23"},{"Name":"robert brenner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWs6Ha0rcHA1u3pZk0_0WbxxbUCaCiH6Qx6aq7JDsHAU_wmJK1x=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It has been almost 15 years since we went to Ellis Island- back when the T-Bone and the beer was 9.99 and the craps table was a small tub. It‚Äôs still the same great place! We had the special, now $14.99! We had soup or salad to start and I got the clam chowder- fantastic! Then the sirloin, green beans and baked potato. I thought for sure the sirloin was going to be tough but it was tender and delicious. It was 12 ounces and so good. I was really impressed! We then played craps for $5 minimum and had a blast. What a great place to watch F1 too. For $100 you watch on the platform and get unlimited food and beer. Now that‚Äôs what I‚Äôm talking about. Still love Ellis Island. More great memories to share.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBZ5Qi9fOZ5qKUfS5-MqY2U&fid=0x0:0xdc15ac48d6e1dd96"],"When":"2025-11-22"},{"Name":"Billie Perrone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW70MZ82N9sBfYgr8wYiAd-gZfMjmkBPME4rFhPdQTaz6zrxnPU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We both got medium king cut prime rib for $34.99 with potato, garlic green beans &salad. Got buy one get one free with players card & LV Advisor coupon. If you're a local, or visit a lot in a year, that coupon book is gold. $50 per year. Our server Ayanna was kind and friendly. Food came quick. Great food & service! Thanks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCEiV8QNMzD--y8aBXp9uqX&fid=0x0:0xdc15ac48d6e1dd96"],"When":"2025-11-29"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Christopher Knebel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOfqfMoPYqoLNGPbGIR_QSnQ8OT5WKI1wJQfe43K-9TU3BdLY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The first thing I noticed is it‚Äôs darker than I expected. It‚Äôs got kind of a steakhouse vibe with the leather and the low light, but it‚Äôs made hip by the music and the creative lights. I meant to go for the social hour specials, but I accidentally made my reservation for a table, not the bar - my mistake. As a solo diner, I got seated at a 2 person table in The Vault (apparently all their rooms are named and themed, this one features an expensive looking piece of jewelery, but who cares). The next thing I noticed is that the staff is very nice and the appropriate level of attentive, not overbearing.

I ordered the Zinfandel, grilled cheese dumplings, and Brussels. I had ordered the focaccia bites too, but my waiter expressed caution of having too much food so I cut that one out. The wine was fine, but I loved the giant glass. I had heard about the dumplings for years, and they were still better than I expected. Smoky, rich, cozy, balanced. That‚Äôs a 10/10. I probably looked like a fool licking every last bit of tomato soup out of those awkwardly sized spoons. I know they‚Äôre meant to share, but I‚Äôd get one order per person. The Brussels were what I expect from a nice restaurant, maybe my one complaint is they were too large so they were hard to tackle in one mouthful. I thought the peppers they came with added little, but the sauce was good. I ate about half the Brussels because I wanted room for dessert - my waiter was right, that‚Äôs a lot of food.

For dessert, the donuts. They are messy and hard to eat but mmmmmmmmmm.

The bill was $81 before tip. For Vegas, I‚Äôm really happy with that. In an out just over an hour. As a solo traveler I‚Äôm happy with that too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA3NN0fLpLQoy3tVJ57fejf&fid=0x0:0x4a29b9c11c0c00b6"],"When":"2026-1-9"},{"Name":"Megan Yem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVI_Rw4vquMUpA_ny4I2axvvv2eX2W37T57ruV6LZozMFx-1Vf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had absolutely wonderful service! Our waitress was Irene and she was top notch. Then we had our 2 bus boys, Ali G and Moya (spelling??), they were wonderful! Our table was cleared continuously and they were also super friendly. But the food was amazing! From the apps to the dessert, everything was delicious! My favorite things were the app shrimp, the beef Wellington and the butterscotch dessert. I could marry the butterscotch dessert and live happily ever after! I would highly recommend!
We had a group of 11 with reservations. We walked up, stated our name and we were seated right away.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDHC2ae0jsxpjAfjWymL5L3&fid=0x0:0x4a29b9c11c0c00b6"],"When":"2025-11-7"},{"Name":"Makinna Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3CxhcXTRfac377cIeZpp5OuYG6Yfvnda-rdKq0uImMbGY7AA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing. The little store front leading into a speakeasy vibe is great. Be prepared for tapas rather than a normal played individual meal. The tomato soup and grilled cheese dumpling is to die for. The overall favorite of what my group ordered. Runner up in my opinion was the street corn ravioli. Besides tapas we did get a 10 oz filet to share and the meat sliced like butter. The only thing we didn‚Äôt like was the lobster roll. We probably had 7-8 different things but the lobster roll just wasn‚Äôt it. Besides that, a great experience. Would love to return. They did ask about dietary restrictions or allergies. Not an issue for us but definitely not heard often so kudos to them!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDxoTMryFD3BjT2PU1TLUEC&fid=0x0:0x4a29b9c11c0c00b6"],"When":"2025-11-4"},{"Name":"Francky B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJrpT1OkBcOhpt_7xwP7wdPoMjVX3CvWFIB5HodOG5BIToj0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything was beautiful and amazing. The service from Jeffrey was like I've never seen before. This guy is a legend and truly made our night. We had a dinner later on and just wanted to have a few quick appies and a couple of drinks but nobody asked us if we wanted the happy hour or a table, and they sat us directly inside the restaurant. A bit disappointed but the decor, food, vibe and service was so on top that we completely felt in love with that place. Highly recommended for a fine dining experience. Be aware that the place is dark, no windows, no view on the outside (we've been told otherwise and also got disappointment on that). Great experience overall.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCh14bdhl07tKHWyD0fKR-R&fid=0x0:0x4a29b9c11c0c00b6"],"When":"2026-2-3"},{"Name":"Fong Yong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_ObQ_NkWjFnxnIELNpnMW2bomU8e4Uww7MojTR3r-dkod=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I finally got to try Beauty & Essex, and honestly, it lived up to all the hype. From the moment you walk in through the hidden entrance, the whole experience feels special‚Äîmoody, stylish, and buzzing without being overwhelming. It‚Äôs the kind of place that instantly makes you feel like you‚Äôre in for a great night.

The food, though, is the real star. I ordered the beef Wellington, and wow‚Äîeasily one of the best I‚Äôve had, and probably the best in town. Perfectly cooked beef, buttery pastry, rich flavours, and beautifully balanced. You can tell real care and skill go into every dish that comes out of the kitchen.

Everything we tried was packed with flavour and beautifully presented. The menu is creative without being pretentious, and the portions are just right‚Äîyou leave satisfied but not uncomfortable. Cocktails were on point too, both in taste and presentation.

Service was warm, attentive, and professional without feeling forced. The staff genuinely want you to have a great experience.

If you‚Äôre looking for amazing food, a fun atmosphere, and a memorable night out, Beauty & Essex absolutely delivers. I‚Äôll definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBsGbJtu-ReH2ONcjjZH3mV&fid=0x0:0x4a29b9c11c0c00b6"],"When":"2026-1-18"},{"Name":"William illingworth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrGRScMj4nd34J-v43pTl1CfQx6Vxd2ra5UTA4cFAkBpohBh7E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If I could give this venue 10 stars I would !!! This was the most incredible experience and I don't think I have the words to describe it but I will try. You get to the restaurant and as you walk in you are in a pawn shop where you can buy all of the the goods on display but you are escorted through a book case into and amazing restaurant to be met and seated at one of the beautiful tables. They were playing great music and the ambience was amazing. The food was the best I have ever eaten and I don't want to go into it too much as you need to experience this at least once in your life.
The cheese dumplings are a must !!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBi18ZOU75HSlXDHG24tyq5&fid=0x0:0x4a29b9c11c0c00b6"],"When":"2025-11-20"},{"Name":"Shelby Cormane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgZN6p2hWuXQEFTL_cGib605075-jxF3JJAhzZ5AtZoV0qhd7N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't wait to come back next time we are in Vegas!

We booked a table for 2 for dinner before we went to see O by Cirque Du Soleil. This was an amazing choice and set the tone for an even better evening. I can't stop thinking about the food we had, especially the pasta dish.

The waitress we had was extremely friendly, welcoming and knowledgeable. She gave great recommendations that we enjoyed and also let us know that everything served is shareable.

My boyfriends birthday was the next day so when I made reservations it asked me if we were dining for a special occasion, which I indicated. B+E had a card in an envelope on the table when we were seated to wish him a Happy Birthday and also included a complimentary dessert.

The atmosphere was dark, moody yet romantic and the music added a modern and fun twist to the night (mix of classic pop, hip-hop hits). You enter the restaurant through a pawn shop located in the Cosmopolitan.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBveFQkctIPhri-rCgnreb0&fid=0x0:0x4a29b9c11c0c00b6"],"When":"2025-10-3"},{"Name":"Max","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2ZNO1Y9cvx-mJm-9akUWCfKRxXCLYoMtKP6fkpPYm-EEpnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had dinner here on Thursday evening and were greeted by our server, Jeffrey. From the moment we sat down, he set the tone for an incredible evening‚Äîhigh energy, charismatic, and extremely knowledgeable about the menu. Every recommendation he made turned out to be spot on.

We ordered the tomato dumplings, French dippers, tomahawk steak, tuna poke tacos, and beef Wellington‚Äîeach dish was absolutely fantastic and beautifully prepared. The drinks menu is equally impressive; I had the Green Envy, which was so refreshing and perfectly balanced with a touch of celery salt.

This restaurant is a must-visit. The food, drinks, and atmosphere are all top-notch, but what really made our evening was Jeffrey‚Äôs outstanding service. If you‚Äôre lucky enough to have him as your server, you‚Äôre in excellent hands. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC0RW3KiDt2MjuzW0OCzcMz&fid=0x0:0x4a29b9c11c0c00b6"],"When":"2025-9-25"}]

column32: [{"Name":"Melissa Woodforlk-Whyte","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW73wu6ww9bagxIXqAG90ZfXGcDUlnZO2nXN-fG7BGxlYBeX2U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time here. The location is great. The customer service was outstanding. We went here post our 10 year wedding anniversary vow renewal. The drinks are pricey but good. I highly recommend this location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICthbjq6gE\u0026fid=0x0:0xd33ca6c53a9c92c2"],"When":"2024-1-31"},{"Name":"Bryan Murphy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUo5oycwer6J3OJjdWnnz1wsNY5tOtTM48D-J9dLkaulDZOpPFT9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great location! Even better product! 50‚Äôs Branson Cognac is incredible. Each level offers its own delights and purpose; with the XO being by far the best I‚Äôve ever had. The attendant was engaging, knowledgeable about the products, and has created a huge fan of Branson. It was honestly the highlight of my day.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tim Cronkhite","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWwebmHbiAf0EYlmHRe1FB9ihIhGZOzxOFrwYPFp-BpwlF3rmP_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cool Bar and great drinks and if your like me from the NW its blue moon beer. Loved this bar and staff. It was really cool and the seats are so comfy. I will be sure to come here and take a break","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDU5KeqFQ\u0026fid=0x0:0xd33ca6c53a9c92c2"],"When":"2019-8-15"},{"Name":"Keith Kupp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKSLxp5MF6A8ZVf4EiTQlkydUD0_aPe1M6udHrk35KqEUUbOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I purchased four beers for $56 and asked for a tap water and they refused to give it to me. The old grumpy looking bar tender said ‚Äúa show is just ending we don‚Äôt want to give waters out all night. You can buy a bottle for $4‚Äù. This was on 10/5 at 11:15 pm. Worst service ever. If I could take back my tip I would.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James Parker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaf_9pU9PLX2DH4KBTe-3nD7SKcJCfL3q-K79MCBmNcf5sMu_IVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"No prices anywhere and was surprised with a $13 charge for blue moon drafts.  I recommend avoiding and walking 1-200 feet down the Miracle Mile Shops - you can find the same draft for $3-5. Bar atmosphere was okay, but not inviting. Bartender was nice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shawn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtwihtkG2AXRDpIJlIQiU-qUmbvg7kvgnwD7IIaTg2X40OA6JJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"20 bucks for a tall draft . Same beer much cheaper, pretty much anywhere else on the strip . If you're going to sit at the bar and play slots better off walking 100ft ahead into the casino and get blue moon for free","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marv Layton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1rtuq3ABeRXb_rLqCvJb24pQKdthMJ7xxsQKBJw8KggUQTmgz=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was great being at planet Hollywood. One of the best parts was going to the Blue Moon Bar just out side of the  Casino  On  miracle mile  Relaxing.. The staff are very friendly and engaging. Making you feel welcome. So a big thank you to Eric, Ramy, and Richelle. You guys are great. The flight back to England was great. Thank you for you service. See you next time... Marv and Karen","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Candy Fortner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTC1ebiCoX5kr8WNpHxgby3GRVSgcN2gytHL0OYa-4h-pwVA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What fun we had watching the Kentucky Derby from this circular bar at the entrance to planet Hollywood casino. Great bartender, wonderful waitresses, delicious Margarita, that's right, they were out of meant, no juleps, but that didn't stop me from giving them 5 stars. I will be back","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Chef Robert Olivares","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdE9lxEC2dMuzFQeyPfMZ_6BpFOg2BDrkZHb-_O-NhwJyvKysoSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Let me take this one at a time. I finally made it to one of Guy‚Äôs spots. The first thing I think of is meeting him at Stagecoach a few years ago and the first thing he did was make me something to eat. We went today for the all you can eat Brunch.
Motley Que Chilaquiles : Tortilla Chips tossed with salsa roja, fire roasted Jalape√±os, crumbled cotija cheese, pulled pork, avocado and a sunny side up egg. I enjoyed these. They had a good flavor and the chips weren‚Äôt all soggy which I appreciated.
Guys Mac and Cheese: macaroni pasta, four cheese sauce SMC (Super Melty Cheese) topped with crispy onion straws. The mac and cheese is a smaller size which was appreciated since there was so much I wanted to try. Add some jalape√±os and thank me later.
Big Bite Breakfast Burrito: scrambled eggs, cheese, bacon, wrapped in a cheese quesadilla with pico de gallo, salsa roja and country potatoes. This wasn‚Äôt worth the upgrade. The burrito was just okay and the salsa didn't have any heat to it at all.
Motley que pulled pork slider : pulled pork smothered in guys bourbon brown sugar bbq sauce, stacked with citrus slaw, pickle chips, aged cheddar cheese plus donkey sauce on a pretzel bun. Now this was good however the sandwich was overshadowed by the fries that came with it. They were absolutely perfect.
Guys Peanut butter bacon + banana waffle : Belgium waffles, stacked with candied bacon, sliced bananas, creamy peanut butter + bacon maple syrup. I LOVED THIS! This was amazing on so many levels.
Southern Style Biscuits and gravy : Buttermilk biscuit, country style gravy topped with bacon crumbles. The gravy had a good flavor and I loved the jalape√±os. I wish the biscuit was cut in half and that the gravy was layered to help it absorb more of the gravy.
Now our server was incredibly friendly and was never far when we needed her. Great service is alive and well here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAONqySvoY-6pPN4vlyIaSy&fid=0x0:0x8a95e0f4fb378950"],"When":"2025-12-10"},{"Name":"Chad Grimley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKQ9jYmNlpFc3bLPxNFFd2LZn6znccFxftYX95nd_NonKdMpbEZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was everything we wanted it to be!!!!!  The food was perfect, atmosphere unique and welcoming and service (provided by Alec) friendly and helpful. We went halfsies with the Kobe burger and pulled pork. Both great!  FYI the pulled pork you will need a fork. Everything down to the 3 different fries in the basket showed the love of food and bold flavors you would expect if you have been watching any of Guy‚Äôs shows over the last several years.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD9cdNafL2gOr-ESUNS2ZmP&fid=0x0:0x8a95e0f4fb378950"],"When":"2026-1-11"},{"Name":"Freddy Lopez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFgILq9V6xo1gnMp2EH4xmWL_M1MXl9GLpgrHiP_EoMWez-uN7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Over hyped, poor service, and food was not worth the wait. We had a reservations & the schedule may have been packed but the restaurant was not due to pending reservation and staff was more than sufficient. We had a reservation and when we were seated we waited 15 minutes for staff to even acknowledge us and bring water. When water arrived we were served in to-go cups, when everyone most around us had glass, are you kidding me a restaurant in Vegas doesn't have enough glasses to serve every table. After waiting 15 minutes for water we waited another 15 minutes to order food (30 minutes into our reservation),  we finally are able to order and its another 48 minutes for our food to arrive ( 1 hour & 18 minutes into our reservation). Now if the food was worth the wait I might get it, but it definitely was not they break up what is an equivalent to a Dennys Grand Slam into 2 plate so its considered 2 order (seems like a tactic to minimize the all you all can eat). We added bottomless Mimosa and we had to track the waitess down every time or it would be pay for bottomless but get 1 drink for the price of bottomless (seemed like another tacticto minimize bottomless drinks).  The final straw was I ordered what I considered my 2nd request (biscuits & gray) but Guy Fieri's all you can eat restaurant counts as 3rd because they break up french toast (which literally is 1 piece cut into 2 and eggs, 1 sausage, 1 bacon and potatoes into 2 the equivalent to a grand slam)  I waited another 24 minutes and when I finally received my request it was cold! At this point I asked for a manager to advise of my dissatisfaction and the manager did not have the decency to come and hear my concerns to hear what they could do to ensure this doesn‚Äôt happen to any other customers. Instead the manager just gave us 25% discount to go away. This was what my wifey and I decided to try for brunch on our anniversary due to all they hype for brunch & it was a failure. This is my 2nd negative experience at a Guy Fieri restaurant seems to be a pattern overhyped, cheap food, and extremely poor service. We tried to give Guy Fieri's a 2nd chance, after all its Vegas it has to be better right? Two Thumbs down for a 2nd time on Guy Fieri's restaurants the one in Arizona sucks & the one in Vegas sucks! High recommended you dont waste your money or time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCPA-m-fwBrxRG6gMHLGFLA&fid=0x0:0x8a95e0f4fb378950"],"When":"2026-1-4"},{"Name":"Daniel Mula","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLs50MPDid-ulB3KrxUv54Yu4m2hpYcczcmMG44r8Hy6CjDUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We sat at the bar for brunch and ordered from the all you can eat brunch menu and bottomless drinks. üçπ woohoo what fun. Out bartender was excellent and paying attention to our food and drink needs and wants","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDDkIDAs_gH7EcYkPpNTEN0&fid=0x0:0x8a95e0f4fb378950"],"When":"2026-2-1"},{"Name":"Sachith Munasinghe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrU9omPq5r9T13QwA8NUAAyMNdAHtkfhFGPz9o6OmfbCnb6pQv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Checked out this place for dinner with my wife. The restaurant was not crowded, and there was no wait time, which was a plus. The host at the front desk was friendly; however, beyond that initial interaction, the overall service was disappointing.

We ordered the award-winning mac and cheese burger and the pulled pork burger. The pulled pork burger was decent and deserves a 4/5. Unfortunately, the mac and cheese burger did not live up to expectations and was closer to a 3/5.

Service issues significantly affected our experience. Cutlery was not provided with the food, and we had to ask for it. To make matters worse, the food was served on a steel tray that was uneven, making it difficult to eat without constantly adjusting the tray. This gave the impression that attention to customer comfort and detail is lacking.

Considering that prices are on the higher side, the overall experience did not justify the cost. I would not recommend this place based on our visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA6qytD-5od6hywHtZbc-jh&fid=0x0:0x8a95e0f4fb378950"],"When":"2026-1-26"},{"Name":"Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ4nyNsJL4t0Js7XqRMLaQRLuu0EAVSNExZAo9WsYTmCoci5w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in here while exploring Vegas. Great food with a nice atmosphere. Everything we had was good, would visit again.
Staff was fast, friendly.
Very happy with the experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCpI-K-RZJgwxbd8jPp4kYm&fid=0x0:0x8a95e0f4fb378950"],"When":"2026-1-28"},{"Name":"Rigo Santana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEZNt6W-OUV5jjOv1T535I4bLKU3WpnxG8C5MrStwE8DX3U7s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dinner was great! The food was full of flavor and the pasta hit the spot. The only super bummer was they ran out of Pepsi and tried giving us Sprite instead ‚Äî but the soda was flat. Other than that, everything else was on point and the vibe was great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBSxIWNOMnqtXoTn1gDfUzU&fid=0x0:0x8a95e0f4fb378950"],"When":"2025-11-5"},{"Name":"Raha Mehrkish","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPamkweyQHUUCaqKMZaAis8uR9V53UyCLpLu5Yc5wEduBuOji4uQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After our long drive from Salt Lake City, my family and I were starving and looking for somewhere good to eat. Someone recommended Guy Fieri‚Äôs Vegas Kitchen & Bar, and we will forever be grateful for this recommendation. It REALLY hit the spot. I ordered the bacon mac ‚Äòn‚Äô cheese burger which was absolutely incredible. No wonder it‚Äôs an award-winning burger. My mom and aunt shared the holy guacamole burger, which they were very impressed with. They said they have never had anything like it. The fries were super tasty as well. Our server was a true gentleman and gave me a years-worth of ketchup when I asked for some to go. This was a fantastic first meal in Vegas and we highly recommend it for anyone who is starving and ready to devour some delicious food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC-dSv89EtgCn6MgIM6BTUf&fid=0x0:0x8a95e0f4fb378950"],"When":"2025-8-12"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Izzy G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAVrePujW3rCHGJI2sR7Xp857IntYAKWFerfLJnd21K6Ws19VI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ayu Dayclub is conveniently located within Resorts World, which made it an easy choice since I was already staying at the hotel. I came to see Kaskade, and for a headliner DJ, the ticket prices were actually pretty reasonable.

That said, the drink prices were wild ‚Äî $30 for a standard drink and $70 for a specialty drink that came with a reusable cup felt excessive.

The venue itself isn‚Äôt massive, but that actually added to the experience. It‚Äôs more intimate, which made the vibe really fun and energetic.

Despite the steep drink prices, I had an amazing time! Every staff member I interacted with was friendly and kind. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAR1_S7JV6VawE4z4LNu6L4&fid=0x0:0x407d565c7e55d019"],"When":"2025-6-29"},{"Name":"Santiago","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhQN-SRFW7VY4IXCZ6Gb49mlkYQx0xdKkVp5Ez-u6LeN3Bm_8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Main DJ Set never showed up, not the gretest prepared house set for a zamna ticket‚Ä¶ almost none shade","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD6lWjHpaB1JNeh2nBTl3zj&fid=0x0:0x407d565c7e55d019"],"When":"2025-10-15"},{"Name":"Toshiro Tsuha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL2Hv_y0qhodsAtI86Y80Ni8HakJKEZY2x8qS2YHUEN22ppErgK=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Had to leave a review because the male bartender at Ayu Dayclub around 2pm on June 27 was straight-up rude. When we first got to the bar, the female bartender was super sweet and welcoming. No complaints there. But when we came back for a second drink and she was busy, we got stuck with the guy working next to her.

He acted like we were bothering him just for ordering. Didn't make eye contact, didn't say a word, and only made half our order. When we asked for the rest, he gave us attitude. Then he literally threw the card reader at me to pay, and when I asked how much it was (since it didn't show on the screen), he got frustrated and stamped a big red "GRATUITY INCLUDED" on the receipt instead of just answering.

I found out later he's apparently the lead bartender. Wild, because the same girl from earlier actually wanted to help us when we spilled the drink, but he stepped in and said no. Bro's on a power trip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAWtrw4AaHkai5M8z0YQA5a&fid=0x0:0x407d565c7e55d019"],"When":"2025-6-27"},{"Name":"Christian Pokrywka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjYhLp9NPJsfutNJ6fuqI7dnOhvgwsxUS4sktRI-6MeV_Qqhrg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went a couple weeks back to check out Zedd during the day. WOW what an amazing time! One of the coolest experiences of my life. Drinks pretty outrageously priced but I expected that. Other than that, amazing stage and sound. Was packed but not too uncomfortable. Water the perfect temperature for a 110 degree day! Sucks it looks like they don‚Äôt allow night time swimming. Definitely check a day time show here if you can! Epic pool party with lots of chill folks from all over the globe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDqj5jbJA&fid=0x0:0x407d565c7e55d019"],"When":"2021-7-18"},{"Name":"John Karg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzlQEa04GFd6RCF9L4Ua3s8BBAN4JBuPp8kZ1WIqzYTk1n6g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty nice venue for pool parties--if a promoter offers you free entrance here it's definitely worth going. The drink prices start at $14 however so I would recommend pregaming!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICj8IaOgAE&fid=0x0:0x407d565c7e55d019"],"When":"2024-4-17"},{"Name":"Cyndi Graham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzg_gzpTBiYJxxQQzRF1RfSL_nsUvXvZnn3vJF36P7x9YeI8qssw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It‚Äôs gross. I know they want you to get a cabana or a table but for the majority of us THERE IS NO WHERE TO PUT YOUR THINGS. Are you supposed to go in without shoes and a shirt? Or the required ID? Bartenders were all rude. They ran out of margaritas by 1. Asked for a cup of water with our cocktails and got a third of a cup of hot water.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDqj_i-Ew&fid=0x0:0x407d565c7e55d019"],"When":"2021-7-18"},{"Name":"Rodrigo ‚Äúfunning‚Äù","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjJOFsXUDGw-Zp39ummfTAL8ihJ_8cHhxZ9cdBAeMZ5pH8-XGhlg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I think it‚Äôs a good pool party.  It‚Äôs setup for more of an excellent experience for people who get a daybed/table. More of a 3.5 out of 5 spot to me.

For just general admission, just expect a day of standing or hopefully finding a pool spot that doesn‚Äôt block a table.  I‚Äôm basing these thoughts as an Encore Beach Club lover. I‚Äôd say this spot is right below an EBC & Wet Republic, still a great venue but the setup isn‚Äôt walking friendly either like EBC.

Also I ordered tickets to see Tiesto & they didn‚Äôt even announce that he cancelled last minute because of a birth of his baby. So we waited and only found out after someone saw that tiesto posted on his social media. We waited all that time to see him and paid premium prices for tickets & they didn‚Äôt deliver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDuw82owQE&fid=0x0:0x407d565c7e55d019"],"When":"2022-8-28"},{"Name":"Amelia Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVG1Xkpe1cpz__e4aq_SxnrYIhUT8Tz4-6muqwlFomqM2AU9s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Saw kaskade play, great atmosphere and bathrooms always kept clean. Pool area is small for sure but the water was warm","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDo3dzAxQE&fid=0x0:0x407d565c7e55d019"],"When":"2025-4-27"}]
