column32: [{"Name":"MTD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUMUbRywegtY0KlJpBK8nPwvHkI7xJVe3YkEjzpzbgXf44HQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Rideshare drivers- please avoid this establishment at all costs! Dropped off a passenger for a rideshare kickback. Parking near the cash stand was blocked by the club‚Äôs own limos, and when attempting to clarify where to park, the staff member responsible for issuing kickbacks who‚Äôs always rude(along with most of the male staff there) was dismissive. Clear lack of professionalism toward rideshare drivers who bring paying customers. Won‚Äôt be returning. Staff at Hustler \u0026 the Palomino Club are much friendlier to interact with.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"josh locy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKUvkHkF7CEcDKSpKHxC0vAaxoj1gATivXetm7x7qcpAAm3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nikki gave us the best Vegas experience! We‚Äôd never been to Vegas before and we will be back again to visit Sapphire Pool , just because of Nikkiüòú If you‚Äôre thinking about going to a pool party, go to Sapphire. You will not regret it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICx3L_QgQE\u0026fid=0x0:0x15186bcba47e7667"],"When":"2023-5-12"},{"Name":"Aliyah Forte","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIxN7blnIQ9NDgj6rYecLRhFuBEkOIODHzD6Dy8_o1UCT8tAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Trevor is the absolute best!! Coolest guy I‚Äôve ever met.. at a pool in Vegas haha 10/10 would recommend! Best AC guy I‚Äôve ever had!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCxc04jRh0bsCYYZlW6SN03\u0026fid=0x0:0x15186bcba47e7667"],"When":"2025-6-7"},{"Name":"Jordan Curran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJo9NElJGFVh3dQ5X3EmI6MN7oNQS69fy2VGQdl5aycuy_UaA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Outstanding pool party! We pre booked the pool beds however we were offered a very reasonable upgrade (cabana) when we arrived which was great!\nOur host Virginia was amazing. She looked after us from the moment we arrived right until we left and went above and beyond to ensure our group had a great time throughout the whole day. She's credit to your team! üëè\nOverall there was a great atmosphere, the pool and layout was excellent and the drinks and food were reasonably priced given in Vegas. This was our first time in Vegas and thanks to you guys for delivering a great experience at the pool party!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anthony Fernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmq-htmXECJ_KQmSXfwZ3BhmpyTIYrXdhIJInp2H_WTxHNqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A day to remember! Staff was super nice and friendly. The music was awesome! I went for my bachelor party and had a great time. The drink beverage credit came in clutch! I had a party of 7 and we didn't go over the drink credit and still got our buzz throughout the day. Beer pong was cool as well","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kelsee Taddeo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJEf-TMg_BERGDU2SYy7UPUvOKL3sxbUkp_1di3MrfSFW_aWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have been here multiple times and always have the best time! But today was especially awesome because of our cocktail server Virginia (I think we call her V though). The rain came and went making things a little hectic but she handled it like a champ and really took care of us! Love this place and can‚Äôt wait to go back and see V again :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kris P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6gtVfBkSecW1V_D9VYBcyVjpIia-AxsxrfjAt_PsFV7sblB52AQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The facilities were clean. Plenty of lockers. Servers are attentive. Good music. Crowd was older than most other day parties, I'm guessing cuz of the cost to get in. If you can spring it, i recommend getting a day bed or cabana in the vip section. Closer to the dj and has a separate bar for faster service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"david duman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKo-je3w5wRY7-t05AAQHM1IggdM8_YNnSKiRyihHBZUD5rDA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Greeted by a great driver at my hotel for pickup promptly at 2pm as i requested. 3 day beds for my friends and I as I reserved. Wait staff prompt, friendly and efficient!. Great music! Diverse menu of food and drinks! Nothing but great things to say! Best pool party in Las Vegas! Way to go guys!","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32: [{"Name":"osman harac","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1NDtO1xLwdgafuRZmGzy2fTNUkDWuKzLnN9ODTyrdpAwW1A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Last night at Mike's event was nothing short of spectacular! From the moment we arrived, we were swept into a whirlwind of exhilaration and glamour. The ambiance was electric, with vibrant lights setting the stage for an unforgettable evening.Our table was perfectly situated, offering a grand view of the lively dance floor and the DJ's mesmerizing set. The service was impeccable ‚Äì our glasses were never empty, and the staff were attentive without being intrusive, ensuring our night was seamless and enjoyable.What truly set the night apart was the energy and expertise of Mike. His knack for creating the perfect party atmosphere is unparalleled. Every detail, from the music selection to the crowd's vibe, was curated with finesse and an evident passion for nightlife.We danced, we laughed, and we made memories that will last a lifetime. It's clear that Mike is not just organizing events; he's crafting experiences. This isn't just a night out; it's an adventure into the heart of what makes nightlife thrilling.Thank you, Mike, for a spectacular evening. We can't wait to return and lose ourselves in the magic of your events once again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIClu6mLJA\u0026fid=0x0:0x89e98f7eda5f3c8"],"When":"2023-11-28"},{"Name":"Angelica Collazo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWf6X4kPbmks8YIuC4nMIehtf1CwHzfyIhZmvUxipYH27dmBJI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mike is an amazing guy who got us in so many nightclubs for free. column32:
[{"Name":"Glen Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcDP6cvmjhiVltb0N2u8kRHFVw5L4Y27waZeGAb6EkhRavHvpQKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"DISCLAIMER: I was here for an after-hours private event so it may not be indicative of the establishment during its normal operating hours.

The atmosphere and vibe was definitely there. The food, for the most part wad pretty good, but there were also some that was already cold and not great by the time it was brought out. Service was pretty good (but again this was a private event).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDI-Z2FQQ&fid=0x0:0x3af25cd08bddb09b"],"When":"2025-4-11"},{"Name":"Jennifer McClain CA-Long Beach","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdXYmwws1jigR7t8pLZYWopCdNCjcqpRJANP7P0Pl8qcHVR_iY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This business is a total SCAM! Was coming to Vegas for my coed engagement fun weekend and booked a Cabana for Sunday 9/14/2025 for 10 people on Tuesday evening 9/9/2025. By the next morning on 9/10/2025 I was informed of a death in the family and had to cancel. I immediately followed ALL steps to begin a refund of the $325 deposit I had put down on my credit card. I understood I was going to lose $25 of the $325 for the processing fee but nonetheless initiated the refund. Evidently Daylight uses a "third-party" to administer refunds. It gave me a notification that it could potentially take 5-7 BUSINESS DAYS to refund. I gave them the full 7 business days before I reached out inquiring about my refund. The third party administrator confirmed it saw my refund request but could do nothing because the establishment had NOT approved my refund request yet. I was told to reach out to Daylight Beach Club directly to find out why.

Here is where it got interesting...I was able to finally get a hold of someone after calling repeatedly. She claimed to manage these issues; her name was Dawn Fields. She said "they" would be in for meetings later in the week and she would follow up and get right back to me. SHE NEVER DID. Each time was a new excuse and a reason why she would call me back at a later time. Weeks went by and as the frustration grew I finally demanded to know who the hell "they" were and why this simple refund was taking this long. Glad it wasn't thousands of dollars here in limbo. Dawn giggled as if something was funny about me still missing my money the last time I spoke with her claiming she was on top of it and would have the issue resolved for me right away. She never did of course.

Ultimately I had to dispute the charge on my credit card (wish I would have just done that from the start) and the credit card company attempted to reach out to the establishment who, surprise surprise, NEVER acknowledged a major credit card company and the money was refunded back to me. Before doing this it had become a second job to follow up as to where my damn refund was at.

Complete and utter aggravation is an understatement. I should have read the reviews in advance because this place is a damn SHAM. I never even got to step foot in this place but this experience alone has ensured that I will never spend a dime here EVER. Daylight Beach Club DO BETTER! The fish rots from the head and it can't be all the people writing reviews of piss poor service who are the issue here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Wilkinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3SExOqa2WLlpSJm0m1ZAz890cI-Crt-aGviAdTEzJ4nMZPyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is a first for me. I have completed nearly 50 reviews. This is the first time I am scoring an establishment a 1. Though it saddens me to do it, unfortunately, it is richly deserved and represents my desire to send a clear message‚Ä¶

BUYER BEWARE

Let's start with the good. The Daylight Beach Club is located at the end of the Las Vegas strip across from the Mandalay Bay Convention Center and offers very easy access. The check-in process was efficient, and the security pat-down provided a sense of safety.

The pool area is large and spacious, and the DJ had the music blaring and the bass booming. It was a very nice vibe.

Unfortunately, the number of positives can't make up for the level of customer unfriendly policies, pure deception, and direct lying we experienced.

The day of our event, winds were extremely high, and pools across the city closed due to hazardous conditions. We asked to cancel our reservation. However, they let us know that cancellation was not possible based on their policies, despite the conditions.

FIRST NOTE TO SELF: Be weary of an organization that does NOT permit canceling due to inclement weather.

They did say they would allow us to change to another day. We were on vacation, had a scheduled itinerary, but opted to rearrange our schedule so as not to lose the money and the experience.

We had purchased a daybed that was relatively inexpensive ($50) but included a $250 minimum spend. This, of course, is a standard practice, so no problem with that. But here is where the wheels really started coming off the party bus.

When we arrived, we got a menu that included $90 pitchers of drinks, $595 for a bottle of Grey Goose, $78 for a bucket of 6 bottled waters ... oh my. Serious sticker shock.

SECOND NOTE TO SELF: In the future, be sure to review menu prices before booking an event with a minimum spend.

So, instead of pitchers and buckets, we asked to order individual drinks and were told we CAN'T order single drinks or single bottles of water. As we learned later, THIS WAS NOT TRUE.

Instead, they had a policy that individual drinks or single bottles don‚Äôt count toward the minimum spend. We were not told this, and we learned it later. BUT WHO MAKES SUCH CUSTOMER UNFRIENDLY POLICIES?

We were told that the pool was heated. (NOT TRUE)

There was indeed a DJ, but he was just that: a disc jockey. He simply played the music. No working up the crowd, no encouragement to get out and boogey, nada. Though the crowd was small, nothing was done to get us pumped up. I EXPECTED SO MUCH MORE FROM A SO-CALLED BEACH CLUB.

When we closed out our bill, we were told that the check included about a 15% gratuity and an 8% service charge. Our server told us that neither of these go to the servers (NOT TRUE).

The pool assistant then came over and the server placed two circles on our bill and indicated that the first circle is for a tip for the pool assistant and the second is for a tip for the server, and then they stood there waiting for me to fill in the two circles. UNBELIEVABLE, YES?

Oh, but the worst was yet to come.

At the time of booking, we were told that the event ended at 6:00 PM. At 5:30, the attendants announced that the venue was closed (not that it was closing), that it was closed, and we had to leave, NOW. I asked about the 6:00 PM closing, and they professed no knowledge of it. We shrugged and began to pack up to leave.

I walked toward the bathroom, and the security guard stopped me and said, ‚ÄúTHE BATHROOMS ARE CLOSED.‚Äù

I explained to the guard that I had just spent over $500 with this establishment, and he was telling me I couldn‚Äôt go the bathroom before leaving? He explained that he was just doing his job and that if he allowed me to go to the bathroom, then he would have to let others‚Ä¶ blah, blah, blah.

UNBELIEVABLE.

BUYER BEWARE: Daylight Beach Club appears to be FIRST about taking your money, and LAST about delivering a quality customer experience. It is most unfortunate.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICTmKu0_gE&fid=0x0:0x3af25cd08bddb09b"],"When":"2024-5-10"},{"Name":"Kayleigh Valentine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTS6SzsYM1VE7rxEYc2xo0_R-9v0VQ-TT0XYo_WCGB-ShPYhc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"As someone who has worked in the industry for 13+ years, I have never had a worse experience. Our time here only lasted about 20 minutes. We stepped into the pool and then were promptly told we could not be there because we did not have a table. Okay, that's fine. We moved to the other end of the pool where we were asked to move our sandals that were basically underneath a bench, out of the way. Once again, out of the pool to move our sandals where security said was a better place. As we made our way back in, we were told no drinks in the pool. As I looked around, there were half a dozen other people in the pool with their drinks, yet no one was saying anything to any of them. Finally, we were told we were not allowed to stand BY the steps.. no, we were not on the steps but IN the pool near the steps. However, other people were sitting ON the steps. Do not waste your time or money here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICxutOlXg&fid=0x0:0x3af25cd08bddb09b"],"When":"2023-5-15"},{"Name":"Shunta M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaN5REVF6snXE4n-qnpl43TV1xfgVfpUUF6HLaelxaKb-P36zoFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really enjoy this place it actually gives me a piece of mind , it‚Äôs fun food is good drinks are the best 25 and your gonna definitely feel right ladies drink free until 1pm just make sure you get your drink ticket pool is clean, rest rooms are clean and the workers are awesome it‚Äôs always a celebrity are a hot DJ playing all the hits. If you haven‚Äôt been go ahead get on the vip lists are pay a very decent amount for a ticket they also have neon nights if you don‚Äôt wanna be in the heat go enjoy the night pool","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICJmP2Fag&fid=0x0:0x3af25cd08bddb09b"],"When":"2023-6-20"},{"Name":"Evan Hoffman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIEtwW7HtwSRu9pamAVEZSoS2H92EgUlKgy4QgswSPtA8yt2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Club promoter got us here with free admission and ‚Äúfree drinks‚Äù (one drink).
No public seating, $150 bar/food spend minimum to get any place to sit. Music was alright enough. Light pours. Security was actually just entirely annoying in a personal sense when I was trying to make work calls while standing outside of the club (Honestly just one guy, wildly immature, telling for who‚Äôs hired for security). Most of them were fine but standoffish, to be expected. Overall about 2.5 stars experience, but that‚Äôs Vegas lol felt like a low budget cruise or spirit airlines flight. Spend your money at Encore or Mandalays club.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sconnie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBrBKuRfRtrWnfsuFipV9JY_45a3I6cCXge4FB79w_2eQJhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We went Friday 9/6. The dj didn‚Äôt read the crowd and adjust the music appropriately. Didn‚Äôt care for the music and clearly majority of the guests didn‚Äôt either but he kept playing the same type of music. Wasn‚Äôt very busy and wondering if it‚Äôs because of that music choice. Had bottle service, server was nice but only came around once or twice. Honestly it was  the busser that did all of the work. He was very attentive and made sure we had everything we needed and more, he was absolutely amazing! When it came to tipping, we were told by the server the busser doesn‚Äôt get any of the already added gratuity and he needs to be tipped separately. I find that a bit odd since the busser clearly was the one doing everything and serving us. We did tip him cash separately. In general, the pool was great, and we had a good time. Just hated the music which is the reason we would never go back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dom Cortez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4ZLNrzK8tyUIN900i-PqNqJEOocyHB7kICL8WcefMb-ZPntQs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If you pre book for one of the parties be prepared for disappointment. Party didn't go ahead, no email, no contact from the establishment to inform us that it had been cancelled. Turned up to find it closed, no members of staff there to explain why, what was going on or to arrange refunds for a large group.  Don't do it, don't give these guys your hard earned money.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Aakash Hegde","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOFS8qYIkfaaX3yDVZzeoQxsaFVj8wyLXuGvpHiEejz0JWumKPXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty solid nightclub outside of the usual top nightclubs that are recommended. The crowd was good, atmosphere was energetic and the music obviously depends on the DJ for the night. The drinks are expensive inside, about 15$ for a beer and 35$ for a long island for example. Make sure you get on the guest list to get in here for free. Definitely worth going if you can get on the guest list.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDsdTfskEBHApm5bYTpXIoU&fid=0x0:0x57f5babdefffd2eb"],"When":"2025-12-29"},{"Name":"N O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkK1n860MzhG4JEFBDp3Awc4-YEkmgR0LNcmuR8qmFxJnMqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place to unwind and dance. Music was loud and drinks were flowing. Only setback was the outdoor area being closed because of winter season. Warmer months here are awesome with the indoor/outdoor club scene. Still fun with indoor only","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC2Qa1yyddCVepr1_cJizB_&fid=0x0:0x57f5babdefffd2eb"],"When":"2025-11-14"},{"Name":"Dr. Stickler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGTH-XWlPyRPtCnuEgwM_4wTQd3-PMIRNBQ7bfCUIN7F2Mwbo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Very beautiful venue, in a fun nightlife area. Bar staff were extremely nice, and drinks tasted extremely good. Sadly, it loses points for a number of areas:

- I attended during a ticketed/guest listed event and it was still shoulder-to-shoulder packed; You'd expect an event with a presumed guest limit to not be so crowded. Likely violated fire code.

- You will pay 30-40$ for a well-rum&coke (Bacardi). The prices will vary every time you buy the same drink. When you email concierge for an explanation they will not explain why the drinks were priced different, nor will they present a menu with set prices. Please note that the restaurant-side's "specialty" cocktails are cheaper than this. Green tea shots will also be ~25$ each (Jameson); I ordered 5 for my friends and i and was slapped with a whopping ~140+$ bill!

- Bouncers/line-staff will confuse you with guest list proof / tickets / arm stamps and what is required to enter. It seems intentionally facetious so they can ward off whoever they choose.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amber Barnes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUExkQANIfebqnT4ZM_iDffXtW2V2J5pfiP1WZerkH74-4LPKqn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a blast here! IG is @actressamber and let me tell you, I came her for my bday weekend & had a blast! Me and my man enjoyed each other so much here although we got to fussing towards the end of the night. I love the way it looked inside and out where you can see the city view! We ordered drinks and it was so packed we couldn‚Äôt really move around but we still had fun. My experience was great","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAKxFvU5_1Z6Fmrov_oAhtv&fid=0x0:0x57f5babdefffd2eb"],"When":"2025-8-11"},{"Name":"Devan ‚ÄúD Leg‚Äù Legington","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRrv8FaDbr1AlLMd9G12Zn5ma0KKL-__h4lrFe6wjk_spn8F86=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you actually want to dance and feel the music, this is the spot. The DJ was absolutely on fire all night ‚Äî no dead moments, just straight heat from start to finish. Every transition hit, and the crowd stayed locked in the entire time.

The atmosphere is perfect if you‚Äôre there for a real party, not just to stand around. Lights, sound, and energy all came together exactly how a Vegas club should feel. The crowd was moving, the vibe was right, and it never felt forced.

If you‚Äôre in Vegas and want a place where the music carries the night and the energy stays high, Marquee is it. Definitely coming back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marie Carmen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLa1ai8AFDjuKevtkXU9WpisJUbgGTSZcxQnXJLqQSQmEvx5g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went to see an EDM artist and turned around as soon as we got inü§£Like anyone who would want to take advantage of a free guest entry via disco tech opportunity I went in good spirits on 01/23/26 for my bfs first time there/ his bday. I went to the counter and waited patiently I asked what qualifies for open bar under the disco tech special and the snobby bar tender the bar right when you get off the elevator to enter the venue with a beard and glasses didn‚Äôt even look me in the eyes said no wristband no drink and kept going üò≠üò≠üò≠like how do I get one then maybe I wanted a drink anyways?? After that we just left the crowd was ass too.At least on the way out the security at the elevators let me know that wrist bands are limited when you go through disco tech which I did not know that they run out.  But I do know I‚Äôm never hitting up a club for EDM music again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDVeTj7EEVvzRTQRcBoJhql&fid=0x0:0x57f5babdefffd2eb"],"When":"2026-1-27"},{"Name":"cassie pacholski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjXw5TwST6cx3D91YDET_ACaLZq2HneEvbGEtbq9KTVfFuxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We bought a table, spent $2500, my first responder boyfriend went to the bathroom and they wrongly accused him of selling drugs (which he is tested for and we are NOT from the country) and they kicked him out with 0 proof or evidence. We have comped rooms in vegas, we will NEVER come back to this club no matter what.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA-aCExxHm2eMYO4ulJpf7R&fid=0x0:0x57f5babdefffd2eb"],"When":"2026-1-1"},{"Name":"Jessica X","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzvTWlLhW-DQWjVpbf7gE8v8b2hmTXF2eeY4cHJ5jNQ6ZX2J0Q1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Did the Table share experience for the Timmy Trumpet concert last weekend here. The alcohol they serve is subpar, leaving me with a terrible hangover the next day. Makes sense though since the alcohol is included with the table share price that they would serve bottom shelf. Music was great, Timmy was amazing. Already booked another table for his Aug and Sept concerts. This is truly the best way to experience your favorite DJ and Vegas Clubs. Girls are only $50, Boys are $100.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDOiUBLF70K9mLkWBrYDp2P&fid=0x0:0x57f5babdefffd2eb"],"When":"2025-6-26"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Michael Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTIt8SJMs9eChk4LfN64lL--oBcToDAPL4p07UgoBk2B-lXJ0_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down the best pool party in Las Vegas! We were able to get on the guest list back to back days. We visited during Memorial Day weekend and to our surprise we got in free both days. On Sunday, we also received free open bar! The vibes are on point and the crowd is easygoing, as we meet people from all over the world.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhApy5fY6PBy1UYqnwwld9Od&fid=0x0:0x9a6ca388f1cf08a8"],"When":"2025-7-16"},{"Name":"Miguel Sanchez (Mich)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTmHPGhSqc202QqXYjblsu9y94PdorVEEfFvKbXHmu39F7sH4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of spending a night at Encore Beach Club in Vegas with my friends, and it was an unforgettable experience! This luxurious pool party noghtclub is the epitome of Vegas pool party scene, offering an unparalleled level of service, amenities, and entertainment.

As we arrived at the club, we were immediately struck by the upscale atmosphere and sleek decor. The sprawling pool area was surrounded by comfortable cabanas, luxurious daybeds, and a lively crowd of partygoers.

But the real highlight of our experience was the incredible DJ music. The electronic beats pulsed through the air, energizing the crowd and keeping us dancing all day long. The DJ's setlist was expertly curated, seamlessly blending popular hits with underground tracks to keep the party vibe going.

One of the standout features of Encore Beach Club is its commitment to luxury and excess. From the lavish cabanas to the high-end amenities, every detail is designed to create an unforgettable experience. And with its prime location in the heart of the Wynn Las Vegas resort, Encore Beach Club is the perfect destination for a party night.

Highlights:

- Incredible DJ music with electronic beats and popular hits
- Luxurious amenities, including cabanas, daybeds, and high-end service
- Upscale atmosphere and sleek decor
- Top-notch service from friendly and attentive staff
- Prime location in the heart of the Wynn Las Vegas resort","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCww5_kkQE&fid=0x0:0x9a6ca388f1cf08a8"],"When":"2025-3-20"},{"Name":"Aubree Topai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsQghCk8vIHgmtqKSaPv2PfiiS02YG8BwVkIOL9mKZrAWk2aac=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Encore Beach Club is a money-making machine with zero soul. They don‚Äôt care about your well-being or whether you‚Äôre actually having fun‚Äîonly that you‚Äôre hot, drunk, and broke by the end of the day.

Pros:
‚Ä¢	Nice layout
‚Ä¢	Easy to walk up and see the artist fairly well

Cons:
‚Ä¢	Pool water was scorching hot‚Äîlike sitting in bathwater under the Vegas sun. Zero refreshment in 100¬∞ heat.
‚Ä¢	Prices are outrageous!!
‚Ä¢	Food is meh at best.
‚Ä¢	Plastic waste is appalling. Every single drink comes in a fresh cup. Picture a group of 10 ordering 4 rounds‚Äîthat‚Äôs 40 cups in the trash. Multiply that by thousands of guests. Vegas is drowning the planet in single-use plastic. SAD.
‚Ä¢	No Liquid IVs allowed. They actually confiscate them‚Äîbecause hydration apparently isn‚Äôt part of their business model. They‚Äôd rather see you wasted than safe. Shameful.
‚Ä¢	They even took my UNO cards and tried to charge $15 to store them. Really?
‚Ä¢	Lockers are overpriced, too ($30)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDLVgbveKFyms55vn9Lgfs1&fid=0x0:0x9a6ca388f1cf08a8"],"When":"2025-9-3"},{"Name":"Astrida McFarland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPEXiRRXtfm_MCEbb8ZlK5wBKZRY0T-MLqns-Bf-Hzd3UxF7-0zQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a super popular place for partying on the Strip. We stopped by here last year on our trip to Vegas. Not much has changed. It is still packed with a younger crowd who love to party!  The DJ was blasting away. Dancing in the huge pool. Cold drinks in everyone's hand.  Girls watching boys watching each other. Everyone's having a good time.
I didn't stay long, only to catch the vibe and went to the casino but my daughter stayed and had a lot of fun there. I'm sure she'll  want to come back again soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEI_z6P_fobuRfA&fid=0x0:0x9a6ca388f1cf08a8"],"When":"2025-6-1"},{"Name":"Lauren Doege","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJf7q1g2YWV3tOu4CqjHpsSWzbAXkso2ztAoD6v2VR5gIvrJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So much fun, get wet or stay dry both options are available! Lots of fun great DJs that spin prior to the main event. They are wonderful! 10/10 have been back and will be back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEN354pftmvvBSw&fid=0x0:0x9a6ca388f1cf08a8"],"When":"2025-5-30"},{"Name":"JOE THOMAS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSx4-ql9l10WUenpdDqwjJT2FQdL23A7xR9M6Doa5A8Cupy7Xz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
Encore Beach Club is hands-down the **ultimate Vegas daylife experience**! From the moment we arrived, we were blown away by the electric atmosphere, luxurious setting, and next-level service. The sprawling pool area is stunning‚Äîcrystal-clear water, sleek cabanas, and palm trees that make you feel like you‚Äôre in a tropical oasis (with a Vegas twist, of course!).

The staff here is **TOP-NOTCH**. Shoutout to our server, who kept the drinks flowing all day with a smile. The bottle service was seamless, and the cocktails were creative, strong, and worth every penny. Pro tip: Splurge on a cabana if you can‚Äîit‚Äôs the perfect mix of privacy and prime access to the action.

The music? **Absolute fire**. The DJ had the crowd hyped from start to finish, mixing current hits with throwbacks that kept everyone dancing. The energy is contagious, whether you‚Äôre lounging in the pool or vibing by the stage. Even the crowd was friendly and there to have a great time‚Äîno pretentious vibes, just pure fun.

And let‚Äôs talk about the views‚Ä¶ The Encore‚Äôs modern design and Vegas skyline backdrop make this place Insta-worthy at every angle. By sunset, the whole venue transforms into a neon-lit paradise.

If you‚Äôre looking for a **luxurious, high-energy pool party** that lives up to the Vegas hype, Encore Beach Club delivers. Worth every dollar‚ÄîI‚Äôll be back next time I‚Äôm in town! üå¥üçæüî•

#EncoreBeachClub #VegasMustDo #UnforgettableExperience","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEIHGm6m8-erZmgE&fid=0x0:0x9a6ca388f1cf08a8"],"When":"2025-5-8"},{"Name":"Susan Planer Phillips, REALTOR CRS GRI","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVz1ZaUn1NNnjHz-AXF-JVg21G4vh_MYs1x1Shgc1HwbFlOfEfM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was there for The Chainsmokers with my daughter and her 10 friends.  It was my daughter's BACHELORETTE PARTY and we had a BLAST!  Our host was FABULOUS BRIAN PFEIFFER, and he was GREAT at communicating with us leading up to the party.  We started planning the pool party in Feb. for our April 19th BACH BASH!.  We reserved a couch and had great waitstaff for bottle service.  They do check your bags thoroughly and will toss out any bottled water and chewing gum! My Advil, too, got tossed.  Luckly for us some of our penis straws made it in!!!!! WINNING!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDo2sPRiwE&fid=0x0:0x9a6ca388f1cf08a8"],"When":"2025-4-24"},{"Name":"K Stamplecoski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCKuUx4_H1AT4IxKwswttuHbMYdGKSVjuGhrg9zFcXqEl3ukEV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went for a bachelorette party to see David Guetta. The venue was a lot smaller than anticipated, with minimal pool space. We ended up getting in touch with a promoter who got us free entry and a booth with a bottle. (We were required to tip them a fair amount). We were under the impression that the booth and bottle would be for our group of 6 girls for the bachelorette. Unfortunately we ended up having to share it with another group which we were not told. That was a surprise. We didn‚Äôt really get much to drink because there was 10 ppl sharing. It would‚Äôve been nice to know before, as it kind of ruined the vibe of our private bachelorette party. Also if your booth gets sold, you get kicked out and are randomly chilling wherever. Had we known we were sharing we could‚Äôve just bought our own area. The booth was extremely small and no shade/ umbrella was provided. It was cramped with 10 girls. We wouldn‚Äôt have lasted more than an hour in that sun with out getting heat stroke. It was not pleasant. We did ask for an umbrella but we were told to make friends if we wanted shade. We ended up meeting a pleasant and respectful group of guys on their bachelor who invited us into their shaded cabana. The rest of the day was a blast once we had some shaded area. We ended up purchasing half the food menu. The chicken tenders were the best I have EVER had. The private cabana with the guys was amazing. They had a private bathroom, a small pool and a large cabana bed. They also had a tv and couch in a shaded room. They actually asked us to join, as they had a minimum spend, and did not think they could consume enough alcohol on their own LOL. The drinks were good, the food was good, and the speakers for the DJ were good. the bottle service women were the most beautiful people I had ever seen. I am sure they hear it all the time, but I complimented one of them and they didn‚Äôt even smile. They were not the friendliest but I can imagine it gets annoying. We ended up having an absolute blast and I recommend going. If you have a group, I suggest you splurge and get a nice shaded booth‚Ä¶ or ‚Äúmake friends‚Äù if you want a great experience. I would go back again & get a private booth with no promoter next time","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDLqPHlEA&fid=0x0:0x9a6ca388f1cf08a8"],"When":"2024-6-25"}]

[{"Name":"Hedonistic Adventurer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKX_FpZTu3eAedwKtv5fH4nltYuD2zYMS88k4Mk496m39vUxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Topless beach club. Two main pools. Will need to pay to rent a day bed (11-6). Staff are happy and attentive. Food is pretty basic but tasty! Love the 5 cans of wine!!Draws a curious crowd. I‚Äôve enjoyed a fun time around the pool and also had occasions when people (read: the ladies) just be wasted. I prefer when people are there for a good time. Enjoy the diverse crowd and young/older mix, singles and couples. Atmosphere is pretty club ish‚Ä¶ myself I always prefer a DJ and notice things like the same music mix tap being played two days consecutively.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCXGyVIe65Y3Y-5zLg0S4Wx&fid=0x0:0xb266dc10d1642bc3"],"When":"2025-10-26"},{"Name":"Nick Oldroyd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtgXNuS_J6lg53Pdcu-Guw1meP-68s28B9TLfG6s0XeJNLcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Moorea is such a fun place to relax and meet new friends. We rented a daybed and everything went very smooth. Colton was great to work with and went above and beyond our expectations. The pool is smaller than I thought but it was a lot of fun and people are easy going. My wife got a massage pool side and she said it was fantastic. All and all, we enjoyed it so much that we went back the next day and walked away super happy. This will be a staple each time we are in Vegas.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shukhrat Maks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSJtPqddRDcwfhIqJJWHO57aTYrbDxa23xwuwR6CwuF5_LmSVUYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The experience we had today was not fully satisfied because we couldn't find Juice at the store, only at the Bar and it was way too overpriced! Our kids was a little below the 48 inches and they didn't allow me to take them to the wave pool and made me go to another pool so they can swim ! It wasn't too bad of an experience the place just needs a little more work !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDut6OvwwE&fid=0x0:0xb266dc10d1642bc3"],"When":"2022-9-1"},{"Name":"Chanell B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-6qVFuQavIE_TBpWPehRvwseHw8HzJ6xiF379OiZ27KFDbotOdg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fabulous!! We had a wonderful time!! The pool was the perfect way to relax and cool down.

Maurice was great!! The whole staff made sure our group of ladies were comfortable.

And the skinny Pina Coladas are yummy!

Great time! Will definitely be going back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDZ74z3Cg&fid=0x0:0xb266dc10d1642bc3"],"When":"2023-10-9"},{"Name":"Silas Lewis -Samson Stone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOtkFszLDnGqv4vSeAmGMq1azEyf3l3GVfgWGUAjiDMZBXP_s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Do yourself a favor and splurge on a cabana or daybed at one of the Mandalay Bay pools, lazy river or beach. It‚Äôs pricey but ITS SHADE!  If you don‚Äôt have a reservation, then good luck finding shade. You can get out there early and find a place with shade, but as the sun moves across the sky, your shade will turn into a blazing hot oven. We were there at the beginning or July so we knew what to expect. The cabana that we reserved was perfect for our family of 4. We had staff that checked on us often. We had a mini fridge with waters and sodas that were included. Towels and floats for the lazy river were already there and are included. We had 3 lounge chairs with umbrellas and obviously the cabana with some chairs, a table, a couch, a ceiling fan and a television. It was luxury at its best, especially in the heat. We were able to charge drinks and food to our room and never had a problem finding Matt or Liz. They took great care of us and were very nice. Jacques was the man!  He got things setup in our cabana by laying our towels, making sure our umbrella was positioned to give us optimal shade, and was so nice. The next day, we had a day bed and once again, Jacques was on it. He put towels on our bed and made sure we were comfortable and all while being in the best mood. Overall, the pool at MB is awesome but your experience will be enhanced if you have a cabana or daybed with shade.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICrstqs3wE&fid=0x0:0xb266dc10d1642bc3"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"McKenzie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY1AOcEW5CrSvE629li1Sw9B57xxM4ZxekxHmQwvL7SVg9Pbw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very enjoyable time with lots to do! Plenty of free lounge chairs to sit in. Towels are at front of entrance. There is a lazy river, wave pool, kiddie pool, pool, and spa. All was very fun to get in. Only complaint was the water was freezing But somewhat refreshing at the hottest point of the day. And the other thing was the fact that in the lazy river tubes are not complementary you have to go buy them at the store which is fine but they were $30 per tube. Speaking of the store the prices were a tad high but plenty of inventory and the staff were friendly. They have lots of life guards with lots of rules then again it makes since as you never know what will happen. The beach bar is nice to eat at whether you order and go lounge or sit down. Everything is very clean and fun. Overall pretty good pool area or I guess beach!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDOwprDdQ&fid=0x0:0xb266dc10d1642bc3"],"When":"2022-6-30"},{"Name":"Nicole Koch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5cwHjy1egWwq1z2n_b7LfxWg8a4KRcBD9IyGZE7qH-zelMoM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mandalay Bay Beach is amazing.  Great for all ages, there was a very shallow toddler area.  The wave pool was fun.  The Lazy Tiver was beautiful and relaxing.    They have a free water station so you can refill your water bottles.  If you want to buy water ifs $8.00 for one bottle of water.  I would recommend this, we had a blast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID4gaexjQE&fid=0x0:0xb266dc10d1642bc3"],"When":"2019-6-14"},{"Name":"Brandon Hartwick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMk2DSNcKtrHePByhOJPMifwD2kMt_ZRvBemLbMtIyaDqe9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The beach and surrounding pools are great. On a weekend and busy day, make sure to get in before 1030-11 to get a seat.  We usually got in between 8-9 and had no issues finding a prime location, but many people spent 30 minutes or More trying to find a spot around the resort.  The best spots, in my opinion, are by the waterfall in the lazy river. You can even move a chair under the cave and lay there the whole day.  Make sure to find something in the shade and/or put on a lot of sunscreen. It‚Äôs hot!

Also, bring your own tube from home for the lazy river. They will blow them up for you for free at the shop! To rent a tube is very expensive or you have to rent a cabana for a day (they come with a select number of tubes). Best cabanas from what I saw are on the lazy river.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID4q_3AowE&fid=0x0:0xb266dc10d1642bc3"],"When":"2018-4-30"}]

column18: Stylish daytime pool party spot & dimly lit late-night venue offering DJs & live entertainment.

[{"Name":"Linda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsZlgcWcfchXzDKP4xqiFLhOOn-S9IPL5ABYQm3DvzTuE8YgSvsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have came here since I moved to vegas and I will miss it. It has been my "personal" party spot for the last 3 years! After hours is great just not the same vibe. Went to the last show on the last night. Watched Dustin give his speech. I heard there is one on Miami, I'll have to visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBwSRMEvbi1QWe05yI88OfH&fid=0x0:0xcd1d538bbc3d77f3"],"When":"2025-11-5"},{"Name":"John Tedesco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwZJ3V-HCt9DO5TSQAon9l8SBjtekkgsIleBIXz4H4nFcw6yA06g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So we were there for a private party but it was a pretty cool spot. Vice rooftop venue.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBRWU-BM_juHmdz6qMwZGp-&fid=0x0:0xcd1d538bbc3d77f3"],"When":"2025-11-17"},{"Name":"Shawanna Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUG0P6YB97_NIWkh2xDf6qHToyjgsXwn32O_5wRezQitMTks0AE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Day party was extremely fun. Dj did his thang kept the music flowing with hit after hit. Pool was clean, staff was nice, drinks expensive but, that is common these days. They had food options which was a reasonable price and the fries, chicken tenders, and cheese burger bites were enjoyable. We has a blast.  I definitely will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA6-yqbeh0OX7YO7x-4FP4Q&fid=0x0:0xcd1d538bbc3d77f3"],"When":"2025-8-18"},{"Name":"Sandee Louis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL22okHYL5eiw8m_BkE9K44_Q8-Arh4O5ItUMfijtYwAC63Dw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best hip hop night club in Las Vegas you have to stop either for the day beach club party or night life. They always have celebrity guest . Hannah took very good care of us in our section. Definitely a memorable birthday.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCY0Ye1Bw&fid=0x0:0xcd1d538bbc3d77f3"],"When":"2025-5-5"},{"Name":"Malcolm Gray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcFFnpuKx0ANNVPMNa_tagUpl3VUIaKtFs_yel2lNjlfFzzsw_EQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Attended a private evening event put on by a sponsor to a convention I was attending. They have this yearly and it is very popular. Not really my thing, but it's a large place with both indoor and outdoor areas, DJ, dance floor with pools.

It was quite cold in January to be outside comfortably even with the heaters. Music gets pretty loud and while they had appetizers there seemed to be only 2 hosts bringing them around to 300+guests. Of course it was free to attendees, but I am sure it cost a lot for the sponsor. Location is very convenient with view of the strip, however they have very high glass all around the outside that spoiled the view.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID_iI-alQE&fid=0x0:0xcd1d538bbc3d77f3"],"When":"2025-1-21"},{"Name":"Alissa Roy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwPQa9tDwasPMhTJhjrPDdhnx908cHpp3pU5brL0ZSS4dgAlc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"üå¥ Unforgettable VIP Experience at Drai‚Äôs Beach Club! üå¥

We checked out the space Thursday and John (the Batista look-alike bouncer!) was super helpful, even connecting us with Hector to book our spot. Booking was smooth, and Hector made everything easy‚Äîhe even personally escorted us to our bungalow on Friday.

We had Bungalow 1 and our server Hannah and busser Fredo were absolute rockstars! They hustled nonstop, stayed attentive, and went above and beyond for our group. Their energy and professionalism made the day unforgettable.

Top-notch service all around‚Äîhuge thanks to the team at Drai‚Äôs for an amazing experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA_CX7F7kbwLV2RM9SF992B&fid=0x0:0xcd1d538bbc3d77f3"],"When":"2025-8-22"},{"Name":"Sherry/Jada Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnjtaMsvKn7_lHpR6S9FQaINpIdG_d2h2mXerXolaw9IBY8lCoDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everytime im in Vegas this was my Place to Party, they said Halloween weekend was the last time Open so had to Party..Thanks Guys Always mucho Te amo.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAqpCrzyVK0PA9ZCpDx-Mhh&fid=0x0:0xcd1d538bbc3d77f3"],"When":"2025-11-10"},{"Name":"UndyingPanda Begay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSBRwgUzLPT2m1ZH03xD6QvAz8O5f-uRpmee8zCastlyPbIlAb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lots of fun! Beautiful view of the strip! And was here for the SEMA after party with our sponsors and was fun food was great and open bar was fun! Lots of dancing and meet some cool people! Can‚Äôt wait for next year event!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID33PiNSg&fid=0x0:0xcd1d538bbc3d77f3"],"When":"2024-11-13"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Preston Forbes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhjR1BLGNuE2WE2xfmGE7LrSX73ThKOZyhWPyqFU2f8KZv8w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vegas Pool Party Famous DJs all day scantily clad wildness‚Ä¶lush cabana healthy food and tons of Tequila üòúüëç our massive group did all day deeeeep.  Cute casino lots of epic views and artwork too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBfeGh6rhXAe_PRlIVR0nen&fid=0x0:0x4a08a6e0adcd01fb"],"When":"2025-10-30"},{"Name":"Kevin Khoshaba","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTHZgQYgKKHsHMq2WqhQGuq0uFF1kA3Nr0sGNG4V3Kix2fgmtL=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I‚Äôve never experienced anything as ridiculous as LIV Beach Club. They charge thousands of dollars for a daybed and umbrella, yet when you actually try to use the umbrella, they tell you you can‚Äôt open it ‚Äî supposedly due to ‚Äúweather conditions.‚Äù Meanwhile, the weather was sunny, calm, and absolutely perfect. No wind, no storms, nothing.
What makes it worse is that other larger tables were allowed to have their umbrellas open, which made me feel completely discriminated against. It‚Äôs beyond unfair to force guests to sit under the scorching sun with no shade, especially when you‚Äôre literally charging them for the umbrella they‚Äôre not allowed to use.
It‚Äôs such a shame for a place with potential to treat paying guests this way. Policies like this ‚Äî and the way they selectively enforce them ‚Äî will absolutely cause LIV Beach Club to lose loyal customers.
If you value comfort, fairness, or basic hospitality, avoid this place at all costs","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAXqEWZk0bAoqRvkTVFZIwo&fid=0x0:0x4a08a6e0adcd01fb"],"When":"2025-10-4"},{"Name":"Marco Santa Cruz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8kIWurMbfNSU2G7e-gZWciCbK15VI1qTOYhqtKSd3mw8TBA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Spent billions and no one checked to make sure the reflections from the building were not going to be a problem (hello Aria), lol.

This is some serious design flaws that were missed all throughout the building process.

The pool area is 20¬∞+ difference from the surrounding areas which is quite frankly ridiculous.
+
$60 drinks, and I'm sure corporate is wondering why the pool can't bring in more $$$.
+
Rude attitude from security at the door leaves a bad taste and you can tell it affects the vibe as soon as you walk in.

here are 3 points to work on, but I'm sure nothing will change.

Save your time, money, and have a better time elsewhere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhClaObISeMaXYMnNUxI3jzi&fid=0x0:0x4a08a6e0adcd01fb"],"When":"2025-7-27"},{"Name":"Marvin Bailey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLUwJn0DPmZCnVZS1tjtaU6lwJDS5822hl2DojgAdcyHLvRzQ_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"LIV Beach Las Vegas ‚Äî Great Vibes, Disappointing Alcohol Integrity

Four of us visited LIV Beach on a hot Friday in Vegas. With no major DJ playing, the lineups were minimal, and since we had a table, we skipped right through. The $500 minimum spend for the table felt fair for Vegas standards. Service was excellent ‚Äî our server, Maddison, was pleasant, attentive, and professional. This is clearly a well-run establishment from a business standpoint. The staff ‚Äî especially the women promoting the party atmosphere ‚Äî are well-trained and know how to keep the energy up while encouraging guests to spend.

Security presence was solid, which adds to the sense of safety. This doesn‚Äôt feel like the kind of place where anyone would get away with starting trouble. The crowd was overall well-behaved and the vibe was energetic but classy.

Music? 5 stars. Atmosphere? 5 stars. Cleanliness of the bathrooms? Also 5 stars. The venue itself is fantastic.

However, where LIV Beach loses stars ‚Äî and ultimately my trust ‚Äî is with the alcohol. It‚Äôs obvious the hard liquor is watered down. One will notice immediately when you taste the liquor clean. The bottles aren‚Äôt brought out in original sealed bottles are immediately poured into plastic jugs for serving. That‚Äôs a big red flag. For a place that charges what seems like an 800% markup on alcohol, there‚Äôs absolutely no justification for compromising integrity just to stretch profits further.

I've attended at world-class beach clubs like Nikki Beach, Shimmy Beach Club, the Grand and the W in Thailand, and none of them cut corners like this. When you're paying top dollar, you expect quality and transparency ‚Äî not shortcuts.

Because of this, I believe the 3-star average rating LIV currently holds is accurate, and I‚Äôm giving it 3 stars as well. Great venue, great vibe ‚Äî but a fundamental breach of trust when it comes to what‚Äôs in your glass.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCYmrT16gE&fid=0x0:0x4a08a6e0adcd01fb"],"When":"2025-5-3"},{"Name":"Deisy Vega","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqPHaAQA8j2yb5Jdf31AKn-r8FluE9EgS6IdVI7cIHJar_kZ9qkg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great day club, great music, good DJs! The sun is crazy out there and drinks aren‚Äôt cheap haha but such a fun experience. I purchased tickets, thankfully. I showed up around 2:30 and got in with no problem but the guest list line was insane, no one was being let in. Definitely get there early if you‚Äôre there without a ticket or table. Hopefully, I‚Äôll be back soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCYisHRYg&fid=0x0:0x4a08a6e0adcd01fb"],"When":"2025-5-3"},{"Name":"Emerald Lemley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZDL0I9gxm1PsU_2CewOaP2qv4YhTKp7SNHaM7xvnx0aAYIovpyg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time in Vegas so I was nervous but the experience here was great! Mariana and Luis took AMAZING care of me and my group. The heated pool and the amazing music just added to their great service. Excited to come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCIkP-S2gE&fid=0x0:0x4a08a6e0adcd01fb"],"When":"2025-3-29"},{"Name":"Deborah Stevens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ScT8ffsUeVJVXaeijxdKiFu6V6GcBHDdNTtmIVRrY7hPGwoa=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My friend and I are guests of the Fontainebleau October 17-20 and decided to go to Liv Beach Club to see Disco Lines on Saturday, October 18th. He had requested that we be added to the invited guest list for free entry through the app DiscoTech. He was additionally told by the concierge at the hotel that we should receive free priority entry. We joined the invited guest line and were given no instruction. We stood there for several minutes before someone came around to check our IDs and give us stamps. Several more minutes passed, and we were moved over to a different part of the line closer to the security check point. Someone came around and checked IDs against the guest list, and my friend presented his ID. We were given a ticket and told that we would need to pay $50 for male entry. My friend inquired why this was the case, as this was contrary to the communication he had received through DiscoTech when he made the reservation and the information provided by the hotel concierge. We were simply told that things were subject to change. Again, no additional instructions were given, and we were led to believe that we should receive entry to the club. We stood in the line for nearly two hours, corralled like cattle. At this point, we were both experiencing dehydration and desperately needed to use a bathroom. I understand that the pre-purchased tickets were given priority, but at this point there was no one in the pre-purchased ticket line, and the security attendants were just standing around twiddling their thumbs. I finally went to one of the staff members to ask about an update on when we might be allowed entry, and I expressed that this was a long time for people to be expected to wait without access to water or a bathroom. She said that she didn‚Äôt know, and that if we wanted to avoid the line we would have to pay $100 per person for the cover. I finally relented just to escape what felt like psychological torture. We‚Äôve been to other pool clubs on the strip using the guest list and have never experienced this kind of treatment. When we finally got in, the pool was so crowded, I can only imagine it was oversold. I was crawling over people all day in the heat. Disco Lines was great but not worth being extorted for $200.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"M Mariotti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgU3SlEr3H9gDkAG3pNgY299K01PSw0ZAXI9a8nEsJvWDj-9g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I attended liv beach club on Saturday June 28th to see Dom dolla. We arrived at 11:20 thinking dom would start at 11:30 from the drop off area we walked into the fountain Blau and walked until we found and escalator and took it to the 3rd floor. We followed some signs which brought us to a waiting area for the guest list which had a $75 cover and an express lane for people who bought tickets for $90. I would highly recommend buying a ticket rather than doing the guest list. We then went through security which consisted of pat downs and wallet checks. We then went inside and quickly realized we had no place to put our stuff and Dom wasn‚Äôt actually going to be coming on till 3. This actually worked out in our favor seeing that drinks were $60 for a 24 oz and $100 for a pitcher we decided to get a day bed for a $1000 tab. So the deal was spend $1000 on drinks and food and you also get the day bed. We bought a bottle of tequila and got some waters. There were 2 openers before Dom dolla and they were both great. The second opener was the highlight of the day though. We had finished our bottle about halfway through the second set and figured we would eat too. So we upgraded our day bed to a couch and it put us on the ground level facing the stage a great upgrade compared to our last spot. The staff was excellent during this process helping us move our stuff and getting our tabs switched over. We also got a safe with this new setup and the people next to us were also awesome. So having the safe and the people next to us we were able to leave our area unattended if we wanted and go to the pool or the pit. Also to be stated is how perfectly spaced everything is to where if you want to be in a crowd you can but also there are places to get space. With about 30 minutes left we closed out the tab everything was reasonable based on where we were and how do the staff is there‚Äôs a 15% gratuity and a service charge. These were acceptable because they aren‚Äôt just wait staff they are the best in the city they also mix drinks as well. One charge to watch out for is waters we bought 31 waters and it came out to $434. You can walk up to the bar and ask for a cup of water and they will give it to you free. This is an expensive but well worth experience and I have already started planning my return in October.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBtbWAi83zAgrW-JjyBPzSh&fid=0x0:0x4a08a6e0adcd01fb"],"When":"2025-7-4"}]

[{"Name":"Happymissesreyes !","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMvQkCXyHxJCd1JkuRaf7MAcIWq7p1K_IHJpea0BHlQBBRTua6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We would have stayed if they had more free, shaded seating. Understandable to have rentable spaces, but the ratio was wayyyy off. There was no where to even set a towel but on the ground. Too bad because the music was good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"George D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJNPPgBHYbXKz013NUuvNzPSRqMhNqMljh9GkqjslUVpYzdnYC_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I would honestly rate it a one star if I could.
At first, the staff assigned us the wrong cabanna and charged us extra to 'upgrade' to the one we initially paid for.
Secondly, we were continuously pushed and pressured to buy bottles of alcohol during our stay, despite our refusal.
We were pressured to buy alcohol constantly throughout the stay.
At the end, the female bouncer discriminated against my friend and I and pressured us to leave, without any explanation or consideration to any situation that had happened.
I think the staff were greedy, inconsiderate and arrogant.
I also believe they added drinks to our bill that we didnt spend. Therefore, I would not visit ever again. Save your money !!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Monta Lewis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLB8fhYc9k9kqBd2ClZrKQkMpIvHJ_bf2QbutRKizOoShtxMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Club liquid a rooftop club is a well place to party. Dj was going hard. A place to turn up no sitting down. Staff was working hard to please. There is a charge for beds,couches,cabanans.But there are accomodations for the charges.Get out and have sum fun.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICavLLbOQ&fid=0x0:0x908ac9112b5613c3"],"When":"2021-7-25"},{"Name":"Steve Callahan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxpEsIsJQjRbHuMN6T58w5V3DNQ19tikP1VgSDWCxTSys9LxUJ1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So this us our second time to come back to this pool. I recall having a great time the first time (renting a day bed). So after reviewing the reviews again this year and seeing so many bad reviews recently we were hesitant. Let us tell you. We came back and received top notch service. Not just the service but the food and drink were amazing. We asked for changes outside the normal menu (lettuce wrap bun instead of regular burger buns etc). Never a question and our servers gave us exactly what we wanted. Our servers (Jill and Davey) met every expectation and the drinks and food met every expectation as well. Five stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC0_PCk2QE&fid=0x0:0x908ac9112b5613c3"],"When":"2019-9-18"},{"Name":"Scott B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZJ2wWIamEu7zXZ_p5oWHHkugMNBHL0oXw0xqufQuV-LBMvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friends and I reserved a bungalow at Liquid for my 40th birthday and it was an awesome time.  Everyone at Liquid, from the greeters to security to the servers and the bussers took great care of us and made sure we were having fun and being safe.  I would absolutely go again and would recommend it to anyone who wants to have a good time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDL8KGRYQ&fid=0x0:0x908ac9112b5613c3"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Veronica Delic- Dallas Realtor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWiPsMuHapjV_CaslxrnJNYRixqsLHSHPEpE9V1gCBuqN2ml8z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Overpriced, servers expect to tip on top of their mandatory 20% + resort fee. The experience is a lot of fun. We had a cabana for the day, prompt service from cabana boys. It damn its expensive! Cheapest bottle of tequila put us at $650 + everything else had a $1,000 be ready to leave drunk and broke LOL","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDO8I35ygE&fid=0x0:0x908ac9112b5613c3"],"When":"2022-6-25"},{"Name":"Dani Adams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqXvEox8QyXhyKlCLD-_Kp8YDE0VrrNGmhpgEmbXHFpZMNxeFq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a blast during the daytime pool party! The crowd had positive vibes, and the staff was really awesome and friendly. We ended up spending about $500 for a daybed (minimum spend on drinks and food) which really does stretch if you know what to order, and having a rest area that's also shaded was definitely worth the spend! Our server (Alina/Alaina?) was absolutely fantastic and super helpful. You can't bring gum in so just remember that. They had to take ours away. Security was great too; they really watched out to make sure no one was getting too drunk or sloppy. I know they were about to escort one girl out because she started stumbling out of the pool. So just pace yourself and hydrate, hydrate, hydrate! The DJ had a good balance of music between house/EDM, rap, and hiphop. Even though the pool itself isn't too big, I thought it was nice because it was more intimate, so you could mingle and make new friends easily! Thanks for a great first experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICLvcG1EQ&fid=0x0:0x908ac9112b5613c3"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Angel Samich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJK6op-aRMQ0GCY5I9n8efllMpp97c_gB5w2mZlXS9oGNRF8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Went on Saturday 8/2 for the special where ladies drink for free from 1-2 PM. Decided to stay and paid $60 for the worst vodka lemonade I‚Äôve ever had! I even provided the Aria cup since I had it. Can‚Äôt understand their outrageous pricing! Won‚Äôt be returning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDN5aWfl5IrQmB0ARVjjRdI&fid=0x0:0x908ac9112b5613c3"],"When":"2025-8-8"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Tara Hawks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvGkgeGlkuPk3yXidq8R2sLr9wGi0Rh_ySK_w53BfnlA98iW2F=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great time was had by all here. Nice beach set up including sand. Cabanas with a safe and in shaded area. There's a DJ playing music to get you in the mood for dancing. There's a menu to order drinks and food. A little pricey but what would expect for convenience and off The Strip.

I'd definitely recommend this beach club.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID64pv1Hw&fid=0x0:0xdce40c07c72e856c"],"When":"2021-9-24"},{"Name":"Buddha Love","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPxQelOuVD5fOtjp7eU7lW1QjzdFlGSrqZoVDfmlJ4-gF_9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Beautiful resort style beach club. They really make it an immersive experience. From the sand to the huge pool it feels like you‚Äôre at the ocean. I used an amazing promoter on IG @koconikki. She helped me get the best experience to see sickick! The bar was pretty empty but a bit pricey. Everyone was super nice and security is very tight.

Edit: I had to take a star off my review after going back to see Chance the Rapper this memorial weekend. It was my birthday and I stood alone at the bar for over 15 mins as bar staff ignored me and served everyone around me. It wasn‚Äôt until a woman next to me was asked her order and alerted the bar tender to serve me that I got my drink (after several people in lines surrounding me came and left the bar as waited quietly). I was in-front of two different bar tenders while being ignored. I even took my credit card out and held it in my hand so they saw I was ready to pay.  I understand it‚Äôs busy but why serve everyone who came after me first? I usually tip but I had to put my tip away after that as I felt like I was being treated differently.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID2pLmRSg&fid=0x0:0xdce40c07c72e856c"],"When":"2022-5-6"},{"Name":"Peter Gal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLulJ1ZnW3ALuvO81OcOJLHOOLdDXL9nM0dtt_iaPM9kuGJJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Don‚Äôt get $20 guac & chips unless you want your jaw to drop to the floor when you open the bowl.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBWATdGHY0LYkoU0nnpLJ3E&fid=0x0:0xdce40c07c72e856c"],"When":"2025-8-28"},{"Name":"Erick Guerra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwGLqSpHQUImj5AJaaEE-M9aLqgxTRQnwidkkqG4b1z1Gasgle=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had few issues when it came to the breakdown of the original cost of our Daybed and drinks but the setting was great, I enjoyed the artificial beach/pool, the DJ played great music. I'm defenetly coming back üëç","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDagq_dnwE&fid=0x0:0xdce40c07c72e856c"],"When":"2021-8-17"},{"Name":"Robert Short","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlUVUkqv2TYStGEBzwdaZ6PsywPwJnwRsvkNiGQG7zEmbxt-tT0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great time today warming up for EDC.  Club is amazing with a lot of staff and they are all very friendly.  The entertainment was on point with Cosmic Gate and Markus Schulz headlining and tomorrow with Above and Beyond and Deadmau5 on Sunday, I know we'll be there both days!  The bar staff is super nice and attentive. Security at the door is very thorough but also nice af.  We're locals and definitely gonna be tracking the parties here.  Oh yeah, the sound system kicked a55!  Amazing bass and nice and loud.  Just go!  Elia is awesome. Need to find a promoter for this place to get on the guest list.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICG3LL4Mw&fid=0x0:0xdce40c07c72e856c"],"When":"2021-10-23"},{"Name":"Claudia Vanesa Jovel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOxdfR8vcBqavMYNLtHOLTmeFIBLsmtYJxihSj_FutZ-F_m113=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We went there for Chris Malinchak for Labor Day Weekend. To get to the pool from the garage or parking area is very uninviting because it‚Äôs also mixed with the employees entrance and looks as if it‚Äôs under construction or unfinished. Once we got to the entrance, the security was nice and informed us that there wasn‚Äôt any lockers for our stuff (brought a pool/beach bag with a change of clothes) and that we could check it in at the hotel‚Äôs bell desk. I didn‚Äôt want the hassle of carrying our stuff around since it was a pool party. It would have been nice to keep our stuff safe nearby and find it strange as to why they don‚Äôt provide lockers. It‚Äôs inconvenient to walk all the way back to the front lobby of the casino to leave our stuff there but at least I was happy they had an option. We got on the guest list the night prior so it was a smooth entry. The pool was decent and they layout was good. The drinks at the bar where overpriced. The first bartender I got was very friendly and the second one was rude. We had already bought 4 of the 32oz for $40 bucks each. Cups where filled up with mostly ice and they weren‚Äôt even strong so I asked if they had other strong cocktails. The bartender replied ‚Äúthey are all the same‚Äù. Would have been nice to suggest something better to drink that‚Äôs all. Overall it was ok. The DJ on the other hand was good and he went with the chill out pool vibes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC6--yp2wE&fid=0x0:0xdce40c07c72e856c"],"When":"2021-9-14"},{"Name":"Kelly H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkINVc52TjCSIG8YIwzw_ohrRDmgoWM9zBlRQlEtqJoWcVsk6P=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Elia Beach Club is the spot if you want to have a really good time. No hassles, plenty of parking & the entertainment is exceptional.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICaybyWIA&fid=0x0:0xdce40c07c72e856c"],"When":"2021-8-3"},{"Name":"Emma M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVc1TWHnOIF7vkU23x1UPwXGe74Y5m2gqoHfBU1GsbYUF5Gk_Ex=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good location.
Usual facilities.
Not overly older child friendly.
Comfortable enough.","Images":null,"When":""}]
