They put my belongings in order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBONva5jAP6SukKY5aJt1t1\u0026fid=0x0:0xbaf964b688fef208"],"When":"2025-6-15"},{"Name":"Karteek Pradyumna Bulusu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDbM1yHf1ahZ7hidLmTzZFSt7LhKgGO5Z_PYIYPTd_-nbN9Wf8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was an Amazing experience to have celebrated new years Eve there. Chainsmokers played on that night and they were lit. Definitely a great night club and must visit when Chainsmokers are there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICml6T9qwE\u0026fid=0x0:0xbaf964b688fef208"],"When":"2022-1-12"},{"Name":"S. Apel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMnGkfHeOOManjHyMB4esst-Ubyc4A37ZefH41MhlUEqDPKw_X=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place to be and have a great party night at Vegas. Perfect outside facilities and pool plus gambling places with lovely people!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC08qmATQ\u0026fid=0x0:0xbaf964b688fef208"],"When":"2019-9-21"},{"Name":"Carlos Canp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiMmET6cNJNO1gfi2I_RmbKNtm5oqPG3C7XdXYVUZo79oZW_c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"NIGHT SWIM was fun! As most clubs prices are FAAAAT! But had such a great time listening tu Rufus du Sol","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICZv_Wccw\u0026fid=0x0:0xbaf964b688fef208"],"When":"2023-9-21"},{"Name":"Alfonso Zito","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3REsIKh2RfJmF9Iqlg85tFvRGbNpccJ6Vj9dytIrqEX0L0w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We were in the line for more than 90 mins waiting to enter in the XS club for NO reasons, since the club was visibly empty on the inside. This is something that created frustration for most of the customers in the line with general admission. Rather than that, bar was fast and price were consistent during the night (vs other clubs that increased the drink price during the night). Good sound set in the dance-floor (that we weren‚Äôt able to reach because flow was managed by security), so we spent the night in the side aisles where acoustic was not at bar of an EDM event. Updated from 2 stars to 3 starts, as the event was enjoyable, but improvement seems needed in the management and procedures to manage successfully top tier international deejays.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Johnathan leary","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrPplr7TpZodeiI0K5neST604le-YomMjXLoWskEuJ8eIebOfHHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had to keep it mellow at Marshmello. It was a good time little bit of a line to get in but as expected on a holiday weekend we were staying at the Wynn, so it wasn‚Äôt too bad to just run upstairs after and relax after the show we‚Äôve seen Marshmello a few times, and this was a cool setting with the hotel in the background by the pool a little bit difficult to get a drink but also expected when it‚Äôs busy so no worries will definitely go back to see another artist next time we stay at the Wynn","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"APRIL Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvI4MxN7j7g9if3BTcCMlCOzTayvvXSOgbeXQHWNUGRfQxfDBFHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fun party","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID7wYTIvgE\u0026fid=0x0:0xbaf964b688fef208"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Lin Gan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLH8CODUVV_QM5aBMWwcTo1D-v1wex5oRw9FrKXVI0qiuw81E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Statistically, if you are partying in Vegas, you will go to XS.  Excellent choice.  Summer 2019 sees that Sunday nights is when this place is busiest.  Gorgeous indoor and outdoor space, plenty of room to walk around and mingle, beautiful lit up pool with floating flamingos abound, water fountain so you don't die, this set up is as good as it gets.  You have the nightclub vibe and crowd, DJ and plenty of outdoor space adds a festival feel, and it's not too loud to talk.  If heaven created a nightclub, it'd be XS Nightswim Sunday nights.\n\nLadies, find a promoter to get on the guestlist and free entrance.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column5: Located In the Cosmopolitan, 3708 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
column30: {"borough":"","street":"Located In the Cosmopolitan, 3708 S Las Vegas Blvd","city":"Las Vegas","postal_code":"89109","state":"Nevada","country":"US"}
column31: null
column32:
[{"Name":"Samina Alva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGPcykmdxOrdWzO_zMgeyykrtWdC02sjAdFPC1-cKCTFKq4BM9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Marquee Day Club Review
We have stayed at the Cosmopolitan Hotel several times every year since 2013.

Surprisingly, during all our stays,  we have never  stepped  foot  in Marquee Dayclub . The feeling was mutual with my husband, we felt the venue was not for us , and for younger crowds

We were planning a bachelor/bachelorette party in August for our daughter and future son in law , and felt Marquee would be something they would both enjoy .

During a visit in June  I met Jake Talley , a senior host at Marquee. He assisted with bookings for my daughter‚Äôs group on one day(Friday ) , and my son in laws on another (Monday ). He was extremely helpful during the planning  . I felt kind of bad contacting him so much due to the many questions/concerns I had . Jake answered everything in a timely manner, and gave me all the information needed to make our visit memorable

Needless to say our visit was a massive success . Both parties had an amazing time . Our guests thanked us multiple times with how much they enjoyed the food , music , and overall  atmosphere .

Visiting Marquee on 2 different days , Friday and Monday, I got a look at how the venue runs during extremely busy and very chill settings.

The staff worked just as hard on both days and were very pleasant to my guests.  The food was phenomenal and not what I expected for ‚Äúpool food‚Äù. Be warned the food can be on pricier side but at the same time the portions are massive and plentiful!  Especially the taco platter and some of the other foods that we tried and worth the mention. The chicken satay, nachos and wings!

We would like to specifically acknowledge our server Zelmara on the guys visit on Monday . She gave many recommendations, visited our party often , and was very sweet .  She was from Chicago like us , and had some nice conversations about it .

I also would like to compliment the server  assigned to my daughter‚Äôs party on Friday .  I was there on Friday for a short time . I chose to leave to let my daughter and her guests have their space .
Our daughter said the server was very kind and hustled to make sure  they had what they needed.  The buss/support staff was also hustling and we appreciated that. They would make they were constantly changing out our ice buckets so our drinks wouldn‚Äôt get warm in that hot Vegas summer weather!

Most of all a big thanks to Jake Talley .  It wouldn‚Äôt have been as seamless without him .

A few tips if you never been to Marquee.

Look up the dress code before you attend. The pricing and crowd level can be significantly different on weekends and when there is a guest DJ. If you want a more relaxed atmosphere with less crowd , give a weekday a try .
We understand the venue is being remodeled and updated, we can not wait to see the updates and looking forward to returning!
We were overall very pleased with our decision to choose Marquee day club as  part of our trip!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAEhH9WZeouPrBpjbULGuRx&fid=0x0:0xd2979bf3140876cf"],"When":"2025-10-25"},{"Name":"Nate Neel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAjq9arfZsixzHzNBnckDVX85LrTBiqf8z4jChbGWZbkXA6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wooow, what an amazing experience. Went there because it heard music coming from the rooftop of the hotel, decided to go and had a blast. It was raining but I stayed and danced in the rain. The staffs are all super friendly, as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDkehdrqdEZCCFY8uM1w9VK&fid=0x0:0xd2979bf3140876cf"],"When":"2025-10-11"},{"Name":"Donna Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7kbCdCaZumuAqMBMrNUOv-_mYG5NNzZByr-QwD_EuqSTtiTBMMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went early, around noon, and received a great tour by one of security. Eric C. took us through each area and explained safety procedures and what was offered in the Day Club. There were already a few people enjoying the pools. Everyone was really nice and it felt like a safe place for single women to go to. They have great security measures in place. The bathroom attendant was so nice to talk to. The night club area was really great to see. Definitely a place to go to if you are looking for a club to attend during the day. They have lockers for you to use and some of the cabanas have private safes to keep your belongings. There wasn't a DJ when we were there,  but they do have them later.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICfvPGEoQE&fid=0x0:0xd2979bf3140876cf"],"When":"2024-12-27"},{"Name":"abhishek kottur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUxB2MrLotcHOYuOfh-KLeBLyPXgcmbOFVwCr0M0kOFMDG1lk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to the Marquee pool party in November with a couple of friends, and it was so much fun! We got a table and had a great time. There‚Äôs a pool outside, and the party had a huge crowd with an amazing DJ sound system. The atmosphere was incredible, and the crowd was great. I‚Äôd say it‚Äôs the best club for a pool party. Even though it was really cold, we still had a blast! Martin Garrix was the DJ, and he was just amazing","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDA3-aMvQE&fid=0x0:0xd2979bf3140876cf"],"When":"2025-2-12"},{"Name":"Chris Bellard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTMCO_S6CrBz6_bGSFjFEXLgUXFWDgQ2wEzwPpujzcvQc79fXkrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Nice place but, like everywhere else in Vegas they want to bleed your wallet dry!  When we arrived they asked what type of card I‚Äôd be using and I told them all I have is Capital One debit and credit cards.  The host informed me that they don‚Äôt take any form of Capital One payments so I figured we may have to leave.  Thankfully they were able to change our fees to our hotel room.  Once inside we noticed that bottled water is $13, bottles of beer are $14, pitchers of cocktails were $120, and they tacked on a 14% admin fee (whatever that is).   Also this place closes at 6 but they‚Äôll turn the music down and basically tell you to leave at 5.  Wet Republic has a much better and cleaner pool, better drinks, better djs, and provides a much better atmosphere.
Our server Maquel, was very friendly and attentive to our needs so that is a plus for them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICX-YDEQg&fid=0x0:0xd2979bf3140876cf"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Anastasiya Martinez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4r8X7kpiOJ6y_CpYoKSligradw0Vg-zJo_YgPnbm1imOgKw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I want to begin by saying that the pool was good. The bigger one is colder and the shallow one is warmer. The only thing is there were lots of empty cups floating around

The service was the worst I‚Äôve ever experienced. We had to wait 1.5 hrs for the food and when they finally brought food it wasn‚Äôt ours.

We ordered the water special which was 6 bottles for $20 but instead brought us 4 and charged $52. When asked to correct the charge, they only gave us 2 extra waters but would not correct the overcharge of $30.
The servers were nice but they did not check up on us even though it wasn‚Äôt busy

They do not accept Capital One cards, which is disappointing and wild because it‚Äôs one of the most popular credit cards out there

It was scorching hot and a windy day so they were not able to open umbrellas because of the wind. They may want to invest in some other form of providing shade because it was miserable to sit on the pleather couches.

Overall would not recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD_NWH2ZUK4mCbVKK-h4m-T&fid=0x0:0xd2979bf3140876cf"],"When":"2025-7-5"},{"Name":"Steve Bintley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUz91tVXj2WT6I7ulfH4Gp5APOIk3cPC3KNiD2RZ0AT-lIBXQFCDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Spending an afternoon at the day club here was perhaps the most enjoyable experience in the city we had. Purchasing tickets in advance online made us think the entrance process would be more seamless and unfortunately that couldn‚Äôt be further from the truth. Different staff members repeatedly sent us to different areas, but when finally in the right zone it was still almost an hour‚Äôs queue to get inside around 1pm. Totally worth the wait though and the atmosphere and vibe within the club was superb throughout.

It was exceptionally hot on the day of our visit but don‚Äôt let that put you off - all of the inside club area is accessible and where the main bar is located, with plenty of seating and complimentary bottled water available. Outside might not have many shady areas but reaching refuge is a breeze. The whole crowd was friendly and there‚Äôs plenty of security overlooking the busy pool and elsewhere.

Service at the main bar wasn‚Äôt too bad considering the crowds but still prepare to wait, so getting a larger round in is better than individual drinks. But be prepared for the prices - this is certainly not somewhere to come if you‚Äôre on a tight budget!

The day time party finishes at 6pm, just after the sun retreats behind the skyscraper opposite, but the five hours we were there offered a fantastic fun time and we all left wanting to return the following day. If you‚Äôre after such a party then I can highly recommend here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICunJ2wrwE&fid=0x0:0xd2979bf3140876cf"],"When":"2022-7-23"},{"Name":"Nisarg Dave","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU03R9ciyV8PPsi0wraePRoDs3uMM6AkO9DdS5MVeL3MaF81h4W4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Main pool water was pretty dirty/hazy! Can‚Äôt see the pool floor clearly; hence didn‚Äôt dare getting into the pool even when the temperature was 97F!
Overall decent music and the bar prices are same as other similar clubs on the strip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEO7P6pSZnqiNvAE&fid=0x0:0xd2979bf3140876cf"],"When":"2025-5-17"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Khalid Sh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLDHn77TELx3pLwL1n-Didb_QL2Pkbhg06oOz-OTDoSW0nM3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"TAO Beach absolutely delivers on every level. The service was top-tier ‚Äî attentive, friendly, and professional from start to finish. The crowd perfectly matches the upscale vibe of the venue, creating an atmosphere that‚Äôs both lively and classy.

The cocktails were fantastic ‚Äî well-crafted, flavorful, and worth every penny. Everything from the music to the energy made it feel like a true luxury beach experience.

After visiting other beach clubs, TAO Beach clearly stands out as the place that gets it right ‚Äî quality, service, and vibe all in one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAn8FN0_hd0maye2JGGa_7B&fid=0x0:0x51db2da38248cc75"],"When":"2025-10-12"},{"Name":"Stars892","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdBrZJ8Iv9cErhHJd_C8qBiZsMJiAg5yfVreCQDcVDOd4zDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tao Beach had an amazing vibe, great music, and a beautiful crowd definitely one of the hotter spots in Vegas (literally and figuratively). However, I was shocked to pay $75 for a single cocktail (mule). I know dayclub prices are steep, but that felt excessive. Also, there was almost no shade, which made the 110¬∞ heat pretty brutal, and the pools were so packed it was hard to even cool off. Great energy overall, but be ready to spend big and sweat it out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDixDPQnDFgr9zn7xLOFack&fid=0x0:0x51db2da38248cc75"],"When":"2025-7-15"},{"Name":"Vel Gayevskiy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7kAVvb2Hdc94DnAcD_DrWhmWPHY2G00n2J-Xl09KMiJvMWHMC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got in to see Tiesto for free by arriving at 10:30am and waiting until 3pm chilling in the pool. Drinks are insanely expensive ($15 Red Bulls), but I consider it the ticket price. It was quite crowded but what do you expect for free entry. Great way to see amazing artists in a more chill environment than a club or festival. Would go again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDOLFhfZYV2869k7YjmHzpg&fid=0x0:0x51db2da38248cc75"],"When":"2025-7-6"},{"Name":"Isabella Rigamonti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-XBeH13yWkYk7-DPCyWx1M5rtUucDpPYqQOMt0Ra-KwCOjXP1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Extremely expensive place but a great time for a pool party!

We went to see Zedd and got a cabana, which was suuuper expensive and we weren‚Äôt even in the VIP side.

If you‚Äôre not American and forget that tip culture is a big thing: remember there will always be an automatic 20% charge on top of what you already paid to reserve, so you might just end up paying another 600$ on top of your booking (of around 5k). Europeans be ware üòÖ

I guess if you like the music and wanna spend money in Vegas for one particular day party, it‚Äôs a good one!

If you don‚Äôt end up getting a cabana and enter with the 50$ ticket per person, be aware there is almost no shade around the pool and booth for the whole day and the pool gets suuuuper full very early!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCiNjq3Z3g_2Z9ekfVAlzEJ&fid=0x0:0x51db2da38248cc75"],"When":"2025-7-14"},{"Name":"Michael Alsop","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8-KPH5cNZ24UkDvjJku0Ng821nGKakGNKObn0ZjNg7gkjGQ0N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Obviously, your experience here will completely depend on the day you visit, and what your willing to spend. Spend the extra money, and get a day bed. It was $360 with tax, fees and gratuity, but you get $250 to spend on drinks and food. Really that ends up being $110 to lay around like a king all day, and enjoy the incredible atmosphere.  Honestly, 250 was hard to spend. We were just giving away food and drinks at the end to new friends we had met. Also, we where here on a Thursday, which is more of a enjoy the atmosphere, and relax day. If you go on a day with a big DJ than it's gonna be sholder to sholder, and more of a party type atmosphere.  Just make sure you go on a day that best suits you. Also, the food was fantastic.  The fortune cookie was perfect.  Filled with chocolate moose and boston cream, it's not overpoweringly sweet. It was wonderful.  The tacos, and quesadilla were ridiculous! Also, the cocktail servers are incredible.  Definitely a place where I had to pinch myself a few times to make sure that I wasn't dreaming. DJ Party day= BLAST. Chill weekday = Blast!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCnGENkemsJwxCrsHZVowo8&fid=0x0:0x51db2da38248cc75"],"When":"2025-7-11"},{"Name":"Divabella C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlgvhiOyewVneKyZBM4sGCZJpSGc2N3NTImi1XLSekHl2mD_4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had a fun time. The pool wasn't overly crowded, and ladies drank for free for an hour on Sunday. Make sure you DON'T pay to get in. Hit up one of the promoters you see walking through the halls at The Venetian. They try to get you to go to all these pool parties at different hotels and will put your name on the list. It's free, not a scam. The promoters get paid based on the amount of people they're able to bring in, and these places want you to come to their pools in hopes of you paying outlandish prices for their drinks, and you will, because they don't even bother to let you bring in your own WATER. Overall, fun time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCYNBnGpKiUNO19WmRZlIXa&fid=0x0:0x51db2da38248cc75"],"When":"2025-7-31"},{"Name":"MaMa_MiA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUx0PIXyk2abk-OY-Ke9HwwJuHoRPrGF1WO0OEvu3dfjonOaAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Good music and vibe. Came here with a group of 10 on a Sunday afternoon. Super pricey with everything, pool was overcrowded...but probably cuz of the event with Flo Rida. Getting in was smooth, and it was a good time. You definitely have to spend money for some shade (booths, cabanas, terrace, etc.), or you can bring a hat or be close to the stage and DJ.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCZCecA1yhiPX2Ix39I8Elt&fid=0x0:0x51db2da38248cc75"],"When":"2025-7-30"},{"Name":"Vishal Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKT4qgI-m448y81SKnXdXHNnuVadY-bSqLGkGXP6xmOvoo69A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time attending a pool party ‚Äî and that too in Vegas, at Tao (Venetian)! I had a great experience. Ti√´sto was DJing, and the crowd was going wild, dancing and drinking. It‚Äôs a great spot for party lovers. Drinks were a bit pricey, but overall, this place truly captures the Vegas vibe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEJDn0IeQ1pyxuwE&fid=0x0:0x51db2da38248cc75"],"When":"2025-6-10"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Melissa Beckham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKx8BybjSAYw4mu4SEZRiYXLatyh-pBoFm896_n485_kZTkug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ok but azzy is actually the sweetest person ever üò≠
She was always smiling and laughing and just had the best energy the whole time. Like you could tell she was genuinely happy and nice, not fake at all. It honestly made the night way more fun.

She checked on us a lot, remembered our drinks, and was just really chill and friendly. Total good vibes. You can tell she‚Äôs just a really sweet human.
She‚Äôs awesome!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Darlene","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfUW7mbDNHgoK-ehU0i1AZ5dT9thAW2oG0frZWZza5Dq_veLRYDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an awesome experience at Peppermint Hippo, and a huge part of that was thanks to Azneth. She‚Äôs hands-down one of the best cocktail servers I‚Äôve ever had anywhere, not just a strip club. Super friendly, great energy, and somehow always appeared right when a drink was needed‚Äîlike magic, but with better timing üòÑ

She made the whole night feel effortless and fun, kept the vibes high, and genuinely seemed to care that everyone at the table was having a great time. Drinks were on point, service was fast, and her attitude was nothing but positive and professional the entire night.

If you‚Äôre at Peppermint Hippo, do yourself a favor and ask for Azneth. She‚Äôs awesome and absolutely elevates the whole experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lavish Licia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUN0_rC3r5l0i7UmzezGpRosIGy0YWxncLzwIfiWvFN0epCBrc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great time here with their private show upstairs! Kassandra was an excellent server who treated us very well! I‚Äôve been here before but will definitely come back ‚ù§Ô∏è","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBmR8dBdBXX3hnID-_FJ5E-&fid=0x0:0x1cb464b9c6c051d2"],"When":"2025-12-10"},{"Name":"Tabari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZGbTvE0CDIKN4X8x5Fo1QGldEl7DJkSd59TMfAq3y7m4gtA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Azeneth is the best bottle server I‚Äôve ever had. She gave us amazing service all night very attentive, professional, and always smiling. She was genuinely nice and sweet, and made sure we had everything we needed. She really made our night better. Highly recommended.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rahul Dev Mahanta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTbDeLTYRnmgLeBX-CEoFMk7EcqA_e7UDCcGvOj5Hwy9hGDAwf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was simply an amazing experience! Especially Leslie, she is a gem!
My first time to Peppermint Hippo, and I am sure to come back on my next Vegas trip. The girls were very nice and of course, beautiful! And a shout out to Candy and Coco for making the experience even more special!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nikko Cuevas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJqeaozoadqSr-Ne80asV9yUt3JbsYOe6b5cV6iuTYv0VFXw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Azeneth is honestly the best bottle service girl I‚Äôve ever had, period. The way she treats you, checks in, and makes sure you‚Äôre good the whole night is on another level. It‚Äôs real hospitality, not forced, not fake  she actually cares.

She turns a regular night into a great one without even trying. I honestly wish everywhere I went had an Azeneth. Vegas has a lot of people in this industry, but she really stands out.

If you‚Äôre at Peppermint Hippo, ask for her. You‚Äôll see exactly what I‚Äôm talking about.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Morgan Mullinax","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_mmjjnylXRbyKUvgwx99rwYWrcnAGo06if002e5IoBIvT1qSl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved our server Audrey! She was so great! Very efficient and friendly! She made sure our first time experience here was great! Definitely will have to come back here next time we are in town! Audrey is the best!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cobey Dumbravo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIM-Gn2xMoC2jHd6gR-KOnRblKemObWc11qFmuPKvyqTrJB0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mayia was my bartender.. what a sweetheart.. She‚Äôs was really attentive and always there when we were ready for another. She was more engaging than most of the girls that danced. Will definitely visit her again!","Images":null,"When":""}]

column5: 3799 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
column18: Bustling, sprawling dayclub offering multiple pools, top dance DJs, cabanas, daybeds & lounge.

column32:
[{"Name":"Nicole Elkhatib","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxEjANnuHTaWkNnBEHhKN_MuFS_MEv3YacV2KwSyECIW0AuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I really liked the set up, I like the cabana we were in. It was really comfortable. However, we honestly spent most of our time in the cabana because we went for Chris Lake and it was only his music that was good like the music leading up to Chris Lake was so boring and it honestly felt like it was meant for old people who were trying to have fun Which is OK, but it definitely is not for a younger crowd. I don‚Äôt like also that even when you have a cabana, you have to pay for a tiny little water bottle and it‚Äôs so expensive for no reason it‚Äôs just water. There is a water fountain in the back, but it took a little bit for them to tell us that which is OK I guess. Overall the staff was really nice, the venue itself was really nice, the food was really good too. I would come back, but they need to find a better DJ that plays before the main set.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCrnZ-Q8bcav3pMIi_gZChS&fid=0x0:0x3f7f7cccc5909f0"],"When":"2025-10-12"},{"Name":"Liann Amagan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXO40HRuuM_E9btxFD4_1E5SUUvCyojdDb_hNIluB_k3nhuX-wcFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Palm Tree Beach Club is the old Wet Republic at MGM. If you‚Äôre getting dropped off or picked up from rideshare best to just put Top Golf so you don‚Äôt have to walk through the casino. We always really enjoy our time at this day club. The service is great, the DJs are usually really good, they have a pretty big pool and stage and if you have a table or cabana you have access to your own pools which feels so much cleaner. Drinks at all day clubs are expensive. There are lockers here and when we get a table we also order food. It‚Äôs fairly safe here, security can be tight and they will kick out people clearly drunk. I‚Äôve gotten my flip flops stolen from here so try to bring a not common pair or get a locker or table. We‚Äôve seen Zedd, Kaskade, Steve Aoki, Chris Lake, DJ Oro over the last couple of years.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC-4mNJEvyW1Zpmx3kpHveR&fid=0x0:0x3f7f7cccc5909f0"],"When":"2025-9-30"},{"Name":"diana jimena melendez rosales","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnvF0Ry2C3teR-Y_WHnhhMt9Tz-HKfMzkbvLemLw5d2Dgs9YvNMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I went to see Martin Garrix in June and honestly, I had a blast. The music, the drinks, and the atmosphere were all great. But if you don't rent a place and just buy a general ticket, I recommend renting a locker because there's nowhere to put your things, and if you leave them around the pool, someone will come and tell you to move them.
Like everywhere else in Vegas, drinks inside are expensive, but they're well-made.
I would definitely go back on my next trip to Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA1S3fe1h67wnGBiIXCvo4X&fid=0x0:0x3f7f7cccc5909f0"],"When":"2025-12-2"},{"Name":"astrida mcfarland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdTe300IQFfKs5bIuXfiS01FioQsJDXRPYubRrpgpLlaubiWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is the place to be if you are in Vegas and want to find day fun!  Step into the ultimate Las Vegas daylife experience at the exclusive and luxurious Palm Tree Beach Club at the MGM Grand, where there are exhilarating Top 40 beats, top-tier DJs (Alesso DJ is on today), and a stage for guest artists.  This dayclub redefines luxury with private cabanas, and an exciting poolside atmosphere with hot men and women looking to meet others.

There is a bar where you can get all the drinks and food that you want. The service is good, friendly and pretty quick considering the number of guests in the pool.  It is a cool place and you will definitely have a good time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhClPlPFthLs6gOHDH8bvWFO&fid=0x0:0x3f7f7cccc5909f0"],"When":"2025-8-31"},{"Name":"Kara K.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJrpRJVAmcb0wUStAyzP1TFg10NGiiS35X1_JVoFrWbhUQpxA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I found it difficult to find information about this place online as it recently reopened under the new name. I was trying to research beforehand to see the best way to ‚Äúdo it‚Äù. I bought general admission tickets for a girls trip to see the kygo set on July 5th. I was disappointed when I got there to see they were also handing out free GA tickets to anyone in the casino that was just walking around. So wasted a little bit of money there but it wasn‚Äôt much. Entering at noon was easy and the pool wasn‚Äôt busy. We were easily able to get a drink at the bar and get a towel from security. You have to get there early if you are GA to get a spot at the poolside as there is NOWHERE for ga to sit. So you‚Äôre either in the pool or sitting on the edge (if you‚Äôre lucky). If I were to do it again I would have paid the $500 for a beach chair. The music quality was good, there is a very small dancing space in front of the dj booth which could be bigger. I think they need more personal item storage options as the whole edge of the pool is people‚Äôs purses, clothing, shoes, phones etc. it looks sloppy and nothing is secure. They do have lockers but they‚Äôre first come first serve. If you go, bring your phone, credit card in a waterproof bag and leave the rest behind. Mixed drinks were $68 and beers were $16, bartenders were not friendly and were in no rush to serve you. At 2pm the line to get a drink took over 20 minutes to get a single beer. They need a better, more mobile checkout option. The credit card readers are stationary and seemed to be slowing down the already slow bar tenders. We ended the afternoon in a cabana which was nice. If you have the disposable income, def go that route just so you have a better view and smaller shared pool. I would return for another concert but do it differently.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDZMa707GsBJBSWHpw6oWaL&fid=0x0:0x3f7f7cccc5909f0"],"When":"2025-7-7"},{"Name":"Carolyn McCabe-Joy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqPTlZihuRjQ1vP6ZKLEDaVObfHDq7HByWw0zT8-L6c2eUeoRNOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was so fun!! The food was great and the drinks were fabulous! If you visit #Vegas, check out Palm Tree Beach Club. It's part of the Tao Group. We had a cabana and having your own pool, so convenient and offers a great place to chill out. Friendly service and will go again!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEPOf1623neqyKg&fid=0x0:0x3f7f7cccc5909f0"],"When":"2025-5-14"},{"Name":"sonali medani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJm7y90j-qYqRj51HOFWDGuhG4AAp_lUzke2ms4GcWtai2o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"0/5 !!!!

Our group of 7 was kicked out of Palm Tree Beach Club just because one person was a little drunk ( it was her bachelorette). The security team was aggressive and unprofessional ‚Äî they pushed us out, forced their way into the ladies‚Äô restroom, and didn‚Äôt let us collect our belongings. We lost expensive clothes, goggles, and footwear, and despite visiting multiple times, nothing showed up in lost and found. Staff just kept redirecting us to each other with no help at all. Completely unacceptable ‚Äî Tao Group needs to fix their security and guest-handling standards immediately.

Shamelessly the guards posed for the picture ‚Ä¶ I have raised a complaint and I hope management takes strong action and they stop harassing women","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB8jfFMDTz2LfE15JgyP0Jf&fid=0x0:0x3f7f7cccc5909f0"],"When":"2025-10-6"},{"Name":"Rob Grosvenor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCvsBICt0zM-6EBwC53xmLKWfwMk7mqyrppVkCcXX_k4iy3D4NOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"If you go here, you'd better have plenty of sunscreen! There's little too NO shade, unless you drop big money and rent a seating area. Starting at $700, and even these places have the smallest umbrellas that give you minimal shade.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCJtYstTRkHX0Qh3On8HPKI&fid=0x0:0x3f7f7cccc5909f0"],"When":"2025-7-6"}]

column5: 3131 Las Vegas Blvd S, Las Vegas, NV 89109
column18: Lavish, gold-accented dance club in Encore featuring dance floor, poolside patio & headliner DJs.

column32:
[{"Name":"Dave K 288","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLn-ta5OoyTI5oekJB1qCEwcknXqvttjcg-9ROe4hxPyV_Uew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Fire hazard and absolutely dangerous. We went to see Marshmello at 1030. We were in the club by 1045 and stood next to a pillar. At 1240 Marshmello had still not made an appearance and the security guy ( who had been standing next to us for the last 2 hours) started being an absolute jerk and told us we needed to move immediately as we were blocking the aisle. I told him we'd been standing next to him for the last 2 hours and not blocking it so what had changed. He said it was hazardous standing there and everyone needed to move.  We moved, someone immediately took our place and the security guard just walked away.

When I say it was literally the most crowded place I've ever been in my life I'm not exaggerating! If there had been an emergency people would have been trampled. Mark my words, this is absolutely not a safe venue with how they manage it.

We eventually left the club without seeing Marshmello because we literally could not find a place to stand without being harassed by another security person or body checked by the bottle service girls charging through. What started as an exciting opportunity to see a great artistended in huge disappointment!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDDaGSy41eUNwUmYo9GgiX-&fid=0x0:0xf628131a7ed6deaa"],"When":"2026-2-1"},{"Name":"Uri Teva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHmxLT_5t94zrhtqyebLOMNl0bEynXHV76H6BILTQa7xb1nXQc1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited XS Nightclub for the AWS re:Invent 2025 EMEA party, and the venue absolutely lived up to the hype. The atmosphere at the Wynn is unmatched‚Äîluxurious, open, and perfect for a large-scale event.

Highlights:

Entertainment: We were treated to a live performance by Sophie Ellis-Bextor! Hearing her perform her major hits (especially "Murder on the Dancefloor") live was the highlight of the night. She had amazing energy.

Food & Drink: The food spread was fantastic‚Äîhigh quality and plenty of it. While I don't personally drink, I noticed there was a huge selection of top-tier alcohol available, and the service was fast and friendly for everyone.

Vibe: It was the perfect setting to network. I met so many great people from the tech community in a relaxed, fun environment.

If you have a chance to attend a corporate event or just visit XS for a night out, I highly recommend it.

Option 2: Professional & Networking Focused (Best for LinkedIn)
Title: A fantastic close to the day at AWS re:Invent 2025

Had a wonderful time connecting with colleagues and partners at the EMEA party hosted at XS Nightclub in the Wynn.

The venue was spectacular, but the real highlight was the networking. I met some truly inspiring people in the cloud space. The hospitality was top-notch with excellent food and service. To top it off, we enjoyed a live set by Sophie Ellis-Bextor, which brought a great energy to the evening.

Kudos to the organizers for a memorable night!

Option 3: Short & Punchy (Best for Instagram/Facebook/Twitter)
Caption: XS at the Wynn never disappoints! ‚ú® Had a blast at the AWS re:Invent EMEA party. The food was great, the venue is stunning, and the crowd was amazing.

The cherry on top? A live show by Sophie Ellis-Bextor playing all the hits! ü™© Even as a non-drinker, I had the best time soaking up the atmosphere and meeting great people. Can‚Äôt wait for next year! #AWSreInvent #XSlasvegas #SophieEllisBextor #LasVegas","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAOwnFvemkm6RH5bHTLyTbl&fid=0x0:0xf628131a7ed6deaa"],"When":"2025-12-6"},{"Name":"Andy Bratz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8XTM5Pw44GCcRHPsXKjDgv7V-wvWJJYyrCQjSW340YdjOylfF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here last October for the Chain Smokers, we had under the stars table and the service was great and so was the show. We  just came again on NYE for Rufus Du Sol....the show was INSANELY AWESOME! We had main room tickets and its was tight, standing room only and felt like we were rightbon top of the VIP tables but the show was so good it didnt matter. Wish there was a little more space to dance but it was definitely one I will remember for ever! Security is really good and bar service was too. I do wish they had a simple water station so you dont have to wait at the bar for a water. Props to the organizers, both shows were really really fun and we will make it a spot to come see shows again and again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBqDxbnrzF1Z6BrFmwFo0lE&fid=0x0:0xf628131a7ed6deaa"],"When":"2025-10-7"},{"Name":"Alaaddin Akkaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0Sn4Sth0BrWxpvfrpFZ_BzQCyaqaxglz1U1InDkxOxbIfCXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Top notch nightclub! Had good time. Sound quality was superb. Lights, DJ performanses, spotless clean bathrooms. Drinks servises. Excellent!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCXpyMFBLYc9nGRAc_WRJim&fid=0x0:0xf628131a7ed6deaa"],"When":"2025-12-31"},{"Name":"Melina Colalillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIR-kJCH1LNAMr8l4PkTnQzoCre_j-_tChNXMUqpP2Sg6Cygw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Absolutely disgusting .

We were attacked out of nowhere while dancing and instead of being protected, we were made to feel like we were the problem. Staff made it clear that self-defense is not permitted, that if someone puts their hands on you, you‚Äôre expected to stand there and allow it.

That is not crowd control.
That is not safety.

A venue of this size and reputation choosing policy over human safety is dangerous. The lack of concern, empathy, and basic responsibility was shocking. Guests are treated as disposable the moment something becomes inconvenient. They threw us out after we got attacked, then proceeded to kick us out our stay at the Wynn at 3am. Trust me, this place is not worth all the hype they claim to be. See your favourite artists anywhere else but here!!!

If you go here, understand this clearly: your safety is not their priority.
When it counts, they will not protect you. Also, their security locked us up and made several sexual comments to my girlfriend. This place is not worth it-go elsewhere.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"rodrigo jimenez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOg2ilPg_SA1Sr6lKnZQt-UU57qXH9MgQS7Z7sOf6K9APINvuH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to see Marshmello. Signed up for the guest list a few months before, then we got the open bar (tequila and vodka only, still fantastic) and the fun times were infinite. Amazing venue, pool looks alluring and the bartenders were very attentive. My wife was fanned (literally) by a very nice fellow, he even got us all the way to the front to see the DJ.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEP_bt6echPmFFA&fid=0x0:0xf628131a7ed6deaa"],"When":"2025-5-12"},{"Name":"Tina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaTCL6C_QMcFM_D4LjOloy86d5ujlUJij3CnoR7eQzi37uHaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing time here and the promoters guest list I was under Mike Oz was the best experience. I was invited to join an all ladies table which had complimentary bottle service. I didn‚Äôt have to pay for any cover fee and it was basically open bar from the time I entered for a limited selection of cocktails until 1230am. I really appreciated how the promoters took care of my group, which was a total of 2 ladies and 2 gentlemen. Also the washroom attendants in the ladies room were great, they sold items in the washroom in case you needed something and I got some fast flats as I wore high heels to the club. How to dress is more casual, but I would have probably worn dressy sandals instead if you like to dance and are not in a booth.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Noah Ramos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhNb8YWb-yG3LONKBqi_-o3yqHL3rP0DJ_74ZUwHfTvL5LTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great vibes in this smallish venue at the Wynn. Came to see Sofi Tukker and sound was great on a Friday. GA admission was no time whole VIP/tables had a line all the way down the hallway. Drinks were reasonable (15/seltzer, $28/mixed drinks). It gets crowded quickly when the headliner comes on, but crowd dispersed quickly and we got down right in front of the booth.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBaGYWD1IgHQUA_2Cf2aSrF&fid=0x0:0xf628131a7ed6deaa"],"When":"2025-7-1"}]

column5: 3025 S Sammy Davis Jr Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89109
column18: Massive gentlemen's club offering skyboxes, private rooms, numerous stages & pole-dancing classes.

column32: [{"Name":"Conrad Cougar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8tqL2-PE98yvvoEajrF1Dht0_IIqZOFQZPi3J6h0ycp259h2a=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They charge you for everything except the air you breathe.  They don‚Äôt even allow you to have separate checks for a table.  Right off the bat the dancers overwhelm you.  My friend and I got the tour of the area and the dancers immediately try to push expensive bottles on us which are unreasonably expensive.  The lowest price is $100 for a couple of dances.  One bouncer would not let my friend get his dances even though we were in a designated area.  Bathroom attendant tried to force my friend to give him a tip when he didn‚Äôt even spray soap in his hands or give paper towels.  Just tried to get a tip for nothing.  On top of that he tried to scam my friend with a scam QR code to leave the tip.  All I wanted was a glass of water and they charged me $13 for a bottle of water.  Our waitress wouldn‚Äôt split our transactions individually which is something that I have never seen before in any establishment.  They tried to charge a bunch of extra fees for anything.  Oh, and their free shuttle service?  They don‚Äôt take you back to your hotel after you‚Äôre done there.  Which is misleading because they said on their website free transportation to and from.  Dishonest pricing and business practices.  The only thing they don‚Äôt charge you for is breathing the air there.  Will never be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Angel P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWjzs-Qv9FsIcH2-u3S7Vh8AQN5FH6Jgq9NLpqPNhLkZ7PCnc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had such a good time New Years Eve! I went w my girlfriend and our friend from out of town. Everyone was so nice and professional! From the driver who picked us up from Fremont Street, to the doorman, to the coat check gal, to our beautiful server, to the bartenders and of course the gorgeous and sweet dancers! Very clean club and they take care of locals üòé Thanks for a fun night ladies! üéâ‚ú®Ô∏èü•Ç","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rudie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLSTPannmG7XcsBvsCdrLnw1bzoIj3lRJFhHgAGI-0LyXgrLg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I have been here years ago and was scammed for 7000$. They assign ladies per seat and they wont leave you alone. I agreed to a dance hoping i was going to be left alone after that. Initially the dance was 100$ but when you go to the back the dancer immediately starts asking for a bottle of champagne, which costs 400$. It is also policy to tip the bartender which was also 400$. They also take your creditcard and can charge whatever they want. The next day my card was charged for computer stuff and perfume. Be very careful if you go here!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John Jay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLkFLpeR9VKp8XncGa9YBvIlhrHM2_RLfiv6k7PPS4jx0UI9w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Super bad behavior. We walked in sat at a table, nobody told us it was bottle table. Bouncer comes up to us with an attitude saying we can‚Äôt sit, he could have said it nicely. Then as we were getting up, he is like your used tissue paper, again with attitude. Never had such bad hospitality anywhere in the world. Would not recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Crystal Baker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2j6pFXlXqzUBd2bWR7rJ1WVsOxwhFNNp-LB1T5pnslb4q-LvV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I visit Las Vegas every year for the last eight years and always visit the Sapphire, where we've consistently had excellent experiences. The recent remodel looks great with an easier flow to the setting. Sabrina and Tommy are fantastic, I can always count on outstanding service from them, from arranging pickup to VIP booths and bottle service girls; the selection of girls is unlimited and there are always options for our preference. We‚Äôll keep choosing Sapphire for our trips when we come in town. See you next time‚Ä¶üòò","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shanna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXULgG7SM95zPMwQ9QNFxBaJ3WX8oM1J5d7yFVfhTfONM0AXCwR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sapphire Las Vegas was the highlight of our night! Everything was top-tier from the music, the vibe, and the service. Elina, our server was exceptional, professional, engaging, and went above and beyond to make the night memorable. Her warm friendly personality made all the difference. Can‚Äôt wait to come back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"nagina amir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKZ9FEklIYShwb8yVEoWdx7QZMGy5NE3nWMSb4z-k3P1_QGTw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Charmane is so sweet and so attentive, having experienced plenty of upscale gentlemen‚Äôs clubs I always have high expectations in VIP and Charmane did not disappoint! I will be back and I hope I have her as a server again!!! 10/10","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michelle Schulman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPYzPJsYGhJZOVE4HAft6yE-QlbM1EYpbD48hxgeyVoH5aoCObAA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience at Sapphire. Super clean club, love that there's no cigarette or cigar smoke allowed inside. If you're a local, they'll make sure you're taken care of. Beautiful girls and great atmosphere. Jarvis was super courteous and helped us get a table right away.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Monica Aima","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU724H57EtnsmtapcDObqM4u58T0I3B8VXjA6EWZtjxE9Htc7ZoKA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an amazing experience with Mia ‚Ä¶ She is an incredible host, not even a single dull moment. She took care of all the guests and all venues were visited in a timely manner. I love how Mia gives a personal touch to the whole experience. Highly recommend Epic Club and the BEST host MIA üíïüíïüíï","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB9UI9GjaBomi50TlqY3cDx&fid=0x0:0xce8dc5d004c24165"],"When":"2025-10-26"},{"Name":"megan c","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFWPTHkOWyC9jQXJ6AKs-QbmhBJRr7a_RoBM1ZYy9Ieo8jm7Jj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything was wonderful. Meetup location was clear, hosts were very friendly, ambiance was perfect. Alcohol was poor quality but to be expected with anything that says ‚Äúfree drinks‚Äù Overall it was a fabulous night!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCn6D1AQxBHf2DzUyMOUfE8&fid=0x0:0xce8dc5d004c24165"],"When":"2025-11-1"},{"Name":"Lily Boyer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWl3WVvqlcfp0AAB8_oOeQ5XiqEzKFwMoz25Si0rfJQwDmq0t0r=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The people are amazing and the vibes are always great! Ive never been to Vegas before and it has been an absolute blast! I cant wait to come back and do it again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAedmOB1fKgX5OX7G3TwCoX&fid=0x0:0xce8dc5d004c24165"],"When":"2025-12-21"},{"Name":"AnnMarie Stagnitta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWHk6O5unPsO3UEQku17yPKuLxB-8IMJv6B89mI6r8cKeT4jhWQw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an incredible time on our Las Vegas pool crawl, and a huge part of that was thanks to our amazing hostess, Vanessa! From start to finish, she made the entire experience effortless and unforgettable.
We hit up Tao Beach Club and LIV, and both venues were absolutely next level ‚Äî amazing music, great crowds, and unbeatable vibes. Vanessa took care of everything, from entry to VIP service, and even gave us some awesome recommendations for where to go after the crawl.
She truly went above and beyond to make sure we were having fun and felt taken care of. Her energy was infectious, and she made us feel like VIPs the entire day.
If you're thinking about doing a pool crawl in Vegas ‚Äî do it, and ask for Vanessa! She's the best.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arantza Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJgPNa-iWf5T5EsY9ELOrkbFqcApwiQZJR6L7BbtS8UFfSEA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I booked a bar crawl on Fremont Street for November 1st, and it was nothing short of a disaster. We showed up early, following all the instructions, only to find that the host, Adrienne was nowhere in sight. Instead of being at the front to check us in she was tucked away in a back room, leaving us lost and frustrated. I had to call multiple people to finally get a hold of her.

To make matters worse, the timing was a joke. We were given inconsistent departure times, and the host kept pushing it back, making us wait around with no clear plan. At one point, she even seemed drunk, which made the whole situation even more chaotic. We were promised drinking games, but we got a single beer pong table and nothing more, far from what was advertised.

We were also promised free entry ‚Äúto up to 5 of the best venues on Fremont Street‚Äù and only went to 3. That was the final straw. The host ditched us at the third bar, leaving us stranded. When we finally reached out, she said ‚ÄúI‚Äôm done with you guys.‚Äù This is not only unprofessional but completely unacceptable. We paid money for this experience, and we deserved far better.

In short, this was the worst bar crawl I‚Äôve ever been on. I strongly urge others to think twice before booking with this company. We definitely deserve a refund or some form of compensation.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rachel Nichole","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8WGw3h2nEcQ8bQjotzsByXF-PyuLBF1RGwM38P54jCzop1A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came to Vegas with my friends for a bachelorette party and had the most amazing time on this bar crawl! Vanessa and Mel were such great hosts, and we had a truly unforgettable experience. Whenever I come back to Vegas, I‚Äôll definitely be doing this bar crawl again. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Devan Schef","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLb8E0TvfTPLHEz6FClCGcW0fqsH6UKYVbUgXdBUzM3j1rJWug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mia was the absolute best. The nicest person and led us through all of the bars. She made us feel like she was one of our close friends, we had such a great time","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"pastorchalise","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_jg_oEpAOd6QVFZ5S00OHulwmEOG048OwA4lgsyFpD4WNOw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sunday with Epic was epic! Mia was the best host ever!!! The Marquee DayClub and the party bus were worth every penny.  Life is about experiences and this was an amazing experience!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCo4uWS9wE&fid=0x0:0xce8dc5d004c24165"],"When":"2025-4-15"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Savannah Stroup","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtM1L30PzwUQOhXIeoFjekClspL5C_M2jHQQrPbhHFxyJ6iWuU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I highly recommend this club for a special occasion. We went here for my friend‚Äôs bachelorette party and had an amazing time. With your ticket price that secures a table for your group and beverage credit equals the price of your ticket which turns out to be a great deal with how expensive 1 drink is at most clubs. There are designated security guards for each section that introduced themselves to us upon arrival. Our waitress was friendly and attentive. The views and atmosphere is amazing. The music was great. I will continue to recommend it here for anyone looking to have a special celebration.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC2qJCpEQ&fid=0x0:0x443dc0f2e39c14f0"],"When":"2022-4-11"},{"Name":"Chris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9gTVV_qIqtOUOoGSp7o3rYz-wBk4ABuTheQveey2uQTsavBxv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Bought tickets to the 2020 NYE event and was disapointed. Ticket prices were about 170$ each. We showed up 45 minutes early which apparently wasnt enough because the line was already huge and we waited about an hour to get inside. The ticket price included open bar but was impossible to get to the actual bar once inside so we left the cool nightclub and went downstairs to the less crowded beer garden for the open bar. The only saving grace of this New Years Eve event is the view of the fireworks, and the fact that you dont have to deal with the 400,000 people on the strip. My advice, find a free or cheap alternative with a rooftop view for New Year Eve.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDMjYG2dw&fid=0x0:0x443dc0f2e39c14f0"],"When":"2020-1-7"},{"Name":"Maegan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFydcLhGs0CMlAyePlxNl6uviT_KcihSaV1lCp664LtTlDDFPgmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friends and I came here last weekend to celebrate a birthday. Since we had 8 people in our group, we chose to get a VIP table. The service was awesome! She made us all drinks and a round of shots with the bottle of Vodka we ordered. The vibe was very upbeat and chill. Exactly what we were looking for.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDs2d7WGA&fid=0x0:0x443dc0f2e39c14f0"],"When":"2020-3-8"},{"Name":"Paul Guthrie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlsRk-zeHKT30L6UO4mxU29VypgrAraRIc4xfYuTh0wHji3mQSqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I visited this club while at a conference. We had the whole club to ourselves as it was a private party. Great location and beautiful design as it's built into the base of the Eiffel Tower in the Paris hotel. You have to take an elevator in and out of the hotel so that can slow you down. Food and drink were high quality but no Canadian Whiskey :(","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDE6PXLzgE&fid=0x0:0x443dc0f2e39c14f0"],"When":"2017-4-27"},{"Name":"Sam S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0LQgrU3sM_9QCtnLUTJqEYtd2Vd9Zk7vmMab5iF8kYi1vci4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The club itself is interesting as it is set under the Eiffel tower. The view from up there is pretty good as well.

The biggest issue was getting through the door. The cover charge is $30 a person. However, if you walk out onto the strip you can easily get passes to get you in for a much cheaper rate. After about 30 seconds of walking I was able to get $20 coupon for myself, with another one for ladies to get in free. This brought the cover charge down to just $20 for 2. After we got our IDs checked by the first bouncer, we then got to the cover charge counter and paid our $20 fee. Then, we got to the third bouncer who wouldn't allow us in because we had a bag with us. They did not seem to have anything coordinated between themselves, and the 3rd bouncer said the cover charge counter could hold a bag for us, but they refused. They definitely need to get their stuff together, because if I had paid $60 just to find out I can't get through the door there would have been a serious problem. I hope the owner of the establishment reads this review, because the bouncing staff is very inefficient. There will be issues if this ever happens again.

After finally stowing our bags back at our hotel, we were able to get into the club. The people shuttling us through the elevators were very polite.

Drinks were very, very expensive. But I suspect this is typical for all clubs on the strip.

TL;DR: find discounted entry cards on the strip. The bouncers absolutely need to get their game together.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICk7vP-IA&fid=0x0:0x443dc0f2e39c14f0"],"When":"2019-4-14"},{"Name":"Robert Atlas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNj2tROCepEhmV98nQvMTSJE_GJLXc4CNOuunfZc4jcFsS-YCMKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a great time at the chateau on the strip. The view of the water show and the strip is awesome. The DJ was really cool! Great atmosphere and drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICkwo-jtQE&fid=0x0:0x443dc0f2e39c14f0"],"When":"2019-2-2"},{"Name":"Chris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUK3Me6d0wDV3GCAz9MsgvasU4rFYPIJwBLXOotyTPws5fDPZHZRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Cool location for a club: right under the chibi Eiffel Tower at Paris.  Club itself has kind of a weird layout.  There's plenty of room to dance and hang out.  Place feels a bit spartan and concrete-y.  Bar is a bit slow.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDEt5WxEg&fid=0x0:0x443dc0f2e39c14f0"],"When":"2017-6-14"},{"Name":"Rae Marie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV64ZuEm56UIx15_sZe4h5cBpVUUBs4uyy6t41y83OxXUd2Y1ow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is fabulous!  Not only were the staff completely prepared they were friendly and full of information.  We felt like VIPs the entire night, the dj was amazing, music lit, everyone was vibing and the drinks were always full! Gotta make reservations and it fills up fast! A definite must for night life!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDetdCmlAE&fid=0x0:0x443dc0f2e39c14f0"],"When":"2022-10-15"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Tony Tino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVhWunAgW9UdNTAc6NoCD8zfwnHgjM_7Hs5_EPFWvSnhVaKA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Front door & cashiers were very nice & helpful. The girls are beautiful, the hookah & drinks were flowing all night!! We had so much fun & will def be returning on our next trip!! Thank you LVSC üëèüèæ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCAx8QLt34nB8CJ6pKfYGib&fid=0x0:0x7825b2a0b1f97081"],"When":"2025-8-29"},{"Name":"Jessica Cot√©","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpfwOojqGFosKiBkazFH7jDHPO5MlIKpNnWr09p75VGuT5Zw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went in last weekend and had the best experience I‚Äôve had in a strip club in a LONG time! Paul gave us the best hospitality we‚Äôve received in Vegas downstairs then we had a blast with ‚ÄúLola‚Äù in VIP. I was expecting better stage performances from a Vegas club but the staff more than made up for the lack of stage entertainment!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Devon Edwards","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJemUCv4zqiF_uGCEKr0Zd_qZF5_zxs-SsLhy8ItTsMGuFxIA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Paul does a great job as a host. He keeps the energy up, makes everyone feel comfortable, and knows how to keep things running smoothly without it feeling forced. You can tell he‚Äôs experienced and good at reading the room.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"DUSTIN DAPKUS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRqVqniL790PwbXNxxi0he08D0s6KFCblY8Gz4bNrlZK3nOg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love to just go in and sit at the bar.
Drinks are well poured and never have to ask for the next. Bre is amazing!!! She even remembered my name and my drink.
She has a kind and thoughtful way of doing that. Girls are nice and not pushy. All the fun if you want is upstairs. Best up and coming club in LV and try it out.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"E S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlMBkoHH313SvGHpAGuKq0RraIT0ZPrZ9krenX6JS6vXhYcw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This review was from my experience on a Monday 9/29/25 @ 8pm. The club was clean and the people there were awesome. From the guy at the door, the lady charging my cover charge, the guys behind the bar and the  dancers were super cool and friendly.

As an average middle class working stiff don‚Äôt come here with $400-$500 and think this will go far (not meant in a solicitation way). Now with that being said I don‚Äôt know if the costs that I am going to list out are industry standard but I have been to other places in the past yearmand it wasn‚Äôt this expensive. The foot traffic has definitely decreased coming from pretty much everyone I spoke to who works/lives here so I get it when everyone is clawing for dollars.

One Uber driver said LVSC is like going to a local burger joint and paying high end steakhouse prices. However, I have learned that these drivers are affiliated with these clubs so they have a vested interest to promote or steer to you certain clubs‚Ä¶ it truly felt that way.

If you Uber the cover is $50. They offer pick up service for free cover but not sure what you have to pay for as a package so that might be better off. I got Coors Light which was $12. The dancers are are nice but VERY persistent immediately going for privet dances. They start off at $200 for 15 min and like every place it goes up from there. But it was all the extra surcharges that were listed off. You have to pay to rent the room or space and some rooms you have to pay for a bottle and depending on what bottle you want there is another additional charge. It seemed the extra charges kept to get going and going.

It wasn‚Äôt until I declined the private dances (multiple times) they offered me a dance for one song $40. Be careful‚Ä¶. I didn‚Äôt get the feeling the dancer I had was going to tell me when the song is over. And again I get it everyone is trying to get their bag but Vegas as a hole is pricing out the middle class. Anyways do with that what you will. I am sure I will get called cheap or broke with the tag ‚Äútell me you don‚Äôt have money without telling me you don‚Äôt have money‚Äù. Lol","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James Cook","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLaZwAWytoWdPDQbOJW44GVjsIMrvSj7_-aFiq4ma_LPI5y2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had no idea what to expect when we came in, just expected to walk around and figure it out as we went but Paul took care of everything, didn‚Äôt have to worry about a thing and my entire group enjoyed every second. This guy has us recs for where to gamble, what restaurants to try, and invited us to come back again and no joke I‚Äôll definitely be hitting him up next time I‚Äôm in town. Dudes a machine and made what was already an experience even better","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Savanna Sweet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBmfdJidshQ9tHgVhxD3B2qQFHddd8jVAHEiRSIKt_zWIgsw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time at Las Vegas Strip Club | LVSC and whew üòèüî• Paul was a GREAT host! Super confident, super welcoming, and made us feel instantly comfortable. Me and my girls had an amazing night, the vibes were HOT, and the energy was nonstop. 10/10 experience, we‚Äôre definitely coming back  üíÉ","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Whit Hall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKef3Noy9t3SQ96EYL7V10yUi6pTfu4lYmwD-VFw-xJlxv1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"honestly very upset over whoever you have doing the promotion on the strip  to get you here, we were promised that the limo driver would come pick us up if we gave him a big enough tip so we got extra money out for him from the ATM and the he stopped responding to us when we were ready to go. then we were told girls got in free but 10$ for guys and that was a lie. felt like there wasn‚Äôt much dancing going on and it felt like all the girls were just sitting around drinking. highly don‚Äôt recommend","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Will Breaux","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVrBNEI7u_ytiZQY0ZvgT4R-2uSJ_Yt6MXj1cV1iQbAzpX_t56=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Liv is one of the premiere night clubs in Las Vegas. Full of life!! Always a good time and a bang bang for your buck. Constant headliners every week!! Thumbs up if you are looking for a good time!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDW8I7TT-nP_sP5PSTUari7&fid=0x0:0xd41db18153666036"],"When":"2025-12-31"},{"Name":"iamAapri G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyhveEuMaVLK2uR7kQnrE2HMLgFHUXJXSaNBSjLydYu-wN3pZJjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Enjoyed myself. I liked that the security doesnt bother you when you stop to look around like Drais I used to hate going there because of that. Had the perfect song playing on my entrance when I finally got in.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDupXwTGqYuWt-0L0FCvbPR&fid=0x0:0xd41db18153666036"],"When":"2026-1-23"},{"Name":"Flavia Grill√≥n","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4m_SFx-d89RplO7Fzd3fCG5QyMZVF51iSyzvWxo-fNrdAg6V8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I had a bad experience at LIV Las Vegas. The staff was rude, yelling at people for no reason, and treating everyone poorly. I always wanted to go, but after this visit I wouldn‚Äôt return even for free.
We arrived early and still waited almost two hours. If you‚Äôre going in on the guest list, don‚Äôt do it. They treat you like you don‚Äôt belong there. You can‚Äôt sit or stand anywhere without someone shining a flashlight in your face and telling you to move. And dancing on the huge dance floor is impossible because they escort you out.
There was one security guard in particular ‚Äî a big Black man ‚Äî who made everything worse. His attitude was aggressive and intimidating. Wherever I moved, he showed up to yell or push people around. It got to the point where I felt uncomfortable even existing in the space.
They pack the place with too many people and then yell at everyone because there‚Äôs no room to move. My friends and I stayed only for the DJ, but we couldn‚Äôt dance or enjoy anything because staff kept bothering us.
We were so frustrated that we didn‚Äôt spend a single dollar on drinks. They don‚Äôt deserve anyone‚Äôs money with that attitude.
The music and lights were great, but the horrible treatment ruined the night. I‚Äôm disappointed and won‚Äôt be coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCVHpsF4yp3Cn5Dj9JWUYUL&fid=0x0:0xd41db18153666036"],"When":"2025-11-16"},{"Name":"Luz Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIVdDT5W331MpeDA_L-uheS-QxTSlthmKSJ_hfnSgBx-GdRceLlg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"SO FUN! ü§©üéßüé§üìÄ

We stayed at Fontainebleau Las Vegas for New Year‚Äôs Eve and celebrated at LIV Nightclub‚Äîit was spectacular! We saw Ti√´sto, and the atmosphere was amazing.

A big plus of staying at the hotel is that guests get priority entry‚Äîno waiting in line! It‚Äôs also super convenient to walk straight to your room after the party.

The club is new, beautiful, and not overly crowded, making it a great experience. The music was incredible. 100% recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDgvdfgHA&fid=0x0:0xd41db18153666036"],"When":"2025-2-26"},{"Name":"Aaron LeDuc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDXL_eJuDfwo8ksQqYIyFtulshSS_yKIKzDQMX0WyXxtP3CHDefg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tiesto was amazing! LIV Nightclub is awesome with great views, sound, and lighting. My wife and I watching the DJs on the decks from the balcony. It felt like Tiesto was right there. What an experience, can't wait to comeback.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAtAJMck8M8S1pETuTNBJp0&fid=0x0:0xd41db18153666036"],"When":"2025-11-25"},{"Name":"Juan Pablo Serna L√≥pez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRHeckN06XGfsGYNNNJbamtfZ4YNYWaZEmf7mOx4ojbG7w9DY3vw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst place to go and by far the worst experience. We went yesterday, and the head of security was extremely discriminatory toward us. Despite being very well dressed, we were treated rudely from the start simply because we were a group of gay men accompanied by a lady. Their behavior was unprofessional, impolite, and clearly biased. In the end, they tried to justify their actions by saying we did not comply with the dress code, even though we were wearing upscale casual attire. This was nothing more than an excuse to discriminate.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA04bw-vxp6vjA1ltfcfipB&fid=0x0:0xd41db18153666036"],"When":"2025-9-7"},{"Name":"Angelica Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOWBMa7jVofIayjpnICgpnxr9edArDUjsP5bGPjhHs-B9ToL8l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Overall: 4.3/5

We checked out LIV Nightclub for the first time to see Alan Walker on a Saturday night. We were on the guest list, and even though we arrived around 12:45 AM, there was no line, so we got in quickly. However, the line setup was a bit confusing, so more signage would have been helpful.

As many have said, the entrance to LIV is stunning--definitely a great photo op spot. I also liked the long hallway between the entrance and the main club space, which works as a perfect break area. The club's layout is well-designed, offering a view of the stage from almost any spot. With multiple bars and plenty of places to stand outside the main dance floor, it's perfect for introverted people like us.

The sound level was good, and the music was enjoyable. My husband liked his cocktail, and the club wasn't overcrowded compared to places like Hakkasan. The security team was firm but polite (not aggressive or on a power trip), which was a nice change. The only downside was that, despite LIV's supposed zero-tolerance policy, there were people smoking cigarettes inside, which really bothered our noses.

I'd definitely come back to LIV for the right artist. Overall, it's one of our top Vegas nightclubs.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC3pv27cg&fid=0x0:0xd41db18153666036"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Jordan Helton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4-jUlqwdyzPjs2xGI0DDBtU4fRB9yeqgqKwMlp4PX2KMBCpxvCA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This was the worst club i‚Äôve ever been too. I don‚Äôt normally leave reviews but the experience here was ridiculous. Was here to see john summit and for my mental sake had to leave before he even came out. They fill the club past what seems a hazardous capacity. The dance floor is small considering the amount of people they bring in and how huge the headliners are.

Once the dance floor you cannot even move in is at capacity, you are forced to be on the sides and outskirts with no view of the stage and people pushing you left and right.

On top of being herded like sheep, the security guards are extremely rude and were pushing and pulling people forcefully. The arrogance and lack of proper training of the security guards was the cherry on top to this horrible experience. What makes this worse is these problems are solvable. If they were to limit capacity in a way that made sense this would not happen. The sheer ratio of one star  reviews already when they have only been open for a year speaks for itself.

Luckily I was able to get on the guest list and expedite the line by paying $50, but waiting in the guest list line is not worth it, there is people that easily waited 3+ hours and then got told they had that to pay the full price half way through. I would have been sick if I paid the $300 admission for something like this, please save your money and see your favorite artist somewhere else. I cannot express how disappointing this experience was.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column5: 2245 E Flamingo Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89119
column18: Festive Latin-style dance club with DJs & live salsa bands, plus a full bar with beer & cocktails.
