column32:
[{"Name":"Zhandra Andrade","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFIME9SYvqPQECTjHINbePA_nwrR7_lmD8DLyhi_72_SvWR3KCrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After reading so many great reviews, my husband and I decided to celebrate our 22 anniversary here and we are glad we did. We had a great time, great music. From the entrance, every employee we encountered, we only got excellent service. Our server (forgot her name) was very attentive. She brought us the bottle with the fun sign, she was checking on us all night, refilling our drinks/ice bucket, etc. The vibe was great, the DJ was on point and even accepted requests for songs. Bathrooms were kept clean at all times and the employees in the B
Bathrooms were really nice.
We thought it was a bit expensive, but we truly had an amazing time, so it was totally worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAiNdnpUwyLozc_q9hvaAPO&fid=0x0:0x63d3bfa891ad8602"],"When":"2025-11-9"},{"Name":"Peter Gil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3WS9wAGVYz3KD5zjGAUussJ1JuPM24q1tKlIkTX1pc7MFsq_i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"a 20$ cover por person and on top of that they try to charge you for a seat and a table by asking you to buy a bottle when the place is hardly busy.. if you want to drop that much money for a dance and a couple drinks, you're better off going to nicer place. it's not that nice to pay that much..","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Angel Arroyo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXErdQVPZqBQF6n1WdnpxSDeK3MBNt3kXmtwhC4CIHcwpBUa0edbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to the La Jolla nightclub to celebrate our anniversary. We had a great time dancing and drinking all night. The price for a table is very reasonable. Erika, our waitress, I recommend, was very attentive to our needs. Vlad, the La Jolla nightclub VIP host, was very helpful to us. If you're in Las Vegas and looking for a Latino night, La Jolla is the place to go. They play all types of music and will play the song you request.

Again,thank you Vladimir our VIP host.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ralph LardiSalsa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQ6t35Gc9BTKE9k9EBMtz05QShVDeXM1veTMXpZ1WTA4DjUOY1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I arrived at 11pm on a Sunday and stayed until 1 AM. No more than 20 people in the club. Dj played a good rotation of Latin music. They said that most people show up after 2am. Possibly because they close at 5am on Sundays...","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John Foreman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKVGYzrGEQCSHmQA1akFn1Q9eC0ZbL6B---0iN9JMi6mtjpdg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The wife and I went to La Jolla this past Saturday and it was an absolute blast.  Vladimir took excellent care of us and treated us like VIPs the entire evening.  Definitely looking forward to going back when in Vegas again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Candyg Lopez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBDGXTkT8RoUBSUYd2Ivb7kWKE3rRag_Y0QocMNO4Me7fTHf0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"20$ cover charge for men and women , club is nice but no seating space prepare to stand if you don‚Äôt have a reservation. Waitress with big arms was rude and kept saying she didn‚Äôt know anything when asking questions. It has really went downhill from prior years but they do have good music.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leovardo Cantos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWF3b6sglBwQKc5ZOZU8NcUxgFF7ExKJ-ofQwNW8dDwjitJzauM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Was told that there was no cover. Wanted 40. But said 20 for a five star review. Got a table. Ordered 5 beer bucket for 45 dollars. Waited 10 minutes and left. I will never come here again. If you're in El Paso TX. Our clubs are way better.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tony Reyes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYdm30DgGqADvgC6gyh1RXNf3HnsIc33W3CrJ-11pH2yNaPw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Place is great. Music is fire. Best Latin spot in Vegas. VLADIMIR was the best host I have ever had ever. Ask for him, call him, text him He‚Äôll make your Vegas experience better than you can imagine. Vladi thank you papa!!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32: [{"Name":"Dawn King","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocICmeKktXjntyfKSAiMciDi_759Dxiajh0i07-XR4TgN1EUJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an amazing night out! The Nightclub on Wheels experience was absolutely incredible. From the lively atmosphere to the top-notch music, it exceeded all my expectations. The drinks were delicious, the staff was friendly and attentive, and the dance floor was always pumping. I can't wait to go back for another unforgettable night of partying on wheels!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marion Robinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIz9JM_TjtlFmsgOoxgcHmcZjg77-7707QVSAtU0satgyhGtA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow, just wow! The Nightclub on Wheels Experience blew my mind. They picked us up in style from the hotel, and the 1-hour open bar got the party started pronto. The scenic tour and Vegas sign stop were Instagram-worthy moments, and the complimentary club/pool guest list made us feel like VIPs. This is how you do Vegas right!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Janie Lambert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSXbs59xKMnDdpD3yt5ZbKtW1DOj0C-El1BoX3NkzzXFVc_w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nightclub on Wheels is the ultimate party experience! The music was on point, the drinks were flowing, and the vibe was contagious. I danced the night away with friends and had the time of my life. It's a must-do for party enthusiasts!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nikolai Ivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCjskfkC2oYbPKoyKgn3Y8AJAgkamNAyf8oUuhk6xu3oOORg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're looking for a one-of-a-kind night out, the Nightclub on Wheels Experience is a must-try. The top-notch sound system and interactive entertainment made it a memorable and electrifying experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"david w","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJJCnztWgfiCIFgFLqm2g0Lr2QVbql-ilgMOyiUWe77IiYXg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We booked Nightclub on Wheels for my Buddy's bachelor party on Saturday and it was awesome!! The party bus was an absolute blast and there was plenty of alcohol ( we had 9 guys in our group and there was still a half bottle left when we got to the club). We got right in with the wristbands and it's blurry after that lol\n\nHighly recommended the pregaming before the club. thumb up","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"adam perez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0IFwa_KIYqcze0bysELq7SE3j4RBK6q0zjgd7GNnYWCNb8XV5sQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"‚ÄúBest party bus experience ever!  My new go-to activity whenever I go to Vegas.  You get to play your own music, there's plenty of complimentary top-shelf alcohol, and everyone appreciates a private tour of the strip in a decked-out Sprinter.  I can't think of anything I've done in Vegas that cost under $100/person that offers this much value.  Nightclub on Wheels is the real deal!‚Äù","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"SOLKOOL Laminados de cristals","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURoRenMloAC-th8_af9PAEmGmT1KN0kWHUy83BLC4oke-7PofYSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karla Cruz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLiCzPyKnXu052zVUPzPbK3_5OQlCyV-Tr-znNLdgW9cpglg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""}]

column5: 3730 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89158
column18: Nightspot hosting well-known DJs & performers in LED-lit digs with VIP suites & luxe furnishings.

column32:
[{"Name":"Carlee Head","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2mNWUSG2CnX31DI_8nNY3f-r9bu7Mny1yvGplEuC6p4j_mg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a blast at the nightclub. Drinks were pricey, but so were drinks everywhere else. Shout out to Tristen Cambra‚Ä¶he‚Äôs a promoter who I reached out to for tickets. He responded to me within minutes. When our group walked up to get our tickets he was very polite and professional. One of the first things I noticed was his suit‚Ä¶it rivaled most of the businessmen I ran into in Vegas. It‚Äôs awesome to see someone take their job so seriously. The club has an awesome environment. I got to drink free most of the night. Some drinks were quite expensive, but the well drinks were cheaper and when you‚Äôre mixing drinks‚Ä¶.eh, who cares if it‚Äôs bottom shelf. If you‚Äôre in Vegas be sure to reach out to @tcreezylasvegas on Instagram so he can hook you up with awesome tickets to any number of events. I‚Äôm so glad I did!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"T. Maria Andreea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWkV6KlVmKkw_YuPbMVa7cDLS8ZdUSuytNLsRaU9z704Ncd4I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got on the guest list for Jewel with the help of a promoter. So we got in for free. The music was really great, you could dance to it. The women got free drinks up to 1 am (vodka, tequila or rum with one type of juice). We loved it there and we didn't want to leave. We went on a Friday and it was not really crowded, but it wasn't empty either. There were the right amount of people for a club.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEI7btuuXobqJ-wE&fid=0x0:0x66408678b07db5a4"],"When":"2025-5-21"},{"Name":"Cameron Betz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXRsxyduy6pFm34638KDIH7fokVBPHnusHzYCyWeA6mR43mwm6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cool club. Very crowded. Bathrooms are in an odd spot. Takes about 5 minutes of squeezing through people to get to","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDFxCgifKTAQyJUF97e70jj&fid=0x0:0x66408678b07db5a4"],"When":"2025-9-24"},{"Name":"Aaron Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVr0a7ajOXT4aOBYSdV0lXPcsXvg-65rg4cYRFJ-okGLSim7IsTSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you want to feel like VIP definitely purchase the shared table tickets. You get all you can drink vodka and tequila. Its definitely worth to get there early so you can grab a seat. There might be 20 other people in the area. The dance floor looks small but definitely was jumping. Can't wait to go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICb6ev1twE&fid=0x0:0x66408678b07db5a4"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Nololn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLY7pgKfIJijDwQM6ZscI169gBHzQ6OBZnaC_JRmBxTFyU5qA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The security guard was very nice but the managers were atrocious!! We were on the guest list and used high pressure interrogation. Just to find out who our promot was. I hope ownership puts the managers in check as they left a bad taste in my mouth. Initially was welcomed by security then shunned away by high strung management. I would have stayed in the club but we walked in out due to this poor experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kyle Tucker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfPzYKPjxFS0z0gEUTCaUJnKkhMGL5kRtpm0n3DOysVo5XLZY3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Oh boy, where do I even begin with the Jewel Night Club at the Aria? Let me just say, if you're looking for a small club with unprofessional workers, $14 water, rude security, and a strong likelihood of being kicked out for being "too old," then this is the spot for you.

It's so small that you'll be rubbing shoulders with strangers all night long, and not in a good way. And don't even get me started on the "professionalism" of the staff. If you're lucky enough to get served, expect half-hearted service from part-time workers who would rather be anywhere else.

Now, let's move onto the drinks. A $14 water? Are you kidding me? I could buy a case of water for that price. And don't even think about ordering anything alcoholic unless you want to take out a second mortgage on your house.

And finally, the security. Let's just say they're not known for their charm or friendliness. If you're not careful, they'll kick you out faster than you can say "I'm too old for this." Which, let's face it, you probably are.

This is one Vegas night club that is a total disaster. Unless you enjoy small spaces, rude staff, and overpriced water, I suggest you steer clear of this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDRqo78Fg&fid=0x0:0x66408678b07db5a4"],"When":"2023-4-22"},{"Name":"Karen Reynolds","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIaWvSkzkgO-w2JHeTE_z_bQw1ad14_Nof5fNikELI4F6jUht3Tw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They only serve drinks here. I asked the barista for something with peach and she made a nice cocktail for me.

The place is crowded. Lil Jon was scheduled to DJ the night we went. To get in, we needed to be on the "Guest List". That was achieved via Event Brite. Entry was free.  You end up in a long line, so get there before 10pm. However, we got in quickly. The place gets crowded. Another DJ played music until around 1am, which is when Lil Jon came. He put on quite the show. He was still going when we left at 2:30am.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDp9OyNngE&fid=0x0:0x66408678b07db5a4"],"When":"2023-8-17"},{"Name":"Dev ajay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7aNbTUoRXHcPJpHp-LjKDbZK_B4ht6jMNoqmhkQwy4c7XdoCe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"To be frank, this place is just a hipe. Nothing different or special.  On top the charge you thrice the amount for everything. Even they have entry charges. Watch out for your pocket gets drianout faster than in a casino.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column18: Renowned London-based Asian-fusion brand presents this massive MGM Grand nightclub, lounge & eatery.

column32:
[{"Name":"N O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkK1n860MzhG4JEFBDp3Awc4-YEkmgR0LNcmuR8qmFxJnMqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Nice club but it is a pay to sit place. Vip, table service are the only available seating otherwise you're standing the entire time. Drinks were good but expect to pay 3 - 4 times what you would normally pay for them. Pregame before you go in.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBpfWPQT_uErXNBHopv0RFp&fid=0x0:0xc506af43be4d4704"],"When":"2025-11-14"},{"Name":"Jr. ‚ÄúFuseBomb‚Äù Jose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWm_YxNJYEe7nFAzlpuK1GH0Mns3_BiAPfP9t-zhJrySalKZM6B=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best night clubs in town!
This club doesn‚Äôt only play heavy house music, there‚Äôs a high mixture of hip-hop and reggaeton.  You will definitely have fun!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCvDznW9xEqB13p2c-MQ1xp&fid=0x0:0xc506af43be4d4704"],"When":"2025-12-21"},{"Name":"R G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIpQKFrYFkIbfBBrzpGzGuaHhKD2ewNgNOpy3GZzRY5A6pd0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We didn't try the food so I can't give a review.  Hakkasan is amazing,  the layout is great, you can see the DJ booth from almost every spot in the club. The bartenders were friendly. The security guard went out of his way to help bring someone back to the main floor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBaf3jEWrm5Fs04447y64_C&fid=0x0:0xc506af43be4d4704"],"When":"2025-9-14"},{"Name":"Michael Taube","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXh0h4eopQv4rqD9cI6xYh6iVeyLRD3DB-AeYvYa1hpnT2Vwamzng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Asian food here is expensive but I walked away feeling like I got everything I paid for and more! The quality, imagination and execution of the meal was fantastic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC46tDXHKkc_Ya9KYGfFyvA&fid=0x0:0xc506af43be4d4704"],"When":"2025-10-25"},{"Name":"Pash H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtYNhBqLdC1q47f1tBIEjcj5fFZVyd3FqiDEQQnvTBkNzA-aHf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"5 Stars ‚Äì Highly Recommended

We recently visited Hakkasan Nightclub (the restaurant) in Las Vegas for a business dinner and it absolutely exceeded expectations. We weren‚Äôt entirely sure what to expect going in, but the entire experience was outstanding from start to finish. If you enjoy seafood, bold flavours, and trying new dishes, this spot should definitely be on your list when in Vegas.

Even though it was a packed evening with every table full, the service remained prompt, friendly, and very professional. You could tell the team was busy, but any questions we had were answered quickly and with helpful recommendations. Our wine glasses were never empty, and the pacing of the meal was perfect.

We sampled a variety of dishes‚Äîbeef ribs, steak, dumplings, sea bass, lobster, shrimp‚Äîand every single one was prepared and presented in a unique and memorable way. The flavours were layered, thoughtful, and beautifully balanced. Dessert was another experience in itself: we tried three different desserts, each one a creative twist on familiar classics. The sweet caviar dessert in particular was truly one of the most unique and delicious desserts I‚Äôve ever had.

Cost-wise, this isn‚Äôt a budget dining spot‚Äîexpect to spend some money‚Äîbut the experience, flavours, and service make it well worth it.

Highly recommend. 5 stars.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Miguel Sanchez (Mich)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTmHPGhSqc202QqXYjblsu9y94PdorVEEfFvKbXHmu39F7sH4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As one of the world's premier nightlife destinations, Hakkasan exceeded my expectations in every way.

From the moment we stepped into the club, we were blown away by the sheer scale and opulence of the venue. The five-story, 80,000-square-foot space is a marvel of modern design, with lavish decor, cutting-edge lighting and sound systems, and a sprawling dance floor that's always packed with beautiful people.

But what really sets Hakkasan apart is its world-class talent. We were lucky enough to catch a set by one of the world's top DJs, and the energy in the room was electric. The crowd was entranced by the pulsating beats and mesmerizing light show, and we danced the night away with abandon.

Throughout the evening, we were impressed by the exceptional service from Hakkasan's staff. The bartenders were friendly and efficient, serving up expertly crafted cocktails with a smile. The security team was also courteous and professional, ensuring that everyone in the club felt safe and welcome.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCwx8vR8gE&fid=0x0:0xc506af43be4d4704"],"When":"2025-3-21"},{"Name":"Brian Carpani, GeckoMediaGroup","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXupvoc4MsCYUImfKgIQnk43H72hPtWiD9cKQ8Ap90jQcqP1YdzcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was really good on the set menu of the night. The dumplings were amazing and the beef was great and tender. The noodles didn't have much flavor though so that was disappointing. The service wasn't great especially for how quiet it was. Water glasses frequently went empty and was hard to find someone when you needed to.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICvjumTtQE&fid=0x0:0xc506af43be4d4704"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Regina Wiggett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJTrUj-jaXf-zp66Dpua7nuJwOaRferIvdb14zMBa4vA1MBoA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our group received VIP straight from the moment we hit the line. We were well taken care of upon our entrance and escorted to our table. Our bottle service staff were attentive and fun to have around in our booth. The club is very spacious and an incredible vibe that is both polished and lively. We arranged for this night as a surprise bachelorette party and the bride-to-be was on the dance floor the whole time, dancing the night away, she even missed her vibrant presentation that we arranged for her (despite the staff being gracious enough to delay doing in hopes she would be back at the table). It was the most lively night and best club experience any of us had ever had, we closed the place down!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC77OPUygE&fid=0x0:0xc506af43be4d4704"],"When":"2024-8-13"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Yariv Cohen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVW-JPdzj7vZoT5pJz9NBApi-yPBBhBtEd3f6wNeIySJ8KwPK8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this club so much ‚ù§Ô∏è The music is always great and vibe is so positive! As a local the moment I found this place I was hooked. The resident DJ (Robby Powell) always brings something new and gets things kicking before the main event when he is not. They bring big names from around the world and some locals that make the place bump and me smiling and happy. From the security guys to Tiffany at the door to the bar tenders, and club crew, they always make me feel welcomed as if I‚Äôm someone important (I‚Äôm not, just a tech nerd with love for EDM.) let‚Äôs not forget the lighting and GFX team which adds so much. The club is the perfect size, crowd is PLUR ü§ó and lots of tables for a fair price for those who come with a group.
I go as many times as I can because I don‚Äôt want the party to stop and truly love this place. ü•≥ü™©‚ù§Ô∏èüï∫üíÉ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAP2rE6Ny1YBxxrmI-lCsIy&fid=0x0:0xa7eeda7c1b0f2560"],"When":"2026-1-24"},{"Name":"Kenneth Frank","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZNs-8KlWdb8fiphKARqPWswRzRk36QLKMbG2_2nS2M_jNPA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ego Afterhours Club in Las Vegas is a remarkable Afterhours spot that never fails to exceed my expectations. From the moment you walk in, you can feel the vibrant energy and welcoming atmosphere, thanks to the incredible team that runs this place.

The star of the bar has to be London, our go-to bartender. Her professionalism and warm charisma make each visit special. London has perfected the art of mixology, crafting drinks that are as delightful as they are diverse. Her friendly demeanor and quick service make you feel like a valued guest every time.

Tiffany, the door person, sets the tone as soon as you arrive. Her blend of kindness and assertiveness ensures that everything runs smoothly and efficiently. It's evident that she's in control, making sure everyone is treated fairly and that patrons feel safe as they enter.

What really sets Ego Afterhours apart is the music and the vibe. The DJs anre always on point, creating an electric atmosphere that keeps everyone on the floor. It's a major reason I've been coming here for years. Mitzy's service is another standout aspect. She's attentive, friendly, and genuinely cares about making your night unforgettable.

The security team at Ego Afterhours deserves a special mention. They are the epitome of professionalism, prioritizing patrons' safety while maintaining a respectful and fair environment. Knowing that they're around makes me feel secure, enabling me to enjoy the night without a worry in the world.

Above all, Ego Afterhours Club is about the people. The crowd, the staff, and the overall energy blend to create a night out that's hard to beat. The respect shown by everyone‚Äîfrom the security team to the bartenders‚Äîreflects the mutual respect shared among patrons, enhancing the overall experience.

I wholeheartedly recommend Ego Afterhours Club to anyone looking for an unforgettable night out in Las Vegas. It's a place where you can feel safe, welcomed, and thoroughly entertained. Whether it's your first visit or your hundredth, Ego promises a night to remember.

Here's to many more nights of great music, exceptional service, and fond memories at Ego Afterhours!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCfG4eAgeLtLqkUAXUU0BKg&fid=0x0:0xa7eeda7c1b0f2560"],"When":"2025-6-15"},{"Name":"Debbie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWopY2ku3Okv-DL5-E6oA5oSiDh89zYNzCkRPINfA3ArPP-g4wQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely amazing Chicago Bears take over Vegas! w/ Legendary Chicago DJ Gene Hunt who flew in to give us the tone of our lives!!! #GeneHunt #Deeruiz #Vegas #ClubEgoAfterhours #chicagobears #chicagodowntown. 9/27/25","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBoSS6cXcpnqJRYp-WUgegl&fid=0x0:0xa7eeda7c1b0f2560"],"When":"2025-9-30"},{"Name":"Scott Horton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWBug-gu0KYbBtJKTj1zS7s5YvL7lkcO4aWWaFcgqKWSLcHQLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Dear Club Ego,

Once upon a time, your venue was a sanctuary ‚Äî a place where music and energy reigned, and the air was as clear as the vibes. Guests were expected to step outside for their smoke, and we all breathed freely inside, dancing without a second thought.

But now? The atmosphere has shifted. Clouds of smoke hang heavy over the dance floor. Within an hour, we‚Äôre forced out, our clothes and hair drenched in the scent of ashtrays instead of memories. For non-smokers, the magic is broken.

We beg you ‚Äî bring back the rule that kept the air clean. Let the smokers enjoy their break outside, and give the rest of us the chance to love Club Ego again without choking on the haze.

With respect and urgency,
Your loyal, non-smoking guests.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cheyenne K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBgvNpyFN1nzQggSn7u4W6d_wc2hluxdLiTruRu27_9a676A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mish was amazing! Super friendly, fast, and really took care of me and my table all night. Drinks stayed coming, vibes were on point, and she made sure we never had to ask for anything. You can tell she knows how to make people feel welcome and keep the party going. If you come here after hours, ask for Mish ‚Äî she‚Äôll make your night!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dacey Yellowbear","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUygqcjdJWx09-c1dl3V8cSeDHY39vq8eJGZA2Ds9soNgdWbhPv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alex was absolutely amazing as our bartender! From the moment we sat down, she made us feel welcomed and taken care of. Her energy was fun, professional, and genuine ‚Äî you can tell she really cares about creating a great experience. Every drink was perfectly crafted, and she gave great recommendations based on what we liked. We had such a fun night thanks to her. Definitely one of the best bartenders we‚Äôve had ‚Äî thank you, Alex!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alissa Vega","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqWeo3eKcJp8FKaTiZNJNuho3Vh0ewmPPVsI8fbXGtjvzsBV35=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è Alex is the BEST bartender at Club Ego!

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about Alex. Every time I come in, she brings the perfect mix of professionalism, personality, and pure talent. Her drinks are consistently amazing, and she always remembers exactly what I like ‚Äî even when it‚Äôs been a while. She's fast, friendly, and somehow keeps the whole bar running smoothly even on the busiest nights. You can tell she genuinely cares about creating a great experience for every guest. Alex truly sets the standard ‚Äî Club Ego is lucky to have her!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"johnna janson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKBSqnPtETLq_A-H69Y_xsya0rqPMsBYonKATOOzbKhV7_GhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were here on a work trip for my husband.  Everyone recommended it so we tried it out. We were not disappointed!! Excellent atmosphere,  the music way insane and just so fun. And the staff,well the staff was just amazing and so helpful.  I'm not a person who drinks much however.  The bartender was very patient with me and after asking me a few questions was able to make me something that I absolutely found delicious and truly enjoyed.  Her name was London,  ill never forget her. If i could give her a 10 star review i would.  She made us so comfortable and really gave us the best service.  We came back 3 nights in a row.  My husband had a blast as well btw. We told everyone we talked to to go and ask for her. Loved this place. Can't wait to go back!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

It is called me Drai‚Äôs After Hours, a late-night club that opens at 2 AM and lasts until early morning. It‚Äôs an awesome nightclub with a high-class crowd, and I absolutely loved it. This is the true meaning of American nightlife, and it‚Äôs a must-visit when you‚Äôre in Las Vegas. Surprisingly, it‚Äôs not too expensive. They have all kinds of drinks and even offer hookah. We got a table there with a couple of friends and had an amazing time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDAudrVOQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x716e1ec76a488137"],"When":"2025-2-10"},{"Name":"albert zapata","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ1JjrFnRC6E1WC2nkx27P_K_SuZpHPwsFLkM7ZxOUAe2srZw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came for my birthday and had an amazing time. Hector took great care of us and we partied until 6:30am  Definitely coming back with a bigger group -They wouldn't let me bring my meta glasses SMH","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Monica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYtU3WvFFx42vGbEtMea6Q4g5rA80u8nOjmvs_S0LeVMb1L1AT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"ü§¶üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è I wasn‚Äôt allowed in because of my outfit the first time I tried to get in. this time i was but then immediately i saw a girl barefoot. boots are in the club, see through outfit in the club, chains in the club. yall are exhausting","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDgsrvCqwE\u0026fid=0x0:0x716e1ec76a488137"],"When":"2025-2-23"},{"Name":"Hernando Gonzalez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXj4P3DTaa26Zz3GABYwfs4-OBQajtXzAb18bPRupym6aHgY-z=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"EricP from security safe my life when I lost my phone and wallet üí≥ he was super professional thank you Eric for your job finding my phone and wallet!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"JG C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKT97jZFXFAQM8b22JZF4WQKkAgTUmszhNc_FJ-ZYuPBEMgA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you like hip hop. This is a good place to enjoy after hours. I won't lie it is kinda hood but that s the vibe","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nayeli Mendez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVl8Fxz144vmiOZKEAISkYZnK02dlJ15PkS_KKOpVwfYAeslVTj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place after hours, line wasn‚Äôt a long wait. Tory Lanez happened to show up and was the dj for a a while, that was fun!! Definitely would come back if I return to Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC-4uXZaQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x716e1ec76a488137"],"When":"2022-10-30"},{"Name":"Kitty Goo'Dachi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuwONTicoqY9pVv5RJILYZfE2L4sENKaxQyy669EFlKE0fFx5Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Not sure if I should be rating but from the experience I had with them its a nice spot and a short walk from the strip. Even in January. column18: Ritzy Asian eatery with a massive Buddha statue, select sushi & other Japanese, Chinese & Thai fare.

column32:
[{"Name":"Amit Patel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKkTsKSFy4__1fMG5ang0Dq_xe28ICH28A3z5ImwrSN2SVyQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tao Asian Bistro is an absolute must-visit in Las Vegas. From the moment you walk in, the ambiance sets the tone‚Äîdimly lit, stylish, and energetic without feeling overwhelming. The space feels upscale and immersive, with a cool, modern Asian aesthetic that makes the whole experience feel like a night out, not just dinner.

The food is phenomenal across the board. Every dish we tried was beautifully presented and packed with bold, balanced flavors. The sushi was incredibly fresh, the dim sum was delicate and flavorful, and the hot dishes were rich without being heavy. You can really tell that a lot of care goes into both the ingredients and the execution. Portions are generous for a high-end restaurant, making it great for sharing and sampling multiple items.

What truly elevates Tao, though, is the staff. The service was attentive, knowledgeable, and genuinely warm. Our server took the time to explain the menu, offered great recommendations, and checked in at just the right moments without being intrusive. Everything felt smooth and well-coordinated, even with how busy the restaurant was.

Overall, Tao Asian Bistro delivers on every level‚Äîexceptional food, top-notch service, and an unforgettable atmosphere. Whether you‚Äôre celebrating something special or just want an incredible dining experience in Vegas, Tao is absolutely worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBBZkDIxlxYILYVpriuqsRQ&fid=0x0:0x86765d15e7373310"],"When":"2026-1-3"},{"Name":"DANA PALACIOS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnd5_YFOHXuY3mhYCS8vtM6fKoNH1I09olmEMg-sgobM5QyUq2mw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had such an amazing experience at this restaurant, and a big part of that was because of our servers, Brandon and Justin. They were absolutely fantastic.

Both of them were incredibly attentive and thoughtful ‚Äî they seemed to know exactly what we needed before we even realized it ourselves. From start to finish, they made sure everything was perfect and that we felt taken care of the entire time.

Brandon and Justin truly went above and beyond. They weren‚Äôt just good servers, they were exceptional. Their attention to detail, kindness, and professionalism made our visit unforgettable. Plus Justin made recommendations off the menu that were absolutely delicious,so thank you for that!

We can‚Äôt wait to come back next time we are in Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD3qSETXQ3sPBK_rk6zhci-&fid=0x0:0x86765d15e7373310"],"When":"2026-1-2"},{"Name":"Jahaan Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNCgEuXhBEP8dkQlMtb3ybR7OzciwlfeBrGlZxUdmZ99x8j2QO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was such a vibe. I had the pleasure of visiting in October during my friend‚Äôs wedding weekend. It‚Äôs very dimly lit but the inside is very dreamy and sultry. Our group ordered a few sushi rolls, a round of drinks and a few entrees to share. The Thai duck fried rice was one of the most exquisite meals I‚Äôve ever tasted. I‚Äôm still thinking about it. Our waiter was great and we all had a good time. To put the cherry on top, we were able to end our night at their nightclub. Open bar was offered for an hour making it the perfect pre-wedding evening.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBLZbPhZzZ-ZI36YSUbzvjl&fid=0x0:0x86765d15e7373310"],"When":"2025-12-11"},{"Name":"Megan Yem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVI_Rw4vquMUpA_ny4I2axvvv2eX2W37T57ruV6LZozMFx-1Vf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Brian C and the Tuna Tartare were the best things about this place! Also, Carlos, Juan, and the chili shrimp were amazing! The service was wonderful! The food was so good. Everything was delicious. The fried rice was so delicious! Also, the carrot cake was so good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDUnz1oPxcmy9ee0YqtB6Ka&fid=0x0:0x86765d15e7373310"],"When":"2025-11-7"},{"Name":"Tamar Boursalian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXeoqvSrbhvVzy7PF-3v7xkCodK-81SvpN5LZDFP-f06P2Imq1oLA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Really wanted to love this place but unfortunately was underwhelmed and really disappointed. Came here for a nicer meal before the show we were going to see. The atmosphere and decor of the restaurant was beautiful. Our server was Dylan W. We ordered chicken lo mein and orange chicken and jasmine rice. We didn't want appetizers or alcoholic drinks and that seemed to be annoying to our server? Our food came out at a decent time after ordering. The taste was good but nothing spectacular. The person who brought our food out was way kinder and friendlier than the server we had. He barely checked on us after our meal was brought to the table. We needed soy sauce and refills and didn't get them until close to the end of our meal. I kind of felt like we weren't as important to him because we weren't a larger group that was ordering a lot of items. I was really looking forward to dining here as a highlight of our weekend and the whole experience really disappointed me.  I wish I had chosen a different restaurant to be honest.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAE3eDqZrAQOx2hzUWctlww&fid=0x0:0x86765d15e7373310"],"When":"2025-9-26"},{"Name":"Elias Nader","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXvnRMSWHnuhsJVeQQPjPS4pBVjTg7SVsaCpqLSK1aq8JJHBP-Xw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Before enjoying the restaurant's services, you will definitely grab a picture of the entrance and also the big statue within the restaurant.
The food was extremely tasty: We have dumplings, sushi, salmon, tao chicken, tofu. Everything was "out of this world"!
And let me tell you, the sweets were super tasty also. The pudding is the best i have ever had!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCOeMKB5wiy9VtRqY_ANXkl&fid=0x0:0x86765d15e7373310"],"When":"2026-2-7"},{"Name":"Arija","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLz-K2OcK27dSSoQglUgq1zTaaA0JmYkkLBD4HzmEFdYOcbsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Loved the lobster wontons and crispy tofu. Unfortunately the sea bass had an ammonia taste, they were kind and offered new ones but was full enough so we declined. Service was great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDFpZGMN8mlyMJrtC3Zndiu&fid=0x0:0x86765d15e7373310"],"When":"2026-1-9"},{"Name":"Rocsii Woolley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDrXNqt-5ITC9T27SPdC8jk7El2lzwD6Ed5F0GIzjwZ7dgTXo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Last night my son turned 19, and I wanted to give him the full TAO Experience. I go here often and knew this would be the perfect way to bring in his birthday. My husband treated him, his girlfriend, and me to a beautiful dinner, and it did not disappoint!

We ordered Hot Edamame, Pork Potstickers, Crispy Shrimp Dumplings, Pad Thai Noodles, Thai Duck Fried Rice, Chinese Broccoli, Crispy Orange Chicken, Beef and Broccoli (Prime-Aged NY Strip), Peking Duck for Two, plus a sushi roll and shrimp fried rice. Everything was perfectly cooked and bursting with flavor.

The customer service was top-tier from start to finish. The manager on duty even moved us to the table we preferred after we made a special request, which really made the evening even more memorable. Every staff member was professional, attentive, and friendly, they truly went above and beyond.

Our total came out to about $350, which was excellent considering the quality, portions, and overall experience. My son loved every moment of his birthday dinner, and it was so special watching him enjoy it in such a stunning atmosphere.

We‚Äôll definitely be back. TAO never misses, the ambiance, food, and service are always elite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAmji1zoTYaBFL4G5aBXxaN&fid=0x0:0x86765d15e7373310"],"When":"2025-10-28"}]

column5: 3000 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
column18: Spacious, energetic nightspot with high-end cocktails, DJ sessions & a bi-level dance floor.

column32:
[{"Name":"diana jimena melendez rosales","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnvF0Ry2C3teR-Y_WHnhhMt9Tz-HKfMzkbvLemLw5d2Dgs9YvNMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I don't understand why it has such a low rating. Honestly, I think it's an amazing place: great music, great DJs, great atmosphere, and overall, everything is incredible.
It has plenty of space to dance comfortably and even get right in front of the DJ. The drinks are very good, and the staff was quite friendly.
It's definitely a place I have to return to on my next visit to Las Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCJSNwqFSEENmag2u2q5EMN&fid=0x0:0xba4788cc2d2a7783"],"When":"2025-12-2"},{"Name":"Mr. Chez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVX0OBsQ_azMP7ZslRidpYJolkkL-9-eevHDR2hoBWzAtft8wi6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Zouk Nightclub delivered a fun experience, especially during the pool party event. Nelly hit the stage around 2:30 AM, and the crowd was pumped ‚Äî his performance was definitely the highlight of the night. The poolside setup gave the party a unique and energetic vibe. Drinks were good, but the prices were pretty steep, which took a bit away from the experience. Still, if you‚Äôre looking for a lively night out with big-name entertainment, it‚Äôs worth checking out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA1EGEoWQBut7FvNFIzE1nJ&fid=0x0:0xba4788cc2d2a7783"],"When":"2025-7-21"},{"Name":"sally Pink","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSuGn5SVSrhZOPSEqS2fggOw2WZtm7RpUr3elXOLtAjxCvKBMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"In the menus I saw some foodstuffs but when we asked, they said no food here. We booked the table already, however when we asked, they told we needed pay 2k more for the table. Really disappointed, because we already deductible for the tables so we have to use all that money for drinks without a table.
However the DJ n atmosphere was very cool, the decor n lighting was amazing.
Just recommend walking only","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCOt-2WoWivfWxPo-nBsnzS&fid=0x0:0xba4788cc2d2a7783"],"When":"2025-9-24"},{"Name":"Eric","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxuE39u-If6kus9iRMAo4mnEoEp2Q_zGiDRu0VVoOMTslOOH_j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We went for James Hype and had good time at Zouk overall, but a few things could have been better. Drinks are definitely overpriced, but honestly that‚Äôs expected for Vegas. VIP tables start around $2,000. The lighting was cool, but I was really hoping for more ‚Äî would‚Äôve been amazing to see some lasers in there to really amp it up. The sound system was solid, but not quite as powerful or clear as I expected for a club of this size. Still a fun experience, just not quite 5 stars for me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCojtGO_wE&fid=0x0:0xba4788cc2d2a7783"],"When":"2025-4-17"},{"Name":"Stifler Fox","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIL6hfrh_kCLz40p6nYXOeMWbYWxe8mhojccRmWPdedSCUnZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Overpriced and disappointing experience.
Prices are way too high. Even the coat check costs $20 plus tip, which is ridiculous.
The atmosphere is bad. About 90% of the club is taken up by tables, so it feels more like a restaurant than a nightclub. The dance floor is extremely small and often blocked off. If you need to go to the restroom, you have to line up behind the tables. If you don‚Äôt have a table or access to the dance floor, you‚Äôre basically just standing around in a hallway.
Drinks are insanely expensive ‚Äî around $110 for four drinks.
The sound system and technical setup are good, but the overall vibe completely kills it. No surprise that Omnia has been ranked higher than Zouk in DJ Mag for years.
Definitely not worth the money.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mrs. W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6Ql18RNDPzIB5QnWgCvZXx5L03wTkLegWeWhi091raCxD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Husband and I went to see Lil Jon! The service was amazing! Our concier Danny was so cool! He and the everyone else made us feel special!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAm2Poydb8wB6eXwDPwUNKx&fid=0x0:0xba4788cc2d2a7783"],"When":"2026-1-24"},{"Name":"Krista Hesse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHFWQ7leOEu6ubY4-mkI7cSdFp3PysMf_U-h3YjacKw7czkmfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My husband and I flew in from Texas and made an entire weekend out of the show this evening (12/12) because T-Pain is my husband‚Äôs favorite artist. This concert was his Christmas present from me, and I truly believed it would be the highlight of our trip.

We arrived around 9:15pm, expecting the show to start around 10. We were able to get a perfect spot, right behind the stanchion on the right side of the stage. T-Pain didn‚Äôt come out until 1:15am, with absolutely no communication or explanation from the venue. By the time we left at 1:30am (we stood there for 4 hours) he still hadn‚Äôt even started singing.

What ultimately pushed us to leave wasn‚Äôt even the delay - it was how unsafe and unmanaged the crowd felt. Two extremely intoxicated women repeatedly pushed and danced their way through the crowd, flailing, touching people, invading personal space (inappropriately dancing against whoever was in their way), and even spilling a drink on me. Their main goal was to get as close as they could and they weren‚Äôt letting anything stand in their way. Many other attendees were visibly frustrated, yet no staff or security stepped in. It was uncomfortable, chaotic, and honestly upsetting.

On top of that, visibility was terrible. The stage was packed with so many people that even standing near the front, we weren‚Äôt able to see the artist. Paying for a concert and not being able to see the performer because of poor crowd control is unacceptable.

The venue felt far beyond a comfortable capacity, and what should have been a once-in-a-lifetime memory turned into a huge disappointment.

I would not recommend this venue unless major changes are made to start times, crowd management, and overall guest safety.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Polina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5cNYTjLvUXuWN1D-27XCFQTb9bXZKARWtaGLicuDb6fs06TmseQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We tried to get in on the New Year's night as Resorts World guests. As per the entertainment channel ad, HOTEL GUESTS COULD ENJOY FREE ENTRY. The bouncer said we could go in until we got to the cashier desk. The girl working there wasn't the politest, she said that she works there so she knows better. Ridiculous, false advertising, unacceptable treatment.
We weren't desperate to go in, so we turned around and left. However, I feel really bad for those who planned a fun night out and couldn't get in due to this kind of misleading information.
Their loss, our gain. We had fun in a different bar instead. I am sure it was so much better than overpretentious Zouk.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column5: 1514 Western Ave, Las Vegas, NV 89102
column18: Alcohol-free, fully nude strip club offering hookah, VIP packages, guest DJs & amateur nights.

column32:
[{"Name":"Zachary Pearson-Carson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWta5kPHZW06AqHXiyA1ASSUfGwNThLUaj3qWRrxDpAxdvjiMCY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place was amazing! I remember going here back in spring of 2025 and it was actually my first time there, the first time I walked in is that I was not only the first person but I was also a first one to receive a 2-minute lap dance for free from a receipt bill thing But it was never done. So the next time I came over here, I paid $20 for a 2-minute lap dance and that 2-minute lap dance. It felt amazing. But a 15 minute for just $140? I have to admit, not long but it was still amazing. I would absolutely love to go over here again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert Aguilar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIBud4WuvZ83J462zpJB7dd0ieJbUEpNbbqBvaZnVktAyb9jg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst experience ever! We went with a group of friends and my wife to have some fun at this place. The first hour was fine, we were enjoying the show, the girls and the experience with our friends but then they stopped. The DJ announced that they had something special going on that night, we got pretty excited when we heard thinking that the girls had a special show or something but instead they brought some midgets to a wrestling ring they had in place that night. The first fight was ok, we had a good laugh, it lasted around 35 minutes but then they announced another fight! I convinced our friends to wait it out so we did. Another 35 minutes went by on that second fight. By the end of it we were ready to see some girls but they announced a THIRD fight!!! Half of the people there left disappointed, asking for their money back, which we did not get. We ended up the night at Palominos, please go to Palominos instead of this place, they have better girls, more attentive and attractive than the ones in this joke of a place. Never coming back to this place again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"RANDOM kid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaDuHQlpusErV2pfWpBznbgT24e11ULESNvvHrn7X-dU1o6uSZ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went to little darlings on a Friday night, hoping to have a good night out with my friends, and I got a dance with a girl who was blonde and had glasses and she stank and she ended up wiping her bodily fluids on me and charged $400 for what felt like 10 minutes, not a good experience wouldn‚Äôt come back again. The one star I gave was generous. I‚Äôve been coming to this club for years and never experienced this Will no longer be spending my money here!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pablo Alvarez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXvHE8VQiU_iPOhYXx7JYVP_HHmpgLgpTxSzF3kT-mF4vDTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Beware scam. Dishonest and violent manager. Advertised pricing is a lie! No clear pricing!
Unfortunately my experiences here were consistently negative. I was shorted on change by the bartender on two different visits. On another visit, I was charged $100 for a 2 minute floor dance.
After declining a dance from one performer, I was falsely accused to management. The manager then threatened me with violence unless I paid 200$ as an apology to the dancer or bought an expensive drink package. I refused and the manager forcefully kicked out. Outside he threatened me with physical violence if I ever return.
I did not feel safe or respected as a customer. Posting this so others can avoid being scammed by this place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"kkk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9yy7u25yp6ZNzkJQwwVCj6_aqvz_2jJMN3oslanDhGlnLIOU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Welcome to here if you'd like to been managed like their employees. Especially their baldddddy manager used to make some opaque rules then randomly kicked out some disobedient customers.

I‚Äôve been visiting this club every year during my trips to Vegas, but today I had the pleasure of experiencing their next-level customer service. The highlight? Getting kicked out for wearing prescription sunglasses‚Äîexplained to them that's my only nearsighted glasses and already confirmed by their security guards just a normal glasses without camera something.

But their dress code is a mystical, ever-changing doctrine that only the manager can interpret. When I pointed out that there was no mention of this policy at the entrance and that I had already spent money on tickets, drinks, and lap dances, he just simply shrugged and said it didn‚Äôt matter, he made the rules and doesn't care me at all. Last year I also got kicked out for wore a sweatpants but others guys who wore shorts without any issues.

Well, if their goal is to turn away paying customers for arbitrary reasons, I‚Äôd say they‚Äôre excelling. No wonder business seems to be going downhill year after year. Good job!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCA-szdEA&fid=0x0:0x99c7b9f06a5034f"],"When":"2025-1-31"},{"Name":"Matthew Curtis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtMfNu3HZ7pMhUXGM0IZHyYjO_F7MHRUqNt09nTEoxXdEU79yp=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Well, let‚Äôs see what can I say? I didn‚Äôt even make it past the front door on a Sunday night when the parking lot is barely full and this chick at the front door tells me to move out of the employee parking.

There are no sign designated it as employee parking or I wouldn‚Äôt park there to begin with. Can you expect me to move on a non-busy night?

Hadn‚Äôt been there in 24 years and guarantee you I won‚Äôt ever go back either just for some stupid shit like that.

Granted, I‚Äôm nobody special. My money spends just like anybody else is in there, but management, you need to get on your front door, girls and teach them a little bit about situational awareness, especially on a Sunday when I know them girls in there ain‚Äôt making any money.

Train better and do better and then maybe you‚Äôll be better","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISNYerQBEEtVZYbWtDxcbdggG7itT-Y5M589ueo0jPzrBVgg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Disgustingly deceptive. Girls are nice. Cover is more exorbitant than a full hour massage. Save ur money and go elsewhere. And this was in a weekday. No liquor as well. Just skip","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dave Reyes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKZt0lC7IpOWaJdO4OKSnVyvIX6jg17r5lJHhm8bdd4HJqXvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rose is the best dancer in that club! She was fun and energetic and I‚Äôll most definitely be back for her!","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"MONEY MAN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0AJAHMsYvENEL5YZjNGoY0QQRJLglUfHiYf08fs0Uvc1_OeTv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I shopped around trying to book with several companies. I decided to work with Bottle Service Las Vegas because they had the best prices and didn't force me to prepay for everything. It was a great choice and my host Brandon is clearly the man to know. I'll be using their serviced every time I come to Vegas. Marquee was amazing by the way!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amanda Zippro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIVbfyKk2Oc02wmQlesaI6j6V43sGao_DzwjROJfjVdSw31Mw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Please do not book with this company!!!! Put a $500 deposit down on 2 tables at the Chateau 8 months before the date of arrival. Contacted the company the day before the date I had reserved 8 months ago. Come to find out the reservation had not been booked. The way I found out was contacting the Chateau Night Club. All bottle Service Vegas did was give me the run around. Bottle Service Vegas ended up booking a reservation last minute. When my party showed up at the Chateau we were told the club promoter needed to be there with us to get in under the reservation. So the $500 I put down 8 months ago was useless. The Chateau ended up being awesome about everything and help us to get two great tables and have a good time. This company is a joke! For what bottle  service Vegas charged on the invoice  I had for 2 tables and bottle service was marked up $700 more than if I went through the Chateau directly. So I got scammed out of $500 dollars. The club said it is honestly not a good idea to go through 3rd parties. Learned my lesson don't buy a Rolex off the street! This company is grabage. Thank you club Chateau for helping to make our night amazing!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kelly W.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLSWDGJ7i64fVK4eNnpR4Qm2FKyWGurtGtFBf5byY2RD2JP6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"After shopping around with a few different host companies a few weeks before we were to arrive, Bottle Service Vegas was the only one to respond in a prompt manner. We were provided options and various package prices to choose from. Rene was very friendly and answered all of my questions quickly. Best booking experience & by far the best customer service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ken Harris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIUgmKTbkusRlgNVHCPf5UQKhD07gAR7f0XX9luGP2nVgdRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a blast! Rene made it simple to get hooked up. Offered some tables at the clubs we wanted but they were a little out of our range because of the weekend and our large group so he got us another table different club same hotel with the option to go to the club we wanted to see the performer. Will definitely use them again. They have different options for different budgets.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rob","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEfwGXL4RyaZUciT3D6MdZXM5PgfbsONdyU0U6V5y8dozpNF0Z=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"By far the best experience with Vegas bottles Services thus far!!! Everything they said they came thru on , me and my friends had the time of our lives !!! I recommend that BSV be your first and only option A+++ service and shotout to Renee, Shannon, Jamall and any others associated with this company!!!! I defiently
coming back!!!!

Thanks again","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"LaTwonna Childress","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZQbtE8hZlnPrRQ5k8FhoPX8QxWtsOaUkgb4IMsQPQNx9-PTRH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rene helped make my birthday more than amazing! I talked with him about a week before I came told him exactly what I was looking for and a day later he sent me a few options, we picked one and he put us on the list everything and everything went smooths thanks again for helping create memories for my birthday I will be back and using you guys again","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOhaO_0Yn6TnjKXQ7CgpzRSveUb8snPgjGAkZjxeCpOIadX4Kv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Gave the wedding party I was with the run around. They called Chateau the day before to confirm they had a table, only to find out they did not. Finally was able to get ahold of BSV, and was told they were all set. Well, as we arrived at Chateau that was not the case. BSV did not communicate anything to Chateau, or our party about needing to have the host onsite, in order to get our. The party had to fork out additional money to get the tables (Thankfully Chateau understood, and helped us out) but to fork out $500 dollars to get sh(*& services is not cool. I do not recommend using them. Even the Host at Chateau stated it is better to work with the clubs directly and not a 3rd party.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Igor Uman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfZoq6JeI_TackKal6q7oWH5fNgbHaTATQ9tvnc-CFCRwiUA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rene was able to help my bachelor party group get a table at Marquee for a reasonable price minimum and on super short notice. Getting into the night club went completely smooth and we had a great night because of Rene's help.","Images":null,"When":""}]

She serves us every time we come here. She is super respectful, as a female she makes me very comfortable. When I come in with my husband and see her she is always full of energy and love and that is why we stay returning. She is one of the best servers Rhino has, hands down! I definitely recommend this place 100% hands down and please ask for Jasmine because she will always make sure you are set and good! Also all that I‚Äôve stated the women are stunning. They speak for their selves, they also are sweet to couples who are wanting to enjoy the night.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Carroll","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDQE8GdmMJVQbMx2C4ZwNjyrviT7v89be3NnHRTxOxIzGymw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went back after a couple years away...club has changed A LOT!!  I was welcomed in by a couple of very friendly employees, offered drinks immediately.

Had an AMAZING experience with dancer Aubrey.  Truly a classy young lady.  I will be coming back to this club.  Kudos to management for turning this place around.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nick M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLI48kvgSBrhdbpdC6YRTpMzFvLX52ZmeWm7nmu0ExOcD51dg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to the club for the first time recently and my experience was absolutely elevated thanks to Jason Conners. From the moment I walked in, he made me feel important and completely taken care of.
On top of that, the cocktail waitresses were the best I‚Äôve ever come across super attentive, friendly, and added to the amazing atmosphere

The service Jason provided was unlike anything I‚Äôve ever experienced before! professional, welcoming, and genuine. I felt like a celebrity! He truly went above and beyond to make sure I had a great time. Big shoutout to him! if you‚Äôre ever at the club, look out for Jason conners. He‚Äôll make your night 10x better!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sheanne Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsYopunmKGyvGuQr8ND-19qc63VWKYgoDxi9GQIeVN7AQn8cH42w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing experience at Spearmint Rhino Gentleman‚Äôs Club. The atmosphere was upbeat, the music was great, and the overall vibe was exactly what you‚Äôd expect from a top-tier Vegas club. What really stood out to me, though, was the exceptional service from bartender AJ. From the moment I walked up to the bar, AJ was friendly, attentive, and made sure my drinks were perfectly crafted and served quickly. He truly elevated the entire experience and made me feel welcomed and taken care of. If you‚Äôre stopping by, do yourself a favor and ask for AJ ‚Äî you won‚Äôt be disappointed!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lili s","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0zsJTY0FuAGbdV1dV55UYBqMbVkFiuLjJuAtPUVlzHZ5V_g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an amazing time at Spearmint Rhino with my husband! The atmosphere was electric beautiful ladies everywhere, great energy, and a fun vibe all around. We headed to the bar for a round of drinks, and AJ the bartender absolutely delivered. Super attentive, friendly, and made us feel right at home. Great conversation, great service. Highly recommend this spot and definitely ask for AJ when you order. He‚Äôs the best!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ynez Athey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwvHZUXULOPUdopO8QzCIOtym3eIHMBcN_15qP_KbRIWQbdmUF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We were surrounded by beautiful women at Spearmint Rhino. The vibe was electrifying. But our server Madonna really made our night. She was attentive and has the friendliest smile. She made sure we had everything we needed thru the night.
Thanks for a good time!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arlynn Dela Cruz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUO8d-0Jlmo73F7wcFfvGe9HBZP-h2HDnCi_6KPH1xsIxYWqhWaKw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an amazing night at Spearmint Rhino Gentlemen‚Äôs Club! Huge shoutout to our  server Kat.  She made the experience even better. She was attentive, friendly, and always made sure our drinks and table were taken care of. Truly a pleasure to have her taking care of us. Highly recommend visiting ‚Äî great service, great vibes, and a great time all around!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nestor Sanchez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUf6fydARhIzmLG9C1RulVBcHJWS1vDVwup4byt_coTT8T6qQ0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best experience ever had in a strip club, the famous Spearmint Rhino, from the staff to the beautiful woman. We came from El Paso, Texas and was recommended this place and it was a great experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Khris Greer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2aUl3YZMvjfu7dR2LawLdNXCH-r9wjx1fQe-Nh9s0NVDf1gxg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had such a great time here tonight! My best friend wanted to try this place for the first time and im so glad we did.  The waitresses are gorgeous and very attentive. The manager Tyler was so awesome and really helped us to have the best night!! My coworkers hyped this place up and I can confirm this is a great time.  The music was perfect. The drinks were strong. 10 out of 10!! I will definitely  be back!","Images":null,"When":""}]

He made sure we had everything we needed - whether it was at the day clubs or for a night. Thanks DK and we‚Äôll see you again soon ü´°","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDRsoDR2AE&fid=0x0:0x29a167728a581f67"],"When":"2023-4-21"},{"Name":"Erin Settanni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvv3OrI1C4QS39FxUrfYW5WHIiuqZOmlkWrFhi3rnL09NxkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly Recommend.
I previously had little to no experience with vegas night life. I was privileged with the opportunity to have met DK and go forward with the Vegas Good Life experience. DK and the organization are highly structured and offer the most significant deals and experiences.
Overall, DK was very professional and took care of my friends and I, and gave us the best vegas experience. I will only go through Vegas Good Life and recommend to everyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICGpr3-Qg&fid=0x0:0x29a167728a581f67"],"When":"2021-10-28"},{"Name":"deni broadhurst","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzjhW4B0kkSyQ0UD6CWNlP7I2mbiUczuDYVMN8hMEZqsbf3A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing Hospitality and very friendly. We had the best time in Vegas because of these guys!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICx5ovwOg&fid=0x0:0x29a167728a581f67"],"When":"2023-5-16"},{"Name":"Rachael Prozinski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIVzJjuL0DmsFTSB3ufWJjYEtBHPsLy5tj-Ox8Ew2bRxwhxUg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vegas Good Life made for an unforgettable bachelorette weekend. Times and locations were always coordinated perfectly and we could count on an exceptional experience. I won‚Äôt come back to Vegas without coordinating my trip/plans through them! Thank you so much!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID2vemd7QE&fid=0x0:0x29a167728a581f67"],"When":"2022-5-22"},{"Name":"Sequoia Madrone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI6obz1tXPMEJ7FJglEUDOVoIrSXHoy_5BMwfOhlfQpetE_2A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had the absolute best weekend in vegas with DK & Nabu! We didn‚Äôt have to wait in any lines to get in, always got the best spots in the club, and always had options. Our group was treated like family the entire weekend & I can‚Äôt wait for the next vegas trip to see DK & Nabuü§ç","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICe3sOX2AE&fid=0x0:0x29a167728a581f67"],"When":"2022-9-15"},{"Name":"Teghjit jaswal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKldxWZR3nYRcKomFJRS8ZjVzInD_jexgXinCdYBj6LFAJ6d3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Coming to Vegas I had no idea which clubs to go to but DK made everything really easy for us. He was amazing to deal with and is very organized at what he does! If you guys are coming to Vegas and are looking to party look no further.

Overall DK was very professional to deal with and took care of my friends and I giving us the best Vegas experience there is. Will definitely be going through DK whenever I do come back to Vegas!","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32: [{"Name":"Edward Coss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_jkrIqXaU2gaHcVCVYOvAbFFAB6AjUeERBYGbLrs2TGvROhY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"10/10 service. Limo service to and from? Boom done. Bottles in the limo? Good looking out A! Strip club venue 10/10. Gorgeous women, strong drinks. Looking forward to coming back next year for my brothers bachelor.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKCbUpmBbXCSAsW7AD9G8NzoJagVm_ej2FDifQQpw5yc75B=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was referred to them by a friend. And what he said was all true. They literally come and pick you up for free and you just pay for 2 drinks. Uber you'd pay $20 to $2. Their limo ride service is  Free and 2 drinks are about the $20+! Do the math","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hit man Champ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKx_RdpQt9Q1Rcw0yfFU1sp1M49e_QmoFKNBghEhXpFVTw8ow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Decided to call a local  strip club limo ride with Strip Club Concierge for my brother‚Äôs bachelor party, and it was an unforgettable experience! The limo was clean, smelled new , luxurious, with plush seating and vibrant lighting that set the mood perfectly. The driver Gary was top-notch professional who kept the sweet vibes high all night long. Highly recommended for your special occasions!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert Rogers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8Z4e7nkiki8W1YTZtM8YM5d4o0xwwGZZzb__q0eM-8OpmLw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yes this is a great establishment to be very amazing service. Very nice customers had the time of my life.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nicolas Lynch (nickdagenral)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRPs3NckOM2lTxnD92LniNB-jKHHOFTsG3vRd4NNtaRMC6dA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Used StripClub Concierge a few weeks back and I am writing this review to let everyone know that they offered us a free ride to our vegas stripclub destination. I contacted their number, a nice lady picked up the phone and scheduled for a pick up. And, in 15 minutes a  fancy limo was there to pick us as if we were celebrities in front of our hotel. It was a night to remember. Ty","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hernan Carriazo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1Ms1j_WGUnEHpdc2pk0nomj3yAhlkqtYyq3KHuuUWxonlR4pM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Strip Club Concierge   limo service was the highlight of our friends high school‚Äô reunion this year. The limo was decked out in luxury + fire beats throughout the ride.  Our driver ‚ÄúSteve‚Äù knew all the best spots to take us, ensuring a smooth and exciting night. You guys have to try them out","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joseph Prado","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXdPMFQOuSk_gTutYGJMuGOy0lmiFuhGBPBHZza0FqATf2Bw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hey everyone this limo pickup service is amazing because when I called them to pick us up from our hotel away from the strip, and the limo arrived in just 10 minutes. It's way better than LYFT. And plus the driver was really cool!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Becky Green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVehmhOyelIY3K4Dym_LZysb35VG8p64mMMrl2sGk1RoB2uvNP1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In a spur-of-the-moment decision, my girlfriend and I decided to indulge in an evening of dining and entertainment at the Treasures Gentlemen's Club  and Steakhouse. To avoid the hassle of driving, we opted for the limousine service provided by Strip Club Concierge. This not only facilitated a smooth journey but also allowed us to bypass the queue, leading us directly to our delicious dinner and the delightful company of the many beautiful ladies. It was indeed a night filled with memorable moments!","Images":null,"When":""}]
