column32:
[{"Name":"jared dupont","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFoi3azxkXrO_NqKftb5wVvcKxEmQGjH9b6rPYc_bo__tpEg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went with my fiancee to celebrate my 30th birthday and it was easily the best gentlemen's club we have ever been too. Very nice, clean, and classy atmosphere. The servers were awsome and super nice, the bouncers were super cool and always made sure we were good. And the girls were absolutely amazing, beautiful, and super friendly. Definitely anyone looking for a great night out in Vegas needs to stop here. Just wanted to personally thank Chris for the help with my V.I.P booking, Bryan for the ride, T for always making sure myself and my fiancee were good, and of course all the beautiful girls of Palomino especially Dao, Rose, and Millie for making our night unforgettable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJR6qQpr8U0Qrr0IzwrDSp88ZlVNpP2GT1QiK3nzzy1azo9NQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"To the Palomino Team,

I wanted to take a moment to share how incredible our experience was at Palomino during a recent weekend trip to Las Vegas

Before arriving, I have to be honest ‚Äî nearly every taxi driver we encountered spoke poorly of Palomino and strongly suggested we go elsewhere instead. One driver in particular repeatedly tried to talk us out of going there altogether. I‚Äôm extremely glad we trusted our instincts and didn‚Äôt listen.

From the moment we arrived, Palomino exceeded every expectation. The atmosphere, professionalism, and overall vibe of the club made it easily the best gentleman‚Äôs club experience I‚Äôve ever had. Everything felt welcoming, well-run, and genuinely enjoyable ‚Äî not forced or overhyped like so many other places claim to be.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mik F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfq0PXpaJBuJr5P-ivknLBcLOKsGB9B9usoAy3VkPuUrjv5A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I have never been to a club and were looking to do something new/exciting together. After some research, we decided on the Palomino and booked a drink package + transportation from our hotel, which made the experience even smoother. Since we were first timers we were a bit unsure of what to expect, but the experience was wonderful. All of the girls were beautiful, talented, and had great energy. The staff on the floor assisting were also very kind and professional. Throughout the night, after we were settling in with some drinks we had multiple girls approach to check in, say hi, ask about dances, etc. They were all nice and none were pushy. We ended up getting a couples dance + two dances each. Overall a great place and friendly for couples.  The only downside was we were having such a good time we missed the last call for the return trip back (haha). Will definitely need to make another visit on a future trip to Vegas!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nick Diller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLIszhVouR9voQUGWF9hYCIQcs7gH8x68hLYDO4iw3L846W7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We planned a night out ahead of time and paid for one of their packages.  Communication from the driver was easy, and he picked us up right on time.  The club was very comfortable.  The staff got us right in and our table was ready.  They made sure to check in with us to make sure our night was going well and we had everything we needed. All the women were amazing, friendly, and none pushy.  Egypt was amazing in making sure our wives were comfortable and had a great time.  When we decided our night was done the driver picked us up within 20 mins and dropped us right at the front of the hotel.  Highly recommend this club specially for couples and first timers!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"D R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxEFkrq4ih8X9Fwj-15-33_2sddqWN4FB7lcDcUuXMybLDKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a very good time here!
I didn't have much experience with strip clubs but decided to go to this one based on the mostly positive things others had to say.
Traveling in the Uber there, I got kind of nervous as the location seemed kind of remote. However, all of that changed as soon as I walked inside the club. A gentleman was there at the door to greet me. He had a very friendly disposition and something about him relaxed me. I was told I had to pay a cover charge of like 30-40 dollars? I honestly can't remember. I did that and walked in.
Inside the club there was a bar where some dancers were sitting and a nice stage where one was performing for the crowd. I would say that the women were all attractive, but not in a fake sort of way. I sat for a bit near the stage and was approached by several women. I was kind of reluctant to do a private dance at first but eventually gave in, and I do not regret it one bit! The dancer was a beautiful brunette with a very sweet personality. I very much enjoyed my short time with her.
I would also add that NONE of the other dancers who came to me were pushy or felt scammy in any way. They just seemed like good people.
All of this said, I would say that if you are on the fence about coming here you should. I think you will have a very good time!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Isaiah Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLW2JykKhsh9Nb6njmwHadlLO6AG0hwzjDMNPe-srHsMZIh_g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing time. The girls who serve the drinks are very beautiful. VIPS are fun. I got too drunk but honestly what do you expect. Aria, Egypt, and Lana are amazing. Great convos from everybody. Egypt held up a conversation for awhile and actually seemed interested in talking to me. Lana was very nice and wasn‚Äôt too pushy on giving me a dance. Aria is gorgeous and gives great dances. Also holds up a good convo. Some girls seemed rude but it‚Äôs any place you go to. I would go again when I visit Vegas. Overall good customer service, beautiful girls, and love that drinks are sold here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJNJMkMKhM3y4g_C3ssDEHxDtOLeNE1Ryib-6In_jUSmHn50A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôve been here a few times and have always had great time! Roxanna is the best entertainer I‚Äôve ever seen!!  Very sexy!  I‚Äôm in love with her Russian accent. For sure I am going to return for more great experiences. She is super hot!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ruby m","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3krFu8iKgyTzyeWSwN0ACDpSJnHA0BhysKrWg4gDjkhfhRA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the pleasure of seeing Bow perform, and I was genuinely impressed by her professionalism, stage presence, and energy. She clearly takes pride in her craft. her performance was engaging, confident, and skilled. Beautiful talent, she was also personable and respectful, creating a fun and comfortable atmosphere. The experience was top notch and reflected a high level of dedication to her work. i highly recommend seeing her","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Erica Ramirez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfYoQbcMhhYHRV7qNLRLblY1vYC5gocG8dJZrFn5P4l9nWTOtj9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nothing but a great time! Jocelyn made sure we had a fun time. We met at the Mandalay Bay Daylight Beach club, then hopped on the party bus and we were greeted with tequila and vodka drinks. Next we arrived to the Ayu where it was crowded but everyone was having a great time! And at last saw Lil Jon at the Marquee at the Cosmo and that was amazing! Will definitely book again, strongly recommend!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCaPd9OJHDf9uH0O09Lmpjl&fid=0x0:0x8899a5cc17267aed"],"When":"2025-9-6"},{"Name":"Joseph Deprey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9oUkS47DKXSb1FG6GTzxHlJtw_5nrTgLnUue3v4IPMf1a4jpczA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The bus was very fun and cool, but guys don‚Äôt get free drinks at the bars. You get them on the bus though. I booked through GetYourGuide, and most of the information was incorrect‚Äì I.e. meeting location & time","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Katelynn Haynes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKncus1xwGnbbtS1kuq1yxY0UCbNt297TXa8pHrzOI6SMoz1Y6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was very fun! Only issues we had was finding the group when meeting if it wasn‚Äôt for the guide wearing her shirt we would have never found her! The last bar we were took to wasn‚Äôt the best as the arcade/bar on had one bartender/worker it difficult to do the many things in there without a big wait time! But overall the guide was fun and it was a nice experience wear all the bars were super close together!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bianca James","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6O31WJnvnrl2jSTy5b0mrQCkx9mc28crgFjJ6ZxnD8Q0grKsr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow...wow....wow...what an amazing night out. Went to some really nice lounges and clubs. Our host Aubrie was so friendly and attentive. Will recommend this to anyone 1st timers in Vegas wanting to go clubing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDjsK623wE&fid=0x0:0x8899a5cc17267aed"],"When":"2024-4-28"},{"Name":"Dina Rager","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVk33qYtTpKWsrjlGX7Uxldm6XoAW-ysdn8WNJrLQS5NHMz30Mk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Was terribly disappointed in the ‚Äútour.‚Äù The first club was fun but we were only there an hour before we got on the bus to go to the next club.

The bus ride was about 15 minutes and although the drinks were free, it‚Äôs bottom shelf vodka or tequila with one mixer choice. The bus ride was so short! As soon as we started to really party, it was time to get off the bus for the night.  It was a cold walk to the resort to go to the next club from the where we were dropped off.

We got into Zouk but couldn‚Äôt dance because the entire center of the club was roped off, dance floor unavailable for peasants evidently.

The hosts were low energy, except when asking for tips. Our specific host looked like she wanted to be anywhere else but hosting our group.

I‚Äôm sure I‚Äôll get a ‚Äúyou knew what you were buying‚Äù response from the management, based on other reviews I‚Äôve read that are very similar to mine. Y‚Äôall keep telling yourself whatever you need to tell yourself to sleep at night. Be more forthcoming with the details of the tour and maybe people will temper their expectations and not be so disappointed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James Peterson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsr4VhdWvYiDh2uaTnoQ-iHg00vz9kHmuBmLVdKBXBpBEw_bM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing experience Had a blast, I recommend anybody visiting Vegas to do this at least once!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICp47WzogE&fid=0x0:0x8899a5cc17267aed"],"When":"2023-8-9"},{"Name":"Lukas Ramos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQ3FCfq-HN7_Ji5TC9IMabz5zDoluAwVbCCaJPJTLDwVF1GA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the best night in Vegas all thanks to Miss Kelsey she was the best guide. We will be back to party with Kelsey again!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICZvr-H2gE&fid=0x0:0x8899a5cc17267aed"],"When":"2023-9-11"},{"Name":"Kamilla Veloso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJ1f3YYH5gQtsdzOAUCsoiLDdUJo1_dcPhsLgqDUSrTTwvxM-B=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The experience with Night out Vegas was incredible! Since the beginning the communication by email was good. when we arrived to the first venue and met our hostess we got a great feeling that the night would be amazing, and we weren't wrong. on the bus it was fun and everyone was excited. The second venue was good although the service was very slow, the decor was pretty and the view was breathtaking. Then, we went to the Omnia night club and we had a great dancing night. I recommend Night out Vegas 100%!","Images":null,"When":""}]

column3: The Pinky Ring by Bruno Mars
column5: Bellagio Hotel & Casino, 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
column30: {"borough":"","street":"Bellagio Hotel \u0026 Casino, 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd","city":"Las Vegas","postal_code":"89109","state":"Nevada","country":"US"}

column32:
[{"Name":"John Wie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXBHLh3oC_FTgGVbG8ZyJF6IvOunQ1EBsJ6B7P1vo-UrkU9vx8wA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Great idea but only for those that have tables really.

The Pinky Room is a jazz/live band club located in the heart of the Bellagio - closer to the exit towards the Caesar's Palace walkway.

We waited in line on a Saturday evening right when this opened. We were told that this was the second anniversary of the Pink Room, so it was reportedly abnormally busy with us having to wait about an hour and 10 minutes before getting in. There was no cover charge, but there is a bouncer checking over your outfit. We weren't told exactly what wasn't allowed but supposedly they will check (saw a lot of the bouncers looking at shoes in particular).

Once you are in, you got a stamp in case you need to step out to grab food or go to the restroom which is not in the club. The bar is set to the far side of the club with the bar area and dance floor set for general attendees. Most of the area though is for reserved tables that require higher drink minimums. The bar at the beginning of the night was easy to get to but once the band came on, it was a tough battle getting a drink as a regular attendee since most of the patrons were really squished in that area trying to watch the band.

The band itself that we saw was great with reportedly Bruno's brother on the drums. It was a fun time and the acoustics were pretty good. The mocktail I had also wasn't bad with drink prices being normal Vegas Strip pricing.

Happy to see more live music venues pop up on the Strip. It's just rough if you don't have the table.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leila Gross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSnuPi31-yLCLuPbPpB6O9MCNEI88Zo64OZNPNw9hB5r7t0YYlpw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This venue is located inside the Bellagio Hotel and Casino on the main floor. It has a strict no phones policy ESPECIALLY when Bruno Mars is present. I recommend getting there by 9pm to avoid the long lines to get in. The cheapest drinks are at least $18.00 but it is well worth it. The vibe, the atmosphere and the live performances are all top notch. And if you are lucky enough to be there when Bruno's band is playing, you may get a chance to see him up close. They do not serve food fyi.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAnYOLOsPSXjjgnl9wQGCo1&fid=0x0:0x37458fa74fcb9d12"],"When":"2026-1-8"},{"Name":"B L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHmuPsPbgBVSXs9FA8JLF2UERDmea-VW8I7nBju3U5UPnbkA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The PINKYRING exceeded my expectations, by the far the most lively lounge I‚Äôve ever been to. Blows the rest out of the water. 1000/10! Amazing friendly staff, the most high energy talented band, great DJ, the ambiance was top notch! Drinks were delicious and strong! It was a very intimate atmosphere, felt like I was at someone‚Äôs private party and we were all friends. It was a whole vibe. My family and I got there when they opened their doors and didn‚Äôt leave until they turned the lights on! Lol.Couldn‚Äôt recommend it enough! Thank you Bruno Mars for this wonderful venue!! Most fun I‚Äôve ever had. Will be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCexYSBDVxkxcBZeEzLHdo1&fid=0x0:0x37458fa74fcb9d12"],"When":"2025-10-16"},{"Name":"Olivia Pinedo, LMFT","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3beLwTFnkW0_LgGZoUD1VEnIA5H7pxNq6MyQRxffvafsk0ON8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I chose this place to celebrate my anniversary, and the experience inside is truly where it shines. Once you‚Äôre in, the hostesses are amazing and make you feel like a VIP. The atmosphere is high-end, welcoming, and incredibly well done.

The live band felt like a full Strip-level performance. On this particular night, I was even lucky enough to hear a little bit of Bruno Mars, which made the evening unforgettable. I also really appreciate the no-phones policy ‚Äî it creates a more authentic, intimate vibe and allows you to fully enjoy the moment.

That said, the entrance experience does not match what‚Äôs inside. The system at the door does not make you feel welcomed or VIP, and the energy from the staff outside could be much warmer. The first impression matters, and a more friendly, engaging approach would greatly improve the overall experience.

Once inside, however, everything is top-of-the-line and absolutely worth it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ricky R.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpacqUnSQ7YSbrhxEHoXFneTy0B4RyAEvufnx_zVuHTu9s8v8E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"On a Saturday night, around 10 p.m. I stood in the Pinky Ring line inside the Bellagio casino and chatted with a man who told me about their "no cell phone" policy. He told me that if you pull out your cellphone, the staff will escort you out immediately. When I arrived near the entrance, I saw a sign that read, "No cell phones. What happens at the Pinky Ring stays at the Pinky Ring," seemingly reinforcing their strict cellphone policy.

I waited in line for approximately 30 minutes, and the lounge has no cover. Once inside, I felt transported to an upscale speakeasy. It's a mid-size venue with a central dance floor, seated sections around the perimeter, a bar along the far wall, and a stage where the live band performs! On this night, the Hooligans performed! The stage has a closed curtain, and every 25 minutes, the curtain opens, and the band performs live, which is when it's "turn up time!" The band played classic rap and R&B live, and they killed it!

The charismatic lead singer, Kameron Whalum, can sing and showed off his falsetto while singing " Frontin" by Pharrell and Jay-Z, and he sang it better than Pharrell. There were moments when Kameron came into the crowd and danced with female audience members! My favorite moment occurred when they performed " Still Not a Player" by one of my favorite rappers of all time, Big Pun!

The Pinky Ring is a vibe, and I can't think of any other lounge or nightclub that's like it! I planned to pregame at the Pinky Ring and go to a nightclub afterward. However, I aborted my pregame plan once I saw how festive the atmosphere was!

The lounge has no restrooms, so you have to use a restroom in the casino.

While inside, I spoke to a Caucasian woman with her cellphone out, and I thought she was living on the edge, risking getting thrown out for the lounge's strict no-cellphone policy. Before seeing her pull out her cellphone I thought I would have to go old school and start bringing paper and a pen to the lounge to write down phone numbers if I met any attractive women there in the future. I asked a bouncer about the cellphone policy, and he told me you can use your cellphone, but you can't take pictures or videos.

A pleasant sound engineer named Ross gave me the rundown of the lounge: he said they rotate five different bands that have all worked with Bruno Mars, and on some nights, Bruno Mars will pop up to perform. Bruno Mars is the owner, and the lounge is his baby, so go on the right night and get a special treat with Bruno Mars performing live. On the night I went, the crowd was diverse but 90% Caucasian. I highly recommend the Pinky Ring as a date spot where you can B.Y.O.M. (Bring Your Own Melanin), dance the night away, and make it a memorable, festive night! The Pinky Ring is a strong five stars! I would give them 10 stars if I could! I highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Levin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVX-JqUkZIkZ_SfVECWM3Fm2bmD_DDm-uNu4JcuCvV5ZYV8VnGj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife Anna and I visited The Pinky Ring at Bellagio on Monday, January 12, and it was truly a highlight of our evening in Las Vegas.

From the moment we arrived, the hostess team made us feel genuinely welcome. They were gracious, attentive, and effortlessly professional, guiding us to our seating with warmth and poise. That first impression set the tone for the entire night.

The band was outstanding ‚Äî vibrant, polished, and full of personality. Their energy filled the room without overpowering it, creating the perfect balance between sophisticated lounge ambiance and lively nightlife. Every song was delivered with style, precision, and obvious love for the performance. It made the evening feel special rather than routine.

The atmosphere, service, music, and crowd all came together beautifully. Pinky Ring is not just a lounge ‚Äî it‚Äôs an experience. Anna and I left smiling and will absolutely return on our next visit to Las Vegas.

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è Five stars ‚Äî exceptional hospitality and unforgettable live music.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Janselle Julian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVp_JhjZebcMCKUL7JFuGutJbjCOzhpJgjF1GP9kfZXkQlbFC6T=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredible experience at The Pinky Ring! From the moment we walked in, the atmosphere, music, and energy were top-tier. The staff was friendly and attentive, and the vibe was unmatched. Whether you're a local or visiting Vegas, this spot is a must-visit. Definitely coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAyasS7DYMJI_wtc-pBymBm&fid=0x0:0x37458fa74fcb9d12"],"When":"2025-10-1"},{"Name":"Olaremilekun Ajibola","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxskPSKeAoepTaRKqvlPoTDUHuCDot3I6USiajzKC56dLhkZCuvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a fantastic, nonstop dancing vibe! The Pinky Ring is hands down one of the most fun nights I‚Äôve had in Vegas.

It perfectly captures that early-2000s classic Vegas energy‚Äîa place where you can actually dance, move around, enjoy great cocktails, and vibe to a live band that blends modern hits with fun throwbacks from the ‚Äô70s and beyond.

We went with a large group and danced nonstop for about four hours, which says everything. If you‚Äôre worried about keeping a big group entertained‚Äîor just need to burn some energy before crashing at night‚Äîthis is the spot.

Everyone was dressed to impress, the cocktails stood out, and the atmosphere stayed high-energy the entire night.

Absolute must-do in Vegas for 2026. üíÉüï∫","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32: [{"Name":"Ivonne Morfin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO-BPEWky23WYQdA2Cds7Q0koIfif4UWMeOf2cW8qjahBfSBsJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was really looking forward to visiting Oddfellows, but unfortunately my experience fell short. The bouncer was incredibly nice, and the bartender was fine, but the drink I ordered wasn‚Äôt good. It was 80‚Äôs‚Äì00‚Äôs night, and at every 80‚Äôs nightclub we‚Äôve been to, DJs usually take requests with a tip. When I politely asked the DJ, he gave a stank face and just nodded ‚Äúno.‚Äù I can accept a no, but the reaction felt completely uncalled for, and we ended up requesting an uber right after. I wish I had a better experience, as I was excited to check out Oddfellows.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCs62Ps2nyIY-bV9yX4RW4W\u0026fid=0x0:0x2f45c36d974db8bb"],"When":"2025-8-26"},{"Name":"Courtney Coutu, RVT","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDNLHuW2O1T1gCqkBuDk4wzDJ2fDHUqZmuAlWWoTGHlf_pXw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I were visiting from CA and were recommended Oddfellows by a local. Walking in, it smelled of incense and it seemed very lowkey. We walked through the hallway and there were a couple of intimate seating areas then another bar. We were greeted by Jordan who was extremely sweet and answered all of our questions. Cheap drinks, fantastic music, and a killer ambience. Oddfellows has just what we like in order to have a great night out.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Scarratt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0npNkWux8rfj3KDSj-v6EnhpTTPe6Jc-f_Mk5HY8f5IHFvo8K4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite local spot has a max capacity of 38, which is just right for me. That probably means I‚Äôm not a Vegas party girl, and I try to steer clear of The Strip whenever I can. On my latest visit, I checked out Oddfellows. The vibe is super fun, and the music is always good. What really stood out to me was the security team. They are extremely polite, they handle the crowds perfectly and make you feel safe without being pushy. It‚Äôs definitely the kind of place I‚Äôll return to whenever I‚Äôm in town for business.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lolly Zavacky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdfIdvkUifZGwCgM8AKwMQBgilzjvPXDK7Q0ljGBxYBHQalz5_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Literally my favorite nightclub to visit everytime I‚Äôm in Vegas and on Fremont! Security is top notch, the bartenders are always friendly, drinks are super reasonable, but the vibes are the best! Local and tourist friendly. Karaoke on Tuesdays is my fave! Can‚Äôt wait to go back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dark Nebula","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtNZ--PRbcIwpG3xYVpXp1fUom0mErgM_IeeuBOn1FD2tT6bM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The bouncer from last night physically wrapped his arms around me to stop me from going in after he said my ID was good to go. He said we needed to pay a cover. Simply saying hey or blocking with his body would‚Äôve sufficed he didn‚Äôt need to bear hug me it was insane because I‚Äôm a woman and completely inappropriate. Then when he asked for a $10 cover as a woman which was crazy as well, I asked him well what music is playing tonight and he ignored me so I asked again and he seems annoyed and just said ‚Äúdark‚Äù and brushed me off. Avoid this place. Do not touch me I will absolutely report it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Potato Muffin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWA9mhXtmbAStxkZwfWn7fdRhAd0KVpEDmUCrDjFxsr88I6CsVv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I went in there with my friend but i had to goto the bathroom. I had no clue where my friends were, so i went upstairs looking for them, and they weren't up there , so i went back downstairs. When i finally found my friend, the bouncer said i was too drunk to be there. I had literally only been there to use the bathroom and look for my friend. I had no other drinks when i was there. I was completely coherent, but had to leave my friends. I was there for all of an hour MAYBE. literally got in,  went to the bathroom, and got kicked out. Idk who y'all have on staff the night of of 11/7 or morning of 11/8, but they kicked me out after using the bathroom AFTER WE HAD PAID","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"AQUADUDE 1","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWs3KUd-0WTGLK7Oe_06nvuHYVjm0CJvWi5vrWdME1EFySMnb7e=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have a great time as always at oddfellows, and my man Todd here is always a great bartender. He‚Äôs always there when I go, brings out drinks quick, and very chill guy to chat with. I would definitely recommend coming here, and coming straight to this man for ur drinks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCAporJ-0xVF20aradDO4fK\u0026fid=0x0:0x2f45c36d974db8bb"],"When":"2025-12-11"},{"Name":"Freq Mandala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcGnhBH7bdcg23v6N4jfkcNgHLW7vhSb7YaMDJSWfb27TGi7-5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Has that classic club look just keep in mind it's has a very left-leaning crowd. Expect a lot of gen z with green and purple hair. The music was a strange mixture of pop rap random stuff they call new noise but that was on Friday or Saturday","Images":null,"When":""}]

column5: 3663 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
column31: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":false}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Fast service","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair accessible restroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true},{"name":"Cocktails","enabled":true},{"name":"Dancing","enabled":true},{"name":"Food","enabled":true},{"name":"Hard liquor","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Restroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Trendy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true},{"name":"Tourists","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true}]}]
column32: [{"Name":"Sam Belt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk0-Z2pdqLMHu1ZlRJWRrSTLuQU7mc-0ZI52RTfOcnSEDc_b6Z=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was our group‚Äôs third time doing the party bus, and it somehow keeps topping itself. Joey has been our host all three times, and he is truly the best‚Äîprofessional, fun, and knows exactly how to keep the energy going. This time we did the private bus club crawl and had the best time. It‚Äôs easily the funnest thing we do in Vegas, and we can‚Äôt wait to come back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ricky Dority","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8gmSKp1Xxu6mGY_QqZstE-TzBrMrvwpDl8qvYpk0z0fg6KA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôve been on the sin city party bus 3x in the past year! It has always been a great time and our host Joey has always been the best! Thanks for making our trips to Vegas unforgettable Joey from your friends from Arkansas","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCouJdlVIe6UdlwOMVIs2yx\u0026fid=0x0:0x619a5e33e28f3714"],"When":"2026-1-24"},{"Name":"Whitney McDonald","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKA6E9iqKLYuMcv60XFJA_2HriIROERn1Dga9e1voLc_H8-mg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a fun time and experience! Highly recommend to anyone visiting Vegas. If you are able to request your host for the evening you need to book with Joey!!! He is a blast","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jihad Abdas-Salaam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmZwCG5GPycIgReulYVOlz68mDA54poNYbhOb39F20Iwy0olY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing time with these folks. I had so much fun I called them them and booked on Saturday because Friday was amazing! I‚Äôll definitely be back to Vegas to link up with them. The party bus was legit it was literally a club on wheels lol! I‚Äôm telling I never danced that much in my life. I might‚Äôve of even broke out so new moves I didn‚Äôt know I had in my repertoire. I met a lot of good people this weekend and I‚Äôm definitely looking forward to going back and doing this again! The hostess and host were amazing and took extremely good care of me. I was by myself in Vegas but I certainly didn‚Äôt feel that way when I got on the party bus tour. I felt like I was apart of the group. 100% recommended for anyone traveling to Vegas looking to have a good time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICWqsCsoAE\u0026fid=0x0:0x619a5e33e28f3714"],"When":"2022-2-23"},{"Name":"Angelica K.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0fbptCvcJogSZLWOLBW6rxHDQDbW77tjZpr-GMA7f9Au1Uyqn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had the best time with the host, Joe! He was so amazing \u0026 had the best energy! The bus was bigger than I expected! It was the size of a city bus with lots of room to sit! Joe went up \u0026 down the bus giving us shots \u0026 making sure every single one of us enjoyed ourselves! We are locals \u0026 will definitely recommend this tour to family \u0026 friends! 5 stars all the way!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Misty Belt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEcfNkYEQ5Mauc0-Be-dkl6tumSuqxOWv8aL21_l5TgdkhPJB3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We‚Äôve been on this ride three times now, all with Joey who is absolutely our favorite!! Literally will always meet up with Joey for this experience! We‚Äôll be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lewis Travers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHdtntdt6fKJviPizVtbHXzJP8zmBiQkTgbkvTJ9UgUK3anQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We did this with a group of friends, and it was an unforgettable experience! From start to finish. Our host, Joey, was outstanding‚Äîenthusiastic, knowledgeable, and engaging. The atmosphere was lively, and the group quickly bonded as we moved from one venue to the next. Overall, the Sin City Pub Crawl is a must-do for anyone looking to experience the nightlife in a vibrant and social way. I highly recommend it to anyone visiting the area or even locals looking for a fun night out. Can't wait to do it again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amelia Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVG1Xkpe1cpz__e4aq_SxnrYIhUT8Tz4-6muqwlFomqM2AU9s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We booked a Groupon since it was my partner‚Äôs first time in Las Vegas and it did not disappoint! We did the day club crawl and Joe was an amazing guide so friendly and so much fun. He really kept the party going!\n\nOur first stop of where we met was at liquid pool at aria and it was super quiet at that time because it was 11:30 in the morning, then we hit up Ayu and ended at marquee which was popping by the time we got there. Definitely recommend bringing your own drinks on the bus or drinking what they make you as vodka soda cans at every club are about 17 to 18 USD and cocktails are $27 and up.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column5: 4633 Paradise Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89169
column18: Compact-but-lush gay nightclub offering theme nights, drag shows, VIP skyboxes & cozy outdoor patio.

column32:
[{"Name":"Sean Huang (Sean)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9Q5clCma8Et7IPltFUTX-eW6sgqCpiplJd7-GW0-yRansy7079Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly great staff. Bartenders were only wearing g-strings. Attractive decoration and it's only $5 for a cup (probably 8 oz) of Long Island Ice Tea. There are a few slot machines. Note: no bags allowed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDV-30WiEmUAODD-YkxWyJv&fid=0x0:0x3c5c68ca8b4c9f5c"],"When":"2025-12-11"},{"Name":"The Kirk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSDiLELRu-O1Dk6gDOzqkHnEPwIPmO5h4CX9NuqiCylK0QJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you are looking for a great time, Pirahna is it. 3 rooms. 2 outdoor areas. Strong but delicious drinks. Beautiful and friendly staff. Great music. All around a great experience for anyone looking for a few drinks or a wild night out. Hands down the best nightclub in Las Vegas.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zab Foxing","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUw4lIk7MM_NfiXOPfE0AGPNn4H7f0EZi0yzZBTHoefSgsxBaLA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gay? Asking yourself WHERE the party is at? This is the place! Always bumping, always a vibe, always a show! Drinks are priced super fair, completely makes up for the cover charge. Right in the heart of the fruit loop so have fun location hopping while you're there! Great drag productions, plus you can go across the street to gypsy and see their drag and order from their sushi bar on the same entry fee. Indoor and outdoor areas available. Plenty of seats if you arrive early enough. Dance floor people actually use!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cameron Holguin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJNrscVxlf1baC8GFO-4wxa6j2MOHU7huh4FSZmtXkwcbzwG1o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I‚Äôve traveled extensively across the United States and the world and been to many establishments and clubs. This was by far the worst I‚Äôve had the displeasure of experiencing. Staff are rude, condescending, and unwelcoming. Security is beyond aggressive. I witnessed multiple people be dragged outside and thrown onto the curb. Not only is this behavior unacceptable, it‚Äôs dangerous. Will not be returning. Highly recommend you take your money elsewhere as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Josue Montoya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1K6ZvAaq3MqNXBmWfzyoc474ndhyG3g8cjoM8enHhJZ7QbA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I love piranha as a concept but oh my god they need new weekend DJs immediately. Its really the same old playlists, the blue room has great variety for the most part, could use a few newer songs. The main red room is a chaotic fever dream, good songs turned in to unnecessary edm messes. Latin room is alright too many oldies sometimes.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dean J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHOrBbY-NXA6ETb9MOCmMANZIKvrl9__iNIpgaoaDcOw03M_wY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lot of fun. Many rooms, each with different vibes and different types of music. There were some great drag shows when I went.

Also, there‚Äôs a big out door area which is great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEJ6FqJ_v9MjL4AE&fid=0x0:0x3c5c68ca8b4c9f5c"],"When":"2025-6-9"},{"Name":"oryx 10","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWC4lds5f0avNvEFfqjfC4HMAjHChhMRREpu3OY5ynYSN8i-FBM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rated best gay nightclub in vegas, and rightfully so, 20$ entrance for none locals and you get entry into gipsy accross the street with that too!
During the week pirahna is free and gispy is closed.
Drinks are reasonable priced, shows are immersive and fabulous.
Gogo dancer are my favorite part, they keep the party going with their moves.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eric Locklear","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcbmGMJUVxOTgGXcdeOa3SSPx-1SbexcSYEGx3rzCj6IipqtJpJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic experience!!  Visited so that we could see plane Jane performing and LOVED THE CLUB.  Multiple areas that play different music which all have their own bars.  Each area feels very separate and the isolated.  Drinks were reasonable and not watered down.  With all the different areas for drinks, never had to wait even though I visited on a busy Saturday night, that happened to also be the 18th anniversary. Gogo Dancers were hott, and entrance fee was 20 for a Saturday night.  Great time!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDzzpjEYA&fid=0x0:0x3c5c68ca8b4c9f5c"],"When":"2024-6-10"}]

column5: 3131 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
column18: High-energy nightclub known for its line-up of prominent DJs, special events & lively crowd.

column32:
[{"Name":"Guacamoeely","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfEJeDLDZMrbwdZg1Ts-msU6lvoizQaWBBZ0QLLLFSp09m5rGS4A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had a great experience here, and the only reason I went was to see DJ Marshmello. The lights/lasers and visuals were very beautiful and the decor was lovely. In my opinion, you can tell a lot of thought was put in to making this club aesthetically pleasing. I was able to get a drink pretty quickly once reaching the bar, however I feel this is because I was there early (before 11) which I would advise anyone to be there in line early on before it opens at 10:30. There was a line around the block, but they were definitely prepared for it. Their staff has people go down the line and check IDs and all that long before you even get to the entrance which is genius and made the process nearly seamless. Will definitely be returning. My only problem was the dance floor was too small.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICEpoPBaQ&fid=0x0:0x82b926ad5cbc08ba"],"When":"2018-3-29"},{"Name":"C T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI40q-L9mQp63BYYTJb6pU8OqqKsjpguA9K8jmKEBaVeIarUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It's fine, good music. $20 drinks.
And like everyone has already mentioned, the security is on power trip. You could tell they were looking for anyone to kick out or not let in.
Be careful, I've had the security physically steal all my cash in the past, and letting‚Äã the other staff know doesn't matter as they are buddies.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICErtvm2QE&fid=0x0:0x82b926ad5cbc08ba"],"When":"2017-4-18"},{"Name":"Julia Thomason","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaNPH6xBE1_LrABLcfRIGrMZE3sfHWlXmpbHYqz2ugTWmy3h8Oxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a great private event at Intrigue. It is a great indoor/outdoor space with tiered seating, a dance floor, stage, bars and large display screen.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDR3qOZqwE&fid=0x0:0x82b926ad5cbc08ba"],"When":"2023-4-26"},{"Name":"Gavin Quinn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvshtcVmc-pDpAF23_Vw35SxvcKroiuRzfUakAllIZ6Y__bfoI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I wanted to dance on the stripper poles, but they wouldn't let me just because I'm male. The poles were not being used, yet I wasn't allowed despite a 2:1 female ratio. I want to be sexy too, why can't I shake my ass too? Some girls were up there just taking snapchats, not dancing at all. If you let makes dance, we would appreciate the opportunity.

Boourns.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICE2eShVQ&fid=0x0:0x82b926ad5cbc08ba"],"When":"2017-8-13"},{"Name":"Chris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUK3Me6d0wDV3GCAz9MsgvasU4rFYPIJwBLXOotyTPws5fDPZHZRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Really difficult to navigate this club.  Came here on a club crawl and it was super packed.  People seemed stressed out though -- this is the only club out of 7 from our recent trip where I got dirty looks when trying to get through a crowd to the bar.  Eventually just gave up because not having fun and we went and grabbed a quick and much-needed sandwich.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDEt-WP1AE&fid=0x0:0x82b926ad5cbc08ba"],"When":"2017-6-14"},{"Name":"Kortney (NurseKortney)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIv2aPYD5t44DYrEarB1f7dtwRO1sb2sP-mBF2OUB7dJtu5JDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It's very pretty, dance floor is decent. I do enjoy the decor. Not my favorite nightclub in Las Vegas, but it is up there on the list.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC4tKv8Sw&fid=0x0:0x82b926ad5cbc08ba"],"When":"2017-11-9"},{"Name":"Benjamin Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1GLxOR-DWaR3A5lc9Gdlu4P1sszWLsnxkQ3K0i9dxFDRmzNE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The security and dress code here is the strictest of all the clubs I went to on the strip. They won't let any type of medicine in. Even through it was in their prepackaging. Also, they had my friend smile exactly like the photo in her ID and had me take off my glasses to match my ID. The guy girl ratio here was definitely nice. They were a significantly higher amount of girls than guys. That might be due to the high cover charge for guys (around 75 from the night I went.) I definitely recommend getting on guestlist. There was free champagne for the ladies the night I went. Also, coat check here is extremely expensive, 20 bucks per coat. The inside is nice. The music on the night we went was bad. Overall I probably won't return. The place and staff felt too pretentious for me.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christy Tillman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLsnFDgwCdqm2dradxj0li8Sa0lQUwBW6wevXTXU3mweKs7i7XO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My only complaint is that the dance floor was shoulder to shoulder packed. Everything else was great! We had a table on the patio and the server was so incredibly sweet. The music was good and we got through security promptly. I'm not a huge club person but I would go back.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Alex Gonzalez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-pQexrdTxvTQCEynhElVLcsWKwg7L85GyW9533HHzqq-oaXV7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Let me just start by saying, wow!!!!! The service was amazing! Staff was super friendly and welcoming from the promoter, to door staff to the bartender and let‚Äôs not forget GM!!! My girl behind the bar, Nicky, just wow! Just made sure we were taken care of. Drinks were strong and the deals here are amazing. Best prices in the Fremont experience area! My boi GM Vince was there during the whole night and insured our experience was the best time! I will definitely be coming back again!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDScjejpMSH8aJ9ZHAB0VHU&fid=0x0:0x8ecab3bd8b8e9cfc"],"When":"2026-1-16"},{"Name":"Kaitlyn P.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhmenNVID01omQEqMM34gZ0p8qMsHWDG7b7_SNL1H7L88lWVY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We LOVED Ryan and Vince. Review for Ryan and Vince at Raised by Wolves.

üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü

I had an excellent experience at Raised by Wolves, thanks to the fantastic bartending team of Ryan and Vince! From the moment we sat down, their dedication to crafting great drinks was evident.

Ryan's expertise shone through as he expertly mixed our shots. Each shot was perfectly balanced and delicious, showcasing his keen understanding of flavor profiles. He took the time to suggest options based on our preferences, making sure we got exactly what we were looking for.

If you‚Äôre looking for superb cocktails in a welcoming atmosphere, I highly recommend visiting Raised by Wolves and letting Ryan and Vince take care of your drink order. Their talent truly sets this place apart! Can‚Äôt wait to return for more great drinks! Cheers! ü•Ç","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jada J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtMjOic8aKseJLWIxrKlWXhqmIhntN-vE7c7Imp5yPj63_dg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The music was amazing! Not to mention, Nicky was an amazing bartender. She took really good care of us and made sure we had a great time while being in the establishment! 10/10 I would recommend to anyone !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brianne Vasana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEnjvdlgc9hbFIL7zj6LMdm6L61oOyXb06akFggjDiaocanx0QnA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an amazing night thanks to Nicky behind the bar! Her service was top-notch, she was very friendly, fast, and super attentive to my group even when the place got busy. She gave great drink recommendations and always checked in to make sure everyone was taken care of. The wristband included access until 1 AM as well as re-entry, so it was definitely worth it!!! Nicky made my first experience here memorable, I‚Äôll be coming back just for her awesome service!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Theara Rice","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzYlr0vbgnuM_Vu2oMyTi3x14JeLrs5lbD1cxtxh33RTG1RA1l=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great night I had at this bar with my family! Thank you to their bartender Nicky for giving us an unforgettable experience in Vegas. We love her energy so much! It got us all dancing to the great music the DJ was playing! We'll definitely be back to come visit Nicky and experience their party bus pub crawl with open bar!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karl Mc Cann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTrRFWt2MzEFQydHHqCs8ptSedlmL1L2FT5LGK-K744bvgIw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nicky was amazing so polite an friendly. Full of conversation an had a laugh. She made great drinks an even stuff not on the menu she went out her way to make. She very experianced bartender happilly come back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dabrielle Hawkins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPcdCuIOmooN04txhVmlyF_z0HjF1ZjyPR8ssbEPfBNvfnHKU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nicky was the beat server ever. If you visit, make sure you request for her to be your saver. I was visting vegas from chicago and she took extremely great care of me and my partner. We enjoyed svery second of this atomosphere. Thank you so much Nicky!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"dianne bergstresser","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKS4IQozCDA5S9JDzrNHNvXRkieCJ7eYIBgabGEE2-Vi8MOKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Raised by wolves is a great bar that's different than the usual. Atmosphere is fantastic, the prices are great, the bartenders are friendly especially NICKY. She's the best of the best and on top of it.  Definitely  the place to be.
We love you Nicky!!
Troy and Dianne","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32: [{"Name":"Ryan Strassburger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWvsuZghyYY3PP4IcCzu6T7JjU5cNyhCSZ_VSrdUDA8txSf_2Z=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place absolutely blasts music all day and night, even when it is entirely empty. Anyone staying nearby cannot get any sleep, day or night, due to their extremely loud music. I get the idea of a club but having it open air with the music at a 6487473 out of 10, even in the early afternoon WHILE THEY HAVE ZERO CUSTOMERS tells me that the people that run this place have no regard for others. I wouldn‚Äôt do business with them","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dana Victoria","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLNZOGeiv9uN9qY4u3omkm7sw8YNmLaaXpC5EfEJ12fDvIdeU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Three beautiful ladies on the main floor and maybe one was training? Not the fastest service but lively atmosphere on a Sunday night! $20 for locals. Womp","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDNtuT1kwE\u0026fid=0x0:0xed0a0e3189680f5b"],"When":"2024-1-22"},{"Name":"AHMED SHAH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYmbVFjbvfBf2mZHOz_HpZ2VC2E3hLBRZyUH6bqn96XwPQQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Zouk Nightclub at Resorts World offers cutting-edge visuals, world-class DJs, vibrant dance floors, upscale vibe, VIP service, and energetic crowds, but expect steep drink prices, long lines, and strict upscale dress code.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Blayne Sofab","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8Ofv_iw86yBzRaVH4TlphxKhiaj3gTn4icaPY28OhtBen4xDMnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Great atmosphere and vibe, but drinks weren‚Äôt strong enough for how much they were charging. DJ sucked too, couldn‚Äôt keep in time, too many annoying sound effects that just didn‚Äôt make sense, and too many sudden changes in mood. This place has potential.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICOseH-QQ\u0026fid=0x0:0xed0a0e3189680f5b"],"When":"2022-6-12"},{"Name":"Karly A.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4pkByfFKTVDf1PlKVem7f3R2Kd3-FDtJ7xO_KXQZP6yXh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place was dead on a Saturday night, 2 beers costed $21 USD, and the place smelled so bad it was unbearable. Like farts. Sulphur. Hard boiled eggs. It was disgusting. Lasted about 45 mins there and then left. No one was dancing, DJ was mediocre. He was trying but the club was just dead and boring. The smell was just awful.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2sJm6WzOEdwWea4PyRTVI82wGYXDT4TkWPWnzLJic1Yo6SadZ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time in Vegas our Uber recommended this place. The dj on the rooftop last night, Saturday night, was everything and super funny. Probably the best dj in Vegas so far played all the good music. We got there towards the end but the music was good and vibe was nice!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carlos Nunez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuY3RoXDUloUR2nzgiNs_yS-8TJ8K69HTDe2GfORGFIVMWGWc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't think of a better place to enjoy the Las Vegas nightlife than at Zoo Nightclub. The best part about this club? You're sure to meet some new friends while you dance all weekend long!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tisha Gallow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPaAdPBpA-Qrhp1BrBgZwtXrkHU3_HYgtQ2A7kwDJTvXdPiUGd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Visiting from Seattle and was looking for a place to dance on my last night. I called and hit option 2. Some guy BARELY answered the phone and was obviously passed out. I said hello 3 times and he hung up on me without saying anything. I called RIGHT back thinking there was a bad connection. The same guy MUMBLED hello again. I said, \"Did I wake you?\" He MUMBLED, \"No.\" I said, \"are you guys opened tonight?\" He MUMBLED, \"No.\" And hung up on me. TACKY and UNPROFESSIONAL!","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32: [{"Name":"George Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXv6ycfoHtE80rpqh2i_ivmczO30kr4XC12WGoEbt1q7W91CBCk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Went to the so called location and it‚Äôs nothing but offices.  there was a guy their and he drove us to the honeys strip club . It was weird and thought it was a scam but decided to give it a try  . It was a cool experience. But is this the same club as Honeys?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Travon Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUITEKR9GlQh38UH7nO6kJjYFaQOTDYANlgkbv2wBo74sumFzY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Booking a limo with them was easy.  they came and got us in about 10 minutes after calling.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lee Brookes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILCmt2yTfmGLRC6jvVdSYS7_AdUlBR0d_nrfJmMOwICUMA7A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've had the most unforgettable time during my stay in Las Vegas, and a huge credit goes to Strip Club Concierge's limo and concierge service! The team was exceptionally friendly. They were incredibly knowledgeable about the best places to visit, and their recommendations were spot on. The prompt pickup, combined with the luxurious interior, set the tone for an amazing night out. Despite the bustling downtown, the limo ride felt exclusive and personal. The attention to detail, the personalized touch, and the overall professionalism of the Strip Club Concierge team truly made my visit to Las Vegas unforgettable. I can't wait to return for another round of fantastic adventures with them!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Trisha Venus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKfHjQv0nzdn6blLCs-goZ7ORnAbpY34pDZG-lTDfvrMQZydsm=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a fun experience! I had a few friends coming in to visit me in Vegas and I wanted to give them the time of their lives hehe\nI had to give them the full Vegas experience, so I arranged a Limo through Strip Club Concierge and our wonderful driver took us around to Peppermint Hippo. Jimmy was so fun and absolutely fantastic! The guys had such a great time booking through Strip Club Concierge made everything so seamless for us. Thank you! Would highly recommend (:","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jaydon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwyMasG-68ZkHiOResuQk8M3qP7MJ9HYuEowHlnVMEg9F8b5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Celebrated my 21st birthday in Vegas last month and a friend of mine recommended to use this limo service.  He was spot on! It did not disappoint.  My friends and I partied like rockstars not having have to worry the driving part. They provided a round-trip service from our hotel, to Spearmint Rhino + Return ride All FREE but yes, you just need to buy 2 drinks..","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ann Brienalyn Egdamen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRWLGUOPQAwD6rg_SfjZdr1AFiIlqOVENis2Bq9r4ZwB_dIA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you are just wanting to go to strip clubs for free, don‚Äôt use uber and save your self cash for the girls, just give these guys a call and they‚Äôll  take you and your buddies there at  no cost. You just have to buy two drinks!  Great deal limo service overall","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jorge Ixtabalan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKADBbetow2dkATeZIHIRc0Q_WRLjvU6A98q2Mk9FSZJMIyLw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Firstly, the ride is FREE! You just can‚Äôt beat that, just purchase 2 drinks! My buddies and I felt safe and comfortable having such a cool driver pick us up and take us for a joy ride across the strip last night after getting wasted. Driver was friendly and made this year‚Äôs vegas experience even more memorable.  Please use this service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica Cummings","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJc3i_19q7aP8GUPpYVc5wAD9pzulBGrH2LkPHjZmS8J9qtXw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great deal. Considering the ride is Free and a pick up service that takes you back to your Hotel is a already WIN! You just have to buy 2 drinks minimum. Still beats than using LYFT, UBER who will charge you $15 with NO drinks! I‚Äôd just use these guys. I hope you get Gary as your driver. Really nice guy and a smooth safe driver. 10 stars from me.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column18: Museumlike club at Planet Hollywood offering hip-hop & dance DJs plus dancers on overhead nets.

column32: [{"Name":"Amanda Dewey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-HhetfjuQ2fssqfcFVbq-bjy09Rh1WjnglDYr0_nD1loY9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It was overall a decent club to go to. I waited in line for longer than expected but when i got in we were sat at a table. the service was good but it took a while to get our drinks served to us. It felt really crowded and small but still played good music. overall it was okay, definitely nothing special","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alicia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKysse-aPaYAcqo0SW4HlAelGULW5SHU8o2XE89KgcqG0bYZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I absolutely agree w/the other review. This is NIOT the place 2 go 4 the Vegas experience. Unfortunately we(me \u0026 my husband) had 2 go the twice. The REGULAR CUSTOMERS get treated horrible. The 1st nite we went was an accident. Me \u0026 my best friend were approached by a guy n the casino of Planet Hollywood(never stay there again) w/wrist bands asking if we wanted 2 go 2 a club. Free admission \u0026 OPEN bar til midnite. With an hour of open bar time left we followed him 2 the front of the imaginary line he talked about \u0026 up 2 the club. Free drinks, of course, were watered down, music was terrible \u0026 the bouncers gav my husband such a hard time we ended up leaving. They hassled him about where he was sitting his drink \u0026 taking his sunglasses off. Seriously?!?! That nite we left \u0026 went 2 Haze! Much better treatment \u0026 all around club. Then, my best friend had a b.day party 4 her husband so we were forced 2 go bak. Once again we were treated like peons from the start. The bouncer grabbed my hand forcefully \u0026 slammed the stamp on before sending us upstairs w/o n e well wishes 4 the nite. Once we made it 2 the reserved VIP area my friends had we were made 2 stand there waiting unnecessarily 4 about 5 minutes. This place stinks \u0026 so do the bouncers. We stayed 30 minutees 2 long \u0026 went 2 PURE. Awesome club !!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sheila Soileau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3s96XWUsPvduInhoXp9QRCI8qMTP6dXfrHckLWtjzV4UCUJolMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Spacious and nice vibe","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Darya Shestakova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnzi3YfPqisBmdnMaXXCRJ5Pa9M-ZJGYaFC2uHr3CyXgiH0h-yWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They serve tasty cocktails, including some creative options. If you want to sit at the table, it's 2 drinks per person minimum, but the table service is quick and friendly.
There's a DJ on site, playing different styles of music. One night we've been there, it was R'n'B and Hip Hop, which we liked. Another night, it was mostly Latin music. So, it depends on your taste if you're going to like it or not.
But the crowd was nice, the cocktails were good, and the ambiance was pumping.  And they're open till late night.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBjf_nHOZ7uPBMMxuJALA4K&fid=0x0:0xf699283d16b32e74"],"When":"2025-7-20"},{"Name":"Eric Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWi-XqvTmjsXkv33i-O9Hs5Ys81FzVpC0cwV0hJ5u8P_7tfqfM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We had drinks at this lounge last evening. The place was empty. The had signs on every table, "saying 2 drink minimum." I watched many folks come in, read the sign, and leave.

Our waitress was rude. She was more concerned about closing out the tab before we even had a sip of our drink. She never came back once to check on us, so we left.

A manager needs to oversee this bar & lounge. You are chasing away business with you 2 drink minimum at $20+ per beverage. The staff needs training on how to just be nice.

No, I can not recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICj56fg9gE&fid=0x0:0xf699283d16b32e74"],"When":"2024-4-26"},{"Name":"Sconnie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBrBKuRfRtrWnfsuFipV9JY_45a3I6cCXge4FB79w_2eQJhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a blast here on a Saturday night! The dj was great and created a fun atmosphere. The bartender with the grey long beard was not so nice and definitely made us feel like an inconvenience by being there. We even tipped well after every round. The other bartenders, however, were great. Would definitely come here again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"DREAMS4U lisa.johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6DKff73U9shG-UMNjJW4CVlCOYXuZ3djfBFD3W4qWNNqSoZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Service terrible.  Waitress was asking for payment as she was taking our drink order (before we even had drinks).  Two drink min per table even though it is empty.  Not sure why the lounge is called what it is.  Not cozy and chairs not comfortable.  Drink prices extreme.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDjto7N1wE&fid=0x0:0xf699283d16b32e74"],"When":"2024-5-3"},{"Name":"pratyush kumar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlbJUI7IznVioZED3WJkXUx3GGeE866i0LlBH8q-329CLJT8DBvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It‚Äôs fine. Happy hour menu is small but you should try their mango Moscow mule or the Mexican old fashioned.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK2fHdSgxYWzj7hqAb4yjyMAdhmcxUeJXY7tJbPRzNzRUPM8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was here for a conference party and the bar was consistently good. The drinks were great, the staff friendly and the food for one of the party it‚Äôs was fabulous. They had a great variety of pizzas that were delicious. It‚Äôs definitely more of a club atmosphere than a relaxing bar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICe0crI3gE&fid=0x0:0xf699283d16b32e74"],"When":"2022-9-16"},{"Name":"Jeffrey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKewGjohOY-D-rLwEbYdgdupjIqGD5xdLRFt0ShTvg0oE6SQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Bartenders are the rudest and worst people. Rob was  rude and disrespectful. He was responsible for several beautiful people walking away.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lawrencia L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUazeiWNmEXti_W3JlqeuDRtjYvR9HCmIibwR85JalqQs0W5bLq_w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here for a conference happy hour and the waitress was amazing! I had the best apple martini and espresso martini. I can‚Äôt wait to come back and try the food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDD1Yu97QE&fid=0x0:0xf699283d16b32e74"],"When":"2024-4-12"}]

Hit him up and let him know Rome sent you for guarantee VIP treatment!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID7j-ewhwE\u0026fid=0x0:0xa42ee5bcd0a7f63a"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Vanessa Ramirez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0CUjfeaPvX85eGCD4Ttg_PlWS5U_xcTUN_qQbpk6YsNlAfLwGsA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ali is one of the most talented hosts in Vegas! I truly mean that. Im hosted in Vegas by a few big properties due to my expensive gambling habits üôÉand they are  not very attentive or welcoming to their clients. We‚Äôre just a number to them. Ali is a very humble and loving person.He always goes above and beyond. He always greets you a big smile and a warm hug. Contact him for any of your Vegas needs. Promise you, you won‚Äôt  be disappointed. Very proud of you sir, never change!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hayley Knapp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMcn5aWWNLz0NztYRCeMYtNN2oSIfcFqeAhRCV8xMP2VmlP283=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ali always takes care of me whenever I go to Vegas! I believe I have known him for over 10 years now and even when I text him the day I am getting there he responds right away and sends me everything happening that weekend so that I can choose what I want to do easily. Highly recommend! ü•Ç","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"lacinda reyes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWB8lKhYnQsR7P99PQBHTpS30fZDIBdl_5AmXnioFypoZImsvZK=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"5 stars isn't enough for Ali, He went above and beyond to make our night unforgettable. From the moment we walked in, he treated us like VIPs, getting us a prime table and making sure our drinks were always full. He even surprised us with a complimentary bottle of champagne to celebrate my friend's birthday! Ali‚Äôs attention to detail, charisma, and dedication to his guests is truly impressive. He's the reason we'll be back at Drais again and again. If you want an exceptional night out, ask for Ali!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Angel Ash-Blair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwxqLtojBsM2w5JPpVLT8jE9BFlnl9j487NA6XqcbkftPWsNo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the best experience! Easy transportation and  had multiple nightlife options for my weekend trip! Ali made the whole experience easy to plan and he was very communicative towards any questions I had! Would definitely go through him again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Doris Alexander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDgoJWN5yJjTIIU662ArVXn7p0BN3e_QexzVf5zQ3ksMX2iA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ali is the best Vegas promoter! 10+ years he‚Äôs been taking care of my events! Nothing but positive experiences!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gabriella Testa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLfaYvDNQwLMAAlsJTnxZX1n_uqKqV5ZHRbvHk_CBXFxWhPKg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you‚Äôre coming to Vegas you need to book with this company! I had the best experience, from the beginning to end. The communication with the host was excellent any questions I had were answered. From the venue, to the transportation, to the party itself was amazing. I‚Äôve partied around the world and this was the best experience I‚Äôve ever had. Vegas is amazing and this experience for me and my friends was even better. If you‚Äôre new to Vegas or have been here multiple times I promise you‚Äôve never had an experience like this! Please book here you will not be disappointed!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"TK Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsIt0rOBKJ5euU4y3GYJHth_DDvaYmhHS1GSS_eRhjpF7OGA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ali is the best promoter in LV! column32:
[{"Name":"Rich K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX14fzSdWKvJevjrL8RAdOG5qqEhUD6qvmiGkGWuCq_lylr-FKr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"If you‚Äôre searching for a bar with sky-high views that will literally take your breath away, this place should be at the top of your list. The panoramic skyline is unreal‚Äîlike stepping into a postcard. Sunset here? Absolutely magical. The space is sleek, the ambiance is classy without trying too hard, and every photo looks like it belongs on a travel magazine cover.

But here‚Äôs the part I can‚Äôt wrap my head around: it‚Äôs‚Ä¶ kind of dead.

For a place with views this insane, you‚Äôd expect it to be packed every night. Instead, it feels like I stumbled onto a well-kept secret‚Äîor a secret that‚Äôs too well-kept. There were only a handful of people scattered around, which made the vibe a little flat. Not bad, just oddly quiet for a bar that should be buzzing.

On the plus side, no crowds means fast service, plenty of space, and uninterrupted views. On the downside, if you‚Äôre looking for energy or a social scene, you might be left wondering where everyone else went.

Still, I‚Äôm rooting for this spot. The potential is sky high‚Äîliterally. If they can bring in some life to match the view, it could be one of the best bars in the city.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBd3ybEj6irlXKDslOihlZL&fid=0x0:0x7b319f2cd8dc421e"],"When":"2025-11-14"},{"Name":"Krystiana Nelson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFGjgvyladj3UMyYcHEklDhxPKGoaFAfdHhWqAHnbTKCycRWr29A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing cocktails crafted with precision and care. Most beautiful view and space in Vegas. Bartenders are so sweet, knowledgeable, and kind!!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBJr6dbulh6vtHFFazmJ6qB&fid=0x0:0x7b319f2cd8dc421e"],"When":"2025-10-28"},{"Name":"Kelly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgaa9EfhT5b1ntIwodKbqS_TBCmg2NR8uZ-1WnjbWfBC9Y36Cv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This rooftop bar was everything I hoped for. The views were unreal‚Äîperfect place to catch the sunset. The staff at the bar were super friendly, and the cocktails did not disappoint. Great whiskey selection too. Also a solid spot if you want to sip and unwind with a cigar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEMye8qG32JXlRA&fid=0x0:0x7b319f2cd8dc421e"],"When":"2025-6-9"},{"Name":"Dr. Michelle ‚ÄúMishka‚Äù Salga","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9gVDTNI2EWY527C46y025xjuyUc742cVLx5ar2aYTgaY_QKY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The drinks are absolutely out of this world. The mixologists there are next level artists. Some of the best cocktails I have ever had! Awesome atmosphere. Spectacular views.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD9s9QIAyF24r7bKCLS5j_a&fid=0x0:0x7b319f2cd8dc421e"],"When":"2025-10-9"},{"Name":"Matthew Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ30Gyy1eW6toeFLXrZcxI_vM6MfHUkmvQCaJMXRZ-tHSu96Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great atmosphere, service and drinks. Had two cocktails and a glass of champagne with the sunset package.
The only thing is the booking and prices on website are not that clear.
However next time I‚Äôm in Vegas I may consider staying at Circa in freemont st rather than the strip","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC0wsFveA5LSl1A0gMg-mhn&fid=0x0:0x7b319f2cd8dc421e"],"When":"2025-8-10"},{"Name":"Jared ‚Äúohmazing‚Äù Perez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIEYW671UAeCRKa9n4ktfNvamn2euL1haWQ59kKn2tPEEJryy2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely phenomenal experience at the Legacy Club at Circa! From the moment we stepped off the elevator, the ambiance, the skyline views, and the elegant decor set the tone for a perfect night. But what truly elevated our experience was the incredible service from Dominic behind the bar.

Dominic was the definition of professionalism‚Äîsharp, attentive, and genuinely passionate about his craft. He offered spot-on recommendations based on our tastes, mixed each cocktail with precision, and kept the energy upbeat without ever being intrusive. It‚Äôs rare to come across a bartender who can match the vibe of such a high-class venue, and Dominic nailed it.

Whether you‚Äôre a local or just visiting Vegas, the Legacy Club is a must‚Äîand if you‚Äôre lucky enough to be served by Dominic, you‚Äôre in for a world-class experience. 5 stars all the way!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDopsO9Nw&fid=0x0:0x7b319f2cd8dc421e"],"When":"2025-4-24"},{"Name":"Melystikal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_zZ0jNEXyjc38LDHsiOqiwSMR3hvgPZEv-ABI9lLsv6z-9Fc6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Celebrated my marriage as newlyweds at the Legacy Club. Drinks were exquisite. My husband got the $100 Midas Touch and Black Chip Old Fashioned drinks and was impressed by the quality of each drink. The bartenders are truly professional and know how to make the experience worth it. They even made me a blackberry champagne thats not on the menu. I would definitely come here again. One thing though...dress code doesn't seem to be really enforced. I seen a man wearing cargo shorts which I thought was not recommend. Either way it did not mess with my vibe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEKP7sa2dlZ_GZQ&fid=0x0:0x7b319f2cd8dc421e"],"When":"2025-5-13"},{"Name":"Margaret Case","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZhcMnT8ZGQb20hKC1ZM71ad-g7MohOmZfzzNLJopkr7tXYX2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to this bar for a special occasion drink on the outdoor patio. The views were stunning. Recommend making an online reservation for a 4-top table (we were only a party of two) and you can sit near the edge and watch the world below. We counted about 30 helicopters go past this patio. It was not windy but we hear it can be too much wind sometimes.
We had a 6:30 reservation, saw the sun set, stayed til 8:45. Don‚Äôt get the food package, just the drinks.
The drinks were all delicious (we had the rose bubbles and a cocktail each), prices were a little high but worth it. Staff was really nice and professional.
Would go back for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCosqnBHw&fid=0x0:0x7b319f2cd8dc421e"],"When":"2025-4-16"}]
