column32:
[{"Name":"Charrissa Richardson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKK-gVSnVYthOtsEFbJ4oH3OfRi_VT5OHZvxIQAcEe1z1rDYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"All SCAMMERS inside!!
Beware the worse strip club. We were recommended this place by an uber driver to later find out it was because he gets commission for brining pple there. We ordered 1 round of drinks and they brought double of what we ordered and also brought us drinks we did not even order. We tried to get it corrected before even drinking anything and the short loud Asian waitress threw a screaming fit like a toddler because she didn‚Äôt want to take back the drinks we never ordered. She was trying to force us to pay for drinks that were not ours even screaming at us. On the way out she was laughing with security as they did nothing to help either. Also we purchased $150 in drink vouchers and they also stole the remaining balance. Believe the bad reviews they will scam you out of your money. If I could give zero stars I would. This is not a safe place !!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matt Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGi_2nlHSDkTGRQ2mRIduQxCiK4dMOHLJALrMh6MX7kGm0z5Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I got a free limo ride with my buddies from Bellagio and got free entry! The girls were hot but the atmosphere wasn‚Äôt quite there compared to other clubs in Vegas. But still had a good time! Thank you all","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lauren Cadilac","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOypgjoEu_PEJiJPmf89ZK-aq6AY053UjtVifz7jzduY5uYul63Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Sat there for an entire hour. Saw the full rotation of dancers. One set of boobs. On an hour. Oh an 1 free glass of tap water. Hard no.  Go to Dallas for a real club.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bob J.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ12KN_ngJlgpEd6qkIuntk2LquMI0ozXc_syVwJXaGDngs5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My son went here, got drunk, and they charged him $1300 twice, after paying over $300 for a private room. Strippers convinced him to sign debit card authorizations on an iPad so he cannot successfully contest the charges. The strippers also emptied his wallet which had $600-$700 in it. DO NOT GO TO THIS CLUB!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karissa Langellier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpFhm_D7T4dsAoQ_U05u5k0IrCEYBFMoX-8lZqGtWbnI3NFS_n=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"First timer review: my husband and I went on a Thursday night last week. Neither of us have ever been to a strip club. We got picked up at the hotel and tipped the driver. No charge for the ride, it was apart of the weekday special I bought ahead of time. The special was to include a ride to the club, a bottle of casa Migos tequila or a bottle of grey goose vodka, unlimited carafes of mixers you wanted (juice or soda is what the ad says), no cover, VIP entry, and table on the main floor. We were picked up by a very polite driver and taken to the club. We were taken straight to VIP entry and let in with no cover as promised. Once inside we were taken to our table on the main floor. Here is were things started to not add up. 2 girls sat down with us IMMEDIATELY, I didn't even have my coat off yet. No issues here, they were very chill and not pushy at all. One girl was offering lap dances 3 songs for $100 which I thought was reasonable but she was taken by another couple before we could go through with it. Another girl joined us instead, she was also lovely. Our "server" came to our table and asked us if we wanted tequila or vodka. I said vodka and she tells me that it's a bottle of STOLI. I have a screenshot of the package I bought that specifically says grey goose. I didn't say anything and moved on. She then asks what mixers we want and before I can respond she says our options are cranberry, pineapple, and sold water..... The package said any juices or soda but we were told no. After a short time she brings the bottle, mixers, glasses and ice. At no point did she ever come back. There was also no water offered for the table. I had my husband go to the bar to get me a bottle of water and it was $12. No surprising for Vegas I guess but you would think water would be included with a table. We ended up going to the back with a girl for $200 for 15 minutes, she was lovely and so much fun but the server back there (we were REQUIRED to buy a drink in the back there) was awful. Very rude. Security also interrupted our time back there. ATM fees are about $36 for $200. Bring your own cash for sure. Some of the reviews say you have to get bunny money but we did not have to. Girls on stage were pretty entertaining but nothing too crazy. I will try other places in Vegas before coming back to form a more rounded opinion. 3 stars, not a horrible visit but some shady things for sure.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"VegasDining","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX__NRyV-2bmXmtKPrMLjDkHSZhe2Jk9gbqmF6qwc_HHCvwfOM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Crazy Horse III isn‚Äôt just about the eye candy‚Äîthe food is a showstopper, too! Located right across from Allegiant Stadium, this spot is perfect for sports viewing parties, offering locals discounts and a menu that goes way beyond your average bar fare. Their sliders are juicy, the fried egg rolls are crispy perfection, the wings are downright addictive, and the pizza? Let‚Äôs just say you won‚Äôt leave a single slice behind. Pair it all with craft cocktails from their in-house mixologist and a menu crafted by a former private celebrity chef, and you‚Äôve got a winning night out.

With locals specials they also have bottle service with the 1L big bottles and not the standard size which took care of our entire table of 6!  Total steal for those bachelor parties. Prices and deal change often, it definitely doesn‚Äôt hurt to inquire within to quote within about your locals discounts!

Oh, and the dancers? Not bad either.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDgmo3FKA&fid=0x0:0x9370d19145e1fd43"],"When":"2025-2-24"},{"Name":"Deluxe Bucks 99","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNTSomz7KiJrvk8gBNYBGLX_hFzp2GHgO7oYS0AgYwImx2bj25=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I'm a 65-year-old retired accountant from Wisconsin, and I thought I'd treat myself to a night out at Crazy Horse 3 Gentleman's Club during my recent trip to Las Vegas. The club itself was alright, the performers were talented, and the atmosphere was lively.

However, my experience was completely ruined by a self-described "house limo" driver who claimed to be affiliated with the club. This short, aggressive individual approached me outside the club and offered to drive me to my hotel in his black SUV.

At first, I thought it was a courtesy service provided by the club, but things quickly took a turn for the worse. The driver made unwanted advances towards me, which made me extremely uncomfortable. I tried to brush him off, but he continued to persist.

I'm still not sure if this individual was actually affiliated with Crazy Horse 3 or if he was just some scam artist preying on unsuspecting tourists. When I asked a security worker at the club about the driver, he told me that it was indeed their driver, but I'm not convinced.

Overall, my experience at Crazy Horse 3 was marred by this disturbing encounter. I would advise others to be cautious when dealing with anyone claiming to be affiliated with the club, especially if they're offering rides or other services","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCIgsapKA&fid=0x0:0x9370d19145e1fd43"],"When":"2025-3-31"},{"Name":"Eric Ogren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3E2imt7rTo2P0EKLkqwW2SEzePV_GRKv_MBuwXr7vcb1v451Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I requested a limo from a nearby casino and that went well. When I arrived at the club, no cover (Tuesday night) . A beautiful woman latched on as soon as I entered the club and followed me to the bar. I could not relax as she repeated the prices as if it were a script. I told her no. I want ready, get lost all to no avail. Eventually, I told the bartender. She left, but not for long. I paid $200 for 15 mins. in private, interrupted by drink service. lame. She seemed to want more $ after the dance, I left the club.","Images":null,"When":""}]

I made my way towards him and used my years of fighting in the war to make my legs way into his head, knocking him out and leaving his unconscious body on the deck. They stopped the party but I was still having a good time, I find this very disappointing. I am a 78 year old man, so this was very scary. Bad security. (This is me in the photo attachment)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICzs67Z-QE\u0026fid=0x0:0x8cfd9b782389ed19"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"Victor Moisei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUI0OPkIs8D18nDi-Cj6ihBapuG4zKlhEiTC_JKPcJF4VwsrtxEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Don‚Äôt trust this address!!!!!!not recommended","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Austin McGrath","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJv_ufXcn70qkY5jDuZVntArLZ4eEcgnMsIrJ_PSyXANdvCzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a good time at the strip club in Vegas. column32:
[{"Name":"Shelly Bese-Doolittle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQBcYtJ2PrME5y9DrLE_xWTVNgtvLlY6OUdjuweCvpkMdxVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So I was a little worried about how my night was going to go when the ticket holder said they could not deliver my tickets but they upgraded us to the Hyde Lounge. Coming from out of town we didn't really understand if that was good or bad. Turned out really good because of calling the lounge with my concerns and Justin at the front taking amazing care of us! The vip seats were fantastic! Sitting on a couch, sipping whiskey and eating while watching Stevie Nicks! Life was good, don't think I could see a concert there anyway else! Service was great, and bathroom literally behind you...and some customers complained about the view and noise of people around you...what, the sound of people having a good time?! Please, sit me up there anytime! So thankful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB-x-0bzofl3tKJV8ebjVbb&fid=0x0:0x35cbad09b458a39f"],"When":"2025-10-26"},{"Name":"Enoc Fernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJOYnVu3XQ_CPWyQZys9BwnOFDnZBOIdMizo1WIxxEYAePA2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family and I attended our very first Lakers Game and during the in Season  NBA tournament in Las Vegas. We got lucky and purchased tickets for the Hyde Lounge in the T-Mobile arena. From the moment we got off the elevator the staff received us with smiles, and a warm welcome! We did not pay for any bottle service, but were still treated like VIP! We bought the nachos to snack on and they were amazing, this was definitely an experience that will be long lasting in ours and our kids memories! Thanks to The Hyde Lounge and your amazing staff, the view, the drinks, the music from the DJ and the entire environment was five star!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDVibiFqAE&fid=0x0:0x35cbad09b458a39f"],"When":"2023-12-13"},{"Name":"April","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLP2ZMR3aK41uBBh7V-cPQWEQ6gUnWzn0a-l0IWjyqvT7PF_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Hyde Lounge is located at the top of the arena. Amazing service and comfortable seats to watch the game. We were well taken care of by our server.  We loved the atmosphere up there, and I would purchase the tickets again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDZhs-W_QE&fid=0x0:0x35cbad09b458a39f"],"When":"2023-9-29"},{"Name":"Eugene dela Pena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvriC2BrmjwE_jUHzp3QSQX8tphN1O2ac6l9KAYNqckeIF2UeF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The experience was awesome for the Canelo fight. The wait staff of Paula, Megan, and Tyler were super as they took care of us throughout the evening. Also, having the screens with commentary to go along with watching the fight live added to the experience","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDZpeTTuwE&fid=0x0:0x35cbad09b458a39f"],"When":"2023-10-5"},{"Name":"beth ellyn rosenthal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvLiy9l5t5Mp6hknfgmrCGo3kqm6Vu6ysRbyTDAPVLGRHYi_Ey=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Three's the charm for Hyde Lounge.
The club's precursor was the Fontana Bar at the Bellagio. It was my FAVORITE place to go on Saturday nights in the early 2000s. An up-and-coming Jimmy Hopper held sway. The music stopped so everyone could watch the Bellagio Fountains from the balcony.
Then Hyde replaced the Fontana Room in 2011. It became the swanky spot for dancin' and romancin', winning award after award.
In 2019 the Bellagio decide to open the Mayfair Supper Club in this space.
The club had such a following the owners simply moved it to the top floor of T-Mobile Arena. Now, instead of live music and DJs, the action on the arena floor provides the entertainment.
It's like having your own private suite at the arena but with all the trappings of a stereotypical Las Vegas lounge. It's a marriage that works.
You queue up on the far side of T-Mobile Arena and go through the scanner outside. The elevator to Hyde is right there and up you go!
The elevator has a closed-circuit TV monitor so you can watch the arena action if you are late.
Once inside the club, find a table. I like the ones right up against the railing because their view is the best.
There are also cozy nooks for a more intimate lounge experience.
Hyde has an extensive  liquor and wine menu. Prices are, well, Las Vegas club-like.
The club also has a large food menu. The food offerings barely fit on the plate. It's bar food, natch.
There are TVs everywhere to watch what's going on on the arena floor. But the sound is muffled this high up if you want to hear the play-by-play.
And if you are afraid of heights, this place is NOT for you!
I was there for the Professional Bull Riders Saturday night performance. Having had season tickets when they rode bulls at Thomas & Mack, I can tell you this was an elegant experience by comparison.
OK, I loved the Fontana Room. But now I love Hyde at T-Mobile too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDG97alBg&fid=0x0:0x35cbad09b458a39f"],"When":"2021-12-12"},{"Name":"Lisa Gracious","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVx8XOmFwMrwnILqPGeQSN7LuuNgNWIfPtaBl4Bu8YDauNdtbJ0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have gone to Hyde Lounge twice now.  Great way to see a hockey game.  Everyone I had the opportunity to work with was helpful, kind and attentive.  Water was expensive.  Should have told us we would be charged per bottle.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID56d7TCA&fid=0x0:0x35cbad09b458a39f"],"When":"2023-10-26"},{"Name":"Jarrett Dixon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocId_a4sj2JCvl6jmAs8rufhiuhK7MS5yMdiLJETKsl3km-qRA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time visiting the T-Mobile area to watch a boxing match and I loved Hyde Lounge! I can‚Äôt say enough good things about this place! We had a great view of the ring and Justin Weiss the VIP manager was amazing. The staff was always nice and within minutes your waitress was there to take your order for food and drinks. The Hyde Lounge is a must-do.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICpuZ7EKQ&fid=0x0:0x35cbad09b458a39f"],"When":"2023-8-6"},{"Name":"Ms G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocII8LO37qbsxmegOR7o-gLvlpDJyZr523uCu7HdfiWZ60-xQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It's such a scam here. You pay for $100 ticket for an artist and there's not even enough room to accommodate everyone. Plus, you have to pay extra money for a table at the lounge.

Also, don't bring bags to the concert at this arena. They won't let you in anyway and if you do, you'll have to pay $24 for a locker. Ridiculous.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32: [{"Name":"Sierra Lewis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_THuf6mqRbCz3xubKULrTOtKt6ichEgCZ6PyEJO0mRRsO4g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I randomly found this site online while searching for free guest lists in Las Vegas. I decided to sign up for Tao guest list for me and nine of my sorority sisters. I received text and email updates which was great and convenient. It told me to arrive by 10:30. I'm glad we did because we were given open bar (yay!). I will definitely use this site again when I come back to Vegas.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Valerie O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVoeRXwNaepf9iEAn-3PRDh5URCRBh1VodMBOzZyZJJyRiivb4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This was a total joke for us! Got us on a VIP guest list for the correct date, received a text confirmation, showed up to the Encore on that correct date, and was told the EBC was closed, and that XS was the club going on that night at that location. They told us we couldn‚Äôt Get in without a confirmation for that club so I texted and texted with no help and we were turned away. Celebrating an anniversary and everything. Fortunately, there was a bouncer that heard our plight after talking to the door guy with hair about a foot tall. We were nice-tall hair guy wasn‚Äôt. So that bouncer walked us around and gave us a pass to get in. Thanks to the kind stranger, things worked out, but this guest comp list was an utter joke. We would‚Äôve had to pay the large cover price and stand in a huge line.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"gabriela guandique","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXb9X6M4QOVhjL5eJEcA810NM-Y0w_EaNMhEge3Xjl5UP8Xpnnx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a great service, i had no troubles at all, i used it to get on the  guest list at Marquee and i was given open bar until 11pm. Its great to know this actually works and you dont have to worry about anything going wrong when you decide to visit any club","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQxPPzhNhyoZAgLN_azQx__vHz-s5cHJMhN6zprMnPWZzbMw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome experience! 1st time in Vegas and I was truly wowed by Drai's! No wait in line, felt just like VIP..","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Juan Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnBh6bvuv0b_o5QdfUr756CBzkpex_C4qeX6K5qvupYfxDXRs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service! I had no problem getting into XS nightclub with my gf this past trip we did.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Reds Vibe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgYjTmy2uM8MPr53CASZt-KGrPPTkpb-Wip25c0R-pWobR69wYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Easy to sign up for, text came right away as well as a reminder text before the event.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aluane Soares","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLdqmaPuhuridkVr2ENpHZ9TGeN4Y5xCVg_cbb6HUEXW-d5ZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ana Lilian Amaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHSAExTvPv2uUe9UfjVBQ9-9QV5YPUE_H9zclzAFlWpEWRP_Qh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"astrida mcfarland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdTe300IQFfKs5bIuXfiS01FioQsJDXRPYubRrpgpLlaubiWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We came here to Paris Las Vegas because we had  reservations at the Vanderpump a Paris restaurant. We really enjoyed walking around and pretending to be in Paris, France, which is on our bucket list to do. All staff were friendly and helpful.

This place is really fun to see. You feel like you are in Paris for sure. There are several restaurants like Vanderpumps, the Cafe Americano, the Eifel Tower, and Mon Ami Gabi. We ate at Vanderpump and it was amazing! There are shops and Paris icon buildings to experience. We will return next trip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDQK5GEY3vOOg-Kk7ytIkhK&fid=0x0:0x16a5ba2e0f6532d3"],"When":"2025-9-26"},{"Name":"Joseph O'Hara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLjB48V4-wCKl31byUvIvK4RpekWflmIlwqYoqH0YVMz6VWVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great location, awesome staff, but.....

They offer ZERO coffee in the rooms and the 3rd party in house bar takes up abiut 30% of the only table/desk in the room. They would/could not remove it so I had to put it on the floor, without unplugging it or I'd be charged $50, so I could use the table.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD-g0SF_z4nYQubkkf0ct7x&fid=0x0:0x16a5ba2e0f6532d3"],"When":"2025-9-5"},{"Name":"Anthony Ramirez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKan1TUDQmeT_szM0wVBFJlvlsfpiN1AJiyash5RrCxcvKt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Free show that is actually good. 4 shows at the top of every hour starting at 8pm. First 2 shows are different then the 3rd & 4th are repeats of the first 2 so don‚Äôt expect every one to be different. The waitress seemed to be over whelmed though. After placing drinks we didn‚Äôt get them til the show was over so go the bar yourself. The show it self was really good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steven Brothers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUA1oqrukVBm1p-5Ed8LYZGgjK3O81EH5kAjP9CubGk15BbBOo5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great 15 minute shows every hour on the weekends at night. Easy to get a seat if you go a few minutes before the first show of the night. Service is slow, but it's nice to take your time here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICdmLykSQ&fid=0x0:0x16a5ba2e0f6532d3"],"When":"2024-2-11"},{"Name":"Sara Hinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-JATIRNRCic7ehx9FdxToV1vM-6xP9_wO4wzWMMVcbIsibg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Unfortunately the show is misrepresented as free but what they don‚Äôt tell you is it‚Äôs a one drink minimum. That being said, we purchased a drink to watch but left after the third number. The headline singer had a wonderful voice but the dancing was lackluster.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Suzanne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrZwIOpR0jQssFXkIGBtNi4QzWtII4L2y9JZZJXuHVxVps9BSpQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Always has great entertainment in a lovely lounge setting. Bands perform every night and get everyone dancing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC47_2fRA&fid=0x0:0x16a5ba2e0f6532d3"],"When":"2018-9-22"},{"Name":"Steve Wood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWe8WXiFSVeJsOqO1fvF-vgGzILYIQVwnPHm7CPEkOMqXrvNsOq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved it.  Well worth a visit, although I preferred the Venetian area, truth be told","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Herlache","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWW5X90kE977fmDletI6FXd6OO931rH6qn3rrzBlG-2nC8zMexjQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fun cabaret show in the Paris hotel. Playful and entertaining. A good time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDrmO2rIA&fid=0x0:0x16a5ba2e0f6532d3"],"When":"2024-7-14"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Kieran Faughey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPAEBe-y-2aaNSzDYN2jl4QOnXB7AaVJh-xs2vxgXzuZdGLg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We visited here for 5 days in November and really enjoyed it. The various hotels, their lobby's,shopping malls etc are truly amazing. Food and drink is quite expensive compared to the UK but there's plenty of choice and something for everyone. The local bus runs in both directions every 20 mins and is great for hopping on and off whenever it suits you and a 3 day pass is only $20. Definitely worth visiting and I'll be back one day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhABJKdyOkup9LjUUnGdMdu6&fid=0x0:0x5f1fc22579e84333"],"When":"2025-11-23"},{"Name":"A Kharodia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvlnRPnDMLSL-APcIMOLamza6AG1XoLkS_RBlZc5PQGOyndpWiSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just wrapped up an exciting visit to the Las Vegas Strip, and it truly lived up to the hype ‚Äî vibrant, over-the-top, and full of unforgettable moments. Whether you're a first-timer or a frequent visitor, the Strip always offers something new.

The Bellagio Fountain Show is absolutely iconic. The water performances are perfectly timed to music and lights, and it's a must-see experience that runs every 15‚Äì30 minutes in the evenings.

Paris Las Vegas is another highlight. The Eiffel Tower replica and Parisian-style architecture make for great photo spots, and the observation deck offers stunning views of the Strip, especially at night.

One food spot I highly recommend is Mediterranean Shawarma near the Strip. The food was fresh, flavorful, and filling ‚Äî a hidden gem that really stood out on this trip.

A word of caution: stay away from people approaching you on the street offering "free" tickets, club passes, or other deals. Many are pushy and some are outright scams. A simple "no thanks" and walking away works best.

A few quick tips: wear comfortable shoes, stay hydrated, and make sure to see the Strip at night ‚Äî the lights and atmosphere are something you won‚Äôt find anywhere else.

The Las Vegas Strip blends entertainment, food, and nonstop energy into one unforgettable experience. Just stay alert, pace yourself, and enjoy the ride.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBqlKkl57UPorw-xHkPpakX&fid=0x0:0x5f1fc22579e84333"],"When":"2025-9-30"},{"Name":"Alexey Cherchik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJeUai2Ut_GEZc3OMLvjTYPgUQzqilq8KWv-g1G9PPO_zYb0Uk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Las Vegas Strip is truly one of the most iconic and unforgettable places in the world! üé∞üåÜ

It‚Äôs hard to describe the energy here ‚Äî a mix of bright lights, luxury, chaos, and pure excitement. Every few steps you see something new: dancing fountains, street performers, giant casinos, Michelin-star restaurants, and themed hotels that feel like mini-worlds of their own. From Paris to New York to Venice ‚Äî you can travel the world in just one evening! üåç‚ú®

What makes the Strip so special is that it‚Äôs not just about gambling ‚Äî it‚Äôs about the atmosphere. The music, the people, the lights ‚Äî it all creates a feeling that anything is possible here. Whether you‚Äôre walking at sunset or late at night, there‚Äôs always something happening.

A few tips: wear comfortable shoes (you‚Äôll walk a lot!), bring water, and be ready for the heat during the day ‚Äî but at night, it‚Äôs pure magic. üåôüí´

We‚Äôve been to many famous places, but the Las Vegas Strip is truly one of a kind ‚Äî a must-see at least once in your life!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDufHuW3moxsadh1KDB4_sN&fid=0x0:0x5f1fc22579e84333"],"When":"2025-10-23"},{"Name":"vichest jirabovonvisut","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWykXRWRX33oN5IfLftgmyIqXnogskR8W5-debHrTqSmCmN_ME=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So big, so bright, and endlessly exciting

Las Vegas Strip is pure energy. The scale is so big and the lights are unreal‚Äîevery hotel feels like its own world. Walking the Strip at night is an experience on its own, full of iconic landmarks, music, and nonstop action.

From world-class shows and casinos to incredible restaurants and street views, there‚Äôs always something happening. It‚Äôs busy, loud, and unforgettable in the best way.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCz3j795kXBXr-gFxcWk95v&fid=0x0:0x5f1fc22579e84333"],"When":"2026-1-3"},{"Name":"april austin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVu6N-a4Nf_nuSXN-QJ96OYxfP7ML0dUbasKejzrYpI559gGD99Aw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love spending Thanksgiving in Las Vegas ‚Äî this is our second time in three years, and it never disappoints! The drive home was torture, but the trip itself was absolutely worth it. We started at the Cosmo, where the view from the 53rd floor was unbelievable. The room was beautiful, though the noise and the bed definitely weren‚Äôt my favorite.

We then moved over to the Venetian and enjoyed every single minute of our stay. What a truly spectacular place ‚Äî from the atmosphere to the service, everything was perfect. I don‚Äôt usually gamble, but they handed me $25 in free slot play and I walked away with $125! A total win-win.

We‚Äôll definitely be back. Hope everyone else had an amazing Thanksgiving on the Strip.
Happy Thanksgiving 2025!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAxmG0dlRjNTXHmZDo-Nx81&fid=0x0:0x5f1fc22579e84333"],"When":"2025-12-4"},{"Name":"Petra Kingmixay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyQXY0nUUHY1omYGji2dgdbzF15sylxIh_kzljRp-qJt3LIq-9vg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Having recently visited Las Vegas for a delightful one-night date with my husband, we thoroughly enjoyed our experience. We explored the entire Strip, capturing memorable photographs and savoring a wonderful dinner at the French restaurant Mon Abi Gabi, which I highly recommend for its reasonable prices, efficient service, and exquisite cuisine. The Eiffel Tower deck tour at night provided a breathtaking panoramic view of the city. Our stay at the Paris hotel was pleasant, although the room's appearance didn't quite match the online descriptions. Some upgrades and window cleaning would certainly enhance the experience. While the Eiffel Tower view from our room was fantastic, the dirty windows slightly detracted from the beauty. We also learned a valuable lesson regarding in-room amenities: even seemingly complimentary items like warm water and a couple of candy packages resulted in an unexpected $80 charge, as there was no price list or indication of a fee. We were accustomed to a mini-bar being in the refrigerator, but we didn't have one. Consequently, we now know to avoid touching anything unless we're prepared to pay for it. Overall, Las Vegas is a fun and exciting destination to visit. It's advisable to be prepared for the heat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCLJ8QgJCiIimQ7UxJ7LL1q&fid=0x0:0x5f1fc22579e84333"],"When":"2025-8-22"},{"Name":"i pm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhrrDY_49LXaGKOiBr9PN1gOy73u2Vr3ccqBRbwgHsnKTurY8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The entertainment center of the world. If you can't find something here probably doesn't exist. Best restaurants, bars, shows, casinos, etc. etc. and the view is unforgettable üëå. column32: [{"Name":"J B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWoDfzL3-GtPyCdhKCzgDyLlx3XzMp5lcjV8YAtvZ93eC1yjcu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a must while visiting,  your trip shouldn't and wouldn't be complete without seeing Mr. LAS VEGAS. Wayne Newton has been entertaining for a long time . We appreciate his talent and commitment to entertaining so many. My wife and I are in our late 40's and had a fantastic time . The show hits all the history and stories of his career and what a career it is. We were happy to give our Time to such an icon .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCNuyG8RogoipK0qD3TPWhu\u0026fid=0x0:0x7abb93eaa164b9ee"],"When":"2025-10-12"},{"Name":"Lisa Russ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXggGnS-xQPaQ56lMFkm0YWWhq0D86zvg0LZlK8hdjXE_rUJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Wayne Newton show was incredible. Didn't know he could play so many instruments. We did the meet and greet. He still got it and could belt out the songs. Very enjoyable evening. He even recognized the veterans, as myself being one. I thought that was great üëç","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEMjLqYeFsMeVQA\u0026fid=0x0:0x7abb93eaa164b9ee"],"When":"2025-5-19"},{"Name":"Jon Christopher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFiJVDwmVdAl6RtQr77kr2996xKfmOQGxwaSeN2tVtaNCRrwoc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My dad was a huge Wayne Newton fan. He had a great voice and would often sing Red Roses or another of Wayne's great songs. It's been on our bucket list for years and we're SO GLAD that we finally got to see Wayne's show\nlast night...and it was AWESOME üëçüòé. I can't recommend this show highly enough! If you want an evening of superb nostalgia, go see this show.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Seth Baker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkzw35jDesHC8R_qnJ35yf6_He5KyezQmd3WwaB9LP9FByGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Saw Wayne Newton. Great performance and cool atmosphere. The showroom is very small. You can't really go wrong with the seats for the Wayne Newton show but more towards the middle/ middle back is ideal! My photos are from stage right with two seats empty to the left of me. I wouldn't have wanted to be any further towards the outer edge.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID2ifSROw\u0026fid=0x0:0x7abb93eaa164b9ee"],"When":"2022-5-18"},{"Name":"Mike Harwell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAGa7f50wUMaYeGIHlg55wThjrFChUXCaFxA4Nc-ZdJIBrKw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I seen X Burlesque. We have never been to anything like this before, so we figured why not. It was amazing. The performers are extremely talented and entertaining. It was way more in depth and high budget than we anticipated. We were blown away. Also you can bring in your own drinks which is nice, it‚Äôs very personal seating, doesn‚Äôt feel like you‚Äôre stuffed in a stadium.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yuribel Alejo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-TTyWAbdjtal9Thq4nTNFXJgnfU42-nomoEVgnvUI5vXrz6kC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got the chance to go to the X Burlesque show with my boyfriend (his Valentine‚Äôs Day gift) and it was great! They just recently opened again after being off being of covid for about 8 months. It was a private limited event with no more than 40 people. I bought my 2 tickets through ticket master and we received a bottle of champagne per table. The host was so funny and the girls were great dancers! My boyfriend and i loved it and had a great time at the show.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICyz76U1gE\u0026fid=0x0:0x7abb93eaa164b9ee"],"When":"2021-2-17"},{"Name":"JD C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdS--vZHIzDRgWDjcVbUmUvj9N5hEjgclNcX_uS33Q1kgB_Ug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Piff, Jade, and Mr Piffles put on a great show and I'll see them every chance I get. Magic, comedy, and altogether a trio of entertainers that love what they do. My favorite grumpy little dragon is well complimented by the lovely and energetic Jade. Together with Piffles they will easily keep you laughing and smiling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICkoZ79ZA\u0026fid=0x0:0x7abb93eaa164b9ee"],"When":"2019-5-20"},{"Name":"Shawgator 96","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOQMDfPNqN4B-13ikQAdRQEKp7tNUp4rX3PFe7nu5trzWOLXeHFg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wayne Newton was awesome!  Not only did he sing up close and personal but he proved why he is Mr Las Vegas!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICJgZv4kAE\u0026fid=0x0:0x7abb93eaa164b9ee"],"When":"2023-6-28"}]

He is the most communicative, reliable, fun, and accommodating host. I admire his hospitality and he makes sure everyone around him has a good time! I am referring all of my friends to him when they plan on visiting Vegas. Thank you for the memories. Can‚Äôt wait to make more!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sofia Ranalli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLM2OFq_byF6RfFRQHLR-cu2rLxmXPLJ_VWqzEUyZJHy9BonQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ali hooked it up!! We were in Vegas for my bachelorette and Ali got us a daybed at Encore and got us onto guest lists wherever we wanted to go. He was super helpful and responsive. Very well connected, knowledgeable and resourceful. He even met us at the clubs and walked us in to make sure we were well taken care of. The best!!!! Will definitely be hitting him up again next time we‚Äôre in town!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aly Doumbia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJt3SE7FwPo6YXgkBT28iWAjKCNdhyaAakx8qg_BM6qiboVvg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We called and asked for a limo. Thank you!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"tambra Kessinger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbfxkb96MnBSutC_gdbbZStbctc9FF-cXUTL0aek3fqEnCLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! Highly recommend this company! We liked riding in the limo, enjoying ALL the sights and sounds to the strip club. We also liked that we were treated respectfully and courteously. Check them out on your trip to Las Vegas!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Katelyn Bukin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgTK1HRkmfTihxe1VRd1SEEz4H0arSVGj5_d0lWJW1lsGUPGU9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If I could give this place 1,000 stars I would. This was my and my best friends first time at a strip club or any kind of club in general. It was one of the best experiences we have ever had, the people at the front door were so kind and one of them showed us around and explained everything to us. One of the female dancers sat with us and we got to talking, she made us feel so welcomed and at ease and we even got a dance from her which was also insanely talented and fun! I can‚Äôt remember any names as I was very, very intoxicated but everyone was amazing. The men were something else each one sexy, sweet and knew what they were doing. I wish I could remember their names to give them the credit they deserve but one (my favorite) was wearing red shorts and another in black shorts. One had shoulder length black hair as well. The hostess there was one of the sweetest women I have ever met. I highly, HIGHLY recommend going here rather than any other place you can find, you won‚Äôt find one as incredible as this place!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elizabeth Shilling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL38iOteenOyUkWhYQD1bpNXz0q_gqJT8AzfiD7YVTY-3-__A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If I could give 10 stars, I absolutely would! These guys know how to put on a show and keep the energy high all night. They definitely got all my money‚Äîbut it was so worth it. Every performance was fun, sexy, and full of personality.
Go early if you can! I showed up around 10 p.m., and my friend and I were the only ones there for a bit‚Äîit turned into our own private show. Total VIP treatment! We ended up staying until 3 a.m. and we're soaking the whole time üòâ
The dancers are very friendly and definitely know how to make sure you‚Äôre having a great time. Lap dances are $40, private rooms are $100 for three songs, and trust me‚Äîit‚Äôs worth every dollar. I would bring cash ahead of time! The ATM inside charged $40 just to pull out $200 (the more you pull out, the more they charge). They will trade out bigger bills for one's which was super helpful.
Such a wild, unforgettable night‚ÄîI will likely be going back tonight!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hannah Ale","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSmD3-MpxzofirTsGUaSwWq_SLttxOzzJy6ebIJmti7T3WIeRz=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend Brittany and I decided to go out for a girls night‚Äî the vibes were üíØ! Spencer was the sweetest bartender who was very attentive and checking in on us frequently. Very clean atmosphere with a warm welcome from the start. The men did not disappoint, they worked hard giving all the ladies a wonderful time! Two of our favorite dancers were Brody and Magic. One thing I appreciated is how respectful the men were and making sure you were comfortable ‚ù§Ô∏è Highly recommend if you‚Äôre looking for a fun girls night out! ü•Ç","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jackie GP","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFWJMbcYp7WbI2xAdJGt-DnN0eClLO6v-GKDK-00FDXHCwi0cfpg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jonny is absolutely incredible and attentive ! Bonus that‚Äôs he truly knows how to move on that stage .

Kings of Hustler - what can I say , the drinks are great and the men are better !!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aleyna Ayhopa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5N6hkBR1Lvjx4Z1awpYoX9iJpiot5CqO2pVTIRvDZckGVqa5i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love Johnny - he‚Äôs the best!!!!! 100% ask for him when you come in. Angelo is also so awesome","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"R A.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjUCJhXu5yEyS0JUvISiZvjYnocreWxamzsFjmWPnVm4HaXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a good time, starting from the entrance, I experienced wonderful customer service. The opening dancer was amazing & Adrian too,I think that was the name. them two were my favorite üòç all off the men i saw put in the work danced real good, maybe take off more clothes next tome lol. Most of them greeted me üòò unfortunately my night was cut off short, but I hope to be back  & stay until 4 amüòÄ

My first time ever,  Thank you so much for the experience!

5/30/2025 9-12 ü´∞
BEST
ROSA.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kayla Turner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW09Ekh4f6a-Gkm3NUYp7-jKOgTu7rlnBgcFjrEtQGR4gbh684c1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went for my birthday with my bestie and Johnny was amazing!!! We had so much fun and everyone was so attentive!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert R.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlS5BSLC1hAYMwco4-87XbQiaK5bnyHjt-AYNDy0RqcmJl2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This review is written based on my soul experience with the hope of being informative for others seeking a male entertainment review as an option for entertainment. Before anyone thinks I have issues I would invite you to read the review I wrote for Magic Mike as one therefore will see that I don't create issues such as what happened which I relate to you here. As a gay man in his late 60s I am clearly unattractive. I have cancer. My hair is falling out from treatment. I look awful. I had surgery where I have a huge scar across my head and have a rather large scar on my arm from a tumor being removed and a very botched   skin graft. Clearly unattractive. Still lovable at least in the eyes of God and those who don't discriminate. I had a ticket for tonight show but I did not attend because I don't feel welcome. I would not say that to be true of the whole cast as I have not met them but overall I could not bring myself to attend. While at the box office at the link I saw Alejandro who I recognized from a video I saw when I was reading reviews. I walked over to him and told him I recognized him and he looked completely taken aback by my presence. He did not speak to me nor acknowledge me but was delighted to see the women walk by who he put beads around their necks. I didn't want beads but I would have liked a simple recognition. The following day I was downtown at the Fremont Street experience and there he was again along with a drop dead gorgeous dancer. The other dancer invited me to come over to have my picture taken with them. Alejandro was dismayed. He went to the motions and when it was over with the other dancer asked me to speak to some manager about how to obtain copies of the pictures which I knew damn well I'm looking to give you 5 cents because upon the completion of the photo snapshots Alejandro said okay bye get out of here. I said I'm going to the show Saturday night and he said well I'm not in it. The manager wanted 45 dollars telling me that it was a special buy one picture get one for free. I don't understand free in the context of me spending $45. Through the discrimination that I believe is ageism not homophobia and also the site of an ugly man along with the manipulation of the pricing I did not attend the show tonight. I will cut my $70 loss and I will accept it with the hope that this review will cause gay men and others to pause and consider with great discretion if this is the appropriate selection for you for entertainment value. I have never been to Vegas. This is my bucket list I'm probably the last vacation I will ever have. Thanks for nothing. And thank you Magic Mike for everything. It is in the best interest of chippendales not to give me a formulated response telling me that we live hoping to give complete guest satisfaction and we will take what you have said here and escalate this situation and we hope to have you come back and give us another try. Do not tell me that feedback like mine is important for you to make improvements. That would be shallow and would lack sincerity indicating lack of sufficient thoughts for an appropriate response. I sincerely wish the cast and crew a great advancement in your lives. Unfortunately I won't be able to experience or meet the great people with this fantastic organization.  And that is my choice and not the fault of chippendales but the decision stems from the behavior of some of its representatives.","Images":null,"When":""}]

The only disappointing thing is if there is an event at any of the 3 casinos the parking goes up to over $40 even if you are not going to the sporting event.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCmPyR0VpBbEd3HUh2MBdR0&fid=0x0:0x164d79b1555033c6"],"When":"2025-11-13"},{"Name":"A.J. Wolf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-M5bXJQ4yJoGgXxkgw09Fj25BGFdEVGSltZ5g6cyj0I-vqme-ZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bought tickets in advance, super fun for adults but also kid friendly! The staff was so nice, especially want to mention two employees, Jayda and Tyler(hope i spelled those right) they really went above and beyond to make our experience amazing. I'm really glad I came here","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCS965AjpK_fT9zAlS1Llot&fid=0x0:0x164d79b1555033c6"],"When":"2025-9-12"},{"Name":"Wilbert Acevedo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLUNG-xFGPIwHDgaHsNPorbYxNMH_IFNUaQ44XWfzYbRv31ks=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to celebrate my wife birthday and we had a great time. Anastasia one of the hosts went the long way to make our experience way beyond of what we where expecting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC5SdH7GBpL6Ds9oEmL675t&fid=0x0:0x164d79b1555033c6"],"When":"2026-1-25"},{"Name":"Emily Redpath","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzYvZ6SEXtKAf37rSjj8hr1aea6KQL4K1_ZSUjDdf6R1ZFHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place was pretty fun! It felt reasonably priced, but they don't seem to limit the number of people that come in, so it did get crowded.  The employees are awesome and create a really good environment.  Drinks are pricey, but pretty typical for an on strip location.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paige Jewell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQGC65QWUvPkUQdqj6gmNvlJsuncf7-vgCz9fKZGbA_CeeAP28=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It was maybe a little worse than I expected. There was a corporate event there while I was there with a friend, so perhaps that's the target demographics. If it was free I might have had more fun, but  it was  around $35 and the discount for being a resident is a whole $3!

Entry gets you each game ONE time. So if you use  your time to figure out how to play, that's it. If you do play it again, then  as your credits dwindle you won't be able to play all the games. Maybe not a  big deal for some, but that was my plan. Some games are just a total waste bc we couldn't figure out the first time (even with reading lol).

Drinks are all sugar overloaded and overpriced so I couldn't find anything decent to order and didn't. Should have gone elsewhere to grab a cocktail first.

I wouldn't go back unless I had a company credit card to use. Even then, I would probably do Swingers or Top Golf.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDZmxjkdyFw2L_M3wil1Cg4&fid=0x0:0x164d79b1555033c6"],"When":"2025-11-3"},{"Name":"Jay Wonderly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9cuf62Hwle1HStWE0rH0uKfoxsBe4cNZu-zCA99NzDtf3NA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a great time! Staff was very helpful and explained everything to us. We grabbed some drinks and sat upstairs after playing, it was a nice spot to relax and unwind.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD8wgXGbv_eQlcN49sn0oKO&fid=0x0:0x164d79b1555033c6"],"When":"2025-10-26"},{"Name":"Tabitha Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlmkJLfw4TLre2fI2howMD-V9Qk6Rg4k4WKEVCh7zSK8AeGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had such a blast! Party of 4 and it was perfect for playing teamed games! There wasn't much of a wait for any of the attractions! Amari had all the answers for getting passes for my 18 year old and his friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhADzehbmUucDM4COuJq07X7&fid=0x0:0x164d79b1555033c6"],"When":"2025-12-14"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Michelle Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVStH7ziQhBDI-Dkv2nyGkfSzU7D3aFNzCwBmIQTt7hUqZKwn-E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"First time here and never again the hostess extremely rude all of them 3 young girls with black dresses I had a reservation I arrived ten minutes before my reservation and they make me wait for 20 minutes more to give me a table and when finally they gave me a table it was more than 10 tables available.
And when I arrived they didn‚Äôt try to stop their conversation to receive the customers.
Good thing the my server she was really helpful and friendly enough i went there to celebrate my birthday but it wasn‚Äôt what I was expecting from this place.
Food was ok nothing to impress so I don‚Äôt think I would recommend or comeback","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBqR1sVoTYaage_GDQwLO1A&fid=0x0:0xa28aed5c426af079"],"When":"2026-2-15"},{"Name":"Garry Ero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLOYgD35HoQzPalWYGACvV0ozQJa4cHl9qMNa3x-tIQxnWw4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I will admit I was not to sure about this one but a friend of a friend recommended it and it was almost perfect. It was definitely more modern Mexican which apparently I am into. I thought it had a very cool setting very relaxing kind of day of the dead type theme going which was different for sure but cool all the same. The chips, salsa and guacamole were wonderful little kick off the salsa had a perfect amount of heat and that guacamole was just so creamy so flavorful one of the best I‚Äôve ever had. For appetizers we started out with the charred octopus, which was so unbelievably tender. You didn‚Äôt even need a knife to cut it yet the ends of the tentacles were perfectly crisp. The chorizo and potatoes underneath added an unbelievable flavor and I‚Äôm not sure what the side sauces were but they were the complete composed bite. We also got the chicken empanadas which were extremely crispy well seasoned And had an amazing chipotle, mayo, dipping sauce it was just the right amount of heat and sweet. Then we got the shrimp and scallop dish that was flaming. It was a very cool presentation. The shrimp and scallops were cooked perfectly not soft not rubbery. They had a perfect little snap to them. For our last appetizer we got the tuna tostada Which had amazing texture with the very thin, almost rice, puff on the bottom with the very smooth tuna on top it was wonderful. For entr√©es, we got the sizzling fajita platter with Carne Asada steak and blackened grilled shrimp, Perfectly cooked perfectly seasoned the Carne Asada just melted in your mouth. The shrimp had a perfect snap texture to it. All the veggies were on point still had a little tiny snap to them. The tortillas were nice and  warm. The chicken mole I‚Äôve had it at some places where they try too hard with the chocolate to make it the star. This was such a wonderful dish. I‚Äôm actually upset that I didn‚Äôt get it for myself. Excellent amount of flavor. Cinnamon was coming through beautifully. It was perfectly cooked and it made me want to get one to go. Here is the only thing that I had a problem with really the street corn It was just OK nothing spectacular which surprised me. For desserts, we got the flaming skull flan, which was set on fire table side was very cool presentation. The chocolate was absolutely amazing and the flan was perfect texture so creamy perfectly set just melted it in your mouth. The coconut cream with berries was very similar to whipped cream, but had obviously a coconut flavor. It was amazingly well set delicious creamy and just an absolute pleasure to have. Mexican Twinkie Trio It was poundcake marshmallow with a chocolate crust. It was probably the star of the show on the desert end. It was so good we all wanted to get another order. Perfect snap on the outside absolutely soft and gooey on the inside. What more can you ask for it wasn‚Äôt dry and it wasn‚Äôt rubbery marshmallow it just checked all the boxes for all four of us. WELL DONE MIJO MODERN MEXICAN WELL DONE.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCr3cgvYHiZT-39JCNZK1WB&fid=0x0:0xa28aed5c426af079"],"When":"2026-1-23"},{"Name":"Savoir Faire","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfTSZJZ398ePxbWBGtOhNV1TUt1OB_24550QZ_6Clc5Z9pFJUtQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The atmosphere was great, but It was a long wait time to be seated. We ordered just to be disappointed with the portion size to price and the flavors weren't supported by the ambiance. My wife ordered the fajitas in which the veggie to meat ratio was ridiculous and no sides with this dish, I ordered shrimp tacos, which are much better on food trucks but it did come with sides. The restaurant is just eye candy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC17YjuOjd2_vM4u177Nbpz&fid=0x0:0xa28aed5c426af079"],"When":"2025-12-15"},{"Name":"April","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxIJxBLl_Nut2Rf0xUT6fxAASTjuKC39-iRnVhmY43tvIAL5U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We came for Happy Hour. The salsa was amazing. The street corn was really good. The guacamole was so so. The tortillas for the fajitas were dry. Amir was our server. He was friendly and tentative. The drinks were okay. Nothing to brag about. The atmosphere was pleasant. The music was nice and not too loud. The hostess was also very pleasant. I might come back to try the other items on the happy hour menu or checkout the speakeasy lounge when it‚Äôs open to the general public.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC1236qBfQkTnIJbkLIAEHJ&fid=0x0:0xa28aed5c426af079"],"When":"2025-12-2"},{"Name":"lydia hacklerlopez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkfqxBf2wJffll12LwDkGDWPRqXS2hHbE3ZGKxCLYLM8DUQzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Justin, our server was on point all throughout the meal and was attentive without being annoying. He honored our special request and even added soda to my sangria when I didn‚Äôt care for the level of sweetness. He understood we had two tired and antsy kids with us and was patient and gracious. The food was good, the cocktails were great and the atmosphere was relaxing. The only complaint I have is that the table kept rocking back and forth which is annoying and with kids made me nervous. Which was why I didn‚Äôt give them 5 stars. They really need to stabilize their tables better. We checked the other table and it was the same. We folded a napkin under the leg to try and stabilize it. Over all though it was a nice evening out and a great experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCuO044uLl2ckNdlmIAR-VL&fid=0x0:0xa28aed5c426af079"],"When":"2025-11-11"},{"Name":"Valentin Alvarez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHrX3VJYVS47feU6zYcpNhEDVKLjFfrOKq9ZlWMBOp-xtYWmY5ig=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Mijo is a nice take on mexican cuisine with the upscale look and prices to go with. We did enjoy all our dishes. The guacamole was some of the best I've had. The wait staff are very friendly. Something I noticed about dining here was that every booth feels intimate. Like it's just you there with your significant other. The hidden bar was pretty cool.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBneXnNHKnJmCYFoJq7xIPu&fid=0x0:0xa28aed5c426af079"],"When":"2025-10-7"},{"Name":"Karen H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoK3UdzY5Ca38iCT0cNWdzq_oyd3WzSQKmM278v8fC0F0c700E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for pre-birthday dinner. Our server was wonderful. The food fantastic and I‚Äôm a huge sucker for some good guacamole.
The hidden bar was very cool too. My salad was massive and good but I still have plate envy and maybe should have had the same tacos as my friends!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB2cQ873nbFSOm-hhaOQ6ZN&fid=0x0:0xa28aed5c426af079"],"When":"2025-10-12"},{"Name":"Monica Crisp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWpg3EwZ-ODRKaJw-J_sTJ4RwHXRi-2TsUhloXC6sJ1FRmVJo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service and atmosphere were amazing. Server had good suggestions and was very attentive. He suggested the scallops for the appetizer and they didn't not disappoint. Cooked well not too chewy and good flavoring. My husband and I ordered shrimp tacos and lobster tacos. If I had to choose I loved the lobster better, it was a nice portion size and very flavorful. The shrimp tacos were good but they were slightly plain, nothing too exciting.   The server also recommend a margarita that was exactly what I was looking for.
Overall, fun birthday outing. Next time might try to go to the speakeasy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBA2qbVrzbl5-i6Sp6J2MaZ&fid=0x0:0xa28aed5c426af079"],"When":"2025-10-7"}]

column5: 512 Fremont St, Las Vegas, NV 89101
column18: Cocktails served in a large, raucous venue with a dance floor, distinctive decor & LED lights.

column32:
[{"Name":"R. R.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaFA6Jy_gdjJMpZQZGWaq2Do8CNyvX-EnGAoCupuMaLPGGL3o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Pros: Friendly staff, efficient entry, excellent sound system. The music was great and possible to have a conversation while still feeling the bass. Professionally tuned and incorporated into the space.

Cons: Water was between $8 and $11. Alcohol should be expensive; venues need to make a profit wherever possible. But after considering bottle service, cocktails, beers, merch, VIP passes, and booth rentals, it just seems predatory to charge so much for something so basic. Don't believe the standard reply of "this is Vegas, the price is typical." Even if true, it displays a certain animosity towards the guest. Drop it down to under $10 and I'll change this review the next day. It was the only flaw to an otherwise perfect evening!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB1gn6rw72UGrkce-VbPLwz&fid=0x0:0x544aa263f59f50fe"],"When":"2025-9-13"},{"Name":"Tanya Bourne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhfDf_QfmgewgO_KnxDN54TomDA6ybn5mkitLOiP1amZ5l1V1S2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best dive bar style rave, hosting amazing talents from around the world!!!
Octopus, LEDs & lazers are wild creating a unique experience while the Voids boom out massive sounds!!
Everyone is super upbeat & friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDy4yvwZ7q9atKoXdhZLKfG&fid=0x0:0x544aa263f59f50fe"],"When":"2025-7-28"},{"Name":"Rachel Vegas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWb-4OczQUFEb86ENFZRq8MKYj4R6Dj4TXrEJELJkwsiKgPtKo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Discopussy is my favorite venue for House, Tech House, techno and other genres of electronic music to discover! I come here to dance and it always delivers. The speakers are loud and the staff is awesome! It's a trippy happy cool place with a great vibe. Love!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCHi-dT2Y54oVVlTACL2tA3&fid=0x0:0x544aa263f59f50fe"],"When":"2025-7-25"},{"Name":"Shirley Mendaros","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrYzl1a8EyMMNa8sMocv5yk1q-kvk-oS1g7t73xdHXvu83nPQL2g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We saw Toyoko Machine, Terminite, and Boom Kitty! Their set was fabulous! The service was excellent we had the table service, and security was lit! Took care of any annoyances immediately! This was my first time to the venue, I certainly will be back! ‚ù§Ô∏è Thank you Discopussy! This is OUR VEGAS, Baby!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDItNBqx1xYIawTUnCpaaEe&fid=0x0:0x544aa263f59f50fe"],"When":"2025-6-7"},{"Name":"Matt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4oK6So2H6x3D8W1WfIpMcwTxYqoty6FmLk-cV2RdRBairLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an absolute blast at Discopussy for new years they had an awesome house DJ lineup all night with multiple DJs dropping hard bass and lots of hits mixed in.  The staff was super friendly and crowd was diverse and welcoming all walks of life.  Everyone here is badass highly recommend coming here for a techno show!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICfs7HMOA&fid=0x0:0x544aa263f59f50fe"],"When":"2025-1-1"},{"Name":"Brandon Mann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGeFtPXwtm1xx3Cz2UEnWd2YXY7qBcS0gsCZ69HfOeUZ9IWuqCdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Did the vip table and they were so nice and always there for whatever we needed. Music was hard hitting with deep drops. Great club experience and not the drama of a big Vegas club.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICfkYj-yQE&fid=0x0:0x544aa263f59f50fe"],"When":"2024-12-29"},{"Name":"Patrick Maffio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV06z2yt7CQAGrQPt25MG5mdXdsK4US0SSQ68Si5P3yJzSadRUAug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love the venue! Good DJs, small enough to get a good house party, rave vibe going. The moisture building up and dripping from the rafters at 3am just make it that much more fun for true music and dance fans. Let's get it!

$7 for a small bottle of water tho? Come on... 5 stars if it weren't for that.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDu5JyNXw&fid=0x0:0x544aa263f59f50fe"],"When":"2022-8-14"},{"Name":"Discovery Dee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSQKSQ2ZlVZkXvozK2MxYEkVgW2vOEw9MgUndgHIkHD8XEeT4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great music variety! Fun atmosphere with plenty of room to move and groove depending on the artist and the night of the week but always an amazing time!! Great location! Very helpful staff.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column5: Bellagio Hotel & Casino, 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
column18: Leather couches & mirrored walls outfit this intimate Bellagio lounge for cocktails & DJ-spun tunes.

[{"Name":"Chelsea Finn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJIfRGxh0UcsRW376o0UNokHwhAi54DERZ-L7tY8--ObNJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I had a wonderful experience here! We absolutely loved the drink recommendations‚Äîhe fell in love with the Las Vegas Sour, and I am head over heels for the Raspberry Cobbler. We want to give a huge thank you to Nicole; she provided us with truly professional and exceptional service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAqlHt9e6CR5hHOB4AgdHxK&fid=0x0:0xa3641aae44f67ea1"],"When":"2025-12-28"},{"Name":"S H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI1s9SHyGy5xZC2CRRRaLkE0UDFPDNASpKAtRMERvENxag9lw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Danielle, Jasmine, and Robyn are amazing hosts/servers. They treat everyone as if you‚Äôre coming into their home. Robyn has been a joy for years at this bar. I basically come to visit her at this point haha. I‚Äôm not one for mixed drinks but they do a great job. Nothing is too sweet. I‚Äôm not a lightweight but their drinks are deceptively strong so you‚Äôre definitely getting what you pay for. Great for people watching, great drinks, amazing service. What else could you want?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Akira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrRefJpaZuTTfD9RdX0diFRIVC07iyX-FZ0LXEL8deQP87A9o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"AMBIENCE: this is located in a very busy and therefore noisy area of the casino. So it‚Äôs great for people watching while you take a rest from all the walking. But if you want calm, it‚Äôs gonna have to be somewhere else.
FOOD: Only drinks here. I had the Broken Flowers and it was lovely. I asked for water & got a Fiji water bottle; that was $16! Bruh. But that‚Äôs what I get for being on the strip.
OVERALL: Stop by, have a drink, and people watch. Beware aware of the prices though LOL","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCgq8SidvpNL-0bfeI3x-tL&fid=0x0:0xa3641aae44f67ea1"],"When":"2025-8-18"},{"Name":"MediZoom Transportation, LLC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3fMN2kFTKrG0hJ1KEMsv6dceJOPhcgk48L3ZbD29DA5_lXWE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an opportunity to visit this lounge and it was nothing short of amazing. The vibe here was üî•. Ask for a last minute table reservation and Robyn and Lauren were on top of it from th me start. They also gave great recommendations for other places to visit. Great times!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEMi6_N69xJTrbg&fid=0x0:0xa3641aae44f67ea1"],"When":"2025-5-28"},{"Name":"Amy Munoz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyaAxHTYfcARozKzjdWnzubwJkdh9Wc8FdpnbolTDRv3Z0gPg2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The hostess that I worked this evening was so kind. She took time to give my husband and I directions twice with patience. She's a gem!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Naz Stobe-Kirst","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-6Ww_yuuGmYG-jPQKLVi6kLtTT-B3dTea5JzRwAs64-99e39S=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Upscale in every way. Great place to hang out while waiting for Bellagio meal reservations.
Came for a beer and spent enough time to sample some great martinis too. Good service, high quality mixed drinks. Also a cigar menu with even Cuban cigars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICh3rj_Ng&fid=0x0:0xa3641aae44f67ea1"],"When":"2023-2-13"},{"Name":"J. C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLu4NH3PMfBQdErzvZ8gGZPLlmxhkKg6Q7K65U4O7CUnBsEUA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had drinks here twice during our recent Vegas trip.
The lounge is nice with couches and comfy chairs. Service is good and the drinks are top notch. We had the Bellagio cocktail and the raspberry cobbler and both were delish!
As others have mentioned this is a good place to people watch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDj9ezqIw&fid=0x0:0xa3641aae44f67ea1"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Meena Faraji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXh-UByqlOdHOgXxr9mcg-N-atpRWocin3q24fGFxROUPcOfpGD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We come all the time and always have a great time but this time the waitress her name LUCY was super rude , we ordered drink and was supposed to brung nuts , probably she forgot and thats ok but when i mentioned it she was soooooo rude disrespectful and very bad attitude, i was shocked, that never happened to me before ,  very disappointed. I would never comeback","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCVxjCzZAxhXQwi58ZtgowW&fid=0x0:0xa3641aae44f67ea1"],"When":"2025-11-29"}]

[{"Name":"TipTop 79!","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMKvMuO8iR6jakuCzxJmL6sv1AU187-5Bauy5KrQ2E97Mz9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Couldn't believe we got guest list tickets to see 50 cent! The party was incredible and it was Halloween too, everyone dressed up and made a real effort. We were over from the UK and no one parties like this in the UK. We had such an amazing time. Thank you so much No Cover Nightclubs for the tickets. We spent plenty of money in the club, and rightly so for free entry. You couldn't get this back home.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAzDmLpFBXnuuoq8bLuOBFb&fid=0x0:0x2f1bc5b67826c80f"],"When":"2025-11-3"},{"Name":"Adam Ex","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_g9Y4-5CPAeFgjzqFDPDvDnM_Ij31Wway5dOdmWQ0qKcAqk1T3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Professional, easy, and events were fun!
Your crew most definitely brought the vibes and were very welcoming and answered any questions my group had. They made us feel like REAL VIPs. I can‚Äôt wait till we come back to Vegas so we can touch base with you guys again for a much larger party of people! Thank you for your unmatched customer service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Monica Way","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlB44vKPHITkYKM4S5Fu3CkK1_Ik7LkYaXIFmrDdJSEMo2kQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were in town for my daughters 21st birthday!  The pool at our hotel was broken and we had one day left in Vegas. We needed a cool down in the 110 degree weather. I emailed Nocover Nightclubs for passes to the Stadium Pool. Within seconds, I received 4 free ladies passes and one free drink for each of us. We swam, drank and watched sports for 2 hours! If you need passes for an event or party, I would suggest contacting NoCover Nightclubs.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD5y0y3F5aA4vPsjgaoC9Pz&fid=0x0:0x2f1bc5b67826c80f"],"When":"2025-7-15"},{"Name":"rick trier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJef6-wUYI7DH-nm5Sew1_1HZqUekuuUCOO6HpqZ_ExWBpDKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Terrific people to deal with. Omnia CLUB is the best ,great atmosphere. No cover nightclubs is the best experience to deal with. Thank you so much ! Definitely, we will be back.Thanks Mike Kelly!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBwZ9RWHzXPcPBDaNi5a5rv&fid=0x0:0x2f1bc5b67826c80f"],"When":"2025-8-14"},{"Name":"Vishal Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKT4qgI-m448y81SKnXdXHNnuVadY-bSqLGkGXP6xmOvoo69A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing experience with no-cover nightclubs! I registered myself on the guest list for some of the premium venues, which allowed me to explore and enjoy their vibrant ambience and vibe.
- They had a clear policy for each event/nightclub, which was really helpful for first-timers.
- Added some pics from Encore (Xs) & Cosmopolitan (Marquee)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEJuG6IeXp-uGzwE&fid=0x0:0x2f1bc5b67826c80f"],"When":"2025-6-9"},{"Name":"Tara Hurtt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXV7elTj2IW-VLojqy3_ztt-m89yXBP3fRzXalspW4E_19t4_fTTw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The No Cover nights was great for my husband and I. We were invite to an all white party there and couldn't really spear the money to pay to get in. We really appreciate the hospitality of Drai's night club","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA_a4Ie6yyYrxP_B1ASGryp&fid=0x0:0x2f1bc5b67826c80f"],"When":"2025-6-17"},{"Name":"V Mang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3N4MRHcarc2MzHtOhT70tt_an7YjGO325vhrcxdFOmTF6kXIh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an AMAZING NIGHT! We had a blast! I am so excited to invite more friends and family to visit for the upcoming holidays!

I appreciate how the event coordinator kept in touch with me, it wasn't pushy, it was helpful. I'm not a big planner and I appreciate the suggestions.

Overall, we LOVED it and look forward to what's next. Thank you for being one of the better aspects of this Vegas experience!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cathleen Gary","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUulYl0zuK1Lsuc3MT3Mixc3GFO1F7iuE87kiUOYGDLak6dJ_c=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was a great service. It was easy and it worked. We even got free drinks! We got to skip the lines too! I'm doing this from now on!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBB5Qg9EfyWyKdtToapXXd_&fid=0x0:0x2f1bc5b67826c80f"],"When":"2026-1-6"}]
