column32: [{"Name":"Shelby Rice","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1ozRUgpfN01gcEyi3YJocnym0gELkHxji89ueAN_tRAxk-ags=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty good for drinks with a small group.\nCould use some soft table lights. And the jukebox might be broken because we could only get it to play one requested song.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA-wr-E8fESnA7TxE-t1Or_\u0026fid=0x0:0x373695388524b780"],"When":"2025-7-20"},{"Name":"Patrick Wallace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISyJA5b2FMzSoUbEbO56Bp0hxuC4m12VfUFrafxkdYSLiS1A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Favorite bar in Vegas.  Great vibes, great staff, excellent drinks.   My partner and I don‚Äôt consider it a great Vegas stop unless we stop by at least once.\nIn a city of fake and ‚Äúexperience cocktails at $40+ a glass‚Äù, this place is the real deal and doesn‚Äôt need to posture, the drinks do the talking.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bella Vannatta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIxdNwywVVIfZM6MJHmgGQWo0A7tMi2or5A501QjvTxZTbtTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is super cool and the bartender Ryan was great. Hanging out here was probably the highlight of our vegas trip will definitely be coming back next time we‚Äôre in town.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Randy Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQ1Dj0x4b-LcwjZRCaFDMzBR3rUtrw-xwhT1a5K50V8tnVFX4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favorite bars in Vegas, especially on Fremont. Recently, they also reduced the volume of the music significantly, which really helps with conversations in larger groups. Now the atmosphere matches the aesthetic and it's much easier to just talk with your friends. In a great place by a few other good bars and ride across the street from some incredible pizza.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jim Peterson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVh21ioTKXUK2LUEQNK9hRWEI7utESzxog8v65MAVzEbN4Olao4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recommended by the bartender from Atomic Liquors, this place was great. The interior reminded us of the galley of a ship, or castle. It has a huge bar that runs the length of one side. Manned by knowledgeable bartenders who know how to mix a drink, this place stands out on Fremont. The bouncer was hilarious! A man who truly must love his job. That set a great vibe to the visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICa8OTLJw\u0026fid=0x0:0x373695388524b780"],"When":"2021-7-22"},{"Name":"Andrew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzEJt9RkyxmkAHDzmfKpScc_EQuFMSEPYud-WP46UzM2jI3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Professionally poured Guinness, well-made Margaritas, an excellent draft beer selection, and a friendly bartender who was happy to pop us some popcorn.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAqcj1CSMSoeZhWCNrgrMtE\u0026fid=0x0:0x373695388524b780"],"When":"2025-12-24"},{"Name":"Ry M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxiWkT_mNjBz9vUgkU0O96uA3WfIPfEgVHXPsWYDnhCUJzV4km=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favorite spots downtown. Ryan is also the best manager/bartender around. They always take care of everybody and make you feel welcomed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Randy Sparre","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEV9-qXOWovJb9N7P_TI-_TBi0l_xUsFzS4CMGkLC3PjJxBDjx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice cozy place for a (quality) drink with great selection. The cute shorter brunette was really nice to deal with but the taller one in the ponytail had some serious attitude. If you don't enjoy your line of work, get a different job!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC-xpbK1gE\u0026fid=0x0:0x373695388524b780"],"When":"2022-11-2"}]

column3: DoubleTree by Hilton Las Vegas East Flamingo
column5: 4055 Palos Verdes St, Las Vegas, NV 89119
column18: Laid-back hotel featuring a restaurant/bar, an outdoor pool & a 24-hour gym, plus parking.
column29: {"id":"105083721288141435738","name":"DoubleTree by Hilton Las Vegas East Flamingo (Owner)","link":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105083721288141435738"}
column31: null
column32:
[{"Name":"Imran Kazi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhe8z-I_Xhm_h9jR7KHIaFseFP4YZjPjGluaucEIuwwuGANcT9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"oubleTree by Hilton Las Vegas East Flamingo ‚Äî A Solid, Business-Friendly Stay

I stayed at the DoubleTree by Hilton Las Vegas East Flamingo while in Las Vegas for CES this year, booking a room close to the event dates ‚Äî which is never easy. Overall, it turned out to be a very solid choice, especially for a business-focused trip.

The location worked well. It‚Äôs a reasonably short commute to both the Strip and the Las Vegas Convention Center, making it convenient without being in the middle of the congestion and noise. Getting in and out each morning was straightforward, and rideshares were easy to coordinate.

The staff were consistently friendly and helpful from check-in onward. After long days at CES, it was genuinely nice to come back to a place where the atmosphere felt calm and well run. The rooms themselves were quiet, clean, and comfortable ‚Äî exactly what you want when you need good rest between early mornings and long show-floor days.

This is not a resort-style property, and it doesn‚Äôt try to be. Instead, it delivers where it matters: comfort, reliability, and a sense of ease. For the location and the price point, it felt like the right balance.

If you‚Äôre traveling to Las Vegas for work, conferences, or conventions and want something comfortable, well-located, and no-nonsense, I would recommend this DoubleTree as a dependable option.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Will","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZgQ-F7km035BzryuQum26YfXKmSuoZP3t4RghKuxCipov=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Friendly front desk. Really comfy soft bed. The restaurant food was good considering it's a hotel. Parking was secured, although it's not free. ...I liked the place overall.

Downsides: Plumbing problems. Flushing the toilet made the sink gurgle up stuff each time. And sewage smells. Also in the morning the planes flight right above the hotel every couple minutes which was pretty loud.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gabriel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVn_WeTL5EvQuqYV7KHP0QDZDvNUWkHsuB4R0qO8lfqaMta1Qk5Hw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My stay was marked by a noticeable inconsistency in service at the front desk. During both check-in and check-out, our interactions with one receptionist were less than welcoming; she appeared unengaged and was unable to assist us with obtaining an invoice. However, we were very grateful when a different colleague stepped in during checkout. She resolved our request efficiently and with a much more courteous demeanor.

While we truly appreciate the helpful assistance we finally received, the initial encounters detracted from the overall experience. We believe consistent, positive guest interactions are key to a seamless stay.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Santiago Valdez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJFT-k7xilaWOZt8vKhydorIjSLmN7j07m-EshWEYCvErnijU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow, wow, wow. I am very surprised by this hotel. The service at every position is incredible. The front desk is super attentive and friendly. They make you feel good. The restaurant food is incredible. My family and I had the pleasure of being served at the bar by Alba. Her attention and warmth are incredible. We were very happy with her energy and kindness. The rooms have been renovated. They look like they were done yesterday. The mattresses are super comfortable. The cleanliness is incredible. It really has the attention and comfort of a 5-star hotel. Thank you so much to all the staff at this beautiful hotel for such a wonderful experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"bobby alexander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK9qgl9nUShxWAS_v41yYt7vGR8cWFe5oJrgO-DmT1pyXiJGg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The room was horrible as soon as the doors opened on the elevator onto the 5th floor the smell hit first then u look down at the carpet and u know why. The rooms are out dated no microwave so if u want to heat anything up you have to go back down to the lobby. The breakfast was not very good at all and staff will get to you when they feel like it. The views are wonderful as long as you like looking at struggling homeless people and rundown neighborhood apartments. Igot out of the uber from the airport and was greeted by 2 homeless people arguing with their split personalities. Advising my company to remove this hotel from our stay list.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Srey Sros","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIKpnifp_xNhi-Ek188aHKUu_hCLSoBvbwLe9Q3Q9OZfSNI7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The room was disgusting. There were stains on the floor and a piece of fries. The shower tub was filled with hair. To top it off the air conditioner made so much noise and the walls were thin. After seeing the room we asked to get our money back to leave the place. We did not want to sleep there anymore. But the supervisor refused to give our money back so we can stay somewhere else. It was new year's eve night our whole night was ruined. First they said the hotel was sold out but then they said they can moved us to a different room. Horrible. Save your money if actually wanna enjoy your time in las vegas. There are so many more hotels. Because of this place I dont want to stay in any Hiltons anymore. If this is how they treat their customers!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"guru pavan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbcXflizRP3F9MWYAGYPhnOI7Pr8UB2jJl_TkR9D9oRO1jUwXo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This stay was extremely frustrating. The hotel charged $12 for small bottled water but did not provide any water in the room simply charged. We had opted for breakfast, yet despite advertising ‚Äúkids stay free,‚Äù we were later informed that this does not include breakfast for kids and were charged extra, which was not clearly communicated in advance. Customer service was very poor‚Äîrude, unresponsive, and unwilling to resolve issues. Additionally, the hotel is located in a very bad area that felt unsafe and run-down, almost like a slum. Overall, not worth the money and disappointing for a family stay.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Telly Swain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDB6ML-R0K1mlYigCfp716H_TBtkkOBu8Td-lqoZWQ5TVLDNMf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Throughout my stay, the room provided a comfortable atmosphere, and the staff consistently delivered professional and accessible service. The hotel's proximity to the Strip, approximately a 3-4 block walk, was convenient, which I utilized periodically over the course of my 19-day stay. Furthermore, the on-site restaurant offered a menu of delicious and well-prepared dishes. I have already made future reservations. reservations for next February at same location.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column5: 1410 S Main St, Las Vegas, NV 89104
column31: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":false},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":false}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Fast service","enabled":true},{"name":"Great cocktails","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair accessible restroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true},{"name":"Cocktails","enabled":true},{"name":"Happy hour drinks","enabled":true},{"name":"Hard liquor","enabled":true},{"name":"Wine","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Restroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true},{"name":"Romantic","enabled":true},{"name":"Trendy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true},{"name":"Locals","enabled":true},{"name":"Tourists","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Paid parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Paid street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
column32: [{"Name":"Katlyn Schulte","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8H8r7iK3hDkKhgTP_SukugaWYJ-dE8Nqngbd759WBKqdc6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The ambiance is amazing. The cocktails are well crafted and delicious. The Bartenders are friendly and knowledgeable. Highly recommend stopping by if only to check out the space. Mrs Klaus Cookie is my favorite, fireside ritual is like an upscale espresso martini, and the Bruce bogtrotter surprised me but was a delightful flavor combination. The traders tale was very herbal for me but still well made.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAtsjCmSauMlCfJQlJ7jwLw\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c79e72195c83274"],"When":"2026-1-20"},{"Name":"Melinda Esquivel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLXMwLAV0M-4xAkmfcKh0kstZSvdXtIIUbeZirMxv-BHdfRVNi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This bar has been on my list for some time and I finally got to stop in for their happy hour. I will say the sage on sunset was delicious and I truly enjoyed the cocktail , it was mixed together very well. I like the decor and overall vibe of the place.  Unfortunately, I was not greeted not once when I first arrived , the whole time I took videos and photos no one approached me or asked if I would like a menu. Once my friends and I sat down it took a while for someone to come over. Wasn‚Äôt very welcoming . I really wanted to enjoy this place more than I did. The 3 stars are for the cocktail and price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD96gZBhj2zzK57z0nRVFNj\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c79e72195c83274"],"When":"2025-12-25"},{"Name":"Spencer E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtyHOk-4rNoQycEqYzN2Z7_7kjUNm6twFJ-137G-uDDVI21Z5tsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Quirky goth bar. The drinks we tried were great! (Silk road and Devils Dance). Both drinks were tasty and well balanced. The decor was cool. Service...seemed to be more interested in talking at the end of the bar, took about 10 minutes for someone to come take our order. I don't know if they pump on the perfume or we just missed a herd of old lady's but the smell of perfume was overbearing. The loud hip hop took away from the cool decor. But worth a stop for the drinks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBbjw163axhxKpGQ6E8s75Z\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c79e72195c83274"],"When":"2025-9-8"},{"Name":"Akira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrRefJpaZuTTfD9RdX0diFRIVC07iyX-FZ0LXEL8deQP87A9o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Been here a few times and its been fun! Their drinks taste great! Depending on when you go, your service can vary. If it's slow, you get better service, just be prepared for slower service on busy night. Check out their social media on the events they hold.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCBnYKnUIKyWpxZS0D-6ncd\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c79e72195c83274"],"When":"2026-1-6"},{"Name":"Shelle Hedrick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL1kAVd9s5Hr54WKxtYtdAgZzc6i1TiFMG1Y4Irc8fBcVzMLg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dark Sister easily has my favorite cocktails in Las Vegas. The drinks are unique \u0026 beautifully crafted. I also love the esthetic \u0026 atmosphere of the space. Dramatic but comfortable all at the same time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAc_Ht4bBhX9XiVxA1ewAN_\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c79e72195c83274"],"When":"2025-9-1"},{"Name":"Natasha Siebert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUq8Q2fTEKWupiRhi3sKzs-BaHb9d3CmKXiLt4HKTbmEgAK-EZHfg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dark Sister was amazing! The service from our bartender, Savannah was top-notch--friendly, attentive, and welcoming. The drinks were not only well-crafted but flavorful and matched the moody ambience of the bar. The vibe was fantastic; mysterious, dimly lit, and atmospheric--yet still warm and inviting. It's the perfect spot for a variety of occasions. Definitely a place I can't wait to visit again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD0cdjf0YQsLYg88CBJ1dcQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c79e72195c83274"],"When":"2025-8-10"},{"Name":"Edward Hernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPvut9EhSpG0IC25V8K-gl4kvKCC3-2D7Fu_09ld3NBI5HAR0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am rating primarily the bartenders although I attended a private event there that wasn't their servers for food. The bartender's were spectacular super nice and we're willing to try new drinks if you simply ask. Everything was world-class in terms of the drinks and the atmosphere of the bar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhACaAPtBfF9gjPOWbWZ5CTr\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c79e72195c83274"],"When":"2025-11-25"},{"Name":"Matthew Kluk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVP-KFQV5D578cUi-x3LO0DTDU0Y-fLIv_KdQiK3v0oDzTO4dDH8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time visit and we are definitely returning. The bartenders were attentive, friendly, and FAST! You can tell all of the decor, from the wallpaper, candles,  mirror, the gorgeous bar top, the lightbulbs, heck, even the restroom decor choices, were all given a lot of thought. There is ample space for a large group, but also many bar seats and table space for intimate groups of 3-4. I look forward to hitting a happy hour or one of the weekday events being held.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB40OKOWngqrdnHIUKtE-vO\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c79e72195c83274"],"When":"2025-9-2"}]

column5: 515 Fremont St, Las Vegas, NV 89101
column18: Throwback, rock-&-roll-inspired bar sporting '70s-era decor to go with DJ music & cocktails.

column32:
[{"Name":"David Dennison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9wf48cbOMwSxDu6tAxt1gLLRtwHHAplbeLXiv-fZF4V84DuzRIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Randy the bar manager was great! He explained how they make their ginger beer fresh in house every day as well as have it on tap! They also use this to make their Moscow Mules.

The Pickle Tini was also an amazing cocktail with great presentation. Lastly you have to try the world famous habenro Pickle back!

You also have plenty amazing picture opportunities with the decor and special back rooms. Definitely a must try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC4sGALR1vMzJxU4sOeXnNo&fid=0x0:0x8b36c3637213f3d2"],"When":"2026-1-13"},{"Name":"Tabitha Quiroz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJ20RiFaFeQMpJutuZD-8hqJiwzp10nopq7mtyLoSijd_0HknT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience I‚Äôll never forget. We went for boozy bingo and it was very awesome and fun. Atmosphere was great and the DJ was funny and interactive with all guests. Will come again when I‚Äôm back in Vegas. üòä","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDwdZLtuQZUgd5FjX48fwsb&fid=0x0:0x8b36c3637213f3d2"],"When":"2025-9-22"},{"Name":"Kristeen Vander Wall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmu0Ut2m7jcqzdofzvqZQh72CEZcqZ4vXgMadGBqCjKQux-7uB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Boozey Bingo on Thursday nights is THE best - especially when a certain number is called- the whole bar gets free shots. The locals are incredible people and the bar staff is TOP NOTCH.

Highlights: the pickle martini, and they have uncrustables.

Check out the Photo Booth room in the back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD2TlhPbhAHPy1y8odO9Vvx&fid=0x0:0x8b36c3637213f3d2"],"When":"2025-12-12"},{"Name":"Margaret S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQ-4kmQRr3gUGxwVx9lhDY-93kcX6vkM_a7aZY6F9Pl3sjqKg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful spot. Excellent low-key punk vibe with extremely knowledgeable and patient bar staff. Also, there is a perfectly maintained bubble wall. If you‚Äôre seeking a haven from the chaos that is Fremont Street, and have a penchant for 2000s pop-punk, this is the place.

10/10.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDw5YzMCQ&fid=0x0:0x8b36c3637213f3d2"],"When":"2025-3-27"},{"Name":"Bill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUA_YozOJpi_OZP4gfcX-kvdBu0UCkb2O3fLE5X6deZUjknzcSq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to enjoy the original Vegas. Casual and spontaneous. The mixed drink selection is fun. Try the pickle martini ! The various rooms to hang in are very cool. Come in for a good time‚ù§Ô∏è","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCh2vpJzUaoZ7O70yMXldAz&fid=0x0:0x8b36c3637213f3d2"],"When":"2025-10-13"},{"Name":"Brandon Rodriguez Torrento","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqHA6xFoyk33Fef7wct9LUrePl661ybSUkcXpQ8WwzO2WK0XY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always fantastic vibes here at Corduroy‚Äôs. The bartenders are professional and clearly know and love what they do :)

Came in August 2021, and again 3 years later and the atmosphere hasn‚Äôt changed a bit. Huge fan of their amaretto sours, but their other cocktails are delicious too!

Corduroy‚Äôs will always be a staple when visiting Vegas. It‚Äôs just such a unique bar with tons of value and incredible vibes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICf-pT0cg&fid=0x0:0x8b36c3637213f3d2"],"When":"2024-12-28"},{"Name":"Ashlie Hagelback","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgZG6_068YIXytN6VVMtwigfvOAWt3oBB-ffEseWZgO26pn5bo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You have to try this bar out! I went for one boozy bingo, and I fell in love with the place. The bar tenders were nice and the drinks tasted so good. The DJ was great and so fun. They have a cute little photo room, conversation pit, and a big empty room in the back so there are plenty of places to be. I took the cutest photos in the photo room I met new people and I had the best time. I would absolutely recommend this place. They do have snacks but it's stuff like Lunchables and chips no real food so eat before you go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICv-s-uggE&fid=0x0:0x8b36c3637213f3d2"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Heather and Michael Paterson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLSM5HYd6LImvBa6RXgs9R-obyK09KsjfZ8okytYPkd-SeAN0U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice atmosphere and great service from Gary and other bartenders! Drinks were all good, music was fun, and seating areas were comfortable. Definitely recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICvqPa39AE&fid=0x0:0x8b36c3637213f3d2"],"When":"2024-12-7"}]

column5: 707 E Fremont St, Las Vegas, NV 89101
column18: Barrel-aged cocktails & a large array of whiskey offered in a warm, traditional space with a patio.

column32:
[{"Name":"Ryan Guilbert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIs8XydL1D_xvw4bd8h3xpjYKRkvAeHOt1lzQjE8adJLUugrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"John is a top notch, 5 star bartender!!!! Give that guy a raise!!! He's a total showman with great spirits and customer service knowledge.

The spirit selection is very good for the size of the bar.

Love the ambiance!

Can't wait to return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA4h7ESRqkAMQQb2Nb0TF6K&fid=0x0:0x200ac38dea689ae9"],"When":"2025-11-14"},{"Name":"Rigor the Reaper","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJj7Mk58DQOGCTEOuPwwP0VJRxgwAQIg1LCg2y7cpCcDAbkIX8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great place for a cocktail in the container park. Bartenders were lovely. Although very small inside the patio is nice to sit on it necessary.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAKc5i0DllGlOELoXluhAVv&fid=0x0:0x200ac38dea689ae9"],"When":"2025-11-13"},{"Name":"J W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhEavyAYsOil3WUX5dgb5TwbuC3iXR6OKOdyOrwS1hS2kJ3UI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent spot with a top notch selection of spirits. Was made to feel welcome the moment I took a seat at the bar by the gentlemen attending. They do the little things right. This place is a hidden gem in the city of scams.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD7V-IAqCJ75OYwp3HQAX3o&fid=0x0:0x200ac38dea689ae9"],"When":"2025-11-25"},{"Name":"Jacob Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQOznOroXH_SfybIX-0gFUeWQkZNDfQ9EwUhoIyRRB4MSjv2mw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Drinks here are really well handled crafted, the bar tender is very nice and knows his cocktails well. They have a great system to order and make drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBFt6VMq6wBTJhrJj0F9R0a&fid=0x0:0x200ac38dea689ae9"],"When":"2025-12-20"},{"Name":"Jason Heilman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLsp8a8LhVdkb_rw2m03QFHg3b9mtk4RcDBX1-WnY5QCvPn_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Knowledgeable staff. Super friendly. Small cozy atmosphere. I like the way it's in the group with the pods so you can get food and then pop over for a drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDkjXW5TVpSiXPuVGV3MYZT&fid=0x0:0x200ac38dea689ae9"],"When":"2025-9-26"},{"Name":"John Fesler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIbBOtTumDBRTC9f-rfphAaaKG6qrw1lBk8TqvyKsdVpfHBLrdMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very pleasant place to sit and have an amazing crafted drink.
Truly an artist with drink making.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCXz-hst_1hwxYIJUIUOGUZ&fid=0x0:0x200ac38dea689ae9"],"When":"2026-1-19"},{"Name":"Jason Ward","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4TUmokh4n2ioGJXEwhJDOqfCJmLEB94gyXDtJ37T3yCssOW1b-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I‚Äôm new to Bourbon and whiskeys and John helped me pick a couple excellent drinks to delight my pallet. Started with a old-fashioned and then moved onto neat pours. The only negative is that they don‚Äôt serve food so I had to leave to go get some food before I can start drinking more. It‚Äôs an excellent place great atmosphere I will be making this one of my go to places when I visit Fremont Street.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDHoILnlgE&fid=0x0:0x200ac38dea689ae9"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Kourtney Layton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8Of4HV_aAbMmaeO9SaGEy5indN14gOLj8QqUi439ZXAKdZgU9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Beautiful establishment, but the wait time for drinks was insanely slow considering they weren‚Äôt that busy. The drinks were very metered and so watered down that we didn‚Äôt end up finishing them. This was the last place we stopped during a really fun bar crawl evening‚Äî but it was our least favorite of the entire night. Definitely expected better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCYhrjJSw&fid=0x0:0x200ac38dea689ae9"],"When":"2025-5-3"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Aaron G Beebe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLIq8bjzHQ4vljXaeJU0X40uz8dTx3Gt3zeaGzgS2zyxrqRbhmB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Review by Aaron G. Beebe ‚Äî Owner of GonnaHappen
Bin 702 @ Downtown Container Park ‚Äì Las Vegas

On my visit to the Downtown Container Park tonight to watch football, I stopped into Bin 702, and the experience was one of the highlights of the day. The guy working there was rocking a Wu-Tang shirt ‚Äî which hit home for me because of the connections I‚Äôve had throughout my life with people from the Wu-Tang world. I‚Äôve help them with torus in Reno and Vegas Cappadonna, Killah Priest, and the late Papa Wu (rest in peace). They were always hardworking, humble, and real ‚Äî so seeing that shirt instantly brought back a piece of my story.

The staff at Bin 702 was just as impressive. They told me all about their happy hour specials, walked me through their local beers on tap, and even suggested I check out Oak & Ivy afterward. I didn‚Äôt make it this time, but the recommendation was appreciated. But on my list....

I came by myself, but the entire atmosphere made me feel good. Most of the groups I saw were families or couples on dates ‚Äî and honestly, it made me want to bring a date next time. But I'm single and ready to mingle and wish I new some local who wanted to hang out. The vibe is that welcoming. Even though it was a colder windy night and the park wasn‚Äôt as packed as usual, it's never super packed but flow is always steady on weekends, the energy at Bin 702 was warm, friendly, and fun.

If you‚Äôre at the Container Park and want a solid drink, great service, and a cool local vibe, Bin 702 is definitely worth the stop.

#Bin702 #DowntownContainerPark #LasVegas #GonnaHappen #LocalVibes #aarongbeebe","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA2NpcRsxKL0SALKC0n_Mqn&fid=0x0:0x86e75c1a5d433394"],"When":"2025-11-17"},{"Name":"TravelingwithNat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlOlDLIRk0RZTVM8C7r_sEe0VinloLlaF28Rv1-mpzJ0RU4wkV8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stopped into Bin 702 in Downtown Las Vegas planning just to grab some drinks, but the moment we walked in, we were hit with the most incredible aroma of spices and savory goodness. It smelled so amazing that we couldn‚Äôt help but ask about the food.

Our bartender, Justin, went above and beyond. Even though the kitchen was already closed, he heard how much we were raving about the smell and was kind enough to reopen it just for us. He made us his signature sandwiches - what he personally recommended, and they were absolutely fantastic.

Between the cozy atmosphere, the delicious food, and Justin‚Äôs outstanding hospitality, this place truly exceeded all expectations. Highly, highly recommend stopping by Bin 702, and if you‚Äôre lucky enough to have Justin as your bartender, you‚Äôre in for an incredible experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA3MSf0Mf0cBhuDRhmsZibJ&fid=0x0:0x86e75c1a5d433394"],"When":"2025-10-1"},{"Name":"Cole Ash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXc1Cs-cwdfc5azpsK5g4JzixHtyc3xJO_2culluwE5KLbr_u-U1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Needed some hair of the dog after a night out and Bin 702 hit the spot! The hot cheeto pickle back was certainly a highlight. Good options for vegetarians","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDiCrwoR4_sDPRawbcUZ-IS&fid=0x0:0x86e75c1a5d433394"],"When":"2026-1-10"},{"Name":"Jessica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJWe6QTdygNjU0QBvODcn73_VgzTN89YMnGgpttdEO3yjLY-slNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered a cubano montadito with a Kentucky mule and they were both so delicious! I then ordered a brie and apple montadito as my dessert. I enjoyed it but not as much as the cubano. The staff were really friendly and accommodating. They made sure I was able to charge my phone and cool off for the time I was there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC8z3qUxcO25bMPZkktdk8P&fid=0x0:0x86e75c1a5d433394"],"When":"2025-9-14"},{"Name":"Train Track Johnny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6hhtCV3ZmzS1Po50rk75gKuFX9iDyjz-xzs4kTVR81YRNYjM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got some drinks in this cool little bar. Friendly staff. Good drinks. Great atmosphere,","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA39V319S_xpoUlaZb7Q-op&fid=0x0:0x86e75c1a5d433394"],"When":"2025-11-1"},{"Name":"Shannon Hopkins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCvF03XD50hrN2Vov62iEOE4zPH-uusloCMHmnKB7UrRpCFtJbEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in for a few beers. The girl working was so fun and friendly. The beers was great. Fun outdoor seating. Glad we stopped by","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAaA-WrliWsABlha0EwkBmX&fid=0x0:0x86e75c1a5d433394"],"When":"2026-1-6"},{"Name":"Lisa M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJk65aDp2yzL8gNVfGTSDzvfHl4qOh1wJWLyNeKG6gg9MgI7DM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alli was absolutely fantastic! She made the best bloody mary I've had in a couple years and you could tell it was hand mixed. She was super friendly and honestly some great service for recommendations around the area. The meat and cheese platter was fantastic and that fig jam was honestly addicting. So good and i would highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCxkuWbuT2dBXkB4v-c4ZWo&fid=0x0:0x86e75c1a5d433394"],"When":"2025-7-18"},{"Name":"Thomas Trautman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXV-Xmb9dFLtw5QzfBdo3ry4Eh3Bs4AEAmVGz_wmsJ_KiYq7v8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great spot to start the day at. We came early in the day and only paid $45 for a cheese board and whole bottle of wine. It was basically empty when we were here the bartender was super nice and the service was quick. This might be the next regular spot we frequent when in town!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDQsdWesgE&fid=0x0:0x86e75c1a5d433394"],"When":"2025-3-11"}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Apple Leong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTcHZPT97xNU30cdF5_Bqbf6v15dR9L5Mt5PXWWIhzWf4rPJdT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"That mushroom was superb!!!!!
The anbience was great!!
Not every seats has a good view of the stage, we have a really good jazz night
Lovely!! I would definitely be back again when i visit Vegas

Oh, old fashioned is a must order!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB7E0JuskOwukQXcw_GWSB7&fid=0x0:0x832b5b79e10c128e"],"When":"2026-1-24"},{"Name":"steve shockley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVg9h1DAfibD5MVpaw1hueUiqZ4HSUDrZ0LbDXqb2c-7M1muyrk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a fantastic place. Find the password in their insta links or you can enter through the museum (not as much fun). Find the secret drink menu on a bottle with a QR code, somewhere in the speakeasy. Personal favorite drink is the moonshine mayhem and the vanilla moonshine is fantastic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDlYQCLf3byYufkI5rdw2Fz&fid=0x0:0x832b5b79e10c128e"],"When":"2025-11-8"},{"Name":"Wayne Mayner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZd7OSSpq7DLHDnw6M_aTeB9u0bqq-zxcjqYg12j-jG-voWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food, drinks, service and atmosphere were amazing. Plenty of prohibition era memorabilia to read and look at. An excellent experience at a reasonable price.
Make sure to get the password from the website.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDUv2YJqJKbUgg1d3MZx9LJ&fid=0x0:0x832b5b79e10c128e"],"When":"2026-1-24"},{"Name":"Rigor the Reaper","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJj7Mk58DQOGCTEOuPwwP0VJRxgwAQIg1LCg2y7cpCcDAbkIX8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love the vibe of this place. If you haven't been to the museum I suggest you go. There is so much interesting history there. We got the spin dip (oddly spicy) but good and a couple cocktails. Our waitress was nice and attentive as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB2ZT9hZCYvdMXncKPK8y-X&fid=0x0:0x832b5b79e10c128e"],"When":"2025-11-14"},{"Name":"Rolf Adelsberger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_Ns2pGDVk2thapWN13vhXeCKENPTN2TL_juZhF2CmI9BGymrvIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Another gem of Las Vegas. Hidden beneath the Mob Museum you are only ‚Äûallowed‚Äú to enter when you know the password. You enter in the back of the building, after climbing down a flight of stairs and ringing the bell. After a while a metal slide at the door gets pulled open and with a dominant voice you are asked the password. (You get it on their website ;) ).
When you succeeded you enter a room that reminds of an area long pasty the personnel is dressed in historically inspired outfits. The menu is small, but great. Prices are fair and the drinks are mixed with proficiency and compassion. It‚Äôs a must-see when you are around.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAUo1iuWhBARo03izW_uNs2&fid=0x0:0x832b5b79e10c128e"],"When":"2026-1-11"},{"Name":"Randy L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0vpI5VaW-fyo4mLGBE5VZHpwLbiS2Osa0jUhQAkW6XPfd4A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You can enter through the mob museum of you buy tickets or you can go around the right side and go down the stairs by the barrel.  Get the password from their Facebook page so they open the door. They have some fancy drinks.  They are a bit pricey all over vegas unless you find a good happy hour. Who knew whipped egg whites could taste so good with alcohol?  They did apparently and now I do to.  We had to wait about 10 minutes to get a seat at the bar but there must have been a rush because ten minutes after we got there half the place cleared out.if your in the area give it a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAaMBp6_BUJJN7gFgJLUR5E&fid=0x0:0x832b5b79e10c128e"],"When":"2025-10-7"},{"Name":"Andrew Mariani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvv9ZorBrfLvJil8bqyvTbSY5qIGqSkUXdjxYWapylSp5VYIDc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really cool experience, definitely worth stopping by. We had the mushrooms and pretzel bites as well and both were good. The Ole fashion was delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAM1qgls9Yby_rHUd08dOCh&fid=0x0:0x832b5b79e10c128e"],"When":"2025-10-21"},{"Name":"Frank Biermann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwwttJM2sqEJwJe3jUZWguC381PJvRHlvz2W7ZxEu7q1TnXIF0tA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An all around absolute solid Las Vegas experience. It is a blast from start to finish as soon as you get to the door and try to enter. The host played loads of tricks on us as we attempted to get in and it took us on a rollercoaster of emotions before we even stepped foot inside.

All the drinks were quite unique - some were not my favorites ever, but enjoyed the ride nonetheless. We particularly loved the presentation of the things we ordered and would definitely return to bring the uninitiated. Super fun. A must visit when in Las Vegas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEJKBiN7rxfa0Bw&fid=0x0:0x832b5b79e10c128e"],"When":"2025-6-5"}]

column5: 1218 S Main St, Las Vegas, NV 89104
column18: Sibling-run haunt offering craft cocktails & beer amid eclectic, vintage decor, plus music events.

column32:
[{"Name":"Zak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW90aROLIjJ-zS__PTISvAdP4kSoQfnzydWCjCXZNn8i98pxVJ-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very dark but nice atmosphere in here with creative cocktails. This location offered really great privacy and it was easy to hold a conversation without hearing every right next to you.

Service was good and their seasonal menu had some unique drinks along side their normal menu. Definitely loved this place for a nice date night. Will definitely be back again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCYhqGCEw&fid=0x0:0xec9f75c8c384b810"],"When":"2025-5-3"},{"Name":"hannah yeagley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTbNt28YvIvleADa8KcMTEkQSrhiSSLGSJ2fUuXR0E1zFGQQk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great hidden gem in the area. One of the OG bars in the arts district offers a friendly, comfortable experience with innovative cocktails. Loved this bar for an early evening low-key vibe in the arts district. Bartenders were knowledgeable and really fun to talk to and get local recs from! Live music on certain nights as well!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel Maros","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWT2J789w6Wl2msroBod6rsq_ZrmlRN8k2eoTxVaPyoFgF3_UzW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here quite a few times.  I honestly believe they got some of the more creative drinks in Vegas.  They are not always my favorite, but I want to Be challenged and they sure do that. Little did I know a beet drink would be my favorite of all I triedü´úlast night.

They change their menu a lot. The punch is always great,  I would say this is a required visit for anyone in Vegas!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBWGqyNnlDO9Kn7n6xvZpgq&fid=0x0:0xec9f75c8c384b810"],"When":"2025-7-30"},{"Name":"J R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4GP_lMlMgi53sAFk37cnu7vuKQtxWsFKSc4dV8zg2MbX-iLUv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"25 January 2026
I had noticed an interesting addition to Velveteen Rabbit's parking lot: a trolley car named Elvis. Felt compelled to go inside the bar for information; naturally had to get a couple of drinks while there.

The current seasonal cocktail menu is "Time Travelers" with each drink evoking a sense of a decade.

Nighthawks ($17): The 1940s, specifically the famous 1942 Hopper painting of a nighttime diner. Drink was poured into a white coffee cup, tasted of black coffee, smoke, and bitter earth. Cinnamon Toast Crunch cereal as a sweet counterpoint was scattered in the saucer.

Sisters of Mercy ($17): Named for the 80s goth rock band, at the point in time when they performed in Detroit. Cocktail was super dry, woody, bittersweet.

Both cocktails were invented by Brian, who also happened to be my server at the bar.

Value: High for strong drinks with a story.

Service: Very nice from both Brian and Amber.

etc
Trolley was a recent purchase with an idea to have it as an eye-catching event space. Couldn't find out if the vehicle was actually mobile.

23 March 2025
Stop number Four on the Arts District Alcohol Discovery Tour.

Atmosphere: Victorian occult inside, casual garden party outside. Plus a DJ booth and neon, as we are still in Las Vegas.

Liked the menu for its many faces of woman theme. Opted to start with The Faceless Old Woman ($16) primarily because of its name; presented a deep viperish flavor. Then ordered Catherine's Kiss ($17), a gentle sweet mind mug.

Value: Tops for theme and creativity.

Service: Very nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDw1sXwIg&fid=0x0:0xec9f75c8c384b810"],"When":"2025-3-25"},{"Name":"Matthew Shockley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7dZclCqtkQrgnEQX1S00Yaw7jOjvmrDLXHqET99cTe2lLS38I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"No Food Available, ughhgugg... This is the best cocktail bar in Las Vegas bar none. Seasonal Menu that changes and the mixologists that work here are top notch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDYzL-mW-oP-bNQPNaGQMFB&fid=0x0:0xec9f75c8c384b810"],"When":"2025-9-11"},{"Name":"Edward Hernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPvut9EhSpG0IC25V8K-gl4kvKCC3-2D7Fu_09ld3NBI5HAR0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"No food that I know of but the drinks are world-class.  They have incredibly innovative drinks with very unusual recipes. There is a hipster old Las Vegas vibe. This is an amazing place to have a drink before a show at the Majestic theater.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB8Rf9q2c8aQOmC4FolUjiH&fid=0x0:0xec9f75c8c384b810"],"When":"2025-6-16"},{"Name":"Nerual Locke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPHAeyLmMPp7n26NOnuDeSbcQKm9k666hLTEq-XXwFlU3rLTFX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Velveteen Rabbit is a hideaway in the arts district, like time traveling behind closed shutters there is a velvet side that is timeless to relax. It takes you back to days when life was romantic in those vintage day's. The ambiance  has lasted the test of time.  A definite place to stop for a drink and remember the good days.
With my co-writer and author.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBDozLtLYyJwempexF2DoG5&fid=0x0:0xec9f75c8c384b810"],"When":"2026-1-30"},{"Name":"Kenny Adams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4PDfzfps2BHD8PYeD3LVX5B669DZjqT6fUcPZylUyFm5RUw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Velveteen Rabbit is one of those rare bars that completely nails the experience. Amazing cocktails, incredible atmosphere, and a team that genuinely cares about their guests. I lost a couple of shirts I‚Äôd bought after visiting and reached out to see if I could purchase them again. Christina went above and beyond to make it right and handled everything with such kindness and professionalism. Their hospitality is just as impressive as their cocktails and it‚Äôs truly one of the best spots in Vegas.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"angel racaza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsgZTkqXKSWsl-ygaeee_Z1DZ5_2RBfSJj2iSfVJyGhwZGZUIILQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"i fear it didn't make much of an impression; the drink had a bit of alcohol but it was 30 dollars (more with tip) for precisely one drink. for an overpriced alcoholic beverage, i'd expect to be in awe but i admit i could find better refreshments that charge for less. i would recommend to avoid if possible","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCIj932t38dNyOgddCmUPk0&fid=0x0:0x5895acc0ba9f6273"],"When":"2025-7-29"},{"Name":"Mike Solis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvkQYBRsr53DC059AUesGqJhGoX2nBEKVkrHW_17XqOKKsFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"One draft beer and a slushy was $56.
Drink smarter. Better options EVERYWHERE ELSE.
Fooled me once.
üëéüëé","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Colton Swanson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKAnY_12JiGQb5sQgnwX28VOtkSQZXPrR5_oWCEb8DQ8czPg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Save your money on the Fremont bar, i went up to order a slushy. One of the girl already kinda had an attitude when i asked what‚Äôs most popular she said all them (not really helpful) i then ordered one it was almost $40 for a watered down slushy. When I said that‚Äôs not a slushy that‚Äôs just juice & alcohol , she got even more snobby and said I‚Äôll let you taste it and I said I can see that‚Äôs it‚Äôs just watered down juice, luckily, I hadn‚Äôt paid and I told her never mind, I don‚Äôt wanna drink from here, she then gave me more attitude then I just walked off. Just warning people to save your money on the slushy drinks from here they ain‚Äôt worth it in my opinion!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"First Name","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJV8d8e8w_y5QFW17QlDEA6bPK0DLwMOZFs6UaOe0XHFj0eHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It's kinda shameful and disgusting even for Las vegas üòîüò•üò°I watched the  bartender(White guy, bald head, blue eyes) rip off each customer. He asks them....how many shots do they want in their drinks. He then proceeds to add an once of alcohol, if that, to each drink....no matter how many shots you order, 1, 2, or 3 He gives u the same pour or amount. His trick is, turning his back to you after he starts pouring.
He gives the illusion as if he is pouring a proper pour, but he's not.
He is ripping people off left and right. And it's a crying shame.
Update: I just spoke with taylor, assistant supervisor at the bar, he refused to give me my money back for those dispecaable drink I order. He proclaimed rudely that it was my fault that I didn't order more alcohol. He was so unprofessional and kept cutting me off as i plead my case......no matter what I said, how I said it, he refused to refund the bad product.
I even asked him....why??? Why?? Why are you doing this, why are you being so mean and rude to me? Why, wouldn't you want to be in good standing with your customers and Google reviews?
That did not phase him at all. He got angry and agitated and blamed me. I was expecting exceptional customer service from such a world renowned establishment.
"Ma'am we are so sorry to hear you were not satisfied with our product that we served you this afternoon, I can see  where they may have been a slight misunderstanding on our part on what the drinks contains. We would be more than happy and honored to provide you with a refund this one time as a courtesy to you and to leave you with an amazing experience from our establishment. Thank you so much for your feedback.
We hope this correction turns you into a valued returning customer.

Safe travels,
The D"

Nope, that's not the response I received. I got a big 'Kick rocks, who cares what you didn't like' from taylor...(not his exact words but that's how he made me feelüòî).

More importantly, and i shared this with taylor, all the bad reviews say the same thing about the drinks. All of them! He could have took the opportunity to make things right across the board...change some people minds and show that he really cares about the customer experience. But no, he stood on business and stood firm on not trying in the least bit to rectify the situation. Not even an apology.
Not even, "hey next time you're in town stop by, let's see what we can do for you.

Nothing but a horrible attitude of frustration.

Thanks taylor.
How much does kindness cost?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"stacy borders","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKBfbv_NEKOgympskAxkM22Lmn6bUFQ-Rig45eCF80U3-H3BS3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst experience I‚Äôve ever had in Vegas at a bar /casino , been coming for yrs , nice place , cool casino . Terrible bartender at the back bar with the black hair , thinks she‚Äôs a kardashian!! Not only a snotty person but extremely rude and nasty look on her face , I mean I get it everyone has a bad day. But omg tells us  ‚Äúdrink's are only free if you tip me really good‚Äù . WOW really ?? Gave her 2$ for a bottle beer . Not even a thank you just the stink eye . SMH , sad .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Darren Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKXqMktfYMj2PTB046bXZahAU4md1HKoPOWw7gendGZ1zrazQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My wife is a light weight. 2 sips of a daiquiri in louisiana and she is to the wind. She drank that whole $30 drink and felt nothing. No alcohol is in that. Just pass it up. It‚Äôs a slush.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pig Rabbit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKnjHRH8WsSnTCO8Z8H1OGQLPRLFKFRgnwxXYD3UaBzSwCn1E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Not only was the bartender‚Äôs lack of customer service off putting, they tried to scam me by putting in multiple charges two days later (I know because this was the only place in Vegas that I used my card, everything else was cash). Good thing my bank declined the other 4 charges, notified me, and closed this card. Avoid this place!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jenna Tranter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLti-2V9JtorwVRq-e13WwnN6Yi7ozYmF6NG6Ppk7CB9hgwlw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place is the worst. They charge $16 for a 20 oz daiquiri which is ridiculous even for Vegas. We ordered a strawberry daiquiri anyway and is was so disgustingly sweet that we couldn‚Äôt drink it - it tasted like straight syrup. Had to throw it away after a few sips. The staff were rude too. Steer clear of this place. It has no redeeming qualities.","Images":null,"When":""}]

This place has quietly become my go-to spot for hidden, underrated cocktails, especially around midnight. Always a great experience!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAzjX3U1gsVtNPno5eOCrgk\u0026fid=0x0:0x9270ee4ed8de4260"],"When":"2025-11-28"},{"Name":"anthony mendez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUnvSZAxtgF47KflUcY02_mDW7DugfBx0-GNYukUHvjpqBow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great bar! My favorite bartender, James, made me an incredible Canadian Old Fashioned with Pendleton. He is a true master at his craft. I‚Äôll definitely be back for the next Cowboy Christmas!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCkh58GRPgcMKeHNkSODB-9\u0026fid=0x0:0x9270ee4ed8de4260"],"When":"2025-12-6"},{"Name":"Jared Powers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpJVHwhuHGFG9zRYv8BsQwNOR48UWYH-NJ3msHv8Z6qSyyajc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super cool bar just off freemont street. There is a public entrance if you don't want to do the museum but you better come prepared. They won't let no coppers in. The old fashioned was served in a book and it really felt like I was back in time. Excellent experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDozPatUQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x9270ee4ed8de4260"],"When":"2025-4-22"},{"Name":"Scrapyard Ape","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAhDg0K0Kxr6Vef5qS9O9TLg_LhG-lQ54bk2NkgTWvkkRnwIcD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this bar!  Every time I come to Vegas, the first thing I do after checking into the hotel, is get a whiskey sour at Bar Prohibition.  Generous pours and served in a glass... something that is becoming more uncommon downtown.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeff Baker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyQPtJnuEyzDoG7ZW1lEpol51PzhGrgWaOVyj-Pzh7lAYvSUJBlg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The atmosphere was good until we met the Very Rude Old Blonde Haired Bartender who harassed us to pay for 2 drinks even though we were gambling.  It was bizarre and we left.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert Rigsbee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnYrWrVwushr9J7xMeSkcunCfP5A2F_0m_XergJJ6Ynji7s--1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were on Royal Bar Crawl and asked each bartender to make one Vodka and one Rum drink, and here was amazing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Defenders Gaming Network","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzAFl6ZjBjcoWY5JJi_utSVgtcyPfpG7yiP2UEBMLm743YtWUI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A solid bar in downtown Las Vegas, vibe on night shift is pretty spot on!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Braela Reed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJyOL-WxREGDsoNq8rmrqiqjJqwV7BpRTziTfFVzQ3Dzv5X2Sw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great bartender she provided great service and recommended a drink to us that was a 10/10","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Daniel Lama","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLN_gEsiVUiFWVtCPy2z06qB0UGN9pru0xd8feU8S8ofRZcsA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cool as seen in pictures ;) They have good happy hour deals, they have draft beer for $8 and over, on party days (thursday through sunday from 22:00 till late) they always have low cost shots or promos.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCCk_J1IhEjmqCT3iNqcj7F&fid=0x0:0x3c2acc7b7382f4a3"],"When":"2025-7-9"},{"Name":"Bryant Boesen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqdb_IockOn-I0j5NmIx9_l-4QSaz0tIj3LZnCBdA9MTIlFcRn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an absolutely delightful spot! The perfect balance of quality and value. Angel made check in seamless and stress free. The food at the bar was great, as is the entertainement yard out back.

MINUTES walk to Fremont Experience, which is the best part of Vegas.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jared G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJcBQDovtXAYymxb_oVFW4KKC7slR4LV16vp0kalAj7voO6IET=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I've NEVER been refused entry to a bar. It was New Years Eve. Not only did my friends get asked to leave, my wife got asked to leave and she is always extremely coherent. My other friend and I left to get food and came back and were refused entry. I moved to Vegas from Utah and this bar practically promoted sobriety.
If you want to have a good time and drink DO NOT go here. They don't want anyone thats had a drink before they get there and the older guy with black/white hair at the front door is not friendly.
If you want to go to somewhere that is practically empty for New Years this is your spot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Selena velazquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSLWkuvEuemK6CMDPaWi7uJde9OedSzLdo8KsNb_nYXfQt7UOkOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The life-size games were freaking awesome and the vending machine filled with mysteries was sick! We all order a variety of drinks and shots. The Dirty Peach, PJ and Strawberry cheesecake shots tasted amazing! The ‚ÄúSomething strong‚Äùdrink wasn‚Äôt that strong but still tasted amazing!  Playing life size beer pong was so much fun but also so hard. Definitely worth the prices to have this much fun. Going late at night is the move cause no one is there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCg7cHRwwE&fid=0x0:0x3c2acc7b7382f4a3"],"When":"2025-2-20"},{"Name":"Danny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-twZm7aCjDsafntA7iB3rBX6mstARpvpNh-DKoXYxjkJr7tfm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here with large wedding party.

DJ was good and inside was very vibrant. People dancing, as well as playing pool and other bar games.

Drinks for very well made and reasonably priced. There's a large bar inside as well as a small bar outside on the patio.

Patio was a little depressing, might be because it's already fall. It is  typically very lively, as you can hear the music outside as well as a lot of outdoor patio games.

Overall silver fun experience and will definitely go back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Manny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsisGgppRkqSAjyRzp6DfNvqGsB36Qp6bfpiYl7-Jlppo4eZTsgA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thoroughly enjoyed my time at the Gold Spike. We didn't expect much as it was a weekday and Wednesday evening. It was nice to have the space for my group and the food was delicious. The chef was an expert and really courteous. I'm excited to come back here when I am back in Vegas. Thank you for a great evening!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDR74_mygE&fid=0x0:0x3c2acc7b7382f4a3"],"When":"2023-5-7"},{"Name":"TZ Snow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFO3Ax0mZU_CBc19Wkt_15gvKbp7g7EST6hHb2H1YgLCGrmDmn1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ran into this place by accident. I am a local and just stopped in for a drink. Paul was the bartender and made excellent margaritas. I honestly thought this was a casino. I was surprised that it was more of a bar with a nice patio and lots of adult games for fun. I was also impressed that it‚Äôs non smoking.  I‚Äôll be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elayna Brooke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsF_lGeBkFMsTdCXDunoE8TvDW9G8dDtgMZSAXShpt0Zma28Gs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Saw them deny entry to someone in a wheelchair, which should've been the red flag. The bartenders are nice, but the female security officer seems to be on a power trip. We hung out there a couple of nights in a row to play pool. On a Friday, I was given a nasty shot and spat it out in the bathroom because of how gross it was, and I was thrown out for that, being accused of puking, which was utterly untrue. I've never been thrown out of any establishment ever. We won't be back because of how they treated us. They walked me out the front door and had my sister-in-law close out my tab on my behalf, which I'm pretty sure isn't allowed. It was empty in there almost every night we went in, and now I get why.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column5: 113 N 4th St, Las Vegas, NV 89101

column32:
[{"Name":"Tyler Yzaguirre","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkB_0PUbjboLViMwC6UkP9AJKeBdpLCU5SCA3pedMYoUnMhmw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Bartender - absolutely amazing, really nice. Everything that went poorly tonight was out of her control. Came in with my associates - visiting from DC - strong solid drinks. ‚Äî tacos & pot stickers took 45 minutes - with an empty restaraunt. Returned the fish tacos. Pot stickers came out freezing cold too. But decided to eat them.

Again - bartender was absolutely amazing. Nothing tonight was her fault. Their ‚Äúcook‚Äù needs to be re-evaluated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCrlGv1wrYmjjOvST6OvVVd&fid=0x0:0x99962f17bd961c27"],"When":"2026-2-3"},{"Name":"Nerual Locke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPHAeyLmMPp7n26NOnuDeSbcQKm9k666hLTEq-XXwFlU3rLTFX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Preserving the charm of old Vegas, when it was known for its glitter and neon.  The term "Glitter Gulch" was also a Wild West term for red-light districts, fitting the area's adult entertainment scene, including the Glitter Gulch strip club.   It is now a tiki bar with island vibes and Creative cocktails if Vegas Vickie could see us now.

A true gotta try this place downtown.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBj_avKitI1pPsNkpauz8p7&fid=0x0:0x99962f17bd961c27"],"When":"2026-1-20"},{"Name":"melissa clark","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIritnkg6cuuwUx3Nqd2QDYBHEZ_aaH3PTZVGwM6gIkg3fNys=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a must stop!
They were open on Christmas when most of everything vegetarian friendly was closed.
We got the veggie dumplings, mango salsa and fish tacos. Wow, the salsa was so fresh and delicious, the chips were crunchy and not stale. The dumpling were a great add on, we got the veggie ones and they were paired with a delightful sauce. The fish tacos blew us away. The shell was thicker tortilla and made a wonderful pillow for the beer battered crispy fish layed on a bed of cabbage and decadent sauce glazed on top, the mango salsa was also on the tacos. Chefs kiss, perfection. The PRICES- most affordable place yet! Our meal was 36$, WHAT??!!?? The atmosphere was so quiet since we went on Christmas which was perfect for me, Fremont is so loud and I needed a quiet place to recharge. Highly recommend, friendly on the budget, Fresh ingredients, you can tell all handmade not from bags like the other places. We are here for another day and will be stopping back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCV02GIsm_OYUk9j9SryqFp&fid=0x0:0x99962f17bd961c27"],"When":"2025-12-26"},{"Name":"Mike MacLeod","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUJg_m3CbqZQDmVtdzTk45lmC0FP3NLbdTGvbai2mTPIDA67r-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Tiki bar. Just off Freemont street. We checked it out mid-day and it was quiet. I'm sure it gets busy at night or on the weekends. Drinks were tasty and boozy. Staff was friendly. Cool atmosphere. Worth checking out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBeEGfSYjiItd9GDM8nr1ez&fid=0x0:0x99962f17bd961c27"],"When":"2026-1-25"},{"Name":"Elizabeth Motter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhKzRh6DxfV3m5xwvktshSpPCvaQkzNaBGL2O8Sx_gPn9vCwpO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"From the moment I walked in, I knew we were in for a treat. How cute is this place! We all love a good tiki party. Well, this place has is all! From great drinks, food and great service. The atmosphere was amazing and music was on point. Not to mention Gina our server had great food and drink recommendations. Gary came around to check on us, so we had to rave about the place. All the staff were attentive and friendly. We all had the best night! Definitely a go to spot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhChSSlLscvA0NQmBL6Z1E9N&fid=0x0:0x99962f17bd961c27"],"When":"2025-10-28"},{"Name":"Mily","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhiqkmC851Pjq919KTsMvzVvWV1SkTeiJYsiC9U_MA3aj9-tck=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you love tiki as much as we do, Glitter Gulch Tiki is an absolute must! From the moment we walked in, we were blown away by the vibrant atmosphere, incredible decor, and the friendliest service you could ask for.

The owner, Fred, is such a gem! Genuinely personable, community focused, and clearly passionate about creating an unforgettable experience for every guest. It‚Äôs the kind of care and connection that makes you want to keep coming back.

The drinks? Next level. Beautifully crafted, perfectly balanced, and served in the most extraordinary tiki mugs I‚Äôve ever seen (and at only $55, they‚Äôre worth every penny!).

A huge shoutout to Ashley, who was behind the bar and made our night unforgettable. Not only is she stunning, but her charisma and energy absolutely lit up the room. She went above and beyond; from walking us through the drinks to putting on a full smoke-and-fire show with dry ice that had us grinning like kids. You can tell she loves what she does, and it made the whole experience feel extra special.

This place has everything we look for: amazing drinks, thoughtful service, and people who truly love sharing good times. Can‚Äôt wait to come back! üçπüî•üå∫","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBPWceZVjjIVWLYeoilnJK1&fid=0x0:0x99962f17bd961c27"],"When":"2025-8-9"},{"Name":"Emily Lorenzo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmKHgfMph1pm6uAZP7WbfhKfKG0XzgQ3BcbZax6TupFXFZ5osJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a much-needed girls‚Äô night at Glitter Gulch Tiki, and it did not disappoint!  Gary, the manager, was an incredible host.  He was constantly checking on us, keeping the energy up with laughs, and offering great drink recommendations.  Gina, our waitress, was super sweet, attentive, and honestly a pro at lighting those cocktails on fire.  Total pyrotechnic skills! üî• If you love strong drinks, good food, a fun staff, and a IG-worthy night please stop by and show them some love!!  Can‚Äôt wait to come back soon üíÉ PS Order the Shipwrecked Fish Tacos and The Revenge üçπ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDbk9R3z9K9WmL7CnoHuZ7g&fid=0x0:0x99962f17bd961c27"],"When":"2025-10-28"},{"Name":"Katie Pickard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBEoNkF76HQyIaNnmYSb-M0iB1XkdN4F9gtKGCu7BlSPDHrgb5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden Gem Just Off Fremont Street!
Stumbled upon this new tiki bar and wow‚Äîwhat a find! Easily some of the best food and drinks we‚Äôve had in Vegas. The cocktails were strong, creative, and perfectly mixed, and the lumpia and fried rice were absolutely delicious. The atmosphere was warm and welcoming‚Äîthe staff made us feel like we were visiting an old friend. This spot completely made our day. I‚Äôm telling everyone to check it out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDLh5ssp--rFQu4l86B_PCR&fid=0x0:0x99962f17bd961c27"],"When":"2025-7-11"}]

column18: Modern bar with comic book‚Äìcentric decor, plus bowling lanes, billiard tables & video games.

column32:
[{"Name":"James Mikkelson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3RYhMR37Jwn8ZWCOKjLQsnPpjesicQsgXFWHjTOpQZlPSOdQi7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Saw other reviews say they paid 5 bucks to get in..we didn't pay anything on a Saturday night.

Music is good, servers are great. The place is grubby and cold, but lots of fun things to play and see. Also they have wrestling out the back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA68UUsUqIUcLDBu8H_8eii&fid=0x0:0x9bd8573a1819b48a"],"When":"2025-10-21"},{"Name":"Sean Monroe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjsc4KEz4CghMBMrjhwz3Iqm2mErbr7B1dOGbKqfxZQKAZRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really cool spot with bowling alley lanes, arcade, wrestling and science fiction memorabilia.  Drink selection is decent.  Marcus the bartender/security  was very nice and efficient.  They have a couple of specialty events that would be worth seeing.  If you are an adult and in to any of these things, great place.  They need to sell merch for their business.  Didn't see a food menu.  Loved it and will go back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vegas Reviews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLsk2CoxHCvHN-JNrs_-E-6pt9z9e3eVnO61vKCSkOqoX4WGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I came here with a group of friends. We've been trying to hit up some of the nerdy spots in Vegas and this was obviously on the list.

The first issue is that it was legitimately dirty in there. Like garbage on the ground levels of dirty.

It was dead, which is fine, but when we walked in the bartender seemed annoyed? It was a strange reaction given how slow it was. You think he'd be happy for some business.

Our group felt like the vibe was off, so we each ordered one drink and left. The drinks were okay, nothing special.

The atmosphere was cool overall, but the bartender and the general condition didn't give us a great impression and we probably won't be back any time soon.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David Warren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpzbxejxb77AycSwIq2yyCvs5ZX948kNeWwzoKRDKganWjlA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Stopped here with a group of seven while on vacation. Based on the pictures we found, we we're looking forward to the visit. We weren't aware of the $5.00 cover, but decided to pay it and check the place out. Boy were we disappointed! First thing we noticed was how filthy the place was! So very dirty! No way would we order anything to eat or drink from there. The place was run down, dumpy and just so very disappointing! One of the women in our group went to the restroom and she said there was dried up vomit all over the bathroom. Seriously didn't touch anything, sit anywhere or order anything. One quick walk around the place and we were out!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Peter Grant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMe_nydTFmMhepR42aS4dgo9-Bji6iep1yQ4k1J_y6EabVnzw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I don‚Äôt give 1 star reviews often but I am actually offended at how this business is run and feel the need to inform people not to waste their time here.

My group was initially excited to come here due to a past reputation - iconic wrestling memorabilia and a Sabu mural caught my eye. However, it was all downhill from there.

To start, I have no issue with the staff. The employee working there did just fine. Overpriced drinks (a $15 rum and coke???) and a tiny arcade where $20 only gets you around 30 minutes of play essentially ruined the excited vibe my group had coming here. We all left feeling like we wished we‚Äôd gone elsewhere.

The claw machines were legitimately rigged (claws wouldn‚Äôt even close after multiple attempts) and the bowling wasn‚Äôt working despite being a ridiculous $20/person for 1 hour. There are posters up showing they‚Äôre sponsored by an NFT (in 2025 no less) so clearly they‚Äôre desperate.

This is a tourist trap and a key business to look at if you‚Äôre researching the quick decline of Vegas and locals being priced out.   Avoid avoid avoid.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrExCzUQBZ4_jRR5wxYcGUl6M6DIkVZZ9wKp6qi94DTAVflZh8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Terrible drinks for $20 üò© had to wait for workers to stop talking so I could order my drink and this place is ancient.... Air hockey table was a blast..... definitely not worth it though","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCFXla4rWZfSDPh1l5hDR_X&fid=0x0:0x9bd8573a1819b48a"],"When":"2025-9-16"},{"Name":"Juan Gonzalez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4GoYThNv5wZ68edmUBVHPnkYfRqW2G1JMSLTOd9tKMvLY81AloA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"$20 cocktails served on a paper cup. Unacceptable. $30 of gaming time is about 25 minutes or so. The bartender was super nice and friendly, but this place simply ain't it. I know gamer bars are dark but I legitimately didn't see anything. I almost tripped on the steps going to the bathroom. Complete tourist trap.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mud Entoyeen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1jWe89ULP6BjkycHSlF3_dAal934zDhlfno6SDghXPztChL4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The atmosphere is basically the only thing going for this place currently.

I've been here twice and my experience was the same both times. Very expensive watered down drinks, staff will turn your music off if they don't like it (doesn't matter if you paid for it to play), and a nice but ultimately empty feeling atmosphere.

The games are certainly the best thing about this bar, but there is a price on just about everything. There's a $5 cover charge per person to get in, most games require money to play, and along with each drink being $15-$20 no matter what's in it, the bill WILL rack up very fast. Be prepared to spend over $50 on just drinks alone.

Specialty drinks tasted great, but they were $20 no matter what was in them. It doesn't really seem to make sense for a drink with 8 different alcohols in it to cost the same as a drink with 3. I ordered a vodka cranberry hoping for a cheaper drink, and it was $15 and HEAVILY watered down. The drinks are also given in flimsy and small plastic cups. It was not a very great experience to drink here.

The first time I went I was ignored by the bar staff for a solid 10-15 minutes waiting to ask a question about bowling as the staff continuously walked passed. I gave up on asking my question.

Unfortunately, I don't think I will be coming here again. Even told my friends not to come here when they visit Vegas. I really wish I could like this bar, especially because of the ~special claw machine~ but I don't think I can.","Images":null,"When":""}]
