[{"Name":"AHMED SHAH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYmbVFjbvfBf2mZHOz_HpZ2VC2E3hLBRZyUH6bqn96XwPQQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vue Bar: Rooftop setting with Fremont Street views, casual atmosphere, affordable drinks, friendly staff, great for people-watching, but limited seating and basic menu.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"P C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHr7oeiKODVSRr3yeNZVE9JRk98KYnMnTy166X1oaEn2VFSUHyDA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
@The D
üìç301 E Freemont St. LV,NV
VUE bar is üëçüëç with exceptional bartenders making amazing cocktails üçª while providing top-tierü•á service all shifts.üïë It has an escalator‚è´Ô∏è directly from the Freemont St. Experience with a VUEü§£ of the action below. ‚úÖÔ∏è it out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDRtKLZMQ&fid=0x0:0x191653a85c85e665"],"When":"2023-4-18"},{"Name":"James Mccorkle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHbJy7wgbI4Qm_etk1GLC1MCmGxzR4C2hNXsZH1bNyObAEM3G-FA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice place to hang out and have a drink, people watch, and take in the canopy video screen.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J Dog","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYBUkQL4xmz_eNXRrMn28t88bVrJLpqAhZfK4DOVUf6zkYOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jason at the Vue Bar is the man! He's been taking great care of me for years. However he refuses to watch the Mike Judge movies I've recommended even though I've offered to pay him to do so, but that's more of a personal choice than a complaint I suppose.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMCQ2J_L-gE&fid=0x0:0x191653a85c85e665"],"When":"2025-3-1"},{"Name":"Tyler Stunja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVz1OK3QgQ58q0IfyN80qrkL2uApDj02QcYvS_3M3U6VFKXDQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Absolute terrible time at vue bar. we had been there for over an hour, then a worker came up to us and asked us to leave for absolutely zero reason. the man tried to say we had did something wrong yet we were there for over an hour keeping to ourselves. a company my friend works for had this set up with them for a bar crawl, and he was in full drag which had been no issue the whole time. the homophobia is real and a complete joke. you chose to be homophobic in one of the gayest cities in this world. DO BETTER","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"JJMRA 77777","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxKJ9OmtUsIO9luV9hNzKLAzwXpcMXqFyU1mOHh962VJCuXSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I will not recommend this place they don't know PUERTO RICO is part of the USA I ask 1 employees and 2 security the same question and the said no we don't know about Puerto Rican funny how people know about LGBTQ but not Puerto Rican this comment I find is from Facebook This happened to me in Vegas. Many bars wouldn‚Äôt serve me if I didn‚Äôt present a passport because my PR Id was foreign for them. And its not just that. Its the attitude that makes me feel like ‚Äúthis is not just ignorance, it‚Äôs disgust‚Äù","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Orit Sarah Cohen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9jSs_TDkQCAAQTSnMa5MnnhMB-Il74U6R18kD-XnxFNtiMF8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Huge thank you to RAPHA for being so kind, so entertaining and patient with the crazies too !
Makes amazing drinks and juggling genius !
Thanks for giving us a great time !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICL1eqWswE&fid=0x0:0x191653a85c85e665"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Sarah Boyce","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUn_NubbpnZpZAQ0VA6P8X5faKDHMh7--P5n50usE4jbUG1hrhsbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is in the D casino, on the second floor to the left of the escalators as you come upstairs.

So, the view... Yes, there is a view of Freemont Street if you walk out onto the balcony, which doesn't have tables or anything. It's a place to congregate and has some fun views, but it would be more fun of there were places to sit out there.

You need to get your own drink before walking out, and you don't have much of a Vue from inside because of the black film they put on the windows. So "Vue Bar" feels a bit deceptive.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column5: 128 Fremont St #2, Las Vegas, NV 89101
column18: Modern rotating bar featuring New American fare & views of the Fremont Street Experience stage.

column32:
[{"Name":"Jesse Peterson (J.P.)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNgvk9jeXtqL4kSOf-5rGQScIT717d7D0OFvNmRsJozrGxCsXHoA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty cool place on Fremont Street! We sat out on the balcony, there is a tutoring minimum to sit right on the chairs overlooking Fremont Street. But that's no big deal.

Ordered the delicious hamburger. Had gooey cheese on it. Bacon and just delicious. It came out hot. The fries were delicious.

I also had a beer and their signature old fashioned. Everything was delicious. It's upstairs at binion's. The rotating bar is pretty cool. We didn't sit there but it looked neat.

Definitely try it out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAxv_5XipHaWEAPre99Eg1q&fid=0x0:0x4ef6f34cd4864e05"],"When":"2026-2-15"},{"Name":"Ysmael Breton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuGUgsl1cLEbx2s9SXreF7bwunl1Y4pVT4VGUhMcnGFw1Aq7WlhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here to have lunch while hanging out on freemont and had a good time, we had some good drinks. Me and my wife shared the tenders. And we also had wings and fries. The service was good and friendly. Would love to come back and try more dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCXgeM0t7-PYIEPMihOGD77&fid=0x0:0x4ef6f34cd4864e05"],"When":"2025-11-9"},{"Name":"Reva Nelson (IdahoJane)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0JZTrD0zdWBhIT3TQN-a6pMIJgg6ZMQZDocwQJGtP00cTVgv4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fremont street eating at its best. If you are lucky, you get a balcony seat for unlimited people watching. Our food was great, from pizza to nachos. Lots of sports tvs for on to watch the big game on too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDu6lsmIueZGmWLXFE79do_&fid=0x0:0x4ef6f34cd4864e05"],"When":"2026-1-13"},{"Name":"William Gray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVjORnaS76VvXL8fSHc_syhtx7XQP7xesVf2uvgVNteSiOCbkk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're coming down to Fremont Street you have to check out the rotating bar above Binions. Great views of Fremont Street and the food is great. Harry is slinging drinks like the consummate professional that he is. Don't miss out on this experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB4vQXGhwriRXWJ1kK6_WLX&fid=0x0:0x4ef6f34cd4864e05"],"When":"2025-11-27"},{"Name":"Tasha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2TWehZpbWVpO0orkaxN32AOfOyrQruGFoZDqDC3rouimKLosb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Try the ceviche from the appetizer menu. It was really good and we make it at home all the time. They have a full service restaurant and a rotating bar that overlooks Fremont Street. The rotation is slow enough to not cause any motion sickness.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB9CabzzftDpqk8A0H7BWD4&fid=0x0:0x4ef6f34cd4864e05"],"When":"2025-11-11"},{"Name":"Philipp Schiller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8GjDfGkMZnagr8F6OMZc9a0tLSkSfjQ2yw2KYYWZGSMe8xC5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was absolutely outstanding! The live music created such a great vibe, and watching the football game there made the experience even better. Definitely a place I‚Äôd recommend to anyone looking for great food and atmosphere!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhATDE-nAw9gPNR7ovXXhOfg&fid=0x0:0x4ef6f34cd4864e05"],"When":"2025-9-15"},{"Name":"Diane Nelson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbNhtmG3O3gMEupBId82OQyDJydw7jXeRrVRSA7KWG9iJxrCxB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The BEST burger, thick, meaty and juicy. Asked for it rare (most places won‚Äôt do it, but this was quality local beef). And it was perfect. Highly recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAI1enYvWBZuIawTLfT1xHm&fid=0x0:0x4ef6f34cd4864e05"],"When":"2026-1-14"},{"Name":"Addie Reed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLfjHDeoyJD4JY2k-3Bzo-cEbK4WRbfKRO78Rr7KYKBN_k8nQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here at the last minute to watch the Super Bowl (go Seahawks!) and was greeted by a kind hostess who checked with her manager to see if they could make arrangements for 4 people which they were luckily able to do. We were served by SLAV who was probably one of the best servers I have had the pleasure of knowing. He was attentive, kind, mindful, accommodating, and on top of things. All staff were super kind and created a lively ambience, which added to the experience. Food was also delicious, which is always a perk. Would 100% recommend!!! Thanks SLAV!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Diana Apolinar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4HzYZtXekdWoyoU0ivO-RTgn2fwt4At1N5qPjR3YYPGu-fIU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The drinks here are amazing! Vegas pricing. Beautiful and handsome bartenders! There is a lot to choose from. I love the frozen options. All drinks are well garnish. I definitely recommend if you are on Fremont.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDb8kQz8FEr-xJNYrmiykgE&fid=0x0:0xf5873cc0b5bf47dd"],"When":"2025-10-7"},{"Name":"Wes Zygmont","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMnPBJ4GBwvTWC02jpJysdvmi9eawPVsVwRkAl0yzOjoIa27Ge=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best spot to hang out on Fremont! You are between two of the stages while front and center to the action only Fremont provides... They pour killer drinks and provide friendly service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAkvKwwK5DZx7cqtJiHB2eg&fid=0x0:0xf5873cc0b5bf47dd"],"When":"2025-6-17"},{"Name":"Morgan Colyer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXX5p0-mlcK1JGBfiOfkRvyKh2vfV4gFtoI0DIXIQJcIEFoJyX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a nice store inside Circa Casino and Hotel. They have what you need. They have Circa gear. Hats shirts shorts. They have swimwear. Evening gowns for any occasion. Cups glasses name brand clothing. They also have essentials like medicine cigarettes soda, and snacks. Check them out. I‚Äôm sure you‚Äôll find something in there. You can use your comps as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDRoqzpCg&fid=0x0:0xf5873cc0b5bf47dd"],"When":"2023-4-21"},{"Name":"R O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLI8SuWzJW0nUjh3NO2XK-dMC6ViHLN8gDkvYAeIIXt480ImMaJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Do NOT buy one of the alcohol slushies from the street bar on Fremont. They are 5%, two drinks with double shots is $80. You'll end up with mild diabetes and achieve no buzz. This is one of the worst rip offs on Freemont.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Susana Fernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1_i2QvdQi_iPPnXiC6EO_psDVBafNNu9SpRwgxGaSAWJEKDztfg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I want to give a thumbs up to an amazing bartender named ‚ÄúTaurus‚Äù.
He served me a delicious drink on the bar at the second floor around 6pm.

He is a flair bartender üî•üî•üî• and put up a show for me and the other guests. He is very talented, it was spectacular everything he did with the bottles, glasses and mixers. If you want to see acrobatics behind the bar, look for Taurus at the second floor‚Äôs bar. Circa is a very beautiful new casino, perfect place to watch sports,

Thank you Circa and Taurus for a great experience , I‚Äôll be coming back ‚ô•Ô∏è,

Susana
(Costa Rica)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID-77jK4QE&fid=0x0:0xf5873cc0b5bf47dd"],"When":"2022-12-13"},{"Name":"Rebecca Argueta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqujG2pBAH6nvvoFD2IXkr2k5aHoG7a9I3bkyc96RE4wfsarKPmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"While walking on Freemont and enjoying the concerts we stopped here to grab a round. We paid about $40, expensive for two drinks, but the size of the cups was huge!! Coming from NY, prices at bars don't scare me, but the size of these drinks was well worth the money. Plus the bartenders were extremely nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICl19S9NQ&fid=0x0:0xf5873cc0b5bf47dd"],"When":"2023-11-28"},{"Name":"byron stephenson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8hKmn_ZOosEkv8GMdGnx61BU4pX0AcDpP9QATVxkRYI7yvK9GpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place. Weird people walking around.  But it's a good place to grab a drink on a hot day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDz54j5aw&fid=0x0:0xf5873cc0b5bf47dd"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Fab TV","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXU7enbbO_hxK0opWID8rw_19KnACd8SEzn1zb6l0nluEurn0HL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Circa Las Vegas store called ‚ÄúFuel‚Äù has all your Circa hotel brand jackets T-shirts cups anything Circa Las Vegas related and it‚Äôs priced right.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICys6nD_QE&fid=0x0:0xf5873cc0b5bf47dd"],"When":"2021-2-12"}]

column5: 129 Fremont St, Las Vegas, NV 89101
column18: Creative cocktails, live bands, comfy seating & blackjack on the casino floor of the Golden Nugget.

column32: [{"Name":"Elayna Brooke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsF_lGeBkFMsTdCXDunoE8TvDW9G8dDtgMZSAXShpt0Zma28Gs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome bar with live music that overlooks Fremont street and one of the stages. The bartenders are very attentive.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"AHMED SHAH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYmbVFjbvfBf2mZHOz_HpZ2VC2E3hLBRZyUH6bqn96XwPQQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Rush Lounge: Stylish Golden Nugget bar, live music, lively crowd, good cocktails, attentive service, comfortable seating, but can get loud on weekends.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eko mulyono","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXl7EPp-Mc-ttuX555YdIwqp6dUM_qHVcGgTgg5I_qfrVwH1hU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect spot for a nice evening out. Everything felt just right.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steve Bintley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUz91tVXj2WT6I7ulfH4Gp5APOIk3cPC3KNiD2RZ0AT-lIBXQFCDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"With the live band this was certainly a buzzing place to be and full of atmosphere. Service was spot on from the bar staff and with a number of gambling tables next to the bar it‚Äôs easy to settle down for a number of hours here. Prices were alright given the location and service was fast, and although fairly small the tables available for groups were decent. We had a great evening here and I‚Äôd recommend popping in one night if you can.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zen Arenz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXY-A6gKU-u91NWa9AhgoiIcJc-w1LFJ0sPCuAWduEHYz2YLyxjoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Micheal was an amazing bartender. He's greeted my mom and I as we sat down and was super friendly right off that bat. I ask for an old fashioned  and it was better than a lot of old fashions I've had in old las vegas. Micheal gave us amazing service while keep a smile. Thank you for making sure my mom and I had a great time!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tyler Faucet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJayvGUgl-PADmfFiPQZtc9Rs7-FSSBKsqDlndOTzBEnLrGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"the best  music  venue  on  Fremont","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wendy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-g151E7eQrj32CG07KrFJcpgyv-wUb7LMaEKlET1S7z6KNw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I highly suggest going to see Michael, The bartender at the Rush Lounge in Golden Nugget.  His service is impeccable! By far one the best service and attention I‚Äôve received on Fremont Street!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lloyd Morris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViAs1KqqhrG4BZX2IvfKj6fMc9WjF6KNuIOz8NAnw7A4nI3Al0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love the lounge and usually enjoy Rock this town who played last night.  We're a black couple and enjoy RnB, but also like some\nrock and top 40.  Was not feeling the set last night which was mostly country.  Do like Rock this Town however.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32: [{"Name":"Smevin Bravis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvpJlzV3GNMZH5NpUNJ0uIbLLnnccv9_zEJaH5NHyWj64_3kyE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This noticeably long bar (not just a clever name) is the perfect refuge from the hurlyburly of Fremont. There are a lot of seats and only a few bartenders so it can take a moment to be served sometimes, but the peeps back there are pretty quick - some even put on a flair show! Just the right amount of bright, flashy, and noisy so that it can still be kinda chill.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICkzpWW0gE\u0026fid=0x0:0x90cec618f7463c20"],"When":"2018-7-12"},{"Name":"P C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHr7oeiKODVSRr3yeNZVE9JRk98KYnMnTy166X1oaEn2VFSUHyDA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"‚úÖÔ∏èLongBar Rocks üé∂literally, great service too! üëçüëç Our go to on Freemont.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDRxMCn2gE\u0026fid=0x0:0x90cec618f7463c20"],"When":"2023-4-18"},{"Name":"Jack Haynes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXTgrajw6SN_Fvh9KcmAEdty1VfidPUtnMv_WYC4qSM_AmosSh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a great time here, made by Jake who was amazing at recommending and making cocktails and generally giving us advice and good conversation. Would highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cathy D'Anna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1OalUZbXuXGu9RwaYnuP1ZMxRGg9_eCwuFpQCifKwbnULhrRB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love this bar! Marco and Antuan are the Best. Bartenders. Ever. They always show genuine consideration and kindness for their customers.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike's Nomadic Travels","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwE21YmUMLdJDw_I09qLjam2FGMlEcqnW_YKjf6s46GLg7-OgS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Way üòé possibly longest bar in Las Vegas. Over 12 large tv's!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICUxqj7Vw\u0026fid=0x0:0x90cec618f7463c20"],"When":"2019-6-28"},{"Name":"A Samgo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTFSs6kD11UE6TIFhUv-Iw0dTFoXlbq82u1Ap3JIauTEylzOk6wQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always a must stop for the best bloody mary. column32:
[{"Name":"Eric Cox","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQnQz9ic6B98Ywxu5ddLxIbQOLJqOZWvIY7vlBlglfcGPvdExT3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

Audio Bar is a hidden gem in the Las Vegas Arts District! From the moment you walk in, you‚Äôre greeted with friendly, welcoming service that makes you feel right at home. The vibe is unbeatable! Great music, creative decor, and colorful wall murals make the whole place feel alive.

The food is just as impressive as the atmosphere. Their happy hour specials are fantastic! Especially the $10 two-topping pizza, which is both delicious and a steal for the quality. The brunch options are amazing too, with generous portions and fresh flavors that make it worth coming back for. I also love that they offer regular $4 pizza slices and great drink specials all week long, making it perfect for casual get-togethers or a relaxed night out.

Whether you‚Äôre stopping by for brunch, happy hour, or a late-night bite, Audio Bar delivers every time. The combination of great food, awesome ambiance, and laid-back yet lively energy makes this spot one of the best dining locations in the Arts District. Everything about Audio Bar truly hits the right note!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBMVcRMd7qnp6VuUTPKPGZI&fid=0x0:0xac3c1ac26964f45f"],"When":"2025-10-17"},{"Name":"liquor lineup","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUX-mONK4k2wj2Lios2gra1ADP-k2jeHDaHK5tvqnTVgZN8eKjG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Last night at Audio Bar was pure downtown magic. Smooth pours, sharp energy, indoor outdoor flow, and a room that knows how to host a proper night out. Our Whiskey Lineup Club called it the best experience yet, and they‚Äôre not wrong. If you‚Äôre local, visiting Vegas, or throwing an event, this place plays it cool and delivers big.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD5iQmxdWUetE-YKQxS2RGG&fid=0x0:0xac3c1ac26964f45f"],"When":"2026-2-6"},{"Name":"Charles Too","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXz5Ouc_lc9H4gBLPbWvutiajcm9RU6unz7HGFj2ggZuYYMmk5scQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great vibes at the Audio Bar. It was my first time there and I immediately felt welcomed and comfortable. The service was excellent, and the music was on point. The highlight of the evening was the PIZZA!  The Pho Pizza was just DELICIOUS!!!  Definitely a place I‚Äôd come back to.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDoDQygjiLyDVUv1Jm85EhG&fid=0x0:0xac3c1ac26964f45f"],"When":"2026-1-10"},{"Name":"Ronnie Long","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEyLmuIYm4lv_CnFLPu75ocsG25OyTo19IorZqF5ZlGi5XhrEGEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome little bar here in the Arts District. This place is sort of tucked away surrounded by all these little gems. I've seen this during First Friday, and it was always booming but I finally got a chance to see it on a regular operating time and it was still a popping spot. I personally was getting roasted by my comedy crew and the owner was more than happy to accommodate even while they were having their Bachata night. We did our stuff on the patio and it was perfect. The staff is great, I actually left some of my gear here and they made sure to hold on to it. I had some pizza, and it was delicious, I forgot to even take pictures. I'm definitely coming back and checking out more of their events.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBX4oCF5a6Rzuw3i1Gxkf_O&fid=0x0:0xac3c1ac26964f45f"],"When":"2025-7-28"},{"Name":"Lottie Grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXR1QOQ3p_C2eJZqj_VyVhozLZTDfvz88A6msC6ZYOe9CWbbdDcrw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Seating in and outside
Waitresses are Beautiful w/cute outfits and Great Service
Food is Wonderful!!!
Handsome Chef Maxwell
We are Differently coming back !!!
The Music is mixed well
Accommodating for Everyone
If you are in the area  Pop Up
Outside activities for little ones and even pets are Welcome.

Love it Thanks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhB37usVaquI_ErtYyWsd7bT&fid=0x0:0xac3c1ac26964f45f"],"When":"2026-1-27"},{"Name":"Kealey Kiser","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlLr6bLhdGxso1iR9mM3I18lpuMS4J7eNj-AFSUJSYfz4nmOUa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We are Vegas locals and we were walking in the arts district looking for somewhere to eat. We stopped at audio bar and it is such a cool place. They have a live dj, outdoor seating, cool lighting inside, and a really nice staff. Everyone seemed super welcoming and chill. The bartender was extremely charismatic and attentive. I‚Äôd recommend this to my friends especially people who are into edm.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCh69PoVoNPlY02tgF_H-Qg&fid=0x0:0xac3c1ac26964f45f"],"When":"2025-10-18"},{"Name":"Kelli Karlsen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmhCj-iiEWZFjI62Caq3k_6AmmJBvU4cYCYK4-cu0eNqWB5I1SGA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My go-to spot in Vegas for consistently great music, even better vibes, and the most amazing people.

The food and cocktails never miss, and the whole experience truly reflects the culture and community that make Las Vegas so special.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA2QMRkjUDbxBlC8TgnFCMd&fid=0x0:0xac3c1ac26964f45f"],"When":"2025-9-1"},{"Name":"Michal Master The Mind Hypnotherapy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1GHqSBsBbeL-i2aCW758aMxEQk7sJE7PotkVMsI5ocgpQ7nU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shout out to Vincent Do the thoughtful owner of Audio Bar LV .

He designed this special space with love, creativity and precise consideration for us Vegas locals. A true gift to the community.

Was blessed to spend and share my Libra birthday there with many friends, great music and excellent vibes.

Thank you to Cara Monday and Valerie Melotti  for setting up the entire evening!

And our awesome DJs:
- Cara Monday
- Omar Contreras
- @Veedub
- Camilo Cordoba
- Jay Seabrook (Zxeu)

Grateful for another trip around the sun! And the myriad blessings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBcfDN4ax3xnlQOaJZiph_n&fid=0x0:0xac3c1ac26964f45f"],"When":"2025-10-18"}]

column32: [{"Name":"Darya Shestakova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnzi3YfPqisBmdnMaXXCRJ5Pa9M-ZJGYaFC2uHr3CyXgiH0h-yWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing cocktails! To me, one of the best cocktail bars on Fremont. Really surprised by the quality üëå","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCr7jHrk8Y7_NGi9cU_5cIV\u0026fid=0x0:0xc9696544aac35b18"],"When":"2025-12-4"},{"Name":"Brad Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmqN8uVmkqqKOAD8wf5hexTMUH7NYyB3Wu_vz8aTGa53VA1BPC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a terrific bar inside Circa. The bartenders really know their business, and mix quality cocktails. They are super friendly. The vibe is really high energy, due to the busy casino adjacent to the bar. The drinks are strong, and a little pricey,  but even the rail liquor is top quality. Ask the bartender to surprise you when they mix something.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID73dbeUQ\u0026fid=0x0:0xc9696544aac35b18"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Jill DeCandio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdMiDOL3PWigHrH_Mkv9WK8vMrsZP1MX2GmCFUxN4ZlVD_Q-1dFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great find!  We went to Fremont Street looking for places new to us to enjoy cocktails and came upon Vegas Vickie‚Äôs, a cocktail lounge in the Circa Hotel.  First, the hotel was very nice and impressive looking in the lobby area.  Vegas Vickie‚Äôs cocktail Lounge is right by the entrance; you can‚Äôt miss it with the huge neon sign of Vegas Vickie prominently displayed. We were quickly seated and the chairs were large, plush and comfortable.  Our server was friendly and knowledgeable about the drink menu.  The drinks were high end in flavor and presentation‚Ä¶.some of the best we had in our weeks stay including those we had at high end fine dining restaurants on the Strip.   Definitely recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICW6enRRw\u0026fid=0x0:0xc9696544aac35b18"],"When":"2022-3-1"},{"Name":"Ben Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVRanzrLEVlDJALuXs27Aasi3fpJ_MsUvs5sqABQV9oIuZP4woTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The neon sign is just amazing. Note that you need to scan id to enter this casino.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDNN52aHpwfS8r1Wh2B6Fal\u0026fid=0x0:0xc9696544aac35b18"],"When":"2026-2-3"},{"Name":"Anna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYN2CEx7WXt6G6YFWOb4Z_PGE6jsDzhz5AYqClpUoqV2puZ9U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favorite spots located in the Circa Casino, watched over by the classic Vegas Vickie neon sign! The cocktails are delicious and the chairs are comfy. Its a great place to people watch the casino floor or take a break from gambling. Our bartender was friendly and was able to help make the decisions from the cocktail menu. I hear their menu changes by season, so will have to come back to try the other options. Prices of the cocktails are in line with other bars and restaurants in the area.\n\nDefinitely will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDBxs6ZeA\u0026fid=0x0:0xc9696544aac35b18"],"When":"2023-1-18"},{"Name":"MO Daddy Dollars","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEkQk1RK60HEpArVtBGer344Mo_xrH9tXZuV564rEifMGCz14j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vegas Vickie is a bar with lounge next to the valet entrance and hotel registration in the Circa Hotel. We stopped here because we were early for a dinner reservation at Barry's, and a couple cocktails seemed like a great idea. I had the Smokin Old Fasioned which came with a great presentation. My wife went Nobody Puts Rum In The Corner which is a Tiki style drink. Both cocktails had great taste. The bartender was really friendly, and the bar/lounge seems like a great place to meet up and conversate over some cocktails. I loved how the Circa used the vintage neon Vegas Vickie sign from the old freemont street. Looking forward to going back and trying some more cocktails.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID7o6OIKw\u0026fid=0x0:0xc9696544aac35b18"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Rigor the Reaper","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJj7Mk58DQOGCTEOuPwwP0VJRxgwAQIg1LCg2y7cpCcDAbkIX8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for a cocktail... would come back when back in town.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAo2slpG9ygpq9pHT86_bWQ\u0026fid=0x0:0xc9696544aac35b18"],"When":"2025-11-13"},{"Name":"Jared Reddington","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAoyvmsxBVcbDv6w4-20NG8UY0cu3MMuEuP2TPiO3LQAHYdoGA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had two cocktails here both were delicious, fun bar within the circa hotel.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEM7u2eLH3fHStgE\u0026fid=0x0:0xc9696544aac35b18"],"When":"2025-5-13"}]

column31: [{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true}]}]
column32:
[{"Name":"Jatziri Rod","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVELgvEdotOVQwnq7Hr_xwahozR55y83Ujx_RggaC4Pq8W8cSQ0tg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My group and I had an incredible time riding the Vegas Pub Crawler! Our guide was exceptionally accommodating and patient, ensuring we all had a great experience. He shared interesting facts about the bars we visited, which added an educational twist to the fun night out.

One of the highlights was the ride‚Äôs Bluetooth connectivity, allowing us to play our favorite music and enhance the party atmosphere. To top it off, our guide surprised us with a mystery drink at one of the bars, which was a delightful touch!

Overall, it was an unforgettable evening, and we‚Äôre already planning to book another ride in the future. Highly recommend the Vegas Pub Crawler for a unique and entertaining night out in Vegas!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tee Mixon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBPFYSpy4XayoqzHEzuZ8N9VjxqIiBDmt9mgxxcOjc5H-ivQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"THE WORST EXPERIENCE EVER, ALMOST ROBBED!!! Im going to try to keep this short and straight to the point because I can write a whole novel on how bad of an experience this was, John. Our driver was horrible. He didn‚Äôt tell us nothing about any historical bars. He didn‚Äôt even speak to us. He collected our money and that was it. The bars that he took us to was some biker bar that was pretty much empty and some other bar that had bad pineapple juice for our drink, and we were the only ones in there, we were driving down empty street back alleys and he took us to the most ghetto bar ever. We were blocked in by gangsters and almost robbed. The $500 we paid WAS NOT WORTH IT!! There was one speaker in the front of the trolley held up by zip ties we couldn‚Äôt hear the music sitting in the back of the trolley. DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Benjamin Alberry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyt9PK2jmzSPTQ5nyK12ddN9Uog-qHJXt3INH-j0SyNu3VWdjeuA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I booked a tour for my fianc√© and I for her birthday. We showed up at 8:30 like they asked us to. The rest of the group we were supposed to ride with showed up late at 9:15 and then complained because they said they ordered a private peddle bike. We were asked to get off this one and wait for another one to come get us in 15 minutes. It was almost an hour before someone showed up and we then asked for a refund and never got to go on the peddle bike. It was a very disappointing experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTxwIqTb4paGSq51PNQKCZ-ME6h1-cqsIYJeS6Q5L112Wn7I5kaA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Booked this as part of our son's 21st birthday. We had so much fun. John our driver told us about each bar before we went in and made the experience that much more enjoyable. I highly recommend thos company. The were early amd started our party early because we were there and ready. Highly recommend","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Gonzales","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVH26ZSixuOu2k7y8one7ePYoh_dsa5tR7GmyOlwkOS-njsn2I7tA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have taken a tour multiple times and each one was super enjoyable. The tour has a good selection of bar stops, which collectively creates a myriad of memories, as each place is unique. And at the same time you get to experience DTLV as a whole. It's like a mini-parade as you pass through the streets of Fremont in Fabulous Downtown Las Vegas. The bike host was friendly and very engaging. Even asking us what kind of music we wanted on our trek. Depending on the bar, there is a special specific for the bike riders which is a nice VIP touch. I would recommend riding this to all my friends.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mark Colvard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfwp4GV945sjKZwUap0eqJqctlKltYMPAgnyeInB1UIbur0Pw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Flew all the way out there from California to enjoy this experience. For starters they came late. Said the had to get a bigger bike. 20 minutes later they came back only to tell us that they could not fix the bike. There were 18 of us with one as far away as Michigan.
After minutes of prodding, the only resolution the owner had was to offer each of us a (get this, a $4.00 drink). This was supposed to be a special birthday gift, but only turned out to be a disaster!
Save your dough and spend it on one of the many other activities you can do in Vegas.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Patricia Lattimore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfsmukeukzh6EbFFCm3EIjfxDFFC8oRQe4Yd-DilVk2_5mbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Scheduled a bike ride a month in advance there were 15 of us  some from Cal, Detroit, Chicago.  We were scheduled for 6pm bike ride. To be told bike was being repaired at 6:15 waited another 30 minutes to be told the bike was broken could not repaired and w would  have  to reschedule  owner sent a kid to deliver his message how disappointing it was for the birthday  girl who had waited for this day. To top it off he did not offer any thing for the inconvenience.  Not a business man  I would not recommend  this activity to anyone.    Pat latt","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anika Payne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGXXZgovrTwZ-er7VBD3FjF8Cl7G4WxBC4qzBrE_1QQ23F3fc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We  had our company meeting in Vegas in July and did a pub crawl as a group activity one night. We had 14 people, which is the max the bike can hold. It was truly a blast. It's basically a pub crawl on wheels. We went to a few new bars I didn't even know existed and rode up and down the backstreets of downtown Vegas blaring music and ringing cowbells while people on the street rubbernecked at the sight. Totally unique and just plain fun. Perfect way to end our week of meetings and a terrific bonding excursion. We have rounded up some friends and already booked another round of this in a a few weeks.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Tom Richards","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0iIBF7tWlDVyDXR1hyUv2ahtPkoDKA3ERdHt0ItUxZB2MHtRPbA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Video Poker there is so fun. I‚Äôve won big each time I‚Äôve visited and sat and played. Cocktails are delicious and the bartenders are cool. Weird at times but cool. Such a huge bar, there‚Äôs always a spot available and all those screens you‚Äôd never miss a thing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICJ2of0Vg&fid=0x0:0x6e358866252ee842"],"When":"2023-6-25"},{"Name":"Wes Zygmont","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMnPBJ4GBwvTWC02jpJysdvmi9eawPVsVwRkAl0yzOjoIa27Ge=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the indoor version of the Circa Bar. It's located right inside the Circa Resort off Fremont. For the sports enthusiasts, this is the spot! Grab a round of drinks and head to watch the games at the sports book or sit down and gamble with tons  of TV's to watch. Both offer a different but awesome experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDNpx3c_4Lif-thbMWFotxI&fid=0x0:0x6e358866252ee842"],"When":"2025-6-17"},{"Name":"Darya Shestakova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnzi3YfPqisBmdnMaXXCRJ5Pa9M-ZJGYaFC2uHr3CyXgiH0h-yWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"That`s a cool bar with kind of loose slots. I won there twice.
Service is always quick, drinks are good. Is it friendly? Well, it depends on which bartender is working. Some of them are pretty cool, others not talking much. Which is understandable. I work with people daily, and sometimes I get tired of them.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Richard C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoDKRNnx0EteZRSzmmhKYzhul4YQ3EOfbV8c_uHUW9AIVeAmt0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Sports Bar inside Circa Casino, Fremont Street Las Vegas. If your playing on the video machine at the Bar, free drinks. Fantastic bar","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC1oIqY3QE&fid=0x0:0x6e358866252ee842"],"When":"2023-12-20"},{"Name":"Dave Harlan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPT8hVX_C4lJxp9rd1sA6Vm27f43KrVLwWWWIG2Fy90n5pEpBp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Really disappointing.  It is a very long bar with TVs, gaming, and seemingly only one bartender who will get your drink to you sometime in the hour after you sit down.

I thought it was a gimmicky waste of time. You cygnet far better, faster service with lower prices and better selection elsewhere on Fremont.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC1tqWRwwE&fid=0x0:0x6e358866252ee842"],"When":"2023-12-29"},{"Name":"Kayla Hampton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViBljTtoaLX6o1VsDK66a6YgEnzZdr-Us9ghJB8PQRorFMPhwx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Staying at the Circa and got drink coupons from the front desk . Went to the mega bar, and CHARLES the bartender was completely rude to us‚Ä¶. horrrrrrible service and suddenly changed his vibe when we asked to talk to the manager. LuckilyJustin and Skye are the best bartenders here- they deserve a raise! Made our visit so much better. Bartending isn‚Äôt for Charles‚Ä¶","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kristin Manion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmNW1p_kzAjuSMM2bw5vdd1b-p6wg126JbphFDv1W8CatDBg43=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Charles the bartender at the mega bar in the circa casino is very rude. I tried to use a free drink coupon the front desk gave me at checkin and he treated me and my friends horribly. The other bartender Skye stepped in and made our experience way better- Charles, clearly hates his job.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Claudia Mercado","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe0E4BQHeGJ9xr7dPNKCce3b5L_T2QKyqppGpyPpGb73lJ9TTN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the coolest bars in Las Vegas! Service was impeccable. Alfred was the best bartender to ever serve me. He made us feel welcomed and had great conversation with my husband and I. Prices are reasonable and drinks are fantastic. I will definitely return. Thank you Alfred üññüèª","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIC2nquQIg&fid=0x0:0x6e358866252ee842"],"When":"2022-4-21"}]

column32: [{"Name":"Yarleny Roa-dugan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrGsRifvc_NB4KAwvxeBG9Lg2rRmwoEez3zhciQqYSaZa2XM6gNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a must try bar, the drinks are delicious, they play Latin music that makes you want to dance, and the service is good. But make sure you eat before you arrive because they don't have food. They have chips and salsa, but the chips tasted stale to us, when we told the bartender, they said, \"That's how it tastes, it's not old\" üôÅ So we finished our drinks and went accros the street to eat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICJvu3njQE\u0026fid=0x0:0x702027e10061bf3c"],"When":"2023-6-28"},{"Name":"Kastle Dynamics","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfGX-iUQj6vdHsNugSPCMeRYbuYXWtHgEgGLMwfwxSPp3whFo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Sadly was very dissapointed to my visit at Lucky Day. Brought a group of 6 people here for my friends birthday, cover was $20 a head, drinks were watered down cocktails that were around $17 each, smoking wasn‚Äôt allowed on their outdoor patio which is literally on the street. Overall the only positives about the bar was the lighting and decor was cool and the DJ knew what he was doing. Otherwise I wont ever go back or bring friends to Lucky Day, as a Vegas local I felt absolutley scalped by the prices they hit us with.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jill DeCandio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdMiDOL3PWigHrH_Mkv9WK8vMrsZP1MX2GmCFUxN4ZlVD_Q-1dFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great tequila selection and atmosphere near Fremont Street. Inviting decor and music brought us in.  Decorated with relics, artifacts, Knick knacks, and a ton of overhead patio lights this place looks like a fiesta!  Enjoyed chips and salsa and a round of drinks.  Prices were reasonable compared to a similar drink if ordered on the strip. We were there relatively early in the evening and there was a good crowd.  DJ played music.  Wait staff was attentive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICW6bGOOw\u0026fid=0x0:0x702027e10061bf3c"],"When":"2022-3-1"},{"Name":"G. Sanchez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhevE_oCyIGgPiNyuXTIoCJhJxKViQruFcH1vDV1_fdpmLfg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Viva Las Vegas! Lucky Day is a nice small bar, get there early before 11 pm or seating will be hard to get. A nice spot to grab some drinks and jam out or dance to a variety of music from their DJ which includes hip-hop, Spanish, house, and more. From the craft drinks they offer to the beer, it was all good! It has a Dia De Los Muertos vibe/theme. Good times good vibes staff was cool and security was too. Thanks, Lucky Day, see you all soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAKWLLB8rWLe_DieDLEwdVk\u0026fid=0x0:0x702027e10061bf3c"],"When":"2025-6-8"},{"Name":"Kendall Patrick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQp0oN7zLZG1XazlZ-_z-ms3a_lB4r9jfqCsd8po5PbchT3k7UUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute bar with great atmosphere. We arrived at 10pm on a Thursday so it wasn't too busy. Music was good. Tried some tequila we hadn't tried before.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"abi drouin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMOo8vv5IxGJluqy095jA2aP9cPXXWrKFxYTeYcwS5bYm9Y6I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Love the bar but not the cover fee!! $10 girls $20 men like it‚Äôs a club. Okay love the hustle but also I like your business and employees and vibes but I‚Äôll never return  just cause of the cover fee + expensive drinks (I‚Äôm okay w the expensive drinks but not both)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Evon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZf5z7H3rPpZv8DC-wwCaCbwW1fqIm2_RqAbncIo-xDjl77Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Saw this place on instagram looked super cute with all the lights and decorations inside, unfortunately when we got sat, we were at a table by the host stand so we didn't really get to be with all the pretty lights. I wish there was more decorations by our table too, but I assume we got sat there because we were a group of 4, and it looked like all 2 tops inside the bar area. Overall it was still a very fun experience and I would definitely like to come back and sit more inside. The music was good and our server was very nice and continuously checked on us. I wish they served food, or small bites, but the drinks were still good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICy-cujswE\u0026fid=0x0:0x702027e10061bf3c"],"When":"2021-2-5"},{"Name":"Cynthia Juarez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLxH0b846Hpf4lIV94EWYosfidMk1a_W02H0at4R36c_5eeoXPHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Probably one of the coolest bars in the fremont area. We won't on mariachi Monday and it was so nice. It wasn't packed but they usually charge a cover charge depending on the flow. They have a nice selection of cocktails and beer. I had a group of 9 and they accommodated us. Hailey was super sweet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICmgMisdw\u0026fid=0x0:0x702027e10061bf3c"],"When":"2021-12-14"}]

column32: [{"Name":"Chad Grimley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKQ9jYmNlpFc3bLPxNFFd2LZn6znccFxftYX95nd_NonKdMpbEZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Breakfast was excellent!!!  Sam our waitress was great!  Friendly and made perfect recommendations. The eggs Benedict and avocado toast were on point. Flavorful and perfect portion size. The Hennessey‚Äôs Lemonade with Peach was also amazing. And you can never go wrong with a Guinness!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBIdXZdoT7of7bd5JtQjZ8d\u0026fid=0x0:0xa44cab083a03a37a"],"When":"2026-1-11"},{"Name":"Jacqui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsQF80s0CU4R2ore33h95Z2ziT6u3UptePhXBxNcX40poY9YQh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Located on the famous Fremont Street, you have the choice to sit inside or out on the patio. We ordered the fish and chips and a Patty Melt.  Both meals were cooked perfectly. The food was very good. Our waitress was very attentive and kind. I wish the area around it was a little cleaner, but it's Fremont Street.  I would go back next time I am in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhD3vWz5ihhtZ8AUuR1IHES0\u0026fid=0x0:0xa44cab083a03a37a"],"When":"2025-10-6"},{"Name":"Saroj Poudyal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRqsi_LYtHvIR_kYgRQ2ZnLMwNVtTWxvqSLLNFifug0dHMIVdLOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome place to watch any English Premier League games. Don't go by the hours listed. They open as soon as the Premiere League games are on. If you are a Chelsea fan! This is your home in Vegas to watch games. I loved it here and folks were awesome.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCkfYPBo4oDh76UXnu-gOZJ\u0026fid=0x0:0xa44cab083a03a37a"],"When":"2025-11-30"},{"Name":"Ron Haggerton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW08CfTPJs_Sx27_n9opGdFrc82nk9gmpaH8KpLGoDyFwo6ALmK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place sits at the east end of the Fremont Street Experience.  Great location with misters to help cool the area.  Tall tables with comfortable seating and many have a great view of the activities outside.  The restaurant itself is a little run down looking and the bathrooms are not the cleanest, but the food was very good.  The Irish nachos were well done and flavorful, the Mac and cheese with beer cheese was great, and the shepherd‚Äôs pie was amazing.  Very rich and hearty.  The service was excellent and our waitress was very attentive.  There are tons of places to eat in downtown Vegas and obviously some really amazing places to get a meal, but this is some great comfort food in a nice place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEK3gtbiejOrmjgE\u0026fid=0x0:0xa44cab083a03a37a"],"When":"2025-5-31"},{"Name":"Don Frasco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuPvxDDvLHpECs698ykFNrZLS8B-2WkL9JBNycG7MIl87QEdL2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Perfect place to watch sports, people watch,  or just hangout with the crew. Came her to drink irish coffee and beers. Servers were helpful and friendly. Parking is paid garage parking only.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAMgyNyWmp6UMJUFYCLJw-c\u0026fid=0x0:0xa44cab083a03a37a"],"When":"2026-2-15"},{"Name":"855 HAUL-YOU","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLRl9RWJ1qXVBMaT_FV3NptESEllowuaWnFMYsg-EwUQomPTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Diana top notch Manager \u0026 Shelby top notch server. Best view on Fremont right next to Duece bus \u0026 safe right next to police station.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBkDrlfbVtxK8DaHyeDTwmR\u0026fid=0x0:0xa44cab083a03a37a"],"When":"2026-1-17"},{"Name":"Mary Krencik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQYPZshlt0iArd3Lp0sj4F91Nqios1wzrQPwwETmGgL2cpTKxwaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for the 2 for 1 breakfast while in Vegas and came back for the burger deal that night.  All the food was excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAeq-y377lkqTlsXOHJCKS-\u0026fid=0x0:0xa44cab083a03a37a"],"When":"2025-11-7"},{"Name":"Tim Kilmer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlpSiQ9oTvqu5HJEPtzjLWmjB-pnz6wTilik_qr-k6i_nL5ldb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Decent bloody mary, although not as spicy as I would like and did request extra spicy. Is a one star everywhere else, bloody was a 3 star, taste wise, except not spicy, drops it back down. Mojitos were mediocre and an eyebrow or eyelash in my fianc√©'s drink. Steak and shrimp, steak was tough,  and both dishes kinda heavy on the mashed potatoes that came with unwanted picks and no choice of sides anyway. Sat there for 20 minutes before someone came and was slow, people count wise. Shepherds pie also middling quality, besides heavy on the potatoes, no crusted top and light on the veggies inside. Over rated place for sure.  And, still no Guinness, six days after St Patty's Day, not acceptable, and a repetitive complaint I oberheard from others, also wanting what I did. Plates did have a decent presentation, but, was a disappointment otherwise.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDwpISlqwE\u0026fid=0x0:0xa44cab083a03a37a"],"When":"2025-3-23"}]

column5: 129 Fremont Street Experience, Las Vegas, NV 89101
column18: Featuring balconies overlooking Fremont Street, this lively club hosts DJs spinning popular music.

column32:
[{"Name":"Artisan Photogroup","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfEuLfpQs11bpfheY1gf1i2z7UbmzSvjJNvKKilq2Ij_GvVDqE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was the best part of the GN hotel. Although different nights offered different themes. We hit this one night and took a few balcony tables. Our crew had a good time drinking and watching Fremont from above. Not cheap but hey it's Vegas. Overall fun and good experience for hanging.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDwwI-QYg&fid=0x0:0x47de397337342d1"],"When":"2025-3-22"},{"Name":"Brittany Worcester","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Jr31t3vfQpOqUJFA33xmIq_zb1Mtl00MtZvnxSyDNvH9yuaJXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't say enough good things about the doorman here, Moufuce (sorry I didn't ask how to spell it). He was amazing. He caught us on our first night walking past and gave me a wristband to drink free from 9-10 (women only), which was awesome. He knew about other fun things at the hotel and was all around attentive and friendly, saying hello to use each time we walked by in the hotel and made sure we were having a great vacation. He wasn't pushy and genuinely wanted people to try the club and have a fun time. The bar itself is pretty cool, it's nice to have the option of an open air patio on Fremont with tables. With one of the stages very near the balcony, you got that music out there, but there was also music inside that people were dancing to. The bathrooms were clean and nice. The bartender was friendly, but I wish he had said before I ordered that the free drinks are only vodka drinks, though I stopped him before he poured a rum drink for me. Others are saying it's pricey, but a rum and diet on Fremont for $14 seems reasonable, especially with patio seating right by a stage.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nicole Shull","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFgEsiNhUho2zSYmoqsgVvABfT3nsvjtTOON3BohOl6yB6ZS4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"For our annual girls trip we had to try something new. Mafous was the perfect door man recruiting our group of six on Friday into Troy. We loved him, Oscar and Snowden so much we had to go back on Saturday with the whole group of nine! We were happy to meet Mohawk Mike that night who was a joy to speak to. Michael Barletto was the reason why I gave a one on service. Oscar was our favorite bartender but was busy with some servers so Michael helped our group. When we ordered drinks he not only rolled his eyes but was very short and was not pleased to have helped us. If you decide to go, please visit everyone but Michael. He is older with scraggly long hair and kills the vibes if you have to interact with him. If Michael was not there I'd give five stars!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Meka Allen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdG3490CSGf1qbgDwSeFhJsMGpGseEKrB-vMPoQKIB_cbGEd5jkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Let me start with the best part of Troy: Michael the bartender is the BEST hands down. Drinks taste great, he‚Äôs attentive, friendly and stellar service.
Next, I‚Äôll say the venue itself is a nice club atmosphere. I love the indoor/outdoor element. The vibe is good when they play the music I like. Speaking of music I can say that the entire club will let you know if the DJ is good based on if the dance floor is empty or full. On my most recent trip to Troy (1/25/2025) the managers wife was DJ-ing and the music wasn‚Äôt good at all. He rudely told me ‚Äúit‚Äôs her birthday, she can play what she wants‚Äù when I asked if they take request. Clearly she was the only one who wanted the music she was playing! 1 out of 10 would recommend if she is in charge of music.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emilia Ziomko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIbzdGZOu2qlRip4QxQVacjC5XD3TeQhcMzebNneTZak_j2Xx_c=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cruz was amazing. Hes such a good sport, and  valuable member to this establishment. Everytime we visit Vegas we come to Troys and Cruz remembers us and is always helful and friendly .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Debbie C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8AeyJb4jbwkfHiMGCh9y_CYDPYp6FvQKyItqh1xAvKsAsE-2K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If I could give this place 10 negative stars I would!  I attended a Harlem nights themed 60th birthday celebration here over the weekend. My friend reserved a section for  20 people; when she arrived there were no reserved signs on the tables and she had to keep telling people to move. Interestingly, there was another party going on at the same time next to our section with reserved signs on their tables.

Jeff gave her a price  for 20 people at  $60 per person.   Upon arrival  he told her she needed to pay an additional $200 because taxes were not included.

A few people could not make it and she wanted to substitute  other people to take their place.  Jeff told her she had to pay extra for them.  In addition, instead of giving her the left over wristbands (she paid for); he held on to them and only gave her enough for the people that were there. If she paid for 20 people then she should have been handed  20 wristbands so she could hand them out.

Bartender was slow not to mention drinks were watered down.  For the price she paid for the section we should have had a dedicated server.

Please save your time and money and avoid going here;  there are many other party places on Fremont  Street with better service, better drinks and better management!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Torina Fortson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhrPY4cqZ-hPl4_Y4pfozrulnRIq1rd9pnFdUrAx3hltDNV0vI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I reserved a section on the balcony view for my husband‚Äôs 60th birthday. I had the worse experience. #1 I spoke with Jeff on the phone he quoted me a different price over the phone and I get there it‚Äôs more than what he quoted me over the phone. Some of my party didn‚Äôt make it so he asked how many wrist bands I needed since they didn‚Äôt show he gave me the amount that was coming, so we had other friends that came to replace the ones that didn‚Äôt show and they paid me for their wristbands. I asked for the rest of the bands that were supposed to be for the ones that didn‚Äôt show. He gave me a hard time didn‚Äôt want to give me the left over bands claiming it was going to cost additional so I had some guest that didn‚Äôt have wristbands and couldn‚Äôt get the free drinks which they paid me $60 for.

The bartender was slow giving us our drinks. What all we paid for that section we should have had servers coming to us to bring us our drinks. My guest were complaining about how long it took to order a drink. Also, there was no reserve sign. I had to keep telling people they couldn‚Äôt sit in the chairs or hang in our section and had to deal with their attitudes.  I had a party of 20 and there wasn‚Äôt even enough seats for the party. Some of the party had to stand. My overall experience was terrible. The promoter Jeff was rude and I felt he treated us differently because of the color of our skin. There was an other section beside us and they didn‚Äôt have any of the problems I had, and of course they were the same color as Jeff. They had enough seating and a reserve sign and didn‚Äôt have to deal with people coming over in their section. There were other women that were waiting for their drinks for a long time and they said they were waiting a long time and they said they felt it was because they were not the right color. Everyone complained the drinks were watered down and tasted like juice. It was just TERRIBLE. I would not recommend this spot for a party if you are not the same color as Jeff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vanessa Medrano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbrMA4X9jo86MNt9g6OQTzQLVHosFoZ08rAtmMRo9oLJT48TEwMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stayed at the Golden Nugget with my fianc√© noticed they had this bar at the hotel On our last night, we decided to give it a try. The dj played a lot of early 2000s rnb n rap. I really enjoyed that. The drinks were pretty pricey but i mean everything is pricey in Vegas. They had a balcony area. Unfortunately it was closed but look like it had a nice view of the freemont experience. I would try this bar again","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Staci Alayvilla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgN9Z6R5ZSmSVwhFu_Osbdaw4uLURJDyFXsEG8CCVJOT6OC763MQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rebar is always such a fun place to come and have a cocktail. I love the vibe and energy down here. The decor is so cute.
So many locals as well as tourist gather here for a inexpensive drink and they even have amazing food served from Davie‚Äôs kitchen next-door. Fun games and lots of top shelf drink options, as well as amazing service and such fun energy and vibes.
You absolutely must come down here for a drink and to feel like you are actually home in Las Vegas!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC4-q8X7kgEHglt8VEQO42-&fid=0x0:0x494b590e73a901a5"],"When":"2026-1-29"},{"Name":"JOE THOMAS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSx4-ql9l10WUenpdDqwjJT2FQdL23A7xR9M6Doa5A8Cupy7Xz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A Must-Visit Vibe on Main Street - 5/5 Stars!
Rebar is an absolute gem in the Las Vegas Arts District and easily deserves five stars. The vibe is truly super cool‚Äîit feels effortlessly eclectic, and the setting on Main Street makes it the perfect spot to soak in the neighborhood's artistic energy.
What really made the experience stand out was the service. Both bartenders were fantastic; they were friendly, engaging, and clearly skilled. Great drinks, great conversation, and an atmosphere that just works.
If you're looking for a spot with personality, excellent staff, and a genuinely unique feel, stop scrolling and head to Rebar. I can't wait to go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhAXpznUVUPIC-yJC8UPfMAU&fid=0x0:0x494b590e73a901a5"],"When":"2025-10-20"},{"Name":"Mary Luangsaysongkham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHER23U7uoVM1mj9PcsJvXDgW99wshCyyQc4JFHjAj-51MG7HP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is such a vibe.  I would not go anywhere else. The employees here are absolutely amazing. RC, Natalie, Billy, Wesley amazing professional bartenders honestly every single staff here is amazing. You guys have to  come. If you want a chill kickback spot, this is the place to be.  1000% recommendations over & over again. Been coming here for years.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBIM74GWSaR2PFGx3vEJzkQ&fid=0x0:0x494b590e73a901a5"],"When":"2026-1-25"},{"Name":"Vaish ‚ÄúSiso‚Äù C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtcKlU2ovIl0Cv6NxU_dnrip3ODsbS8eDmpg5LC3kCKrckIuaIfg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good place to hangout n chill.  The drinks were not bad.  Beer would be a better option than cocktails.  Old fashion was extremely sweet ..
The food from Devy‚Äôs was amazing.   Everything was very fresh","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA1_Od3ewA4VMcKYneMRBU2&fid=0x0:0x494b590e73a901a5"],"When":"2025-11-13"},{"Name":"Alexa Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtC4yWG8Pihhx_zx-b4ABdtd7Yv7bNoCJ03kAhzb7bPA-qgsRA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rebar is amazing. RC, Natalie, Billy, the security guard w/ the long hair. So warm and welcoming. The people remind me of my highschool friends. The outcasts have grown up and found their space. I feel safe and welcomed here. The drinks are very cheap compared to the rest of Vegas. I highly recommend if you haven't been.

Edit 1/24/26: I forgot to mention that Wesley is also one of the best of the best bartenders ever.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCjEh9tXf-7mseJzTi3ZbfR&fid=0x0:0x494b590e73a901a5"],"When":"2025-10-25"},{"Name":"Joe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ592XZQqZYHdTT9a_L4fXUDS-uqnicFZ5S08tN3azIQpLElw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best unique, dive, fun bar anywhere. Great drink selection,  including mystery beers and shots. Great food choices. Great atmosphere.  Monday night trivia is the best! Natalie is the best bartender to be found. Friendly,  prompt, makes it worth coming here. Don't pass it up!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jimmy Krueger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-gUbb6W_YThZYi2mQDbUxrXJf-18Gf1jpRCpo2zmuRFrwhw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We checked this place out for some pre-dinner drinks and it was a great experience. Stepping through the doors is like time travel. It sent me back to growing up in the late 80s, early 90s. We sat on the back patio and watched the TVs flip through old TV shows and commercials that I haven‚Äôt even thought about in years. The drink prices are great ($3 PBR). The staff is friendly. Go check them out","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDMVhvr7upZ7uFs8Z4jeX6i&fid=0x0:0x494b590e73a901a5"],"When":"2025-8-3"},{"Name":"Natasha P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiGSEYFb7t-M50UGzcZLx083X1sQ9ho5KVGh-C4Wbbfig2JQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great dive bar, great service, reasonable prices. Definitely will return","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhC6LsG6HiPH3v9RCqovDjO8&fid=0x0:0x494b590e73a901a5"],"When":"2025-10-3"}]

The person at the counter was really nice and the store is very clean.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mary","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNSyuraWY1_x9-WfZC5adV8W0rhemiQr6GmcvwXcCz_FCA6ss=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Located across from my hotel. They have a large selection of Beer and alcohol. We picked up some tall cans before walking up and down Fremont Street. Dealt with Josh who was very friendly. Thanks guys","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXevq7fY36KPZR_xd7f6UejSwWi10e4wgiGZ_lsFWv3nEVybls=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This liquor store is attached to a jewelry/pawn shop. It is so cool. They had a huge variety of alcohol. Got me and my buddy a couple of cutwaters and walked the streets","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paul","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWx4nWB7o1YyzaMRKkyIjk5Am5iQZrnRjGdf8elinBH8Qhsn1E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"For the location,  excellent friendly service, pretty dag on good choice...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgMDoraKjwgE\u0026fid=0x0:0xae4a411d1f9f4a74"],"When":"2025-4-27"},{"Name":"Deanna Gordon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJRiPC0O3ZW9btp9aiBxBeiKybV0k_a4xcF0z-z1H9Y2Xl6mxn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Josh is the best!! He's friendly, helpful, and has a great personality. His customer service is above and beyond!!
