[{"Name":"xiaoxin xiao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEIIrzHeryua3JhknzDAR7hCXSTaf86ASvCx7amutNuuG_ZP0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really nice team and atmosphere! We and our guests enjoyed a wonderful night here, having food and drinks and talking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCIXkuMUrh3cZWHOSONJdiq&fid=0x0:0x265af1225d17f576"],"When":"2026-1-9"},{"Name":"Maestro Locke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVA1gtIdyYCW2Huwbx9o9At8vMEAIJhKAfpkbpXDJumh4quLJQi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a wedding reception here recently! First, Sherri was awesome & very helpful! She did everything she could to make sure our event was a success. The food was great, I'd recommend the wings! Staff was friendly & accommodating, drinks from the bar was mixed well. All the guests had a great time & loved the atmosphere, would highly recommend this place for a private event or just a night out in Vegas!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chelsea A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWvXhdP1TfDCllv2kScuzdiYcVf4pDg71NS5C6DrTG94wQaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This establishment delivers an unparalleled atmosphere that truly brings the vibes. From the moment you walk in, the carefully curated music sets the tone, creating an energetic yet sophisticated ambiance that‚Äôs perfect for a night out.

One standout feature is the intimate event space, which is ideal for hosting gatherings that cater to a grown and sexy crowd. Whether you‚Äôre planning a birthday celebration, a private party, or just a cozy evening with friends, this area provides the perfect backdrop for a memorable experience.

In addition to the ambiance, the venue offers a well-rounded selection of amenities. Guests can enjoy expertly prepared hookah, a menu filled with delicious food options, and an impressive array of drink choices. The diverse offerings ensure there‚Äôs something for everyone, making this spot a go-to destination for both casual outings and special occasions.

For those seeking a vibrant yet refined nightlife experience, this place checks all the boxes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDfgIGkvwE&fid=0x0:0x265af1225d17f576"],"When":"2025-1-3"},{"Name":"Lindsey Banks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-96uFBP6MqZbI8nDmFROC1FUA49UYF8usg1TYI9XPZ6P57b-P=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"LOVED my experience here! Planned a 20-30 person event and the staff helped me with a lot of details for the event! I had the full bar with sliders, tacos, fruit tray etc for food options. Currently planning the next event to have there soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDb4cKRVQ&fid=0x0:0x265af1225d17f576"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Salvatore Oggiano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW91NjuBSfYvPLAfyAGDoM_SxuBS__lyZkL3SNpPVqvPsixyg8b=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":""ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTING!" THIS IS MY THIRD YEAR IN LAS VEGAS. I LIVE AND WORK HERE FOR several periods of the year and I even have an apartment in Las Vegas. I'm Italian. As soon as I entered, both bartenders Woman" the black one and the white one, instead of greeting me, literally laughed in my face in a highly discriminatory way.  Especially the black one didn't stop laughing and was very rude (I should mention that my face looked tired due to a 16-hour flight).  Anyway, the place is "squalid and very dirty," but the bartenders, as I already said, are even worse. I pointed out this lack of manners and respect to one of the two bartenders and then I left. This is the disgusting and squalid side of beautiful Las Vegas. Avoid this place!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vegas ‚ÄúVegas‚Äù","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVwrRa0XDk-FYZVxR7cH-XRU7hlltpPPsiEZ7NzmR6ZlIq2npQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a hidden gem üíé.  Such a fantastic atmosphere and the music was awesome.  The bar has a vast variety of liquors and the service was a 10. They have a great selection of hookahs and outdoor seatimg aswell. I will be coming back and bringing family and friends.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Patricia Patrick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI1igsbQkKE7KtexACnmmSzzyePOx5emg703WKX8eQh67bWvAc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We visited this black owned establishment on Tuesday, September 6, 2022. This business is located in downtown Las Vegas. They have Trap Bingo and Karaoke on Tuesday nights. It states on their Instagram, entry was free before 10 PM. We arrived around 8:40 PM. Upon arrival outside, there is a security guard we showed ID‚Äôs to. This didn‚Äôt appear to be the rundown ghetto part of downtown Las Vegas. We felt pretty safe in this area. I‚Äôm not sure about parking, since we just took an Uber here. It did appear that they had side street parking, however I didn‚Äôt see anywhere you had to purchase it so maybe it‚Äôs free. The security guard did not check my boyfriend‚Äôs pockets or my purse before we entered. Once we entered the establishment it was quaint, clean, and had a laidback ambience. They had R&B and Hip-hop hits playing overhead. We decided to sit at the bar, but there were other patrons smoking hookah and having drinks. They do have a QR code hookah menu, where you can select your hookah flavor. We don‚Äôt smoke hookah, so we didn‚Äôt partake. The bartender Sierra was very nice, professional, and welcoming. We asked her for a drink menu, but they don‚Äôt have one. I decided to order a Bahama mama and my boyfriend ordered a Mojito. The drinks didn‚Äôt take long to make. I do feel they need a drink menu! The Bahama mama was its standard flavorful drink. It was sweetly balanced and not overly strong. My boyfriend enjoyed his Mojito and I did sample it myself. The Mojito was refreshing and pretty balanced. They also have food at this establishment, but we had already eaten before arrival. They have several TV‚Äôs right by the bar. We were able to watch the WNBA playoffs game and the US Open tennis matches. I asked the bartender what time the Trap Bingo was starting and she stated it would be around 9 PM. She also stated they would have Karaoke that night more than likely. They also have a back room area, which I was able to go view. We were informed we also could sit back here in this area, but just not at the high top tables which require reservations. I just sipped on my Bahama mama throughout our time there. The bartender checked on us consistently to see if we needed anything or wanted to order anything else. Like any bar, you can start a tab and leave it open or close it upon purchasing your items. Keep in mind they do add 18% gratuity to every bill, which seems to be a standard practice for black owned businesses these days. As the night went on, several more patrons entered the building and were seated. We also noticed that they never did Trap Bingo like the bartender stated. We stayed here for about an hour and a half and they still hadn‚Äôt started. They did start broadcasting music videos on one of the TVs, which had a statement at the bottom entitled Hip-Hop Bingo. I felt this was a bit misleading on their part as a business. I even directly asked the bartender who stated they would have Bingo on this evening. It also states this as I said on their Instagram page. I feel this is a gimmick to get patrons to come in on a Tuesday night to order drinks, hookah, and food. It appeared throughout the night at times they were going to start the Trap Bingo. It never came to fruition for some reason when we were there. I don‚Äôt not recommend this place, but definitely don‚Äôt pay attention to their advertisements. Especially the advertisements of them having Trap Bingo on Tuesday nights, if you go on a Tuesday. I do feel more than likely on a Wednesday night they do have live music and a band. This is due to the business advertising it more heavily on their Instagram and website pages. Overall this was a pretty good evening and we did enjoy ourselves for the amount of time we stayed. We decided to leave around 10 PM, because they still hadn‚Äôt started the Trap Bingo. I‚Äôm still unsure if it actually took place after we left. I think it‚Äôs great that this establishment is a black owned lounge in Las Vegas. This is quite unique and rare. You don‚Äôt find a lot of black owned establishments in Las Vegas, let alone a lounge.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICejI2Gbg&fid=0x0:0x265af1225d17f576"],"When":"2022-9-7"},{"Name":"Patricia Hughes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIZQ1A8f0ecMevPGeFM1cT4cHXMWFqkFd2uLCCduzjod2d8E5bLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best cocktail lounge in downtown Las Vegas! We celebrated our 25th Wedding Anniversary reception here in June, traveling from Chicago, the online service, the quick response to emails, and the best in person service we‚Äôve ever had!  The food, drinks and bar service was top tier! And the DJ played any and everything you wanted to hear. We had a wonderful experience! Big thanks to Sherri and her wonderful staff! We shall return!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

Woke up this morning at 6am still nothing had to cancel my order.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Harry Tellios","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUI4KSP0AD2XgBnaJglZvz7xUhXc4Z-V8JgtSpuVZjQU6NnySQkvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is what a liquor should look like and the people that work there are customer service oriented and go beyond what is expected of them. Good parking all kinds of Liquor and mixes and all that goes with it. They also have groceries at a very fair price. The place is historical and makes you feel at a Back home liquor store. Chicago style. I would suggest to check it out.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"LASVEGAS SNOWMAN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEF368RNWlA-Omd4AsViL_HfHXLoeP-GgmZXOZ71sWsk3MwNyLpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quick and to the point. Exactly what you want in a place like that.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDv19TgfQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x396931e714450359"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Christopher Pitts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxn3WOCZZRECvkgHeJJoC-gp18bJ5XC35H01O2Kl5zPcXr1VoK=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The store is 24 hours,  and i also scored a $1300 win here on the Buffalo Gold. There's a great variety of items and goods here. The only reason i have given it four stars instead of five is because the prices are a bit steep.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Homie Hookups","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJTlx4rfswD_o0saCKSLNCyqod0HrjR9MVqZE6xn-c-JKR2cw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Maxi Mart is my favorite local store where I get everything from my daily beer to dinner for my family and food for my dog.  Prices are a little higher for the most part cause it's a convenience store and they can't buy in bulk like the chain stores but they usually always have a special .99¬¢ beer in a tub full of ice right by the register for us local alcoholics.  Staff is always friendly, helpful and Kool.  One thing I haven't figured out yet is why they put up with the local homeless druggies that are always hanging out in front, back or on side of their building.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32:
[{"Name":"Paul Bowman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXskmT6N4cAP3EKip93KTgb76muAV2fRzzQ3lYTyH6pRYtECE1KLg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place never disappoints. The service is excellent. Need help? Ask any of the employees and they will most likely stop what they're doing to help you. Fantastic. Great selection too and the prices aren't bad either.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Kushner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlIPazzUVfe5ShP2dQk5XakYU6n2kuqcn7qHuEENiq2Y8BCNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Steph is a little hard to find sometimes, but are very helpful when you get them and having you sample some products as well as making good selections.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cheryl N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVw52mR7ryOF9nrqVv7fa8ZYYQYvDBrOV6humAlXtmXIWzloXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The place is huge with a wide variety of wines & spirits, beer, hard drinks. Our usuals were at great prices too.

On a Saturday,  there were at least 2 tastings, California cab & another wine. We did not partake though.

Also being Saturday,  parking was crazy. Even though you see the building sign for Total Wine when entering the mall, turn left at the stop sign to go to the front of the building for plenty of parking & proximity to the front door.

Very pleased with our first visit to Total Wine & More. Just avoid the weekend, if possible.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhCAOuBk0i70UaIR7Bb3ml59&fid=0x0:0x397608ad73a2c48"],"When":"2025-10-19"},{"Name":"Juliet Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWe8dfsQn5X6K7rGUCUIS-xLEU0FNncJAebMcpCynPpYcSJUQAeKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Holy Moly! This is a gigantic liquor store. They have the largest assortment of single shots that we‚Äôve ever seen and well priced with many costing a mere 99 cents. Incredible! The cashier was friendly both times we shopped here during our week in Vegas. The rating would be five star except that the older floor clerk was rude to us when we asked for her help to find the Dos Hombres Mescale.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICjxoLmHg&fid=0x0:0x397608ad73a2c48"],"When":"2024-4-20"},{"Name":"Angie Person","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7a7G6-m90civ683oHtblKipXGAy1txJ5LDSX1L8RgHChFb7m5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Best variety and selection and in town. Mostly good prices, but some items are much cheaper elsewhere. Parking is pretty horrible, but the lines aren't too bad, so pretty quick in and out.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John Nelson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZyObMN-7CpziOQzQ1N6Kieb-ZgYxxj29GBb8cZaQMFb-c0l8J=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very clean and professional place. Good prices. They have alcohol for every price range, and I mean every price range. They have tasting, and so many brands you'll be here for years. They also have a humidor with tons of cigars. They have mixers, gluten free alcohol etc! Anyway good place to check out even if just for fun.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICk8azayAE&fid=0x0:0x397608ad73a2c48"],"When":"2018-11-19"},{"Name":"Shiloh Roberson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJSQkzXi1-SXVfprSLGT0tp9HnscVkVU5f_jgkyrVlu7bhOg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Twice I have ordered delivery and both times it was a large mistake first time I ordered wine and saki was delivered. Stores mistake. Second I ordered 3 items 2 were out of stock. Instead of checking to see if I would like to replace it, instead they sent the one item, which was a 6 dollar item. That put the total at 14 dollars. The first time I called and they said they would send me a refund that never came. Lees is next door. I'll go there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J Souza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrVSXhcpNGaq3sGrTyWkJiMxdw77wznxa49Y2D17VyWfECrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Located at Boca Park Mall
For the most part the most of the staff here are friendly and occasionally helpful.

Like with other large liquor stores visiting on a consistent basis will enable you to catch their sales on your favorite libations.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID9pqidNw&fid=0x0:0x397608ad73a2c48"],"When":"2024-3-16"}]

column18: Family-owned chain retailer offering a wide selection of wine, beer & spirits.

column32:
[{"Name":"Keith McNamara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHPgAsWi34q5GizwOazuq8X6PEJCdSaqtrPtEjcwN5_7AdEG9P6g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Naturally, I've been to a dozen of these stores as I travel often and visit w friends blah, blah, blah...

Now for this location and more personable review.  Kelly was awesome.  I was asking targeting questions about tequila as we are strongly considering an investment in a tequila company based overseas.  She consistently offered valid answers as well as her opinions on products, marketing etc.  - she poured me a taste of two versions of Suavecito.

Most importantly even as a first timer, in this, my new local TW&M store I felt valued.  In the other areas of the store I found pleasant staff members as well.  Checkout was seamless and I even got to use some kind of discount tied to either my membership or a special of the month.

It was a winning trip.  I'm stocked up with tequila, whiskey and even alcohol-free sparkling grape juice, so it'll be a minute until I return.  But thanks to the entire crew!  Pricing & Knowledgeable Staff are key to their continued success.

Mac Will B üîô... Knowledgeable Staff with a keen eye and ears to the floor re: what is moving and trends in the booze industry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKELGdlc7BjL7hdA&fid=0x0:0x30d5a80e3d0a3c3d"],"When":"2025-5-18"},{"Name":"Jennifer H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJrhLVZ7Y-jo4rC1Ze6pguEzIlPPD9y1S3VgS4w1qjN2G3IXaHdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I used to be a staunch BevMo fan until I discovered Total Wine. The selection here is incredible, and the workers are very friendly and helpful. There is always one type of every liquor on a fantastic deal. ( At least that's what i've noticed every time I have gone.) The displays are nice and they often have in store tastings, which allow you to discover new brands and new liquor. Some women love going to the shoe store.But I feel the same way going to total wine.... Excited and eager to discover something new","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"L. Consoli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOwQoLUkp3ympBbAGYBIMiU-3BqEryDYxjnQWqk2nXyx4rpNYl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Convenient location off 95 and Centennial Pkwy. Lots of parking with handicap parking up front. Carts available at entrance. No masks required. Very neat, clean organized. Large selection from low to high prices. Very helpful, accommodating, friendly customer service. We ordered items for pickup. They called right away when items were ready. The assistant manager was quick in retrieving the items. Cashier was great. We will be returning and or ordering online.

7/5/22 Revisited Total wine today. No masks required. Still maintaining organized neat and clean interior. We were looking for specific items. We found two of them but needed help on the third. Customer service rep was extremely helpful. She went above and beyond locating the item. She climbed up the ladder to the top shelf, pushed aside boxes and found the item at the back.  She was determined to find it and we were very pleased.

Shopped here recently. No masks required. Still neat organized and clean. Shelves were well stocked. Customer service is still friendly and helpful. Checkout was fast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgID2tPfp3QE&fid=0x0:0x30d5a80e3d0a3c3d"],"When":"2022-5-7"},{"Name":"Juxycat Vegas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCaoPgSDNfYBBzD-DH-sRKpgTVj8987xN4oYFXs1Prth9H0t4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"[Above all, will I be back?]
This place is an adult version of a candy shop! It is as big as Costco, there are several tasting booths. I tried whiskey from North Carolina and flavored cocktails and of course I got bunch of them! I wish I had this brand in my area.. As a Vegas local, definitely I will be back!

1. Ambience
It is huge liquor store with many different section. From Japanese whiskey to brewery beers, you can find most of the common brands here!  Well stocked and organized. Easy to shop. Well lit, high celling and well airconditioned. Decorated sections with theme here and there. I love their wedding selection(champagnes in pretty packaging) with flower decor. They offer consultation for wedding. There is a cigar room.

2. Service
Staff was helpful to find what I was looking for and cashier was friendly.

3. Hygiene
The bottles were not dusty, floor was clean.

4. Location
It is right next to 95 and near In-N-Out burger and La-Z Boy Furniture in Centennial Hills

5. Parking
It is in a shopping plaza so there is a plenty of parking.

6. ETC
- Pick up or delivery available
- Class and event room in this location
- Gift card available
- Reward system
- Dog friendly

** If this review was helpful, please vote :) @juxycat **","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDRwc_smwE&fid=0x0:0x30d5a80e3d0a3c3d"],"When":"2023-4-26"},{"Name":"Jay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLcXiGJmNWcgYs0xJNO0HqcXE6T2WJC7bH3hmx9kJg_K1ML0A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered something online recently, and it was as simple as 1-2-3 with delivery! However, when I visit the store, I wish the customer service was a bit more attentive. I‚Äôve noticed that no one ever asks me if I want to sample a product, even though I see other customers being offered that opportunity!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"robert kehne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7GPTD6ZbqCJZe5eYdfgtX7o_UG2XBFdicX25e9U6KQftii-Xq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If I could give 6 stars I would. Absolutely top notch customer service and interaction, and a selection second to none! Amazing store.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"R. MITCHELL LLAMAS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDPao-NVGKGSKy7-j-il00CgoKBVa1mdZBW47KuInsjummLw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went today on December 5, 2024 and want to thank Vince who went to the back to get me 3 more bottles of Josh Cellars Chardonnay wine. I appreciate it so very much. You Rock.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steve Morrill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_qkNootlJ1D1jnYoaInVs1ymEPbvWPBqvMOFXXjug8wr79g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Meh. Good selection and prices are fine. My overall experience purchasing, renting, and returning a 1/4 keg of beer was lacking.

Picking up my order took over 15 min with most of the time watching the woman(dont remember name) said one minute as she ran around the front of the store filling out other orders  or something. Finally someone comes out and asks what I needed again. Get my keg, tap, tub and leave.

Go to install the party pump(tap) and of course it doesnt work. Leaks and produces nothing but foam. Life happens so I head to the store for a replacement. Kinda of get attitude because i dont know what type of tap I am holding? I dont work at Total Wine not do I work on kegs for a living. Sorry I am not up to par with these terms.

Whatever, I get my tap and leave and eventually get to enjoy my beer.

The return of the keg, tap, and tub was even worse. Employee said go grab a cart and bring up the items to front of the store. Lets me out the front of the store. I am back within 45 sec and he is off helping someone else? Um hello how about you finish this transaction first? So I get to stand around for another 5 minutes waiting for help when Tyler comes up and says if I am not purchasing anything else I can leave out the lanes.

No mention of my deposit. Again I dont work here so I assume they willl scan the items in and I will get my deposit. Now at this point I dont trust anything from your employees so I call up as I am halfway home and not to my shock I have to return to the store.

When I arrive to the store Tyler, who is the one who ends up doing my return and deposit didnt apologize for making me come back. Seemed irritated I was even at the store.

I wont be back. I would rather take my business where I am appreciated and not a bother to the employees.

TLDR : Beer good, tap bad, zero customer service. Wont be back.","Images":null,"When":""}]

column32: [{"Name":"Thomas B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4jjZCkDAvHWaDIfieb8EczOOPbmr3VDwtRPauJeRGwql2rA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in during errands today to check their bourbon and whiskey out. Was greeted by Zack, I didn‚Äôt like the pricing on some allocated bourbons, instead of just letting me leave without making a purchase, he went and checked his pricing and came back with a fair offer much closer to MSRP. We had an excellent conversation, he was humble and fair, truly a treat in today‚Äôs times. I will be frequenting this location on all my bourbons hunts going forward.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhA3VdrSnUDlN5mCu7tLODff\u0026fid=0x0:0xda01d0ad988025fd"],"When":"2025-8-20"},{"Name":"Kevin Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXysak76_DrX8V1_cW83ZUa77FuU43k1PLqA12w-tizCMFf5Xql=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"These guys helped us fill a big beer keg and liquor order for our wedding DAY OF, and went so above and beyond to make it happen. They had a great selection of wine, sparkling wine, bourbon, and top-shelf selections. The shop was clean and the staff were so friendly, Zack was a knowledgeable dude. Would 10/10 recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lisa Marie Higginbotham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLiMQTql6rp5uplX6evKKP7yCs-E7XhqFwz-8jdnAP85FDw-gs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Walked in found exactly what I wanted, and it was reasonably priced! Was treated like a regular with kindness and welcome. We will return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhANucEKTvRu72mOyhCuQ-Nn\u0026fid=0x0:0xda01d0ad988025fd"],"When":"2025-12-27"},{"Name":"Will-The-Beast","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUGLOBUmS-1sua_HxL4c5ulawTvx08ij3x8frgsy2QT-zDOsZQLg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owner was super helpful really nice, I will definitely be going back highly recommend","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elizabeth Retana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImo7bQLUeOMtbmgg4wHbrAb0CLbSBo5lzpiyCPz1TUbdqzXA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I used to drive right past this place, assuming it would be overpriced like many wholesale liquor stores. I even thought gas stations had better deals‚Äîbut I was totally wrong. This store is clean, well-organized, and surprisingly affordable. Zack was super helpful and friendly, which made the experience even better. The prices are actually lower than what you‚Äôd find at most gas stations, even for snacks! Don‚Äôt just take my word for it‚Äîstop by and see for yourself.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sam fares","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKNIDF_8TYZLKM88x725AhX9ffQPz5EQNZ0FY9EW10PG3AfpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome place. They just opened. Great selections and prices and excellent Customer service! column32:
[{"Name":"Buck Williamson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmrT8RLIaQPrl0Fz_wCscfdHUsDNF8Twiw7HoEJhMsipQvfxbKfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Navigating past those mid-range neighborhood shops is a necessary evil to get to this location, which is a horse of a different color and well worth the haul. The whole operation is spinning like a top, offering more wines than Erica could shake a stick at in a lifetime. Finding a proper selection of hard kombucha‚Äîthe absolute favorite‚Äîis usually a mission, but seeing brands like Flying Embers and JuneShine chillin' in the cooler is a proper result.
‚ÄãStepping into the Beer Cave is a fair sight better than your average walk-in, especially when hunting for kegs or large-scale beer options to keep a shindig going. Catching a tasting on the weekend is a real treat, proving the neighborly staff is actually in the business of people while they manage everything from the massive wall of minis to those clever Bulleit and Traeger gift baskets. If you‚Äôre fixin' to stock up on the real McCoy, this is the spot, don't forget to grab one of those lil' shopping carts on the way in üòé","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBxuoTEILFxyMgwv0u4MPHx&fid=0x0:0x3b517cfb94d58d"],"When":"2025-12-21"},{"Name":"Henry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUeg5tH6dD2i5vgGDTMxY0P-U6wGePpCW3EedWbRrR7o_G6EwM1ag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went in last minute.. Super helpful staff... Even found a piece of Home... Highly recommend this location","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBnKDTSkQ2cbaHlCxqb8-2S&fid=0x0:0x3b517cfb94d58d"],"When":"2026-1-1"},{"Name":"Bill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzEt_vsFWjSOaQ2j91vTr8ObCwiMR7STas78X6lrfgQWTeQw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My go to for all my liquor needs. I usually buy vodka, and Lee's liquor has the best prices in town. I usually go to this location, and the inside is clean, and the staff is friendly. If you are looking for affordable alcohol there's nowhere better.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Byron Sheardown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNqxb0c_42J36yKVRNJaOWQgsDJlMUDs94sxLG_b3F9RGXTQ_D=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Big store. Lots of selection.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhDUHwy6WLfq9qq8Oy43OaRp&fid=0x0:0x3b517cfb94d58d"],"When":"2025-11-21"},{"Name":"Jason Comfort","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnWwLnz2j5lTuU20PlNid-vnOWEMXbpdUpYAyIdx4fLZNrTxpEew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm so glad the Lee family didn't freak out after, ya know, 9/11, and cram a Korean AYCE BBQ joint in their spare broom closest. That Lee family, resilient in their plight and future stress positions are a beacon of hope for anyone who has a pulse.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICfhceqfw&fid=0x0:0x3b517cfb94d58d"],"When":"2024-12-30"},{"Name":"David Stillsmoking","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK2cjua4SPUaeZydPhH1AjMSQ9zAMTiz6wxJCn6mPgLoRZ7JA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great selection both liquor and beer.  Wine too but didn't browse.  Staff are friendly and helpful.

Managed to find gluten free beer which is a real treat.  Located a variety","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carolyn Zorn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJrod2WYc__abzJEVaTedZhSRYlxmHH6_NtlLuzvvHfYZuSXw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I live down the road from this Lee's location. I don‚Äôt frequent it unless I have to. Sullen, unhelpful and lazy employees and the store is often not stocked with what they say they have on line.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ialejo11","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJPuR4N8ElwnKKsVFc-elQldKnWTs4hF_GbtgmO8dsV1FzWIY3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything you can imagine you will find here at the best prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDv7baL1AE&fid=0x0:0x3b517cfb94d58d"],"When":"2024-12-23"}]

column32: [{"Name":"Westcoast Teddybear","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6ig5zsw_NXiVS6ZVUXC-Y_c8IBEpWuV9Y6KMS75z3SLjexEkv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sam is a good dude. We bought a case of old English malt liquor, a case of alize, a case of mad dog 2020 and a case of Mickey's malt liquor. With that purchase he gave us 4 free shots. He will also order what they dont have. My 1st time goin here and very friendly and courteous. Thanks Sam for the help and customer service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDkjpLZywE\u0026fid=0x0:0x41d88f8b7fdac461"],"When":"2018-4-29"},{"Name":"Alana Millman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZqfXeUy4P7chsX0cMgM23eMSOeOI6hR3UXv4b9IGU8M_Pql0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great selection and I always find some hidden treasures üòÅ","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Notmyfault","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZA_Vet_DT5J6PIGfErGbcDLPbqRbbeyKp6dj4_oHq3u_HFA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is AWESOME! It‚Äôs got everything you are looking for. If they don‚Äôt have it they make it a point to have the next day. Beer , sodas, juice all is the coldest in town you‚Äôre gonna find. Fast friendly and always welcoming staff! This is the way customer service should be! Keep up the good work guys.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"AmiEvil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0vAt1FpJBX1cHulurafRdy7XGVYxoZO7CYPibWu1SpM7exg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They sell alcohol and I purchased alcohol. Friendly staff","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sergio Melendez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLW-9PlmMZQa-yItvqFhsjsDRV5SxtTfhpt-4tfW8hYySVlNw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The cleanest, friendliest, and the most variety of alcohol I‚Äôve ever seen. I go out of my way to visit that store. The staff are very helpful and friendly all the time. I recommend this store to everyone in Vegas, much love 702","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lillian Steger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtL6l4AJ7hBf2l6aNN3FpDG8pSTCuCOuUp2fjP2jBuf8Mbqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Sad when Smith's is cheaper and has a better selection. Told my husband we should have gone to Lee's or the grocery store by the house. They did not carry 6 out of the 10 things we wanted for our families grad party. Left very disappointed because of way to high priced and really bad selections and funky oder. Next time we will go elsewhere even if it's a bit of a drive go to or just get were we get the food. Husband and I both agreed never going back. I guess it was a lesson well learned.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrew Chacon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI9c7rugPhtpLMdrqwguql5kO29dtj-fztkzlOxd1W0X5ou4g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've searched all over town for a place like this. The variety is top notch. They have west coast IPAs like Stone, all the mexican beers, unique flavored beers and stouts like Dragons Milk, all the wine and liquor you could imagine. The closest you'll get to Total Wine or BevMo.\n\nThe employees treat you like family and know your preferences. You cant find a better establishment, I've tried. Do yourself a favor and make this your spot, you're welcome in advance.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jay Rob","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzD9muFhU-Zq5AgrZJKzIWdOSeQMjdGpMzXjPtEFdXzoEQ9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Place is nice, had everything I needed, the workers are nice, they have variety of things cheaper than most stores, and they have bottles and snacks others stores don‚Äôt have ,100% recommend, this place is better than most liquor stores I‚Äôve bin too ..","Images":null,"When":""}]

column3: Servehzah Bottle Shop and Tap Room
column5: 1301 S Commerce St #130, Las Vegas, NV 89102
column18: Spirits & creative craft beers delivered in an industrial-style bohemian taproom.

column32:
[{"Name":"Joshua Flores","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfsacU212HOXg6PYvbg5kTTIAX5e432oXdABT8PeFsfmJ3ApY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was here on Thursday for their live band the Sonz and the drinks and vibe, they did not disappoint. The host maybe manager, two girl bartenders and the social media guy were chill And kind but homeboy with the hat needs an attitude check those drinks weren‚Äôt made with good vibes. It really makes a difference when someone loves their job and transmits that. When worker is passionate the food and drinks can be shit and somehow still can taste fire. i‚Äôll make sure to call him out next time in person on the spot in a polite manner, I was just wanted to have a good time last night . when you talk to employee and they completely ignore you that ain‚Äôt it..Tipped 18% to guy tipped the girl 20% I think her name was Maria. She took her the time to let me sample two sours was patient and attentive. I forgot to get a picture, but the Michelada flight is a must when visiting this establishment. This was my first time here I frequent the deer Springs location. The AMF I ordered was OK. Can‚Äôt go wrong with the Michelada‚Äôs.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhBisGw6ba3ntB0MZMQSlTkR&fid=0x0:0xa7b2ab1b9882e90d"],"When":"2025-11-21"},{"Name":"V W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4RpH4dOJ9BdxNac0AgJeho4QKx_KHOsdXtswgeGho9a0H64rL9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super nice and chill place to hang out at downtown / art district. I love their fresh and tasty beer! My favorite flavors are guava and pineapple. I also enjoyed the beer and the tacos from the food truck just right next to the store.

Parking could be a little hard especially on holidays or first Friday. However, this place is definitely worth walking some distance to visit.

I really enjoyed this place. I will definitely recommend it to my friends and family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgICJnsSKtQE&fid=0x0:0xa7b2ab1b9882e90d"],"When":"2023-6-27"},{"Name":"Lily Wonder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6SSLr1Hn7sUVaV5VEekQ3AhESEXsXpmw4skWbZ7oMBwdOtVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came to Servehzah on Saturday morning and had such a great experience that I had to leave a review. From the moment we walked in, we were immediately greeted with genuine care and attention. I was with my parents, who are older and very particular, and we were originally going to another nearby spot. I convinced them to try somewhere new; and I‚Äôm so glad I did.

My mom, who is extremely picky, ordered a 25 oz michelada and absolutely loved it. She said it‚Äôs the best michelada she‚Äôs had in Vegas. That alone says a lot. Sisco was so attentive. he even had her sample different beers until we found the perfect one, ‚ÄúNueva Esperanza.‚Äù That level of patience and care is rare.

On a personal note, I didn‚Äôt expect to walk in and hear Enjambre (a band I love), but that just added to the magic of the moment. We had a small bite, enjoyed the atmosphere, and truly felt taken care of.

What really stood out, though, was Sisco himself. Customers were coming in specifically to see him, and now I understand why. I live nearby and usually go to other bars, especially in the Arts District‚Ä¶but I‚Äôll be coming back here just because of Sisco. You can get drinks anywhere, but you can‚Äôt get him everywhere.

He listens, he makes thoughtful recommendations, he genuinely cares, and he asks why you chose to be there. He‚Äôs a true gem üíé Please take care of him - he made this Saturday morning special not just for my parents and me, but for everyone who walked in that day.

Thank you for allowing me to express my gratitude for Sisco. üôè","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ruben salas jr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9sgTG1Xs3WBhPyvNSGETr_K2b9ChbMYeWtaEGMfjwck7Y619D=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best brewery in town and the food trucks outside are delicious üòã great place and the bartenders are kind and helpful üòÄ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIABIhATy07ffGAatCT8wWoRgTrl&fid=0x0:0xa7b2ab1b9882e90d"],"When":"2025-11-5"},{"Name":"Jeff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXq55SeVa9NOEAPNNkud1seoWPAYnroPQkYxnEBEX07YDKNV1w54Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beer flights with some unique sour flavors. A friend took us here, and I liked the decor and the overall experience. For unique experiences Las Vegas arts district is definitely a place to explore not just the usual touristy hustle and bustle of the strip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDZs9HUDg&fid=0x0:0xa7b2ab1b9882e90d"],"When":"2023-10-7"},{"Name":"Tyrell Scott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGEprAMHakdBW4bVJcYGGPo0mcyVVavg9y1ZgFZHmaVlHXtwSL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was at the top of my list for my trip to the Arts District and it did not disappoint. The tap list was stellar, the service was on point and the can fridge had so many amazing things that it was almost overwhelming. The space is well put together and has relaxed vibe. I am sure it gets pretty busy on a weekend so it may not always be so relaxed. They do have a small corkage fee for any of the cans in the fridge you want to drink. If you are looking for some great beers then you have found THE place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sCIHM0ogKEICAgIDR3eXAqAE&fid=0x0:0xa7b2ab1b9882e90d"],"When":"2023-5-1"},{"Name":"Lily","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKJPPoNHLrcpvmeRhI2zC8EzexbrSBsYg4_sPU0xnajZEIkTp5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went in for a quick drink on halloween. The pirate bartender Carrie Ann helped me out, super fast and friendly service. I got the hellmouth special cocktail - i like sweet and spicy and the little candy on top was a cute touch","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Casandra Ortega","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFe4c0idk-pi80oJTrJhGVTW3iE1kvCpRiGO17S7GP1DhENA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bleu was the absolute best bartender. He was so attentive and accommodating. I got a white tea shot and he told me white tea was better than green tea because I don‚Äôt like whiskey. Homeboy needs a raise

Vida was so sweet and took a group photo.","Images":null,"When":""}]
